char_102_texas.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_102_texas.text: My next mission is to protect you, Doctor.

char_102_texas.title: Talk 1
char_102_texas.text: I don't say much? That's because I'd rather avoid thinking about most things.

char_102_texas.title: Talk 2
char_102_texas.text: Our job is to deliver life and death.

char_102_texas.title: Talk 3
char_102_texas.text: I usually listen to Sora's songs when I'm driving.

char_102_texas.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_102_texas.text: Cigarette? Oh, no, this is chocolate. You've gotta replenish your energy regularly. Which reminds me... do you want some coffee?

char_102_texas.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_102_texas.text: How long have I worked for Penguin Logistics? When did I start...? I don't even know how long it's been.

char_102_texas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_102_texas.text: Watch out for the Red Wolf. She's not evil, but... she's not like us.

char_102_texas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_102_texas.text: No matter how hard I run, my past will catch up to me one day.

char_102_texas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_102_texas.text: My independent lifestyle and rowdy friends have brought me a lot of trouble... but I kind of like it this way.

char_102_texas.title: Idle
char_102_texas.text: Is it time for a break?

char_102_texas.title: Onboard
char_102_texas.text: Code name Texas. I'm responsible for driving, moving cargo, and keeping our people safe. Try to get the mission briefings as concise as possible, please.

char_102_texas.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_102_texas.text: I'm not good at barking orders.

char_102_texas.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_102_texas.text: A few of them got through.

char_102_texas.title: Operation Failure
char_102_texas.text: I may have underestimated this operation.

char_102_texas.title: Assigned to Facility
char_102_texas.text: Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.

char_500_noirc.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_500_noirc.text: What's up, Doctor? Me, I'm just on standby.

char_500_noirc.title: Talk 1
char_500_noirc.text: My shield? Fun fact: I personally provide a portion of the energy it needs.

char_500_noirc.title: Talk 2
char_500_noirc.text: What I look like beneath the mask? Well, I... Actually, let's keep it secret for a bit longer.

char_500_noirc.title: Talk 3
char_500_noirc.text: Man, nothing better than a break after you finish a mission.

char_500_noirc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_500_noirc.text: Doctor, if I get to know you better, I figure my shield's gonna get even sturdier.

char_500_noirc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_500_noirc.text: Course I know where my limit's at. But I don't want Yato to worry about me, which is what matters. We'll worry about the rest some other time!

char_500_noirc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_500_noirc.text: There's always the need for guys like me, you know? Nah, I'm not trying to act high and mighty. What I'm saying is: when you have a VIP plus a lot of danger, you need a guy to stand between them, that's all.

char_500_noirc.title: Idle
char_500_noirc.text: Sometimes you've just gotta take off the mask and catch a breather.

char_500_noirc.title: Onboard
char_500_noirc.text: Defender Noir Corne, reporting for duty. You need VIP protection, I'm your guy.

char_500_noirc.title: Watching Battle Record
char_500_noirc.text: Cool... So this stuff is what Grandpa Rangers was talking about earlier.

char_500_noirc.title: Depart
char_500_noirc.text: Holding the line is a Defender's most important job!

char_500_noirc.title: 4-star Result
char_500_noirc.text: Even guys like me are happy to get through tough battles like these.

char_500_noirc.title: Operation Failure
char_500_noirc.text: This wouldn't have happened if I'd worn my good mask! God dammit!

char_500_noirc.title: Trust Tap
char_500_noirc.text: You wanna get some drinks after work?

char_503_rang.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_503_rang.text: Doctor, I greatly admire your genius. It's my honor to be your guard.

char_503_rang.title: Talk 1
char_503_rang.text: A man of my experience can tell you'll be a great leader one day, Doctor.

char_503_rang.title: Talk 2
char_503_rang.text: I have an unusual skin tone, you say? Hah. Just a souvenir from back when I snuck into a biolab, and... Please, I'm joking around.

char_503_rang.title: Talk 3
char_503_rang.text: I need to wear this scarf, even when I sleep, or else my neck will get cold.

char_503_rang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_503_rang.text: This face of mine might be a little too exotic for your typical townsfolk. Heh, I tend to draw a curious crowd when I wander.

char_503_rang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_503_rang.text: I'm surprised how polite you are to this old man! Not many besides Durin ask after my health.

char_503_rang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_503_rang.text: When I go barefoot, I can sense enemies through their vibrations on the ground.

char_503_rang.title: Idle
char_503_rang.text: Hmm... Snoring is a bad habit. The other rangers will hear you.

char_503_rang.title: Onboard
char_503_rang.text: I'm Rangers, the Sniper. Call whenever you need me.

char_503_rang.title: Watching Battle Record
char_503_rang.text: Not bad.

char_503_rang.title: Added to Squad
char_503_rang.text: My turn, is it?

char_503_rang.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_503_rang.text: Good. Let me show you what an old man can do.

char_503_rang.title: Depart
char_503_rang.text: Let's get going.

char_503_rang.title: Begin Operation
char_503_rang.text: Prey spotted. Commence operation.

char_503_rang.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_503_rang.text: I'm waiting for orders.

char_503_rang.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_503_rang.text: What are your orders?

char_503_rang.title: Deployment 1
char_503_rang.text: Alright.

char_503_rang.title: Deployment 2
char_503_rang.text: Got it.

char_503_rang.title: In Battle 1
char_503_rang.text: Found you!

char_503_rang.title: In Battle 2
char_503_rang.text: Taste my arrow!

char_503_rang.title: 4-star Result
char_503_rang.text: Challenge after challenge. Exactly what we wanted. Right, Noir Corne?

char_503_rang.title: 3-star Result
char_503_rang.text: What a satisfying battle!

char_503_rang.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_503_rang.text: A few of them got through. I'd call that decent.

char_503_rang.title: Operation Failure
char_503_rang.text: Oh no, I'm out of breath...

char_503_rang.title: Assigned to Facility
char_503_rang.text: If you need anything, just say the word.

char_503_rang.title: Tap
char_503_rang.text: Urgh! Please, leave my tail be...

char_503_rang.title: Trust Tap
char_503_rang.text: You like me that much, huh? Weird taste, I gotta say.

char_503_rang.title: Title
char_503_rang.text: Arknights.

char_503_rang.title: Greeting
char_503_rang.text: Doctor, how can I help you?

char_501_durin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_501_durin.text: Morning, Doctor... Mind if I lay out my sleeping bag here...? Thanks. The rest is up to you...

char_501_durin.title: Talk 1
char_501_durin.text: How do I fight? Using Arts, of course... Want me to show you the power of earth?

char_501_durin.title: Talk 2
char_501_durin.text: What time is it...? See, I don't work mornings, noons, afternoons, or nights...

char_501_durin.title: Talk 3
char_501_durin.text: You'll make an S-sized uniform for me...? No thanks. My oversized one works as a sheet when I take naps... plus, it's really warm.

char_501_durin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_501_durin.text: Dooooctoooooor? I need a break! I'm competing in the Speedy Sleep Contest.

char_501_durin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_501_durin.text: Doctor, check this out. This isn't my normal wand, it's a pendulum. You're feeling very sleepy and will nap in five minutes without giving me any work... Zzzz...

char_501_durin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_501_durin.text: I was hoping I could tell you about my homeland, Doctor.

char_501_durin.title: Idle
char_501_durin.text: After you went to sleep, I somehow didn't feel sleepy at all anymore... Hmmmph...

char_501_durin.title: Onboard
char_501_durin.text: Hello? Hellooooo? Can you hear me? Down here. Down heeeeere! Nice meeting you, big Doctor. I'm Durin the Caster.

char_501_durin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_501_durin.text: Whoa... I've fiiiinally gotten s-tron-ger.

char_501_durin.title: Added to Squad
char_501_durin.text: The secret to staying healthy is to sleep whenever you can.

char_501_durin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_501_durin.text: Captain's orders: everyone, save your energy and take a nap!

char_501_durin.title: Depart
char_501_durin.text: I wanna dig a hole in the ground and make a shelter to sleep in, if you don't mind.

char_501_durin.title: Begin Operation
char_501_durin.text: Take over for me. Thaaanks.

char_501_durin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_501_durin.text: Wooo.

char_501_durin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_501_durin.text: Hmm?

char_501_durin.title: Deployment 1
char_501_durin.text: What a pain.

char_501_durin.title: Deployment 2
char_501_durin.text: Okaaaay, I'll do it.

char_501_durin.title: In Battle 1
char_501_durin.text: You're going down!

char_501_durin.title: In Battle 2
char_501_durin.text: Gooooooo!

char_501_durin.title: 4-star Result
char_501_durin.text: Why do we have annoying missions like this? Can't we do something easier...? Still, it's nice that we won.

char_501_durin.title: 3-star Result
char_501_durin.text: Of course we won. I worked real hard supporting you with my Arts.

char_501_durin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_501_durin.text: Doctor, are you still worried about those ones that got through?

char_501_durin.title: Operation Failure
char_501_durin.text: Ugghh... Sorry... I'll try harder next time...

char_501_durin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_501_durin.text: The Land of Giants... Here I aaaaaaaaaaaaaaam!

char_501_durin.title: Tap
char_501_durin.text: Hmmm?

char_501_durin.title: Trust Tap
char_501_durin.text: I'm in a good mood, so how about a magic trick?

char_501_durin.title: Title
char_501_durin.text: Arknights.

char_501_durin.title: Greeting
char_501_durin.text: *Yawn*... Good morning...

char_502_nblade.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_502_nblade.text: Hey, Doctor. Do me a favor and just tell me what you need done.

char_502_nblade.title: Talk 1
char_502_nblade.text: I'll be watching you even when I'm off duty.

char_502_nblade.title: Talk 2
char_502_nblade.text: Hm? Do you need something?

char_502_nblade.title: Talk 3
char_502_nblade.text: My skin is sensitive to sunlight. So please assign me to nighttime missions, whenever you can.

char_502_nblade.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_502_nblade.text: There's limits to what I'm capable of, but even so, I want to help ease the burden you carry, Doctor.

char_502_nblade.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_502_nblade.text: I can't help but feel just a little envious when I see how the other Operators fight...

char_502_nblade.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_502_nblade.text: I need no particular reason to fight for you, Doctor. I hope to see an exciting frontline battle someday...

char_502_nblade.title: Idle
char_502_nblade.text: Doctor, let me be your guardian, now and forever...

char_502_nblade.title: Onboard
char_502_nblade.text: Vanguard Yato here. Are you the one I'm protecting?

char_502_nblade.title: Watching Battle Record
char_502_nblade.text: Thank you.

char_502_nblade.title: Added to Squad
char_502_nblade.text: Yato has joined the team.

char_502_nblade.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_502_nblade.text: We're ready to execute your plans, Doctor.

char_502_nblade.title: Depart
char_502_nblade.text: All Operators, be on alert.

char_502_nblade.title: Begin Operation
char_502_nblade.text: Targets spotted. Get ready for battle.

char_502_nblade.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_502_nblade.text: Here.

char_502_nblade.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_502_nblade.text: Go ahead.

char_502_nblade.title: Deployment 1
char_502_nblade.text: Got it.

char_502_nblade.title: Deployment 2
char_502_nblade.text: Understood!

char_502_nblade.title: In Battle 1
char_502_nblade.text: In a blink of eye!

char_502_nblade.title: In Battle 2
char_502_nblade.text: Prepare yourself!

char_502_nblade.title: In Battle 3
char_502_nblade.text: Haaaaghhh!

char_502_nblade.title: In Battle 4
char_502_nblade.text: Slash you down!

char_502_nblade.title: 4-star Result
char_502_nblade.text: As long as we follow the Doctor's orders, we won't have any problems.

char_502_nblade.title: 3-star Result
char_502_nblade.text: The Doctor's brilliant command was the key to victory.

char_502_nblade.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_502_nblade.text: Victory is the most welcome news.

char_502_nblade.title: Operation Failure
char_502_nblade.text: I apologize... We failed to execute your plan, Doctor...

char_502_nblade.title: Assigned to Facility
char_502_nblade.text: Please send me somewhere that sunlight can never touch.

char_502_nblade.title: Tap
char_502_nblade.text: *Gasp*!

char_502_nblade.title: Trust Tap
char_502_nblade.text: Doctor, thank you for always taking care of us.

char_502_nblade.title: Title
char_502_nblade.text: Arknights.

char_502_nblade.title: Greeting
char_502_nblade.text: Doctor, I will be your shield.

char_122_beagle.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_122_beagle.text: Doctor, I'm your guard for the day! Don't worry, I won't let any sketchy people near you! Just relax!

char_122_beagle.title: Talk 1
char_122_beagle.text: My training score for today...? Um, I mean, we could talk about something else...

char_122_beagle.title: Talk 2
char_122_beagle.text: I can't shake the pre-battle jitters, and that makes Captain Fang really nervous too... What should I do? Doctor!

char_122_beagle.title: Talk 3
char_122_beagle.text: Hibiscus and Lava always complain to me about each other, but both of them are my good friends, and neither of them are wrong... Doctor, what should I do?

char_122_beagle.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_122_beagle.text: Instructor Dobermann always told us, 'Even when after you finish your training, your number one goal on the battlefield is to stay alive.' Urgh... How can I become as strong and awesome as she is?

char_122_beagle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_122_beagle.text: I'm still a rookie Operator, but I'm working hard! Hehehe, I'd really love a compliment or two, if you agree.

char_122_beagle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_122_beagle.text: My Oripathy? It doesn't bother me all that much, I'm used to it. I just want to be with the people I care about until my disease gets cured... Ughh...

char_122_beagle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_122_beagle.text: I didn't have much confidence before I came here, but I'm so glad that I can protect you and everyone on Rhodes Island! It's my dream to protect everyone! I really wish days like these could last forever.

char_122_beagle.title: Idle
char_122_beagle.text: Aww... seeing the Doctor sleeping all vulnerable like that makes me want to doodle something on a certain someone's face...

char_122_beagle.title: Onboard
char_122_beagle.text: My codename is Beagle! I know I didn't do very well on my assessment, but I'll still do my best at my internship!

char_122_beagle.title: Watching Battle Record
char_122_beagle.text: I did it! I've become stronger!

char_122_beagle.title: Promotion 1
char_122_beagle.text: Finally, FINALLY! Now nobody's going to call me 'the Rookiest Rookie in the Rookieverse' anymore!

char_122_beagle.title: Added to Squad
char_122_beagle.text: I'll do all I can!

char_122_beagle.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_122_beagle.text: Huh? I am the leader? I don't feel right about Fang not being the leader...

char_122_beagle.title: Depart
char_122_beagle.text: Everyone, let's roll out!

char_122_beagle.title: Begin Operation
char_122_beagle.text: Everyone, enemies incoming!

char_122_beagle.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_122_beagle.text: Grant me strength!

char_122_beagle.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_122_beagle.text: Is it my turn?

char_122_beagle.title: Deployment 1
char_122_beagle.text: Target location reached!

char_122_beagle.title: Deployment 2
char_122_beagle.text: This is the place!

char_122_beagle.title: In Battle 1
char_122_beagle.text: Haah!

char_122_beagle.title: In Battle 2
char_122_beagle.text: Watch this!

char_122_beagle.title: 4-star Result
char_122_beagle.text: It's my duty to protect everyone! My resolve will never falter, no matter the odds!

char_122_beagle.title: 3-star Result
char_122_beagle.text: All enemies have been defeated! We Rhodes Island Operators are the finest!

char_122_beagle.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_122_beagle.text: Hooray, we won! Although a few enemies managed to get away... *sigh*...

char_122_beagle.title: Operation Failure
char_122_beagle.text: I'm sorry... so sorry...

char_122_beagle.title: Assigned to Facility
char_122_beagle.text: What can I do for you?

char_122_beagle.title: Tap
char_122_beagle.text: Doctor! Th-That tickles!

char_122_beagle.title: Trust Tap
char_122_beagle.text: Doctor, can I come to your place to study every day?

char_122_beagle.title: Title
char_122_beagle.text: Arknights.

char_122_beagle.title: Greeting
char_122_beagle.text: Hi, Doctor!

char_123_fang.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_123_fang.text: Is there anything I can help you with, Doctor?

char_123_fang.title: Talk 1
char_123_fang.text: Thank you for believing in me! I'll keep up my work!

char_123_fang.title: Talk 2
char_123_fang.text: Hibiscus and Lava are fighting again... What a pain. Why are they like this? They're sisters.

char_123_fang.title: Talk 3
char_123_fang.text: Instructor Dobermann puts us through mock battles a lot, but I can never get a handle on her skill. Doctor, next time you and Amiya observe our training, would you please give us some notes?

char_123_fang.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_123_fang.text: Someone on my team is late again, huh? I'll make sure that gets fixed.

char_123_fang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_123_fang.text: Lava and I are both Infected, but I didn't get a talent for Arts like she did...

char_123_fang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_123_fang.text: Rhodes Island is our home and shelter, Doctor. I will protect everyone here with my life.

char_123_fang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_123_fang.text: The ever-honest and reliable Beagle, the perceptive Kroos, the resourceful Lava and the energetic Hibiscus. I like everyone in this team... as long as Hibiscus doesn't force her health food innovations on me.

char_123_fang.title: Idle
char_123_fang.text: Shhh! The Doctor's resting. We can talk outside.

char_123_fang.title: Onboard
char_123_fang.text: Lancer Fang, captain of Reserve Op Team A1. My team and I will do our best to serve Rhodes Island.

char_123_fang.title: Watching Battle Record
char_123_fang.text: Thank you for your guidance.

char_123_fang.title: Promotion 1
char_123_fang.text: Your approval means so much to me, Doctor. This promotion proves my hard work is paying off.

char_123_fang.title: Added to Squad
char_123_fang.text: Leave it to me.

char_123_fang.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_123_fang.text: I know the captain's duty well. Rest easy.

char_123_fang.title: Depart
char_123_fang.text: Team, check your gear before departing.

char_123_fang.title: Begin Operation
char_123_fang.text: Enemy spotted. Prepare to fight!

char_123_fang.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_123_fang.text: Ready for action.

char_123_fang.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_123_fang.text: On standby.

char_123_fang.title: Deployment 1
char_123_fang.text: In position.

char_123_fang.title: Deployment 2
char_123_fang.text: Leave it to us.

char_123_fang.title: In Battle 1
char_123_fang.text: Thrust!

char_123_fang.title: In Battle 2
char_123_fang.text: Everyone, follow me!

char_123_fang.title: 4-star Result
char_123_fang.text: With the right plan, even rookies like us can win a tough fight!

char_123_fang.title: 3-star Result
char_123_fang.text: We have accomplished our objective as planned.

char_123_fang.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_123_fang.text: We can't call a mission complete if we let even a single enemy get through. Beagle, let's do better on the next one.

char_123_fang.title: Operation Failure
char_123_fang.text: I'm sorry I failed you, Instructor Dobermann...

char_123_fang.title: Assigned to Facility
char_123_fang.text: Yes. I'm back. Is Kroos here too?

char_123_fang.title: Tap
char_123_fang.text: Ahh...!

char_123_fang.title: Trust Tap
char_123_fang.text: Am I helping?

char_123_fang.title: Title
char_123_fang.text: Arknights.

char_123_fang.title: Greeting
char_123_fang.text: I'm ready whenever you need me, Doctor.

char_124_kroos.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_124_kroos.text: Doctor, it's such a nice day, so can't we take a little nap?

char_124_kroos.title: Talk 1
char_124_kroos.text: Hmm...? We're about to leave? But I just got up... Wait, is this the Doctor's office? How'd I get here?

char_124_kroos.title: Talk 2
char_124_kroos.text: Why am I always squinting? Because I don't want anyone to see my eyes. Nope, nobody~

char_124_kroos.title: Talk 3
char_124_kroos.text: I'm really careless and get hurt a lot... But Hibiscus heals me every time, so I'm not afraid of getting injured. Oh gosh, that 'Curing Cuisine' of hers though, I'm terrified of it...

char_124_kroos.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_124_kroos.text: Doctor! Someone left 10 alarm clocks by my bed! Who would do something so awful?!

char_124_kroos.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_124_kroos.text: Doctor, let's play a game~ Put an apple on your head and we'll start~

char_124_kroos.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_124_kroos.text: I'm always looking for fun things to do as a way to ease the pain of my Oripathy, I guess. Plus, I love seeing other people smile~

char_124_kroos.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_124_kroos.text: One day, our journey with Rhodes Island will come to an end, and hopefully we'll all get to have a warm, neverending dream, lying in the sunshine~ That's my number one dream~

char_124_kroos.title: Idle
char_124_kroos.text: Can't believe the Doctor's a heavier sleeper than me...

char_124_kroos.title: Onboard
char_124_kroos.text: Hi-hiii~ I'm Kroos~ I might be inexperienced, but I'll do the best I can~

char_124_kroos.title: Watching Battle Record
char_124_kroos.text: Thank you so much!

char_124_kroos.title: Promotion 1
char_124_kroos.text: A promotion~ What a lovely dream~ Huh? I'm not dreaming?

char_124_kroos.title: Added to Squad
char_124_kroos.text: Umm, where's the rally point?

char_124_kroos.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_124_kroos.text: Huhhh~? Fang would make a better captain than me!

char_124_kroos.title: Depart
char_124_kroos.text: Listen, everyone~! Stay calm~

char_124_kroos.title: Begin Operation
char_124_kroos.text: Why can't everyone try to get along...?

char_124_kroos.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_124_kroos.text: Sure!

char_124_kroos.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_124_kroos.text: Let's take it slow~

char_124_kroos.title: Deployment 1
char_124_kroos.text: Mmhmm, I'm listening~

char_124_kroos.title: Deployment 2
char_124_kroos.text: I won't sleep on the job~

char_124_kroos.title: In Battle 1
char_124_kroos.text: There you are!

char_124_kroos.title: In Battle 2
char_124_kroos.text: Heeere I aaaaam!

char_124_kroos.title: In Battle 3
char_124_kroos.text: Take aim!

char_124_kroos.title: 4-star Result
char_124_kroos.text: Phew, that was tough...

char_124_kroos.title: 3-star Result
char_124_kroos.text: I think we did alright!

char_124_kroos.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_124_kroos.text: Hmm, I guess this was a bit of a letdown...

char_124_kroos.title: Operation Failure
char_124_kroos.text: S-sorry... I'll fight harder next time...!

char_124_kroos.title: Assigned to Facility
char_124_kroos.text: Can I get my beauty sleep in here?

char_124_kroos.title: Tap
char_124_kroos.text: Ughh...

char_124_kroos.title: Trust Tap
char_124_kroos.text: Hmm, have I matured?

char_124_kroos.title: Title
char_124_kroos.text: Arknights.

char_124_kroos.title: Greeting
char_124_kroos.text: Doctor~ *Yawn*...

char_121_lava.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_121_lava.text: Need something? If you don't ,how about some divination?

char_121_lava.title: Talk 1
char_121_lava.text: Just tell me when there's work to do. But don't ever put her and me on the same team. I hate her guts. And don't get me started on all the weird food she makes me eat... Just thinking about it makes me... euurghh...

char_121_lava.title: Talk 2
char_121_lava.text: No one told me Hibiscus was at Rhodes Island before I got here... It's too late for me to quit now.

char_121_lava.title: Talk 3
char_121_lava.text: If you grow up sheltered, you don't know how to taunt, how to destroy, and how to handle yourself in a real fight. Am I right, Doctor?

char_121_lava.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_121_lava.text: Have you ever heard the saying 'little sisters are justice'? If that's true, then my big sis is evil by default... at least as far as I'm concerned.

char_121_lava.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_121_lava.text: Instruments? I can play the piano a little. My teacher in Leithanien said learning an instrument can improve your Arts affinity. It also apparently eases the impact that Oripathy has on your mind...

char_121_lava.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_121_lava.text: I'm starving... Huh, what's this? You keep sweets in here? Nom... I'm in the middle of training. Should I really be eating this?

char_121_lava.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_121_lava.text: See, like, I don't have a big beef with Hibiscus... It's all water under the bridge. I'm fine with her as long as she doesn't force me to eat her medicine and food. After all, she was the one... who saved my life...

char_121_lava.title: Idle
char_121_lava.text: I almost envy your ability to sleep like a log...

char_121_lava.title: Onboard
char_121_lava.text: I'm Lava, a Caster, here to join you simply because I'm bored and want something to do… But I heard my sworn nemesis is here too, though... Can I just quit now?

char_121_lava.title: Watching Battle Record
char_121_lava.text: Thanks.

char_121_lava.title: Promotion 1
char_121_lava.text: Did you forget? I don't need a cause to work for, and I don't need a team... but... thanks, I guess...

char_121_lava.title: Added to Squad
char_121_lava.text: As far as teamwork's concerned... I don't mind, as long as nobody messes up.

char_121_lava.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_121_lava.text: I'm not good at this sort of stuff, but if you insist...

char_121_lava.title: Depart
char_121_lava.text: Let's go. Keep an eye on my back.

char_121_lava.title: Begin Operation
char_121_lava.text: I can see their souls. They're mine to reap.

char_121_lava.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_121_lava.text: What are you waiting for?

char_121_lava.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_121_lava.text: Hurry up.

char_121_lava.title: Deployment 1
char_121_lava.text: Come on.

char_121_lava.title: Deployment 2
char_121_lava.text: That's it.

char_121_lava.title: In Battle 1
char_121_lava.text: It's game over for you.

char_121_lava.title: In Battle 2
char_121_lava.text: Even the dead can't save you.

char_121_lava.title: 4-star Result
char_121_lava.text: The supreme form of Arts. I'm interested in seeing what it's like.

char_121_lava.title: 3-star Result
char_121_lava.text: I foresaw this result earlier. A perfect victory.

char_121_lava.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_121_lava.text: Well… My fortune telling isn't always right. Sometimes there's a lot of external noise that affects the outcome.

char_121_lava.title: Operation Failure
char_121_lava.text: Dammit... These evil spirits are too strong...

char_121_lava.title: Assigned to Facility
char_121_lava.text: Oh, come on. I'd rather be alone.

char_121_lava.title: Tap
char_121_lava.text: Don't touch me! Uaghh!

char_121_lava.title: Trust Tap
char_121_lava.text: Eh, you're not scoring any points with me like that!

char_121_lava.title: Title
char_121_lava.text: Arknights.

char_121_lava.title: Greeting
char_121_lava.text: Oh, it's you, Doctor. Morning.

char_120_hibisc.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_120_hibisc.text: Did you call for me, Doctor? I feel so happy to be with you!

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk 1
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor! Dr. Kal'tsit said that you need to look after your health more. In two words, E-A-T L-E-S-S! So there!

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk 2
char_120_hibisc.text: You know, Doctor, if my sister starts getting all bossy with you, you have to tell me! She needs my treatment or else!

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk 3
char_120_hibisc.text: Dr. Kal'tsit teaches me a ton of practical stuff, although it's tough to actually learn! At least I've always had a knack for nutrition, so I think I'm doing well with that!

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_120_hibisc.text: I feel better about everyone here, compared to when I just joined Rhodes Island! And they all eat my healthy food on schedule! But... why does everyone pull these weird faces when they finish?

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_120_hibisc.text: Tadaaaaaah! A special healthy meal just for you, Doctor! Decaf coffee and a hamburger without meat, cheese, pickles, or lettuce! Oh, and a mixed salad made of 12 different vegetables!

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_120_hibisc.text: Hey, Doctor, where does your family live? Are they doing well? I know there's things you can't tell them about because they're your family... but, still, I think you've got to reach out. You have to try, at least.

char_120_hibisc.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_120_hibisc.text: Isn't it lonely cooking all by yourself? Let me help you out! Oh, right, and let's get Lava in here too!

char_120_hibisc.title: Idle
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor, did you fall asleep? Have a good rest then. You need to sleep plenty to stay healthy.

char_120_hibisc.title: Onboard
char_120_hibisc.text: This is intern Hibiscus. From now on, I'll be in charge of managing yours and every Operator's health at Rhodes Island. Thank you for your cooperation!

char_120_hibisc.title: Watching Battle Record
char_120_hibisc.text: Oh, I see! So that's how you do it!

char_120_hibisc.title: Promotion 1
char_120_hibisc.text: It's my honor to be promoted! I'm looking forward to working under you for the health management of us all, Doctor!

char_120_hibisc.title: Added to Squad
char_120_hibisc.text: I won't fail you! I'll protect everyone!

char_120_hibisc.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_120_hibisc.text: Acknowledged! I'll take good care of everyone! First, I need to get my special sustained-release medicine ready...

char_120_hibisc.title: Depart
char_120_hibisc.text: Please take good care of yourself while I'm gone!

char_120_hibisc.title: Begin Operation
char_120_hibisc.text: Ready to heal!

char_120_hibisc.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_120_hibisc.text: Don't be afraid!

char_120_hibisc.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor?

char_120_hibisc.title: Deployment 1
char_120_hibisc.text: There we go.

char_120_hibisc.title: Deployment 2
char_120_hibisc.text: It's safe here!

char_120_hibisc.title: In Battle 1
char_120_hibisc.text: Please come to your senses!

char_120_hibisc.title: In Battle 2
char_120_hibisc.text: I can heal that wound in no time!

char_120_hibisc.title: 4-star Result
char_120_hibisc.text: Even if everyone gets wounded, I can heal them all with my staff!

char_120_hibisc.title: 3-star Result
char_120_hibisc.text: Looking after everyone's health is my greatest motivation.

char_120_hibisc.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor! Everyone! Are you alright?

char_120_hibisc.title: Operation Failure
char_120_hibisc.text: No... First aid needed!

char_120_hibisc.title: Assigned to Facility
char_120_hibisc.text: Anything I can help with?

char_120_hibisc.title: Tap
char_120_hibisc.text: Oh, my~!

char_120_hibisc.title: Trust Tap
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor, do you want to have a taste of my new vitamin drink?

char_120_hibisc.title: Title
char_120_hibisc.text: Arknights.

char_120_hibisc.title: Greeting
char_120_hibisc.text: Doctor! Would you mind tasting this?

char_208_melan.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_208_melan.text: H-Hello, Doctor... It's nice meeting you...

char_208_melan.title: Talk 1
char_208_melan.text: Um... Sorry... I'm not a good talker...

char_208_melan.title: Talk 2
char_208_melan.text: Yes... My parents are Victorian merchants. But I haven't been able to contact them for a long time... I picked this code name because it reminds me of home.

char_208_melan.title: Talk 3
char_208_melan.text: Th-That masked Operator... makes me feel... nervous...

char_208_melan.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_208_melan.text: It's not that... I'm trying to avoid people, it's just, I'm not sure... what I should do...

char_208_melan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_208_melan.text: Sorry to make you worry again, Ansel... But you don't have to give me special treatment. Many more people need your help.

char_208_melan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_208_melan.text: Oripathy granted me powerful senses, but they're slipping away, little by little... Even so, I will not crumble... There's so much more I want to talk about with everyone...

char_208_melan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_208_melan.text: Doctor, could you take this bottle of perfume, please? I brought it from home... This type of perfume lifts spirits. I often take a sniff when I feel down.

char_208_melan.title: Idle
char_208_melan.text: Merry? Keep it down... The Doctor is very tired.

char_208_melan.title: Onboard
char_208_melan.text: I'm Melantha... From now on, my blade is yours.

char_208_melan.title: Watching Battle Record
char_208_melan.text: Thank you... for your guidance.

char_208_melan.title: Promotion 1
char_208_melan.text: Thank you very much... Um, were the others promoted as well? I think they all deserve it just the same.

char_208_melan.title: Added to Squad
char_208_melan.text: Understood... I'll follow your orders.

char_208_melan.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_208_melan.text: The leader? But I'm not particularly good at giving orders...

char_208_melan.title: Depart
char_208_melan.text: Let's work to make the world a more peaceful place.

char_208_melan.title: Begin Operation
char_208_melan.text: Ansel... I'm counting on you now.

char_208_melan.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_208_melan.text: Please give me instructions...

char_208_melan.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_208_melan.text: What are your orders?

char_208_melan.title: Deployment 1
char_208_melan.text: Understood.

char_208_melan.title: Deployment 2
char_208_melan.text: I'll do my best.

char_208_melan.title: In Battle 1
char_208_melan.text: You will fall...!

char_208_melan.title: In Battle 2
char_208_melan.text: Attack!

char_208_melan.title: 4-star Result
char_208_melan.text: No matter what difficulties are in store for me, I will keep on advancing.

char_208_melan.title: 3-star Result
char_208_melan.text: We won? Thank goodness for that...

char_208_melan.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_208_melan.text: I can still fight.

char_208_melan.title: Operation Failure
char_208_melan.text: We failed... How did things end up this way?

char_208_melan.title: Assigned to Facility
char_208_melan.text: Is there... anyone else here?

char_208_melan.title: Tap
char_208_melan.text: Wh-Who's there?! Oh, Doctor...

char_208_melan.title: Trust Tap
char_208_melan.text: Doctor, thank you for always taking care of me... Um, actually... I'd like to keep taking on the fight.

char_208_melan.title: Title
char_208_melan.text: Arknights.

char_208_melan.title: Greeting
char_208_melan.text: Doctor...

char_209_ardign.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_209_ardign.text: Hello! It's my shift now, Doctor!

char_209_ardign.title: Talk 1
char_209_ardign.text: What does my 'Cardigan' codename mean? Ahh, It's actually the name of my clan. It's a family tradition to use it as a codename.

char_209_ardign.title: Talk 2
char_209_ardign.text: Wow, I found one of my people on another team! I've got to invite her to hang out with me sometime!

char_209_ardign.title: Talk 3
char_209_ardign.text: I was born in the north of Leithanien, a place full of snowy forests. Oh, that reminds me, I can teach you to ski, Doctor!

char_209_ardign.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_209_ardign.text: A lot of people say stuff like 'it's a Defender's job to hold her ground,' but that's such an outdated concept. Speed is what you need! This is the age of maneuver warfare! Mobility is the key to victory!

char_209_ardign.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_209_ardign.text: *Sniff sniff*... I recognize that perfume, it's gotta be Melantha! I hope we can become closer friends... 'Cause then we'll be able to work better as a team!

char_209_ardign.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_209_ardign.text: Hehe, I really enjoy playing with kids. Back in my hometown, I took my brothers and sisters sledding every year. I really miss it! Oh, speaking of sleds... I wonder if Adnachiel can make one for me.

char_209_ardign.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_209_ardign.text: I have plenty of things I don't like. Oripathy, for instance... But there's no point in worrying too much. I would rather live my days in happiness! Plus, I've got you with me, Doctor!

char_209_ardign.title: Idle
char_209_ardign.text: Woof!

char_209_ardign.title: Onboard
char_209_ardign.text: Heeellooo! I've never been in such a big mobile facility before! I'm so excited! Merry of the Cardigan here. Are you the Doctor?

char_209_ardign.title: Watching Battle Record
char_209_ardign.text: Ehehe, thanks!

char_209_ardign.title: Promotion 1
char_209_ardign.text: Yay! I will keep fighting hard for my next promotion! I'm sure it will come in time!

char_209_ardign.title: Added to Squad
char_209_ardign.text: Awesome! Finally, my time has come!

char_209_ardign.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_209_ardign.text: Ansel! Come on! I promise I won't lead everyone on a wild-goose chase!

char_209_ardign.title: Depart
char_209_ardign.text: Formation ready! Advance to the objective!

char_209_ardign.title: Begin Operation
char_209_ardign.text: Let's go! ...Steward, what was I supposed to do next?

char_209_ardign.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_209_ardign.text: There's no hesitating in battle!

char_209_ardign.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_209_ardign.text: All right!

char_209_ardign.title: Deployment 1
char_209_ardign.text: Understood!

char_209_ardign.title: Deployment 2
char_209_ardign.text: I will protect us all!

char_209_ardign.title: In Battle 1
char_209_ardign.text: Aha!

char_209_ardign.title: In Battle 2
char_209_ardign.text: Your attacks have no effect!

char_209_ardign.title: 4-star Result
char_209_ardign.text: I knew we could do it. Right, Adnachiel?

char_209_ardign.title: 3-star Result
char_209_ardign.text: Yeeaaah! A flawless victory!

char_209_ardign.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_209_ardign.text: Thanks, Medics! You saved my life...

char_209_ardign.title: Operation Failure
char_209_ardign.text: Ughh... Sorry, Ansel...

char_209_ardign.title: Assigned to Facility
char_209_ardign.text: Steward, what should I do next?

char_209_ardign.title: Tap
char_209_ardign.text: Woah! Roller coaster—!

char_209_ardign.title: Trust Tap
char_209_ardign.text: Melantha? Huh? Why are you here, Doctor?!

char_209_ardign.title: Title
char_209_ardign.text: Arknights.

char_209_ardign.title: Greeting
char_209_ardign.text: I'm right here, Doctor!

char_210_stward.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_210_stward.text: Welcome back, Doctor. Steward at your service.

char_210_stward.title: Talk 1
char_210_stward.text: Steward is my surname, as well as my Operator codename. Doctor, I'm sure you can tell from it what my ancestors did for a living.

char_210_stward.title: Talk 2
char_210_stward.text: I didn't expect to see another from my clan here. Is she looking for someone? I know how that feels... Oh, never mind.

char_210_stward.title: Talk 3
char_210_stward.text: People often say our fur has the 'color of snow.' Doctor, have you ever seen snow?

char_210_stward.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_210_stward.text: Lava has a very distinct fighting style. I thought she was going to cast with her book, but her real Arts Unit is a dagger. Her style reminds me of the mystic who taught me Arts.

char_210_stward.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_210_stward.text: It is my honor to work for you, Doctor. But if possible, I do hope you pay some extra care to Melantha. She's always alone…

char_210_stward.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_210_stward.text: Adnachiel is a mysterious one... No one can tell what he is thinking.

char_210_stward.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_210_stward.text: Ansel... It's okay... I stopped caring about my identity as an Infected long ago. In fact, I received a lot of help because of it. Before the infection takes away what's dear to me, I will use it to create a place where everyone can live in peace.

char_210_stward.title: Idle
char_210_stward.text: Are you tired? Do take a good rest, Doctor. Rhodes Island will need your skills tomorrow.

char_210_stward.title: Onboard
char_210_stward.text: Caster Steward reporting in. I'm glad to be working with you.

char_210_stward.title: Watching Battle Record
char_210_stward.text: I have learned a lot. Thank you.

char_210_stward.title: Promotion 1
char_210_stward.text: I'm glad that you are satisfied with my work. Instructor Dobermann will be happy too.

char_210_stward.title: Added to Squad
char_210_stward.text: What can I do for you?

char_210_stward.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_210_stward.text: Cardigan, always read the situation before you act.

char_210_stward.title: Depart
char_210_stward.text: Well, I'll be sure to bring you some good news.

char_210_stward.title: Begin Operation
char_210_stward.text: They probably won't make it to tomorrow.

char_210_stward.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_210_stward.text: Awarting orders.

char_210_stward.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_210_stward.text: Gladly!

char_210_stward.title: Deployment 1
char_210_stward.text: Got it.

char_210_stward.title: Deployment 2
char_210_stward.text: Understood.

char_210_stward.title: In Battle 1
char_210_stward.text: Freeze!

char_210_stward.title: In Battle 2
char_210_stward.text: Down you go.

char_210_stward.title: 4-star Result
char_210_stward.text: With the right strategy, we'll make it through any tight spot.

char_210_stward.title: 3-star Result
char_210_stward.text: A perfect victory. Good work, everyone!

char_210_stward.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_210_stward.text: Ansel, please check the casualties for me. We must prepare for the next battle.

char_210_stward.title: Operation Failure
char_210_stward.text: Did we make a mistake somewhere...?

char_210_stward.title: Assigned to Facility
char_210_stward.text: Is that you, Cardi— WAI-WAIT! WAIT! Don't touch the equipment!

char_210_stward.title: Tap
char_210_stward.text: Hmm?

char_210_stward.title: Trust Tap
char_210_stward.text: Doctor, is there anything I can do for you?

char_210_stward.title: Title
char_210_stward.text: Arknights.

char_210_stward.title: Greeting
char_210_stward.text: Awaiting your instructions, Doctor.

char_211_adnach.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_211_adnach.text: That device you're holding seems to be in poor shape. Would you mind if I take a look at it?

char_211_adnach.title: Talk 1
char_211_adnach.text: Hey, Ansel. Cardigan looks good today. Anything I can help you with?

char_211_adnach.title: Talk 2
char_211_adnach.text: We have a squad of very interesting people, especially Melantha. She always seems to be hiding from me, but I can sniff her out.

char_211_adnach.title: Talk 3
char_211_adnach.text: Cardigan, what are you doing? You look so happy.

char_211_adnach.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_211_adnach.text: Not every Laterano has the right to use guns, rare weapons that they are. In my hometown, we're pretty good at making knockoff gun parts. The crossbow crafting industry is also on the rise. The result is what I have here - a crossbow with a tactical rail attachment.

char_211_adnach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_211_adnach.text: Would you like to try some of my handmade sweets? I'm kind of ashamed that I can only make 25 types of desserts. It feels like I've disgraced the Laterano people.

char_211_adnach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_211_adnach.text: What's wrong with my halo? I don't know why, but it seems to have deviated slightly. According to Dr. Kal'tsit, it probably has something to do with my abnormal hippocampus.

char_211_adnach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_211_adnach.text: Instead of watching you from afar, I feel much better standing by your side, Doctor.

char_211_adnach.title: Idle
char_211_adnach.text: Doctor, you strike an impressive figure, even when you rest like that.

char_211_adnach.title: Onboard
char_211_adnach.text: My name is Adnachiel. I'm a Sniper from Laterano. Although I'm not yet certified to carry a gun, I can match the veterans with my crossbow!

char_211_adnach.title: Watching Battle Record
char_211_adnach.text: Put me to good use and I'll be more than happy.

char_211_adnach.title: Promotion 1
char_211_adnach.text: Thank you very much for the promotion.

char_211_adnach.title: Added to Squad
char_211_adnach.text: We will be fine.

char_211_adnach.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_211_adnach.text: If anything breaks, bring it to me. I may be able to fix it for you.

char_211_adnach.title: Depart
char_211_adnach.text: It's time to go. Are you ready?

char_211_adnach.title: Begin Operation
char_211_adnach.text: Let the hunt begin.

char_211_adnach.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_211_adnach.text: I will follow your orders.

char_211_adnach.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_211_adnach.text: Hmm?

char_211_adnach.title: Deployment 1
char_211_adnach.text: You better run away soon.

char_211_adnach.title: Deployment 2
char_211_adnach.text: Okay!

char_211_adnach.title: In Battle 1
char_211_adnach.text: Gotcha!

char_211_adnach.title: In Battle 2
char_211_adnach.text: Locked on!

char_211_adnach.title: 4-star Result
char_211_adnach.text: Everything went just as you planned, Doctor.

char_211_adnach.title: 3-star Result
char_211_adnach.text: We have the Doctor's orders to thank for this.

char_211_adnach.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_211_adnach.text: Our operation was a success, but something feels a bit off...

char_211_adnach.title: Operation Failure
char_211_adnach.text: I'm so sorry...

char_211_adnach.title: Assigned to Facility
char_211_adnach.text: This place has a great vibe.

char_211_adnach.title: Tap
char_211_adnach.text: What?

char_211_adnach.title: Trust Tap
char_211_adnach.text: Doctor? I'm so happy to be with you!

char_211_adnach.title: Title
char_211_adnach.text: Arknights.

char_211_adnach.title: Greeting
char_211_adnach.text: May the Lord bless you, Doctor.

char_212_ansel.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_212_ansel.text: Doctor, it's time for your injection. Oh, um, are you alright?! Are you scared of needles?

char_212_ansel.title: Talk 1
char_212_ansel.text: Like Dr. Kal'tsit is always telling you, Doctor, you really need some exercise. I'm new here, but you still need to listen to my advice.

char_212_ansel.title: Talk 2
char_212_ansel.text: Cardigan! We've told you, if you move like that when you strike, you'll wind up getting hurt.

char_212_ansel.title: Talk 3
char_212_ansel.text: Good grief... Doctor, you need to take care of yourself. You can't make us do it for you.

char_212_ansel.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_212_ansel.text: Are you worried about my health after so many night shifts? You shouldn't be. My race has a unique way of producing hormones, which allows us to handle night activities better. So I can hand my shift over to Hibiscus at just the right time.

char_212_ansel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_212_ansel.text: You must stop with the midnight snacks. Don't go bringing up my eating habits. I eat at night because of my race! Yes, it's a racial trait!

char_212_ansel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_212_ansel.text: I'm Ansel. It's a little embarrassing to admit, but I chose to become a Medic because I've been sickly since I was young. But now that I'm an Operator, I'll make sure not to burden you. So please treat me just the same way you treat the others.

char_212_ansel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_212_ansel.text: I know everyone does what they can. But I heard from Dr. Kal'tsit that Steward and Melantha's conditions aren't looking too good... My job is to make their lives as easy as possible. Doctor, let's redouble our efforts, together.

char_212_ansel.title: Idle
char_212_ansel.text: Adnachiel, could you ask Cardigan to settle down for a moment? The Doctor is resting.

char_212_ansel.title: Onboard
char_212_ansel.text: I am Ansel, a medical intern. I'll be assisting with surgery and internal medicine, among other things. I look forward to working with you.

char_212_ansel.title: Watching Battle Record
char_212_ansel.text: I hope I didn't cause you any trouble.

char_212_ansel.title: Promotion 1
char_212_ansel.text: I'm glad that you care so much for the wellbeing of us Medics.

char_212_ansel.title: Added to Squad
char_212_ansel.text: Ready whenever.

char_212_ansel.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_212_ansel.text: Medical support should be the top priority for any tactical squad.

char_212_ansel.title: Depart
char_212_ansel.text: Alright, all medicine has been prepared.

char_212_ansel.title: Begin Operation
char_212_ansel.text: Injections ready. Prepare for battle.

char_212_ansel.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_212_ansel.text: First aid box is ready.

char_212_ansel.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_212_ansel.text: Awaiting your orders.

char_212_ansel.title: Deployment 1
char_212_ansel.text: Ready to heal!

char_212_ansel.title: Deployment 2
char_212_ansel.text: Please hold on!

char_212_ansel.title: In Battle 1
char_212_ansel.text: Clear!

char_212_ansel.title: In Battle 2
char_212_ansel.text: Your medication is here. Take it!

char_212_ansel.title: 4-star Result
char_212_ansel.text: Phew, thank goodness I brought enough medicine. Please don't worry.

char_212_ansel.title: 3-star Result
char_212_ansel.text: I was very impressed by everyone's performance. It was fantastic.

char_212_ansel.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_212_ansel.text: Please hold on, I'll treat your injuries right away.

char_212_ansel.title: Operation Failure
char_212_ansel.text: We've sustained injuries! I need to get the wounded to the rear. Cover me!

char_212_ansel.title: Assigned to Facility
char_212_ansel.text: I'm checking on the medical supplies here.

char_212_ansel.title: Tap
char_212_ansel.text: Whoa, Doctor, please don't mess with me!

char_212_ansel.title: Trust Tap
char_212_ansel.text: Doctor, I'm very glad that you like me.

char_212_ansel.title: Title
char_212_ansel.text: Arknights.

char_212_ansel.title: Greeting
char_212_ansel.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_108_silent.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_108_silent.text: Doctor, these are your tasks for the day. Yeah. A whole pile of work. Let's get to it.

char_108_silent.title: Talk 1
char_108_silent.text: Is Ifrit making trouble again? Sorry. I'll discipline her later.

char_108_silent.title: Talk 2
char_108_silent.text: Zzzzz… Sorry, I was taking a nap… I'm still not used to working during the day.

char_108_silent.title: Talk 3
char_108_silent.text: My reasons for quitting Rhine Lab? So much happened since I signed on, I don't even know where to start…

char_108_silent.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_108_silent.text: Have you ever heard of a woman named Saria? Like me, she was once a scientist at Rhine Lab, and she was one of the people responsible for the creation of Ifrit…

char_108_silent.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_108_silent.text: Our biology research at Rhine Lab went so far as to implant Originium Shards into living bodies… Sorry, we'd better change the subject.

char_108_silent.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_108_silent.text: Saria? You mean she's here at Rhodes Island too? Is she here for Ifrit…? After she walked out on us like that, why would she come here right now…?!

char_108_silent.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_108_silent.text: I will not allow Ifrit to see Saria. Please trust me, this is for Ifrit's own good…!

char_108_silent.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_108_silent.text: Are you trying to cure Oripathy too? I heard that you were involved in the development of medical technology at Rhodes Island. Heheh… you must be looking forward to a breakthrough, as a researcher yourself.

char_108_silent.title: Idle
char_108_silent.text: …Asleep already? All right. I'll handle the rest of the work.

char_108_silent.title: Onboard
char_108_silent.text: I am Olivia Silence, an Originium scientist from the Rhine Lab Medical Research Institute. My hope is to rid the world of Oripathy… even if it means risking my life in the process.

char_108_silent.title: Watching Battle Record
char_108_silent.text: I will make good use of this new power.

char_108_silent.title: Promotion 1
char_108_silent.text: Is my medicine effective? Wonderful. This news brings me even greater joy than my promotion.

char_108_silent.title: Promotion 2
char_108_silent.text: Doctor, I am looking forward to the day when the world is finally cured of Oripathy. In fighting and studying with you, I think that day may not be far off.

char_108_silent.title: Added to Squad
char_108_silent.text: Understood. I'll focus on support.

char_108_silent.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_108_silent.text: Come on, team, let's fight with all our might.

char_108_silent.title: Depart
char_108_silent.text: Originium… Are you to blame for this battle?

char_108_silent.title: Begin Operation
char_108_silent.text: Observe and determine the form of Infection. Such data will be useful for research.

char_108_silent.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_108_silent.text: Doctor, let me do it.

char_108_silent.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_108_silent.text: No abnormality detected.

char_108_silent.title: Deployment 1
char_108_silent.text: Concentrate.

char_108_silent.title: Deployment 2
char_108_silent.text: Stay calm.

char_108_silent.title: In Battle 1
char_108_silent.text: I'll heal you.

char_108_silent.title: In Battle 2
char_108_silent.text: No need to panic.

char_108_silent.title: In Battle 3
char_108_silent.text: Deploying.

char_108_silent.title: In Battle 4
char_108_silent.text: Support incoming.

char_108_silent.title: 4-star Result
char_108_silent.text: In order to defeat stronger enemies, must we make further use of Originium's power…?

char_108_silent.title: 3-star Result
char_108_silent.text: Medical team, please take tissue samples from the Infected, we need to see the composition of the Infection in this area.

char_108_silent.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_108_silent.text: All wounded personnel, please remain calm. The medical team will get to you.

char_108_silent.title: Operation Failure
char_108_silent.text: …Now is not the time for despair. We must withdraw immediately.

char_108_silent.title: Assigned to Facility
char_108_silent.text: This room… Ugh… It's like it's designed to make me sleepy!

char_108_silent.title: Tap
char_108_silent.text: Hmm?

char_108_silent.title: Trust Tap
char_108_silent.text: Doctor, you're kinder these days.

char_108_silent.title: Title
char_108_silent.text: Arknights.

char_108_silent.title: Greeting
char_108_silent.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_134_ifrit.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_134_ifrit.text: Why is this office so damn cold?! Hey, you there! You okay with me using that for kindling?

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Oh, How much did you say this book costs? Haha, pricey. Call me Mistress Ifrit and I'll give it back to you.

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Huh? You want me to read this book? I hate it when people try to tell me… It's from Silence? Really? Urgh... Wha-what does this word mean here?

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk 3
char_134_ifrit.text: I hate it when you white coat creepers stare at me... Yeah, I mean you! What'cha looking at? Go stare at something else!

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Um... Okay, fine. No more scaring people with fire.

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Back off! You... Why are you coming at me like that? You wanna strap me to a lab table too?

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Saria's here? I want to see her— Silence says no? C'mon, what's the big deal? Just take me to her and keep it off the record!

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Why are Silence and Saria arguing all the time? I don't get it... Hey! You gotta know how to get them to make up, right? C'mon, just tell me… I mean, please...?

char_134_ifrit.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_134_ifrit.text: I don't care what you think of me, but you'd better be nice to Silence. When she wants something, you go get it for her! Do that, and your wish is my command.

char_134_ifrit.title: Idle
char_134_ifrit.text: You little...! You've got guts to ignore me and slack off like this!

char_134_ifrit.title: Onboard
char_134_ifrit.text: You stand before the almighty Ifrit! Hmph, Silence says Rhodes Island's a nice place, but there's nothing I hate more than you white-coat science creepers... I mean, except Silence...

char_134_ifrit.title: Watching Battle Record
char_134_ifrit.text: Stronger...? Hmm, that means my flames can burn brighter, right?

char_134_ifrit.title: Promotion 1
char_134_ifrit.text: What's this? Promotion Manual for Rhodes Island Operators? Guess I'll give it a peek... What the hell? So many rules even after I get promoted? Nah-uh, pass.

char_134_ifrit.title: Promotion 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Haha, that's right! I don't give a damn about all those rules. But, if you say you're counting on me, then that's all the words I need!

char_134_ifrit.title: Added to Squad
char_134_ifrit.text: Yeah yeah, I heard ya.

char_134_ifrit.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_134_ifrit.text: I'm the captain? So, just do like Silence would, right?

char_134_ifrit.title: Depart
char_134_ifrit.text: Hey! They made me the captain, so I'm the one calling the shots here!

char_134_ifrit.title: Begin Operation
char_134_ifrit.text: Yo! How 'bout another barbecue!

char_134_ifrit.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Hey!

char_134_ifrit.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Too slow!

char_134_ifrit.title: Deployment 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Let the world BURN!

char_134_ifrit.title: Deployment 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Hellfire, locked and loaded!

char_134_ifrit.title: In Battle 1
char_134_ifrit.text: Does it hurt? I bet it does!

char_134_ifrit.title: In Battle 2
char_134_ifrit.text: Hahaha! Keep screaming!

char_134_ifrit.title: In Battle 3
char_134_ifrit.text: Shriek all you want! Nobody cares!

char_134_ifrit.title: In Battle 4
char_134_ifrit.text: Get in the line of death!

char_134_ifrit.title: 4-star Result
char_134_ifrit.text: Weak, you're all too weak! I am invincibllllle!

char_134_ifrit.title: 3-star Result
char_134_ifrit.text: Why don't we torch all the trash into kindling? It'll be nice and warm!

char_134_ifrit.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_134_ifrit.text: Nothing but cinders left now. I could've handled this all by myself!

char_134_ifrit.title: Operation Failure
char_134_ifrit.text: Damn you... You made a fool out of me!

char_134_ifrit.title: Assigned to Facility
char_134_ifrit.text: What kind of place is this? Huh?

char_134_ifrit.title: Tap
char_134_ifrit.text: The hell are you doing here?

char_134_ifrit.title: Trust Tap
char_134_ifrit.text: Heheh, you're nicer than I expected. Wanna hang out?

char_134_ifrit.title: Title
char_134_ifrit.text: Arknights.

char_134_ifrit.title: Greeting
char_134_ifrit.text: You need something?

char_202_demkni.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_202_demkni.text: I've checked your schedule. Isn't it time you took a break? If you'll excuse me.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk 1
char_202_demkni.text: Evolution is the law of nature. But Rhine Lab attempted to tamper with this law, even to take control of it. What a foolish endeavor…

char_202_demkni.title: Talk 2
char_202_demkni.text: As a researcher, have you ever participated in some experiments you probably shouldn't have? No? That's good.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk 3
char_202_demkni.text: Don't you think it's too noisy at Rhodes Island? Everyone should be quiet and focused during work. You should enforce discipline on your subordinates.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_202_demkni.text: My true power has nothing to do with first aid. However, I have slightly adjusted the operation of this power to accommodate it to your command.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_202_demkni.text: You think Calcification Arts only makes organisms weaker? You're wrong. I can condense calcium into a tough enamel. The enemies can try as they want, but no one can break my shield.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_202_demkni.text: You've seen me arguing with Silence? Yes, we do that a lot... Sorry for causing trouble for you and Rhodes Island

char_202_demkni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_202_demkni.text: Please tell Ifrit on my behalf, 'No matter what happens, I will protect you'... Meet her? No, I'm not ready for that.

char_202_demkni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_202_demkni.text: Even in the most desperate of situations, one must stand fast to be a symbol of strength for the people they hold dear. That is where I draw my line and how I live my life. You'll do the same, won't you?

char_202_demkni.title: Idle
char_202_demkni.text: I'll go back to my room if there's no further assignments.

char_202_demkni.title: Onboard
char_202_demkni.text: I am Saria, formerly of the Rhine Lab Medical Research Institute Experiment Team. As for now... I need Rhodes Island's help to bring the astray back to the orthodox.

char_202_demkni.title: Watching Battle Record
char_202_demkni.text: What are you doing?

char_202_demkni.title: Promotion 1
char_202_demkni.text: Good, you must continue motivating your subordinates with your ideas if you hope to maintain influence over them.

char_202_demkni.title: Promotion 2
char_202_demkni.text: Promotion? I don't want any special treatment. But for Ifrit's sake, I do need your help to correct all those twisted laws and rules.

char_202_demkni.title: Added to Squad
char_202_demkni.text: I am within my rights to oversee and bring up my own opinion on your command.

char_202_demkni.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_202_demkni.text: Send me the operation briefing, I will review it.

char_202_demkni.title: Depart
char_202_demkni.text: All operators must maintain strict discipline.

char_202_demkni.title: Begin Operation
char_202_demkni.text: Are they the ones who caused such destruction and started all this conflict?

char_202_demkni.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_202_demkni.text: It's my turn.

char_202_demkni.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_202_demkni.text: Suppress them.

char_202_demkni.title: Deployment 1
char_202_demkni.text: Forward.

char_202_demkni.title: Deployment 2
char_202_demkni.text: Vermin.

char_202_demkni.title: In Battle 1
char_202_demkni.text: Just who are you weaklings going to stop like that?

char_202_demkni.title: In Battle 2
char_202_demkni.text: This will be over soon.

char_202_demkni.title: In Battle 3
char_202_demkni.text: Solidify.

char_202_demkni.title: In Battle 4
char_202_demkni.text: Yielding is not an option.

char_202_demkni.title: 4-star Result
char_202_demkni.text: Your tactics appear modern, yet the ideas behind them are primitive at their roots. Just who are you?

char_202_demkni.title: 3-star Result
char_202_demkni.text: All must return to the existing order. None may disobey the rules.

char_202_demkni.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_202_demkni.text: The routed enemies may be calling for reinforcements. We must not drop our guard before we find the last of them.

char_202_demkni.title: Operation Failure
char_202_demkni.text: Where did I go wrong...?

char_202_demkni.title: Assigned to Facility
char_202_demkni.text: This room has interesting decor. I'd be more fond of a futuristic style, though.

char_202_demkni.title: Tap
char_202_demkni.text: Hm? What?

char_202_demkni.title: Trust Tap
char_202_demkni.text: Doctor, you might do a bit of research into the past in your free time. You will find many a thing of great interest.

char_202_demkni.title: Title
char_202_demkni.text: Arknights.

char_202_demkni.title: Greeting
char_202_demkni.text: Doctor, are you well?

char_128_plosis.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_128_plosis.text: Greetings Doctor. How may I assist you?

char_128_plosis.title: Talk 1
char_128_plosis.text: Deep Sleep Mode enabled... Zzzzz... Setting advanced config and power interface... Zzzzz…

char_128_plosis.title: Talk 2
char_128_plosis.text: My racial traits, in conjunction with my infection, may cause me to fall asleep in mid-conversation. Do not be alarmed.

char_128_plosis.title: Talk 3
char_128_plosis.text: I met Dr. Silence at Rhine Lab. I assisted her with data and risk analysis on a secret project.

char_128_plosis.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_128_plosis.text: Warning! Formatting Rhodes Island database... Don't worry. It's just a joke. Please don't panic.

char_128_plosis.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_128_plosis.text: I recommend you refactor my data if optimization fails to increase my performance. This will improve communication efficiency, and Ptilopsis will... Zzzz...

char_128_plosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_128_plosis.text: The way I speak? It is a side effect of Originium poisoning. By no means do I enjoy articulating my thoughts this way.

char_128_plosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_128_plosis.text: Warning, system has recovered from a fatal error. Reconfiguring to last normal system boot point. Do not be alarmed.

char_128_plosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_128_plosis.text: It is, in fact, quite burdensome to speak in this manner. But this is a necessary measure to prevent the system nexus from being devoured by that other voice. Doctor, if I lose control, please guide me back onto the right path.

char_128_plosis.title: Idle
char_128_plosis.text: System... is now in Sleep Mode...

char_128_plosis.title: Onboard
char_128_plosis.text: I am Ptilopsis, former data analyst at Rhine Lab. Please submit your orders via the Command Line.

char_128_plosis.title: Watching Battle Record
char_128_plosis.text: Reading package data… Installation complete.

char_128_plosis.title: Promotion 1
char_128_plosis.text: Update installation complete. Ptilopsis's system permissions have been revised.

char_128_plosis.title: Promotion 2
char_128_plosis.text: Warning. Reverting Rhodes Island database to previous save state. Time since save state: two years… Just joking. Please calm down. System update complete.

char_128_plosis.title: Added to Squad
char_128_plosis.text: New data used to assemble package build.

char_128_plosis.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_128_plosis.text: Squad leader permissions acquired.

char_128_plosis.title: Depart
char_128_plosis.text: Direct memory access for application map and enemy coordinates authorized. Please stand by.

char_128_plosis.title: Begin Operation
char_128_plosis.text: Tactical support system online.

char_128_plosis.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_128_plosis.text: Program initializing.

char_128_plosis.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_128_plosis.text: Initiation complete.

char_128_plosis.title: Deployment 1
char_128_plosis.text: Arts Unit charging.

char_128_plosis.title: Deployment 2
char_128_plosis.text: Target marked.

char_128_plosis.title: In Battle 1
char_128_plosis.text: Initiating healing process.

char_128_plosis.title: In Battle 2
char_128_plosis.text: Loading complete.

char_128_plosis.title: In Battle 3
char_128_plosis.text: Healing Mode enabled.

char_128_plosis.title: In Battle 4
char_128_plosis.text: Activating Arts Unit.

char_128_plosis.title: 4-star Result
char_128_plosis.text: Even such a challenging scenario couldn't stop you, Doctor. Perhaps one day you will find the solution to the non-deterministic polynomial time problem.

char_128_plosis.title: 3-star Result
char_128_plosis.text: Your logical deduction was absolutely correct. What a perfect calculation.

char_128_plosis.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_128_plosis.text: A number of errors have been detected. Please confirm.

char_128_plosis.title: Operation Failure
char_128_plosis.text: A fatal error occurred during the operation. Reboot the system to proceed.

char_128_plosis.title: Assigned to Facility
char_128_plosis.text: Is this place like a disk array?

char_128_plosis.title: Tap
char_128_plosis.text: Error occured.

char_128_plosis.title: Trust Tap
char_128_plosis.text: Detecting affection increase for the Doctor within Ptilopsis. Would you like to skip to the next dialogue choice?

char_128_plosis.title: Title
char_128_plosis.text: Arknights.

char_128_plosis.title: Greeting
char_128_plosis.text: Date rollover complete. The Doctor is now online. Detecting emotional surge within Ptilopsis.

char_242_otter.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_242_otter.text: Structural design, industrial R&D, scientific research. You name it, and I can do it, Doctor.

char_242_otter.title: Talk 1
char_242_otter.text: The Engineering Department never approve my proposals. Do they have any bias toward me? What should I do... Oh! Actually, Doctor, would you please submit this suggestion on improvement for me? It's a deal then!

char_242_otter.title: Talk 2
char_242_otter.text: There are many workshops like mine in Rhine Lab, but what takes others six weeks to finish, I can have it done in one. I'm not boasting!

char_242_otter.title: Talk 3
char_242_otter.text: DO NOT interrupt me when I'm doing my research, or I'll have my Meeboos bite you! And I will bite you too!

char_242_otter.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_242_otter.text: At night I'm always full of inspiration... and the… urgency to sleep! No, I can't bear it... Where's the pillow... I need to rest...

char_242_otter.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_242_otter.text: Hm? Why are these cuties called Meeboos? That's because they go 'meeee-boooo' when they boot up. So I named them after that. Fitting, don't you think? Just listen and you'll get it. You press this switch to... NONONONO, That's the self-destruct button! Ahhhhhh run！

char_242_otter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_242_otter.text: That girl who just passed by... that was Silence, right? If only back then... Oh, sorry, the non-disclosure agreement is still in effect. I should keep my mouth shut.

char_242_otter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_242_otter.text: I feel kinda empty when I've got nothing to do... I guess that's just how engineers are. I bet even you have to idle your time away on occasion, Doctor. Huh? You don't?

char_242_otter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_242_otter.text: Doctor, may I request... No! Not 10 square meters! I asked for too much last time, so this time... all I need is 3! W-Wait! Don't leave yet! 1 square meter, just 1 more for my research will do! Please, Doctor, I'm begging you...

char_242_otter.title: Idle
char_242_otter.text: Geez... where's the coffeemaker... Oh, there it is... You want some too, Doctor?

char_242_otter.title: Onboard
char_242_otter.text: Lutra Workshop of Rhine Lab, at your service. Yup, I run the workshop on my own. No assistance needed. Amazing, right?

char_242_otter.title: Watching Battle Record
char_242_otter.text: This structure... Interesting. I'll look into it.

char_242_otter.title: Promotion 1
char_242_otter.text: This raise came just in time! I can afford to upgrade my equipment now.

char_242_otter.title: Promotion 2
char_242_otter.text: I promised that you'd not be disappointed. Now look what I have! Surely kept my end of the bargain, didn't I?

char_242_otter.title: Added to Squad
char_242_otter.text: Time to go, Meeboos!

char_242_otter.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_242_otter.text: Commanding both Operators and my Meeboos at the same time is a bit much even for me...

char_242_otter.title: Depart
char_242_otter.text: Hopefully we can get some useful experiment data!

char_242_otter.title: Begin Operation
char_242_otter.text: Come on, Meeboo, show them what Rhine Lab's technology can do!

char_242_otter.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_242_otter.text: Whoa!

char_242_otter.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_242_otter.text: Careful! Be gentle with it!

char_242_otter.title: Deployment 1
char_242_otter.text: Handle with care!

char_242_otter.title: Deployment 2
char_242_otter.text: Precision equipment isn't cheap!

char_242_otter.title: In Battle 1
char_242_otter.text: Get 'em, Meeboo #3!

char_242_otter.title: In Battle 2
char_242_otter.text: Bite 'em, Meeboo!

char_242_otter.title: In Battle 3
char_242_otter.text: If anything breaks, just make another one!

char_242_otter.title: In Battle 4
char_242_otter.text: My Meeboos are more than just machines!

char_242_otter.title: 4-star Result
char_242_otter.text: Come on, Meeboo! Show everyone your victory dance!

char_242_otter.title: 3-star Result
char_242_otter.text: Nice! We practically rolled over them!

char_242_otter.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_242_otter.text: The device is slightly damaged. I'll fix it in no time.

char_242_otter.title: Operation Failure
char_242_otter.text: Oh no! My Meeboo...! I'll need to make more...

char_242_otter.title: Assigned to Facility
char_242_otter.text: Now I want a new workshop!

char_242_otter.title: Tap
char_242_otter.text: Whuah?! Hey, I'm working here!

char_242_otter.title: Trust Tap
char_242_otter.text: Doctor, let me touch your head! Inspiration can strike, you know!

char_242_otter.title: Title
char_242_otter.text: Arknights.

char_242_otter.title: Greeting
char_242_otter.text: Heya, Doctor!

char_215_mantic.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_215_mantic.text: Umm, excuse me… I've been waiting here... for two hours…

char_215_mantic.title: Talk 1
char_215_mantic.text: Sorry… I know people keep ignoring me... But... my Arts aren't to blame…

char_215_mantic.title: Talk 2
char_215_mantic.text: My Arts... make me undetectable to people... in certain environments…

char_215_mantic.title: Talk 3
char_215_mantic.text: I… I've never had any friends... S-surely no one wants a friend that…  they can't even notice… right?

char_215_mantic.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_215_mantic.text: My tail... It curls up when I'm not fighting... So please, don't be afraid…

char_215_mantic.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_215_mantic.text: Doctor... you can leave the dangerous work to me... After all... my Arts were made for that…

char_215_mantic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_215_mantic.text: These ID tags around my neck… I collected them... I like holding onto evidence... that someone once existed...

char_215_mantic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_215_mantic.text: Don't let that 'Nightmare' girl near me!... She's dangerous... My Arts don't work on her... Why…?

char_215_mantic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_215_mantic.text: I… I really want to cure my Oripathy. But if it's cured... what's going to happen to my Arts?... If they're gone, will I... still be of any use...?

char_215_mantic.title: Idle
char_215_mantic.text: Doctor's ignoring me… I don't like it, hmph...

char_215_mantic.title: Onboard
char_215_mantic.text: I'm Manticore... My Arts can take out lives silently... Please don't be scared, you're not my target…

char_215_mantic.title: Watching Battle Record
char_215_mantic.text: Thank you... I-I'm looking forward to you teaching me... more...

char_215_mantic.title: Promotion 1
char_215_mantic.text: Finally, I got a promotion... I always thought I wasn't good enough… so you didn't promote me…

char_215_mantic.title: Promotion 2
char_215_mantic.text: Did I... manage to help you? I don't have anywhere else to go... My home is here... at Rhodes Island... So please, let me protect it with you...

char_215_mantic.title: Added to Squad
char_215_mantic.text: Okay...

char_215_mantic.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_215_mantic.text: Nobody will like me... as their captain...

char_215_mantic.title: Depart
char_215_mantic.text: Please don't leave me behind…

char_215_mantic.title: Begin Operation
char_215_mantic.text: Please choose tactics that make use of my Arts... even if it's something crafty and underhanded... I won't mind...

char_215_mantic.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_215_mantic.text: I-I'm ready...

char_215_mantic.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_215_mantic.text: I'm…right here…

char_215_mantic.title: Deployment 1
char_215_mantic.text: Manticore… going dark…

char_215_mantic.title: Deployment 2
char_215_mantic.text: Ready... to ambush...

char_215_mantic.title: In Battle 1
char_215_mantic.text: That must... really hurt…

char_215_mantic.title: In Battle 2
char_215_mantic.text: Please, Don't come close…

char_215_mantic.title: In Battle 3
char_215_mantic.text: I don't like this... either...

char_215_mantic.title: In Battle 4
char_215_mantic.text: Farewell…

char_215_mantic.title: 4-star Result
char_215_mantic.text: Even in such terrible battles… your judgement and decisions didn't seem to waver… You're incredible, Doctor…

char_215_mantic.title: 3-star Result
char_215_mantic.text: A victory by all means... Still...

char_215_mantic.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_215_mantic.text: I can handle the runaways... if you wish...

char_215_mantic.title: Operation Failure
char_215_mantic.text: I'm sorry... It's all my fault...

char_215_mantic.title: Assigned to Facility
char_215_mantic.text: I'll sit... in the corner...

char_215_mantic.title: Tap
char_215_mantic.text: Eeeeeek!

char_215_mantic.title: Trust Tap
char_215_mantic.text: Thank you for paying attention to me... I know it's your job... but it still makes me happy…

char_215_mantic.title: Title
char_215_mantic.text: Arknights.

char_215_mantic.title: Greeting
char_215_mantic.text: Hello... Doctor...

char_149_scave.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_149_scave.text: Better to get your job done first than wasting time on chitchat.

char_149_scave.title: Talk 1
char_149_scave.text: You'd better remember that failing to adapt makes you a useless burden.

char_149_scave.title: Talk 2
char_149_scave.text: Work, eat, run, repeat. Big fricking whoop. Isn't that how life is for anyone these days?

char_149_scave.title: Talk 3
char_149_scave.text: My job was to take care of 'troubles' for my employers. Eventually they started to call me Scavenger.

char_149_scave.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_149_scave.text: Just like the two sides of a coin, no matter how splendid the face is, the backside is always stained with dirt.

char_149_scave.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_149_scave.text: I've adapted to this place really well since I joined? Pfft, rubbish. It's just that I've gotten used to working on the surface.

char_149_scave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
