char_149_scave.text: That's Provence, isn't it…? The wretched girl who got Infected while rescuing people from a Catastrophe... Look at that massive tail she's got...

char_149_scave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_149_scave.text: You know, Doctor... I hated the idea of working with other people, at first. I figured our methods would clash. But at some point, I came to realize that's not the case.

char_149_scave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_149_scave.text: If only she were still alive... Now all I can do is carry on alone, carrying her dreams on my back.

char_149_scave.title: Idle
char_149_scave.text: How can you sleep so soundly when you're defenseless…?

char_149_scave.title: Onboard
char_149_scave.text: I'm Scavenger. Leave the dirty work to me. Just pay me like my other employers and we'll be good.

char_149_scave.title: Watching Battle Record
char_149_scave.text: No, it's not enough...

char_149_scave.title: Promotion 1
char_149_scave.text: This still isn't enough. I need to become stronger...

char_149_scave.title: Promotion 2
char_149_scave.text: Thanks, Doctor. I feel like I have a reason to fight now.

char_149_scave.title: Added to Squad
char_149_scave.text: Do I need to quip just 'cause I joined the team?

char_149_scave.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_149_scave.text: Don't you hold me back.

char_149_scave.title: Depart
char_149_scave.text: Conceal yourselves so the enemy won't find you.

char_149_scave.title: Begin Operation
char_149_scave.text: Hmph, time for a clean up.

char_149_scave.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_149_scave.text: Hurry up.

char_149_scave.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_149_scave.text: Are we doing this?

char_149_scave.title: Deployment 1
char_149_scave.text: Tch.

char_149_scave.title: Deployment 2
char_149_scave.text: I know what to do.

char_149_scave.title: In Battle 1
char_149_scave.text: Garbage.

char_149_scave.title: In Battle 2
char_149_scave.text: Keep writhing in the gutter!

char_149_scave.title: In Battle 3
char_149_scave.text: There is no turning back for you!

char_149_scave.title: In Battle 4
char_149_scave.text: You get no sympathy!

char_149_scave.title: 4-star Result
char_149_scave.text: Gotta say that mission was a special one.

char_149_scave.title: 3-star Result
char_149_scave.text: Hmph. They have only their own weakness to blame.

char_149_scave.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_149_scave.text: Tch, some of them got away. I'm disappointed in you.

char_149_scave.title: Operation Failure
char_149_scave.text: Dammit! Screwed up again...

char_149_scave.title: Assigned to Facility
char_149_scave.text: Just give me a dark corner.

char_149_scave.title: Tap
char_149_scave.text: Argh! Let go of me!

char_149_scave.title: Trust Tap
char_149_scave.text: What? You want me to dispose of you too?

char_149_scave.title: Title
char_149_scave.text: Arknights.

char_149_scave.title: Greeting
char_149_scave.text: You got a job for me?

char_204_platnm.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_204_platnm.text: *Yaaawn*... Doctor, could I take a quick break?

char_204_platnm.title: Talk 1
char_204_platnm.text: Don't worry about my bow. I keep it well maintained. It's much tougher than you, so stop asking about it already.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk 2
char_204_platnm.text: There are so many interesting people at Rhodes Island. Would be nice if I could make a friend or two to travel with.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk 3
char_204_platnm.text: Nowadays, the Knights of Kazimierz are little more than a bunch of musclehead jocks, or clowns obsessed with billboards and firework shows. Man, it's so lame.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_204_platnm.text: I was planning to return home after finishing this job, but now I've changed my mind. Why, you ask? You should know better than to ask a girl a question like that.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_204_platnm.text: Want to know the origin of my codename? You see, there are different ranks for the Knight Assassins in Kazimierz. There's three Darksteel and two Lazurite assassins above me, but I and I alone bear the rank of Platinum, from now till the day I die. So I figured it'd make a good codename.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_204_platnm.text: Ah, it's Miss Nearl! No, no, I wasn't going to lay a hand on her. I'm just worried she's going to charge at me with her hammer.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_204_platnm.text: Kazimierz is... a boring place. *Sigh*, I'm almost mad at how much more amusing life here at Rhodes Island is.

char_204_platnm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_204_platnm.text: Have you thought about how you're going to maintain your relations with everyone here at Rhodes Island? You know, all suits of armor have small gaps which leave you vulnerable, and that's where the enemies always try to jam their blades. One hit to your weak point can bring down everything you've painstakingly built.

char_204_platnm.title: Idle
char_204_platnm.text: I'm so bored. Hoping something amusing happens.

char_204_platnm.title: Onboard
char_204_platnm.text: Assassin of the Armorless Union of Kazimierz here as per our agreement. What am I called? Hmm... Call me Platinum, then. Nice to meet you.

char_204_platnm.title: Watching Battle Record
char_204_platnm.text: Good. My bow feels even lighter. Thank you.

char_204_platnm.title: Promotion 1
char_204_platnm.text: Promotion? Isn't the rank of Platinum already intimidating enough? Oh, you are an interesting one.

char_204_platnm.title: Promotion 2
char_204_platnm.text: Hah. Do you have the guts to gaze upon the true face of the one called Platinum, my dear Doctor?

char_204_platnm.title: Added to Squad
char_204_platnm.text: Platinum, reporting for duty.

char_204_platnm.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_204_platnm.text: Really? I'm commanding? It's not my strongest suit, but all right.

char_204_platnm.title: Depart
char_204_platnm.text: Will this battle be an interesting one?

char_204_platnm.title: Begin Operation
char_204_platnm.text: You may as well attack at the same time. You're all too weak anyway.

char_204_platnm.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_204_platnm.text: Your orders?

char_204_platnm.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_204_platnm.text: Who's my target?

char_204_platnm.title: Deployment 1
char_204_platnm.text: I'll make them disappear.

char_204_platnm.title: Deployment 2
char_204_platnm.text: Moving to intercept.

char_204_platnm.title: In Battle 1
char_204_platnm.text: First, break their legs.

char_204_platnm.title: In Battle 2
char_204_platnm.text: Second, break their armor.

char_204_platnm.title: In Battle 3
char_204_platnm.text: And third, pierce their flesh.

char_204_platnm.title: In Battle 4
char_204_platnm.text: Now, it's checkmate!

char_204_platnm.title: 4-star Result
char_204_platnm.text: Nice. I had quite an enjoyable time.

char_204_platnm.title: 3-star Result
char_204_platnm.text: Checkmate. I'm sorry, but victory is mine.

char_204_platnm.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_204_platnm.text: What a pity that we left some alive.

char_204_platnm.title: Operation Failure
char_204_platnm.text: Don't give up... He who laughs last laughs best.

char_204_platnm.title: Assigned to Facility
char_204_platnm.text: The atmosphere here is surprisingly good.

char_204_platnm.title: Tap
char_204_platnm.text: Huh?!

char_204_platnm.title: Trust Tap
char_204_platnm.text: Want to go on a walk? If you're busy, there's always next time.

char_204_platnm.title: Title
char_204_platnm.text: Arknights.

char_204_platnm.title: Greeting
char_204_platnm.text: You look well, Doctor.

char_172_svrash.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_172_svrash.text: There are better ways to kill time. Care to try one?

char_172_svrash.title: Talk 1
char_172_svrash.text: Why the constant sullen face? Can't you at least smile for me? Good. That's what I want to see... Yes, there's no one better suited to solve your problems than me... Isn't that right?

char_172_svrash.title: Talk 2
char_172_svrash.text: That girl... Amiya, I believe her name was? She's no ordinary girl. If you don't put shackles on her wrists today, you will find yourself placing a crown upon her head tomorrow.

char_172_svrash.title: Talk 3
char_172_svrash.text: The stability of the alliance between Karlan and Rhodes Island depends solely on your state of mind, and mine. As such, we should at least try to get along, my friend.

char_172_svrash.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_172_svrash.text: I suppose... it's high time I signed this contract. Of course, I do know that the terms are in yours, and Rhodes Island's favor.

char_172_svrash.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_172_svrash.text: I'm well aware that this contract offers me nothing... But what does that matter? I shall nonetheless accept this unequal treaty. The reason being that I, SilverAsh, recognize that you warrant it.

char_172_svrash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_172_svrash.text: Is Ensia giving you trouble? My apologies. It was originally my own responsibility to foster and guide her, but it's unlikely I will be able to do so. So I must ask... could you do it in my stead, {@nickname}?

char_172_svrash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_172_svrash.text: Could you show me to Rhodes Island's deck? No, I'd just like to get a view of the area. Tenzin needs to spread his wings every once in a while as well. He must be longing to soar through the night sky.

char_172_svrash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_172_svrash.text: If this continues, there will come a day when you and I confront one another... I seem delighted, you say? Hah, perhaps I am. You would be a worthy opponent, that's for certain. Let us make the most of our time before that day comes.

char_172_svrash.title: Idle
char_172_svrash.text: When the aether darkens, 'tis an omen that snowfall draws near...'

char_172_svrash.title: Onboard
char_172_svrash.text: I, SilverAsh, have joined your cause as a sworn ally. Whatever your plans may be, do not disappoint me.

char_172_svrash.title: Watching Battle Record
char_172_svrash.text: For one to travel such an arduous path, one absolutely must have experience.

char_172_svrash.title: Promotion 1
char_172_svrash.text: Ostentatious titles are one thing, but the trust accompanying them is what concerns me. You surely know that.

char_172_svrash.title: Promotion 2
char_172_svrash.text: It takes a daring soul to drag me into their war. That being so, I, SilverAsh, will show my prowess for all of Rhodes Island to see.

char_172_svrash.title: Added to Squad
char_172_svrash.text: We all have our roles to play. Use my abilities as best you see fit.

char_172_svrash.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_172_svrash.text: You wish me to act as your proxy? Very well. But you must pay me due tribute later.

char_172_svrash.title: Depart
char_172_svrash.text: Compassion saves no one on the battlefield.

char_172_svrash.title: Begin Operation
char_172_svrash.text: Show me what you're made of. Amuse me, if you even can.

char_172_svrash.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_172_svrash.text: What are you planning?

char_172_svrash.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_172_svrash.text: Made up your mind?

char_172_svrash.title: Deployment 1
char_172_svrash.text: Acknowledged.

char_172_svrash.title: Deployment 2
char_172_svrash.text: Very well.

char_172_svrash.title: In Battle 1
char_172_svrash.text: 'The fool flaunting his gallantry reaches none with his vanity...'

char_172_svrash.title: In Battle 2
char_172_svrash.text: 'Fool, for what reason hast thou come?'

char_172_svrash.title: In Battle 3
char_172_svrash.text: 'Art thou mine worthy enemy, or art thou naught but a jester?'

char_172_svrash.title: In Battle 4
char_172_svrash.text: 'Thy pleas falleth upon deaf ears.'

char_172_svrash.title: 4-star Result
char_172_svrash.text: The fiercer the battle, the more jubilant the victory.

char_172_svrash.title: 3-star Result
char_172_svrash.text: A satisfying battle. It brought palpitations even to my heart.

char_172_svrash.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_172_svrash.text: We should strive for better.

char_172_svrash.title: Operation Failure
char_172_svrash.text: Retreat at once, while there is still time.

char_172_svrash.title: Assigned to Facility
char_172_svrash.text: For a place to rest my feet, it is acceptable.

char_172_svrash.title: Tap
char_172_svrash.text: Hmm?

char_172_svrash.title: Trust Tap
char_172_svrash.text: Let me rest for a brief while. I'm more tired than I thought. My apologies.

char_172_svrash.title: Title
char_172_svrash.text: Arknights.

char_172_svrash.title: Greeting
char_172_svrash.text: You haven't changed one bit, my friend.

char_173_slchan.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_173_slchan.text: Uh... Doctor, you really need to work out more, you know.

char_173_slchan.title: Talk 1
char_173_slchan.text: Everyone's really nice here at Rhodes Island. Too nice to prank. Oh, is it time for lunch? I'll help!

char_173_slchan.title: Talk 2
char_173_slchan.text: Mountaineering's not just a hobby of mine, it's my career! You heard me: career!

char_173_slchan.title: Talk 3
char_173_slchan.text: The hoop on my leg? Oh, you mean what it's for? It's just for decoration. I've got this crystal over here, see. Wanna touch?

char_173_slchan.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_173_slchan.text: My brother sent Matterhorn to look after me, didn't he…? Ugh, why can't he just come out and tell me what he's thinking? It drives me mad.

char_173_slchan.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_173_slchan.text: I've always wanted to climb the holy Mt. Karlan, and I've only wanted it even more since my sister left us and became the Saintess. So Doctor, train me more, yeah? So one day I can reach the peak of Mt. Karlan and bring my sister home.

char_173_slchan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_173_slchan.text: When it comes to Mountaineering, I won't lose to anyone! No one knows these tools better than me. They make great weapons too!

char_173_slchan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_173_slchan.text: Yeah, Oripathy really changed me. But if I keep wallowing in self-pity, that wouldn't be like me, right? So, no matter what lies in wait in the future... I should continue working hard on my chosen path.

char_173_slchan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_173_slchan.text: Ah, it's snowing... We Silverashes can't go back to the way we were... I get that. Everything's changed. Only the snow is the same—the same snowflakes that I watched falling back home.

char_173_slchan.title: Idle
char_173_slchan.text: Doctoooor? Doctooooor! Heeeey! Fine, if you're just gonna sleep, then so be it. Bye-bye!

char_173_slchan.title: Onboard
char_173_slchan.text: I'm Cliffheart, and I live to conquer the peaks! It's nice to meet you!

char_173_slchan.title: Watching Battle Record
char_173_slchan.text: Hmm... what a novel experience!

char_173_slchan.title: Promotion 1
char_173_slchan.text: Promotion? Wow! Let's celebrate with some cake. Look, I grabbed these from Logistics. It's fine!

char_173_slchan.title: Promotion 2
char_173_slchan.text: Well, well, you really know what you're doing, Doctor! That's right, I'm really talented. You'd better use my power well!

char_173_slchan.title: Added to Squad
char_173_slchan.text: All right? I'm feeling motivated! Time to climb all the way to the top!

char_173_slchan.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_173_slchan.text: Eh? You want me to lead? This is all so sudden...

char_173_slchan.title: Depart
char_173_slchan.text: Say goodbye to the reckless Cliffheart. I'm taking things seriously from here on out.

char_173_slchan.title: Begin Operation
char_173_slchan.text: I'll show them what I can do!

char_173_slchan.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_173_slchan.text: Here!

char_173_slchan.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_173_slchan.text: Over here?

char_173_slchan.title: Deployment 1
char_173_slchan.text: Leave it to me!

char_173_slchan.title: Deployment 2
char_173_slchan.text: I'm raring to go!

char_173_slchan.title: In Battle 1
char_173_slchan.text: I'veeee got yoooou!

char_173_slchan.title: In Battle 2
char_173_slchan.text: My hook never misses! I've got this!

char_173_slchan.title: In Battle 3
char_173_slchan.text: Amateurs are doomed to fall to their death!

char_173_slchan.title: In Battle 4
char_173_slchan.text: For the Silverash name!

char_173_slchan.title: 4-star Result
char_173_slchan.text: There ain't no mountain too high, no situation too bleak!

char_173_slchan.title: 3-star Result
char_173_slchan.text: Of course we won with me around!

char_173_slchan.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_173_slchan.text: Wow, they sure are good at running away!

char_173_slchan.title: Operation Failure
char_173_slchan.text: Dangit... I messed up...

char_173_slchan.title: Assigned to Facility
char_173_slchan.text: It's so warm here... I'll hang out over here for a while!

char_173_slchan.title: Tap
char_173_slchan.text: W-wait! Whuah!

char_173_slchan.title: Trust Tap
char_173_slchan.text: I'm gonna teach you all about Mountaineering next time, Doctor! You'll love it, I promise!

char_173_slchan.title: Title
char_173_slchan.text: Arknights.

char_173_slchan.title: Greeting
char_173_slchan.text: Mornin', Doctor!

char_174_slbell.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_174_slbell.text: Hm? You're here to pray? Sorry, I'm busy right now.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk 1
char_174_slbell.text: Hm? Yes, I'm the current Karlan Saintess. But everyone swamped by work deserves a little break from time to time, don't you think?

char_174_slbell.title: Talk 2
char_174_slbell.text: Wasting time on trivial affairs is what I call slacking off. What I'm doing right now is… taking the opportunity to recharge.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk 3
char_174_slbell.text: Work hard, play hard, right? Don't force all those rigid rules on me.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_174_slbell.text: The Karlan Goddess? We share a good relationship, thanks to my duty as the Saintess.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_174_slbell.text: I'd be happy to help you, but the life of a Karlan Saintess is a busy one. Well, I guess I'll make an exception for you this once, but please make it short.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_174_slbell.text: My sis... Ensia... you people at Rhodes Island are all pretty fond of her, right? So it's not like she received any special treatment from that guy. And now... well, I think I get it now. It's fine like this. I'll just keep watching over her. It's fine.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_174_slbell.text: I twisted my ankle once when I was a kid. My brother carried me on his back all night, going from house to house until someone agreed to take us in. I decided that very moment that I wanted to grow up to become someone like my brother! But now... heh, forget it.

char_174_slbell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_174_slbell.text: Huh? How did you find me? I'll freeze your toes—Um? Coffee? For me? Thanks. Oh, right, Doctor, wanna hang out here with me for a while? The view is pretty nice. But let's keep it a secret, okay? A secret between just the two of us—aw, this coffee is so bitter!

char_174_slbell.title: Idle
char_174_slbell.text: It's rare to get to rest like this.

char_174_slbell.title: Onboard
char_174_slbell.text: Shh, I sneaked out—oh, um, hi, HR Director! I... I'm here to lend my powers to Rhodes Island. Pramanix, Karlan Saintess, at your service. Bless you, my friend.

char_174_slbell.title: Watching Battle Record
char_174_slbell.text: I hear a voice... repeating something in my head...

char_174_slbell.title: Promotion 1
char_174_slbell.text: 'You shall emerge victorious one day.' This is the pledge of Karlan, and what I'm praying for as well.

char_174_slbell.title: Promotion 2
char_174_slbell.text: Since when did you need blessings too? Can you wait a bit? I'll get ready.

char_174_slbell.title: Added to Squad
char_174_slbell.text: May the Holy Mt. Karlan be with us.

char_174_slbell.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_174_slbell.text: Follow the bells and you'll find the way.

char_174_slbell.title: Depart
char_174_slbell.text: Let me pray towards the mountains for you.

char_174_slbell.title: Begin Operation
char_174_slbell.text: Impurities must be purged.

char_174_slbell.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_174_slbell.text: Be careful.

char_174_slbell.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_174_slbell.text: I am ready.

char_174_slbell.title: Deployment 1
char_174_slbell.text: Let us begin.

char_174_slbell.title: Deployment 2
char_174_slbell.text: You have my blessings.

char_174_slbell.title: In Battle 1
char_174_slbell.text: O Spirits, hear my prayer.

char_174_slbell.title: In Battle 2
char_174_slbell.text: Here come the bells, cold winds binding my enemies.

char_174_slbell.title: In Battle 3
char_174_slbell.text: These powers are a gift from the Holy Mountain.

char_174_slbell.title: In Battle 4
char_174_slbell.text: As the bells ring, the impenetrable armor shall be no more.

char_174_slbell.title: 4-star Result
char_174_slbell.text: It was simple, thanks to the Spirits' power.

char_174_slbell.title: 3-star Result
char_174_slbell.text: The light of Karlan was shining on us.

char_174_slbell.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_174_slbell.text: If only we could have won without bloodshed... just my wish...

char_174_slbell.title: Operation Failure
char_174_slbell.text: It's not looking good... I suggest we retreat at once.

char_174_slbell.title: Assigned to Facility
char_174_slbell.text: It's a really peaceful place.

char_174_slbell.title: Tap
char_174_slbell.text: Hm?

char_174_slbell.title: Trust Tap
char_174_slbell.text: Close your eyes and I'll bring you somewhere new... Do keep your eyes closed, okay?

char_174_slbell.title: Title
char_174_slbell.text: Arknights.

char_174_slbell.title: Greeting
char_174_slbell.text: You have my blessings, Doctor.

char_198_blackd.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_198_blackd.text: It's not the duty of a guard to stand here and do nothing. Why don't we chat a bit?

char_198_blackd.title: Talk 1
char_198_blackd.text: With perfect positioning and a suitable environment, my letters will arrive just fine. After all, it's my job, right? I need to do well to survive.

char_198_blackd.title: Talk 2
char_198_blackd.text: Are you hungry? If you want something to eat, just say the word. I can't compete with Matterhorn in the kitchen, but I can at least cook a decent meal.

char_198_blackd.title: Talk 3
char_198_blackd.text: The comms equipment here at Rhodes Island is way too good. At this rate, I'm going to lose my job...

char_198_blackd.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_198_blackd.text: Anything else you need? Just don't keep me on the line for too long.

char_198_blackd.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_198_blackd.text: Huh? There's a faint smell on the letters? No, you must be imagining things.

char_198_blackd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_198_blackd.text: I owe my life to Master SilverAsh. If necessary, I would do anything for him.

char_198_blackd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_198_blackd.text: You want me to transport... all these? That's a lot, Doctor! Come on, I'm not a miracle worker!

char_198_blackd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_198_blackd.text: Seems I'm no match for you. I suppose it's time to retire my business smile for now... *Ahem*... I'd like to show you my true face, from now on.

char_198_blackd.title: Idle
char_198_blackd.text: Doctor, there's a new message for... Ah, never mind.

char_198_blackd.title: Onboard
char_198_blackd.text: Esteemed Leader of Rhodes Island, your ally—Courier of the Snow Realm—is here at your service. If you get into any sort of trouble during your contract with Master SilverAsh, just snap your fingers and I'll be there.

char_198_blackd.title: Watching Battle Record
char_198_blackd.text: Whoa, that's an incredible job well done.

char_198_blackd.title: Promotion 1
char_198_blackd.text: You'd save a lot of trouble if you sent me onto the battlefield.

char_198_blackd.title: Promotion 2
char_198_blackd.text: As a Messenger of the Snow Realm, I'm sure to appear whenever you need me.

char_198_blackd.title: Added to Squad
char_198_blackd.text: Leave the scouting to me.

char_198_blackd.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_198_blackd.text: I won't blemish the name of the Snow Realm.

char_198_blackd.title: Depart
char_198_blackd.text: Too bad some people just can't live and let live.

char_198_blackd.title: Begin Operation
char_198_blackd.text: They'll pay for what they've done.

char_198_blackd.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_198_blackd.text: At your service.

char_198_blackd.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_198_blackd.text: Your orders.

char_198_blackd.title: Deployment 1
char_198_blackd.text: Mhmm.

char_198_blackd.title: Deployment 2
char_198_blackd.text: Forwards!

char_198_blackd.title: In Battle 1
char_198_blackd.text: Attack!

char_198_blackd.title: In Battle 2
char_198_blackd.text: How's that?

char_198_blackd.title: In Battle 3
char_198_blackd.text: Haaaghh!

char_198_blackd.title: In Battle 4
char_198_blackd.text: Speeding up!

char_198_blackd.title: 4-star Result
char_198_blackd.text: I'll bring news of our victory to Rhodes Island right away!

char_198_blackd.title: 3-star Result
char_198_blackd.text: Let's grab a nice dinner after we clean up the battlefield. My treat!

char_198_blackd.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_198_blackd.text: Anyone injured? I've got medicine and bandages.

char_198_blackd.title: Operation Failure
char_198_blackd.text: Let's get out of here first. Here, this way! Hurry!

char_198_blackd.title: Assigned to Facility
char_198_blackd.text: I'll greet my roommates and neighbors first.

char_198_blackd.title: Tap
char_198_blackd.text: How can I help?

char_198_blackd.title: Trust Tap
char_198_blackd.text: Alright, I'll whip up a meal for you later.

char_198_blackd.title: Title
char_198_blackd.text: Arknights.

char_198_blackd.title: Greeting
char_198_blackd.text: Call me whenever you need me.

char_199_yak.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_199_yak.text: I've moved your belongings where you wanted. No worries, it wasn't heavy.

char_199_yak.title: Talk 1
char_199_yak.text: The shield is a symbol of a steadfast guardian.

char_199_yak.title: Talk 2
char_199_yak.text: I've been responsible for protecting Young Master SilverAsh... I mean, Master SilverAsh... ever since he was young.

char_199_yak.title: Talk 3
char_199_yak.text: It's not exactly polite to talk about Miss Enya behind her back, but... *sigh* I do pity Miss Enya for what she has suffered. She really deserves a better life.

char_199_yak.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_199_yak.text: If my shield gets damaged, I should take it to the artisan called Vulcan for repairs. Is that correct?

char_199_yak.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_199_yak.text: This is far beyond my expectation. That artisan is truly skilled. I need to thank her properly.

char_199_yak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_199_yak.text: Life at Rhodes Island is fun. The Snow Realm is rather bland in comparison.

char_199_yak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_199_yak.text: Master did send me to protect Ensia. But I honestly don't think she's the type who would sit there and ask to be protected.

char_199_yak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_199_yak.text: I am slowly starting to understand why Master SilverAsh holds you in such high regard. Doctor, from this day, feel free to command me as your shield.

char_199_yak.title: Idle
char_199_yak.text: Sometimes, I suddenly start missing my life in the Snow Realm.

char_199_yak.title: Onboard
char_199_yak.text: Ally, I salute you in true Snow Realm fashion. My codename is Matterhorn, and I am one of the guards dispatched here by Master SilverAsh.

char_199_yak.title: Watching Battle Record
char_199_yak.text: You have my gratitude.

char_199_yak.title: Promotion 1
char_199_yak.text: Thank you for the approval, Doctor. I am greatly flattered.

char_199_yak.title: Promotion 2
char_199_yak.text: I will not step back, not even if this shield shatters the very next second. Not because of my loyalty, but because of my conviction.

char_199_yak.title: Added to Squad
char_199_yak.text: At your service.

char_199_yak.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_199_yak.text: I am honored.

char_199_yak.title: Depart
char_199_yak.text: I shall protect the team.

char_199_yak.title: Begin Operation
char_199_yak.text: All is ready.

char_199_yak.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_199_yak.text: I shall be your vanguard.

char_199_yak.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_199_yak.text: My shield is ready.

char_199_yak.title: Deployment 1
char_199_yak.text: Hm!

char_199_yak.title: Deployment 2
char_199_yak.text: Hoo-yah!

char_199_yak.title: In Battle 1
char_199_yak.text: Retribution!

char_199_yak.title: In Battle 2
char_199_yak.text: I'm not here just for show!

char_199_yak.title: In Battle 3
char_199_yak.text: With my conviction, I shall bring any monster to its knees!

char_199_yak.title: In Battle 4
char_199_yak.text: You don't have what it takes!

char_199_yak.title: 4-star Result
char_199_yak.text: I wasn't even giving my all!

char_199_yak.title: 3-star Result
char_199_yak.text: Their strikes can barely tickle me.

char_199_yak.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_199_yak.text: I'll pull off a perfect victory next time for you, I promise.

char_199_yak.title: Operation Failure
char_199_yak.text: I should not have taken the enemies lightly. Now I pay the price.

char_199_yak.title: Assigned to Facility
char_199_yak.text: Very nice room, this one. Furnished tastefully, with a peaceful atmosphere.

char_199_yak.title: Tap
char_199_yak.text: Mhmm.

char_199_yak.title: Trust Tap
char_199_yak.text: This is my signature dish. How do you like it?

char_199_yak.title: Title
char_199_yak.text: Arknights.

char_199_yak.title: Greeting
char_199_yak.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_219_meteo.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_219_meteo.text: It's time for my shift. If I'm interrupting your work, I can wait outside.

char_219_meteo.title: Talk 1
char_219_meteo.text: Have you gone through every new operator's personnel files and info?

char_219_meteo.title: Talk 2
char_219_meteo.text: Nowhere in the world is completely safe with a war going on. Not even Rhodes Island. Please remember that.

char_219_meteo.title: Talk 3
char_219_meteo.text: To be frank, you're surrounded by people from all walks of life. That can be quite dangerous, don't you think?

char_219_meteo.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_219_meteo.text: I'm surprised that so many other Sarkaz have come to Rhodes Island. What's more surprising is that they actually get along…

char_219_meteo.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_219_meteo.text: My bowgun may not be easy to operate, but it's just as powerful as the Laterano guns. I use it to defend the glory of my people.

char_219_meteo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_219_meteo.text: I see Firewatch is here. I can't believe she's using the name of our old guerrilla group as her codename. It's like time stopped for her the day her home was destroyed...

char_219_meteo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_219_meteo.text: As for what happened between Firewatch and I... she'll tell you when she's ready. All I can say is that I was not the one who led the rebels to her village... but no one would believe the words of a Sarkaz, right?

char_219_meteo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_219_meteo.text: She wants her revenge, and I have my duty. Even though we've met again at Rhodes Island, it probably won't affect anything. Our paths aren't likely to cross.

char_219_meteo.title: Idle
char_219_meteo.text: What's that sound? Is someone monitoring this room? Or am I just… imagining things?

char_219_meteo.title: Onboard
char_219_meteo.text: Codename Meteorite, a freelance mercenary. I'm Sarkaz, as you can see. Do you still want to hire me?

char_219_meteo.title: Watching Battle Record
char_219_meteo.text: My aim with my bowgun has improved.

char_219_meteo.title: Promotion 1
char_219_meteo.text: You want to promote me? I see that I made the right choice to work here.

char_219_meteo.title: Promotion 2
char_219_meteo.text: Thank you so much for this, really. I can't believe someone like me could work a stable job here at Rhodes Island. I'll do everything I can to repay your trust in me.

char_219_meteo.title: Added to Squad
char_219_meteo.text: Reporting for duty.

char_219_meteo.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_219_meteo.text: Me, a leader? To be honest, I'm not that good at giving orders.

char_219_meteo.title: Depart
char_219_meteo.text: I'll do my best to take care of everyone.

char_219_meteo.title: Begin Operation
char_219_meteo.text: Enemy status confirmed. All units, prepare to engage.

char_219_meteo.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_219_meteo.text: All right.

char_219_meteo.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_219_meteo.text: No problem.

char_219_meteo.title: Deployment 1
char_219_meteo.text: I've got a clear shot.

char_219_meteo.title: Deployment 2
char_219_meteo.text: Let's take them all out.

char_219_meteo.title: In Battle 1
char_219_meteo.text: Fire!

char_219_meteo.title: In Battle 2
char_219_meteo.text: Open fire!

char_219_meteo.title: In Battle 3
char_219_meteo.text: Focus fire!

char_219_meteo.title: In Battle 4
char_219_meteo.text: Get back!

char_219_meteo.title: 4-star Result
char_219_meteo.text: I don't want to see anything laid to waste in the fires of war ever again. Let us put an end to this, once and for all.

char_219_meteo.title: 3-star Result
char_219_meteo.text: Trying to escape after I laid you to siege? Don't be silly.

char_219_meteo.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_219_meteo.text: Someone's escaped. Not the time to let our guard down.

char_219_meteo.title: Operation Failure
char_219_meteo.text: Retreat! Back to the stronghold and regroup.

char_219_meteo.title: Assigned to Facility
char_219_meteo.text: What's this place?

char_219_meteo.title: Tap
char_219_meteo.text: Huh? Huh? What?

char_219_meteo.title: Trust Tap
char_219_meteo.text: Is this for me? Thanks.

char_219_meteo.title: Title
char_219_meteo.text: Arknights.

char_219_meteo.title: Greeting
char_219_meteo.text: How's it going, Doctor?

char_158_milu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_158_milu.text: I'm keeping an eye on our surroundings. So far everything seems fine.

char_158_milu.title: Talk 1
char_158_milu.text: You should know that some of those eyes on you hold nothing but malice. You're not safe, not even at Rhodes Island.

char_158_milu.title: Talk 2
char_158_milu.text: Don't be afraid of those hostiles hiding in the shadow. No matter how those criminals try to hide, they can't escape my eyes.

char_158_milu.title: Talk 3
char_158_milu.text: I'll have my revenge... even if I must lose my life for it.

char_158_milu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_158_milu.text: My clan, my friends, they all perished in the woods of our hometown... The only ones who mourned them were the trees, which gave unto them their leaves.

char_158_milu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_158_milu.text: This crossbow is manufactured for the sole purpose of punishing sinners. The day will come when I use it to pass my final judgement on those who deserve it.

char_158_milu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_158_milu.text: Meteorite... we used to be friends. On the day my hometown was destroyed, we were part of the small group that managed to escape.

char_158_milu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_158_milu.text: Since then, I've never stopped searching for the traitor who led the rebel army to our town. Could it be Meteorite? No, I... It couldn't be her...

char_158_milu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_158_milu.text: ...Oh, did I fall asleep? Sorry, I've been spending more time patrolling these days... It's fine, you say? But... um, thank you for caring.

char_158_milu.title: Idle
char_158_milu.text: I'd like to take a nap...

char_158_milu.title: Onboard
char_158_milu.text: Firewatch here. I'm a sniper. To avenge my fallen clan, I need all the power I can get.

char_158_milu.title: Promotion 1
char_158_milu.text: Thanks for appointing me to this position.

char_158_milu.title: Promotion 2
char_158_milu.text: Thank you for the promotion. I hope you'll keep using my powers for the right thing. If you don't, however...

char_158_milu.title: 4-star Result
char_158_milu.text: I'm not done until I have my revenge...

char_158_milu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_158_milu.text: Mission accomplished, request search for remaining hostiles.

char_158_milu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_158_milu.text: I'm not used to being in a room with so many people...

char_158_milu.title: Trust Tap
char_158_milu.text: Uh, please don't touch my antlers... it tickles...

char_115_headbr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_115_headbr.text: I'm here to help. So? Whose ass are we kicking next?

char_115_headbr.title: Talk 1
char_115_headbr.text: You can't go out without permission? Что? Aren't you the one in charge? Screw the rules, let's just get out.

char_115_headbr.title: Talk 2
char_115_headbr.text: You said something? My headphones were on.

char_115_headbr.title: Talk 3
char_115_headbr.text: The leader of Rhodes Island looks younger than even Istina. How can you let a kid like that go to battle?!

char_115_headbr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_115_headbr.text: Why do I stare at you all the time? 'cause I'm onto you, gotta see what you're doing.

char_115_headbr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_115_headbr.text: Every soldier wants to be the general. And I trust you have no opinion on me taking your position someday?

char_115_headbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_115_headbr.text: Plans for the future? Don't have any. You got a problem with that? I'm still young, no need to plan ahead.

char_115_headbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_115_headbr.text: I found Istina and the girls out there in the field. We used to have a bunch more, too. What happened to them…? I dealt with 'em. Had no choice, they wouldn't play nice.

char_115_headbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_115_headbr.text: Huh? Chernobog? Who'd ever wanna go back to that miserable city? We've got new lives here at Rhodes Island. So, let's keep it together, Doctor.

char_115_headbr.title: Idle
char_115_headbr.text: …You really finished all your work?

char_115_headbr.title: Onboard
char_115_headbr.text: I'm Zima, leader of the Ursus Student Self-governing Group. I can make do without one, but my comrades need a place to call home. Let's cut the crap, gimme a job to do. I know lodging here ain't free.

char_115_headbr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_115_headbr.text: Not too bad.

char_115_headbr.title: Promotion 1
char_115_headbr.text: A promotion? Cool! So I'll keep getting promoted if I keep doing a good job knocking heads, yeah?

char_115_headbr.title: Promotion 2
char_115_headbr.text: I'll be frank: if I keep getting promoted, I might end up replacing you someday. Oh, you think I'm joking? Sorry, pal, I'm dead serious here.

char_115_headbr.title: Added to Squad
char_115_headbr.text: Don't care if I'm leading or following. Whatever.

char_115_headbr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_115_headbr.text: What a pain...

char_115_headbr.title: Depart
char_115_headbr.text: Time to go.

char_115_headbr.title: Begin Operation
char_115_headbr.text: Roll out.

char_115_headbr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_115_headbr.text: Duh, it's me!

char_115_headbr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_115_headbr.text: I'm heading into the thick of it.

char_115_headbr.title: Deployment 1
char_115_headbr.text: Spineless scumbags.

char_115_headbr.title: Deployment 2
char_115_headbr.text: Hah.

char_115_headbr.title: In Battle 1
char_115_headbr.text: What're you scared of?!

char_115_headbr.title: In Battle 2
char_115_headbr.text: Bring it on, bastards!

char_115_headbr.title: In Battle 3
char_115_headbr.text: For power and glory!

char_115_headbr.title: In Battle 4
char_115_headbr.text: Victory or death!

char_115_headbr.title: 4-star Result
char_115_headbr.text: Who else has a death wish? Happy to help!

char_115_headbr.title: 3-star Result
char_115_headbr.text: Not bad. A solid win.

char_115_headbr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_115_headbr.text: Anyway, this place is ours now.

char_115_headbr.title: Operation Failure
char_115_headbr.text: Man, you suck. Get lost!

char_115_headbr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_115_headbr.text: What do you want me to do here?

char_115_headbr.title: Tap
char_115_headbr.text: Huh?

char_115_headbr.title: Trust Tap
char_115_headbr.text: Hey, you're getting better at giving orders these days. I bet you also see the fun in fighting now, eh?

char_115_headbr.title: Title
char_115_headbr.text: Arknights.

char_115_headbr.title: Greeting
char_115_headbr.text: You need something?

char_195_glassb.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_195_glassb.text: Greetings, I'm here for my shift… That's a peculiar look on your face. Do I seem so unreliable?

char_195_glassb.title: Talk 1
char_195_glassb.text: We don't throw ourselves into battle because we want to. We just have a stronger will to survive than most. If you understand, that alone would be enough.

char_195_glassb.title: Talk 2
char_195_glassb.text: Zima, the girls, and I all came from different schools. But all the students in the city knew the legends of General Zima. Doesn't that sound cool? Literally. Zima is Ursine for 'winter', you see. Hm, yes.

char_195_glassb.title: Talk 3
char_195_glassb.text: How did we escape from Chernobog? Hmm... you really don't want to know. Sometimes the truth is better left untold.

char_195_glassb.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_195_glassb.text: Oh? I'm reading a mystery novel… As a matter of fact, it taught me some lessons that proved useful in getting me through that terrible time.

char_195_glassb.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_195_glassb.text: My favorite books? Hmm, I enjoy topics like politics, economics, and dialectical materialism… Baking magazines and stuff like that are nice too.

char_195_glassb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_195_glassb.text: Home? My hometown? Obviously, we can't go back there. You know as well as I do that there's nothing left of it. Even if we rebuilt Chernobog, I still…

char_195_glassb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_195_glassb.text: Rhodes Island is safe. And there are so many books here in your office... If I could, I'd really prefer to stay here…

char_195_glassb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_195_glassb.text: What will I do in the future? Hmm… No idea. My books don't have an answer for that. I hope someone will give offer me one, someday…

char_195_glassb.title: Idle
char_195_glassb.text: Such a twist is beyond my imagination. 'Every last one of the passengers on this train, you're all murderers!'

char_195_glassb.title: Onboard
char_195_glassb.text: I am Istina. I'm still a student, but I was recruited for my ability to use Arts… Yes, it is rather strange for a student to serve here, isn't it?

char_195_glassb.title: Watching Battle Record
char_195_glassb.text: You want me to be stronger?

char_195_glassb.title: Promotion 1
char_195_glassb.text: Do you feel like you understand me better now? Naive, you're far from really knowing me.

char_195_glassb.title: Promotion 2
char_195_glassb.text: Now that you've offered me such recognition, I will reveal my true power. Allow me to demonstrate by reducing this office to a fine powder… Just kidding. There are too many precious books here. I would never do something so awful.

char_195_glassb.title: Added to Squad
char_195_glassb.text: Understood.

char_195_glassb.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_195_glassb.text: Hmm… The team is somewhat different from what I imagined.

char_195_glassb.title: Depart
char_195_glassb.text: Let's show our determination, earnestness, and boundless passion.

char_195_glassb.title: Begin Operation
char_195_glassb.text: May the star of victory shine upon us.

char_195_glassb.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_195_glassb.text: What is it, Doctor?

char_195_glassb.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_195_glassb.text: Go ahead.

char_195_glassb.title: Deployment 1
char_195_glassb.text: I have a distaste for war.

char_195_glassb.title: Deployment 2
char_195_glassb.text: It seems we must fight.

char_195_glassb.title: In Battle 1
char_195_glassb.text: Come at me.

char_195_glassb.title: In Battle 2
char_195_glassb.text: Please, no need to rush.

char_195_glassb.title: In Battle 3
char_195_glassb.text: Let us take it slow.

char_195_glassb.title: In Battle 4
char_195_glassb.text: Time to teach you a lesson.

char_195_glassb.title: 4-star Result
char_195_glassb.text: Why do they fight... even when it may cost them their lives? What do they gain from it?

char_195_glassb.title: 3-star Result
char_195_glassb.text: Doctor, if you have to commend us, now is the time.

char_195_glassb.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_195_glassb.text: Those enemies who fled... We probably won't see them again.

char_195_glassb.title: Operation Failure
char_195_glassb.text: Neither our numbers nor our efforts were sufficient…

char_195_glassb.title: Assigned to Facility
char_195_glassb.text: A secret room, where, shall we say, interesting things happen.

char_195_glassb.title: Tap
char_195_glassb.text: What?!

char_195_glassb.title: Trust Tap
char_195_glassb.text: It's too noisy here, I'd rather read in the Doctor's office.

char_195_glassb.title: Title
char_195_glassb.text: Arknights.

char_195_glassb.title: Greeting
char_195_glassb.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_196_sunbr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_196_sunbr.text: Hello, Doctor! You hungry? Heehee, I heard your stomach growling from a mile away! It sounded like thunder!

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk 1
char_196_sunbr.text: My shield? I can lift it easy! One, two, lift! Hehe, see? Oh, Relax, Doctor. I'm not gonna drop it or anything. You don't have to stand all the way over there.

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk 2
char_196_sunbr.text: The bad guys who destroyed my hometown are gonna pay! I'll smash them with my frying pan!

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk 3
char_196_sunbr.text: Zima says she'll protect me, but I'm not a baby! Me and my shield kept everyone safe before we made it here! It's not a shield, it's a vault door? No it isnnnn't! I can't believe you're calling it that!

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_196_sunbr.text: Doctor, you wanna taste my cooking? Hehe, you can try it soon. I've already asked Closure if I can work the cafeteria! Just waiting to hear back.

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_196_sunbr.text: Tadaaah! Here comes Gummy's specialty: bacon and eggs! So, do you like it? It's tough to get the heat right when I'm out in the field, but most days I can make it perfect!

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_196_sunbr.text: Me and the other four weren't always together, you know.

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_196_sunbr.text: Why am I always so cheery? Umm, actually... After the things we've seen, it's hard to be cheery... But I really want my friends to forget about all that awful stuff. So I need to pull myself together and smile a whole bunch to make that happen!

char_196_sunbr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_196_sunbr.text: I... I miss my parents, and I do want to find them. I think about them all the time... but if I leave now, I don't think I could do anything by myself... So... Doctor, could you please teach me how to fight? I don't want everyone to think of me as some kind of kitchen girl!

char_196_sunbr.title: Idle
char_196_sunbr.text: Are you sleeping, Doctor? Hmm, maybe a bit of reading here would be okay, I guess?

char_196_sunbr.title: Onboard
char_196_sunbr.text: My name's Gummy! You must be the Doctor. Thank you and everyone from Rhodes Island for helping us! I don't have any special skills, but I'll do what I can as good as I can!

char_196_sunbr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_196_sunbr.text: I can feel my power surging! I might even be able to lift you up, Doctor!

char_196_sunbr.title: Promotion 1
char_196_sunbr.text: I'll become a three-star Rhodes Island chef after the promotion, right? Just kidding! Hehe.

char_196_sunbr.title: Promotion 2
char_196_sunbr.text: I want to do much, much more besides cooking! I don't know if I'm strong enough to do everything you want me to, but I'll give it my all!

char_196_sunbr.title: Added to Squad
char_196_sunbr.text: Gummy, ready to go!

char_196_sunbr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_196_sunbr.text: Что?! You're making me the leader?!

char_196_sunbr.title: Depart
char_196_sunbr.text: Just wait for us to get back, Doctor!

char_196_sunbr.title: Begin Operation
char_196_sunbr.text: Nope, I'm not scared!

char_196_sunbr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_196_sunbr.text: Let me do it!

char_196_sunbr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_196_sunbr.text: Pick me! Pick me!

char_196_sunbr.title: Deployment 1
char_196_sunbr.text: I'm ready to fight!

char_196_sunbr.title: Deployment 2
char_196_sunbr.text: I'll protect everyone!

char_196_sunbr.title: In Battle 1
char_196_sunbr.text: Try some of my specialty!

char_196_sunbr.title: In Battle 2
char_196_sunbr.text: Here's something yummy for you!

char_196_sunbr.title: In Battle 3
char_196_sunbr.text: Anyone hungry?

char_196_sunbr.title: In Battle 4
char_196_sunbr.text: Push forward, team! Ura!

char_196_sunbr.title: 4-star Result
char_196_sunbr.text: The bad guys should just give up! With the Doctor on our side, they'll never beat us!

char_196_sunbr.title: 3-star Result
char_196_sunbr.text: I didn't want to have to do that… but if we don't fight, the bad guys will get us!

char_196_sunbr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_196_sunbr.text: We won, and that's what matters! It's a good thing!

char_196_sunbr.title: Operation Failure
char_196_sunbr.text: Ughh… did anybody get hurt…? Doctor? Is the Doctor okay?!

char_196_sunbr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_196_sunbr.text: Wow, what a big room! You could get so many people in here!

char_196_sunbr.title: Tap
char_196_sunbr.text: Ahahahahah!

char_196_sunbr.title: Trust Tap
char_196_sunbr.text: Doctor, I know my food tastes great, but don't eat too much of it! You'll get fat!

char_196_sunbr.title: Title
char_196_sunbr.text: Arknights.

char_196_sunbr.title: Greeting
char_196_sunbr.text: Doctor, you want something to eat?

char_147_shining.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_147_shining.text: Greetings, Doctor... Is there anything you'd like to discuss?

char_147_shining.title: Talk 1
char_147_shining.text: You look quite pale... You say your chest hurts? Don't overwork yourself, please get some rest. Don't be afraid, I'm right beside you. Everything will be okay...

char_147_shining.title: Talk 2
char_147_shining.text: You've seen my healing Arts somewhere before?... That must have been your imagination. Yes, our memories do deceive us on occasion…

char_147_shining.title: Talk 3
char_147_shining.text: 'Confessarius?' Where did you learn this word? My apologies, but I'm afraid I cannot continue this topic.

char_147_shining.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_147_shining.text: We Sarkaz combined our inherent Arts affinity with the power of Originium to develop new healing Arts,  we've been doing this for quite some time to succour those who drag themselves in the mire.

char_147_shining.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_147_shining.text: Now, you ask? Now we have nothing left. That war bereaved us of all hope.

char_147_shining.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_147_shining.text: Who is Nearl to me? Well... She's a travel companion, and I trust her with my very life.

char_147_shining.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_147_shining.text: There are those who will sacrifice their all to deliver others from their pain. And Nearl, she is just the kind.

char_147_shining.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_147_shining.text: Once upon a time, I followed someone who shone bright as the beacon of hope, until wicked machinations took the light away. But this time, the incandescence will cease nevermore, even at the cost of my life...

char_147_shining.title: Idle
char_147_shining.text: This quiet… it reminds me of my time back home.

char_147_shining.title: Onboard
char_147_shining.text: I am Shining, the roaming medic. I look familiar to you? It is possible our paths have crossed.

char_147_shining.title: Watching Battle Record
char_147_shining.text: The power to merely heal wounds... is not enough.

char_147_shining.title: Promotion 1
char_147_shining.text: A medic's hand cannot reach all those in need.

char_147_shining.title: Promotion 2
char_147_shining.text: Yes. I must be more than a medic—I will live on as a guardian. As has always been my goal. Doctor, please bear witness to my oath.

char_147_shining.title: Added to Squad
char_147_shining.text: To the battlefield, are we not?

char_147_shining.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_147_shining.text: A battle for our own delieverence, is it not?

char_147_shining.title: Depart
char_147_shining.text: War, ever inevitable.

char_147_shining.title: Begin Operation
char_147_shining.text: May the war grant us the redemption we seek... or will it?

char_147_shining.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_147_shining.text: Let's begin.

char_147_shining.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_147_shining.text: Yes, I'm listening.

char_147_shining.title: Deployment 1
char_147_shining.text: Flourish, or perish.

char_147_shining.title: Deployment 2
char_147_shining.text: 'Tis but a flash in the drift of time.

char_147_shining.title: In Battle 1
char_147_shining.text: Your life is mine to protect.

char_147_shining.title: In Battle 2
char_147_shining.text: Fear not.

char_147_shining.title: In Battle 3
char_147_shining.text: Grief, ever echoes in our souls.

char_147_shining.title: In Battle 4
char_147_shining.text: Agony, ever etched on our hearts.

char_147_shining.title: 4-star Result
char_147_shining.text: Our wills and spirits are ever burning against the fiercest enemies.

char_147_shining.title: 3-star Result
char_147_shining.text: No matter the sins, all will fall to ashes with lives at the end of time.

char_147_shining.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_147_shining.text: Return not to the battlefields. You will find no redemption here.

char_147_shining.title: Operation Failure
char_147_shining.text: Victory and loss... are insignificant moments in an endless cycle.

char_147_shining.title: Assigned to Facility
char_147_shining.text: I will be fine, so long as I have a quiet place to be alone.

char_147_shining.title: Tap
char_147_shining.text: Yes? What is it?

char_147_shining.title: Trust Tap
char_147_shining.text: It's been some time since I've known such serenity. I can even hear your heartbeat.

char_147_shining.title: Title
char_147_shining.text: Arknights.

char_147_shining.title: Greeting
char_147_shining.text: How are you feeling today, Doctor?

char_148_nearl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_148_nearl.text: Salutations, Doctor. May the light be with you.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk 1
char_148_nearl.text: Doctor, I ask that you give me the most dangerous assignment available, such that my shield and I can best protect those in need.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk 2
char_148_nearl.text: The title of 'Knight' should be a symbol of honor. And yet now, it's been reduced to a mere commodity...

char_148_nearl.title: Talk 3
char_148_nearl.text: As long as the light continues to guide me, I will neither bow to cruelty nor kneel to violence.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_148_nearl.text: I'm grateful as always for your service, Doctor.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_148_nearl.text: The Kazimierz chivalric spirit should have been a force of salvation for all who suffer in this world. But now, it's nothing more than a rotten legacy, used to benefit the rich. Nothing is more shameful.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_148_nearl.text: Shining, too, is a beam of light that guides me forward. She carries the hope I've long sought.

char_148_nearl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_148_nearl.text: Something flickered in Shining's eyes when she heard the name Rhodes Island. I had no idea what it meant...

char_148_nearl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_148_nearl.text: In this time and age of a world plagued by Oripathy, may the ray of hope from Rhodes Island light the way.

char_148_nearl.title: Idle
char_148_nearl.text: Let us embrace this momentary respite.

char_148_nearl.title: Onboard
char_148_nearl.text: Margaret Nearl, the Radiant Knight of Kazimierz...and now a Rhodes Island Operator. I will defend your life and your honor with my shield.

char_148_nearl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_148_nearl.text: Thank you for granting me power.

char_148_nearl.title: Promotion 1
char_148_nearl.text: Thank you, Doctor. These new powers shall bring relief to those who suffer. This I shall engrave upon my heart.

char_148_nearl.title: Promotion 2
char_148_nearl.text: Shining once said that dawn remains distant. But I believe that, one day, we will revive the dying glory with our very own hands.

char_148_nearl.title: Added to Squad
char_148_nearl.text: I shall protect them from all harm.

char_148_nearl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_148_nearl.text: I shall not blemish Rhodes Island's name.

char_148_nearl.title: Depart
char_148_nearl.text: I am ready. Set out!

char_148_nearl.title: Begin Operation
char_148_nearl.text: Honor must be defended.

char_148_nearl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_148_nearl.text: In your name.

char_148_nearl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_148_nearl.text: I shall give my all to you.

char_148_nearl.title: Deployment 1
char_148_nearl.text: I shall cover you!

char_148_nearl.title: Deployment 2
char_148_nearl.text: Get behind me!

char_148_nearl.title: In Battle 1
char_148_nearl.text: Light, heed me!

char_148_nearl.title: In Battle 2
char_148_nearl.text: I'm with you!

char_148_nearl.title: In Battle 3
char_148_nearl.text: Don't be afraid.

char_148_nearl.title: In Battle 4
char_148_nearl.text: Revitalize!

char_148_nearl.title: 4-star Result
char_148_nearl.text: A true knight will not bend to the threat of violence. Now, repent for your sins, in front of my warhammer.

char_148_nearl.title: 3-star Result
char_148_nearl.text: Let us go forth. And there will be one day…

char_148_nearl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_148_nearl.text: A true knight will not chase one who's lost the will to fight. Everyone deserves a chance to choose a new path.

char_148_nearl.title: Operation Failure
char_148_nearl.text: We must not give up now.

char_148_nearl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_148_nearl.text: I shall keep watch here.

char_148_nearl.title: Tap
char_148_nearl.text: I sense an intru- Oh, Doctor?!

char_148_nearl.title: Trust Tap
char_148_nearl.text: Doctor, umm... may I enter your office? I've heard you have a vast collection of literature.

char_148_nearl.title: Title
char_148_nearl.text: Arknights.

char_148_nearl.title: Greeting
char_148_nearl.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_179_cgbird.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_179_cgbird.text: I apologize... It's my job to attend to you, but my body simply won't move like I want it to...

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk 1
char_179_cgbird.text: I once breathed in some kind of Originium toxin... it damaged my memory and the nervous system in my lower extremities... at least that is what Dr. Kal'tsit told me. So I often wonder... what was my life like before then?

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk 2
char_179_cgbird.text: This little blue bird often comes over and chats with me. Sometimes, I dream about turning into a bird myself... flying free in the skies, without a care...

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk 3
char_179_cgbird.text: Once upon a time, I was imprisoned in an empty room. I only saw another human being when they needed my healing...

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_179_cgbird.text: With this staff in my hand, I can heal as many as I will. Is this... really an ability I was born with?

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_179_cgbird.text: Shining told me that the sins we carry... the guilt of starting the war, as devils... will one day catch up to us and we will have to face judgment. Those people who imprisoned me said the same thing. But...

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_179_cgbird.text: Amiya... I feel a sense of deja vu whenever I see her. Perhaps we met sometime in the past?

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_179_cgbird.text: The memories I have are mere fragments. My people... Originium... my mission, the rebellion, the war... but tell me, why are you in one of my memories too?

char_179_cgbird.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_179_cgbird.text: How did I end up like this? Why must I suffer all that I do? Doctor, do you have the answers?

char_179_cgbird.title: Idle
char_179_cgbird.text: Do you too dream of flying freely through the skies like a bird?

char_179_cgbird.title: Onboard
char_179_cgbird.text: Liz... that's my real name. Everything else is just cloudy, indistinct memories...

char_179_cgbird.title: Watching Battle Record
char_179_cgbird.text: Why is there a need for me to grow stronger?

char_179_cgbird.title: Promotion 1
char_179_cgbird.text: A promotion? I see. It sounds like something to rejoice over. But... I apologize, I don't feel any joy within...

char_179_cgbird.title: Promotion 2
char_179_cgbird.text: Thank you for personally informing me of my promotion, Doctor. But... to me, it doesn't matter as much as the story of the world outside that this little bird is telling me right now.

char_179_cgbird.title: Added to Squad
char_179_cgbird.text: Is this the rendezvous point?

char_179_cgbird.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_179_cgbird.text: I shall do anything you command me to.

char_179_cgbird.title: Depart
char_179_cgbird.text: I need only do as the manual said, yes?

char_179_cgbird.title: Begin Operation
char_179_cgbird.text: The battlefield... a place where lives are taken...

char_179_cgbird.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_179_cgbird.text: Doctor...

char_179_cgbird.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_179_cgbird.text: Who will you choose?

char_179_cgbird.title: Deployment 1
char_179_cgbird.text: This is... the battlefield...

char_179_cgbird.title: Deployment 2
char_179_cgbird.text: It's not my wish to take lives.

char_179_cgbird.title: In Battle 1
char_179_cgbird.text: My power is all yours now.

char_179_cgbird.title: In Battle 2
char_179_cgbird.text: Take flight.

char_179_cgbird.title: In Battle 3
char_179_cgbird.text: You will not come to harm.

char_179_cgbird.title: In Battle 4
char_179_cgbird.text: I shall protect you.

char_179_cgbird.title: 4-star Result
char_179_cgbird.text: No matter how difficult the battle gets, I will always…

char_179_cgbird.title: 3-star Result
char_179_cgbird.text: To fight to the very end... that's our destiny.

char_179_cgbird.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_179_cgbird.text: Perhaps they've already escaped this cage called fate...

char_179_cgbird.title: Operation Failure
char_179_cgbird.text: Is this... how despair feels?

char_179_cgbird.title: Assigned to Facility
char_179_cgbird.text: Rooms... They too are a type of cage.

char_179_cgbird.title: Tap
char_179_cgbird.text: Yes? What is it?

char_179_cgbird.title: Trust Tap
char_179_cgbird.text: Doctor... is this... what is known as 'intimacy'?

char_179_cgbird.title: Title
char_179_cgbird.text: Arknights.

char_179_cgbird.title: Greeting
char_179_cgbird.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_112_siege.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_112_siege.text: You're still not done assigning tasks? I'll wait a bit longer then.

char_112_siege.title: Talk 1
char_112_siege.text: Keep calm and carry on.

char_112_siege.title: Talk 2
char_112_siege.text: Our meals used to be fairly nice in the past... but the quality's gone downhill since we joined Indra's group.

char_112_siege.title: Talk 3
char_112_siege.text: I had a dream... a dream where the sun rises, and in the distance beyond the horizon... there was my hometown. The place I might never get to return to, ever again.

char_112_siege.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_112_siege.text: Before I knew it, I'd gotten accustomed to this drifter's life... It's a strange thing. In the past I never imagined this was how I'd end up.

char_112_siege.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_112_siege.text: Gawain and company? I wouldn't say they ran into me, more like they picked me up off the streets.

char_112_siege.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_112_siege.text: I used to stand side by side with Indra's team when we fought in the streets of Victoria... Looking back, I suppose it's a fairly fond memory to me.

char_112_siege.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_112_siege.text: Stay on your guard! I know you've done the best you can, but there may be unknown dangers beyond our abilities.

char_112_siege.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_112_siege.text: If we're ever put in a tough situation... then I may well act on my own motives. And if it comes to that, Doctor, I hope you'll join me too in... no, never mind for now.

char_112_siege.title: Idle
char_112_siege.text: Hm? You fell asleep?... I wonder if you ever dream of your hometown, too.

char_112_siege.title: Onboard
char_112_siege.text: I've passed the strength test, right? So assign me some missions. Don't let this hammer get too bored. My codename? They call me the Siege. Curious name, but it's got a nice ring to it.

char_112_siege.title: Watching Battle Record
char_112_siege.text: Feels pretty good.

char_112_siege.title: Promotion 1
char_112_siege.text: A promotion? Interesting...

char_112_siege.title: Promotion 2
char_112_siege.text: Another promotion? All right, thanks... Life is strange like that, you know? Once upon a time, I was the one assigning new ranks to people.

char_112_siege.title: Added to Squad
char_112_siege.text: Tell me, is this battle inevitable?

char_112_siege.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_112_siege.text: You'd better get used to my combat style.

char_112_siege.title: Depart
char_112_siege.text: For want of a nail... the kingdom was lost.

char_112_siege.title: Begin Operation
char_112_siege.text: Run while you can. Better to be a coward with a pulse than a martyr with a grave.

char_112_siege.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_112_siege.text: Yes?

char_112_siege.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_112_siege.text: Are you ready?

char_112_siege.title: Deployment 1
char_112_siege.text: What a pain.

char_112_siege.title: Deployment 2
char_112_siege.text: We'll take them out all at once.

char_112_siege.title: In Battle 1
char_112_siege.text: My weapon chooses its worthy wielder.

char_112_siege.title: In Battle 2
char_112_siege.text: Get lost!

char_112_siege.title: In Battle 3
char_112_siege.text: A warrior must be ready to face death on the battlefield!

char_112_siege.title: In Battle 4
char_112_siege.text: My rule is the balance your lives hang in.

char_112_siege.title: 4-star Result
char_112_siege.text: Can bluff, can't take one blow.

char_112_siege.title: 3-star Result
char_112_siege.text: Those who refuse to surrender don't deserve mercy.

char_112_siege.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_112_siege.text: Are we done here?

char_112_siege.title: Operation Failure
char_112_siege.text: I'm... more tired than I thought. I apologize...

char_112_siege.title: Assigned to Facility
char_112_siege.text: Do you mind if I get my forty winks in here?

char_112_siege.title: Tap
char_112_siege.text: Tsk...

char_112_siege.title: Trust Tap
char_112_siege.text: It's too noisy out there for my tastes... I think the silence of your office suits me more. Let me stay in here for a bit, will you?

char_112_siege.title: Title
char_112_siege.text: Arknights.

char_112_siege.title: Greeting
char_112_siege.text: Oh, it's you, Doctor.

char_155_tiger.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_155_tiger.text: If you got enemies about, just scream. I'll keep ya safe.

char_155_tiger.title: Talk 1
char_155_tiger.text: Where's that kid gone off to? Y'know, her... the really tanned shorty who's always trailing our Master... 'Morgan' is her nam- Oi! Stop right there!

char_155_tiger.title: Talk 2
char_155_tiger.text: You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours, we keep it real that way, yeah? You treat me with respect, I'll do the same for you.

char_155_tiger.title: Talk 3
char_155_tiger.text: Seems our Majesty's really into your place. Don't see that every day, seeing as we're never anywhere same for long.

char_155_tiger.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_155_tiger.text: Work or what have ya, you've gotta have guts!

char_155_tiger.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_155_tiger.text: Whoa, whoa, chew before you swallow, mate! HEY! SOMEONE BRING US MORE MEAT! This girl's got an empty belly to fill!

char_155_tiger.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_155_tiger.text: Bleeding Morgan... she might seem like a layabout mostly, but she's our tactician when push comes to shove. Gets the job done. Gets on my nerves otherwise, though, and she loves it. Tch...

char_155_tiger.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_155_tiger.text: Doesn't she look brilliant, like a liege with a hammer in hand? I'm even more keen to see the look of her holding a sword, though.

char_155_tiger.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_155_tiger.text: Out with it! Don't beat around the bush, just say it: who do you want dealt with?

char_155_tiger.title: Idle
char_155_tiger.text: Tch. look at you spacing out like an idiot... Your own bloody fault if a tiger bites you.

char_155_tiger.title: Onboard
char_155_tiger.text: I'm Indra. I don't have any of those weird crazy powers -- I let my fists do the talking. Nice to meet ya!

char_155_tiger.title: Watching Battle Record
char_155_tiger.text: Niiice, this is good stuff.

char_155_tiger.title: Promotion 1
char_155_tiger.text: Promotions are great, almost as great as fighting is!

char_155_tiger.title: Promotion 2
char_155_tiger.text: Don't be afraid. I'll protect ya.

char_155_tiger.title: Added to Squad
char_155_tiger.text: Where's the battlefield?

char_155_tiger.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_155_tiger.text: So, who's in the market for a walloping?

char_155_tiger.title: Depart
char_155_tiger.text: Mind your own sodding business and let me be!

char_155_tiger.title: Begin Operation
char_155_tiger.text: Come on! Show me what you've got!

char_155_tiger.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_155_tiger.text: Oi!

char_155_tiger.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_155_tiger.text: Get on with it, plod!

char_155_tiger.title: Deployment 1
char_155_tiger.text: Haha!

char_155_tiger.title: Deployment 2
char_155_tiger.text: All right, it's my turn!

char_155_tiger.title: In Battle 1
char_155_tiger.text: You bastard!

char_155_tiger.title: In Battle 2
char_155_tiger.text: Nothing can stop me!

char_155_tiger.title: In Battle 3
char_155_tiger.text: You're dead meat!

char_155_tiger.title: In Battle 4
char_155_tiger.text: Give it up!

char_155_tiger.title: 4-star Result
char_155_tiger.text: That's the stuff! That's what I call a kick!

char_155_tiger.title: 3-star Result
char_155_tiger.text: You don't go home happy without some bloodshed!

char_155_tiger.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_155_tiger.text: Tch, we've got some who fled. Bunch of cowards.

char_155_tiger.title: Operation Failure
char_155_tiger.text: Not bad... But I'll get you back for this!

char_155_tiger.title: Assigned to Facility
char_155_tiger.text: What's this room about? More of a squeeze than anywhere I've been.

char_155_tiger.title: Tap
char_155_tiger.text: Oi! You got a bleedin' death wish?

char_155_tiger.title: Trust Tap
char_155_tiger.text: C'mere, lemme get my arms around you! Yes, I mean hug you!

char_155_tiger.title: Title
char_155_tiger.text: Arknights.

char_155_tiger.title: Greeting
char_155_tiger.text: What's up, Doctor!

char_101_sora.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_101_sora.text: Heya, Doctor! So, what are you up to? Looks like fun!

char_101_sora.title: Talk 1
char_101_sora.text: Are there any karaoke venues at Rhodes Island? It would be great if we had a place to sing the night away when we don't have battles to fight!

char_101_sora.title: Talk 2
char_101_sora.text: My duty as an idol was to make my fans happy with my songs and performances. But I'm an Operator now... what should my duty be, then?

char_101_sora.title: Talk 3
char_101_sora.text: Doctor, anything I can help with? Don't you underestimate me—I'm considered quite physically capable at Penguin Logistics!

char_101_sora.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_101_sora.text: Yup, my special skill is singing! Let's see, I can do a cappella, lead vocals, choir singing, pop music, and I can even rap, yo! Though I guess that's not a very useful skill for an Operator... If only I had a more practical skill...

char_101_sora.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_101_sora.text: Ears...? Uh, I can't tell you... even if you ask Texas, she's not gonna tell you! I'll explain if I get the chance someday...

char_101_sora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_101_sora.text: You know, Texas actually saved my life and taught me so much I never knew. Which is why... I want to stay by her side whenever I have the chance... I'm uhh, trying to show my gratitude for her, that's all!

char_101_sora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_101_sora.text: You think I look upset? Um... it's because... Exusiai went on a mission with Texas today, right? If only I were as skilled as Exusiai, I could...

char_101_sora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_101_sora.text: Doctor! Could you teach me to use weapons? My songs have no practical use except for support and encouragement. If I could fight with weapons... Huh? You're not good at fighting either?!

char_101_sora.title: Idle
char_101_sora.text: ...Texas, are you listening to my songs?

char_101_sora.title: Onboard
char_101_sora.text: Hiiii! I'm the loveable idol from Monster Siren Records: Sora! Oops, sorry, introducing myself like this at Rhodes Island must be kinda weird. Hmm...

char_101_sora.title: Watching Battle Record
char_101_sora.text: Levely uppity!

char_101_sora.title: Promotion 1
char_101_sora.text: A promotion? You mean like debuting as a trainee idol?

char_101_sora.title: Promotion 2
char_101_sora.text: I feel as excited as I did during my first live performance! I'm just so happy that you trust me this much, Doctor! It's like all my hard work has paid off! ...Huh? My ears? What about them?

char_101_sora.title: Added to Squad
char_101_sora.text: As a member of the squad, I'll start by learning the very basics.

char_101_sora.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_101_sora.text: The leader? You mean like being the lead singer?

char_101_sora.title: Depart
char_101_sora.text: Singing on the battlefield... now that's something new!

char_101_sora.title: Begin Operation
char_101_sora.text: If only my songs could put an end to all this fighting...

char_101_sora.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_101_sora.text: Is it my turn?

char_101_sora.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_101_sora.text: I can handle this!

char_101_sora.title: Deployment 1
char_101_sora.text: The concert's starting!

char_101_sora.title: Deployment 2
char_101_sora.text: All right, let's make some noise!

char_101_sora.title: In Battle 1
char_101_sora.text: Come on, we can do it!

char_101_sora.title: In Battle 2
char_101_sora.text: I'm cheering for you!

char_101_sora.title: In Battle 3
char_101_sora.text: Counterattack!

char_101_sora.title: In Battle 4
char_101_sora.text: Keep it up!

char_101_sora.title: 4-star Result
char_101_sora.text: I heard your cheering loud and clear, everyone! Thank you!

char_101_sora.title: 3-star Result
char_101_sora.text: Awesome! A smashing victory! Texas, were you watching me?

char_101_sora.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_101_sora.text: Good job, everyone!

char_101_sora.title: Operation Failure
char_101_sora.text: I'm sorry... my performance wasn't good enough...

char_101_sora.title: Assigned to Facility
char_101_sora.text: This place is much bigger than the dorms at Penguin Logistics!

char_101_sora.title: Tap
char_101_sora.text: Sparkle spark!

char_101_sora.title: Trust Tap
char_101_sora.text: Ehehe, thanks, Doctor!

char_101_sora.title: Title
char_101_sora.text: Arknights.

char_101_sora.title: Greeting
char_101_sora.text: I hope you have a fantastic day, Doctor!

char_103_angel.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_103_angel.text: Leader! Give us something to do~

char_103_angel.title: Talk 1
char_103_angel.text: Leader! Let's throw a party! We can play some hip-hop and eat apple pie! The best life is the party life! No party, no life!

char_103_angel.title: Talk 2
char_103_angel.text: Locked and loaded, ready for action! What's the objective today, Leader?

char_103_angel.title: Talk 3
char_103_angel.text: Some people believe that money can buy everything. But that saying doesn't apply to me! If I want someone to rest in pieces, no amount of money can save them~

char_103_angel.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_103_angel.text: My first wish: for eight new guns! We angels all have a special gun we grow up with, but owning just one gun is so lame, right?

char_103_angel.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_103_angel.text: My second wish... find someone to help me turn off this light over my head!

char_103_angel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_103_angel.text: The only reason Texas lives so carefree and swagged out is that she's got me watching over her. That's the obvious truth, right?

char_103_angel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_103_angel.text: If you ever run into an angel with black horns oozing ominous vibes, please tell her for me: I've never forgotten her.

char_103_angel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_103_angel.text: Us Penguin Logistics girls ain't so bad, right? Wanna come be our boss? Ehehe, just kidding.

char_103_angel.title: Idle
char_103_angel.text: ...Lord, is this someone we gotta save too?

char_103_angel.title: Onboard
char_103_angel.text: Our slogan is 'Long live the Penguin Empire.' Are you our client? You can call me Exusiai. I'm nothing like that Lupo ice queen. I'm always down for some fun!

char_103_angel.title: Watching Battle Record
char_103_angel.text: I'm lovin' this feeling!

char_103_angel.title: Promotion 1
char_103_angel.text: Thanks for promoting me!

char_103_angel.title: Promotion 2
char_103_angel.text: Leader... No, savior, I pledge to this gun in my hand to protect you until the very end of this world.

char_103_angel.title: Added to Squad
char_103_angel.text: Squad combat? I'm very familiar with that.

char_103_angel.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_103_angel.text: No one makes a better leader than me! You've got a good eye.

char_103_angel.title: Depart
char_103_angel.text: Let's go! Take them all by storm!

char_103_angel.title: Begin Operation
char_103_angel.text: I already called dibs on the most lucrative real estate in Hell, and you guys all get a share. Rest easy!

char_103_angel.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_103_angel.text: All right!

char_103_angel.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_103_angel.text: Is it my turn?

char_103_angel.title: Deployment 1
char_103_angel.text: Follow me!

char_103_angel.title: Deployment 2
char_103_angel.text: Let me create a diversion.

char_103_angel.title: In Battle 1
char_103_angel.text: Heaven's will!

char_103_angel.title: In Battle 2
