char_103_angel.text: Rock n' roll!

char_103_angel.title: In Battle 3
char_103_angel.text: Barrage!

char_103_angel.title: In Battle 4
char_103_angel.text: Apple pie!

char_103_angel.title: 4-star Result
char_103_angel.text: Wonderful! This is the chance of a lifetime. Charge on!

char_103_angel.title: 3-star Result
char_103_angel.text: May my hail of bullets bring you eternal peace.

char_103_angel.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_103_angel.text: The sound of victory is the sweetest melody. Alright, let's grab some drinks to celebrate when we get back!

char_103_angel.title: Operation Failure
char_103_angel.text: Even a well-crafted gun will jam sometimes. Life is no different, so don't worry about it~

char_103_angel.title: Assigned to Facility
char_103_angel.text: I like this place!

char_103_angel.title: Tap
char_103_angel.text: Oh!

char_103_angel.title: Trust Tap
char_103_angel.text: Leader, wanna try out my weapon?

char_103_angel.title: Title
char_103_angel.text: Arknights.

char_103_angel.title: Greeting
char_103_angel.text: Hey, Leader!

char_201_moeshd.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_201_moeshd.text: This here Croissant guarantees yer safety, no matter where yer headin', Baws! Oh, 'n payment's upfront! 'Member that!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk 1
char_201_moeshd.text: Make a buncha money workin' yer butt off! We can't be livin' in no poverty, after all!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Yer kiddin'! All yer people got such shiny gear on 'em! Lemme have a touch too!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk 3
char_201_moeshd.text: Boy, I sure love orderin' new gear! Feels like I bought enough stuff to fill the whole depot! This what they call a 'shoppin' addiction'?

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_201_moeshd.text: Every month there's more 'n more bills to pay... 'n that's why I sell some stuff I find on the side! Everythin' I got is cheap 'n high quality!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Move this, lift that. If we gotta be haulin' things, might as well pick some easy-to-use and yummy-yummy stuff!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_201_moeshd.text: Baws, Baws! Found this here heckin' tasty thing lyin' around, ya want a bite? Ya ask me, the only thing second to gud gear is gud food!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Baws, c'mere a sec, wouldja? Take a gander at my wares! From fancy clothes 'n everyday items to office supplies and gear, ya name it, I got it! Buy in bulk 'n I'll give ya a discount!

char_201_moeshd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_201_moeshd.text: Baws, I gotta thank ya! With all them referrals, I can buy everything I ever wanted! Yer the best, Baws! Love ya lots!

char_201_moeshd.title: Idle
char_201_moeshd.text: Aw shucks, gotta tighten my belt again this month...

char_201_moeshd.title: Onboard
char_201_moeshd.text: The name's Croissant, and by golly yer in luck, Baws! Won't find nobody as good at their trade as I am! I'm strong, don't break easy, 'n if ya hire me right now, I'll give ya a 20% discount!

char_201_moeshd.title: Watching Battle Record
char_201_moeshd.text: I reckon I'll get more work if I get stronger!

char_201_moeshd.title: Promotion 1
char_201_moeshd.text: Thank ya kindly, Baws, fer helpin' me find such a nice job.

char_201_moeshd.title: Promotion 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Baws, Baws, I made good use of that there bonus ya gave me! Check it out, I don't got myself some new gear. All the better to keep ya safe!

char_201_moeshd.title: Added to Squad
char_201_moeshd.text: Leave the defense to me!

char_201_moeshd.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_201_moeshd.text: Listen up, y'all! Let's do this here mission nice and cleanlike!

char_201_moeshd.title: Depart
char_201_moeshd.text: We'll be back with the best results ya ever did see!

char_201_moeshd.title: Begin Operation
char_201_moeshd.text: Well lookee here. The bad guys're comin' to donate their gear!

char_201_moeshd.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_201_moeshd.text: What can I do ya for?

char_201_moeshd.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Time to try this here new gear!

char_201_moeshd.title: Deployment 1
char_201_moeshd.text: H'all righty!

char_201_moeshd.title: Deployment 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Here we are!

char_201_moeshd.title: In Battle 1
char_201_moeshd.text: End of the road!

char_201_moeshd.title: In Battle 2
char_201_moeshd.text: Ya ain't gettin' through me!

char_201_moeshd.title: In Battle 3
char_201_moeshd.text: THUNDERCLAP!

char_201_moeshd.title: In Battle 4
char_201_moeshd.text: That ain't gon' work on me!

char_201_moeshd.title: 4-star Result
char_201_moeshd.text: Ya reckon the enemy dropped a treasure chest or somesuch?

char_201_moeshd.title: 3-star Result
char_201_moeshd.text: Yeehaw! Mission accomplished!

char_201_moeshd.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_201_moeshd.text: Dagnabbit... the enemy got away! That ain't good for my rep…

char_201_moeshd.title: Operation Failure
char_201_moeshd.text: Aw, shucks… First I lost the fight, and now my wallet…

char_201_moeshd.title: Assigned to Facility
char_201_moeshd.text: Ya got any treasure chests hidin' 'round here?

char_201_moeshd.title: Tap
char_201_moeshd.text: Hmm?

char_201_moeshd.title: Trust Tap
char_201_moeshd.text: Baws, Baws, got any nifty stuff on hand? C'mon, I wanna see!

char_201_moeshd.title: Title
char_201_moeshd.text: Arknights.

char_201_moeshd.title: Greeting
char_201_moeshd.text: Howdy, Baws!

char_118_yuki.title: Talk 1
char_118_yuki.text: Princess Fumizuki is my master, and you're my employer.

char_118_yuki.title: Talk 2
char_118_yuki.text: My hobby? Standing on the coast, watching the snow fall.

char_118_yuki.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_118_yuki.text: My weapon? A shuriken, the Silver Wind, made by Eastern Heavy Industries.

char_118_yuki.title: Onboard
char_118_yuki.text: I am Shirayuki. Princess Fumizuki told me to assist Miss Ch'en and follow all your orders.

char_118_yuki.title: Promotion 1
char_118_yuki.text: A promotion? I, Shirayuki, am honored.

char_118_yuki.title: Promotion 2
char_118_yuki.text: I, Shirayuki, may devote greater strength to you.

char_118_yuki.title: Begin Operation
char_118_yuki.text: A snowstorm will bury this battlefield.

char_118_yuki.title: 4-star Result
char_118_yuki.text: The enemy dies, I advance. I advance, the enemy dies.

char_118_yuki.title: 3-star Result
char_118_yuki.text: The enemy has fallen. Total victory.

char_118_yuki.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_118_yuki.text: Of their ranks, some flee. Wariness, a must.

char_118_yuki.title: Operation Failure
char_118_yuki.text: Should we fight again, we will return the favor one hundredfold.

char_118_yuki.title: Trust Tap
char_118_yuki.text: Your consideration, I, Shirayuki, will engrave upon my heart.

char_136_hsguma.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_136_hsguma.text: Relax, Doctor. I'll keep you safe.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk 1
char_136_hsguma.text: Lots of new recruits lately, many new faces. Don't let your guard down.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk 2
char_136_hsguma.text: If something happens, don't forget to use the emergency communication channel. Just call me and I'll come running.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk 3
char_136_hsguma.text: I sound cold when I talk? I'm on the clock. I'm a lot less serious when I'm off.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_136_hsguma.text: Rhodes Island needs more than just combat Operators. You need experts in education, PR, and all kinds of stuff.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_136_hsguma.text: I used to only get called in for the nastiest fights, but now every fight is a nasty one.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_136_hsguma.text: This shield has a name: Hannya. I brought it from my hometown. Its 'father' and mine were old friends. Back in the L.G.D., my superiors would always tease me about it, but together we've proven that a shield makes a great weapon, and so do I.

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_136_hsguma.text: Hannya's tasted plenty of Lungmen gangster blood. I never thought it'd win me many friends, but the ones who looked down on me started showing me some respect after all that had happened. Or maybe they're just scared of how big I am? What do you think?

char_136_hsguma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_136_hsguma.text: How about another shot...? Oh, you've had enough? Don't sweat it... I can carry you back to your room if you pass out. What? That worries you even more? C'mon, don't be a buzzkill.

char_136_hsguma.title: Idle
char_136_hsguma.text: Hm? Heh. Nothing. Just guarding you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma.title: Onboard
char_136_hsguma.text: Hoshiguma, Defender Operator. I'll be your shield, your blade, your fortress. Very glad to meet you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma.title: Watching Battle Record
char_136_hsguma.text: It's all thanks to your teaching, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma.title: Promotion 1
char_136_hsguma.text: I'm honored.

char_136_hsguma.title: Promotion 2
char_136_hsguma.text: No one tells me where I'm going, and no one can stop me once I make up my mind. And now—I've made up my mind to follow you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma.title: Added to Squad
char_136_hsguma.text: I will protect everyone.

char_136_hsguma.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_136_hsguma.text: Protecting Rhodes Island is my responsibility too.

char_136_hsguma.title: Depart
char_136_hsguma.text: I want everyone to get home safe.

char_136_hsguma.title: Begin Operation
char_136_hsguma.text: If you've got a reason to fight, you've got a reason to die!

char_136_hsguma.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_136_hsguma.text: Yes, Sir.

char_136_hsguma.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_136_hsguma.text: Got it.

char_136_hsguma.title: Deployment 1
char_136_hsguma.text: Not one step backwards.

char_136_hsguma.title: Deployment 2
char_136_hsguma.text: Not one step forwards.

char_136_hsguma.title: In Battle 1
char_136_hsguma.text: Hannya will crush you.

char_136_hsguma.title: In Battle 2
char_136_hsguma.text: If you want to hurt my friends, you have to go through my shield first.

char_136_hsguma.title: In Battle 3
char_136_hsguma.text: Seeing is believing.

char_136_hsguma.title: In Battle 4
char_136_hsguma.text: Hannya, unleash the rage your father poured into you!

char_136_hsguma.title: 4-star Result
char_136_hsguma.text: The harder the journey, the stronger you'll become.

char_136_hsguma.title: 3-star Result
char_136_hsguma.text: Hurting my friends right in front of me? I'll make you pay!

char_136_hsguma.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_136_hsguma.text: Are you hurt? I'm sorry. I failed.

char_136_hsguma.title: Operation Failure
char_136_hsguma.text: Fall back, now! I'll bring up the rear!

char_136_hsguma.title: Assigned to Facility
char_136_hsguma.text: With my size... it's kind of hard to get through the door.

char_136_hsguma.title: Tap
char_136_hsguma.text: Here.

char_136_hsguma.title: Trust Tap
char_136_hsguma.text: Doctor, you should take a load off now that we finally got a break.

char_136_hsguma.title: Title
char_136_hsguma.text: Arknights.

char_136_hsguma.title: Greeting
char_136_hsguma.text: Hey, Doctor.

char_106_franka.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_106_franka.text: We're changing shifts right now, Doctor. Just ignore me and get on with your work.

char_106_franka.title: Talk 1
char_106_franka.text: Back in BSW, I was appointed as a BPRS... you know, Biochemical Protection Response Staff. You can probably imagine what it was like... bulky hazmat suit and all that...

char_106_franka.title: Talk 2
char_106_franka.text: Hmm? You think I'm a clean freak? Well, Doctor, I see you're unexpectedly direct! I admire your courage.

char_106_franka.title: Talk 3
char_106_franka.text: Some of the Operators' rooms are in dire need of cleaning. For example, the one belonging to that high-and-mighty teacher's pet. What do you think?

char_106_franka.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_106_franka.text: You want to see the intricate pattern on my sword up close? Sure, hold it tight, then. Don't let go—it'll heat up to 2,500 degrees Celcius in 3 seconds! Haha, just kidding! Don't be scared!

char_106_franka.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_106_franka.text: Stay clear of that room full of chemical haze, toxins and harmful radiation... that's right, I mean Dr. Kal'tsit's lab.

char_106_franka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_106_franka.text: You're asking me for advice regarding the prevention of biochemical contamination? Well, for example... always brush your teeth after eating?

char_106_franka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_106_franka.text: Liskarm's been looking so flashy since she got her promotion. 'Hey! Hot girl here! Get your gunsight on me!' I bet that's how she greets the enemies.

char_106_franka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_106_franka.text: Good golly, if this is how free life is at Rhodes Island then I might just quit my job at BSW. Liskarm would be upset, though.

char_106_franka.title: Idle
char_106_franka.text: There's a mosquito on your arm, Doctor.

char_106_franka.title: Onboard
char_106_franka.text: I'm chemical specialist operator, Franka, here to do my bit to help minimize the pollution wrought by Originium.

char_106_franka.title: Watching Battle Record
char_106_franka.text: I could perform these techniques anywhere, anytime!

char_106_franka.title: Promotion 1
char_106_franka.text: Wooow, you're giving me a promotion? I'm having a lot more fun here than at BSW.

char_106_franka.title: Promotion 2
char_106_franka.text: *Giggle*, you want to see my sword at its most glorious? Too bad, Doctor—you're not qualified yet! If you work at it, maybe one day you'll gain the privilege!

char_106_franka.title: Added to Squad
char_106_franka.text: All right, I'm ready.

char_106_franka.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_106_franka.text: The best thing about training capable subordinates, is that I get to let them handle all the annoying stuff for me.

char_106_franka.title: Depart
char_106_franka.text: Well, let's go, then.

char_106_franka.title: Begin Operation
char_106_franka.text: Too bad... these people have already been contaminated. In that case...

char_106_franka.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_106_franka.text: Gotta hurry!

char_106_franka.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_106_franka.text: No time to hesitate.

char_106_franka.title: Deployment 1
char_106_franka.text: Offense isn't what I trained for, but hey...

char_106_franka.title: Deployment 2
char_106_franka.text: Heavy defenders are SO scary... Hehe, just kidding.

char_106_franka.title: In Battle 1
char_106_franka.text: Weak spot, Sighted!

char_106_franka.title: In Battle 2
char_106_franka.text: Let's burn it up!

char_106_franka.title: In Battle 3
char_106_franka.text: Hold your breath now.

char_106_franka.title: In Battle 4
char_106_franka.text: Tricked you!

char_106_franka.title: 4-star Result
char_106_franka.text: Obsession with power is a fool's game.

char_106_franka.title: 3-star Result
char_106_franka.text: That was perfect from start to finish. Well done.

char_106_franka.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_106_franka.text: Just as expected.

char_106_franka.title: Operation Failure
char_106_franka.text: What, you still have time for that upset face? Fall back now.

char_106_franka.title: Assigned to Facility
char_106_franka.text: Say, do you have black tea here?

char_106_franka.title: Tap
char_106_franka.text: Need something?

char_106_franka.title: Trust Tap
char_106_franka.text: Want to hear about my time at BSW?

char_106_franka.title: Title
char_106_franka.text: Arknights.

char_106_franka.title: Greeting
char_106_franka.text: Gooood morning, Doctor!

char_107_liskam.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_107_liskam.text: Doctor, I'm on shift today.

char_107_liskam.title: Talk 1
char_107_liskam.text: Take all missions seriously: that's the guiding rule for us security professionals.

char_107_liskam.title: Talk 2
char_107_liskam.text: I'm actually not that good at dealing with people like Franka. I'm not even sure how we became partners in the first place...

char_107_liskam.title: Talk 3
char_107_liskam.text: There's a strict selection process before you qualify for BSW. I'm short, have no outstanding Arts talents, and I'm not from any particularly prestigious bloodline. No one believed that I would make it... not even myself, once upon a time.

char_107_liskam.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_107_liskam.text: BSW is a top security contractor and a great fit for me, I think. But I do enjoy a little more freedom here when dispatched to Rhodes Island.

char_107_liskam.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_107_liskam.text: Isn't it amazing how far I've come? I feel like a real dragon... uh, ahem, forget I said that... Anyway, I'm okay with whatever as long as it helps our side in battle!

char_107_liskam.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_107_liskam.text: Thank you, Doctor, for trusting me this much.

char_107_liskam.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_107_liskam.text: People who know me always say I'm more easygoing than I seem. Do you think so too, Doctor?

char_107_liskam.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_107_liskam.text: Franka is telling you about our time at Blacksteel again?  Ahhh, for the love of... Just don't believe anything she says, okay?

char_107_liskam.title: Idle
char_107_liskam.text: Doctor, we're still at work...

char_107_liskam.title: Onboard
char_107_liskam.text: Defender Liskarm, awaiting orders. I've been involved in multiple special operations like VIP protection, assaulting fortified positions, rescuing hostages, and clearing out threats.Your safety is my mission, and I will use every tool at my disposal to guarantee it.

char_107_liskam.title: Watching Battle Record
char_107_liskam.text: Upgrade complete.

char_107_liskam.title: Promotion 1
char_107_liskam.text: Thank you for appointing me to this position, Doctor.

char_107_liskam.title: Promotion 2
char_107_liskam.text: Thank you, Doctor! I will devote myself to defending Rhodes Island, as your trusted Operator.

char_107_liskam.title: Added to Squad
char_107_liskam.text: I'm ready.

char_107_liskam.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_107_liskam.text: Understood. I will ask my team to rigorously adhere to the guidelines and procedures of Rhodes Island.

char_107_liskam.title: Depart
char_107_liskam.text: Permission to attack granted.

char_107_liskam.title: Begin Operation
char_107_liskam.text: Waiting for further instructions.

char_107_liskam.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_107_liskam.text: In position.

char_107_liskam.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_107_liskam.text: Liskarm, ready.

char_107_liskam.title: Deployment 1
char_107_liskam.text: I have a visual.

char_107_liskam.title: Deployment 2
char_107_liskam.text: On standby.

char_107_liskam.title: In Battle 1
char_107_liskam.text: Thunder roar!

char_107_liskam.title: In Battle 2
char_107_liskam.text: Thunderstorm!

char_107_liskam.title: In Battle 3
char_107_liskam.text: One bullet each.

char_107_liskam.title: In Battle 4
char_107_liskam.text: Charging!

char_107_liskam.title: 4-star Result
char_107_liskam.text: This is nothing. Franka and I have been through much worse.

char_107_liskam.title: 3-star Result
char_107_liskam.text: Clear. All targets down.

char_107_liskam.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_107_liskam.text: All green. This area has been secured.

char_107_liskam.title: Operation Failure
char_107_liskam.text: Emergency squad, retreat with the injured Operators! Everyone who can still fight, follow me and hold back the enemy!

char_107_liskam.title: Assigned to Facility
char_107_liskam.text: Is this room protected against electrical discharge?

char_107_liskam.title: Tap
char_107_liskam.text: Watch out you don't get shocked.

char_107_liskam.title: Trust Tap
char_107_liskam.text: Doctor, is Franka still being treated? By the way, you need to rest after work.

char_107_liskam.title: Title
char_107_liskam.text: Arknights.

char_107_liskam.title: Greeting
char_107_liskam.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_117_myrrh.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_117_myrrh.text: Pardon, but that report you submitted to Dr. Kal'tsit... we could barely read the last few lines as they are nearly indecipherable... Please don't stay up late so much...

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk 1
char_117_myrrh.text: So many things in here I've never seen before... Oh, sorry, I shouldn't be looking around... sorry...

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk 2
char_117_myrrh.text: I know herbs are rather bitter, but people could pay more attention to how effective they are…

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk 3
char_117_myrrh.text: Um, Doctor... is Harmonia still not getting any better? ... I see... I'll attend to her as soon as I finish work.

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_117_myrrh.text: I know my herbs aren't popular because they're bitter... Aww...but I don't know how to make them taste better... Oh, you mean I should ask around for tips? Bu-bu-but... I'm not that good at small talk... I guess I'll try my best…

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_117_myrrh.text: Harmonia and I would explore all sorts of places together when we were kids. Yeah, we grew up in the city ruins, and were really hoping to see the world outside back then...

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_117_myrrh.text: Harmonia is both my oldest and best friend... But I'm the one to blame for her Oripathy infection, and what she is right now... I will find the cure and make up for the life Oripathy has taken away from her. I promise.

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_117_myrrh.text: Ms. Perfumer suggested that I add some spices into my herbs and now they taste much better! I'm so glad I managed to summon the courage to ask everybody for their advices...

char_117_myrrh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_117_myrrh.text: Harmonia says I'm in higher spirits these days. Do you agree as well, Doctor? It's all thanks to your timely advice. I wouldn't know what to do without you…

char_117_myrrh.title: Idle
char_117_myrrh.text: Doctor... oh, are you asleep? Yay! Now I can look around the office to my heart's content.

char_117_myrrh.title: Onboard
char_117_myrrh.text: Hello, I'm Myrrh, an herbalist. Dr. Kal'tsit gave me this title... she said myrrh symbolizes the ephemerality of life and wanted me to keep this in mind.

char_117_myrrh.title: Watching Battle Record
char_117_myrrh.text: Thank you so much! This way I'll be able to concoct even better medicine.

char_117_myrrh.title: Promotion 1
char_117_myrrh.text: This is called a... promotion? Is that it...? Um, I don't really know much about stuff like that…

char_117_myrrh.title: Promotion 2
char_117_myrrh.text: This reminds me of childhood with Harmonia, when we explored secret places and abandoned buildings. The more dangerous the place was, the rarer the ingredients we could find.

char_117_myrrh.title: Added to Squad
char_117_myrrh.text: Uh... I'll try my best not to drag everyone down...

char_117_myrrh.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_117_myrrh.text: I'll start by doing my best to make eye contact...

char_117_myrrh.title: Depart
char_117_myrrh.text: Ah, Doctor, I'm ready to go.

char_117_myrrh.title: Begin Operation
char_117_myrrh.text: I'll do my best to make sure no one gets hurt...!

char_117_myrrh.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_117_myrrh.text: I'm with you.

char_117_myrrh.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_117_myrrh.text: I'm coming.

char_117_myrrh.title: Deployment 1
char_117_myrrh.text: I need to be careful.

char_117_myrrh.title: Deployment 2
char_117_myrrh.text: Does anyone need healing?

char_117_myrrh.title: In Battle 1
char_117_myrrh.text: Gotta aim more carefully.

char_117_myrrh.title: In Battle 2
char_117_myrrh.text: Here's the medicine!

char_117_myrrh.title: In Battle 3
char_117_myrrh.text: Medicine here. Please, take it!

char_117_myrrh.title: In Battle 4
char_117_myrrh.text: It's okay, it's curable!

char_117_myrrh.title: 4-star Result
char_117_myrrh.text: We won? Really? Even against those really tough opponents? Wow... you're so cool, Doctor!

char_117_myrrh.title: 3-star Result
char_117_myrrh.text: How's the medicine this time, everyone? ...Um, I guess I'll ask when we get back...

char_117_myrrh.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_117_myrrh.text: So much to do in so little time... Thank goodness I didn't mess up too badly…

char_117_myrrh.title: Operation Failure
char_117_myrrh.text: My vials... All shattered...

char_117_myrrh.title: Assigned to Facility
char_117_myrrh.text: Uh... I can still smell herbs on my clothes...

char_117_myrrh.title: Tap
char_117_myrrh.text: Wahh!

char_117_myrrh.title: Trust Tap
char_117_myrrh.text: Excuse me, Doctor. I made you some herb soup good for soothing the body and calming the mind. It's just... a bit bitter…

char_117_myrrh.title: Title
char_117_myrrh.text: Arknights.

char_117_myrrh.title: Greeting
char_117_myrrh.text: Oh! Good morning, Doctor

char_193_frostl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_193_frostl.text: Want to listen to some music? I'll lend you my headphones.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk 1
char_193_frostl.text: Sorry, please keep a little distance from me.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk 2
char_193_frostl.text: I never imagined that I'd have the chance to become a rescue worker.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk 3
char_193_frostl.text: I picked up this axe a long time ago, maybe even before I learned to read.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_193_frostl.text: The songs I like are probably not so popular. They're only good for humming to myself when I'm alone.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_193_frostl.text: Don't blink—you have but one moment to witness this epic move.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_193_frostl.text: Want something to drink? My treat. You should relax a bit after work, you know.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_193_frostl.text: I only realized how precious life is after everyone around me died, one by one. Ironic, huh? I think so, too.

char_193_frostl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_193_frostl.text: I'm a mercenary. I just do my job. As for the purpose of my mission and its consequences, I don't have a say in any of that. So, from now on, all my responsibilities are your concern.

char_193_frostl.title: Idle
char_193_frostl.text: Dun... dun dun♪dun... dun dun...♪

char_193_frostl.title: Onboard
char_193_frostl.text: Frostleaf, former mercenary. From now on, I'm your operator. Assign me any job you want, I can do pretty much anything.

char_193_frostl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_193_frostl.text: Thanks.

char_193_frostl.title: Promotion 1
char_193_frostl.text: Things are on the right track now.

char_193_frostl.title: Promotion 2
char_193_frostl.text: Whew... not bad. Feeling fulfilled for the first time in a while.

char_193_frostl.title: Added to Squad
char_193_frostl.text: I'll do my job.

char_193_frostl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_193_frostl.text: Go your own ways and do your own jobs.

char_193_frostl.title: Depart
char_193_frostl.text: Great, I feel like some exercise.

char_193_frostl.title: Begin Operation
char_193_frostl.text: You will shatter.

char_193_frostl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_193_frostl.text: Hmm?

char_193_frostl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_193_frostl.text: Your orders?

char_193_frostl.title: Deployment 1
char_193_frostl.text: This should work.

char_193_frostl.title: Deployment 2
char_193_frostl.text: Hm, okay.

char_193_frostl.title: In Battle 1
char_193_frostl.text: My bodily fluids aren't the only thing that's chilling.

char_193_frostl.title: In Battle 2
char_193_frostl.text: Extend my edge!

char_193_frostl.title: In Battle 3
char_193_frostl.text: Life, brittle as frost, fragile like leaves.

char_193_frostl.title: In Battle 4
char_193_frostl.text: Let's chill down some hot heads.

char_193_frostl.title: 4-star Result
char_193_frostl.text: I've been through countless battles... seen the carnage, witnessed the silent nothingness at the end.

char_193_frostl.title: 3-star Result
char_193_frostl.text: I remember every enemy I fought. Not a single one escapes.

char_193_frostl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_193_frostl.text: We didn't lose anyone, did we?

char_193_frostl.title: Operation Failure
char_193_frostl.text: I'll hold up the rear.

char_193_frostl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_193_frostl.text: I'd like... a more private space.

char_193_frostl.title: Tap
char_193_frostl.text: Ow.

char_193_frostl.title: Trust Tap
char_193_frostl.text: How about a drink?

char_193_frostl.title: Title
char_193_frostl.text: Arknights.

char_193_frostl.title: Greeting
char_193_frostl.text: Doctor...

char_129_bluep.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_129_bluep.text: Greetings, Doctor. You're glowing today. To see you so well... it's all I could ever hope for.

char_129_bluep.title: Talk 1
char_129_bluep.text: I prepared an antidote to nullify the effects of any common poison. I'd like you to take one dose before every battle. Do you mind?

char_129_bluep.title: Talk 2
char_129_bluep.text: Actually, the toxin in my body is an ingredient in some high-quality medicines. That's why Dr. Kal'tsit needs me in her lab a lot.

char_129_bluep.title: Talk 3
char_129_bluep.text: Hmm, why do you keep staring at me... You mean, it's because my eye color is special? Is that a compliment, Doctor?

char_129_bluep.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_129_bluep.text: I'm the one our enemies fear the most. After all, who wouldn't want to kill me before I can torture them to death with my poison? What really worries me is that my teammates might think the same…

char_129_bluep.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_129_bluep.text: Why am I staring at this cake? Actually... I baked it to share with everyone, but no one wanted it... Would you like to try it, Doctor?

char_129_bluep.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_129_bluep.text: Doctor, you're always wearing the same outfit. How about I choose some new clothes for you? I think I have pretty good taste. Oh... it's a uniform? So you can't change it? Okay…

char_129_bluep.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_129_bluep.text: I'm 'toxic'... so people prefer to stay away from me. But now I have you by my side, Doctor, and I'm really, really happy.

char_129_bluep.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_129_bluep.text: My body isn't that different from everyone else. I may be 'toxic,' but nothing bad will happen if someone touches me. Doctor, if you can prove this to everyone, then maybe they won't always keep away from me. Could you... hold my hand out there?

char_129_bluep.title: Idle
char_129_bluep.text: Doctor? Oh, already asleep. Gotta find a blanket to keep the Doctor warm...

char_129_bluep.title: Onboard
char_129_bluep.text: Nice to meet you, I'm Blue Poison. I'm sure Dr. Kal'tsit must have told you about me. In that case, it'll be up to you to decide how to use my 'toxic' powers.

char_129_bluep.title: Watching Battle Record
char_129_bluep.text: I think I hear the sound of toxic liquid boiling, like music to my ears.

char_129_bluep.title: Promotion 1
char_129_bluep.text: Thank you so much... I'm so glad I get to help out in all these battles. It's like a dream come true.

char_129_bluep.title: Promotion 2
char_129_bluep.text: I used to hold back and hide my 'toxic' self, but now I've accepted what I am, trying to move forward to change my fate. I have you to thank for helping me make this shift, Doctor. You have my sincerest gratitude.

char_129_bluep.title: Added to Squad
char_129_bluep.text: Great. I'm good at supporting assaults.

char_129_bluep.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_129_bluep.text: I'd be much better off supporting the others. Wouldn't want my poison to harm you, Doctor...

char_129_bluep.title: Depart
char_129_bluep.text: Everyone, there's no need for you all to stand so far from me...

char_129_bluep.title: Begin Operation
char_129_bluep.text: I prepared a 'gift' for you. Like it?

char_129_bluep.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_129_bluep.text: Awaiting your orders.

char_129_bluep.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_129_bluep.text: Please don't be scared of me.

char_129_bluep.title: Deployment 1
char_129_bluep.text: Don't worry, my poison is not contagious.

char_129_bluep.title: Deployment 2
char_129_bluep.text: My toxicant is ready.

char_129_bluep.title: In Battle 1
char_129_bluep.text: My toxins will slowly burn your life away...

char_129_bluep.title: In Battle 2
char_129_bluep.text: Are you hallucinating?

char_129_bluep.title: In Battle 3
char_129_bluep.text: Honey to me, poison to you.

char_129_bluep.title: In Battle 4
char_129_bluep.text: Poison kiss.

char_129_bluep.title: 4-star Result
char_129_bluep.text: Use poison to fight the evils and crimes... Isn't that ironic to you?

char_129_bluep.title: 3-star Result
char_129_bluep.text: I've got a poison to melt away all these remains in an instant. Want me to show you?

char_129_bluep.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_129_bluep.text: Good, finished before my clothes got dirty.

char_129_bluep.title: Operation Failure
char_129_bluep.text: How ridiculous. Feels like I killed myself with my own poison...

char_129_bluep.title: Assigned to Facility
char_129_bluep.text: Resting when you're tired helps you focus on your work.

char_129_bluep.title: Tap
char_129_bluep.text: Huh?

char_129_bluep.title: Trust Tap
char_129_bluep.text: D-Did you just touch me? C-Can you do that again? Please?

char_129_bluep.title: Title
char_129_bluep.text: Arknights.

char_129_bluep.title: Greeting
char_129_bluep.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_143_ghost.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_143_ghost.text: Good day. Please allow me a moment of prayer... before I resume my work for the day...

char_143_ghost.title: Talk 1
char_143_ghost.text: O benevolent Herald, hear my prayer: please watch over my dreams and ward my soul…

char_143_ghost.title: Talk 2
char_143_ghost.text: Hehehe… Cutting things... cutting things is such fun... Yes, some things were disconnected from the very beginning, their integrity only a false fiction...

char_143_ghost.title: Talk 3
char_143_ghost.text: Ehehehe... Hahahah... AHHAHAHAHAH!

char_143_ghost.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_143_ghost.text: Ehehe…Why were you dodging my sight? So pointless... because I already know exactly what your heart desires...

char_143_ghost.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_143_ghost.text: I have always, always wanted to bring you to a special place... A place where secrets are imparted...

char_143_ghost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_143_ghost.text: What did you do to me...? Why was I made to drink that strange medicine? Who brought me to this place? PLEASE ANSWER ME!

char_143_ghost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_143_ghost.text: That person's words are the complete and utter truth... Dissecting them, dismembering them, disemboweling them... it all grants them salvation...!

char_143_ghost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_143_ghost.text: You see many things in your dreams that are hard to comprehend?... Those things you see are that soul's despairful tidings... And I, as the messenger, here to convey this exhortation to you... heh…

char_143_ghost.title: Idle
char_143_ghost.text: Hearken... Hear the whispers of vast creation's master, echoing from the deep...

char_143_ghost.title: Onboard
char_143_ghost.text: I am Specter, that is what the spirits call me... That kind doctor informed me that I may receive further treatment by helping Rhodes Island... Yes, of course, my powers are yours to command.

char_143_ghost.title: Watching Battle Record
char_143_ghost.text: Power... is flowing into me...

char_143_ghost.title: Promotion 1
char_143_ghost.text: I have no right to go against your will...

char_143_ghost.title: Promotion 2
char_143_ghost.text: Will this position be a new source of joy for me...? Or... will working for you become my life's joy...?

char_143_ghost.title: Added to Squad
char_143_ghost.text: Good night, my brothers and sisters.

char_143_ghost.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_143_ghost.text: As you wish.

char_143_ghost.title: Depart
char_143_ghost.text: This will be a path paved with sacrifice.

char_143_ghost.title: Begin Operation
char_143_ghost.text: All these lost souls on the battlefield... I offer them to you.

char_143_ghost.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_143_ghost.text: Humbly awaiting your command.

char_143_ghost.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_143_ghost.text: Please let me know the results.

char_143_ghost.title: Deployment 1
char_143_ghost.text: I come from the depth of the ocean…

char_143_ghost.title: Deployment 2
char_143_ghost.text: You are the one who woke me.

char_143_ghost.title: In Battle 1
char_143_ghost.text: Grant joy unto me!

char_143_ghost.title: In Battle 2
char_143_ghost.text: Return to the abyss!

char_143_ghost.title: In Battle 3
char_143_ghost.text: I care not for valueless ones.

char_143_ghost.title: In Battle 4
char_143_ghost.text: There's no escape.

char_143_ghost.title: 4-star Result
char_143_ghost.text: I have conquered all trials you gave me... Were you watching me?

char_143_ghost.title: 3-star Result
char_143_ghost.text: Please guide these lost souls to peaceful enlightenment...!

char_143_ghost.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_143_ghost.text: None of you shall leave this place!

char_143_ghost.title: Operation Failure
char_143_ghost.text: They shall pay for this... They must pay…

char_143_ghost.title: Assigned to Facility
char_143_ghost.text: May I ask you to assign me to a room where I can see the starry sky?

char_143_ghost.title: Tap
char_143_ghost.text: Heheh...

char_143_ghost.title: Trust Tap
char_143_ghost.text: Doctor... What is it inside you… that is driving me to this blissful ecstasy?

char_143_ghost.title: Title
char_143_ghost.text: Arknights.

char_143_ghost.title: Greeting
char_143_ghost.text: You are... Ah, the Doctor, isn't it?

char_181_flower.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_181_flower.text: Listen to me, Doctor, it's for your own good.

char_181_flower.title: Talk 1
char_181_flower.text: How do you like this fragrance? You feel refreshed, right? It's all thanks to Melantha. Her samples inspired me.

char_181_flower.title: Talk 2
char_181_flower.text: Thank you for building me that flower greenhouse. It'll be a good place for our people to rest and ease their minds.

char_181_flower.title: Talk 3
char_181_flower.text: Oh, you're up? Try stretching, see if you got all the tiredness out. Nice. I put a lot into this new fragrance. Glad it works.

char_181_flower.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_181_flower.text: Narcissus, rabbitear iris, kalanchoe, boronia... I always carry all sorts of flower seeds on me.

char_181_flower.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_181_flower.text: Oh, you mean this little one? She's still young, but she's been a big help with my fragrances.

char_181_flower.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_181_flower.text: I've heard that scents are the foundation of ant society. The relationship between perfumers and their clients is the same.

char_181_flower.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_181_flower.text: You seem to visit the greenhouse a lot these days. Oh, there's some pollen on your sleeve. Let me wipe it for you… Alright, you're good.

char_181_flower.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_181_flower.text: You were asleep for quite a while. What did you dream about, I wonder?

char_181_flower.title: Idle
char_181_flower.text: Doctor? Doctor...? Wow, the lavender was much more effective than I expected…

char_181_flower.title: Onboard
char_181_flower.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor. I'm Lena, the perfumer. Interesting job, right? Have you heard the word before?

char_181_flower.title: Watching Battle Record
char_181_flower.text: Please take a look and tell me how I did.

char_181_flower.title: Promotion 1
char_181_flower.text: A promotion...? You came to tell me in person? I'm flattered. Oh, just a moment, Doctor… There we go, your collar was wrinkled, so I smoothed it out for you.

char_181_flower.title: Promotion 2
char_181_flower.text: I don't appreciate violence as a tactic... But I'll do my best to get used to it for Rhodes Island, Doctor.

char_181_flower.title: Added to Squad
char_181_flower.text: With pleasure.

char_181_flower.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_181_flower.text: Whether you need me as a perfumer or a healer, I won't let you down, Doctor.

char_181_flower.title: Depart
char_181_flower.text: Do be careful, everyone.

char_181_flower.title: Begin Operation
char_181_flower.text: What kind of battle will it end up being, I wonder…?

char_181_flower.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_181_flower.text: Yes?

char_181_flower.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_181_flower.text: That's fine with me.

char_181_flower.title: Deployment 1
char_181_flower.text: So this is a battlefield…

char_181_flower.title: Deployment 2
char_181_flower.text: I won't be afraid.

char_181_flower.title: In Battle 1
char_181_flower.text: Let fragrance revive your mind.

char_181_flower.title: In Battle 2
char_181_flower.text: Come on, chin up!

char_181_flower.title: In Battle 3
char_181_flower.text: How do you like this scent?

char_181_flower.title: In Battle 4
char_181_flower.text: Stay calm, my friends.

char_181_flower.title: 4-star Result
char_181_flower.text: I always knew we'd win, Doctor, so long as you're the one in command.

char_181_flower.title: 3-star Result
char_181_flower.text: Very well done, Doctor.

char_181_flower.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_181_flower.text: Good job, everyone. Go get some rest.

char_181_flower.title: Operation Failure
char_181_flower.text: It's too bad we didn't win, but I won't let it discourage me.

char_181_flower.title: Assigned to Facility
char_181_flower.text: I always feel best when I'm at your side, Doctor.

char_181_flower.title: Tap
char_181_flower.text: Oh.

char_181_flower.title: Trust Tap
char_181_flower.text: I sense… a pleasant smell from you, Doctor

char_181_flower.title: Title
char_181_flower.text: Arknights.

char_181_flower.title: Greeting
char_181_flower.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_109_fmout.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_109_fmout.text: Alright, Doctor, your tarot card for today is...

char_109_fmout.title: Talk 1
char_109_fmout.text: Would you like to learn more about your future?

char_109_fmout.title: Talk 2
char_109_fmout.text: Bear it in mind that excessive reliance on unfathomed power will eventually backfire on us.

char_109_fmout.title: Talk 3
char_109_fmout.text: Tarot cards aren't divine, all-seeing tools. Instead, we use them for guidance when we feel lost.

char_109_fmout.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_109_fmout.text: Destiny is like the world we walk upon—no one can escape it.

char_109_fmout.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_109_fmout.text: Humans might never be able to escape this world... but we can change it. Our actions belie endless possibilities.

char_109_fmout.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_109_fmout.text: There are countless topics for which you can consult the tarot, the most common one being your luck in card games. To change it, however, you must be brave enough to change your fate first.

char_109_fmout.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_109_fmout.text: We have a ritual among diviners that's all the rage these days. We call it the 'Hand of Fate.' Would you like to try it?

char_109_fmout.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_109_fmout.text: It's a divination taboo to do readings concerning death. But I don't believe death is the end—it's the beginning of something new.

char_109_fmout.title: Idle
char_109_fmout.text: Dreams can often enlighten you in strange ways. If you have an enlightening dream like that, you'd best remember every detail, Doctor.

char_109_fmout.title: Onboard
char_109_fmout.text: Following the guidance of the arcana, our paths have finally converged. Nice to meet you, Doctor.

char_109_fmout.title: Watching Battle Record
char_109_fmout.text: I feel inspired now.

char_109_fmout.title: Promotion 1
char_109_fmout.text: I'd already foreseen this promotion in my crystal ball. Heheh, just kidding.

char_109_fmout.title: Promotion 2
char_109_fmout.text: You want to know your destiny, Doctor? Too bad, I can't help you. I'm not the one to share it with you, for the fate forbids me to do so.

char_109_fmout.title: Added to Squad
char_109_fmout.text: Wait a minute, let me predict the results of this battle.

char_109_fmout.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_109_fmout.text: Well then, let me pray for everyone.

char_109_fmout.title: Depart
char_109_fmout.text: Fate is a fickle thing... only the victorious will be forever revered.

char_109_fmout.title: Begin Operation
char_109_fmout.text: I can see the outcome. Victory belongs to Rhodes Island.

char_109_fmout.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_109_fmout.text: A very wise choice.

char_109_fmout.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_109_fmout.text: My turn.

char_109_fmout.title: Deployment 1
char_109_fmout.text: Draw a card.

char_109_fmout.title: Deployment 2
char_109_fmout.text: Do not resist your fate.

char_109_fmout.title: In Battle 1
char_109_fmout.text: The tower of void.

char_109_fmout.title: In Battle 2
char_109_fmout.text: The flying chariot.

char_109_fmout.title: In Battle 3
char_109_fmout.text: The Emperor's scepter shall break.

char_109_fmout.title: In Battle 4
char_109_fmout.text: All will fall before the Priestess's might.

char_109_fmout.title: 4-star Result
char_109_fmout.text: Will fate have us in a chokehold… or will we turn the table?

char_109_fmout.title: 3-star Result
char_109_fmout.text: I have moved all of them to the graveyard.

char_109_fmout.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_109_fmout.text: Time to reshuffle the deck.

char_109_fmout.title: Operation Failure
char_109_fmout.text: Impossible... this isn't what I saw in the cards...

char_109_fmout.title: Assigned to Facility
char_109_fmout.text: Bad omens seem to lurk inside this room. May I use my powers to help you manage them?

char_109_fmout.title: Tap
char_109_fmout.text: Hm? What can I do for you?

char_109_fmout.title: Trust Tap
char_109_fmout.text: Want me to do a reading on your future? All right, please give me a minute.

char_109_fmout.title: Title
char_109_fmout.text: Arknights.

char_109_fmout.title: Greeting
char_109_fmout.text: Doctor, you're blessed by the winds of luck.

char_126_shotst.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_126_shotst.text: I sense something familiar in the wind. Where are we?

char_126_shotst.title: Talk 1
char_126_shotst.text: Do you feel the wind from Kazimierz?

char_126_shotst.title: Talk 2
char_126_shotst.text: Rhodes Island is very different from the places I used to live. There's nowhere to start a campfire here... too bad. Maybe on the deck? I'd like to create a space where everyone can talk and grow closer together.

char_126_shotst.title: Talk 3
char_126_shotst.text: Umm, how does this mission signup system actually work? I'm really bad at electronics…

char_126_shotst.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_126_shotst.text: There have been lots of new faces at Rhodes Island. I'll gladly help them adjust to the environment.

char_126_shotst.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_126_shotst.text: That Kazimierzian knight... Oh, it's her. I knew that girl years ago. She used to be a shy, bookish type. I wonder what made her change so much.

char_126_shotst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_126_shotst.text: Shh... look what I found! A solitary Doctor... gotta catch this one! Oh, did I scare you? Haha…

char_126_shotst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_126_shotst.text: I sometimes recall the time back home in the forest. We had lots of different competitions every year…ah, the good old days. I wonder what my hometown is like now.

char_126_shotst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_126_shotst.text: I'll always have your back, Doctor.

char_126_shotst.title: Idle
char_126_shotst.text: So you can fall asleep without a care, just like that? Heheh...

char_126_shotst.title: Onboard
char_126_shotst.text: Hello, I'm Meteor, the archer from the woods. Do you need an Operator who excels in long-distance support?

char_126_shotst.title: Watching Battle Record
char_126_shotst.text: Archery requires constant practice. No one can afford to slack off for even one day.

char_126_shotst.title: Promotion 1
char_126_shotst.text: I'm honored to receive this promotion.

char_126_shotst.title: Promotion 2
char_126_shotst.text: Thank you, Doctor, for recognizing my skill. I'll continue to do my best to serve you.

char_126_shotst.title: Added to Squad
char_126_shotst.text: Leave the long-distance support to me.

char_126_shotst.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_126_shotst.text: I'll keep everyone safe.

char_126_shotst.title: Depart
char_126_shotst.text: Everybody, let's go.

char_126_shotst.title: Begin Operation
char_126_shotst.text: Time to show them what we can do.

char_126_shotst.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_126_shotst.text: Awaiting your orders.

char_126_shotst.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_126_shotst.text: I've been waiting for a while.

char_126_shotst.title: Deployment 1
char_126_shotst.text: The wind is blowing in the right direction.

char_126_shotst.title: Deployment 2
char_126_shotst.text: I'll stay vigilant.

char_126_shotst.title: In Battle 1
char_126_shotst.text: Perfect chance!

char_126_shotst.title: In Battle 2
char_126_shotst.text: Feel the wind.

char_126_shotst.title: In Battle 3
char_126_shotst.text: This is the shot!

char_126_shotst.title: In Battle 4
char_126_shotst.text: Critical hit.

char_126_shotst.title: 4-star Result
char_126_shotst.text: No matter how difficult the battle, we can handle it, as long as we work together as one.

char_126_shotst.title: 3-star Result
char_126_shotst.text: Perfect! You all did well.

char_126_shotst.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_126_shotst.text: All injured personnel, please stay put, don't move. I'll be right there.

char_126_shotst.title: Operation Failure
char_126_shotst.text: I'm sorry... I didn't want it to end up like this...

char_126_shotst.title: Assigned to Facility
char_126_shotst.text: It's hard to get used to such a small room.

char_126_shotst.title: Tap
char_126_shotst.text: Oh? Need anything?

char_126_shotst.title: Trust Tap
char_126_shotst.text: Being by your side feels like basking in the spring sunshine. So warm, so comfy.

char_126_shotst.title: Title
char_126_shotst.text: Arknights.

char_126_shotst.title: Greeting
char_126_shotst.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_127_estell.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_127_estell.text: Uh... w-where should I stand? O-oh, you want me to sit? Then... where should I sit?

char_127_estell.title: Talk 1
char_127_estell.text: That little bird is my friend. But it's always disappearing on me these days... Oh no... It's not disliking me, is it...

char_127_estell.title: Talk 2
char_127_estell.text: The way I look... is nothing like an Operator at all... And I understand having someone like me in your team won't make you pround... But don't worry, I won't go around saying I'm with Rhodes Island.

char_127_estell.title: Talk 3
char_127_estell.text: You've probably noticed, but my hair is quite difficult to sytle... So I have to let my hair down like this... It's not very appropriate, is it?

char_127_estell.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_127_estell.text: My mutant horns... they don't really fit in with the crowd... I thought I was used to other people staring at them... but … but it's still embarrassing...

char_127_estell.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_127_estell.text: The friends I made in the wilderness... they're all coming to Rhodes Island too. So... I'll feel less lonely. I'll do my best to fight hard and protect everyone.

char_127_estell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_127_estell.text: Actually, ever since my childhood, I've always been dreaming to be a... a princess... I-I mean it's okay if you find it ridiculous...

char_127_estell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_127_estell.text: The bad guys always call me 'freak'... but… yeah, I'm a freak, a freak that wants to protect you and everyone else.

char_127_estell.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_127_estell.text: Um... that really energetic doctor... she's an Archosaurian too, huh? I do want to talk to her... but I'm still a bit scared…

char_127_estell.title: Idle
char_127_estell.text: No one's staring at me now, right? Ah, finally...

char_127_estell.title: Onboard
char_127_estell.text: H-hello... Uh... s-sorry, my horns... I accidentally broke your office door with my horns...

char_127_estell.title: Watching Battle Record
char_127_estell.text: Powers stronger than what I already have... can I really control them...?

char_127_estell.title: Promotion 1
char_127_estell.text: Promotion? What's that?... I don't really get it, but I think it means that I've been helpful, right?

char_127_estell.title: Promotion 2
char_127_estell.text: Thank you, Doctor, for giving me a bit more confidence... Now I am starting to understand what to do and how to wield my power.

char_127_estell.title: Added to Squad
char_127_estell.text: P-please don't look at me...

char_127_estell.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_127_estell.text: Wahh... me? R-really? Is that really okay?

char_127_estell.title: Depart
char_127_estell.text: Uh, everyone... it's... it's time to attack! I-is this how I'm supposed to give orders?

char_127_estell.title: Begin Operation
char_127_estell.text: I... I won't let the bad guys win!

char_127_estell.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_127_estell.text: Huh? Me?

char_127_estell.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_127_estell.text: Let me do it!

char_127_estell.title: Deployment 1
char_127_estell.text: My pushover look should pull a lot of enemies here...

char_127_estell.title: Deployment 2
char_127_estell.text: To intimidate the enemy... I... I'm capable of that, right?

char_127_estell.title: In Battle 1
char_127_estell.text: Hah!

char_127_estell.title: In Battle 2
char_127_estell.text: I-I won't let you pass!

char_127_estell.title: In Battle 3
char_127_estell.text: I won't let you escape this easily!

char_127_estell.title: In Battle 4
char_127_estell.text: Fear me, please!

char_127_estell.title: 4-star Result
char_127_estell.text: I can do better... yes, even better!

char_127_estell.title: 3-star Result
char_127_estell.text: Are you proud of what we've achieved, Doctor?

char_127_estell.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_127_estell.text: Great... we won, Doctor!

char_127_estell.title: Operation Failure
char_127_estell.text: In the end... I'm good for nothing... just as expected...

char_127_estell.title: Assigned to Facility
char_127_estell.text: Wow, this place... it's so spacious! I love it!

char_127_estell.title: Tap
char_127_estell.text: Um...

char_127_estell.title: Trust Tap
char_127_estell.text: You're always so kind to me... I... I'm so happy!

char_127_estell.title: Title
char_127_estell.text: Arknights.

char_127_estell.title: Greeting
char_127_estell.text: D-Doctor...

char_141_nights.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_141_nights.text: Didn't notice me behind you, eh? It's only natural. I'm a cat. We're known for being silent prowlers!

char_141_nights.title: Talk 1
char_141_nights.text: Hey, don't touch my hat... it's crazy, you know! If it feeds you too many secrets, Doctor, you'll be in trouble.

char_141_nights.title: Talk 2
char_141_nights.text: So rare to see a pharma take in runaway kitties from a jail. Did you all want a peek at my maps? Or,  was it some advice on prison breaks?

char_141_nights.title: Talk 3
char_141_nights.text: We thieves have our own principles and standards too... perhaps. Who can say?

char_141_nights.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_141_nights.text: Meow, meow, meow... Meow? Never you mind, I'm just talking to myself.

char_141_nights.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_141_nights.text: Anytime you want. Don't you worry, I have friends everywhere. Eyes everywhere.

char_141_nights.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_141_nights.text: Curiosity can kill a cat, you know.

char_141_nights.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_141_nights.text: I'm in a good mood right now, so here's a riddle for you. 'Why is a raven like a writing desk?'

char_141_nights.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_141_nights.text: Thank you, for this 'Haze' I'm now.But... did you catch a peep of any of them, along the way? Any of, well... my secrets?

char_141_nights.title: Idle
char_141_nights.text: Asleep like a baby... Time to get 'meown to business,' then.

char_141_nights.title: Onboard
char_141_nights.text: Hello, I'm Haze. I like relaxing work environments,  and an employer who knows better than to bother me with too many questions.

char_141_nights.title: Watching Battle Record
char_141_nights.text: Yummy.

char_141_nights.title: Promotion 1
char_141_nights.text: Promotion? What's that? Does it taste good?

char_141_nights.title: Promotion 2
char_141_nights.text: Finally out of those old shackles... and here I am, straight into new ones. The destiny of a thief's no wonder.

char_141_nights.title: Added to Squad
char_141_nights.text: Give me a bit of freedom and I'll be happy.

char_141_nights.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_141_nights.text: What do we need a leader for? Can't everyone just fight on their own?

char_141_nights.title: Depart
char_141_nights.text: Meow... It's driving me wild... this sweet, sweet smell of freedom!

char_141_nights.title: Begin Operation
char_141_nights.text: Everyone, no need to have cold feet here.

char_141_nights.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_141_nights.text: Meow?

char_141_nights.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_141_nights.text: Here we go.

char_141_nights.title: Deployment 1
char_141_nights.text: Out and about.

char_141_nights.title: Deployment 2
char_141_nights.text: Like a shadow.

char_141_nights.title: In Battle 1
char_141_nights.text: How do nya like this?

char_141_nights.title: In Battle 2
char_141_nights.text: Careful, kittens. Don't lose your mittens.

char_141_nights.title: In Battle 3
char_141_nights.text: You think you've got all the trimmings, don't you?

char_141_nights.title: In Battle 4
char_141_nights.text: Nah-ah-ah, Don't get carried away.

char_141_nights.title: 4-star Result
char_141_nights.text: No one stands above a kitty in the end!

char_141_nights.title: 3-star Result
char_141_nights.text: Perfect victory? Whatever. A victory's a victory afterall.

char_141_nights.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_141_nights.text: Do you know how many enemies you let go? That will be a spanner in the works.

char_141_nights.title: Operation Failure
char_141_nights.text: I'm no stranger to running for it, but this is just too embarrassing...

char_141_nights.title: Assigned to Facility
char_141_nights.text: Kotatsu. Where's the kotatsu?

char_141_nights.title: Tap
char_141_nights.text: Meow?

char_141_nights.title: Trust Tap
char_141_nights.text: Meow? I'm not satisfied yet. You know my rule: if I can't have it, I want it.

char_141_nights.title: Title
char_141_nights.text: Arknights.

char_141_nights.title: Greeting
char_141_nights.text: Doctor, nice to meet nya.

char_145_prove.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_145_prove.text: If you need your room cleaned, I'd be glad to help, Doctor.

char_145_prove.title: Talk 1
char_145_prove.text: You seem really interested in my tail, don't you? You say it's furry and looks cute? Well, wanna touch it? No one else has a tail like this, you know!

char_145_prove.title: Talk 2
char_145_prove.text: Water is precious in the wild. Rhodes Island is in no danger of having a drought right now, but that doesn't mean we should waste water.

char_145_prove.title: Talk 3
char_145_prove.text: It's my duty to search for and rescue those who encounter Catastrophes. I rarely find any survivors though...

char_145_prove.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_145_prove.text: Retrieving beacons, exploring mineral deposits, and recycling... Then we can call it a day!

char_145_prove.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_145_prove.text: Mr. Grape is my buddy and a capable partner I can rely on! Where he came from, you ask?... Uh, hmm... Now that's a good question. Where did we first meet?...

char_145_prove.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_145_prove.text: W-what's with that red one...? I... can't stop trembling... uh... Doctor, can you lend me your arm? I'd feel much safer that way...

char_145_prove.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_145_prove.text: Those who do Catastrophe relief work often develop all kinds of mutations. What mutation do I have? Well, it's better not to ask. The more you know, the more dangerous it gets for you, Doctor.

char_145_prove.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_145_prove.text: Catastrophe relief workers in the wilderness... don't usually come out unscathed. No need to worry about me, though! I'm already very happy to have a chance to rest at Rhodes Island.

char_145_prove.title: Idle
char_145_prove.text: Aw, falling asleep in this kinda place again... Guess 'safety' isn't a part of your vocabulary.

char_145_prove.title: Onboard
char_145_prove.text: I'm Provence, your average Catastrophe relief worker. Hmm, why are you staring at me like that? Interested in my tail?

char_145_prove.title: Watching Battle Record
char_145_prove.text: So... does this bring me closer to what you imagined I should be?

char_145_prove.title: Promotion 1
char_145_prove.text: It's fun working with you, Doctor!

char_145_prove.title: Promotion 2
char_145_prove.text: I sense a storm approaching Rhodes Island. But don't worry, leave the evacuation to me! I'm an expert at Catastrophe prevention!

char_145_prove.title: Added to Squad
char_145_prove.text: Who will I be teaming up with this time?

char_145_prove.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_145_prove.text: Don't worry. Everything will be fine.

char_145_prove.title: Depart
char_145_prove.text: My job is to bring everyone home safely.

char_145_prove.title: Begin Operation
char_145_prove.text: I despise natural Catastrophes and enemies equally!

char_145_prove.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_145_prove.text: Is it my turn?

char_145_prove.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_145_prove.text: I am in peak condition!

char_145_prove.title: Deployment 1
char_145_prove.text: Let's greet 'em with a warning shot.

char_145_prove.title: Deployment 2
char_145_prove.text: Arrows loaded. Ready to go!

char_145_prove.title: In Battle 1
char_145_prove.text: I've warned ya! Now time for Crowd Control!

char_145_prove.title: In Battle 2
char_145_prove.text: Pinpointing enemy weakness!

char_145_prove.title: In Battle 3
char_145_prove.text: I'll distract the enemy.

char_145_prove.title: In Battle 4
char_145_prove.text: The wilderness has its own rules.

char_145_prove.title: 4-star Result
char_145_prove.text: Compared to natural Catastrophes, these enemies are really powerless.

char_145_prove.title: 3-star Result
char_145_prove.text: Disaster assessment report: we received zero damage!

char_145_prove.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_145_prove.text: Everyone worked hard. Even if we suffered some damage,  let's not be discouraged!

char_145_prove.title: Operation Failure
char_145_prove.text: Aw... my assessment was off. This'll leave a spot on my record for sure...

char_145_prove.title: Assigned to Facility
char_145_prove.text: It'd be nice to have a room to rest in!

char_145_prove.title: Tap
char_145_prove.text: Oh, Doctor?

char_145_prove.title: Trust Tap
char_145_prove.text: I've got a fluffy tail~ a fluffy tail~♪

char_145_prove.title: Title
char_145_prove.text: Arknights.

char_145_prove.title: Greeting
char_145_prove.text: Oh, good morning, Doctor.

char_183_skgoat.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_183_skgoat.text: Doctor, I've finished sorting the Originium from the other ores, as you requested. Is there anything else?

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk 1
char_183_skgoat.text: Oripathy is indeed troublesome. I can't even go on operations without approval from Dr. Kal'tsit. Oripathy shortens one's lifespan, you say? Yes, that's true, but I don't really mind.

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk 2
char_183_skgoat.text: This tuning fork? It's actually a staff — not only a weapon but also useful for geological surveys. I find it always comes in handy.

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk 3
char_183_skgoat.text: Without Rhodes Island, I'd probably still be a full-time geological researcher. And without you people... I'd probably already be dead.

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_183_skgoat.text: What? I have dark circles under my eyes? Aw, I knew it…

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_183_skgoat.text: What's that behind me, you ask? Well... ah, never mind, it's really hard to explain. I'll tell you when we have more time.

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_183_skgoat.text: Some rocks talk to me, you know. They chatter and even squabble away. Sometimes, I lose sleep because of it… You think I'm kidding? Do I look like I'm kidding?

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_183_skgoat.text: Provence is as careless as always. She needs to be careful or she'll end up like me, seriously ill. You'd better give her a good talking-to.

char_183_skgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_183_skgoat.text: Astonishing...! Look at this, Doctor! This surface... it couldn't have been formed without high pressure in the crust three hundred and fifty thousand years ago. Isn't it incredible…? Guess what, Doctor? The theory is correct! Those who refuted it are the true fools!

char_183_skgoat.title: Idle
char_183_skgoat.text: Doctor—oh, you're sleeping? You must be tired from all your hard work.

char_183_skgoat.title: Onboard
char_183_skgoat.text: I'm Earthspirit, a geology scholar and Caster, reporting in. I work eight hours each day. Make me work any more and you'll have to pay me extra.

char_183_skgoat.title: Watching Battle Record
char_183_skgoat.text: Hm, is this academic data, or something else?

char_183_skgoat.title: Promotion 1
char_183_skgoat.text: We must continue to refine our scientific method.

char_183_skgoat.title: Promotion 2
char_183_skgoat.text: Forgive my bluntness, but do bear in mind you are paying me only a single salary. No matter how far you promote me, I won't do more than a single person's work.

char_183_skgoat.title: Added to Squad
char_183_skgoat.text: Understood.

char_183_skgoat.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_183_skgoat.text: I hope this squad performs well in all types of extreme environment.

char_183_skgoat.title: Depart
char_183_skgoat.text: Don't worry, we'll be right back.

char_183_skgoat.title: Begin Operation
char_183_skgoat.text: We can't let them misuse Originium like this.

char_183_skgoat.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_183_skgoat.text: Here.

char_183_skgoat.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_183_skgoat.text: What's the battle plan?

char_183_skgoat.title: Deployment 1
char_183_skgoat.text: I'm ready.

char_183_skgoat.title: Deployment 2
char_183_skgoat.text: Where are the enemies?

char_183_skgoat.title: In Battle 1
char_183_skgoat.text: Sink into the earth!

char_183_skgoat.title: In Battle 2
char_183_skgoat.text: The power of the earth...

char_183_skgoat.title: In Battle 3
char_183_skgoat.text: This ends here!

char_183_skgoat.title: In Battle 4
char_183_skgoat.text: You shouldn't have set foot here.

char_183_skgoat.title: 4-star Result
char_183_skgoat.text: What the enemy was doing… would only bring disaster.

char_183_skgoat.title: 3-star Result
char_183_skgoat.text: All enemies have been dealt with.

char_183_skgoat.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_183_skgoat.text: A fine victory, Doctor.

char_183_skgoat.title: Operation Failure
char_183_skgoat.text: How is this possible…?

char_183_skgoat.title: Assigned to Facility
char_183_skgoat.text: This environment is quite suitable for research.

char_183_skgoat.title: Tap
char_183_skgoat.text: Um...

char_183_skgoat.title: Trust Tap
char_183_skgoat.text: This piece of ore is… for me? Really? But… it must be very expensive, no?

char_183_skgoat.title: Title
char_183_skgoat.text: Arknights.

char_183_skgoat.title: Greeting
char_183_skgoat.text: Doctor, time to get to work.

char_187_ccheal.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_187_ccheal.text: Yeah, yeah, I get it, you deserve a nice rest in your off time. But you gotta get your treatment right now.

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Huh? You want me to be gentle and caring? That's nurse stuff, pal. I'm a doctor, from top to toe. That means healing. Treatment. Don't waste my time with the fluff.

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk 2
char_187_ccheal.text: Strange, why does Dr. Kal'tsit keeps telling me to 'be nice to patients'? She's been doing it ever since I got here.

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk 3
char_187_ccheal.text: Your average doctor's biggest concern is keeping herself safe. Mine, on the other hand... it's getting my patients to stop being scared of me.

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Treatment time, ears open! Eyes on me! Hands up! Don't move!

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_187_ccheal.text: Doctors and fighters... life-savers, life-takers. People think we're polar opposites, but I think we're one and the same—we both sacrifice.

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Huh? I didn't beat anyone up, I just wanted to say hi. Watch, lemme demo... I initiate physical contact, and that's how I get closer to people, see?

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_187_ccheal.text: I'm kinda missing my homeland... I chose to be a medic myself, but it's crazy it all turned out the way it did. Life sure took me down some wild paths, huh?

char_187_ccheal.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_187_ccheal.text: Doctor... you and I are both travelers on a lonely road. I guess that's why we understand each other so well.

char_187_ccheal.title: Idle
char_187_ccheal.text: What the... you're asleep, huh? Heheh.

char_187_ccheal.title: Onboard
char_187_ccheal.text: I'm Medic Operator Gavial. First things first... Don't judge me by the way I look. Got it?

char_187_ccheal.title: Watching Battle Record
char_187_ccheal.text: Tch, I thought we were gonna have combat class.

char_187_ccheal.title: Promotion 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Everyone's so scared of me treating them... You're the only one who accepts me for what I am. Thanks for that.

char_187_ccheal.title: Promotion 2
char_187_ccheal.text: All right, no more fooling around. I'll be serious from now on.

char_187_ccheal.title: Added to Squad
char_187_ccheal.text: Leave the rear to me. Go show what you're made of!

char_187_ccheal.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_187_ccheal.text: All right, get in line, everyone!

char_187_ccheal.title: Depart
char_187_ccheal.text: All right, ladies. Let's keep it cool.

char_187_ccheal.title: Begin Operation
char_187_ccheal.text: Coming!

char_187_ccheal.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Let's begin.

char_187_ccheal.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_187_ccheal.text: Where do you need me?

char_187_ccheal.title: Deployment 1
char_187_ccheal.text: Ready to heal!

char_187_ccheal.title: Deployment 2
char_187_ccheal.text: Who needs healing? Come over!

char_187_ccheal.title: In Battle 1
char_187_ccheal.text: If you want treatment, you gotta come closer!

char_187_ccheal.title: In Battle 2
char_187_ccheal.text: Don't get yourself killed, dummy!

char_187_ccheal.title: In Battle 3
char_187_ccheal.text: Come on, get it together!

char_187_ccheal.title: In Battle 4
char_187_ccheal.text: Hang in there, I'm coming!

char_187_ccheal.title: 4-star Result
char_187_ccheal.text: Meh, pushovers. I wasn't even breaking a sweat.

char_187_ccheal.title: 3-star Result
char_187_ccheal.text: Man those guys were weak. I regret not giving 'em a few whacks with the staff here.

char_187_ccheal.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_187_ccheal.text: Have you guys never taken emergency response training courses?

char_187_ccheal.title: Operation Failure
char_187_ccheal.text: Darn it... I'm not giving up yet!

char_187_ccheal.title: Assigned to Facility
char_187_ccheal.text: Let's see if there are any interesting people here!

char_187_ccheal.title: Tap
char_187_ccheal.text: Hey, knock it off!

char_187_ccheal.title: Trust Tap
char_187_ccheal.text: You want me to just nod and listen? No. Freaking. Way.

char_187_ccheal.title: Title
char_187_ccheal.text: Arknights.

char_187_ccheal.title: Greeting
char_187_ccheal.text: Hey, Doctor.

char_241_panda.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_241_panda.text: So... I have to just stand here and not do anything? Laaaame.

char_241_panda.title: Talk 1
char_241_panda.text: These gauntlets aren't that heavy. See? Even a dainty little girl like me can carry 'em around real easy.

char_241_panda.title: Talk 2
char_241_panda.text: You remember fighting by my side before? Can't say I remember fighting by yours, sorry... I just fight for what's right, that's all.

char_241_panda.title: Talk 3
char_241_panda.text: Hah. That boxer, Beehunter? She's really something! I enjoyed sparring with her so much, I had to throw out some serious moves. And she's got an amazing honey collection too. Wanna visit her with me next time? You gotta learn some kung fu first, though.

char_241_panda.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_241_panda.text: Reading a movie magazine...? Well, guess what? The 'hot kung-fu actress' mentioned in this article is ME! What? You don't believe me? Come on, look! This is me, can't you tell? C'mon, that's definitely me!

char_241_panda.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_241_panda.text: Do I regret forgoing my previous life? Well, sometimes, of course. But the world ain't kind to us Infected. Lots of places I'm not allowed to go. It blows.

char_241_panda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_241_panda.text: There's a street full of food stalls in the neighboring city. And... a candy shop over there? And a theme park? Aww, Doctor, can I get a day off? I wanna check out these places!

char_241_panda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_241_panda.text: Am I satisfied with life at Rhodes Island, you ask? Hm, to be honest... It's even sweeter than what they show in the movies! I got cool opponents to practice with, top-notch food, and by working here, I'm doing something good for the world! What could be better!

char_241_panda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_241_panda.text: Doctor, look! What do you think about this script? Oh, who's gonna act in it, you wonder? You and I are gonna be the main characters! There's this scene where we leap from the roof of a thirty-story building and slide all the way down. Isn't that cool? Hey! Come back! Wait!

char_241_panda.title: Idle
char_241_panda.text: You're catching some z's, eh? Guess I'll slack off for a bit too. Man, this couch is so fluffy!

char_241_panda.title: Onboard
char_241_panda.text: You swear you've seen my face before? Probably saw it in a movie I was in! Call me FEater, and what I do from here is your call!

char_241_panda.title: Watching Battle Record
char_241_panda.text: It's over? Come on, let's watch just a while longer. We're almost at the fun part!

char_241_panda.title: Promotion 1
char_241_panda.text: Oooh! A promotion! Thanks so much, Doctor!

char_241_panda.title: Promotion 2
char_241_panda.text: This here's the perfect opportunity to show you some REAL kung fu!

char_241_panda.title: Added to Squad
char_241_panda.text: All right, it's show time!

char_241_panda.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_241_panda.text: Huh? I'm the leader? Not sure how it'll go, but...

char_241_panda.title: Depart
char_241_panda.text: This is gonna be exciting!

char_241_panda.title: Begin Operation
char_241_panda.text: I'm FEater. Pleased to beat you!

char_241_panda.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_241_panda.text: Un-huh.

char_241_panda.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_241_panda.text: Here we go!

char_241_panda.title: Deployment 1
char_241_panda.text: All right!

char_241_panda.title: Deployment 2
char_241_panda.text: Show time!

char_241_panda.title: In Battle 1
char_241_panda.text: HI-YAH!

char_241_panda.title: In Battle 2
char_241_panda.text: This is straight out of one of my movies!

char_241_panda.title: In Battle 3
char_241_panda.text: From flexibility comes power!

char_241_panda.title: In Battle 4
char_241_panda.text: Who says a movie star couldn't be a real kung-fu master!

char_241_panda.title: 4-star Result
char_241_panda.text: Wow, it's over?

char_241_panda.title: 3-star Result
char_241_panda.text: It's over already? I was just starting to get warmed up.

char_241_panda.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_241_panda.text: Hey, it's no biggie. Just a few scratches and bruises.

char_241_panda.title: Operation Failure
char_241_panda.text: Aw... I just wanna go home and sleep...

char_241_panda.title: Assigned to Facility
char_241_panda.text: Now that's stylin'!

char_241_panda.title: Tap
char_241_panda.text: Stop that, I'm getting dizzy!

char_241_panda.title: Trust Tap
char_241_panda.text: Hey, Doctor, want my autograph? I'll take a pic with you if you want, too!

char_241_panda.title: Title
char_241_panda.text: Arknights.

char_241_panda.title: Greeting
char_241_panda.text: Did you have breakfast yet, Doctor?

char_180_amgoat.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_180_amgoat.text: Professor, I've finished all my Catastrophe studies notes. Do you have any more I could read?

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk 1
char_180_amgoat.text: Huh? What? Why do I call you 'Professor'? Well, you're an expert on Catastrophe studies, so you're like a professor, right? Aren't we all supposed to address our superiors with respect?

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk 2
char_180_amgoat.text: Pardon me? Please say that again? Oh, you're wondering why I'm hard of hearing? Well, I got infected with Oripathy back when I was doing research near a volcano...

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk 3
char_180_amgoat.text: Besides completing the tasks you give me, I have to go to Dr. Kal'tsit regularly for checkups. The doctor said my symptoms are pretty serious...

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_180_amgoat.text: I have to work hard to finish the research my parents began! I want to prove that their work was meaningful, and that it could maybe even change the world!

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_180_amgoat.text: My parents... they've passed on. A pyroclastic flow hit them when they were conducting studies near a volcano... I have to pick up where they left off and finish their research, no matter what!

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_180_amgoat.text: My playmates? I'm pretty friendly with Mousse and some others, so I don't feel lonely at all! If possible, I'd love to start a book club with them too. Could we hold our club meetings in your office, Professor?

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_180_amgoat.text: Dr. Kal'tsit told me... I'm losing not only my sense of hearing, but my sense of sight too. …Well, what else might this disease do to me?

char_180_amgoat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_180_amgoat.text: How could I tell you were behind me? Because I could feel your warmth! My eyesight and hearing aren't as sharp as they once were, but my other senses are still the same. Can't bring me down this easily, you know!

char_180_amgoat.title: Idle
char_180_amgoat.text: Professor! Oh... You're asleep...?

char_180_amgoat.title: Onboard
