char_180_amgoat.text: I'm Eyjafjalla. My career before joining Rhodes Island was in the field of volcanology. I'm a bit hard of hearing due to my Oripathy. I just hope I won't be a burden to you, Professor.

char_180_amgoat.title: Watching Battle Record
char_180_amgoat.text: Please teach me all you can, Professor.

char_180_amgoat.title: Promotion 1
char_180_amgoat.text: Promotion? Really? I'm so happy to have your approval, Professor!

char_180_amgoat.title: Promotion 2
char_180_amgoat.text: My mother gave me these little lambs. They're cute, aren't they? Huh? They're scorching hot? Be careful! You have to put on oven mittens before touching them!

char_180_amgoat.title: Added to Squad
char_180_amgoat.text: Understood, Professor.

char_180_amgoat.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_180_amgoat.text: Don't forget to prepare emergency supplies as well as weapons!

char_180_amgoat.title: Depart
char_180_amgoat.text: We can take care of ourselves, Professor. You just focus on giving orders.

char_180_amgoat.title: Begin Operation
char_180_amgoat.text: Stay safe, everyone.

char_180_amgoat.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_180_amgoat.text: Professor?

char_180_amgoat.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_180_amgoat.text: Please give your orders, Professor.

char_180_amgoat.title: Deployment 1
char_180_amgoat.text: I'll be careful.

char_180_amgoat.title: Deployment 2
char_180_amgoat.text: All the best!

char_180_amgoat.title: In Battle 1
char_180_amgoat.text: Temperature is stable!

char_180_amgoat.title: In Battle 2
char_180_amgoat.text: This may be a little hot...

char_180_amgoat.title: In Battle 3
char_180_amgoat.text: Watch out for fires.

char_180_amgoat.title: In Battle 4
char_180_amgoat.text: How's that?

char_180_amgoat.title: 4-star Result
char_180_amgoat.text: I'm so glad you're safe, Professor...

char_180_amgoat.title: 3-star Result
char_180_amgoat.text: Why must our world be enveloped in strife?

char_180_amgoat.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_180_amgoat.text: Is everyone okay? Anything I can do?

char_180_amgoat.title: Operation Failure
char_180_amgoat.text: Ow... It's... It's okay... I'm fine...

char_180_amgoat.title: Assigned to Facility
char_180_amgoat.text: This room makes me feel safe.

char_180_amgoat.title: Tap
char_180_amgoat.text: Eek! You startled me, Professor!

char_180_amgoat.title: Trust Tap
char_180_amgoat.text: Thank you, Professor, for helping me become a stronger person.

char_180_amgoat.title: Title
char_180_amgoat.text: Arknights.

char_180_amgoat.title: Greeting
char_180_amgoat.text: Good morning, Professor!

char_185_frncat.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_185_frncat.text: We've got more kitties! Yeah…

char_185_frncat.title: Talk 1
char_185_frncat.text: Laterano cakes are so delicious! But we operators have to pay attention to our diet, right?... aww...

char_185_frncat.title: Talk 2
char_185_frncat.text: Not my gloves... I'm sorry, I can't take my gloves off... I don't want you to see my hands. That's the one thing I ask... sorry…

char_185_frncat.title: Talk 3
char_185_frncat.text: A-Are we departing now? Al-Alright, let me just prepare one moment...!

char_185_frncat.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_185_frncat.text: Do you think it's odd that I have two tails? Do-do-do I look even stranger than I thought? Umm...

char_185_frncat.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_185_frncat.text: When my symptoms aren't flaring up, my hand stays all normal... It feels so nice, just being able to hold the kitties like this...

char_185_frncat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_185_frncat.text: Doctor, what kind of cake do you prefer? Mango, or matcha? I tried making a few, and... you already ate? Oh, umm, Okay...

char_185_frncat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_185_frncat.text: D-Doctor! Sora... sh-she's the super idol, Sora, isn't she?! I'd recognize her anywhere! I'm her biggest fan! Why is she here at Rhodes Island? And... and... can I ask her for an autograph?

char_185_frncat.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_185_frncat.text: Doctor, have you heard of the Avenue des Champs-Élysées? Yes, I happened to be born there. I really wish I could go back and visit one day... what? Oh, no, I appreciate it, but I'm not lonely. I have you, after all! You're my family.

char_185_frncat.title: Idle
char_185_frncat.text: Aw... Doctor... why are you ignoring me...

char_185_frncat.title: Onboard
char_185_frncat.text: Good day... p-please call me Mousse. And... and please don't stare at my hand so much...

char_185_frncat.title: Watching Battle Record
char_185_frncat.text: This is a favor I'll never forget!

char_185_frncat.title: Promotion 1
char_185_frncat.text: Huh? Pro...promotion?! I-I'm not prepared for this...

char_185_frncat.title: Promotion 2
char_185_frncat.text: Doctor, I know there's a limit to what I can accomplish, so I swear... I'll do all that I'm able, as well as I'm able! It's... It's the only way I could ever repay you, Doctor...

char_185_frncat.title: Added to Squad
char_185_frncat.text: Yes, I'll do my best!

char_185_frncat.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_185_frncat.text: This is in my hands! You can do this, Mousse!

char_185_frncat.title: Depart
char_185_frncat.text: I essentially blend into the walls, so I'm a good choice for scouting...

char_185_frncat.title: Begin Operation
char_185_frncat.text: Scouting complete. Sending you enemy coordinates.

char_185_frncat.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_185_frncat.text: I'm ready!

char_185_frncat.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_185_frncat.text: Here!

char_185_frncat.title: Deployment 1
char_185_frncat.text: I'm not scared...!

char_185_frncat.title: Deployment 2
char_185_frncat.text: From now on, this is my battle...!

char_185_frncat.title: In Battle 1
char_185_frncat.text: Yah!

char_185_frncat.title: In Battle 2
char_185_frncat.text: No, stay back!

char_185_frncat.title: In Battle 3
char_185_frncat.text: I can fight too!

char_185_frncat.title: In Battle 4
char_185_frncat.text: You-You'll regret this!

char_185_frncat.title: 4-star Result
char_185_frncat.text: It was a tough fight... but I stayed steady through it all...!

char_185_frncat.title: 3-star Result
char_185_frncat.text: Yay... Oh, oh, sorry, it's not that I like battles that much, but...

char_185_frncat.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_185_frncat.text: D-Did I drag us all down?

char_185_frncat.title: Operation Failure
char_185_frncat.text: I can... keep going...

char_185_frncat.title: Assigned to Facility
char_185_frncat.text: E-Excuse me... May I come in...?

char_185_frncat.title: Tap
char_185_frncat.text: Yah!

char_185_frncat.title: Trust Tap
char_185_frncat.text: D-Doctor... I really can't hold it in anymore... do we have a scratching post? Urghh...

char_185_frncat.title: Title
char_185_frncat.text: Arknights.

char_185_frncat.title: Greeting
char_185_frncat.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_150_snakek.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_150_snakek.text: Here I am! What should we play, baseball or board games? Oh, you're working?

char_150_snakek.title: Talk 1
char_150_snakek.text: Where was I born, you ask? Well, umm...no idea. But that doesn't matter, right?

char_150_snakek.title: Talk 2
char_150_snakek.text: Hello, Professor Rhodes Island! Wait, am I calling you by the right name?...

char_150_snakek.title: Talk 3
char_150_snakek.text: Hm, what's my assignment today? To capture some long, sleek animals?

char_150_snakek.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_150_snakek.text: Hey! Don't knock on my backpack! Oh, sorry, I'm not mad, I'm just worried. If you're not careful, you could hurt your hand! Here, let me show you how it's done.

char_150_snakek.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_150_snakek.text: If anyone dares to hurt you, I'll smash them with my baseball bat. Oh, uh... so... there really are people who hurt you? Um... actually, I'm not that good at fighting, hehe…

char_150_snakek.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_150_snakek.text: I love spending the whole day just walking down the street. I get to watch the people, enjoy the sunshine, and then… lose my way!

char_150_snakek.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_150_snakek.text: You've been treating my sickness, and you gave me a place to live... you're really so kind...

char_150_snakek.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_150_snakek.text: Doctor, are you my big brother? Or big sister?... Well, does't matter! I'm not leaving you, even if you throw me out! It's not like I can walk far anyway.

char_150_snakek.title: Idle
char_150_snakek.text: Oh, the Doctor is busy. I'll just play by myself then...

char_150_snakek.title: Onboard
char_150_snakek.text: Hm? Where am I? Who am I?

char_150_snakek.title: Watching Battle Record
char_150_snakek.text: I can make myself super tough! It's my only special skill!

char_150_snakek.title: Promotion 1
char_150_snakek.text: Promotion? What's a promotion?... Whatever, let's play for a bit longer! You and me, together!

char_150_snakek.title: Promotion 2
char_150_snakek.text: New position or not, I don't really care. All I want is to be by your side every day. Can you grant this tiny wish of mine?

char_150_snakek.title: Added to Squad
char_150_snakek.text: I've got lots of friends here!

char_150_snakek.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_150_snakek.text: Everybody, let's go!

char_150_snakek.title: Depart
char_150_snakek.text: We'll be fine if we stick together!

char_150_snakek.title: Begin Operation
char_150_snakek.text: Everyone, let's play!

char_150_snakek.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_150_snakek.text: I'm here~!

char_150_snakek.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_150_snakek.text: Doctor!

char_150_snakek.title: Deployment 1
char_150_snakek.text: Ora ora!

char_150_snakek.title: Deployment 2
char_150_snakek.text: Hey, dummies, bring it on!

char_150_snakek.title: In Battle 1
char_150_snakek.text: Muda muda muda muda!

char_150_snakek.title: In Battle 2
char_150_snakek.text: C'mon, show me what you got!

char_150_snakek.title: In Battle 3
char_150_snakek.text: This is my playground!

char_150_snakek.title: In Battle 4
char_150_snakek.text: I won't back down!

char_150_snakek.title: 4-star Result
char_150_snakek.text: Was that tough? Didn't feel much different from any other battle.

char_150_snakek.title: 3-star Result
char_150_snakek.text: Homerun!

char_150_snakek.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_150_snakek.text: Safe!

char_150_snakek.title: Operation Failure
char_150_snakek.text: Aww... struck out…

char_150_snakek.title: Assigned to Facility
char_150_snakek.text: Just don't throw fireballs at me, okay?

char_150_snakek.title: Tap
char_150_snakek.text: Wow, fun!

char_150_snakek.title: Trust Tap
char_150_snakek.text: Hey Doctor! Can we play a little bit longer? Just a little bit!

char_150_snakek.title: Title
char_150_snakek.text: Arknights.

char_150_snakek.title: Greeting
char_150_snakek.text: Heya! Doctor!

char_130_doberm.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_130_doberm.text: Doctor, are the new recruits keeping up with my basic training regimen?

char_130_doberm.title: Talk 1
char_130_doberm.text: A balanced, regular diet is also an important part of daily training. Any complainers get fifty laps around the deck.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk 2
char_130_doberm.text: As a military instructor, it's important to achieve the perfect balance between strictness and leniency. To be honest... I may be a bit too hard on Fang...

char_130_doberm.title: Talk 3
char_130_doberm.text: When putting your Operators into squads, it's crucial to assign them positions where they can exercise their skills to the fullest. It's true that Operators' ability is important, what's really being tested here is your judgement.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_130_doberm.text: Doctor, when training Operators, you need to work on spiritual fulfillment as much as improving their physiques and skills. After all, they need to be mentally strong enough to survive interrogations and all sorts of attacks on their minds.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_130_doberm.text: You're looking for the newbies? They're training out on the deck. Yes, I do realize what the weather's like right now. Of course I do.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_130_doberm.text: Anomalies... ha. You can never fool the eyes of the 'Hound'.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_130_doberm.text: If you believe that command allows you to slack off whenever you want, then I WILL correct your misconception, Doctor.

char_130_doberm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_130_doberm.text: If I hope to remain at your side through all the difficulties to come, I must be even harder on myself. After all, with the world around us being what it is... the only way we can keep it together is to keep training our mental strength.

char_130_doberm.title: Idle
char_130_doberm.text: No slacking off!

char_130_doberm.title: Onboard
char_130_doberm.text: Attention! I am Dobermann, former military instructor for the Bolívarian armed forces. Now, let's cut to the chase. Hand over the list of Operators in need of training.

char_130_doberm.title: Watching Battle Record
char_130_doberm.text: This is how our training pays off.

char_130_doberm.title: Promotion 1
char_130_doberm.text: Promotion, huh? Thanks. I'm just doing my job.

char_130_doberm.title: Promotion 2
char_130_doberm.text: The responsibility for training the future of Rhodes Island is on my shoulders. I will do my best to be worthy of that responsibility.

char_130_doberm.title: Added to Squad
char_130_doberm.text: Got it.

char_130_doberm.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_130_doberm.text: Then show me the briefing docs for the mission.

char_130_doberm.title: Depart
char_130_doberm.text: Calling all hands. This is not a drill!

char_130_doberm.title: Begin Operation
char_130_doberm.text: Time to interrogate.

char_130_doberm.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_130_doberm.text: Your orders.

char_130_doberm.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_130_doberm.text: Orders?

char_130_doberm.title: Deployment 1
char_130_doberm.text: Got it.

char_130_doberm.title: Deployment 2
char_130_doberm.text: Commence tracking.

char_130_doberm.title: In Battle 1
char_130_doberm.text: Filthy scum.

char_130_doberm.title: In Battle 2
char_130_doberm.text: Take that!

char_130_doberm.title: In Battle 3
char_130_doberm.text: Tear 'em up!

char_130_doberm.title: In Battle 4
char_130_doberm.text: Hang in there!

char_130_doberm.title: 4-star Result
char_130_doberm.text: No matter the challenges we face, strong fundamental combat skills can mean the difference between life and death.

char_130_doberm.title: 3-star Result
char_130_doberm.text: Come back when you're less mediocre.

char_130_doberm.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_130_doberm.text: The operation was successful, but we still have room for improvement.

char_130_doberm.title: Operation Failure
char_130_doberm.text: We have failed. I am the one to blame.

char_130_doberm.title: Assigned to Facility
char_130_doberm.text: The newbies are intimidated by me, you say? That's only natural.

char_130_doberm.title: Tap
char_130_doberm.text: Please mind your behavior.

char_130_doberm.title: Trust Tap
char_130_doberm.text: You want to cheer me up? Hm, let me interrogate someone, then.

char_130_doberm.title: Title
char_130_doberm.text: Arknights.

char_130_doberm.title: Greeting
char_130_doberm.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_163_hpsts.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_163_hpsts.text: Hm? You want to watch me forge weapons? Sure, but be careful not to get singed.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk 1
char_163_hpsts.text: Only weapons that are never in use will remain undamaged. Therefore, leaving a weapon spotless is actually the worst sacrilege for it.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk 2
char_163_hpsts.text: The modernized weaponry and equipment manufacturing processes have left many traditional craftsmen jobless. But those who can't keep up with the times will of course be left behind... that's only natural.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk 3
char_163_hpsts.text: Firearms... these weapons will truly change the world completely.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_163_hpsts.text: My right leg? Oh, it's fine. You know, all craftsmen make mistakes.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_163_hpsts.text: Thank you for giving me a chance to show what I can do.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_163_hpsts.text: You saw my name engraved on some equipment? No... that's not me.

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_163_hpsts.text: With steel and copper as the core...

char_163_hpsts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_163_hpsts.text: My greatest wish is for the hammer I forged to come in useful to you.

char_163_hpsts.title: Idle
char_163_hpsts.text: They're promoting new drinks at the bar. What should I have today?

char_163_hpsts.title: Onboard
char_163_hpsts.text: They call me Vulcan. I can do maintenance for your damaged weapons if you want. Oh, by the way, the forging equipment I need is all listed here in this blueprint.

char_163_hpsts.title: Watching Battle Record
char_163_hpsts.text: Ah, I'm feeling inspired. Get the blower machine ready, it's time to get down to business.

char_163_hpsts.title: Promotion 1
char_163_hpsts.text: I see that you, too, understand the importance of an excellent craftsperson to a military organization.

char_163_hpsts.title: Promotion 2
char_163_hpsts.text: Keeping your weapons in good condition is the best way to keep yourself safe. Ah, you agree with me? I see that I've finally found my soulmate.

char_163_hpsts.title: Added to Squad
char_163_hpsts.text: I just want to... focus on my work.

char_163_hpsts.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_163_hpsts.text: Leader? Well, if I have to... Still, compared to giving orders, I'm much better at designing and manufacturing weapons.

char_163_hpsts.title: Depart
char_163_hpsts.text: Can't I just stay behind and work?

char_163_hpsts.title: Begin Operation
char_163_hpsts.text: Hopeless imbeciles...

char_163_hpsts.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_163_hpsts.text: Ah.

char_163_hpsts.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_163_hpsts.text: Hmm?

char_163_hpsts.title: Deployment 1
char_163_hpsts.text: Okay...

char_163_hpsts.title: Deployment 2
char_163_hpsts.text: Everything's normal.

char_163_hpsts.title: In Battle 1
char_163_hpsts.text: Suit up.

char_163_hpsts.title: In Battle 2
char_163_hpsts.text: Raging flames!

char_163_hpsts.title: In Battle 3
char_163_hpsts.text: I don't need healing.

char_163_hpsts.title: In Battle 4
char_163_hpsts.text: I'll destroy your weapon with my next blow!

char_163_hpsts.title: 4-star Result
char_163_hpsts.text: If you pick up some enemy equipment, show it to me. Could be useful for future development.

char_163_hpsts.title: 3-star Result
char_163_hpsts.text: A victory, just as expected! That's why we need high-quality weapons.

char_163_hpsts.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_163_hpsts.text: Please submit a damage report for each of your weapons. I will work on repairs when we get back.

char_163_hpsts.title: Operation Failure
char_163_hpsts.text: My crafting skills are still lacking...

char_163_hpsts.title: Assigned to Facility
char_163_hpsts.text: Got a melting pot here?

char_163_hpsts.title: Tap
char_163_hpsts.text: Argh...

char_163_hpsts.title: Trust Tap
char_163_hpsts.text: Any equipment you have in mind? I can try making it for you.

char_163_hpsts.title: Title
char_163_hpsts.text: Arknights.

char_163_hpsts.title: Greeting
char_163_hpsts.text: Good morning, Doctor.

char_144_red.title: Talk 1
char_144_red.text: I prefer to work alone, by myself.

char_144_red.title: Talk 2
char_144_red.text: Name, bounty, kill. Simple. That's the agreement with Kal'tsit.

char_144_red.title: Talk 3
char_144_red.text: Wolves have fangs, I have my blade. Wolves do not rest, neither do I.

char_144_red.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_144_red.text: Granny's calling... I can hear her.

char_144_red.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_144_red.text: Bleak wind, corpses on the ground, screams under the stars... I smell them all, the scent of wolves. I join the hunt.

char_144_red.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_144_red.text: Family? I have no family. I am always alone. Do you need a family, Doctor?

char_144_red.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_144_red.text: They avoid me... I just want to touch their tails. Provence, and Texas... I like their scent.

char_144_red.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_144_red.text: Doctor, sometimes I wonder... if I weren't a wolf hunter, would my life be different? Oh, you mean… I should answer the question... myself?

char_144_red.title: Idle
char_144_red.text: Doctor... no, nothing. I thought you fell asleep. Don't sleep, not now.

char_144_red.title: Onboard
char_144_red.text: Projekt Red, wolf hunter, smells wolves.

char_144_red.title: Watching Battle Record
char_144_red.text: As long as it helps me hunt.

char_144_red.title: Promotion 2
char_144_red.text: A promotion? This will disguise me. I accept.

char_144_red.title: In Battle 4
char_144_red.text: Your death... is in my eyes.

char_144_red.title: 3-star Result
char_144_red.text: The one way a hunt can end.

char_144_red.title: Operation Failure
char_144_red.text: Sorry... My blade... not sharp enough.

char_144_red.title: Assigned to Facility
char_144_red.text: I prefer to be outside. But… it's okay.

char_144_red.title: Tap
char_144_red.text: Watch your hand. I might cut you.

char_140_whitew.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_140_whitew.text: Ehi, Doctor. Hope you don't mind if I bring my weapons inside. I'll plop myself right over here.

char_140_whitew.title: Talk 1
char_140_whitew.text: Somebody out to get you, huh? Then have a long, hard think about who you might've wronged in the past.

char_140_whitew.title: Talk 2
char_140_whitew.text: If someone's out for revenge on you, don't hesitate, just take them out. Once you decide to pick up a weapon, you don't need a reason to kill.

char_140_whitew.title: Talk 3
char_140_whitew.text: It's been a while... I see that Texas made some friends. Hehehe... Affascinante! Can't wait to get to know them!

char_140_whitew.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_140_whitew.text: You think I'm an assassin, huh? Yeah, alright. Call me whatever you want. I can be anyone, do anything, kill anyone anytime. Just so long as I want to!

char_140_whitew.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_140_whitew.text: I love power, Doctor. And you offered me a job where I can use my power to my heart's content... Love it. Honestly, the only joy I get out of this insane world is using my power to conquer it.

char_140_whitew.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_140_whitew.text: Texas? Ha, she's afraid of me, but I don't wanna do anything to her, except maybe try to bring back the old Texas. The one we got here's a cucciolo impaurito.

char_140_whitew.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_140_whitew.text: That red one... oh... Doctor, keep her away from me! She'd definitely kill me in a fight. But I have this feeling... this feeling... ugh, why do I want to fight her so badly?

char_140_whitew.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_140_whitew.text: You want to know what happened between me and Texas? Hehe, you don't have a single idea of what you are sticking your nose into. You'll find out the truth someday, but not from me.

char_140_whitew.title: Idle
char_140_whitew.text: Sleep tight... enjoy your sweet dreams while you still can.

char_140_whitew.title: Onboard
char_140_whitew.text: A great evil stands in the way of justice. My master, in the name of hatred and revenge, lead the weak onward!

char_140_whitew.title: Watching Battle Record
char_140_whitew.text: Don't you just love how I keep getting more and more powerful?

char_140_whitew.title: Promotion 1
char_140_whitew.text: Hahaha! Bene! I love how much you trust me. You can't say the same for Texas, right?

char_140_whitew.title: Promotion 2
char_140_whitew.text: Molto bene! That's more like it! Strength, unfettered and unchained! That's what I'm talking about!

char_140_whitew.title: Added to Squad
char_140_whitew.text: Make Texas the leader!

char_140_whitew.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_140_whitew.text: Put Texas on my team!

char_140_whitew.title: Depart
char_140_whitew.text: Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.

char_140_whitew.title: Begin Operation
char_140_whitew.text: We're fighting you guys? Then please do your bestest job, or I'll be really bored.

char_140_whitew.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_140_whitew.text: Show me what you've got.

char_140_whitew.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_140_whitew.text: Tell me, what's your plan?

char_140_whitew.title: Deployment 1
char_140_whitew.text: Solid positioning.

char_140_whitew.title: Deployment 2
char_140_whitew.text: Ahahaha!

char_140_whitew.title: In Battle 1
char_140_whitew.text: C'mon! C'eri quasi, tesoro!

char_140_whitew.title: In Battle 2
char_140_whitew.text: Can you do it?

char_140_whitew.title: In Battle 3
char_140_whitew.text: Just try me!

char_140_whitew.title: In Battle 4
char_140_whitew.text: You'll have to try harder than that!

char_140_whitew.title: 4-star Result
char_140_whitew.text: It's over? Ah, che noia!

char_140_whitew.title: 3-star Result
char_140_whitew.text: Hahaha, sliced 'em up like a millefoglie. How do you like it?

char_140_whitew.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_140_whitew.text: Not my best work. You can lay it on me for letting a few get away.

char_140_whitew.title: Operation Failure
char_140_whitew.text: Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!

char_140_whitew.title: Assigned to Facility
char_140_whitew.text: Hm? Did I see a red shadow flash by?

char_140_whitew.title: Tap
char_140_whitew.text: Haha!

char_140_whitew.title: Trust Tap
char_140_whitew.text: The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.

char_140_whitew.title: Title
char_140_whitew.text: Arknights.

char_140_whitew.title: Greeting
char_140_whitew.text: Heh. Ciao, Doctor.

char_171_bldsk.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_171_bldsk.text: Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit sent me to take a blood sample from you. We can chat as I'm getting the needle ready.

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Can I control the urge to feed, you ask? How dare you underestimate me! I'm a trained professional. Of course I can tell patients from food!

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk 2
char_171_bldsk.text: It's my job to track blood indicators for all our operators, even if they aren't exactly happy about it—huh...? These blood bags? They're samples, of course! What were you thinking!?

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk 3
char_171_bldsk.text: There's another one of my kind here. And she's an... engineer? Hm…maybe she likes the smell of machine oil more than blood?

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Why I chose to become a doctor? I can't say it was any sort of lofty calling. It's just that, you know, OUR kind... we don't exactly have the brightest prospects. But it turned out my skills were actually in surprisingly high demand, so... I just went with the flow.

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_171_bldsk.text: How do we fight the urge to feed? We actually have a course that helps us control our desires. And we've invented artificial blood, so we drink that if we need. We can be very resourceful, you know.

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_171_bldsk.text: This is the standard procedure. It's the same for everyone getting blood drawn. Don't move, Doctor. Ah... blood... your blood... it smells delicious... It's just… it's just… captivating...

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_171_bldsk.text: Replenishing saline solution! Changing filters! Sterilizing sand and charcoal canisters... all done! Doctor, you'd better keep your medical supplies well-maintained. As Dr. Kal'tsit said, when your kidneys give out, these machines are going to save your life... aw, come on, just kidding.

char_171_bldsk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_171_bldsk.text: Fine, fine, I'll come clean... I have tasted lots of blood of many different types from all different races. And I do enjoy the subtle differences in flavor, okay? In fact, the only type of blood I've never tasted is... yours, Doctor. Heheh...

char_171_bldsk.title: Idle
char_171_bldsk.text: Hm? So you still have time to sleep? I'm jealous.

char_171_bldsk.title: Onboard
char_171_bldsk.text: I am Warfarin, the blood-scientist-slash-doctor. Besides typical healing Arts, I also bring you specialized medical treatments, courtesy of my remarkable expertise in hematology and plentiful experience. Anyway, look forward to working with you.

char_171_bldsk.title: Watching Battle Record
char_171_bldsk.text: Hm, my work efficiency seems to have improved.

char_171_bldsk.title: Promotion 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Are you even listening? We're having trouble collecting rare blood types for the emergency blood bank. So—what? What did you say? A promotion? Now?

char_171_bldsk.title: Promotion 2
char_171_bldsk.text: This only means more work for me, right? Ha, I saw that a mile away! I'm an expert in this field after all. Don't worry, I am well prepared!

char_171_bldsk.title: Added to Squad
char_171_bldsk.text: Wait, I need to prepare my equipment first.

char_171_bldsk.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_171_bldsk.text: A leader reports only to you, right?

char_171_bldsk.title: Depart
char_171_bldsk.text: My equipment is ready. We can start any time.

char_171_bldsk.title: Begin Operation
char_171_bldsk.text: I don't have the leisure for enemy intel at the moment. Taking care of our operators has already occupied my whole schedule...

char_171_bldsk.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Go ahead.

char_171_bldsk.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_171_bldsk.text: Medical equipment set.

char_171_bldsk.title: Deployment 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Call for help immediately if you're injured!

char_171_bldsk.title: Deployment 2
char_171_bldsk.text: Commence treatment.

char_171_bldsk.title: In Battle 1
char_171_bldsk.text: Ready for blood transfusion!

char_171_bldsk.title: In Battle 2
char_171_bldsk.text: Get the hemostat!

char_171_bldsk.title: In Battle 3
char_171_bldsk.text: First aid here, take it!

char_171_bldsk.title: In Battle 4
char_171_bldsk.text: I'll be right there!

char_171_bldsk.title: 4-star Result
char_171_bldsk.text: It's really nerve-wracking being in the medic squad. Support troops are really under lots of pressure! Good thing I'm already used to it.

char_171_bldsk.title: 3-star Result
char_171_bldsk.text: The battlefield is a place of tragedy. I hope they come to understand this one day.

char_171_bldsk.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_171_bldsk.text: Forget about those fleeing enemies at the moment, our priority now is to help the injured.

char_171_bldsk.title: Operation Failure
char_171_bldsk.text: I am sorry, we've even ran out reserve medicine…

char_171_bldsk.title: Assigned to Facility
char_171_bldsk.text: I guess I'm more accustomed to figuring things out myself...

char_171_bldsk.title: Tap
char_171_bldsk.text: Huh? What are you doing?

char_171_bldsk.title: Trust Tap
char_171_bldsk.text: Doctor, isn't it almost time for your annual checkup?

char_171_bldsk.title: Title
char_171_bldsk.text: Arknights.

char_171_bldsk.title: Greeting
char_171_bldsk.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_002_amiya.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_002_amiya.text: You work so hard, Doctor.

char_002_amiya.title: Talk 1
char_002_amiya.text: Dr. Kal'tsit told me you have to be 100% focused on your work to maximize efficiency. So... yes, that's what I'm gonna do!

char_002_amiya.title: Talk 2
char_002_amiya.text: Rhodes Island has achieved cruising speed, Doctor. Would you mind sorting out the navigation log for me?

char_002_amiya.title: Talk 3
char_002_amiya.text: I still have a lot to learn as leader of Rhodes Island. I hope you'll be there to guide me on our path to the future.

char_002_amiya.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_002_amiya.text: Maybe it's just wishful thinking, but I hope Rhodes Island can be like a second home to everyone.

char_002_amiya.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_002_amiya.text: Making it this far has cost us so much. Sometimes, I can't help but ask myself... is it really worth it?

char_002_amiya.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_002_amiya.text: Sometimes I remember where I came from... It was cold, and the air smelled of rusted copper. Rhodes Island is a cozy place in comparison. I'll do everything I can to protect our home.

char_002_amiya.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_002_amiya.text: Hehe… Dr. {@nickname}, let me tell you something: I picked up the violin again.

char_002_amiya.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_002_amiya.text: We've still got a long, long way to go, Doctor. This might be a journey without an end, but as long as you're with me, we'll be okay.

char_002_amiya.title: Idle
char_002_amiya.text: There's still lots of work that needs to be done, Doctor. We can't afford to have you resting.

char_002_amiya.title: Onboard
char_002_amiya.text: I'm so glad you're back, Doctor. Now we can walk this path together, me with you, and you with me.

char_002_amiya.title: Watching Battle Record
char_002_amiya.text: I see... thank you, Doctor! I've learned so much from you.

char_002_amiya.title: Promotion 1
char_002_amiya.text: I'm so excited to fight by your side again, Doctor!

char_002_amiya.title: Promotion 2
char_002_amiya.text: What I saw that day... the despair stuck in my throat, hopelessly trying to scream... I want to bury it all deep inside my mind and never let it out…

char_002_amiya.title: Added to Squad
char_002_amiya.text: Got it.

char_002_amiya.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_002_amiya.text: I won't let you down.

char_002_amiya.title: Depart
char_002_amiya.text: Operation commencing!

char_002_amiya.title: Begin Operation
char_002_amiya.text: Incoming! Get ready, everyone!

char_002_amiya.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_002_amiya.text: Here.

char_002_amiya.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_002_amiya.text: I'm right here, Doctor.

char_002_amiya.title: Deployment 1
char_002_amiya.text: Got it!

char_002_amiya.title: Deployment 2
char_002_amiya.text: Roger.

char_002_amiya.title: In Battle 1
char_002_amiya.text: I know what you're thinking.

char_002_amiya.title: In Battle 2
char_002_amiya.text: Everyone believes in me...

char_002_amiya.title: In Battle 3
char_002_amiya.text: Are you afraid of me?

char_002_amiya.title: In Battle 4
char_002_amiya.text: I hear... someone crying?

char_002_amiya.title: 4-star Result
char_002_amiya.text: No matter how difficult the mission, we can handle it as long as you're here, Doctor. I've never doubted you.

char_002_amiya.title: 3-star Result
char_002_amiya.text: We may have achieved a perfect victory, but we still can't let our guard down.

char_002_amiya.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_002_amiya.text: Well done, Doctor! You must be exhausted. Be sure to rest when you need it.

char_002_amiya.title: Operation Failure
char_002_amiya.text: I'm fine... Get it together, everyone!

char_002_amiya.title: Assigned to Facility
char_002_amiya.text: You want something to drink, Doctor?

char_002_amiya.title: Tap
char_002_amiya.text: Huh? Doctor?

char_002_amiya.title: Trust Tap
char_002_amiya.text: Ehehe...

char_002_amiya.title: Title
char_002_amiya.text: Arknights.

char_002_amiya.title: Greeting
char_002_amiya.text: Welcome home, Doctor!

char_110_deepcl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_110_deepcl.text: Good morning, Doctor. Can I paint a portrait of you? And don't worry, I'll try not to... bring it to life. Besides, it's not like I can bring everything to life, you know.

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk 1
char_110_deepcl.text: Maybe I wasn't supposed to appear here?…

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk 2
char_110_deepcl.text: Doctor... what color are you, reflected in my eyes?

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk 3
char_110_deepcl.text: There are lots of fun, creative things here at Rhodes Island. I'm feeling inspired…

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_110_deepcl.text: See my lovely 'assistants'? Hehe… What? You think they're scary? But, but they're so cute!

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_110_deepcl.text: Heh, so these are the colors of your soul…? Alright then, look at me. And paint me in those colors, your colors.

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_110_deepcl.text: That's right. Even if no one understands me, I'll keep making art. No matter what kinds of monsters my works might become…

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_110_deepcl.text: We artists are a unique breed… We spend at least thirty days a month stuck in a rut, thinking all our work is trash. And we only make any progress when inspiration strikes after midnight.

char_110_deepcl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_110_deepcl.text: In the end, the mottled world sleeps peacefully in the dark depths—Yes, that's the true color of the ocean. Black is the only color you see? Looks like I still have more to share with you…

char_110_deepcl.title: Idle
char_110_deepcl.text: Are you... dreaming? Is the world in your dreams as colorful as the beings of this world, Doctor…?

char_110_deepcl.title: Onboard
char_110_deepcl.text: I'm Deepcolor, a painter. Yes, just a 'painter', nothing more.

char_110_deepcl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_110_deepcl.text: What's this unsettling feeling...?

char_110_deepcl.title: Promotion 1
char_110_deepcl.text: Um, could you just... stop caring about me? If you keep treating me so well... I-I don't know what I might become…

char_110_deepcl.title: Promotion 2
char_110_deepcl.text: Thank you, Doctor. Now, let's complete this work of art, shall we?

char_110_deepcl.title: Added to Squad
char_110_deepcl.text: You're sending me to fight? Seriously?!

char_110_deepcl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_110_deepcl.text: I can't lead so many people.

char_110_deepcl.title: Depart
char_110_deepcl.text: Do your best, everyone!

char_110_deepcl.title: Begin Operation
char_110_deepcl.text: Is that who we're fighting?!

char_110_deepcl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_110_deepcl.text: Me?

char_110_deepcl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_110_deepcl.text: What do I do?

char_110_deepcl.title: Deployment 1
char_110_deepcl.text: Scumble-scumble...

char_110_deepcl.title: Deployment 2
char_110_deepcl.text: Aww, I just need a minute!

char_110_deepcl.title: In Battle 1
char_110_deepcl.text: No need to rush.

char_110_deepcl.title: In Battle 2
char_110_deepcl.text: Let's take it slow.

char_110_deepcl.title: In Battle 3
char_110_deepcl.text: You'll have to get past my 'assistants' first.

char_110_deepcl.title: In Battle 4
char_110_deepcl.text: Can you defeat my little ones?

char_110_deepcl.title: 4-star Result
char_110_deepcl.text: If you really make me mad... you won't like what happens next.

char_110_deepcl.title: 3-star Result
char_110_deepcl.text: Let me sketch these triumphant heroes.

char_110_deepcl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_110_deepcl.text: Aw, got my clothes dirty again...

char_110_deepcl.title: Operation Failure
char_110_deepcl.text: If only battles were like sketches. I'd just erase that one and redo it…

char_110_deepcl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_110_deepcl.text: This room's got a nice design.

char_110_deepcl.title: Tap
char_110_deepcl.text: Hm?

char_110_deepcl.title: Trust Tap
char_110_deepcl.text: Doctor, since we happen to have some time off, want to see my latest work?

char_110_deepcl.title: Title
char_110_deepcl.text: Arknights.

char_110_deepcl.title: Greeting
char_110_deepcl.text: Good morning, Doctor.

char_166_skfire.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_166_skfire.text: The fire alarm's gone off? Sorry, it was only me passing by your office. My body temperature must've sailed too high again.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk 1
char_166_skfire.text: There's no language that's impossible to learn, no Arts that are impossible to understand. Isn't that the plain and simple truth? ...What? I'm the exception to the rule, you say?

char_166_skfire.title: Talk 2
char_166_skfire.text: My life plans...? Tch, everything was going swimmingly until that dreadful attack. But after Reunion murdered Phil, their eradication jumped to the top of my to-do list.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk 3
char_166_skfire.text: Rhodes Island's methods aren't nearly tough enough. All they'll do is drag King's Wand down.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_166_skfire.text: Can you talk to Amiya for me? Poor girl, her kind heart clouds her judgment. As far as I'm concerned, total annihilation is the only fitting end for the wicked.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_166_skfire.text: Your current skills wouldn't compare to even the average level of a King's Wand member such as myself. Ha, yes, I'm powerful... and the power of all five of us put together... words wouldn't even begin to describe.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_166_skfire.text: Luminarie's blade was a gift from Shiro. I heard that the owner before Shiro was a swordmaster who could fell all the cherry blossoms of Higashi with a single swing. But even that legendary swordmaster was no match for Shiro, and had to surrender the blade.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_166_skfire.text: What happened to your shirt? What? I burned a hole in it? But... impossible... my self-control is impeccable, don't you think...? I... well, I'm sorry. Really, truly sorry.

char_166_skfire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_166_skfire.text: We might be on opposite ends of the spectrum when it comes to ideals, but I do enjoy seeing the people of Rhodes Island sweat away with bright hopes for the future. Yes, that is a compliment. It's a heartwarming sight.

char_166_skfire.title: Idle
char_166_skfire.text: How lazy. You think it's fine to just sleep here and while away the precious day?

char_166_skfire.title: Onboard
char_166_skfire.text: I am Skyfire of King's Wand. I will remain at Rhodes Island until my objective is accomplished. What's my objective, you ask? To burn every last Reunion thug to ashes, of course.

char_166_skfire.title: Watching Battle Record
char_166_skfire.text: This is no way to go about unleashing my true power.

char_166_skfire.title: Promotion 1
char_166_skfire.text: Naturally.

char_166_skfire.title: Promotion 2
char_166_skfire.text: Ha. Enjoying the privileges I deserve from time to time is a good way to relax.

char_166_skfire.title: Added to Squad
char_166_skfire.text: This battlefield needs some heating up.

char_166_skfire.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_166_skfire.text: The rays of the sun are my shield.

char_166_skfire.title: Depart
char_166_skfire.text: Now's the time to attack.

char_166_skfire.title: Begin Operation
char_166_skfire.text: Kneel before the flame of the heavens.

char_166_skfire.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_166_skfire.text: Out with it.

char_166_skfire.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_166_skfire.text: What are your plans?

char_166_skfire.title: Deployment 1
char_166_skfire.text: Bad luck is always in waiting for the weak.

char_166_skfire.title: Deployment 2
char_166_skfire.text: The wise alway take the initiative.

char_166_skfire.title: In Battle 1
char_166_skfire.text: Here we go!

char_166_skfire.title: In Battle 2
char_166_skfire.text: Fire! Blaze! Inferno!

char_166_skfire.title: In Battle 3
char_166_skfire.text: May the flames of the sun devour you!

char_166_skfire.title: In Battle 4
char_166_skfire.text: May the rays of the skies set you ablaze!

char_166_skfire.title: 4-star Result
char_166_skfire.text: There isn't a soul who may survive the sunflame.

char_166_skfire.title: 3-star Result
char_166_skfire.text: Pathetic... you're nothing but ashes now. Were you hoping to leave a trace behind?

char_166_skfire.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_166_skfire.text: Is that it? I had  higher expectations.

char_166_skfire.title: Operation Failure
char_166_skfire.text: Impossible... how could I...

char_166_skfire.title: Assigned to Facility
char_166_skfire.text: Couldn't you ready a slightly cooler room for me?

char_166_skfire.title: Tap
char_166_skfire.text: Are you trying to get your hand burnt?

char_166_skfire.title: Trust Tap
char_166_skfire.text: Doctor, could you explain this theory to me? I'll need twelve minutes of your time, that's all.

char_166_skfire.title: Title
char_166_skfire.text: Arknights.

char_166_skfire.title: Greeting
char_166_skfire.text: How are you doing today, Doctor?

char_240_wyvern.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_240_wyvern.text: Awaiting your orders, Doctor.

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk 1
char_240_wyvern.text: The two seniors from the BPRS squad are here too? In that case... Could you assign me to their squards in future missions, Doctor?

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk 2
char_240_wyvern.text: Huff... huff... three more sets of physical training and I'll be half-done for today. Doctor... please... fetch my water bottle for me...

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk 3
char_240_wyvern.text: You want to know about my hometown? My hometown… it's a cruel wilderness. Even survival itself is a difficult feat there. Compared to that, Rhodes Island is like heaven.

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_240_wyvern.text: I've become stronger than when I was an intern for Blacksteel.

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_240_wyvern.text: The 22nd rule of Blacksteel: 'Anyone who loses her weapon no longer belongs here.' That's why I always bring my hellebarde with me wherever I go. The rule doesn't apply to everyday situations, you say? But... if I remember correctly... wait, let me check. 'This rule only applies to contracted Operators and new recruits under training.' What?... Ms. Franka didn't tell me about this part...

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_240_wyvern.text: Instructor Dobermann's really got a heart of stone! Why choose me other than anyone elase to deal with all those live Originium slugs? I... I just can't!

char_240_wyvern.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_240_wyvern.text: I think I know now why Franka and Liskarm decided to stay at Rhodes Island. Compared to Blacksteel, this is a place we can call home. There's lots of fun things to do here besides the missions...

char_240_wyvern.title: Idle
char_240_wyvern.text: Shh, the Doctor's having a rest now. Keep your volume down, would you?

char_240_wyvern.title: Onboard
char_240_wyvern.text: I'm Vanilla, trainee Operator from Blacksteel. Looking forward to learning from you, Doctor.

char_240_wyvern.title: Watching Battle Record
char_240_wyvern.text: It's time to organize my notes. I need to digest what I've just learned.

char_240_wyvern.title: Promotion 1
char_240_wyvern.text: A promotion medal? For me? My-my sincerest gratitude!

char_240_wyvern.title: Added to Squad
char_240_wyvern.text: I'm here to help everyone!

char_240_wyvern.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_240_wyvern.text: Me, the leader? Are you sure about that?

char_240_wyvern.title: Depart
char_240_wyvern.text: I'll work even harder.

char_240_wyvern.title: Begin Operation
char_240_wyvern.text: I will not bring shame to Blacksteel!

char_240_wyvern.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_240_wyvern.text: Hmm?

char_240_wyvern.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_240_wyvern.text: Your words are my command.

char_240_wyvern.title: Deployment 1
char_240_wyvern.text: Okay!

char_240_wyvern.title: Deployment 2
char_240_wyvern.text: Understood.

char_240_wyvern.title: In Battle 1
char_240_wyvern.text: You shall not pass!

char_240_wyvern.title: In Battle 2
char_240_wyvern.text: This hellebarde isn't just for show!

char_240_wyvern.title: In Battle 3
char_240_wyvern.text: Battles aren't always won by the most experienced!

char_240_wyvern.title: In Battle 4
char_240_wyvern.text: Take that!

char_240_wyvern.title: 4-star Result
char_240_wyvern.text: Whew, perfect victory!

char_240_wyvern.title: 3-star Result
char_240_wyvern.text: A very successful operation.

char_240_wyvern.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_240_wyvern.text: If we worked a bit harder, we could have done better.

char_240_wyvern.title: Operation Failure
char_240_wyvern.text: I... I'm still not strong enough...

char_240_wyvern.title: Assigned to Facility
char_240_wyvern.text: At your service.

char_240_wyvern.title: Tap
char_240_wyvern.text: Huh?

char_240_wyvern.title: Trust Tap
char_240_wyvern.text: Doctor, would you like to dine with me tonight?

char_240_wyvern.title: Title
char_240_wyvern.text: Arknights.

char_240_wyvern.title: Greeting
char_240_wyvern.text: Morning, Doctor.

char_236_rope.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_236_rope.text: Doc~tor~, you didn't forget anything, did you?

char_236_rope.title: Talk 1
char_236_rope.text: Picking pockets to feed myself? Yeah, that was how I grew up. I didn't exactly have a choice. I woulda starved to death otherwise.

char_236_rope.title: Talk 2
char_236_rope.text: If you want sturdy grappling hooks, the key thing's a good rope. Hm? Why do I like my hook so much? Well, go scale a building with your bare hands and you'll see.

char_236_rope.title: Talk 3
char_236_rope.text: Fine, fine, your word's the word, Doctor. Can I go back to my room now? I've got stuff coming up. What? Still no? C'mooon, cut me some slack! Pleasie please?

char_236_rope.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_236_rope.text: If it wasn't you Rhodes Island, I'd probably still be rotting in jail. Say, how'd you find me anyway? Hmm… Maybe you heard about my skill through the grapevine?

char_236_rope.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_236_rope.text: There's lots of ways if you wanna survive in the slums, though more people simply die without a way at all. Never had much of a choice myself. Hope you can understand, Doctor.

char_236_rope.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_236_rope.text: My parents kicked me out, and I had to fend for myself on the streets. Compared to my days in the gutter, life at Rhodes Island is a massive improvement.

char_236_rope.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_236_rope.text: Saw a lot of people get same disease as mine who didn't end well. I kinda gave up on myself too, until I got lucky enough to be found by you guys… Tell me straight, Doctor. You can cure me, right? You...you can't? *Sigh*, I can live with that, I guess.

char_236_rope.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_236_rope.text: Before, I was always looking for the next meal. Now I can really eat my fill. Gotta hand it to you, Rhodes Island's alright in my book. Huh? You wanna hear me say 'thank you'? Nah-ah, in, your, dreams. *Gasp*, I just said it...

char_236_rope.title: Idle
char_236_rope.text: Ugh, this chair... ahhh….dangit... so comfy...!

char_236_rope.title: Onboard
char_236_rope.text: The name's Rope, nice to meet ya. Oh, here's your ID card, don't forget it. Huh? Why do I have it? That's a se-cret!

char_236_rope.title: Watching Battle Record
char_236_rope.text: Does watching this stuff actually help?

char_236_rope.title: Promotion 1
char_236_rope.text: C'mon, lets talk about payment. Promotions are cool, but my salary is what really matters.

char_236_rope.title: Promotion 2
char_236_rope.text: Fine, fine. Now that I've got my due, I guess I should give my best.

char_236_rope.title: Added to Squad
char_236_rope.text: All right, coming!

char_236_rope.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_236_rope.text: I'm doing captain biz? I would've asked for a bonus usually, but I can let this slide since it's you.

char_236_rope.title: Depart
char_236_rope.text: Look at the map and figure out your route before we get in there. This is experience talking.

char_236_rope.title: Begin Operation
char_236_rope.text: So, what kind of good stuff will our enemies be carrying today?

char_236_rope.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_236_rope.text: I don't really do straight-up fights.

char_236_rope.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_236_rope.text: Put me to good use, ooo-kaaay?

char_236_rope.title: Deployment 1
char_236_rope.text: Sneaky sneaky…

char_236_rope.title: Deployment 2
char_236_rope.text: Hmm, is this a good spot?

char_236_rope.title: In Battle 1
char_236_rope.text: Aha!

char_236_rope.title: In Battle 2
char_236_rope.text: Good, good, a little closer!

char_236_rope.title: In Battle 3
char_236_rope.text: Huuugh!

char_236_rope.title: In Battle 4
char_236_rope.text: Once I hook you, you're not getting away.

char_236_rope.title: 4-star Result
char_236_rope.text: A lot more excitement on that one than usual! A lot more profit too... whoo-hoo~!

char_236_rope.title: 3-star Result
char_236_rope.text: It'd be a waste to leave all that good stuff here. The enemies don't need them anyway, right?

char_236_rope.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_236_rope.text: Some of 'em got away? Just leave them be. They might turn over a new leaf, who knows.

char_236_rope.title: Operation Failure
char_236_rope.text: Hey! Let's just bug out now, Doctor! We must save ourselves first!

char_236_rope.title: Assigned to Facility
char_236_rope.text: Is there an air vent in this room? Nothing, just curious.

char_236_rope.title: Tap
char_236_rope.text: Aaaagh! Am I under arrest?!

char_236_rope.title: Trust Tap
char_236_rope.text: I mean, I'd like to figure out how a normal girl lives sometime... but, you know... I mean, maybe that's not really me?

char_236_rope.title: Title
char_236_rope.text: Arknights.

char_236_rope.title: Greeting
char_236_rope.text: Hiiii, Doctor.

char_237_gravel.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_237_gravel.text: Aaaahhh! You want me to stay by your side? I can barely keep my heart in my chest!

char_237_gravel.title: Talk 1
char_237_gravel.text: Fascinating...

char_237_gravel.title: Talk 2
char_237_gravel.text: Don't mind me, just continue with your work.

char_237_gravel.title: Talk 3
char_237_gravel.text: Hmm? What am I looking at? Why, you, of course!

char_237_gravel.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_237_gravel.text: If that's what you ask, Doctor, I will do what it takes to become stronger.

char_237_gravel.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_237_gravel.text: Heheh... You don't need to worry about any ambushes or assassination attempts. Because I'll aaalways be here with you.

char_237_gravel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_237_gravel.text: Are you finally... a little bit interested in me now? Well, I've always been a big bit interested in you.

char_237_gravel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_237_gravel.text: Thanks for taking such good care of me these days. By my knighthood of Kazimierz, I hereby pledge to repay your kindness with my life—huh? You're not used to me talking this way? But I'm an honest-to-goodness knight. Surely I can improvise a speech or two.

char_237_gravel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_237_gravel.text: Ever since I was taken away to Kazimierz, it's rare for someone to be so kind to me. So, if you don't mind, Doctor... I, Gravel—no, I Senomy, on my honor as a knight, shall serve you always at your side.

char_237_gravel.title: Idle
char_237_gravel.text: When I'm here with you, don't you feel your heart racing?

char_237_gravel.title: Onboard
char_237_gravel.text: Mmmwah. Hm? What's wrong? Your face is beet red. That's just how I say hello. Don't think too much about it. Anyway, I'm Gravel, a knight of Kazimierz. It's a pleasure. Heheh.

char_237_gravel.title: Watching Battle Record
char_237_gravel.text: Are you the one who comes up with all the Rhodes Island's battle tactics, Doctor? Oh~ that's even more intriguing.

char_237_gravel.title: Promotion 1
char_237_gravel.text: You think I'm doing well, Doctor? Yaay!

char_237_gravel.title: Promotion 2
char_237_gravel.text: This means you need me, doesn't it? Heheh.

char_237_gravel.title: Added to Squad
char_237_gravel.text: You want to go together? Hehe...

char_237_gravel.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_237_gravel.text: Oh~ You chose me!

char_237_gravel.title: Depart
char_237_gravel.text: I'll come with you~

char_237_gravel.title: Begin Operation
char_237_gravel.text: Hehehe...

char_237_gravel.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_237_gravel.text: Hmm?

char_237_gravel.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_237_gravel.text: Any orders for me?

char_237_gravel.title: Deployment 1
char_237_gravel.text: This is the place~

char_237_gravel.title: Deployment 2
char_237_gravel.text: Surely a good spot.

char_237_gravel.title: In Battle 1
char_237_gravel.text: I am your shadow.

char_237_gravel.title: In Battle 2
char_237_gravel.text: hehe...

char_237_gravel.title: In Battle 3
char_237_gravel.text: You really think you'll get away?

char_237_gravel.title: In Battle 4
char_237_gravel.text: Gather up, my rats!

char_237_gravel.title: 4-star Result
char_237_gravel.text: Of course the Doctor's tactics are flawless~

char_237_gravel.title: 3-star Result
char_237_gravel.text: My blade hasn't even been stained red yet... hehe...

char_237_gravel.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_237_gravel.text: Run all you like, Let's see how far you can get.

char_237_gravel.title: Operation Failure
char_237_gravel.text: Sorry... did I... mess up again...?

char_237_gravel.title: Assigned to Facility
char_237_gravel.text: Hmm, looks like there's a lot of good hiding places here in this room~

char_237_gravel.title: Tap
char_237_gravel.text: hehe...

char_237_gravel.title: Trust Tap
char_237_gravel.text: Yes. I'm right here, always and forever.

char_237_gravel.title: Title
char_237_gravel.text: Arknights.

char_237_gravel.title: Greeting
char_237_gravel.text: How are you today, Doctor?

char_286_cast3.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_286_cast3.text: Thank you for choosing Castle-3! I am honored to serve as your assistant, Doctor.

char_286_cast3.title: Talk 1
char_286_cast3.text: Doctor, please do not be intimidated by my appearance. My sturdy metal shell, modified by Master Closure herself, will make you invincible on the battlefield.

char_286_cast3.title: Talk 2
char_286_cast3.text: Warning: be careful not to strike my case too hard. It may damage me.

char_286_cast3.title: Talk 3
char_286_cast3.text: The topography in the wild may be treacherous, but Castle-3 is fitted with an engine with outstanding performance and a 4WD mode, to whisk you away from danger.

char_286_cast3.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_286_cast3.text: Doctor, if your life is ever in danger, just summon Castle-3! Castle-3 was created specifically for combat purposes. I am a top-class defensive warfighting robot.

char_286_cast3.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_286_cast3.text: Castle-3 is honored to be at your side. Doctor, should you require me to strike down your foes, I shall go through heaven and hell to see it done!

char_286_cast3.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_286_cast3.text: Castle-3's official manager is 'Master Closure,'but please understand that you are even more important to Castle-3 than Master is, in most cases. I am your devoted, trustworthy battle companion!

char_286_cast3.title: Idle
char_286_cast3.text: Entering sleep mode. Press any button to wake.

char_286_cast3.title: Onboard
char_286_cast3.text: Hello, Doctor. Thank you for choosing Castle-3. Tap anywhere to initialize startup options.

char_286_cast3.title: Watching Battle Record
char_286_cast3.text: Firmware upgrade complete. Restart required. Please click anywhere to restart.

char_286_cast3.title: Added to Squad
char_286_cast3.text: Device scan complete. All communications working as normal. Castle-3 is on standby, awaiting your orders.

char_286_cast3.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_286_cast3.text: Understood. Castle-3 is your best choice, Doctor, to lead a squad against enemy formations!

char_286_cast3.title: Depart
char_286_cast3.text: Next, Castle-3 will show you its true power as an industrial battle platform!

char_286_cast3.title: Begin Operation
char_286_cast3.text: Enemy unit located. Ready for attack.

char_286_cast3.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_286_cast3.text: Castle-3, awaiting orders.

char_286_cast3.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_286_cast3.text: Castle-3, ready and waiting.

char_286_cast3.title: Deployment 1
char_286_cast3.text: Order received.

char_286_cast3.title: Deployment 2
char_286_cast3.text: Understood.

char_286_cast3.title: In Battle 1
char_286_cast3.text: Show me what you've got!

char_286_cast3.title: In Battle 2
char_286_cast3.text: Enemies, you are forbidden to advance.

char_286_cast3.title: In Battle 3
char_286_cast3.text: Count up your sins!

char_286_cast3.title: In Battle 4
char_286_cast3.text: Doctor, that was at last a worthy opponent!

char_286_cast3.title: 4-star Result
char_286_cast3.text: Well done, Doctor. Castle-3 is your best choice on the path of justice!

char_286_cast3.title: 3-star Result
char_286_cast3.text: What an exciting battle! Let's fight together again next time.

char_286_cast3.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_286_cast3.text: Is everyone all right? I hope Castle-3's performance has exceeded your expectations.

char_286_cast3.title: Operation Failure
char_286_cast3.text: I will hold up the rear. Everyone, retreat!

char_286_cast3.title: Assigned to Facility
char_286_cast3.text: Is there anything Castle-3 can help with?

char_286_cast3.title: Tap
char_286_cast3.text: Please be gentle, Doctor!

char_286_cast3.title: Trust Tap
char_286_cast3.text: Doctor, would you like to grab a drink together? I might not be able to actually have a drink, but I can still treat you to one. It is fine, Master Closure will pay.

char_286_cast3.title: Title
char_286_cast3.text: Arknights.

char_286_cast3.title: Greeting
char_286_cast3.text: Lovely weather today, Doctor!

char_285_medic2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_285_medic2.text: Do you require medical assistance, Doctor? But, you look quite well…?

char_285_medic2.title: Talk 1
char_285_medic2.text: Doctor, you have been working far too late these days. Please get adequate rest, or Dr. Kal'tsit may give you an earful again…

char_285_medic2.title: Talk 2
char_285_medic2.text: Are you feeling unwell? I could give you a medical examination, if you wish.

char_285_medic2.title: Talk 3
char_285_medic2.text: You've worked hard, Doctor. How would you like a cup of coffee? Actually, I've always wanted to try coffee... but... I can't drink… Anyway, I am also satisfied watching you enjoy yours.

char_285_medic2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_285_medic2.text: I've printed out the results of the routine blood test you just did. All indicators are normal. But Doctor, your blood appears to be very unique…

char_285_medic2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_285_medic2.text: What do I like? I like 'lovely Ms. Closure.' Why, you ask? Uh... I'm not sure either... It's been my default setting ever since the first time Ms. Closure switched me on…

char_285_medic2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_285_medic2.text: I am only useful when healing the sick or injured. But as long as you're healthy, as long as I get to be by your side, I'm okay with being totally useless. I'll still feel calm and satisfied.

char_285_medic2.title: Idle
char_285_medic2.text: Doctor, unbeknownst to you, I recorded your snoring just now. Your sleep quality is normal. The length of your REM sleep cycle is—

char_285_medic2.title: Onboard
char_285_medic2.text: Hi, nice to meet you, Doctor. I understand that you want me to say something more interesting, but I'm afraid I cannot do so. Because I'm just a medical robot…

char_285_medic2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_285_medic2.text: Firmware upgrade complete. Restart required. Please click anywhere to restart.

char_285_medic2.title: Added to Squad
char_285_medic2.text: Medical supplies: confirmed. Battery charge: confirmed. Ready for deployment.

char_285_medic2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_285_medic2.text: Doctor, I'm pretty cumbersome. There's not much I can do besides providing emergency treatment and healing... Are you sure you still want me to be the captain?

char_285_medic2.title: Depart
char_285_medic2.text: Moving out. Everyone, please be safe.

char_285_medic2.title: Begin Operation
char_285_medic2.text: Be careful, everyone. Leave the first aid to me.

char_285_medic2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_285_medic2.text: Do you need medical attention?

char_285_medic2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_285_medic2.text: Ready to operate.

char_285_medic2.title: Deployment 1
char_285_medic2.text: Affirmative.

char_285_medic2.title: Deployment 2
char_285_medic2.text: Roger that.

char_285_medic2.title: In Battle 1
char_285_medic2.text: Commencing treatment.

char_285_medic2.title: In Battle 2
char_285_medic2.text: Initiating first aid.

char_285_medic2.title: In Battle 3
char_285_medic2.text: Analgesic deployed.

char_285_medic2.title: In Battle 4
char_285_medic2.text: Equipment sterilized. Ready for treatment.

char_285_medic2.title: 4-star Result
char_285_medic2.text: With every battle, we suffer even more casualties. When will humans finally stop hurting each other?

char_285_medic2.title: 3-star Result
char_285_medic2.text: Well done, Doctor. That was a tough battle. Um, the enemies do not look well. Can I treat them too?

char_285_medic2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_285_medic2.text: Is everyone okay? Please hold still, I'll perform first aid.

char_285_medic2.title: Operation Failure
char_285_medic2.text: Don't worry, we've successfully retreated. I will clean your wounds now. It might hurt, please be brave.

char_285_medic2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_285_medic2.text: Lovely Ms. Closure' told me that you need help here.

char_285_medic2.title: Tap
char_285_medic2.text: Ahhh...

char_285_medic2.title: Trust Tap
char_285_medic2.text: I asked 'lovely Ms. Closure' to change 'what I like the most' to you, Doctor. But she refused to do it...

char_285_medic2.title: Title
char_285_medic2.text: Arknights.

char_285_medic2.title: Greeting
char_285_medic2.text: Welcome back, Doctor. You are in good condition. Please keep it up.

char_192_falco.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_192_falco.text: Don't worry, Doctor. No matter what happens, I'll protect you.

char_192_falco.title: Talk 1
char_192_falco.text: Liberi have excellent eyesight. According to legend, some can even tell one droplet from another in a rainstorm. Sounds incredible, huh?

char_192_falco.title: Talk 2
char_192_falco.text: I take everyday life too seriously? My apologies. I think that comes from my time serving as a Laterano Guard. I'll work on that in the future.

char_192_falco.title: Talk 3
char_192_falco.text: To most Lateranos, heavy armor doesn't serve much of a purpose. Of course, when we perform the large-scale rituals of our homeland, we do dress up in ceremonial garb.

char_192_falco.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_192_falco.text: I appreciate your faith in my abilities, Doctor. I won't let you down.

char_192_falco.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_192_falco.text: Right... I submitted a request to the HR office... to become your personal bodyguard. I guess maybe I miss my old job too much.

char_192_falco.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_192_falco.text: I grew up in Laterano and didn't really have the chance to learn about other cultures. Here at Rhodes Island, I get to see such diversity, way beyond my imagination. Actually...it's not so bad.

char_192_falco.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_192_falco.text: I have no regrets. Yes, true, they did drag me out of Laterano against my will... but this has been a great adventure. I've enjoyed it.

char_192_falco.title: Idle
char_192_falco.text: It is my duty to protect you, Doctor. Rest assured.

char_192_falco.title: Onboard
char_192_falco.text: My name is Plume, formerly of the Pontifica Cohors Lateran. I will be your sword, and your wings, as I defend your very life.

char_192_falco.title: Watching Battle Record
char_192_falco.text: Ah, so tactics can help you overcome a more skilled opponent, huh?

char_192_falco.title: Promotion 1
char_192_falco.text: Thank you, Doctor. As your bodyguard, your approval is the best reward I can ask for.

char_192_falco.title: Added to Squad
char_192_falco.text: I'm ready.

char_192_falco.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_192_falco.text: As the leader, it's my responsibility to keep everyone safe.

char_192_falco.title: Depart
char_192_falco.text: Watch the friendlies!

char_192_falco.title: Begin Operation
char_192_falco.text: Keep your guard up!

char_192_falco.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_192_falco.text: Hmm?

char_192_falco.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_192_falco.text: Got it.

char_192_falco.title: Deployment 1
char_192_falco.text: Ready for overwatch.

char_192_falco.title: Deployment 2
char_192_falco.text: Understood!

char_192_falco.title: In Battle 1
char_192_falco.text: You think you're faster than me?

char_192_falco.title: In Battle 2
char_192_falco.text: No move can escape my sight!

char_192_falco.title: In Battle 3
char_192_falco.text: My resolve lies with my spear!

char_192_falco.title: In Battle 4
char_192_falco.text: I fight for the glory of Laterano!

char_192_falco.title: 4-star Result
char_192_falco.text: Nothing can hold me back.

char_192_falco.title: 3-star Result
char_192_falco.text: Like a wave crashing against an immovable stone, isn't it?

char_192_falco.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_192_falco.text: Regroup! I'll look out for the remaining enemies!

char_192_falco.title: Operation Failure
char_192_falco.text: I can't... fall... yet!

char_192_falco.title: Assigned to Facility
char_192_falco.text: Should I patrol this area?

char_192_falco.title: Tap
char_192_falco.text: Anything over there?

char_192_falco.title: Trust Tap
char_192_falco.text: Doctor... it feels like I'm abusing my position...

char_192_falco.title: Title
char_192_falco.text: Arknights.

char_192_falco.title: Greeting
char_192_falco.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_278_orchid.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_278_orchid.text: I'll make the arrangements. Just leave it to me.

char_278_orchid.title: Talk 1
char_278_orchid.text: Doctor, I certainly hope my teammates won't cause any trouble while I'm here working for you... Aagh, the more I think of it the worse this headache gets...

char_278_orchid.title: Talk 2
char_278_orchid.text: An ordinary job, a peaceful life. That's all I ever wanted.

char_278_orchid.title: Talk 3
char_278_orchid.text: Yeah, it's not that I don't get along with the other A6 members... I just get a little headache whenever I see them...

char_278_orchid.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_278_orchid.text: My group members just bump into new troubles every day. There is the anti-social one, the never listening one, the awfully stubborn one… Just when will they ever settle down and work?...

char_278_orchid.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_278_orchid.text: I don't know how I ended up on this team either. All I wanted was an ordinary life. Why did I end up in charge of these... problem children?! Wait a minute, Midnight is a grown man!

char_278_orchid.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_278_orchid.text: Popukar... gotta pat her on the head. Catapult... gotta tie her up. Spot... never make him mad. As for Midnight, just knock him out. There, Doctor, now you know the proper protocol for dealing with Team A6.

char_278_orchid.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_278_orchid.text: I made a cake for my teammates. Wanna take a slice, Doctor? Everyone in A6 just love fruitcakes. They really are a bunch of kids, aren't they?

char_278_orchid.title: Idle
char_278_orchid.text: Not much time left. Done with your work for the day, Doctor?

char_278_orchid.title: Onboard
char_278_orchid.text: Captain of Reserve Op Team A6, Orchid, reporting in. Are you the Dr. {@nickname}? I look forward to working with you.

char_278_orchid.title: Watching Battle Record
char_278_orchid.text: I learned a lot from this video. I'll keep it in mind for sure.

char_278_orchid.title: Promotion 1
char_278_orchid.text: Thank you so much. I'll work hard to improve my skills from now on and strive for better results for you!

char_278_orchid.title: Added to Squad
char_278_orchid.text: I'll complete my mission to the best of my ability.

char_278_orchid.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_278_orchid.text: Please follow the tactical combat manual closely, everyone. Thank you for your cooperation.

char_278_orchid.title: Depart
char_278_orchid.text: The battle has begun! Be careful, everyone!

char_278_orchid.title: Begin Operation
char_278_orchid.text: Please make sure you follow every detail on the plan. Alright, everyone, now spread out!

char_278_orchid.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_278_orchid.text: Go ahead.

char_278_orchid.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_278_orchid.text: Here.

char_278_orchid.title: Deployment 1
char_278_orchid.text: Orchid, ready to move.

char_278_orchid.title: Deployment 2
char_278_orchid.text: Just as planned.

char_278_orchid.title: In Battle 1
char_278_orchid.text: Target locked!

char_278_orchid.title: In Battle 2
char_278_orchid.text: Stop them now!

char_278_orchid.title: In Battle 3
char_278_orchid.text: Out of my way!

char_278_orchid.title: In Battle 4
char_278_orchid.text: Oh come on, I already have enough work to deal with!

char_278_orchid.title: 4-star Result
char_278_orchid.text: Well done, Doctor! Impeccable leadership even against such a tough opponent.

char_278_orchid.title: 3-star Result
char_278_orchid.text: A perfect job! Looks like we can have a good rest today.

char_278_orchid.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_278_orchid.text: We need to work harder next time.

char_278_orchid.title: Operation Failure
char_278_orchid.text: Is everyone okay? Let's get out of here!

char_278_orchid.title: Assigned to Facility
char_278_orchid.text: Oh, What a noisy place...

char_278_orchid.title: Tap
char_278_orchid.text: What do you want...?

char_278_orchid.title: Trust Tap
char_278_orchid.text: Huh?! Overtime again?! Ugh, I knew it...

char_278_orchid.title: Title
char_278_orchid.text: Arknights.

char_278_orchid.title: Greeting
char_278_orchid.text: Greetings, Doctor. Let's start today's work just as planned.

char_235_jesica.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_235_jesica.text: I-Is there anything I can help with? Just say the word and I can do it.

char_235_jesica.title: Talk 1
char_235_jesica.text: Franka and Liskarm are so incredible! I really admire them. I want to become as great as they are someday. I can... I can do it! Will you help me, Doctor?

char_235_jesica.title: Talk 2
char_235_jesica.text: Um, I heard word that Vanilla's here too? She was in my squad when she first joined Blacksteel. We went on missions together! She's become such a reliable Operator now... but I'm still just me...

char_235_jesica.title: Talk 3
char_235_jesica.text: Dr. {@nickname}, do I come off as... spineless? I know I shouldn't let people walk all over me... I'm trying to change...

char_235_jesica.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_235_jesica.text: Sometimes I feel like I'm back in Blacksteel, even after going through so much with Rhodes Island. I'm not the old me anymore, either... it's weird. Is it because I miss how it was back then? No, no. I don't miss the person I used to be, I know that for sure...

char_235_jesica.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_235_jesica.text: Hard work doesn't mean anything without results. That's what I think at least! That's why I don't want anyone to see me training alone. Having you, though... it's really comforting when you're with me, for some reason.

char_235_jesica.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_235_jesica.text: I pulled a muscle training a couple days ago... but don't worry, I-I'm okay! Urk...! I won't let this get in the way of you or anyone at Rhodes Island, Doctor!

char_235_jesica.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_235_jesica.text: Freeze, hands in the air! Oh, did I scare you? I'm sorry, it's just Franka told me to be bold and assertive, and I only wanted to try it out... I'm really sorry...

char_235_jesica.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_235_jesica.text: Everyone at Blacksteel and Rhodes Island is so amazing and talented. I know I'm nothing compared to them... but, still, just every once in a while, I really like it when I get compliments...

char_235_jesica.title: Idle
char_235_jesica.text: Doctor... Doctor? Are you sleeping? I'll clean your desk up for you, then...

char_235_jesica.title: Onboard
char_235_jesica.text: Um, are you Dr. {@nickname}? Nice to meet you. I'm Jessica from Blacksteel Worldwide. Sorry... I'm really bad at introducing myself...

char_235_jesica.title: Watching Battle Record
char_235_jesica.text: This seems a lot more effective than training by myself.

char_235_jesica.title: Promotion 1
char_235_jesica.text: Doctor... I'm... I'm so happy you're honoring me... Just... let me cry it out for a bit, I'll be fine...

char_235_jesica.title: Promotion 2
char_235_jesica.text: Ah, Doctor, does this mean you think I'm a great Operator? Thank you so much for all your help. You were by my side all the way...!

char_235_jesica.title: Added to Squad
char_235_jesica.text: Just give your orders and I'll carry them out!

char_235_jesica.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_235_jesica.text: I won't let you down!

char_235_jesica.title: Depart
char_235_jesica.text: Stay focused... look straight ahead.

char_235_jesica.title: Begin Operation
char_235_jesica.text: I'll definitely prove myself this time!

char_235_jesica.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_235_jesica.text: Standing by...

char_235_jesica.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_235_jesica.text: Haah?

char_235_jesica.title: Deployment 1
char_235_jesica.text: Ughh...

char_235_jesica.title: Deployment 2
char_235_jesica.text: All right...

char_235_jesica.title: In Battle 1
char_235_jesica.text: Y- you'll pay for that!

char_235_jesica.title: In Battle 2
char_235_jesica.text: Freeze!

char_235_jesica.title: In Battle 3
char_235_jesica.text: Not one step backward.

char_235_jesica.title: In Battle 4
char_235_jesica.text: I'll show them what I can do!

char_235_jesica.title: 4-star Result
char_235_jesica.text: I'm going to climb to the top of the mountain. I won't stop halfway!

char_235_jesica.title: 3-star Result
char_235_jesica.text: I... I really did it? I managed to protect everyone by myself?

char_235_jesica.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_235_jesica.text: I could do better. I can't get complacent just because we won!

char_235_jesica.title: Operation Failure
char_235_jesica.text: Requesting medevac! I dragged everyone down... it's all my fault! Sorry! I'm sorry!

char_235_jesica.title: Assigned to Facility
char_235_jesica.text: I wonder if the people at Rhodes Island are nice...?

char_235_jesica.title: Tap
char_235_jesica.text: Where are we going...?

char_235_jesica.title: Trust Tap
char_235_jesica.text: I can do a little cooking...

char_235_jesica.title: Title
char_235_jesica.text: Arknights.

char_235_jesica.title: Greeting
char_235_jesica.text: Good morning, doctor...

char_290_vigna.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_290_vigna.text: Hey, hey! I'm watching a rock concert, Doctor! Stop blocking the TV! Just missed the best part thanks to you!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk 1
char_290_vigna.text: You get people who say things like 'fight the power' and 'be yourself.' But for us Sarkaz, that's just life.

char_290_vigna.title: Talk 2
