char_290_vigna.text: I like bands... no, I LOVE bands! As a guitarist myself, I know every beat, every chord is important. I gotta practice on and on, day and night. That's the only way to give the audience the ultimate face-melting solo!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk 3
char_290_vigna.text: I'm going exceptionally harsh on you, given I've been so nice to everyone else you say? Well, isn't it only natural? Those who shoulder the responsibility of management like you need more than their self-discipline to do their job, Doctor. I have high standards for myself, and I think it's only right for these standards to be applied to you as well.

char_290_vigna.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_290_vigna.text: Hmm, this smell... is this the lunchbox Hibiscus brought you? You want me to eat it for you? No way! This... this wasn't in my job description!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_290_vigna.text: If there's something you want out of life, you gotta work hard for it. Like, I want to become stronger, so I train. I want a sharper weapon, so I customize this one myself. People can judge as they want, but I'll stick to my belief until I get what I want!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_290_vigna.text: Wha?! It's pouring outside? I-I don't... believe it has anything to do with my outdoor concert! Now get aside if you hear me 'cause I'm setting off right NOW! I won't let this sprinkle dampen my passion by one bit!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_290_vigna.text: You got an important mission you want me to handle? Hehee, you can count on me! Let's see here... 'You are to acquire the following products for Rhodes Island during a time-limited mega-sale...?' Th-that's impossible!

char_290_vigna.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_290_vigna.text: Even if the crowd starts booing, the show must go on. You can't quit in the middle of a performance just because you messed something up. Same is true for the Sarkaz and infected. We won't have anything left with us if we just call it quits.

char_290_vigna.title: Idle
char_290_vigna.text: Hey, you can't sleep over here! Ugh... you're too heavy for me to carry...

char_290_vigna.title: Onboard
char_290_vigna.text: Excuse me, is this the office of the Doctor? I've been looking for the place quite a while and it'd be really appreciated if—what? YOU'RE the Doctor? Hmpf, I see. Operator Vigna, reporting in!

char_290_vigna.title: Watching Battle Record
char_290_vigna.text: You gotta be willing to sweat a lot to keep up the battle tempo!

char_290_vigna.title: Promotion 1
char_290_vigna.text: Am I wearing my elite medal right? Great! In that case, it's time to get a picture for this remarkable moment!

char_290_vigna.title: Promotion 2
char_290_vigna.text: Pure strength might not be my forte, but my spear and unparalleled skills shall always leave them with a deep impression!

char_290_vigna.title: Added to Squad
char_290_vigna.text: I'll learn from others' battle techniques.

char_290_vigna.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_290_vigna.text: I may be the team captain, but you can all let me know where and how I might improve.

char_290_vigna.title: Depart
char_290_vigna.text: Everyone, prepare to deploy. And please keep in mind that coordinated actions bring victory.

char_290_vigna.title: Begin Operation
char_290_vigna.text: Eyes on me—it's showtime!

char_290_vigna.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_290_vigna.text: Oh!

char_290_vigna.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_290_vigna.text: Mhmm.

char_290_vigna.title: Deployment 1
char_290_vigna.text: Here I go!

char_290_vigna.title: Deployment 2
char_290_vigna.text: Battle stance ready!

char_290_vigna.title: In Battle 1
char_290_vigna.text: Say no more!

char_290_vigna.title: In Battle 2
char_290_vigna.text: My blood is boiling!

char_290_vigna.title: In Battle 3
char_290_vigna.text: Victory shall be mine!

char_290_vigna.title: In Battle 4
char_290_vigna.text: Now! Tear them to shreds!

char_290_vigna.title: 4-star Result
char_290_vigna.text: No matter how tough the bad guys are, I won't stop strumming! Oh… 'fighting' might be the better word here!

char_290_vigna.title: 3-star Result
char_290_vigna.text: You all deserve a commendation from me, oh, but not you, Doctor, not yet! Your job's not finished until I see everyone back home safe and sound.

char_290_vigna.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_290_vigna.text: We're not out of trouble yet! Hold formation!

char_290_vigna.title: Operation Failure
char_290_vigna.text: Ugh... This can't be it. We have to fight harder!

char_290_vigna.title: Assigned to Facility
char_290_vigna.text: Is there a soundproof room here? My fingers are itching for guitar strings so BAD!

char_290_vigna.title: Tap
char_290_vigna.text: Hey! That just gave me a chill!

char_290_vigna.title: Trust Tap
char_290_vigna.text: D-Don't pat me on the head! It might make me shorter!

char_290_vigna.title: Title
char_290_vigna.text: Arknights.

char_290_vigna.title: Greeting
char_290_vigna.text: How can I help?

char_289_gyuki.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_289_gyuki.text: Doctor, you gotta be hungry! Try some of my onigiri. They're great!

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk 1
char_289_gyuki.text: I've actually got a lotta hobbies. They go way beyond martial arts. I'm also really into soccer, and flower arrangement. Wouldn't want you thinking I'm just some kinda bloodthirsty monster!

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk 2
char_289_gyuki.text: My race eats other races? That's some old crap! Who told you that? Pff, what kinda coward goes around talking that crap behind my back? I'll give 'em a peace of my mind when I find 'em.

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk 3
char_289_gyuki.text: My body? Heals right up whenever I get hurt. Even in the middle of a fight, the wounds close right back up. Handy, huh.

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_289_gyuki.text: Hey, Doctor, Rhodes Island's got a soccer tournament! Let's sign up together. When you got me on your team, it's in the bag, don't worry. Doctor, you better start thinking up a cool victory pose!

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_289_gyuki.text: You don't even recognize me on the battlefield? I just start cutting through enemies one by one with a blank expression on my face? Wow! Sounds hella badass! Wish I could watch myself out there.

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_289_gyuki.text: I got this problem where I kinda end up breaking stuff, so I'm working with my flower arrangement teacher to control my strength. Being around all those pretty flowers makes me real happy too.

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_289_gyuki.text: Strategy? Ehh, not really my specialty. That's why I keep hopping right into the enemy's plans. But with you, Doctor, you always stop me before I screw up too bad. Been a big help!

char_289_gyuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_289_gyuki.text: I've always been pretty gullible. It's almost gotten me killed. But now I, Matoimaru, swear loyalty to you, Doctor! I know you'll never betray me, Doctor!

char_289_gyuki.title: Idle
char_289_gyuki.text: Grrr... Hey, no falling asleep, Doctor! You gotta listen to my stories or I'm gonna die of boredom!

char_289_gyuki.title: Onboard
char_289_gyuki.text: Matoimaru has officially joined Rhodes Island! You let me do the fighting and I'll take the orders, Doctor!

char_289_gyuki.title: Watching Battle Record
char_289_gyuki.text: Hey now I can beat 'em even harder.

char_289_gyuki.title: Promotion 1
char_289_gyuki.text: Doctor, you put my strength to good work and I'll be a happy lady!

char_289_gyuki.title: Promotion 2
char_289_gyuki.text: Doctor, stand back a bit. I don't wanna hurt you swinging my naginata around. I, Matoimaru, will bring victory in the name of the Doctor!

char_289_gyuki.title: Added to Squad
char_289_gyuki.text: Hah hah! You all look pretty strong. Let's do some warm-ups!

char_289_gyuki.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_289_gyuki.text: Ugh, you want me to play captain? That means I get to beat 'em as hard as I want, right?

char_289_gyuki.title: Depart
char_289_gyuki.text: You guys ready to rumble? We'll wipe the floor with 'em.

char_289_gyuki.title: Begin Operation
char_289_gyuki.text: Sorry to keep you waiting, bad guys!

char_289_gyuki.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_289_gyuki.text: I'm over here.

char_289_gyuki.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_289_gyuki.text: How much longer now?

char_289_gyuki.title: Deployment 1
char_289_gyuki.text: Love that battlefield smell.

char_289_gyuki.title: Deployment 2
char_289_gyuki.text: Make 'em shake in their boots!

char_289_gyuki.title: In Battle 1
char_289_gyuki.text: You're standing up to Matoimaru. Ballsy.

char_289_gyuki.title: In Battle 2
char_289_gyuki.text: You ready yet?

char_289_gyuki.title: In Battle 3
char_289_gyuki.text: I'll cut you to ribbons!

char_289_gyuki.title: In Battle 4
char_289_gyuki.text: Down you go!

char_289_gyuki.title: 4-star Result
char_289_gyuki.text: A sea of fire and a mountain of blades... That was awesome! It's the battlefield I've always dreamed of!

char_289_gyuki.title: 3-star Result
char_289_gyuki.text: Doctor, I got 'em all! Hey, what happened here? Everything's busted. Did I do that?

char_289_gyuki.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_289_gyuki.text: I'll get 'em before they escape! Can't call the battle over until I do!

char_289_gyuki.title: Operation Failure
char_289_gyuki.text: Retreat! I'll cover your escape. Make sure you don't get hit!

char_289_gyuki.title: Assigned to Facility
char_289_gyuki.text: Agh! Ow! My horn...!

char_289_gyuki.title: Tap
char_289_gyuki.text: Huh?

char_289_gyuki.title: Trust Tap
char_289_gyuki.text: You look happy about something. You gotta tell me too!

char_289_gyuki.title: Title
char_289_gyuki.text: Arknights.

char_289_gyuki.title: Greeting
char_289_gyuki.text: Uh huh, I'm listening.

char_277_sqrrel.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_277_sqrrel.text: Um, Chief, I'mverynervous… Actually, I'mnotgoodatexpressingmyself… Thankyou, foryourconcern.

char_277_sqrrel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_277_sqrrel.text: Chief, canyoupleasehelpchangethislightbulb... I... can'treachit... Oh, it'sworkingnow. Thankyou.

char_277_sqrrel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_277_sqrrel.text: Chief... Theythey'rebarbecuinginthedormagain. Canyoupleasestopthemforme! Aaaah! SomeoneswappedmyfireextinguisherwithIfrit'sflamethrower! Areyouokay, Chief?

char_291_aglina.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_291_aglina.text: Dr. {@nickname}, I made a really strong brew with our new coffee machine. Wanna try? You can only have one cup a day, though. Don't want you up all night!

char_291_aglina.title: Talk 1
char_291_aglina.text: Being a Messenger isn't easy. Both the sender and the receiver might have some big ideas, and who knows if some shady secrets get inside your bag. If you're too absorbed in getting yourself moving, you could still end up in a pit for what you get yourself into.

char_291_aglina.title: Talk 2
char_291_aglina.text: My mother was from Higashi, so my name doesn't sound very Siracusan. A lot of people ask me if it's even my real name, so I decided to use Angelina as a codename too.

char_291_aglina.title: Talk 3
char_291_aglina.text: Good morning, Dr. {@nickname}! Yeah, I'm off to send out some documents. Dr. Kal'tsit says my skills could come in super useful in battle... but compared to fighting, I kinda prefer taking letters where they belong!

char_291_aglina.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_291_aglina.text: I actually don't know if I'm a good fit for Rhodes Island... I mean, a lot of really heavy stuff happens here, I'm not sure I can handle it. Croissant's always comforting me, but I am still not sure about myself. Do I really have what it takes?

char_291_aglina.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_291_aglina.text: I don't feel lost anymore. At the end of the day, it's more than a simple identification with you or Rhodes Island. If I can leap across the gaps between skyscrapers as a Messenger, then I know I could  bridge the gap between the Infected and Uninfected as an Operator!

char_291_aglina.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_291_aglina.text: Memories are precious. I always remember that the Infected, just like us, look forward to a better tomorrow. I don't know anything about your past, Dr. {@nickname}, but I promise to help you recall.

char_291_aglina.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_291_aglina.text: Dr. {@nickname}, don't be shy, come closer! That's right! Three, two, one, sorridi! See? It's a photo sticker of you and me. The perfect souvenir, right? I guess it's also a token of… some of my feelings, haha.

char_291_aglina.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_291_aglina.text: The view from the deck is great. Especially for stargazing! See that lone star over there? People say that one day, its companion star will appear, and then they'll embrace and dance together. Still... how long does it have to wait for the other one to show up? And how long do I have to wait... for the star to wink back at me?

char_291_aglina.title: Idle
char_291_aglina.text: Umm hmm~♪ Mmm, maybe the coral lipstick suits me more.

char_291_aglina.title: Onboard
char_291_aglina.text: Ciao! I'm Angelina Ajimu, a Messenger from Siracusa. Just call me Angelina. Am I cool to call you Dr. {@nickname}?

char_291_aglina.title: Watching Battle Record
char_291_aglina.text: The battlefield is a cruel place... but I'll try not to let you down.

char_291_aglina.title: Promotion 1
char_291_aglina.text: Since you trust me, Dr. {@nickname}, I'll have to work much, much harder than I usually do! Like, Siracusan Messengers always say: 'A slow Messenger gets caught by the wind.'

char_291_aglina.title: Promotion 2
char_291_aglina.text: I've made my decision. As long as you're still working to help the Infected, Dr. {@nickname}, I'll follow you. You've come so far, done so much... now it's my turn to do something for you.

char_291_aglina.title: Added to Squad
char_291_aglina.text: In work or in battle, I'll give it all I've got!

char_291_aglina.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_291_aglina.text: I might not be the best, but I'll still do what I can.

char_291_aglina.title: Depart
char_291_aglina.text: Everybody, please be careful!

char_291_aglina.title: Begin Operation
char_291_aglina.text: When will all these conflicts ever come to an end…

char_291_aglina.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_291_aglina.text: Okay~

char_291_aglina.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_291_aglina.text: Hm?

char_291_aglina.title: Deployment 1
char_291_aglina.text: Gently lan~ding.

char_291_aglina.title: Deployment 2
char_291_aglina.text: Ehee~

char_291_aglina.title: In Battle 1
char_291_aglina.text: Feeling you're gaining some weight?

char_291_aglina.title: In Battle 2
char_291_aglina.text: We will overcome what confronts us.

char_291_aglina.title: In Battle 3
char_291_aglina.text: I've got a magic touch on this.

char_291_aglina.title: In Battle 4
char_291_aglina.text: Ever wondered how it feels to float in the air?

char_291_aglina.title: 4-star Result
char_291_aglina.text: We only grow stronger after getting into a wolf's mouth, right?

char_291_aglina.title: 3-star Result
char_291_aglina.text: We all worked hard for this. You'll cherish this victory, won't you Dr. {@nickname}?

char_291_aglina.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_291_aglina.text: Well, even I lose a letter sometimes...

char_291_aglina.title: Operation Failure
char_291_aglina.text: The more difficult the situation, the harder we have to try!

char_291_aglina.title: Assigned to Facility
char_291_aglina.text: This place is like home to me!

char_291_aglina.title: Tap
char_291_aglina.text: Woah!

char_291_aglina.title: Trust Tap
char_291_aglina.text: My hair looks nice? Heheh, I've got a secret for that.

char_291_aglina.title: Title
char_291_aglina.text: Arknights.

char_291_aglina.title: Greeting
char_291_aglina.text: Morning, Dr. {@nickname}!

char_009_12fce.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_009_12fce.text: Forgive me, Doctor... There are limits to what I can do, including in conversation... but I'm honored to be your assistant. I look forward to helping you with your work.

char_009_12fce.title: Talk 1
char_009_12fce.text: Doctor, time heals all wounds. Please have more confidence in yourself. Your Operators have chosen to follow you because we believe that you will bring positive change.

char_009_12fce.title: Talk 2
char_009_12fce.text: Many Infected have relocated to Rhodes Island... not because they have any particular goals to achieve, but simply because they want a place to call home. The world outside no longer accepts them, after all...

char_009_12fce.title: Talk 3
char_009_12fce.text: Owl may not seem very friendly, but she's got a good heart. Please excuse her and pay her no mind.

char_009_12fce.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_009_12fce.text: 12F? That was the day I 'came to' this world. You could consider it my birthday.

char_009_12fce.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_009_12fce.text: I might not be able to spend my entire life serving one person... but at least I can start working on it now.

char_009_12fce.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_009_12fce.text: She has finally found you, Doctor. What a perilous journey it's been. You're very important to her, as well as to everyone else.

char_009_12fce.title: Idle
char_009_12fce.text: I'll be by your side watching over you, Doctor, even in your sleep. So rest easy, you have nothing to fear.

char_009_12fce.title: Onboard
char_009_12fce.text: You have my thanks for allowing me to join you. From now on, I will do my best to serve you, Doctor, with my alchemical skills. I have never had a name... but if you must call me something, you can refer to me as 12F.

char_009_12fce.title: Watching Battle Record
char_009_12fce.text: I see, I understand now. Thank you for your guidance.

char_009_12fce.title: Added to Squad
char_009_12fce.text: I may not possess outstanding skills, but I will do my best.

char_009_12fce.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_009_12fce.text: Will it be alright for me to be the leader? Anyway, thank you for your trust, Doctor.

char_009_12fce.title: Depart
char_009_12fce.text: Relax, Doctor. We will complete this operation in no time.

char_009_12fce.title: Begin Operation
char_009_12fce.text: Everyone, get ready for battle.

char_009_12fce.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_009_12fce.text: Your orders?

char_009_12fce.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_009_12fce.text: Ready for action.

char_009_12fce.title: Deployment 1
char_009_12fce.text: Got it.

char_009_12fce.title: Deployment 2
char_009_12fce.text: Copy.

char_009_12fce.title: In Battle 1
char_009_12fce.text: Please show me the path.

char_009_12fce.title: In Battle 2
char_009_12fce.text: Burn to ashes.

char_009_12fce.title: In Battle 3
char_009_12fce.text: Clear away all obstacles.

char_009_12fce.title: In Battle 4
char_009_12fce.text: Watch out, Owl!

char_009_12fce.title: 4-star Result
char_009_12fce.text: I'm used to failure... but a victory after countless defeats is always the most precious one. Don't you agree, Doctor?

char_009_12fce.title: 3-star Result
char_009_12fce.text: This victory is all yours, Doctor. And I am honored to be a pawn in your game of chess.

char_009_12fce.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_009_12fce.text: That was a hard-won victory, but we did it. Are you all right, Owl?

char_009_12fce.title: Operation Failure
char_009_12fce.text: Failure is only normal. Don't be discouraged. I've been in many wars, and my experience tells me that your victory will come soon.

char_009_12fce.title: Assigned to Facility
char_009_12fce.text: If you'd like, I can help. No trouble.

char_009_12fce.title: Tap
char_009_12fce.text: Aah! Be careful.

char_009_12fce.title: Trust Tap
char_009_12fce.text: I am so thankful for all that you have done for me. I feel ashamed I have so little with which to repay your kindness. Forgive me, Doctor.

char_009_12fce.title: Title
char_009_12fce.text: Arknights.

char_009_12fce.title: Greeting
char_009_12fce.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_230_savage.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_230_savage.text: Heheh, Dr. {@nickname}, What can I do for you today?

char_230_savage.title: Talk 1
char_230_savage.text: Combat missions take up most of my job, where I just havoc around with my hammer... It feels nice to get to sort files like this every once in a while.

char_230_savage.title: Talk 2
char_230_savage.text: When I worked for RIM Billiton, I was in charge of a lot of things: mining ores, doing geological surveys with electromagnets, all kinds of stuff. Hmm... sounds like a mouthful, right? To put it simply, I smashed what blocks the way and kept digging down!

char_230_savage.title: Talk 3
char_230_savage.text: Amiya has a lot on her shoulders. If only I could help share her burden a little... And perhaps yours too, Doctor. Don't hesitate to let me know if there's anything you need help with!

char_230_savage.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_230_savage.text: Providing cover, trailblazing, area denial... I might not be able to literally shield my teammates like the Defender Operators, but I can still protect everyone in my own way!

char_230_savage.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_230_savage.text: Did... did I manage to keep everyone safe?... *Sign of Relief* I'm so rapt... Please, Doctor, from now on, let me stay with you and Amiya!

char_230_savage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_230_savage.text: Doctor, want a cabbage veggie salad with mushroom pies? Yep, I made three servings! Yours, mine, and another for Amiya. She loves the pies I make!

char_230_savage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_230_savage.text: The running backs on the football field are unstoppable. They just keep charging forward in spite of everything, all to clear a path for their teammates. And then they just fall down and leave it to everyone else to finish the job. Isn't that sort of like what I do? It's very cool! I hope I don't have to get tackled though.

char_230_savage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_230_savage.text: Doctor, as long as I get to stay with you and Amiya, it's enough for me. Memories belong in the past, while the future is waiting for us to color it in. Amiya and I will continue to create more memories with you in the days to come!

char_230_savage.title: Idle
char_230_savage.text: Doctor, seems you've got some time to spare... Then let's go get groceries for tea tonight!

char_230_savage.title: Onboard
char_230_savage.text: Savage, from RIM Billiton, reporting for duty! The moment I got the message from you and Amiya, I rushed right over to see what I could do. Huh? You don't remember anything? Strewth!

char_230_savage.title: Watching Battle Record
char_230_savage.text: Ooh, I see. Uh-huh… I totally understand it now!

char_230_savage.title: Promotion 1
char_230_savage.text: I feel a lot better taking orders from you, Doctor. I won't let you down!

char_230_savage.title: Promotion 2
char_230_savage.text: Don't worry, Doctor. No matter how many enemies there are, as long as you're with me, I'll smash 'em all!

char_230_savage.title: Added to Squad
char_230_savage.text: Savage, in position!

char_230_savage.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_230_savage.text: Everyone, follow me closely!

char_230_savage.title: Depart
char_230_savage.text: Begin the attack!

char_230_savage.title: Begin Operation
char_230_savage.text: Target located. Attack!

char_230_savage.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_230_savage.text: I'm ready!

char_230_savage.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_230_savage.text: What's next?

char_230_savage.title: Deployment 1
char_230_savage.text: Leave it to me!

char_230_savage.title: Deployment 2
char_230_savage.text: This one's mine!

char_230_savage.title: In Battle 1
char_230_savage.text: Haaaa!

char_230_savage.title: In Battle 2
char_230_savage.text: Mjolnir-3, full power!

char_230_savage.title: In Battle 3
char_230_savage.text: Piece of cake!

char_230_savage.title: In Battle 4
char_230_savage.text: Incoming!

char_230_savage.title: 4-star Result
char_230_savage.text: Hmm, guess no mission's too difficult for us!

char_230_savage.title: 3-star Result
char_230_savage.text: What? It's over already? Easy-peasy!

char_230_savage.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_230_savage.text: ...I'd give my performance a C.

char_230_savage.title: Operation Failure
char_230_savage.text: It's too dangerous here! We have to fall back!

char_230_savage.title: Assigned to Facility
char_230_savage.text: Huh? You're really trusting me with work this detail-oriented?

char_230_savage.title: Tap
char_230_savage.text: Hmm? Nnngg?

char_230_savage.title: Trust Tap
char_230_savage.text: All done with work for the day!

char_230_savage.title: Title
char_230_savage.text: Arknights.

char_230_savage.title: Greeting
char_230_savage.text: Yahoo~ Doctor! Good morning!

char_282_catap.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_282_catap.text: We got a lot to do today, Doctor. So how about we play some games first? Isn't getting nice and relaxed the best way to prepare for a hard day of work?

char_282_catap.title: Talk 1
char_282_catap.text: Aw, I feel so lazy today for some reason! Maybe because Midnight isn't around? I love watching him chat up girls with that flashy smile of his. It's especially fun when the girls turn him down! Totally makes my day.

char_282_catap.title: Talk 2
char_282_catap.text: Doctor, you know who's the most reliable in our group? Oh, you can't guess? It's Spot! He might be quiet, but he's very reliable. So why don't we get him here to offer a hand? After all there's so much work for only two of us, don't you think?

char_282_catap.title: Talk 3
char_282_catap.text: Aw... Ms. Orchid yelled at me again today. She's such a nag! Must be work getting into her head and stressing her out. She should learn from me—I have the perfect balance between working hard and playing hard!

char_282_catap.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_282_catap.text: Hey, where's Dobermann? She's out on business today? Yay, finally! I can slack off all day now, wonderful! I'm gonna go get some snacks first. Doctor, you want some chips or popcorn? I'll grab a bag for you!

char_282_catap.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_282_catap.text: Uh, Popukar, sweetie, please listen to me, I'll do anything you say, okay? J-just put down the chainsaw! Oh no, she's out of control! This is the worst! Doctor, run! Run! We gotta jump out the window! Yeah, the window! Follow me!

char_282_catap.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_282_catap.text: The town I came from... the mayor was a tyrant, a fat cat with no heart, no sympathy. Drove the townspeople nuts. I hated him too, so I blasted open his vault and handed out all the money I found to the townies. Now that was a good time!

char_282_catap.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_282_catap.text: I don't care what anybody thinks of me—it's more important that I just enjoy every day doing what I like. My life belongs to me, so I alone decide what I do. Isn't that right?

char_282_catap.title: Idle
char_282_catap.text: Doctor's asleep? Well, can't interrupt a beauty nap. Guess I'll go out and have some fun.

char_282_catap.title: Onboard
char_282_catap.text: Reserve OP Team A6, Catapult, reporting in! Hey, I can tell you're hella different from that stuffy old bit—I mean, that esteemed, honorable instructor Ms. Dobermann. Right? Like it's obvious!

char_282_catap.title: Watching Battle Record
char_282_catap.text: ...Ahhh, that was a nice nap.

char_282_catap.title: Promotion 1
char_282_catap.text: Hehe, I finally finished basic training. Wait, what? Dobermann will keep overseeing the newbies, even AFTER their promotions? You gotta be kidding me! No—

char_282_catap.title: Added to Squad
char_282_catap.text: It's not time to head out yet, right? Let me hang out for a bit longer...

char_282_catap.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_282_catap.text: I'm the captain? Haha~I've been waiting forever to hear those words!

char_282_catap.title: Depart
char_282_catap.text: Aw man, where did I leave my ammunition belt?

char_282_catap.title: Begin Operation
char_282_catap.text: Ugh, I hate fighting. But what else can I do?

char_282_catap.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_282_catap.text: What's up?

char_282_catap.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_282_catap.text: Whatever you say.

char_282_catap.title: Deployment 1
char_282_catap.text: Safe landing!

char_282_catap.title: Deployment 2
char_282_catap.text: Time for business.

char_282_catap.title: In Battle 1
char_282_catap.text: Watch how I get them with one shot!

char_282_catap.title: In Battle 2
char_282_catap.text: You're all gonna fly!

char_282_catap.title: 4-star Result
char_282_catap.text: What an awesome formation! You got some great tactics, Doctor. And it all went down perfect!

char_282_catap.title: 3-star Result
char_282_catap.text: I love commanders that lead us to victory! Just like you, Doctor!

char_282_catap.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_282_catap.text: Relax, I set a whole bunch of traps right where the enemy's gonna be running. What? They didn't step in any of them? No way!

char_282_catap.title: Operation Failure
char_282_catap.text: Oh shoot! Hurry up, Doctor. We gotta move!

char_282_catap.title: Assigned to Facility
char_282_catap.text: Psst, care to take a peek and tell me if Dobermann's in there?

char_282_catap.title: Tap
char_282_catap.text: You can't catch me! ...Oh, you can.

char_282_catap.title: Trust Tap
char_282_catap.text: Doctor, you're an awesome leader!

char_282_catap.title: Title
char_282_catap.text: Arknights.

char_282_catap.title: Greeting
char_282_catap.text: Doctor! I'm right here!

char_283_midn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_283_midn.text: Thank you for choosing me, Darling. Now, what kind of secret are you going to share with me under this velvet of the night?

char_283_midn.title: Talk 1
char_283_midn.text: Fiend of the Night? Ah, I can't hide anything from you. But past glory is nothing to me. After all, I have an even brighter future waiting.

char_283_midn.title: Talk 2
char_283_midn.text: I may work in a different place now, but my job is still the same—to put a smile on everyone's face.

char_283_midn.title: Talk 3
char_283_midn.text: I bet Ms. Orchid must have been born with a negative number on her happiness scale. Why else would she always look so stern whenever I'm there to light her up? If you know anything about her, please tell me.

char_283_midn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_283_midn.text: People say my swordsmanship is top notch. All due credit, I have to say. Practicing swordsmanship helps me maintain my figure and cultivate my elegance. It'd be a crime for me to slack off on the pratice. After all, you either keep the momentum and hold the lead or end up getting overwhelmed. Please keep that in mind.

char_283_midn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_283_midn.text: People used to say that I sold feelings as commodities, that I treated 'happiness' as a product. Fools, all of them. How can I expect my customers to open their hearts to me if I don't open mine to them first?

char_283_midn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_283_midn.text: I believe happiness can be contagious. It's a tangible atmosphere that truly exists. I feel the joy when others treat me with sincerity, and I will make sure my happiness reaches right into their hearts.

char_283_midn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_283_midn.text: My colleagues in team A6... they may be a bit weird, but they're truly kind souls. They're a gift from destiny, a gift that continues to remind me to cherish those important to me.

char_283_midn.title: Idle
char_283_midn.text: Now that I have some free time, I should read.

char_283_midn.title: Onboard
char_283_midn.text: Show me your brightest smile, my esteemed customer! Happiness is at arm's reach when you're by my side. Midnight, at your service.

char_283_midn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_283_midn.text: It's important to never stop learning!

char_283_midn.title: Promotion 1
char_283_midn.text: Whoa, so my hard work really paid off! Let's set up a champagne tower to celebrate. My treat.

char_283_midn.title: Added to Squad
char_283_midn.text: With me on your side, success is guaranteed!

char_283_midn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_283_midn.text: Follow this handsome me!

char_283_midn.title: Depart
char_283_midn.text: Show me your spirit, everyone!

char_283_midn.title: Begin Operation
char_283_midn.text: Behold, here comes my flamboyant moves!

char_283_midn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_283_midn.text: Hmm?

char_283_midn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_283_midn.text: What's up?

char_283_midn.title: Deployment 1
char_283_midn.text: I've arrived.

char_283_midn.title: Deployment 2
char_283_midn.text: OK.

char_283_midn.title: In Battle 1
char_283_midn.text: O sword, pierce the moonlight that veils the night!

char_283_midn.title: In Battle 2
char_283_midn.text: Bathe in fresh blood!

char_283_midn.title: 4-star Result
char_283_midn.text: Impressive, Dr. {@nickname}, truly impressive. Your blazing brilliance almost stole my show today.

char_283_midn.title: 3-star Result
char_283_midn.text: There's only one thing that's impossible for me: being imperfect.

char_283_midn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_283_midn.text: Not too shabby. Such a heart-warming result calls for a little celebration.

char_283_midn.title: Operation Failure
char_283_midn.text: No need to look back. We'll greet each other with a smile next time.

char_283_midn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_283_midn.text: A wonderful place. Let's have a drinking party tonight.

char_283_midn.title: Tap
char_283_midn.text: There now, would you please leave my collar as it is?

char_283_midn.title: Trust Tap
char_283_midn.text: Thanks for taking care of me.

char_283_midn.title: Title
char_283_midn.text: Arknights.

char_283_midn.title: Greeting
char_283_midn.text: Good evening, Dr. {@nickname}.

char_137_brownb.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_137_brownb.text: Boss, let's go grab a bite. On you this time. What? You bought last time? Doesn't sound right to me.

char_137_brownb.title: Talk 1
char_137_brownb.text: Use my head to win fights? Hmm… Hmm… Pummel them until I win, train harder if I lose. That's using your head!

char_137_brownb.title: Talk 2
char_137_brownb.text: Honey's sweet, but getting it hurts. I went for some the other day and the bees served me up some beating.

char_137_brownb.title: Talk 3
char_137_brownb.text: My knucklers? They're my precious babies. Wouldn't have racked up all those wins without 'em!

char_137_brownb.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_137_brownb.text: There's more rules in the underground fight scene than you might think. Plenty of gopniks dove in before they had 'em figured out. They usually ended up dead.

char_137_brownb.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_137_brownb.text: Oripathy? Who cares? Infected, Uninfected... They're all the same after I knock their lights out.

char_137_brownb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_137_brownb.text: What? The fin in the kitchen? Hah! Right here in my belly now!

char_137_brownb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_137_brownb.text: My book of names here? Hah, looks like that big brain of yours doesn't know everything. Gotta meet people to fight people, right? I don't want to run out of enemies.

char_137_brownb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_137_brownb.text: The only reason I joined the underground fight is 'cause I didn't have two kopecks to rub together. But here on Rhodes Island I got that load off my mind. It's all thanks to you, Boss!

char_137_brownb.title: Idle
char_137_brownb.text: *Sniff sniff* Smells like grilled fish!

char_137_brownb.title: Onboard
char_137_brownb.text: Yo! Boss, you know a winner when you see her! Now, put your hands together for the strongest underground fighter out there. The one! The only! BEEEEEEEE-HUNTERRRRRR!

char_137_brownb.title: Watching Battle Record
char_137_brownb.text: I really don't wanna study. Send me out to fight already!

char_137_brownb.title: Promotion 1
char_137_brownb.text: Hah hah hah! Somebody likes me a lot!

char_137_brownb.title: Promotion 2
char_137_brownb.text: Hah! After this promotion, ain't no way I'm gonna let you down! Lemme show you what I can do in a fight, Boss!

char_137_brownb.title: Added to Squad
char_137_brownb.text: Here I come!

char_137_brownb.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_137_brownb.text: Oooh yeah! Chow's on me after we win this one!

char_137_brownb.title: Depart
char_137_brownb.text: Relax, Boss. Ain't nobody can go three rounds with me!

char_137_brownb.title: Begin Operation
char_137_brownb.text: So you're the ones looking for a beatdown. You guys?

char_137_brownb.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_137_brownb.text: What's up?

char_137_brownb.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_137_brownb.text: Ready?

char_137_brownb.title: Deployment 1
char_137_brownb.text: Gimme the bell!

char_137_brownb.title: Deployment 2
char_137_brownb.text: All right, let's do this.

char_137_brownb.title: In Battle 1
char_137_brownb.text: Eat this!

char_137_brownb.title: In Battle 2
char_137_brownb.text: Get over here!

char_137_brownb.title: In Battle 3
char_137_brownb.text: One-two One-two One-two!

char_137_brownb.title: In Battle 4
char_137_brownb.text: C'mon, c'mon! Bring it on!

char_137_brownb.title: 4-star Result
char_137_brownb.text: The stronger the matchup, the more pumped I get!

char_137_brownb.title: 3-star Result
char_137_brownb.text: K.O.! Check it out, Boss. See 'em all piled up there?

char_137_brownb.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_137_brownb.text: That's a wrap. Let's head back and chow down!

char_137_brownb.title: Operation Failure
char_137_brownb.text: Ouch… *Gasp* Where's the Boss? Is the Boss okay?!

char_137_brownb.title: Assigned to Facility
char_137_brownb.text: This room's a lot better than any I had before!

char_137_brownb.title: Tap
char_137_brownb.text: Hm?

char_137_brownb.title: Trust Tap
char_137_brownb.text: You brought food? Yeah! You're the best, Boss!

char_137_brownb.title: Title
char_137_brownb.text: Arknights.

char_137_brownb.title: Greeting
char_137_brownb.text: Sup, Boss.

char_164_nightm.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_164_nightm.text: Um, it hurts my eyes in here... Doctor, could you turn down the office lights a bit? I'm not so used to bright rooms...

char_164_nightm.title: Talk 1
char_164_nightm.text: Um, did you really bring me here to be an Operator? Not to keep a watch on me? What about that doctor, Miss Kal'tsit? What is she going to do to me...?

char_164_nightm.title: Talk 2
char_164_nightm.text: My staff was passed down to me by my father. Its magic does something called 'Evernight' to those it touches. Anyone trapped in that illusion will... have trouble waking up the next day...

char_164_nightm.title: Talk 3
char_164_nightm.text: I'm used to being alone. When I feel lonely, I'll just talk to myself. Eheh... Hmm? Is that weird?

char_164_nightm.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_164_nightm.text: Stare deeply into my eyes. Feeling sleepy, aren't you? Hehe... Now, wouldn't you like to do something for me? Tell me, where does Rhodes Island store all its Originium?

char_164_nightm.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_164_nightm.text: You called for me? Oh yes, my disease is worsening. That's because you wouldn't give me your Originium, which means now this body is gradually disintegrating... So, just what should we do, Doc-tor?

char_164_nightm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_164_nightm.text: Um, please let me apologize! I mean, erm, I m-might still end up saying something weird, but please don't get angry... I just have no way to control 'her'…

char_164_nightm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_164_nightm.text: Say, Doctor, if I were to suddenly end you, right here, how would everyone else react...? Argh! Grgh! No! I have to stop myself from... Hehe, I really would like to see it...

char_164_nightm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_164_nightm.text: Doctor, don't you get tired of it, from time to time? Your work,life, feelings, everything... What would you say to just forgetting all of it, all at once? With my power, things like that can be arranged...

char_164_nightm.title: Idle
char_164_nightm.text: Your sleeping face is so cute, it makes me want to...

char_164_nightm.title: Onboard
char_164_nightm.text: I'm Nightmare... Ah, that's a code name. My real name is Gloria. But, if you don't mind, I'd rather you call me that... I think my code name... is kind of scary...

char_164_nightm.title: Watching Battle Record
char_164_nightm.text: You're making me stronger... but why...?

char_164_nightm.title: Promotion 1
char_164_nightm.text: I came here as a patient, to get treatment for my disease. But now, I'm given to understand that that doctor wants me to fight for you, doesn't she?

char_164_nightm.title: Promotion 2
char_164_nightm.text: Don't you think I'm only barely qualified for this promotion? Not that it matters—go ahead and call your shots. At this point, I'm just lucky to even be alive.

char_164_nightm.title: Added to Squad
char_164_nightm.text: Alright, I'm coming.

char_164_nightm.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_164_nightm.text: I can't do this alone...

char_164_nightm.title: Depart
char_164_nightm.text: What sorts of incredible powers will you show me? I can't wait to see.

char_164_nightm.title: Begin Operation
char_164_nightm.text: So these are our enemies? Well, well, you look like fun.

char_164_nightm.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_164_nightm.text: Um, is there anything to eat?

char_164_nightm.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_164_nightm.text: Say, why don't you let me take you on?

char_164_nightm.title: Deployment 1
char_164_nightm.text: This is... the battlefield...!

char_164_nightm.title: Deployment 2
char_164_nightm.text: Ah, the battlefield. How I missed you.

char_164_nightm.title: In Battle 1
char_164_nightm.text: Ahaha, why so serious?

char_164_nightm.title: In Battle 2
char_164_nightm.text: Come on, relax for me.

char_164_nightm.title: In Battle 3
char_164_nightm.text: May you have sweet dreams...

char_164_nightm.title: In Battle 4
char_164_nightm.text: You'll run if—if you know what's good for you.

char_164_nightm.title: 4-star Result
char_164_nightm.text: Victory... Always so refreshing.

char_164_nightm.title: 3-star Result
char_164_nightm.text: Well, sorry, but this is the end I prepared for you.

char_164_nightm.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_164_nightm.text: We won. What more could you ask for?

char_164_nightm.title: Operation Failure
char_164_nightm.text: What... have I done...

char_164_nightm.title: Assigned to Facility
char_164_nightm.text: I'll be fine in the corner...

char_164_nightm.title: Tap
char_164_nightm.text: Argh...

char_164_nightm.title: Trust Tap
char_164_nightm.text: D-did I do something bad again...? J-Just, please let me apologize. I'm so, sooo sorry...

char_164_nightm.title: Title
char_164_nightm.text: Arknights.

char_164_nightm.title: Greeting
char_164_nightm.text: Good morning, Doctor.

char_220_grani.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_220_grani.text: Reporting in, Doctor! Patrol completed. Nothing out of the ordinary!

char_220_grani.title: Talk 1
char_220_grani.text: I'm starving. That battle really took a lot out of me... You say you've got something to eat? Just for me? Whoa... It's… it's an apple pie! Thanks a lot! It looks great!

char_220_grani.title: Talk 2
char_220_grani.text: Everybody here at Rhodes Island calls me 'Tiny,' but it really doesn't bother me. The boys back on the force always teased me the same way. Hey! Don't pat my head! Or rub my ears! Or squeeze my cheek for that matter!

char_220_grani.title: Talk 3
char_220_grani.text: Doctor, I might not make it to training on Wednesdays or Fridays... Right, I need to be out there helping the civil corps to keep the peace and catch the bad guys! Wh-waht? I have an important mission on Friday?!

char_220_grani.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_220_grani.text: Rhodes Island has lots of strong Operators, but there's no one who can match my speed!

char_220_grani.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_220_grani.text: Time flies, Dcotor. We've been working together so long. I will never forget anything we've been through. But we can't stop now! We have to keep striving for that bright future, don't we?

char_220_grani.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_220_grani.text: I just bumped into Skadi in the hallway... Doctor, you think she's cold and distant, don't you? She's actually very kind. Really!

char_220_grani.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_220_grani.text: Compared to everyone else, I'm pretty ordinary. I don't have any superpowers, or spectacular achievements to brag about... But I don't need magic or claws to make the world a better place. I can do that with my own two hands! But before that, we still have to eat well.

char_220_grani.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_220_grani.text: Doctor, you always worry so much about your people, but you never remember to take care of yourself. You can't do that! No matter what dangers you may face, I promise I'll be there to hold your hand! Definitely, you have my word!

char_220_grani.title: Idle
char_220_grani.text: Hmm? Why do you smell so good, Doctor? You're definitely hiding something tasty, aren't you?!

char_220_grani.title: Onboard
char_220_grani.text: Mounted Police Officer Grani, here to answer your call for help! Fear not. From this point forward, I will protect you!

char_220_grani.title: Watching Battle Record
char_220_grani.text: I see. That's another thing I should watch out for. Got it!

char_220_grani.title: Promotion 1
char_220_grani.text: An elite promotion medal? For me? Thank you, Doctor! I'll hang it up with my police medal!

char_220_grani.title: Promotion 2
char_220_grani.text: Since the day of my first mission, I've been leaning on this lance to get back on my feet. As long as I grip it tight, my heart will brim with the courage it needs to protect the people and their dreams.

char_220_grani.title: Added to Squad
char_220_grani.text: Shall I go scout the battlefield?

char_220_grani.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_220_grani.text: You're making me the captain? Okay. I'll protect the whole squad!

char_220_grani.title: Depart
char_220_grani.text: All right, let's bring home a victory!

char_220_grani.title: Begin Operation
char_220_grani.text: Your crimes stop here!

char_220_grani.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_220_grani.text: Leave it to me!

char_220_grani.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_220_grani.text: Sure!

char_220_grani.title: Deployment 1
char_220_grani.text: In position.

char_220_grani.title: Deployment 2
char_220_grani.text: Moving out!

char_220_grani.title: In Battle 1
char_220_grani.text: My lance will clear a path!

char_220_grani.title: In Battle 2
char_220_grani.text: Set! Ready! Charge on!

char_220_grani.title: In Battle 3
char_220_grani.text: Only one comes out on top when the lances are crossed!

char_220_grani.title: In Battle 4
char_220_grani.text: My battlefield extends well above the ground!

char_220_grani.title: 4-star Result
char_220_grani.text: If you look to harm those under my protection, you'll have to go through me first!

char_220_grani.title: 3-star Result
char_220_grani.text: Nice! That was an excellent fight! You all did splendidly!

char_220_grani.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_220_grani.text: Doctor, please stay close to me. There may still be some enemies around.

char_220_grani.title: Operation Failure
char_220_grani.text: Damn it... I can't let myself fall here!

char_220_grani.title: Assigned to Facility
char_220_grani.text: Anyone need help here?

char_220_grani.title: Tap
char_220_grani.text: Careful!

char_220_grani.title: Trust Tap
char_220_grani.text: If we get the chance, I hope we can see the world together, Doctor.

char_220_grani.title: Title
char_220_grani.text: Arknights.

char_220_grani.title: Greeting
char_220_grani.text: Hello, Doctor!

char_263_skadi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_263_skadi.text: I advise you to keep at least two meters away from me, for your own good. And of course you shouldn't speak to me either... I don't want you to be the next victim of what's after me.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk 1
char_263_skadi.text: You've read my file? Terrible, isn't it? If I'm allowed to stay by your side, the same misfortune will befall you, and that's trouble for me too.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk 2
char_263_skadi.text: My long hair looks good? Oh… Well, thank you. Would you like to feel it? It should have a soft touch. I'm confident of that.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk 3
char_263_skadi.text: Could that be...? The one over there, you guys call her Specter now, right? Why is she dressed as a nun? Amnesia? That's a problem… Dr. {@nickname}, you have to help her. She can't be allowed to forget her true function.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_263_skadi.text: You just don't know when to give up, do you? I suppose I have no choice but to defend you with all my might.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_263_skadi.text: Down beneath the vast blue sea, below the white waves that lap endlessly at the earth, lies all that I once held dear. I fear that one day misfortune will once again take away someone important from me. That is why I fled. I don't want anyone I care about... to suffer on my account.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_263_skadi.text: Good, another easy day. No giant tentacles coiling up my teammates, no fanatics lurking in the shadows with their hands coated in blood... Yes, just some straight fights on the battlefield. An easy day for me.

char_263_skadi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_263_skadi.text: According to legend, my people have fought against those calamities for aeons. Perhaps we kept them from making landfall and terrorizing you city folk as well... So, how about buying me a drink, as a thank you?

char_263_skadi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_263_skadi.text: When you've finally made the long journey through the dark up to the water's surface—your eyes dazzled by the sparkling stars all over the sky, your cheek soothed by the cradling waves, your tears seep into your mouth. They have the same salty taste of your home—compared to all that, the bathtub at Rhodes Island is so tiny and puny... I'll have to show you my home someday.

char_263_skadi.title: Idle
char_263_skadi.text: Dr. {@nickname}, you fell asleep…? Rest well then, and may you never see your dream eroded by sea waves.

char_263_skadi.title: Onboard
char_263_skadi.text: I am Skadi, a bounty hunter. Are you really hiring me? I cannot say what calamities I may bring with me.

char_263_skadi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_263_skadi.text: So this is how you fight. Rush in with a 'woosh,' knock them down with a 'pow,' and finish them with a 'thud.' Very good. I'll keep it in mind.

char_263_skadi.title: Promotion 1
char_263_skadi.text: So this is the promotion you Rhodes Island folks are always going on about? Not bad. Feels like I've become stronger. Just by a bit, maybe.

char_263_skadi.title: Promotion 2
char_263_skadi.text: Your thirst for my power really troubles me... But if nothing can really stop you, then brace yourself, for the infinite darkness we will stand against together.

char_263_skadi.title: Added to Squad
char_263_skadi.text: I am quite skilled at teamwork, but...

char_263_skadi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_263_skadi.text: You're placing everyone's life in my hands?

char_263_skadi.title: Depart
char_263_skadi.text: It's hardly a sport when all the enemies are human.

char_263_skadi.title: Begin Operation
char_263_skadi.text: Compared to the calamities I fought against, you are barely a threat.

char_263_skadi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_263_skadi.text: By your command.

char_263_skadi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_263_skadi.text: I'm used to fighting alone.

char_263_skadi.title: Deployment 1
char_263_skadi.text: Let's share a dance.

char_263_skadi.title: Deployment 2
char_263_skadi.text: Better safe than sorry.

char_263_skadi.title: In Battle 1
char_263_skadi.text: Who knows what lurks within the kelp forest?

char_263_skadi.title: In Battle 2
char_263_skadi.text: This sword has a terrifying past. Care to find out?

char_263_skadi.title: In Battle 3
char_263_skadi.text: Sing me a song, my torturous nightmare.

char_263_skadi.title: In Battle 4
char_263_skadi.text: Don't blink, for you may miss the misery of your death.

char_263_skadi.title: 4-star Result
char_263_skadi.text: We survived somehow.

char_263_skadi.title: 3-star Result
char_263_skadi.text: The words and thoughts of our enemies mean nothing to me. All I care about is how to defeat them.

char_263_skadi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_263_skadi.text: Feeling a little rusty? Hope you won't mind having part of your share taken away.

char_263_skadi.title: Operation Failure
char_263_skadi.text: Such simple misfortunes are only the beginning.

char_263_skadi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_263_skadi.text: Put me in a room by myself please.

char_263_skadi.title: Tap
char_263_skadi.text: Oops... My hat.

char_263_skadi.title: Trust Tap
char_263_skadi.text: Y-You should watch your distance... I really can't guarantee your safety this close…

char_263_skadi.title: Title
char_263_skadi.text: Arknights.

char_263_skadi.title: Greeting
char_263_skadi.text: Never let down your guard, Doctor.

char_284_spot.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_284_spot.text: Work's kinda like a trap, and you just fling yourself into it.

char_284_spot.title: Talk 1
char_284_spot.text: I don't talk much 'cause I don't want to. Not 'cause I'm looking down on anyone.

char_284_spot.title: Talk 2
char_284_spot.text: What did Midnight do this time? Did he finally end up in Medical after hitting on one too many ladies in the hallway? No? Too bad.

char_284_spot.title: Talk 3
char_284_spot.text: Got something, Doctor? I could probably lend a hand. But I'd rather not eat up too much of my time. I got a lot of comics to read.

char_284_spot.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_284_spot.text: I know I speak a little too bluntly sometimes, but I always get my work done. It's not like I got professional pride or anything, I just can't respect somebody who doesn't finish his work.

char_284_spot.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_284_spot.text: Rhodes Island is a strange place. The people here just say whatever they're thinking, and somebody's always there to help when someone needs it.

char_284_spot.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_284_spot.text: Reserve Op Team A6 is a real diverse crowd. We have Lady Stinky-face, Miss Lacking-self-confrol, Narcissist Kun, and a little walking time bomb. But still, I do think I can trust them. They work hard, even if they don't show it.

char_284_spot.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_284_spot.text: I used to live free and easy like everyone else at Rhodes Island, but my family thought I was a freak. This place may be a freakshow, but at least everyone's happy, and that's pretty good.

char_284_spot.title: Idle
char_284_spot.text: Can I go back to my room now?

char_284_spot.title: Onboard
char_284_spot.text: Hi, I'm Spot from Operation Reserve Team A6. My job is to protect the other troublemakers on my team, I guess.

char_284_spot.title: Watching Battle Record
char_284_spot.text: I've seen this battle before. Bad guys got their asses kicked.

char_284_spot.title: Promotion 1
char_284_spot.text: I'm gonna work twice as hard. I'll bump it up from a 0.1 to a 0.2, I think.

char_284_spot.title: Added to Squad
char_284_spot.text: I won't ask about the meaning of this mission then.

char_284_spot.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_284_spot.text: I wanna get back to my dorm.

char_284_spot.title: Depart
char_284_spot.text: Got it.

char_284_spot.title: Begin Operation
char_284_spot.text: Save us a lot of time if you just surrender.

char_284_spot.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_284_spot.text: Whatever you say.

char_284_spot.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_284_spot.text: Doesn't matter to me.

char_284_spot.title: Deployment 1
char_284_spot.text: Alright then.

char_284_spot.title: Deployment 2
char_284_spot.text: Yeah, yeah, fine.

char_284_spot.title: In Battle 1
char_284_spot.text: Hey, catch.

char_284_spot.title: In Battle 2
char_284_spot.text: Don't see any harm in this.

char_284_spot.title: In Battle 3
char_284_spot.text: So many weaknesses.

char_284_spot.title: In Battle 4
char_284_spot.text: Holding this shield is tiring, pal.

char_284_spot.title: 4-star Result
char_284_spot.text: Been through an easy battle, you say? Then better do it all over again.

char_284_spot.title: 3-star Result
char_284_spot.text: With hard work, even an idiot can get the job done.

char_284_spot.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_284_spot.text: Perfection is for suckers, you know.

char_284_spot.title: Operation Failure
char_284_spot.text: Relax, you're doing fine.

char_284_spot.title: Assigned to Facility
char_284_spot.text: Yeah sure.

char_284_spot.title: Tap
char_284_spot.text: Ah.

char_284_spot.title: Trust Tap
char_284_spot.text: If you keep petting me like that, my hair's gonna get tangled.

char_284_spot.title: Title
char_284_spot.text: Arknights.

char_284_spot.title: Greeting
char_284_spot.text: Hey Doctor...

char_281_popka.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_281_popka.text: Ummm... Nice to see you again, Doctor. It makes me happy... hehe...

char_281_popka.title: Talk 1
char_281_popka.text: Doctor, do you need a break? I made you some tea, and Miss Orchid made cookies. Here, hope you like them… And, umm... Cheer up!

char_281_popka.title: Talk 2
char_281_popka.text: Why is everyone in Team A6 always fighting with each other...? If things keep going like this, we can't be a team anymore... Fighting is bad. I must make them understand!

char_281_popka.title: Talk 3
char_281_popka.text: The gear on my chainsaw is kinda loose, the one that makes the 'vrrrr' sound ... But I don't remember using it lately. Weird...

char_281_popka.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_281_popka.text: Doctor, is Team A6 getting along well...? That's really some good news. Peace is the best... As long as they don't fight, nothing will bother me while I stay with you…

char_281_popka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_281_popka.text: I don't know why, but I sometimes get these gaps in my memory. Then when I ask my teammates in A6, they just smile and tell me nothing happened at all...

char_281_popka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_281_popka.text: Um, Doc-Doctor, did I just pass out...? Um, why is everyone lying on the floor? Miss Catapult? Mr. Midnight? Mr. Spot? Why do you all have bruises on your face? And Miss Orchid too...

char_281_popka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_281_popka.text: I'm actually super strong? You say I lost control over my power, when I wanted to stop my friends from fighting each other? That's why I don't remember anything...? Okay, I think I get it! Umm... right, I will put my power to good use!

char_281_popka.title: Idle
char_281_popka.text: Aaaah! The cup! I didn't control my grip... Errmm... I'm in trouble when the Doctor wakes up...

char_281_popka.title: Onboard
char_281_popka.text: Popukar from Operation Reserve Team A6, reporting in. I'm sorry my teammates are always fighting each other, Doctor… But don't worry, I know what to do.

char_281_popka.title: Watching Battle Record
char_281_popka.text: Umm, Doctor, is the girl in the video... me?

char_281_popka.title: Promotion 1
char_281_popka.text: I'm so happy I don't even know what to say...! Thank you, Doctor...! Thank you so much!

char_281_popka.title: Added to Squad
char_281_popka.text: My name is Popukar... Nice to meet you...

char_281_popka.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_281_popka.text: B-But... I really don't know anything about tactics or strategies or anything…

char_281_popka.title: Depart
char_281_popka.text: Miss Catapult, um, it's time to deploy!

char_281_popka.title: Begin Operation
char_281_popka.text: Miss Orchid, don't worry... I'll be fine.

char_281_popka.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_281_popka.text: Errrmm...

char_281_popka.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_281_popka.text: I'm right here.

char_281_popka.title: Deployment 1
char_281_popka.text: I want to stop this fight.

char_281_popka.title: Deployment 2
char_281_popka.text: Please stop arguiiing!

char_281_popka.title: In Battle 1
char_281_popka.text: Be good and don't move.

char_281_popka.title: In Battle 2
char_281_popka.text: Chainsaw got mad…

char_281_popka.title: 4-star Result
char_281_popka.text: Mr. Midnight, come back here... Miss Orchid is staring at you…

char_281_popka.title: 3-star Result
char_281_popka.text: Can everyone have a good peaceful talk, now...?

char_281_popka.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_281_popka.text: Doctor… Doctor…? Here, I made some tea. You must be tired.

char_281_popka.title: Operation Failure
char_281_popka.text: **A painful groan** I'm… injured…? It hurts…

char_281_popka.title: Assigned to Facility
char_281_popka.text: Please don't leave me here alone...

char_281_popka.title: Tap
char_281_popka.text: Aaaugh...

char_281_popka.title: Trust Tap
char_281_popka.text: Doctor, headpats…

char_281_popka.title: Title
char_281_popka.text: Arknights.

char_281_popka.title: Greeting
char_281_popka.text: Doctor, are you getting along with everyone today...?

char_308_swire.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_308_swire.text: Doctor, we can't waste even one single precious minute! One minute could mean a loss of millions on the account with extra casualties on the field! Huh? Coffee? I take it with a sachet of sugar and heavy on the milk foam, thanks!

char_308_swire.title: Talk 1
char_308_swire.text: They say Rhodes Island is a criminal organization, full of Infected people dirtying up the corridors. But that couldn't be further from the truth. Rhodes Island's Operators are giving their lives to make things better for everyone, just like the police force of Lungmen!

char_308_swire.title: Talk 2
char_308_swire.text: Hear me out, do you think we could redesign the instructors' office? At least add a bit of flavor to it, maybe a handmade rug or some atomistic art whatnot. It's just so bland now. Dobermann might say she doesn't care, but it really kills my enthusiasm...

char_308_swire.title: Talk 3
char_308_swire.text: Ahhh, that awful Ch'en isn't here, is she? Back when we were in the L.G.D. together, she shot me this dirty look every time we bumped into each other. It made me wonder if I've done anything bad! I just... kinda want to take over the L.G.D. myself. That couldn't be bad, right?

char_308_swire.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_308_swire.text: Exercise, study, training, researching my competitors and market shifts... Gotta keep them up!

char_308_swire.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_308_swire.text: I've been allowed to set aside the family business for a while. But it's clear to me that the future of Lungmen needs both a stable public sector and security apparatus, as well as a healthy business and financial system. In both respects, I'm ready to be of service to Lungmen!

char_308_swire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_308_swire.text: Lungmen bureaucracy is complicated, even for us. Keeping the peace, protecting the people, directing traffic, negotiating trade... Agh, it's absolutely backbreaking. But as long as what we do is good for Lungmen, I'll be—hehe—very pleased.

char_308_swire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_308_swire.text: Doctor, why is Rhodes Island's training course so short...? Insufficient capital? Unacceptable, I'm requesting an immediate transfer to the business division! It's-it's not as if I like business, but if you need me to do it, I'm... more than capable!

char_308_swire.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_308_swire.text: You know, Doctor, Lungmen could use someone as talented as you. So, well... If you're not enjoying this line of work, there's plenty of opportunities in the banking and management sectors! I-I can get you a job! Oh? You'd rather we work with Rhodes Island? ...Fine!

char_308_swire.title: Idle
char_308_swire.text: Uughh... I'm exhausted... Two shifts in a row really does... zzz... zzz...

char_308_swire.title: Onboard
char_308_swire.text: Swire, Senior Superintendent of the L.G.D.. I'll be joining Rhodes Island as a training consultant. Dr. {@nickname}, I'm looking forward to working together with you for the future of Lungmen!

char_308_swire.title: Watching Battle Record
char_308_swire.text: Hmm, as far as tactical theory goes, this is a decent application!

char_308_swire.title: Promotion 1
char_308_swire.text: A promotion? Hmm? But it doesn't do anything for me back in Lungmen, does it? Well, if you insist, I suppose I will accept it!

char_308_swire.title: Promotion 2
char_308_swire.text: Maybe it's that you want me to improve your relationship with Lungmen. Or, possibly, you truly need my talents. I suppose it could be something else you want, too... I'm not sure exactly what, and I can't promise it'll be on offer. But I'll be a stalwart with you to the end.

char_308_swire.title: Added to Squad
char_308_swire.text: Aha~! You finally need my wisdom!

char_308_swire.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_308_swire.text: Everyone, follow my orders to the letter!

char_308_swire.title: Depart
char_308_swire.text: Wipe them out in one fell swoop! It's cheaper that way!

char_308_swire.title: Begin Operation
char_308_swire.text: Let's finish this quickly. My time is far too precious!

char_308_swire.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_308_swire.text: Huh?

char_308_swire.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_308_swire.text: I've seen through the enemy's strategies!

char_308_swire.title: Deployment 1
char_308_swire.text: This is far from my only battlefield!

char_308_swire.title: Deployment 2
char_308_swire.text: Business competitor or not, you will get a lesson from me!

char_308_swire.title: In Battle 1
char_308_swire.text: Time is money!

char_308_swire.title: In Battle 2
char_308_swire.text: Hurry it up, let's move!

char_308_swire.title: In Battle 3
char_308_swire.text: Lungmen has its own pride!

char_308_swire.title: In Battle 4
char_308_swire.text: Time to liquidate!

char_308_swire.title: 4-star Result
char_308_swire.text: Fantastic! In battle as in business: high risk, high return!

char_308_swire.title: 3-star Result
char_308_swire.text: Capital is all mergers and acquisitions! Victory is like investigation and arrest!

char_308_swire.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_308_swire.text: ...Bad... just bad... You can do better, can't you? We'll work it out together. Don't give up!

char_308_swire.title: Operation Failure
char_308_swire.text: How could this have happened? How could I... How could I have blundered so badly?!

char_308_swire.title: Assigned to Facility
char_308_swire.text: Not bad... No, I think this room could use some more renovation!

char_308_swire.title: Tap
char_308_swire.text: Ah! How rude of you!

char_308_swire.title: Trust Tap
char_308_swire.text: How... How about we go for dinner together? M-my treat!

char_308_swire.title: Title
char_308_swire.text: Arknights.

char_308_swire.title: Greeting
char_308_swire.text: Doctor, roar!

char_253_greyy.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_253_greyy.text: Hi, Doctor. If you need anything, please tell me...  Um, I assume you still remember my code name...?

char_253_greyy.title: Talk 1
char_253_greyy.text: Doc-Doctor, hi... Um, I just checked the Medical Department's power grid, and taking some files around while I'm at it... No, nobody's forcing me! I mean, they take such good care of me, it's the least I can do for them...

char_253_greyy.title: Talk 2
char_253_greyy.text: I decided to learn electric Arts just so my friends back in the slums could have some light, just so the nights would be a little less miserable... That pitch black, it's really scary. And the kinds of people who live in the dark, they can be scary too...

char_253_greyy.title: Talk 3
char_253_greyy.text: These Originium generators here at Rhodes Island are amazing... You know, if we had anything like them back home, we wouldn't need to live in the dark all the time, like life without light is normal.

char_253_greyy.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_253_greyy.text: My mother taught me the basics of Arts. She told me I use Arts just like she did when she was younger, but I'm also as sickly as she was... If she were still alive, I'd hope she could come with me to Rhodes Island...

char_253_greyy.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, before I got the training from you, all I could do with my Arts was light up one little room. But now that little spark has turned into something that can help lots of people...! Thank you so much!

char_253_greyy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_253_greyy.text: Huh? A current anomaly in Miss Mayer's storeroom? W-why is it her again... What? Dr. Kal'tsit wants more cables for her lab? And another outage in Ifrit's room? Waahhhh... Doctor, help meee...

char_253_greyy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_253_greyy.text: Zzz... Wha? Doctor...? Ah! Sorry! I wasn't napping! I, um, I was... Oh, is this Medical?

char_253_greyy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, are you going out again...? Okay, I know. I'll wait here for you... Um, Doctor, please hurry back...

char_253_greyy.title: Idle
char_253_greyy.text: Whoa...! Aaaugh... Static electricity. Gave me a jolt...

char_253_greyy.title: Onboard
char_253_greyy.text: H-Hi. My name is Greyy. I'm kind of an electrician... Erm, th-thanks for taking me on...!

char_253_greyy.title: Watching Battle Record
char_253_greyy.text: C-could you pause it for a minute? I-I'm taking notes…

char_253_greyy.title: Promotion 1
char_253_greyy.text: A promotion? Okay, I'll take it to... Huh? It's, it's for me...? Really?

char_253_greyy.title: Promotion 2
char_253_greyy.text: Hehe. Doctor, I shall light the way for you!... Um, sorry, just got too full of myself...  But I actually mean it...!

char_253_greyy.title: Added to Squad
char_253_greyy.text: Everyone, I'm here to help...

char_253_greyy.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_253_greyy.text: I'm the Captain...? O-Okay! If that's your wish, Doctor!...

char_253_greyy.title: Depart
char_253_greyy.text: Let me handle the logistical support...!

char_253_greyy.title: Begin Operation
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, I see the enemies rallying...

char_253_greyy.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_253_greyy.text: I'll try my best…

char_253_greyy.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_253_greyy.text: I should be able to do it...!

char_253_greyy.title: Deployment 1
char_253_greyy.text: Slowly, and carefully...

char_253_greyy.title: Deployment 2
char_253_greyy.text: Can't tiwst my ankle now!

char_253_greyy.title: In Battle 1
char_253_greyy.text: Stop being evil!

char_253_greyy.title: In Battle 2
char_253_greyy.text: I won't let you hurt my friends...!

char_253_greyy.title: In Battle 3
char_253_greyy.text: T-Take that!

char_253_greyy.title: In Battle 4
char_253_greyy.text: An electric shock c-can really hurt...!

char_253_greyy.title: 4-star Result
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, we've done a wonderful job...! Cou-Could we go home now?...

char_253_greyy.title: 3-star Result
char_253_greyy.text: We-We won, Doctor!

char_253_greyy.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, the ones who ran off... We won't see them again, will we?

char_253_greyy.title: Operation Failure
char_253_greyy.text: Err... Doctor...

char_253_greyy.title: Assigned to Facility
char_253_greyy.text: What am I doing today?

char_253_greyy.title: Tap
char_253_greyy.text: Whoa…

char_253_greyy.title: Trust Tap
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, you're really tall... I-I wonder when I'll get to be that tall...

char_253_greyy.title: Title
char_253_greyy.text: Arknights.

char_253_greyy.title: Greeting
char_253_greyy.text: Doctor, you're back!

char_010_chen.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_010_chen.text: I will be your bodyguard, Doctor.

char_010_chen.title: Talk 1
char_010_chen.text: I've always had my suspicions about Rhodes Island. Still do.

char_010_chen.title: Talk 2
char_010_chen.text: Why are you staring at me? Nothing better to do?

char_010_chen.title: Talk 3
char_010_chen.text: Hmph.

char_010_chen.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_010_chen.text: I know every nook and cranny in Lungmen. The docks, the neon signs, the winding paths, I can see them all in my mind, clear as day. I'll never forget them.

char_010_chen.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_010_chen.text: Things around here have deteriorated lately. I'll be on guard, but I'll still need you to be careful.

char_010_chen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_010_chen.text: Maybe one day that man will take note of my efforts, but until then…

char_010_chen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_010_chen.text: Amiya trusts you completely. When I see you two together, it makes me wonder... what if I had someone like that by my side?

char_010_chen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_010_chen.text: I've... I've never been able to rely much on anyone, not even...

char_010_chen.title: Idle
char_010_chen.text: Doctor? You fell asleep? Hmph. No nerves to keep you awake, then.

char_010_chen.title: Onboard
char_010_chen.text: Ch'en. Leader of the L.G.D.'s Special Inspection Unit. For my own reasons,I'll be joining you for a while. Seeing as we're already well acquainted from our prior work together, I'll ask you to take me to my workplace now.

char_010_chen.title: Watching Battle Record
char_010_chen.text: It's all in the service of more efficient operations.

char_010_chen.title: Promotion 1
char_010_chen.text: A promotion? I've been through these things before.

char_010_chen.title: Promotion 2
char_010_chen.text: Roger. Just give me all the missions your usual Operators can't handle.

char_010_chen.title: Added to Squad
char_010_chen.text: No problem.

char_010_chen.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_010_chen.text: Listen up! We'll be much more efficient if we work together.

char_010_chen.title: Depart
char_010_chen.text: Everyone! Prepare for battle!

char_010_chen.title: Begin Operation
char_010_chen.text: Ready? Stick to the plan.

char_010_chen.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_010_chen.text: This is Ch'en.

char_010_chen.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_010_chen.text: Ready to move.

char_010_chen.title: Deployment 1
char_010_chen.text: Moving out!

char_010_chen.title: Deployment 2
char_010_chen.text: Take them out fast.

char_010_chen.title: In Battle 1
char_010_chen.text: Slash!

char_010_chen.title: In Battle 2
char_010_chen.text: Flash!

char_010_chen.title: In Battle 3
char_010_chen.text: Drop your weapon!

char_010_chen.title: In Battle 4
char_010_chen.text: Don't force my hand!

char_010_chen.title: 4-star Result
char_010_chen.text: Your evil must be stopped. I will do so by any means necessary.

char_010_chen.title: 3-star Result
char_010_chen.text: Where did you find the courage to challenge me?

char_010_chen.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_010_chen.text: The wounded wait here for a medivac. The rest of you, stay on guard.

char_010_chen.title: Operation Failure
char_010_chen.text: Tactical retreat. Don't break formation!

char_010_chen.title: Assigned to Facility
char_010_chen.text: So this is Rhodes Island's base? Bigger than I expected.

char_010_chen.title: Tap
char_010_chen.text: Hey! What are you doing!

char_010_chen.title: Trust Tap
char_010_chen.text: Doctor, you're in a good mood. Is it because that operation went well? Same here.

char_010_chen.title: Title
char_010_chen.text: Arknights.

char_010_chen.title: Greeting
char_010_chen.text: Oh, it's you, Doctor.

char_298_susuro.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_298_susuro.text: Time for a break, Doctor. Have you been at it since the last round? Take a break now, please.

char_298_susuro.title: Talk 1
char_298_susuro.text: It is my duty to perform regular check-ups on Oripathy patients. Some are personable enough, but a few are hard to communicate with. It's not the first time, though, so worry not, they will understand how vital a doctor is to them.

char_298_susuro.title: Talk 2
char_298_susuro.text: Do you know everything an amnesia patient should know? Don't work yourself into the ground. Work and relaxation are equally important!

char_298_susuro.title: Talk 3
char_298_susuro.text: You always have patients who ignore the doctor's orders, but in battle, a doctor can't ignore a cry for help.

char_298_susuro.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_298_susuro.text: The cruelty of war and disasters have often spurred the development of medicine, so doctors must be at the forefront of pain and suffering. As long as I can help my patients get their lives back, I'm ready to face that fact.

char_298_susuro.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_298_susuro.text: The time I've worked with you has been, uh... some of my happiest! Come on, Doctor, you know I'm not good with words, so don't play dumb!

char_298_susuro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_298_susuro.text: Here's a pen. How did I know you wanted it? Well, I've been working with you for a while now, isn't it natural I picked up on it?

char_298_susuro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_298_susuro.text: I'm still far below the level of Doctors Silence and Shining, but I'm not afraid of how hard it may be for me. How can I measure up to your confidence in me otherwise?

char_298_susuro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_298_susuro.text: The sun is indeed warm on the deck, and the breeze is cozy as well... No, I'm not slacking off. Even a doctor needs to relax, right? Why don't you tell me what's bothering you? You can even whisper it.

char_298_susuro.title: Idle
char_298_susuro.text: Who designed this meal plan? It's simply horrifying!

char_298_susuro.title: Onboard
char_298_susuro.text: Sussurro, Medic, reporting in and reminding you to follow your doctor's orders, no matter how much you have on your plate.

char_298_susuro.title: Watching Battle Record
char_298_susuro.text: I must make more copies of these battle notes for Myrrh and company.

char_298_susuro.title: Promotion 1
char_298_susuro.text: Promotion ceremony, while everyone stares at me? I don't have to make any embarrassing speeches, do I? No, no, I'm not nervous at all, really...

char_298_susuro.title: Promotion 2
char_298_susuro.text: For this promotion, I have to thank the entire hard-working Medical Unit behind me and the guidance of the Doctor. I'm very, very grateful to you all!

char_298_susuro.title: Added to Squad
char_298_susuro.text: Don't worry, I'll watch over them.

char_298_susuro.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_298_susuro.text: Hold everything! You must complete all pre-battle physical exam to deploy!

char_298_susuro.title: Depart
char_298_susuro.text: Attention, medics, please follow all standard procedures in a battle.

char_298_susuro.title: Begin Operation
char_298_susuro.text: Safety first, and do not touch anything that may be suspicious or infected!

char_298_susuro.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_298_susuro.text: I'm over here!

char_298_susuro.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_298_susuro.text: Louder! It's hard to hear over the battle!

char_298_susuro.title: Deployment 1
char_298_susuro.text: Look over here for a doctor!

char_298_susuro.title: Deployment 2
char_298_susuro.text: Anybody hurt?

char_298_susuro.title: In Battle 1
