char_298_susuro.text: Don't worry, you'll be okay in no time!

char_298_susuro.title: In Battle 2
char_298_susuro.text: Don't concern yourself with fighting, you're still wounded!

char_298_susuro.title: In Battle 3
char_298_susuro.text: Listen to the doctor!

char_298_susuro.title: In Battle 4
char_298_susuro.text: Scream if you're in pain, don't hold it in!

char_298_susuro.title: 4-star Result
char_298_susuro.text: Finally, the battle's over. You should take a break too. I imagine commanding the mission would take a toll on your body.

char_298_susuro.title: 3-star Result
char_298_susuro.text: No casualty on our side. The Doctor's leadership is indeed unparalleled.

char_298_susuro.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_298_susuro.text: Will the enemy return? There are still wounded unable to move here.

char_298_susuro.title: Operation Failure
char_298_susuro.text: Make way, make way! Stop crowding! Wounded coming through!

char_298_susuro.title: Assigned to Facility
char_298_susuro.text: Promise you'll rest when it's time to, okay?

char_298_susuro.title: Tap
char_298_susuro.text: Um...

char_298_susuro.title: Trust Tap
char_298_susuro.text: Phew. I need a drink after work! Mind handing me a juice, Doctor? Thanks!

char_298_susuro.title: Title
char_298_susuro.text: Arknights.

char_298_susuro.title: Greeting
char_298_susuro.text: How do you do, Doctor.

char_151_myrtle.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_151_myrtle.text: Hey, Doctor. I'm here to hang!

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk 1
char_151_myrtle.text: Doctor, don't look down on me just 'cause I'm little. Back where I'm from, all the kids looked up to me.

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk 2
char_151_myrtle.text: Durin used the name of our race as her codename because she's so lazy, but isn't it kind of dumb how calling me 'Myrtle of Durin' made me sound like I belong to her or something?

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk 3
char_151_myrtle.text: I understand how all the machines here work, but it still feels weird using them. Some have a lot of different parts, but some are surprisingly simple.

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_151_myrtle.text: My banner? Good eye, Doctor. It sure is a tablecloth from my house. I sneaked it out with me because it can't get dirty. My dad is probably pretty mad about it!

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_151_myrtle.text: Is my apple really that great? They're popular back home. You can study or play with it if you want, Doctor, just don't break it.

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_151_myrtle.text: There are still many things I'm not used to on land, but I love the many delicious foods. The cafe on Rhodes Island is my favorite!

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_151_myrtle.text: I do have to point out the fact, Doctor, that I am a full-grown adult! And I'm tall by Durin standards! Please tell everyone to stop patting me on the head and giving me candy!

char_151_myrtle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_151_myrtle.text: Say, Doctor, are you interested in my homeland? I can take you there! But it's pretty far, so wait till I'm in the mood.

char_151_myrtle.title: Idle
char_151_myrtle.text: Are you taking a break? You can use my banner as a blanket.

char_151_myrtle.title: Onboard
char_151_myrtle.text: Reporting in! You must be the Doctor? Call me Myrtle, Myrtle of Durin. Durin said I could get a job here, so what have you got for me? I may be small, but I'm tough!

char_151_myrtle.title: Watching Battle Record
char_151_myrtle.text: Cool fight... Got some more, Doctor?

char_151_myrtle.title: Promotion 1
char_151_myrtle.text: Oh, did I get promoted? Does that mean I can go somewhere I couldn't before?

char_151_myrtle.title: Promotion 2
char_151_myrtle.text: I told you I'm tough! Told you!

char_151_myrtle.title: Added to Squad
char_151_myrtle.text: There's a mission? I wanna go!

char_151_myrtle.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_151_myrtle.text: Don't anyone wander away.

char_151_myrtle.title: Depart
char_151_myrtle.text: Let's go!

char_151_myrtle.title: Begin Operation
char_151_myrtle.text: Don't worry, you got me!

char_151_myrtle.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_151_myrtle.text: Hmm?

char_151_myrtle.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_151_myrtle.text: Whoa, almost dozed off...

char_151_myrtle.title: Deployment 1
char_151_myrtle.text: Good scenery here, Doctor!

char_151_myrtle.title: Deployment 2
char_151_myrtle.text: I'm here to help!

char_151_myrtle.title: In Battle 1
char_151_myrtle.text: I have to get serious now!

char_151_myrtle.title: In Battle 2
char_151_myrtle.text: Gather around me, guys!

char_151_myrtle.title: In Battle 3
char_151_myrtle.text: We're counting on you again today, little apple.

char_151_myrtle.title: 4-star Result
char_151_myrtle.text: Phew, I'm exhausted! I wanna go to lie down, Doctor.

char_151_myrtle.title: 3-star Result
char_151_myrtle.text: Flawless victory! I was pretty good, wasn't I, Doctor?

char_151_myrtle.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_151_myrtle.text: We won, Doctor, and that's what counts!

char_151_myrtle.title: Operation Failure
char_151_myrtle.text: Run!

char_151_myrtle.title: Assigned to Facility
char_151_myrtle.text: Wow, Rhodes Island is huge!

char_151_myrtle.title: Tap
char_151_myrtle.text: Hey, that is fun!

char_151_myrtle.title: Trust Tap
char_151_myrtle.text: Why can't the cafe open 24 hours?

char_151_myrtle.title: Title
char_151_myrtle.text: Arknights.

char_151_myrtle.title: Greeting
char_151_myrtle.text: Any more fun things to do, Doctor?

char_274_astesi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_274_astesi.text: I drew up the work schedule for you. Please kindly follow.

char_274_astesi.title: Talk 1
char_274_astesi.text: How to make a celestial globe is a secret, but as we know, anything can be on the table for a fair price. I'd be happy to reveal my trick of the trade as long as your price is right.

char_274_astesi.title: Talk 2
char_274_astesi.text: Observing the stars everyday makes my neck sore. Wonder if the medics would have any suggestions for that... What, Miss. Warfarin is the physician on duty today? Um... I'll check again another day.

char_274_astesi.title: Talk 3
char_274_astesi.text: Astrology is learning about the present and the future from celestial alignments. It's not quite divination, but with the same result. So, would you like to give it a try, Doctor? It's free of charge!

char_274_astesi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_274_astesi.text: 'Similar genes, among blood relatives, causes, uh, reverberations of Originium...' I can barely understand a word in this work of an occultist. Doctor, Can you interpret the medical report for me?

char_274_astesi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_274_astesi.text: Ever since my Oripathic infection, the stars have diminished their responses to me. I must find a way to reverse it before I lose all my power. Otherwise I'l… Could you help me, Doctor?

char_274_astesi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_274_astesi.text: You want to know more about the organization I'm with? Sorry, I took an oath not to divulge anything, and it's not for public knowledge, anyway. If you're curious, just think of it as a completely neutral community.

char_274_astesi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_274_astesi.text: Sometimes, I envy Astgenne...  Ah, guess I should call her Elena now. She has everything I'm missing... But like you said, Doctor, we relied on each other because we complement each other, that's why we're sisters.

char_274_astesi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_274_astesi.text: As the nights bid us farewell, so do the starlights fade and quell. If this is the end that awaits us ahead, I should be picking up something more meaningful to do. Such as? Umm... Doctor, do you mind me waking you up every morning?

char_274_astesi.title: Idle
char_274_astesi.text: The tea's ready, Doctor. Time for a little break.

char_274_astesi.title: Onboard
char_274_astesi.text: Astesia, astrologer, reporting for guard duty. I'm yours to command, Doctor.

char_274_astesi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_274_astesi.text: No report after viewing?

char_274_astesi.title: Promotion 1
char_274_astesi.text: A promotion medal? How exquisite. I'll treasure it well.

char_274_astesi.title: Promotion 2
char_274_astesi.text: Stars shine bright, bearing witness of our past nights.

char_274_astesi.title: Added to Squad
char_274_astesi.text: I'm over here, Doctor.

char_274_astesi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_274_astesi.text: Let me be the guiding star for all.

char_274_astesi.title: Depart
char_274_astesi.text: There's no turning back now.

char_274_astesi.title: Begin Operation
char_274_astesi.text: The stars will light our way.

char_274_astesi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_274_astesi.text: Ready for action.

char_274_astesi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_274_astesi.text: Is it my turn, Doctor?

char_274_astesi.title: Deployment 1
char_274_astesi.text: Don't panic, Astesia. Do it like you usually do.

char_274_astesi.title: Deployment 2
char_274_astesi.text: Time to prove myself.

char_274_astesi.title: In Battle 1
char_274_astesi.text: Defend with me, steadfast Taurus.

char_274_astesi.title: In Battle 2
char_274_astesi.text: Lend me your wings, avians among the stars!

char_274_astesi.title: In Battle 3
char_274_astesi.text: The serpent has brought about your end.

char_274_astesi.title: In Battle 4
char_274_astesi.text: The light of stars shall be my blade!

char_274_astesi.title: 4-star Result
char_274_astesi.text: So this is 'our' power, a power even the stars failed to foresee...

char_274_astesi.title: 3-star Result
char_274_astesi.text: Fantastic results, Doctor. But don't overwork yourself, be sure to rest up well.

char_274_astesi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_274_astesi.text: If I put in more effort, maybe the outcome could be better…

char_274_astesi.title: Operation Failure
char_274_astesi.text: I'm dead on my feet... but it's not time to quit yet

char_274_astesi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_274_astesi.text: Let me see... Yes, the layout's good. The furniture won't attract any unwanted spirits this way.

char_274_astesi.title: Tap
char_274_astesi.text: W-Wait!

char_274_astesi.title: Trust Tap
char_274_astesi.text: W-What's that... something on my face?

char_274_astesi.title: Title
char_274_astesi.text: Arknights.

char_274_astesi.title: Greeting
char_274_astesi.text: Good morning, Doctor.

char_326_glacus.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_326_glacus.text: I'll be quiet modifying the Raythean Franker close by... I won't disturb you, I promise.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk 1
char_326_glacus.text: Why does everyone always keep their distance from Blue Poison? Am I missing something...? All right.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk 2
char_326_glacus.text: Anything you would like to say, Doctor? No? Well, anyway, I'm here.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk 3
char_326_glacus.text: No one in a hot dorm is going to have any appetite... Oh, it's a family thing, I'm not actually complaining.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_326_glacus.text: Why would I leave home to come here if I can't even run free?

char_326_glacus.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_326_glacus.text: While Vulcan doesn't appreciate 'old things' like me, I still feel we have different fundamental philosophies.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_326_glacus.text: So, Doctor, Blue Poison said I always seem to be hiding something. Do I? Occasionally? No way...

char_326_glacus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_326_glacus.text: It's not I don't want to talk, it's just that I seldom had the right to in the past, so I got used to not speaking up! Hope you won't take it the wrong way, {@nickname}.

char_326_glacus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_326_glacus.text: Two memories stand out to me. One is the wide-open, splendid scenery I saw the first time I ran with the child. For the other, I'll say right here, right now on Rhodes Island.

char_326_glacus.title: Idle
char_326_glacus.text: Hey, when did the Doctor fall asleep...?

char_326_glacus.title: Onboard
char_326_glacus.text: Operator Glaucus reporting. May I go back to my room now?

char_326_glacus.title: Watching Battle Record
char_326_glacus.text: Huh? Yes, I see. Got it.

char_326_glacus.title: Promotion 1
char_326_glacus.text: I named the weapon, actually. Maybe that's what I really think... What, did they just announce my name for promotion?

char_326_glacus.title: Promotion 2
char_326_glacus.text: Trust...? Well, I don't know how to show it, but I'll keep trying.

char_326_glacus.title: Added to Squad
char_326_glacus.text: Have the members followed the proper landing procedure?

char_326_glacus.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_326_glacus.text: What? I'm the captain? Did I agree without realizing it?

char_326_glacus.title: Depart
char_326_glacus.text: What interesting thing will we pick up this time?

char_326_glacus.title: Begin Operation
char_326_glacus.text: EMP field ready.

char_326_glacus.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_326_glacus.text: Calling for me?

char_326_glacus.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_326_glacus.text: Fully charged and ready to go.

char_326_glacus.title: Deployment 1
char_326_glacus.text: Feeling the surface...

char_326_glacus.title: Deployment 2
char_326_glacus.text: Don't worry, it's a successful landing.

char_326_glacus.title: In Battle 1
char_326_glacus.text: Discharge!

char_326_glacus.title: In Battle 2
char_326_glacus.text: Never mind accidents now...!

char_326_glacus.title: In Battle 3
char_326_glacus.text: Increase microwave frequency!

char_326_glacus.title: In Battle 4
char_326_glacus.text: Time to fall!

char_326_glacus.title: 4-star Result
char_326_glacus.text: Enemy silent. Please check damage on yourself.

char_326_glacus.title: 3-star Result
char_326_glacus.text: All units silent, EMP field canceled. Nice work, everyone.

char_326_glacus.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_326_glacus.text: Did some enemy escape? Aren't we pursuing?

char_326_glacus.title: Operation Failure
char_326_glacus.text: EMP field is canceled. Call for backup, quickly!

char_326_glacus.title: Assigned to Facility
char_326_glacus.text: No problem, as soon as I find that screw first...

char_326_glacus.title: Tap
char_326_glacus.text: Oops...

char_326_glacus.title: Trust Tap
char_326_glacus.text: Mind taking a walk with me, Doctor?

char_326_glacus.title: Title
char_326_glacus.text: Arknights.

char_326_glacus.title: Greeting
char_326_glacus.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_348_ceylon.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_348_ceylon.text: I'll be writing reports or reading nearby, just call when you need me.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk 1
char_348_ceylon.text: I believe you reap what you sow, and have always followed that principle.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk 2
char_348_ceylon.text: ...Wait, I didn't know Oripathy could take on this characteristic! This needs to be investigated immediately! Doctor, if you'd excuse me... Hmm, I wonder if there are any suitable subjects in Rhodes Islands...

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk 3
char_348_ceylon.text: The day is not complete without tea. Would you like a cup too, Doctor? I have the best tea leaves in all Victoria.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_348_ceylon.text: I've been with Schwarz since childhood. I know everything about her, including her past before we met. But I'm not giving that up so easily.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_348_ceylon.text: If I could find a cure for Schwarz, wouldn't that mean I could cure other infected too? Worry not, Doctor, I'm not that selfish. But please also know that Schwarz is dearest to my heart.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_348_ceylon.text: Originium research is still a vastly unexplored territory, Doctor. But I just want to find a cure, which is why I longed for Rhodes Island ever since I heard about it.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_348_ceylon.text: Doctor, did you know, I hate those who would discriminate against Schwarz because of her infection. But, there are no people like that here at Rhodes Island. No-one here will reject her, and I can further my medical knowledge... I'm really glad that I came here.

char_348_ceylon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_348_ceylon.text: Regardless of how good a leader is, there's still a chance she could be blinded by selfish interest, so you must watch out for that, Doctor. But as long as I'm around, I'll put you back on the right path anytime you stray.

char_348_ceylon.title: Idle
char_348_ceylon.text: Doctor, it's not good to sleep while sitting up... Mm, I guess it's fine. Let me at least get a blanket for you.

char_348_ceylon.title: Onboard
char_348_ceylon.text: Hello, I'm Ceylon, graduate of the Victoria National University with a major in Originium research. I start my internship on Rhodes Island today with Dr. Kal'tsit's approval. Nice to meet you, Doctor.

char_348_ceylon.title: Watching Battle Record
char_348_ceylon.text: An excellent application of Originium. Rhodes Island sure lives up to its reputation!

char_348_ceylon.title: Promotion 1
char_348_ceylon.text: So I'm officially recognized by Rhodes Island? Thank you, Doctor, I'll work even harder!

char_348_ceylon.title: Promotion 2
char_348_ceylon.text: Rhodes Island does boast amazing Originium research! I will cure Schwarz one day if I keep working here! Please help me too, Doctor!

char_348_ceylon.title: Added to Squad
char_348_ceylon.text: A mission? Perfect time to try out my new Originium ability.

char_348_ceylon.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_348_ceylon.text: Relax, I'm a pretty good commander.

char_348_ceylon.title: Depart
char_348_ceylon.text: I wonder if we'll find rare materials along the way?

char_348_ceylon.title: Begin Operation
char_348_ceylon.text: Don't panic, handle it with composure.

char_348_ceylon.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_348_ceylon.text: Where's the wounded?

char_348_ceylon.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_348_ceylon.text: Hmm?

char_348_ceylon.title: Deployment 1
char_348_ceylon.text: Leave the support work to me.

char_348_ceylon.title: Deployment 2
char_348_ceylon.text: The wounded shouldn't move around.

char_348_ceylon.title: In Battle 1
char_348_ceylon.text: Battle in peace, everyone.

char_348_ceylon.title: In Battle 2
char_348_ceylon.text: Concentrate on the enemy ahead!

char_348_ceylon.title: In Battle 3
char_348_ceylon.text: This move should be better for the present situation.

char_348_ceylon.title: 4-star Result
char_348_ceylon.text: Phew... Hehe, it feels like I just finished a difficult experiment. I might be tired, but I feel a sense of accomplishment.

char_348_ceylon.title: 3-star Result
char_348_ceylon.text: The enemy should be gone now, so I'm going to look around the perimeter.

char_348_ceylon.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_348_ceylon.text: They wouldn't have gotten away if I were Schwarz...

char_348_ceylon.title: Operation Failure
char_348_ceylon.text: Don't just stand there, Doctor, give me a hand with the wounded!

char_348_ceylon.title: Assigned to Facility
char_348_ceylon.text: Maybe talk to the other doctors on base.

char_348_ceylon.title: Tap
char_348_ceylon.text: Wait, my hair is getting messed up!

char_348_ceylon.title: Trust Tap
char_348_ceylon.text: Don't tell me the Doctor dozed off in the chair again...

char_348_ceylon.title: Title
char_348_ceylon.text: Arknights.

char_348_ceylon.title: Greeting
char_348_ceylon.text: How are you, Doctor? Care for some tea with me?

char_340_shwaz.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_340_shwaz.text: I've noted down your schedule. You can confirm with me anytime.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk 1
char_340_shwaz.text: If it's about making someone bleed, do not send Lady Ceylon to the task. Let those who live amongst the shadow take it over, like me.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk 2
char_340_shwaz.text: I won't tell you anything more about Lady Ceylon. And of course, others won't learn anything more about you from me.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk 3
char_340_shwaz.text: I'm your bodyguard, Doctor. My duty is to protect you, not chat with you. If you want to talk, please stop turning to me like Lady Ceylon does and find someone else.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_340_shwaz.text: My expertise? Killing targets, guarding people, and... making tea. Don't be so shocked. After all, the tea Lady Ceylon makes is… Anyway, I'm good at that.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_340_shwaz.text: Doctor, based on the danger involved in the missions to date, I believe you need to learn self-defense in addition to my protection. Otherwise, even I can't guarantee your safety.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_340_shwaz.text: Once you've got blood on your hands, there's no turning back… Doctor, I do not wish you to go down the same road as mine. So leave the dirty works to me.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_340_shwaz.text: You want to hear my revenge story? You won't be able to sleep at night, Doctor. But… somehow I do have this strange urge to tell you. Well then, let's hit the bar. This story will take a while.

char_340_shwaz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_340_shwaz.text: Sinners always get what they deserve, I know that. But I do wonder sometimes that... if I could have met Lady Ceylon and you sooner, maybe I'd be more than just a killer. It's still not too late for me? Do you really mean that, Doctor?

char_340_shwaz.title: Idle
char_340_shwaz.text: Falls asleep just like that? Can't keep a guard up at all, just like her.

char_340_shwaz.title: Onboard
char_340_shwaz.text: I'm Schwarz, Lady Ceylon's personal bodyguard, here to join Rhodes Island with her. If at all possible, please assign me to accompany her.

char_340_shwaz.title: Watching Battle Record
char_340_shwaz.text: I see that Rhodes Island is teeming with war monsters. I can only try to learn their way of battle.

char_340_shwaz.title: Promotion 1
char_340_shwaz.text: Now I understand why Rhodes Island wanted me. Your vision is a hundred times crazier than anything I ever did.

char_340_shwaz.title: Promotion 2
char_340_shwaz.text: Reawaken my memories? I'm fine with it. Maybe you can tame the evil inside us when on battlefields. Please, tame it for us.

char_340_shwaz.title: Added to Squad
char_340_shwaz.text: A mission? Got it

char_340_shwaz.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_340_shwaz.text: Follow my orders.

char_340_shwaz.title: Depart
char_340_shwaz.text: Let's go.

char_340_shwaz.title: Begin Operation
char_340_shwaz.text: None will escape.

char_340_shwaz.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_340_shwaz.text: Where am I needed?

char_340_shwaz.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_340_shwaz.text: Here.

char_340_shwaz.title: Deployment 1
char_340_shwaz.text: A solid position.

char_340_shwaz.title: Deployment 2
char_340_shwaz.text: They won't get away.

char_340_shwaz.title: In Battle 1
char_340_shwaz.text: I've got you in my sight.

char_340_shwaz.title: In Battle 2
char_340_shwaz.text: Way too obvious.

char_340_shwaz.title: In Battle 3
char_340_shwaz.text: Unworthy of my shots.

char_340_shwaz.title: In Battle 4
char_340_shwaz.text: Lady Ceylon may have mercy. I do not.

char_340_shwaz.title: 4-star Result
char_340_shwaz.text: Doctor, in a dangerous mission like this,  you'd better give you command from as far as possible.

char_340_shwaz.title: 3-star Result
char_340_shwaz.text: We got everyone, per your order.

char_340_shwaz.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_340_shwaz.text: The perimeter is secured. What's next?

char_340_shwaz.title: Operation Failure
char_340_shwaz.text: Come, Doctor, I'll ensure your safety.

char_340_shwaz.title: Assigned to Facility
char_340_shwaz.text: Patrol? Got it.

char_340_shwaz.title: Tap
char_340_shwaz.text: ...?! Please, Doctor, I don't want you to hurt yourself.

char_340_shwaz.title: Trust Tap
char_340_shwaz.text: Doctor, I suppose everything's fine?

char_340_shwaz.title: Title
char_340_shwaz.text: Arknights.

char_340_shwaz.title: Greeting
char_340_shwaz.text: Don't let your guard down even on base, Doctor.

char_188_helage.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_188_helage.text: Queching the flames of war demands prolonged suffering. To ignite them, however, it takes naught but a lapse of thought.

char_188_helage.title: Talk 1
char_188_helage.text: The fall of Chernobog dealt a devastating blow to Azazel, our clinic. I must rebuild it for the children. As long as they can have a shelter to call home, any place will do. You don't need a reason to try for your family.

char_188_helage.title: Talk 2
char_188_helage.text: Rhodes Island is in a respectable position, but the Infected of Ursus face prospects far worse than anyone could imagine. They must be ready to resort to violence in order to survive. At the end of the day, virtue and dignity hold meaning only for those who live to see the next dawn.

char_188_helage.title: Talk 3
char_188_helage.text: All Ursus should take pride in their nation and their Emperor.' I, too, fought for Ursus once, but I don't have the passion driving me anymore. Time has robbed me of too much.

char_188_helage.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_188_helage.text: Life in the military has taught me two things: First, have faith in your fellow soldiers; second, have faith in them, but do not trust them. This dilemma has always plagued our lands, and none can escape it.

char_188_helage.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_188_helage.text: Dr. {@nickname}, a limitless future awaits you, just as it does for those children. Though I can neither let go of yesterday nor look forward to tomorrow, I shall fight for you till my last drop of blood, so you may be part of that future.

char_188_helage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_188_helage.text: I am fine with Ursus as my enemy. Once I swore my utmost loyalty to it, but that was returned with endless disillusionment and shame. For the children's sake, I will never falter, much less surrender.

char_188_helage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_188_helage.text: Once there was a long battle. When I finally broke into the enemy headquarters, I was too late... All I could do for my dying friend was take his pocket watch and sword. The enemy lost their commander, whose death brought us a brief victory. That day, Ursus enjoyed her momentary triumph, but I knew my war was over. A war where I lost everything.

char_188_helage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_188_helage.text: The photograph inside my pocket watch? Hahahah, so you saw it... This is Neon from when she was little. Isn't she adorable? She's not so quiet anymore, but she loves herself now, and that's all that matters... Live free, Dr. {@nickname}, that's my wish, even if it is trite.

char_188_helage.title: Idle
char_188_helage.text: Don't lose focus. You must be alert at all times on Rhodes Island.

char_188_helage.title: Onboard
char_188_helage.text: Hellagur, an infected mercenary. I will work with Rhodes Island in order to rebuild my Azazel Clinic and protect my family. But be advised, I have no medical skills.

char_188_helage.title: Watching Battle Record
char_188_helage.text: Battlefields may change, but not the cruelty.

char_188_helage.title: Promotion 1
char_188_helage.text: I'm used to it as a soldier, but I find it fascinating as an infected. Thank you for the ribbon, Dr. {@nickname}.

char_188_helage.title: Promotion 2
char_188_helage.text: War will never truly be over, but I believe even this land will end eventually. Maybe you can end our suffering one day, Dr. {@nickname}. Now, give me your order!

char_188_helage.title: Added to Squad
char_188_helage.text: Only butchers thirst for blood. We are merely paying the price of survival.

char_188_helage.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_188_helage.text: I'll have them following orders to Ursus army standards!

char_188_helage.title: Depart
char_188_helage.text: I don't mind losing my life, if that is enough to end this all.

char_188_helage.title: Begin Operation
char_188_helage.text: You have never seen a real war, pathetic runts.

char_188_helage.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_188_helage.text: I was born to fight.

char_188_helage.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_188_helage.text: A slip of the mind is the difference between life and death.

char_188_helage.title: Deployment 1
char_188_helage.text: Killing is but the last resort.

char_188_helage.title: Deployment 2
char_188_helage.text: I've never truly left the battlefield, I know.

char_188_helage.title: In Battle 1
char_188_helage.text: A lash of blade, the flesh to flay.

char_188_helage.title: In Battle 2
char_188_helage.text: A thrust of whip, the sword to rip.

char_188_helage.title: In Battle 3
char_188_helage.text: A cleave of spear, the armor to tear!

char_188_helage.title: In Battle 4
char_188_helage.text: Decapitator'… Our sacrifices were not in vain.

char_188_helage.title: 4-star Result
char_188_helage.text: You leave the fight behind, and pay for it with yet more fighting.

char_188_helage.title: 3-star Result
char_188_helage.text: Avert your eyes, I'm about to end their misery.

char_188_helage.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_188_helage.text: Keep your guard up. One flaw is all the enemy needs to turn the tables.

char_188_helage.title: Operation Failure
char_188_helage.text: There is no shame in failure. At least you had the chance to learn from it.

char_188_helage.title: Assigned to Facility
char_188_helage.text: If only I can find shelter for the children.

char_188_helage.title: Tap
char_188_helage.text: Hmm?

char_188_helage.title: Trust Tap
char_188_helage.text: Would you like a candy? I still have some. But watch out for cavities.

char_188_helage.title: Title
char_188_helage.text: Arknights.

char_188_helage.title: Greeting
char_188_helage.text: You look well, Doctor.

char_260_durnar.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_260_durnar.text: Aw, c'mon, get someone more literate for this job. I'm a soldier, all I know is following orders. Paperwork's beyond me.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk 1
char_260_durnar.text: Life is tough enough already. Let's relax with some butter, frosting and jam.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk 2
char_260_durnar.text: If Frostleaf wasn't still lugging that big axe around, there's no way I would've recognized her. We fought together before, probably as enemies. Anyway, I'm relieved to see her living the good life at Rhodes Island.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk 3
char_260_durnar.text: Watch it, Doctor, you can't go touching my weapon. I just replaced the Originium on that thing. It's dangerous when you hold it wrong... Look out! I, I'll take you to Medical...

char_260_durnar.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_260_durnar.text: Defensive ability is what matters to a Defender. I don't care if it's organic fiber or ceramic padding, as long as it's the state-of-the-art, just buy it!

char_260_durnar.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_260_durnar.text: Stories from my past? Umm… Don't have much to say. I mean, what kind of story could a bad tempered soldier have? All those merits and medals... Hmph, they're nothing in the face of the lives lost.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_260_durnar.text: The greenies we got in the reserves are pretty good. But they suck at securing amenities. Back in my day, the rookies were way smarter about hiding cookies.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_260_durnar.text: I talked to Logistics. From now on, they're putting 'Industrial Material' on all our snack packaging. Then, all we need is you to sign off on them for us, Doctor.

char_260_durnar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_260_durnar.text: Doctor? Oh, sorry. I was all caught up in reminiscing. I still can't get past certain things. If my old commander was anything like you, maybe... We wouldn't have had to go through that.

char_260_durnar.title: Idle
char_260_durnar.text: Psst, Psst! Want some pop rocks? I got all kinds. I know I got one you'll love.

char_260_durnar.title: Onboard
char_260_durnar.text: Hard as rock and lethal as lightning! That's me, Dur-nar. Nice to meet you, Doctor.

char_260_durnar.title: Watching Battle Record
char_260_durnar.text: Ah, shoot, I'm out of popcorn.

char_260_durnar.title: Promotion 1
char_260_durnar.text: A promotion? Good, good, do I get paid more too? Awesome!

char_260_durnar.title: Promotion 2
char_260_durnar.text: The old me only knew how to charge on ahead and fight without stopping. Now, I fight for everybody. Just give your orders, Doctor.

char_260_durnar.title: Added to Squad
char_260_durnar.text: Ready to deploy. Where am I needed?

char_260_durnar.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_260_durnar.text: I only have one request: Safety first and don't ever forget it.

char_260_durnar.title: Depart
char_260_durnar.text: We're off! Remember to stay frosty and keep an eye out.

char_260_durnar.title: Begin Operation
char_260_durnar.text: I never did get used to the stench of war.

char_260_durnar.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_260_durnar.text: Yes sir!

char_260_durnar.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_260_durnar.text: In position!

char_260_durnar.title: Deployment 1
char_260_durnar.text: I'll leave the support to you.

char_260_durnar.title: Deployment 2
char_260_durnar.text: Cover me!

char_260_durnar.title: In Battle 1
char_260_durnar.text: Hold the line!

char_260_durnar.title: In Battle 2
char_260_durnar.text: Don't be an idiot!

char_260_durnar.title: In Battle 3
char_260_durnar.text: Ya ain't gettin' through me!

char_260_durnar.title: In Battle 4
char_260_durnar.text: Stay down!

char_260_durnar.title: 4-star Result
char_260_durnar.text: Ever heard of the Medal of Glory? I feel that's tailor-made for you.

char_260_durnar.title: 3-star Result
char_260_durnar.text: No need to clean up the battlefield? Okay, then we're done here.

char_260_durnar.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_260_durnar.text: The enemy still hasn't gone far. Should we chase them down?

char_260_durnar.title: Operation Failure
char_260_durnar.text: Take it easy, Doctor. It's not your fault...

char_260_durnar.title: Assigned to Facility
char_260_durnar.text: Whoa, I bet a fancy interior like this cost a bundle!

char_260_durnar.title: Tap
char_260_durnar.text: Hmph, Who the--

char_260_durnar.title: Trust Tap
char_260_durnar.text: You must be drunk to want to hear me sing war songs. Okay, don't you regret it.

char_260_durnar.title: Title
char_260_durnar.text: Arknights.

char_260_durnar.title: Greeting
char_260_durnar.text: Good morning!

char_355_ethan.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_355_ethan.text: Yo, Doctor! Is it time for my shift? Hmm? I suddenly popped up out of nowhere? Nope, just got here.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk 1
char_355_ethan.text: C'mon, man, I worked with you on my background check. And I told you a million times: My last job was with Reunion, sure. But I wasn't mixed up in any of the criminal stuff. No guilt here!

char_355_ethan.title: Talk 2
char_355_ethan.text: If there's one thing I really hated about Reunion, it was the food! If you can even call it food… My team mostly got by on rock-hard black bread. I had to throw it in a pot and simmer it into stew every time. Those people were just brutal on their stomachs.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk 3
char_355_ethan.text: You must've run into Reunion's 'Wraith' guys a whole bunch of times, right? I was one of those. They sent me to scout stuff, never did any fighting. I used to place bets on who would or wouldn't get seen as a way to deal with the boredom. Thinking back, I guess that was kind of rough on the other guys.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_355_ethan.text: What did I do before I joined Reunion? I was playing hide n' seek with the Infected hunters, duh. With my sneaky little power here, they went home empty-handed every time, haha… But all I could do was hide. And that wasn't gonna help change things for the Infected.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_355_ethan.text: I joined up with the underground because I wanted to help other Infected. But over time, I got jaded, then I stopped being a good guy... Well, at least my hands are 'clean' again. What do I mean by that? Hehe, that's enough questions, friend. Never you mind.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_355_ethan.text: Look, camouflage Arts are really complicated! First, you gotta actually know the compisition and texture of your surroundings. Then, you memorize the shape of every crack in the wall, and all the colors of all the soil and every tree. If you don't have those down, even your nerves will get you popping out, and then it's only a matter of time until you're made.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_355_ethan.text: You were the only one in the office, and your snacks disappeared as soon as you turned your head? Wow, that's weird. Why don't you leave it to me? I'll solve this mystery and bring the thief right to you. Yep.

char_355_ethan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_355_ethan.text: So this is a map of the operating area? Let's see… Wow, you're really something. Your strategies are so clever, no wonder Reunion always got their asses handed to them. Okay, I'm moving out!

char_355_ethan.title: Idle
char_355_ethan.text: Hm? The door isn't locked?

char_355_ethan.title: Onboard
char_355_ethan.text: Where am I? Right in front of you! You can call me Ethan. How did I get in here? Haha! Can't answer that one yet.

char_355_ethan.title: Watching Battle Record
char_355_ethan.text: Where was I? C'mon! Right over there! Look at the top left of screen. Top left corner!

char_355_ethan.title: Promotion 1
char_355_ethan.text: Haha, I told you before right? You won't regret putting work into my hands.

char_355_ethan.title: Promotion 2
char_355_ethan.text: Yo, Doctor. Make sure you remember the little guys like me. I could die in some battle somewhere and nobody would even know I was gone. So please, remember where I am!

char_355_ethan.title: Added to Squad
char_355_ethan.text: The wall moved, right before your eyes? Naw, you're exaggerating, definitely.

char_355_ethan.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_355_ethan.text: Eyyy! I'm the captain now, so you'd all better listen up!

char_355_ethan.title: Depart
char_355_ethan.text: Don't panic if you suddenly notice a missing squadmate.

char_355_ethan.title: Begin Operation
char_355_ethan.text: Time to fight? I gotta hide first!

char_355_ethan.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_355_ethan.text: Hey, over here!

char_355_ethan.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_355_ethan.text: What's the plan?

char_355_ethan.title: Deployment 1
char_355_ethan.text: Let's dance.

char_355_ethan.title: Deployment 2
char_355_ethan.text: Good spot here.

char_355_ethan.title: In Battle 1
char_355_ethan.text: Get 'em! Get 'em good!

char_355_ethan.title: In Battle 2
char_355_ethan.text: Violence can't solve all your problems, but it can solve you!

char_355_ethan.title: In Battle 3
char_355_ethan.text: Haha, you can't see me!

char_355_ethan.title: In Battle 4
char_355_ethan.text: Feel like you're gonna faint?

char_355_ethan.title: 4-star Result
char_355_ethan.text: Are we done fighting? Ahh, I'm beat!

char_355_ethan.title: 3-star Result
char_355_ethan.text: I worked pretty hard. You saw me, right? Right?

char_355_ethan.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_355_ethan.text: So what if they got away. Just let 'em go.

char_355_ethan.title: Operation Failure
char_355_ethan.text: You should go first, at least I can grab their legs.

char_355_ethan.title: Assigned to Facility
char_355_ethan.text: Nice room you got here. Let's see what sticks out the most.

char_355_ethan.title: Tap
char_355_ethan.text: Oh, you found me.

char_355_ethan.title: Trust Tap
char_355_ethan.text: Hey, wanna go for a stroll?

char_355_ethan.title: Title
char_355_ethan.text: Arknights.

char_355_ethan.title: Greeting
char_355_ethan.text: Hey, Doctor, somebody looks happy. Did something good happen?

char_275_breeze.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_275_breeze.text: I'll gladly offer my help if you need it. Just remember to return the favor someday.

char_275_breeze.title: Talk 1
char_275_breeze.text: Vina... Err, I mean, Miss Siege—always gives me this feeling I can't describe. I wonder why...?

char_275_breeze.title: Talk 2
char_275_breeze.text: My dad? Oh my, you know I ran away from home and you're still going to ask me that? Doctor, are you perhaps not the best at conversation?

char_275_breeze.title: Talk 3
char_275_breeze.text: Dr. {@nickname}! Do have a try of my cooking... You taste medicine? Oh, gosh... Well, I do have some knowledge in herbs, but you know I wouldn't be experimenting on you, would I? Eheheh...

char_275_breeze.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_275_breeze.text: I used to think my parents were so stuffy and numb to it all, so I ran away from home to find a new life. But after having traveled so far and been through so much, I've come to realize why my parents felt how they did now. Ahahah, c'est la vie, as the saying goes.

char_275_breeze.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_275_breeze.text: Dr. {@nickname}, see that lone cloud over there, off from the rest? That's the way my hometown lies.

char_275_breeze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_275_breeze.text: Faith' is an interesting topic. I never had the chance to go to Laterano, but how funny I should hear all about its feats on Rhodes Island? Although I've mostly heard about, er... one very overly active girl. Has Laterano always been such a lively place?

char_275_breeze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_275_breeze.text: The boats of Toron need a lighthouse to make their way back to port, and Rhodes Island has served as the safe haven at the end of my trip. Dr. {@nickname}, your light might not illuminate the whole harbor, but go on... Do what I couldn't. It's my honest request.

char_275_breeze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_275_breeze.text: Right here, right now, is where I, Grace Arizona, place my faith. Dr. {@nickname}, you hold my hopes in your hands, forever more.

char_275_breeze.title: Idle
char_275_breeze.text: ...That's the face of someone lost in their dreams. I wonder if you're feeling uneasy, Doctor?

char_275_breeze.title: Onboard
char_275_breeze.text: Breeze, a traveling scholar from Toron County. It is a pleasure to meet you, Doctor. Phew, I've had enough of formal etiquette, so this will be the last of it.

char_275_breeze.title: Watching Battle Record
char_275_breeze.text: ...Stunning medical skills. There's Rhodes Island for you...

char_275_breeze.title: Promotion 1
char_275_breeze.text: I bestow my heartfelt blessings on you for your gift, Doctor. Hmm? What a shoddy reaction—this is a hand-kiss, you know, we're being serious here. Hurry up, come on!

char_275_breeze.title: Promotion 2
char_275_breeze.text: Well, this time won't be as mannerful as the last, not that I'd think you were hoping for that? So here goes. I will dedicate everything to Rhodes Island, a pledge that transcends my consciousness.

char_275_breeze.title: Added to Squad
char_275_breeze.text: Leave the medical work to me.

char_275_breeze.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_275_breeze.text: Thank you for your trust. I will make sure to prioritize the safety of the Operators.

char_275_breeze.title: Depart
char_275_breeze.text: It's getting windy...

char_275_breeze.title: Begin Operation
char_275_breeze.text: Those who seek to inflict harm on others have no right to ask for forgiveness.

char_275_breeze.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_275_breeze.text: Here.

char_275_breeze.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_275_breeze.text: Awaiting orders.

char_275_breeze.title: Deployment 1
char_275_breeze.text: Let's get this done quickly.

char_275_breeze.title: Deployment 2
char_275_breeze.text: Make sure to look after yourself.

char_275_breeze.title: In Battle 1
char_275_breeze.text: Rings through winds the Eulogy…

char_275_breeze.title: In Battle 2
char_275_breeze.text: Sings the breeze an elegy!

char_275_breeze.title: In Battle 3
char_275_breeze.text: We have the will!

char_275_breeze.title: 4-star Result
char_275_breeze.text: Everyone, victory is ours.

char_275_breeze.title: 3-star Result
char_275_breeze.text: Every victory creates a kindling that will flourish into an everlasting fire.

char_275_breeze.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_275_breeze.text: Keep your senses alert. The wind is still restless.

char_275_breeze.title: Operation Failure
char_275_breeze.text: Why are they so fixated on hurting others...?

char_275_breeze.title: Assigned to Facility
char_275_breeze.text: What a... unique place this is.

char_275_breeze.title: Tap
char_275_breeze.text: Wait, wait!

char_275_breeze.title: Trust Tap
char_275_breeze.text: Doctor, would you like to hear the story of my hometown?

char_275_breeze.title: Title
char_275_breeze.text: Arknights.

char_275_breeze.title: Greeting
char_275_breeze.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_248_mgllan.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_248_mgllan.text: I'll stay with you until my next expedition, Doctor. Don't be afraid to send me out anywhere you need me.

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk 1
char_248_mgllan.text: I actually heard about you a long time ago, Doctor! Yeah, Mayer and MuMu told me all about you. I just had to come to Rhodes Island to see what you're like in person. Oh, I also got a little present for you! Here!

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk 2
char_248_mgllan.text: This one? It's an Emperor strap! Who...? The Emperor of Penguin Logistics! I visited that company a whole bunch, so I've met him lots of times. He's so cute! I give him plenty of pets every time I go! You ever pet him before, Doctor? You don't dare? Why?!

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk 3
char_248_mgllan.text: Is Iffy doing better these days? Last time I left Rhine Lab, she was in pretty bad shape. I've been worried about her…

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_248_mgllan.text: Has Mayer made anything new? I haven't worked on any new equipment for a long time, so I wanna do some research with her. Oh right, Doctor, I'll let you in on a little secret. If you bother Mayer while she's working... What? She already bit you?

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_248_mgllan.text: Unlike Meeboo, Sisyphus or Kirkika, my drones are operated differently. There is a limit to how many I can run at once, and it's just the way it goes. But I have a new system in development. I think you'll be surprised before long.

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_248_mgllan.text: The North? It's like a cold, cruel wonderland. But it's also the place where my dreams lie. And I'm willing to do whatever it takes to make them come true.

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_248_mgllan.text: 'The tiny gardner, and the tiny flower, growing under the tile with no one to care for it...' It was Iffy's favorite storybook, maybe because it resonated with her. But, well... It seems like she doesn't remember it. Hmm… that's odd.

char_248_mgllan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_248_mgllan.text: The North... it's both mysterious and beautiful. The towering cliffs, the lonely, snow-covered trees, the glowing, prismatic Originum crystals… And the vast snowland, stretching to the ends of the earth. Doctor, you should come see it with me. We'll go together, okay?

char_248_mgllan.title: Idle
char_248_mgllan.text: Doctor? Stay awake Doctor! If you fall asleep, you'll freeze to death!

char_248_mgllan.title: Onboard
char_248_mgllan.text: Rhine Lab Specialist Magallan just discovered a mysterous research vessel! And you are…? Oh my goodness, you're that doctor from Rhodes Island! Uh, W-Would you like to join my expedition!? Adventuring together would be really interesting!

char_248_mgllan.title: Watching Battle Record
char_248_mgllan.text: Efficiency improved!

char_248_mgllan.title: Promotion 1
char_248_mgllan.text: Update complete! Now my devices respond twice as fast.

char_248_mgllan.title: Promotion 2
char_248_mgllan.text: Doctor, if you're curious about the results of my research, then I'll have to show you my stuff! Hehe, just so you know, I'll be showing you true power, so brace youself!

char_248_mgllan.title: Added to Squad
char_248_mgllan.text: Leave the exploration and support to me.

char_248_mgllan.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_248_mgllan.text: Everyone, maintain communication, beep-beep!

char_248_mgllan.title: Depart
char_248_mgllan.text: Hold on, calibrating my equipment… Done!

char_248_mgllan.title: Begin Operation
char_248_mgllan.text: Preflight testing complete. Drones standing by.

char_248_mgllan.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_248_mgllan.text: Sure!

char_248_mgllan.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_248_mgllan.text: I bet you need my skills.

char_248_mgllan.title: Deployment 1
char_248_mgllan.text: Time to work!

char_248_mgllan.title: Deployment 2
char_248_mgllan.text: All my equipment's good to go!

char_248_mgllan.title: In Battle 1
char_248_mgllan.text: Is the target marked? Ok, launching drone!

char_248_mgllan.title: In Battle 2
char_248_mgllan.text: Now! Let 'em go snow blind!

char_248_mgllan.title: In Battle 3
char_248_mgllan.text: Three… two… one! Take flight!

char_248_mgllan.title: In Battle 4
char_248_mgllan.text: 'Bloom, my flowers!'

char_248_mgllan.title: 4-star Result
char_248_mgllan.text: Watch out, there's a blind spot in my scan—What, it's already over? All thanks to you, Doctor, you're reliable as ever.

char_248_mgllan.title: 3-star Result
char_248_mgllan.text: No more hostiles detected!

char_248_mgllan.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_248_mgllan.text: There's still some enemies around. Are we going after them?

char_248_mgllan.title: Operation Failure
char_248_mgllan.text: They're flanking us? My bad, sorry…

char_248_mgllan.title: Assigned to Facility
char_248_mgllan.text: Hm...? You even have heated floors?! Ahh, this is bliss.

char_248_mgllan.title: Tap
char_248_mgllan.text: Mhm?

char_248_mgllan.title: Trust Tap
char_248_mgllan.text: Come on, Doctor. Ice skating isn't so cary. I'm here with you.

char_248_mgllan.title: Title
char_248_mgllan.text: Arknights.

char_248_mgllan.title: Greeting
char_248_mgllan.text: Um? Anything I can help with?

char_131_flameb.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_131_flameb.text: {@nickname}, compared to the old ones, today's battle are too relaxed and juvenile . They are weak. Weak enough to make weapons rust. And once a warrior's weapons rust, death soon follows.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk 1
char_131_flameb.text: Life is but a brief flicker before the vast maw of annihilation. Cherish that view of the sunset while you still can, {@nickname}.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk 2
char_131_flameb.text: Practical exercises? Nah, I'm not interested. While Rhodes Island boasts many powerful warriors, squandering one's physical strength on a game is wasteful. Only on the edge of life and death does the clashing of swords have value.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk 3
char_131_flameb.text: I'm not concerned with the plight of the Infected? Hmph, don't misunderstand me - fighting in vain is what I hate. No enemy worth spilling my blood has come forward, and that's all there is to it.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_131_flameb.text: Rampant slaughter liberates your inner instinct, 'teamwork' only robs you of it. What 'trust' and 'strategizing' buy you are nothing but illusions of security. And these illusions, {@nickname}, will one day cost you your life.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_131_flameb.text: This blade ran through two crown princes, and this other one slew three generals. In our chaotic world, anything can happen. I don't know who will claim my life, but on that day, I sure hope it'll be more exciting than when I took these lives.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_131_flameb.text: Shining, huh? A pity, she could have been a worthy adversary. But after she got pulled into that mess with the 'Confessarii,' I bet she felt her blade had been besmirched. Hmph, Swordsmen without faith in their swords are beneath mention.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_131_flameb.text: {@nickname}, you remember that battle, right? After killing all the ambushers, I led the survivors and charged straight into the traitor's fortress. I was the only one who made it out alive. How did it all start? Oh, you know the answer to that. I've seen you before, and my memory is very good.

char_131_flameb.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_131_flameb.text: {@nickname}, help me fetch those seeds in the cupboard, won't you? Thank you. Yes, I'm actually quite fond of flowers. No matter how brilliantly they blossom, their petals must wither and fall into the wind. When will the petals wither next, Doctor?

char_131_flameb.title: Idle
char_131_flameb.text: Vigilance can keep you alive, {@nickname}.

char_131_flameb.title: Onboard
char_131_flameb.text: We meet again, {@nickname}. Don't worry, I understand the situation you're in now, and pose no threat to you. I shall be your blade, so use me as you see fit, Doctor.

char_131_flameb.title: Watching Battle Record
char_131_flameb.text: The skills a great warrior needs are those which defy recording.

char_131_flameb.title: Promotion 1
char_131_flameb.text: Promotion? What? So you actually care about these rituals now?

char_131_flameb.title: Promotion 2
char_131_flameb.text: I have no concept of what it's like to be Infected. Perhaps Rhodes Island can help me understand. I don't care, but if you have your own considerations. Fine, I'll hear them out.

char_131_flameb.title: Added to Squad
char_131_flameb.text: Ahh, I've longed for a hurricane of blood.

char_131_flameb.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_131_flameb.text: I've been a captain before, and it didn't end well.

char_131_flameb.title: Depart
char_131_flameb.text: I will bathe in their blood.

char_131_flameb.title: Begin Operation
char_131_flameb.text: Let's begin.

char_131_flameb.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_131_flameb.text: Do not interfere.

char_131_flameb.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_131_flameb.text: Mind your own business.

char_131_flameb.title: Deployment 1
char_131_flameb.text: So, who shall be my opponent?

char_131_flameb.title: Deployment 2
char_131_flameb.text: Will it be you? Or maybe you?

char_131_flameb.title: In Battle 1
char_131_flameb.text: The blade brings the flame.

char_131_flameb.title: In Battle 2
char_131_flameb.text: The bone falls with blood.

char_131_flameb.title: In Battle 3
char_131_flameb.text: Whose name will you cry as you pass?

char_131_flameb.title: In Battle 4
char_131_flameb.text: I don't give a damn.

char_131_flameb.title: 4-star Result
char_131_flameb.text: Did this battle satisfy you?

char_131_flameb.title: 3-star Result
char_131_flameb.text: A weak enemy proves nothing. Search for a worthier battlefield.

char_131_flameb.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_131_flameb.text: A dedicated opponent will prove to be a worthy adversary in the future, let them do just that.

char_131_flameb.title: Operation Failure
char_131_flameb.text: The rest of you, go. It has always been my job to destroy the pursuing enemy.

char_131_flameb.title: Assigned to Facility
char_131_flameb.text: It's pretty quiet here.

char_131_flameb.title: Tap
char_131_flameb.text: Yeah?

char_131_flameb.title: Trust Tap
char_131_flameb.text: You're just in time, I find myself in need of a whetstone…

char_131_flameb.title: Title
char_131_flameb.text: Arknights.

char_131_flameb.title: Greeting
char_131_flameb.text: Not bad, you're still alive.

char_279_excu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_279_excu.text: Fragmentation mines deployed. None may interfere with your work or rest, Doctor. You can focus on your duty.

char_279_excu.title: Talk 1
char_279_excu.text: I am well aware that Rhodes Island has its own specialists in countering infiltration, sabotage and assassination. I know not who is behind these, but they are operating covertly in every corner of this landship. My mind is just playing tricks on me? Negative, Doctor. My mind does not play tricks.

char_279_excu.title: Talk 2
char_279_excu.text: I serve the Laterano Notarial Hall, so I rarely live in Laterano. But even if a Laterano citizen lives in other city-states, most of their rights and privileges still depend on the support of the Hall. In my case, for example, my work has less to do with the living, but more with those at death's door.

char_279_excu.title: Talk 3
char_279_excu.text: The control system is denying you access? Please allow me to check it. Mm, it appears to be a front-end crash caused by inputting an erroneous command. It has nothing to do with the framework and can be easily solved. Doctor, please feel free to ask me if you have any similar issues in the future. I understand machines better than I do people.

char_279_excu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_279_excu.text: There are many Sankta at Rhodes Island who also use a gun. They will not fire at one other in the face of the law, but I am different. If necessary, I will not hesitate to fire upon my fraters. Of course, there is hardly a need for that, because my fists are sufficient to deal with most of them.

char_279_excu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_279_excu.text: Do not worry about the Notarial Hall. They are all reasonable people, and the agreement I signed with Rhodes Island is also in line with their protocols, so they won't make things difficult for you. As a matter of fact, Doctor, I think you are well suited for notarial work yourself. They always welcome foreign employees.

char_279_excu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_279_excu.text: I have a distant relative who had great musical talent ever since she was a child. Contrary to what others expected, her gift led her onto a tumultuous path. Fortunately, she seems to hate me very much, because I cannot see the illusion she creates, nor understand what emotion means to people.

char_279_excu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_279_excu.text: Private disputes are more frequent than public conflicts, as chaos is the norm over order. I have seen much more people who fired upon me at first glance than those who opened their doors to welcome me. But it matters not, for I can complete any commission, whether it is to kill a living person on behalf of the dead, or to create a dead person on  behalf of the living.

char_279_excu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_279_excu.text: Being treated as an aberration is normal to me, because I cannot understand other people, nor do I have any desire to deal with them. On the contrary, talking to you is quite interesting to me, Doctor. Neither you nor the Notarial Hall has denied me because of the way I live. You make me feel at ease. Thank you.

char_279_excu.title: Idle
char_279_excu.text: Rest is necessary, Doctor. Take your time and rest well.

char_279_excu.title: Onboard
char_279_excu.text: Well met, Doctor of Rhodes Island. I am a Laterano citizen who signed a clean-up agreement with your company. Here is my certificate. You require to know my name? You may call me Executor, if you insist.

char_279_excu.title: Watching Battle Record
char_279_excu.text: There is value in referencing these battles.

char_279_excu.title: Promotion 1
char_279_excu.text: Thank you. I have already prepared all the ammunition I need for the next battle. If the situation worsens, please allow me to use heavier firepower. Promotion? I have already thanked you for that.

char_279_excu.title: Promotion 2
char_279_excu.text: Another promotion? I understand, there must be an infiltration operation that requires me at the heart of the enemy. If that's your wish, then I have no objections. You have no such a need? You are just promoting me? Why's that?

char_279_excu.title: Added to Squad
char_279_excu.text: The law won't enforce itself. It needs executors.

char_279_excu.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_279_excu.text: I am not good at working with others.

char_279_excu.title: Depart
char_279_excu.text: Departing.

char_279_excu.title: Begin Operation
char_279_excu.text: Objective: eliminate all enemies.

char_279_excu.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_279_excu.text: Let's begin.

char_279_excu.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_279_excu.text: Your request has been confirmed.

char_279_excu.title: Deployment 1
char_279_excu.text: Victory is an illusion.

char_279_excu.title: Deployment 2
char_279_excu.text: Only the law is the truth.

char_279_excu.title: In Battle 1
char_279_excu.text: My bullets always find their targets.

char_279_excu.title: In Battle 2
char_279_excu.text: I carry out the wills of the dead and the living.

char_279_excu.title: In Battle 3
char_279_excu.text: Maximizing firepower.

char_279_excu.title: In Battle 4
char_279_excu.text: All is permitted when called by necessity.

char_279_excu.title: 4-star Result
char_279_excu.text: Mission completed. All contracts successfully fulfilled.

char_279_excu.title: 3-star Result
char_279_excu.text: Mission completed.

char_279_excu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_279_excu.text: Mission completed. Defects in the result.

char_279_excu.title: Operation Failure
char_279_excu.text: Mission failed.

char_279_excu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_279_excu.text: Do not worry about me. I have no need for stable residence.

char_279_excu.title: Tap
char_279_excu.text: I am confused.

char_279_excu.title: Trust Tap
char_279_excu.text: How can I help you, Doctor?

char_279_excu.title: Title
char_279_excu.text: Arknights.

char_279_excu.title: Greeting
char_279_excu.text: Doctor, please exercise caution.

char_190_clour.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_190_clour.text: Did you call me here for a new hunt? No? Gah…

char_190_clour.title: Talk 1
char_190_clour.text: This claw pendant? It's a symbol of revenge. The Ursus mercenaries who hurt my people treat these things as dogtags, so there's no mistaking them.

char_190_clour.title: Talk 2
char_190_clour.text: A beast took my left hand when I was hunting. Luckily, a mechanic gave me a prosthetic limb, so I can draw my bowstring again.

char_190_clour.title: Talk 3
char_190_clour.text: There was a time when I would've turned anyone who mocked my scars into a pincushion! But if you ask me now... Well, people like that aren't even worth the trouble.

char_190_clour.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_190_clour.text: If you're ever facing a difficult decision, let your instincts decide for you. Your body won't lie—This is what I've learned after a lifetime of hunts.

char_190_clour.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_190_clour.text: I've been living alone ever since my village was wiped out.  So, I… I'm still getting used to being around people... But since you trust me and give me important work, I swear I'll return the favor.

char_190_clour.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_190_clour.text: Ehh, a pebble got stuck in my prosthetic finger...? Darn it, I'm going to need a mechanic to fix it... N-No, I don't need you, I can handle this myself!

char_190_clour.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_190_clour.text: You'll make sure I don't ever lose anyone else? Hmph. Big words. But I'll see for myself if you can back those up.

char_190_clour.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_190_clour.text: The doctors here offered to get rid of my more recent scars, but I said no. I want to keep them. They're proof of my work here... You, you understand what I'm getting at?

char_190_clour.title: Idle
char_190_clour.text: You're sleeping? Looks like this one can fall asleep almost anywhere. Well, that's a trait we hunters share…

char_190_clour.title: Onboard
char_190_clour.text: Vermeil, hunter. You won't regret giving me work.

char_190_clour.title: Watching Battle Record
char_190_clour.text: Can I take another look at that?

char_190_clour.title: Promotion 1
char_190_clour.text: Thank you, but... are you sure it's okay to promote someone like me?

char_190_clour.title: Promotion 2
char_190_clour.text: I don't really care about stuff like Oripathy or 'the rest of my life.' Right now, the happiest thing I can imagine is fighting by your side.

char_190_clour.title: Added to Squad
char_190_clour.text: I'm here.

char_190_clour.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_190_clour.text: You want me to be the captain? Am I... really cut out for the job?

char_190_clour.title: Depart
char_190_clour.text: The big game hunt is about to start!

char_190_clour.title: Begin Operation
char_190_clour.text: You don't seem to understand your situation here. You've fallen into my trap.

char_190_clour.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_190_clour.text: I'll go ahead.

char_190_clour.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_190_clour.text: Give me the order.

char_190_clour.title: Deployment 1
char_190_clour.text: I can smell the game on the wind.

char_190_clour.title: Deployment 2
char_190_clour.text: I'll be waiting here.

char_190_clour.title: In Battle 1
char_190_clour.text: You'd better start running, or there's only one way this ends.

char_190_clour.title: In Battle 2
char_190_clour.text: Don't underestimate the people of the wilderness.

char_190_clour.title: In Battle 3
char_190_clour.text: Watch where this arrow goes!

char_190_clour.title: In Battle 4
char_190_clour.text: This arrow will find your throat!

char_190_clour.title: 4-star Result
char_190_clour.text: Strong game is still just game.

char_190_clour.title: 3-star Result
char_190_clour.text: Nice. If you were born in Siracusa, you would've been a great hunter.

char_190_clour.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_190_clour.text: The target got away. I'm going after it.

char_190_clour.title: Operation Failure
char_190_clour.text: We can't let it end like this…

char_190_clour.title: Assigned to Facility
char_190_clour.text: This place has walls and a roof… that's enough for me.

char_190_clour.title: Tap
char_190_clour.text: Wha?

char_190_clour.title: Trust Tap
char_190_clour.text: ...My plans for the day? Help you with missions. Shoot at enemies. Use up all my arrows. Finish the mission. Eat dinner, go to sleep. Simple enough.

char_190_clour.title: Title
char_190_clour.text: Arknights.

char_190_clour.title: Greeting
char_190_clour.text: Ah, it's you.

char_213_mostma.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_213_mostma.text: Ahaha, aren't you the lucky one, Doctor? I don't have any work for the day, so I wouldn't mind keeping you company for a bit.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk 1
char_213_mostma.text: The marketplaces of Lungmen, the suburbs of Ursus, the ancient ruins of Victoria... Doctor, this world holds countless beautiful sights, but very few people will ever seek them out.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk 2
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, do you want to hear a story of my journeys? In that case, I'd recommend preparing some fine tea cakes before we sit down. Otherwise, even the most fascinating tales will turn bland.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk 3
char_213_mostma.text: I've witnessed the rise and fall of many organizations, but so far, Rhodes Island is the most interesting one I've seen. Will the epochs bend to your will, or finally swallow you whole? ...I'm dying to find out.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, concerning our next destination, I have a few recommendations for where we can get some good food. Interested?

char_213_mostma.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, you seem to already know a thing or two about fallen angels. Unfortunately, I can't give you any more details than that. Even if I could share everything else with you one day, this would remain my solitary secret.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, you don't need to concern yourself with how to have a good relationship with me. For me, friends, family, and love... I have nothing against them, but I don't need them either. Heh, not like that's going to stop you from trying, right? Well, I don't really mind, so give it your best shot~

char_213_mostma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_213_mostma.text: I'm back... Huh? No way, Doctor, were you seriously waiting here for me the whole time? You even brought snacks... Hah, all right. If you're going to go this far, I guess I can't turn you down. As thanks, I'll tell you about something interesting that happened on a delivery run.

char_213_mostma.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_213_mostma.text: ...I see now. When I thought of having a friend like you, the spark of joy I felt wasn't fake after all. Scrap what I said before, Doctor. Maybe I do need a bit of warmth in my life.

char_213_mostma.title: Idle
char_213_mostma.text: Hehe... Sweet dreams, Doctor.

char_213_mostma.title: Onboard
char_213_mostma.text: Hey there, Doctor. You might've heard from Emperor that I'm not bound by the contract between Penguin Logistics and Rhodes Island, and can therefore act independently. Having that said, I'll probably be staying here anyway when I'm not busy, so I'll see you around~

char_213_mostma.title: Watching Battle Record
char_213_mostma.text: Let me see how Rhodes Island fights.

char_213_mostma.title: Promotion 1
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, relying on me isn't a very wise decision.

char_213_mostma.title: Promotion 2
char_213_mostma.text: Doctor, you really want to see me go all out? Just for the record, I'd like to ask - I won't have to worry about paying for the collateral damage after this, right?

char_213_mostma.title: Added to Squad
char_213_mostma.text: Here I am.

char_213_mostma.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_213_mostma.text: Hmm... Sorry, but why don't we let everyone do their own thing?

char_213_mostma.title: Depart
char_213_mostma.text: If this is the place... I'll lead the way.

char_213_mostma.title: Begin Operation
char_213_mostma.text: Let's get this started.

char_213_mostma.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_213_mostma.text: Hm?

char_213_mostma.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_213_mostma.text: Ahah...

char_213_mostma.title: Deployment 1
char_213_mostma.text: Nice weather out here.

char_213_mostma.title: Deployment 2
char_213_mostma.text: Not a bad view.

char_213_mostma.title: In Battle 1
char_213_mostma.text: Seventy percent-ish should do the trick.

char_213_mostma.title: In Battle 2
char_213_mostma.text: Isn't it about time to wrap things up?

char_213_mostma.title: In Battle 3
char_213_mostma.text: I have nothing against you guys, but this is just a part of life.

char_213_mostma.title: In Battle 4
char_213_mostma.text: What should we get to eat after this?

char_213_mostma.title: 4-star Result
char_213_mostma.text: Some thrill-seeking every now and then isn't half bad either.

char_213_mostma.title: 3-star Result
char_213_mostma.text: Hm? I thought I missed a few, but I guess that's a job well done.

char_213_mostma.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_213_mostma.text: For a transporter, the results of a battle don't really matter. Just surviving is enough of a victory.

char_213_mostma.title: Operation Failure
char_213_mostma.text: I guess I don't get this whole 'teamwork' thing after all...

char_213_mostma.title: Assigned to Facility
char_213_mostma.text: Mind if I go wander around?

char_213_mostma.title: Tap
char_213_mostma.text: Hmm?

char_213_mostma.title: Trust Tap
char_213_mostma.text: Let's have a chat, Doctor.

char_213_mostma.title: Title
char_213_mostma.text: Arknights.

char_213_mostma.title: Greeting
char_213_mostma.text: How's your day going, Doctor?

char_325_bison.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_325_bison.text: Doctor, do you need my help transporting anything?

char_325_bison.title: Talk 1
char_325_bison.text: This noisy metal music... sounds like Exusiai is throwing another one of her parties again. Doctor, should I go reprimand her?

char_325_bison.title: Talk 2
char_325_bison.text: I'm quite good with manual labor. I also know a bit about company management as well. So, Doctor, is there anywhere I can be of use?

char_325_bison.title: Talk 3
char_325_bison.text: My parents were the first generation to settle in Lungmen, so I'm actually a Lungmen native... Doctor, if there's anything you'd like to learn about it, I wouldn't mind helping you out.

char_325_bison.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_325_bison.text: Doctor, if you want to know how a real logistics company operates, it'd be best to just ask me directly. Penguin Logistics is more of an exception than the rule, and though I don't mean this in a bad way, they don't have any reference value whatsoever.

char_325_bison.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_325_bison.text: What do I like to do outside of work? Other than just resting, I'll sometimes accompany Croissant on her shopping trips and make sure she doesn't waste too much money... Doctor, do you also want to come along?

char_325_bison.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_325_bison.text: I used to believe that for any company to survive in the long run, standardization and efficiency were of critical importance. That's why at first, I couldn't fathom how a company like Penguin Logistics could stay afloat.

char_325_bison.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_325_bison.text: After getting to know more about the people at Penguin Logistics and talking to them, I began to understand that the world is much broader than I had thought. There's nothing wrong with structure and rules, but they don't necessarily apply to everyone.

char_325_bison.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_325_bison.text: Doctor, perhaps you haven't realized this yourself, but the fact that you can unite so many people with very different personalities under one banner is no simple feat... It'd be great if I could become more like you one day.

char_325_bison.title: Idle
char_325_bison.text: Doctor... You're taking a nap? I guess it can wait. Guess I'll start tidying up the place first.

char_325_bison.title: Onboard
char_325_bison.text: Pleased to meet you, Doctor. My name is Bison. According to the terms of our contract, I will now also be a member of Rhodes Island. I look forward to working with you.

char_325_bison.title: Watching Battle Record
char_325_bison.text: Thank you very much. I will make sure to learn from this.

char_325_bison.title: Promotion 1
char_325_bison.text: Thank you very much, Doctor. As long as I put my best foot forward, my hard work will be rewarded. This is what I believe.

char_325_bison.title: Promotion 2
char_325_bison.text: At Penguin Logistics and Rhodes Island, I saw a more expansive world than before... Doctor, one day, I will also find my place in this world.

char_325_bison.title: Added to Squad
char_325_bison.text: A mission? Understood.

char_325_bison.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_325_bison.text: On-site command? I have some experience with that.

char_325_bison.title: Depart
char_325_bison.text: Yes, I've noted the mission location and objectives.

char_325_bison.title: Begin Operation
char_325_bison.text: Hah... I won't be a burden on the others.

char_325_bison.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_325_bison.text: What would you like me to do?

char_325_bison.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_325_bison.text: Is it my turn, Doctor?

char_325_bison.title: Deployment 1
char_325_bison.text: I'll do my best.

char_325_bison.title: Deployment 2
char_325_bison.text: Got it.

char_325_bison.title: In Battle 1
char_325_bison.text: I can keep going.

char_325_bison.title: In Battle 2
char_325_bison.text: Hang in there a bit longer? Understood.

char_325_bison.title: In Battle 3
char_325_bison.text: Don't worry, my shield still holds firm.

char_325_bison.title: 4-star Result
char_325_bison.text: Way to go, Doctor! You must be the kind of leader that every company wants to have if you wanted to change jobs.

char_325_bison.title: 3-star Result
char_325_bison.text: Wow, Doctor... You really are amazing!

char_325_bison.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_325_bison.text: The basic objectives of the mission have been accomplished. This should be good enough, right?

char_325_bison.title: Operation Failure
char_325_bison.text: Don't feel down, Doctor. We'll have another chance.

char_325_bison.title: Assigned to Facility
char_325_bison.text: So this is the inside of Rhodes Island... It sure is big.

char_325_bison.title: Tap
char_325_bison.text: Where should I go?

char_325_bison.title: Trust Tap
char_325_bison.text: Sora's new album is really good.

char_325_bison.title: Title
char_325_bison.text: Arknights.

char_325_bison.title: Greeting
char_325_bison.text: Good morning, Doctor!

char_243_waaifu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_243_waaifu.text: Doctor, where are you going? Shouldn't you be working? Lunch? Well then, I'm coming along. There's a few things I want to buy, and I can protect you too.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk 1
char_243_waaifu.text: Sorry, Doctor, Rhodes Island is just a part-time job for me. I have to study hard to make sure I have a nice, normal future ahead of me. I am committed to keeping in touch with everyday society.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk 2
char_243_waaifu.text: I color coded all the documents to be sent out, the backups have already been delivered, your schedule is right here. I bought your late night snack and put it in the refrigerator. Don't forget to heat it up. And last, oh, do you need me to change the light bulb in your office for you?

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk 3
char_243_waaifu.text: Did I ever tell you about my other job? No? Well, I won't. Don't look at me like that, Doctor. There's just not much to say. If my other office worked a tenth as hard as Rhodes Island does, they'd monopolize Lungmen's entire investigations industry.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_243_waaifu.text: You wonder where I learned martial arts? Well, I have my nasty old dad and his weird education to thank for that. Not that I resent kung fu. A hero must uphold justice. Martial arts are a part of me.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_243_waaifu.text: Just like the human heart, martial arts have yin and yang, right and wrong. To right those wrongs, to defeat evil, to counter bad kung fu, these are all second nature to me. The world is dark, and someone must stand for justice.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_243_waaifu.text: You think you just saw me? In downtown Lungmen? That may have been me. I just finished class. Hm? You saw me beat down some thugs who were harassing a passerby? And then slipped away before the police arrived? Must have been someone else. Heh heh. Definitely. That's enough about that.

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_243_waaifu.text: My rotten dad said he had to go find the true meaning of kung fu. I still don't know where he is. Please! What year does he think it is? Find some common sense and learn some responsibility before you get yourself killed. But at least I haven't forgotten what he taught me: 'Martial arts have martial virtue, humans have human kindness.'

char_243_waaifu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_243_waaifu.text: Doctor, did any mail come for me? It did? Great. These are my grades... my very important grades! It's been straight A's for me, so far. If I don't work hard enough, I'll end up regretting all the things I wasn't strong enough to do.

char_243_waaifu.title: Idle
char_243_waaifu.text: Falling asleep at a time like this... Oh well, I'll just finish your work for you.

char_243_waaifu.title: Onboard
