char_243_waaifu.text: Is this Rhodes Island? Nice to meet you. I'm Waai Fu, your new part-timer. Please don't go easy on me. I can handle anything you ask of me.

char_243_waaifu.title: Watching Battle Record
char_243_waaifu.text: If I can fight like this here, I can definitely knock them out.

char_243_waaifu.title: Promotion 1
char_243_waaifu.text: Thank you very much. I won't let you down, Doctor.

char_243_waaifu.title: Promotion 2
char_243_waaifu.text: I often witness injustices in my life. If I ever find myself unable to stop them, I reflect on the moment, and force myself to get stronger. So, if ever you need me, don't hesitate to say so. I'll be there, with all my strength!

char_243_waaifu.title: Added to Squad
char_243_waaifu.text: Is there evil to fight?

char_243_waaifu.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_243_waaifu.text: I don't have much experience, but I won't turn down the responsibility.

char_243_waaifu.title: Depart
char_243_waaifu.text: Fight evil with the fist of justice!

char_243_waaifu.title: Begin Operation
char_243_waaifu.text: Like cutting weeds and pulling roots!

char_243_waaifu.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_243_waaifu.text: Hey.

char_243_waaifu.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_243_waaifu.text: Go ahead!

char_243_waaifu.title: Deployment 1
char_243_waaifu.text: No other choice.

char_243_waaifu.title: Deployment 2
char_243_waaifu.text: All right!

char_243_waaifu.title: In Battle 1
char_243_waaifu.text: You have turned your backs on society!

char_243_waaifu.title: In Battle 2
char_243_waaifu.text: Pick on someone your own size!

char_243_waaifu.title: In Battle 3
char_243_waaifu.text: Behold, the power of the Song Do Bart Cham style!

char_243_waaifu.title: In Battle 4
char_243_waaifu.text: The mind directs, the fist executes!

char_243_waaifu.title: 4-star Result
char_243_waaifu.text: Foul intentions lead a foul life. Repent now. There is still time.

char_243_waaifu.title: 3-star Result
char_243_waaifu.text: A strong will conquers all.

char_243_waaifu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_243_waaifu.text: That was not enough. I need to train more.

char_243_waaifu.title: Operation Failure
char_243_waaifu.text: Father... I'm still... not strong enough.

char_243_waaifu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_243_waaifu.text: At least it's better than some old, messy detective agency.

char_243_waaifu.title: Tap
char_243_waaifu.text: An ambush...?! Doctor, don't sneak up on me like that. You'll end up in Medical.

char_243_waaifu.title: Trust Tap
char_243_waaifu.text: You want to go for a walk? I'll go with you. You'll be safe with me.

char_243_waaifu.title: Title
char_243_waaifu.text: Arknights.

char_243_waaifu.title: Greeting
char_243_waaifu.text: Care for some tea, Doctor?

char_133_mm.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_133_mm.text: Doctor, even though I'm now your employee, if your conduct is even slightly shady, I won't stand by idly!

char_133_mm.title: Talk 1
char_133_mm.text: Rhodes Island has a suspicious smell about it...

char_133_mm.title: Talk 2
char_133_mm.text: Careful observation is fundamental to all investigations! It might seem basic, but it always works!

char_133_mm.title: Talk 3
char_133_mm.text: You, over there! Face me, and put your hands where I can see 'em! Ah, sorry... I got the wrong person...

char_133_mm.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_133_mm.text: I always thought that penguin over there is super suspicious. Look, even though it dresses like that, it spends money like it's water or something. It's even wearing a gold necklace! You know how much detectives like me make... that kind of lifestyle is simply unthinkable!

char_133_mm.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_133_mm.text: Mmmm... so frustrating! How am I going to investigate that shady logistics company? ...Should I break in? Err, but those two guards give off fierce vibes that make my skin crawl... No, no, I'm not scared or anything, I'll just have to use my head and come up with a plan!

char_133_mm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_133_mm.text: Why are you giving me this bean paste bun? I would neber eat shumfing libe ris on an inweshtigation, you musht watch too mush TV or...(chewing)... A real detective only eats donuts while on a mission!

char_133_mm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_133_mm.text: Three months, then three months after that. Then another three months after that. I've already been undercover for ten months! Chief, what the heck is going on...? ...Hey! You scoundrels, stop eavesdropping on my call!

char_133_mm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_133_mm.text: Doctor, that penguin seems to have noticed that I'm investigating it... I'm starting to fear for my life...!

char_133_mm.title: Idle
char_133_mm.text: Wake up! Waaake uppp! Stop slacking off!

char_133_mm.title: Onboard
char_133_mm.text: I'm the Royal Detective, May. Please cooperate with my investigation! Eh? I've got the wrong address? Impossible! I have evidence that proves that penguin is hiding here!

char_133_mm.title: Watching Battle Record
char_133_mm.text: Don't I look super cool when I'm conducting my investigation?

char_133_mm.title: Promotion 1
char_133_mm.text: Thank you for the promotion Chief I'm so very grateful for... Hey, wait, you aren't even my real boss!

char_133_mm.title: Promotion 2
char_133_mm.text: Elite team? Hey, I'm a Royal Detective! Why am I being promoted by some mercenary organization?!

char_133_mm.title: Added to Squad
char_133_mm.text: Be careful not to let any shady people onto the team.

char_133_mm.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_133_mm.text: Hehehe! Leader? Nay, call me Inspector General!

char_133_mm.title: Depart
char_133_mm.text: All troops, move out! All troops, moooove outttt!!

char_133_mm.title: Begin Operation
char_133_mm.text: You criminals! Behave and turn yourselves in!

char_133_mm.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_133_mm.text: What? Did something happen?

char_133_mm.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_133_mm.text: Sure, sure, I got it!

char_133_mm.title: Deployment 1
char_133_mm.text: It's time to investigate the scene!

char_133_mm.title: Deployment 2
char_133_mm.text: Let me see your documents!

char_133_mm.title: In Battle 1
char_133_mm.text: This is your one warning!

char_133_mm.title: In Battle 2
char_133_mm.text: Freeze! Please!

char_133_mm.title: In Battle 3
char_133_mm.text: Now you're going to get a taste of my taser!

char_133_mm.title: In Battle 4
char_133_mm.text: It won't hurt, it'll just give you a little buzz!

char_133_mm.title: 4-star Result
char_133_mm.text: For a master detective, there is no case that can't be solved!

char_133_mm.title: 3-star Result
char_133_mm.text: Take away all these suspects! Ugh... Fine, I'll do it myself...

char_133_mm.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_133_mm.text: Hmm... I feel like we missed some of the clues?

char_133_mm.title: Operation Failure
char_133_mm.text: R-requesting backupppp...

char_133_mm.title: Assigned to Facility
char_133_mm.text: I have a hunch as to what will happen here!

char_133_mm.title: Tap
char_133_mm.text: You and your villainous hand! I'll remember this!

char_133_mm.title: Trust Tap
char_133_mm.text: D-don't think you can wash away your crime just like that...!

char_133_mm.title: Title
char_133_mm.text: Arknights.

char_133_mm.title: Greeting
char_133_mm.text: There you are, Doctor!

char_356_broca.title: Talk 1
char_356_broca.text: That Amiya girl is one of this place's leaders? What a black-hearted organization Rhodes Island is.

char_356_broca.title: Talk 2
char_356_broca.text: I have no intent on being a freeloader. If you need any manual labor done, just let me know.

char_356_broca.title: Talk 3
char_356_broca.text: I have nothing against taking orders, but I don't like fighting without knowing why I'm doing it.

char_356_broca.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_356_broca.text: My hobbies? I have no reason to tell you, do I? ...Good grief, stop making that face. You'll leave me alone if I tell you, right... I like modifying various things.

char_356_broca.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_356_broca.text: Back then, had it not been for Chiave and Aosta, I would've been dead in that alley. So, my life belongs to them. No matter what they want me to do, I will do it without hesitation.

char_356_broca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_356_broca.text: I don't hate you, but... I find it difficult to fully trust you.

char_356_broca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_356_broca.text: Work hard, make money, and continue surviving. I used to think that was all there was to life. However, Aosta was right. In a country like Siracusa, something like that is nothing more than a pipe dream.

char_356_broca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_356_broca.text: I acknowledge your right to lead.... However, Aosta once said that corruption begins to seep into an organization the moment you let your guard down. To prevent that from happening, I'll be keeping a close eye on you.

char_356_broca.title: Idle
char_356_broca.text: Asleep? Good grief, what a carefree fellow... Tch, where'd the blanket go...

char_356_broca.title: Onboard
char_356_broca.text: Since Chiave decided for me to join you, I don't have much else to say. You can call me Broca. I will listen to your orders, but don't count on me to do anything extra. I have no love for large organizations like yours.

char_356_broca.title: Promotion 2
char_356_broca.text: Maybe Aosta was right, maybe Rhodes Island is trustworthy. If that's the case, I...

char_356_broca.title: 3-star Result
char_356_broca.text: They've all been taken care of.

char_356_broca.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_356_broca.text: Need me to go after them?

char_356_broca.title: Operation Failure
char_356_broca.text: No need to panic. You did what you could. Even Aosta makes mistakes.

char_261_sddrag.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_261_sddrag.text: Doctor, here is the paperwork. Is it strange to see me on clerical errands? The truth is, compared to battle, I much prefer... writing...

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk 1
char_261_sddrag.text: Doctor, look outside the window. The night is quiet... and peaceful. Up until now, every night has been filled with the red light of fire, and the stench of burning. I only feel easier... on nights like tonight.

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk 2
char_261_sddrag.text: There's been a—red-haired Vouivre girl, who never stops staring at me... Does she suspect my identity? But... she wouldn't have any evidence... Hm. I'm not going to let her find me out.

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk 3
char_261_sddrag.text: Is it time for my regular medical examination? Un... Understood. But... I don't trust those other doctors. If I have to be examined, I want... you to help me with it.

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_261_sddrag.text: You all have a lot of questions, but I can't answer any of them. This is for your own sakes, and I encourage you ... not to overestimate yourselves.

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_261_sddrag.text: ...I am strong. I know the terrifying power I hold, though I... have no love for it. But if you desire it—then yes, I will fight...

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_261_sddrag.text: This spear... I am not able to fully use its power. Despite that, I've had it take so many lives. Guilt? ...No, I have no guilt. After all, our lives are all equally worthless

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_261_sddrag.text: I do not mind my Oripathy... Without it, I would never have spent my days here. It will take my life? I—still do not mind it... So many other things across this land could kill just the same, why then... would you fixated on this particular one?

char_261_sddrag.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_261_sddrag.text: I am a shadow, but I do not spurn that. I am only able to stay here, incognito, because I am a shadow... However... however... if someone with the same face as me ever finds you, do not fight her! You will die. I don't... I don't want you dead...

char_261_sddrag.title: Idle
char_261_sddrag.text: I will stand vigil for you, so... please rest at ease. Good night.

char_261_sddrag.title: Onboard
char_261_sddrag.text: You were the ones... who saved me? You want my name? ...Just 'Reed' is fine... like the reeds by a pond. A nondescript existence...

char_261_sddrag.title: Watching Battle Record
char_261_sddrag.text: Your battles are—very bitter... but, this way, many more may continue to live.

char_261_sddrag.title: Promotion 1
char_261_sddrag.text: Forward, soldiers of Dublinn! ...I was constantly forced to give these words, but in reality—I hated them...

char_261_sddrag.title: Promotion 2
char_261_sddrag.text: You have a dream that calms my soul... and I want to help you accomplish it. So long as I rouse the fires of Dublinn, they may come to light your way in the dark of night.

char_261_sddrag.title: Added to Squad
char_261_sddrag.text: The fires of war will char the wilderness...

char_261_sddrag.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_261_sddrag.text: Just as you have exhorted me, I will no longer neglect the lives of others...

char_261_sddrag.title: Depart
char_261_sddrag.text: And so, we go to harvest...

char_261_sddrag.title: Begin Operation
char_261_sddrag.text: Why do you burn as easily as stalks of wheat...?

char_261_sddrag.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_261_sddrag.text: My flames, they scorch...

char_261_sddrag.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_261_sddrag.text: No one else will see I am here, will they...?

char_261_sddrag.title: Deployment 1
char_261_sddrag.text: Ah...

char_261_sddrag.title: Deployment 2
char_261_sddrag.text: Only ashes will remain...

char_261_sddrag.title: In Battle 1
char_261_sddrag.text: The living blaze will purify your tainted souls.

char_261_sddrag.title: In Battle 2
char_261_sddrag.text: I am Dublinn.

char_261_sddrag.title: In Battle 3
char_261_sddrag.text: I... am Dublinn!

char_261_sddrag.title: In Battle 4
char_261_sddrag.text: Sister...

char_261_sddrag.title: 4-star Result
char_261_sddrag.text: Endless battles, flames that never cease to smolder... This isn't what you truly desire, is it?

char_261_sddrag.title: 3-star Result
char_261_sddrag.text: Should this fight be for the sake of our shared future, I will bear anything...

char_261_sddrag.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_261_sddrag.text: What else can we hope to gain from the battlefield? Let's go. Hurry, let's go home...

char_261_sddrag.title: Operation Failure
char_261_sddrag.text: No. I won't let anyone hurt you... I swear it.

char_261_sddrag.title: Assigned to Facility
char_261_sddrag.text: Can I have a separate room? I don't mind how small it may be...

char_261_sddrag.title: Tap
char_261_sddrag.text: Ah!

char_261_sddrag.title: Trust Tap
char_261_sddrag.text: Doctor... won't my body temperature burn you?

char_261_sddrag.title: Title
char_261_sddrag.text: Arknights.

char_261_sddrag.title: Greeting
char_261_sddrag.text: Doctor...? Um... it's nothing.

char_017_huang.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_017_huang.text: C'mon, I'm no good with paperwork. You sure you want me here in the office? I'd be better out in the field. Wouldn't you rather I brought home some wins?

char_017_huang.title: Talk 1
char_017_huang.text: I fight for the Infected. Life for our people is rough, anyone with eyes can see that. It's just that most people don't give a damn about our lives. But I do, I care a lot. We've got so many operators here counting on me, and I'm NOT about to let them down.

char_017_huang.title: Talk 2
char_017_huang.text: The reason I work for Rhodes Island? Because I've got nowhere better to be, naturally. But I've gotta be honest, I can't think of any place better than here. The pay's good, the medical treatment is cutting edge, and we've even got a cute little rabbit. It's just brilliant. What could be better?

char_017_huang.title: Talk 3
char_017_huang.text: I'm one of Rhodes Island's frontline breachers, I don't have powerful Arts that wipe the field, and it's not like my combat techniques could down a whole army. But, if I combine the two things I'm good at, then BOOM! You get quick results. I think that's what they call a chemical reaction.

char_017_huang.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_017_huang.text: Amiya is one of the most talented fighters I've ever met. She keeps a clear head in any situation, and her Arts are enough to scare even me.  You know, Doctor, I can't help but wonder, how did she get so good at fighting, as young as she is? Honestly, I wish she was picking up joyful, happy experiences, not the combat kind.

char_017_huang.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_017_huang.text: If you need my help, no need to be shy - just say the word! You put your trust in me, and I return the favor. You command, I fight. It's symbiotic. Aw, look at us! We're the best partners in all Rhodes Island! Oh, don't tell Amiya I said that.

char_017_huang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_017_huang.text: The crew's been buzzing about who you used to be, before your memory loss. They were talking back before I even met you. It looks to me like you aren't the same person anymore. Soooo, I guess I'm talking about two different Doctors? Past Doctor and Present Doctor, hah!

char_017_huang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_017_huang.text: Dr. Kal'tsit says you're going to really shoulder responsibility for Rhodes Island someday. She saved my life, and I trust her. She also asked me to decide what kind of person you are for myself. And I'm going to do that, at least until Oripathy takes my life.

char_017_huang.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_017_huang.text: Hey, Doctor, pass me that towel, would you? Yeah, just finished training. I need at least six hours every day to stay combat-ready. Gotta roll out whenever the order comes in, you know. Alright, I've kept you waiting long enough. So where are we going this time? If that's the plan, I guess you're picking up the tab?

char_017_huang.title: Idle
char_017_huang.text: Would people get the wrong idea if I carried the Doctor to bed? Maybe I'm better off leaving well enough alone…

char_017_huang.title: Onboard
char_017_huang.text: Rhodes Island Operator, Blaze, reporting in. Here, the authorization letter signed by Dr. Kal'tsit. Now I'm under your direct command. Alrighty, Doctor, let's show the other squads what we can do!

char_017_huang.title: Watching Battle Record
char_017_huang.text: I've seen a lot of battles like this. But tougher times might still be ahead of us.

char_017_huang.title: Promotion 1
char_017_huang.text: Hehe, can you feel the air getting hotter? No? Reeaaally? Then I'd better kick things up a notch. Aww, I was trying to get you fired up.

char_017_huang.title: Promotion 2
char_017_huang.text: Us Rhodes Island Operators put all our trust in Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit, and you, Present Doctor. Because you've never given up on any of us. Fighting for the Infected is the right thing to do. It's worth it, Doctor.

char_017_huang.title: Added to Squad
char_017_huang.text: Time for combat? Count me in!

char_017_huang.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_017_huang.text: Alright, I'm the leader, huh? I got this, I know all about wiping out hostiles!

char_017_huang.title: Depart
char_017_huang.text: Us frontline breachers have high standards. Try to keep up!

char_017_huang.title: Begin Operation
char_017_huang.text: It may be a little gruesome, but I love shredding steel and crushing bunkers!

char_017_huang.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_017_huang.text: You know, it wasn't easy learning high-temperature vapor dynamics!

char_017_huang.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_017_huang.text: Let me show you the chainsaw techniques the other elite operators taught me!

char_017_huang.title: Deployment 1
char_017_huang.text: This place could use some heat.

char_017_huang.title: Deployment 2
char_017_huang.text: Hear the roar of my chainsaw!

char_017_huang.title: In Battle 1
char_017_huang.text: Don't worry if you see fire, that's just a side effect!

char_017_huang.title: In Battle 2
char_017_huang.text: Surrender now if you don't want to get sawed in half!

char_017_huang.title: In Battle 3
char_017_huang.text: My blood's only gonna make this place hotter!

char_017_huang.title: In Battle 4
char_017_huang.text: Fresh blood coats my saw, and boils the whole battlefield!

char_017_huang.title: 4-star Result
char_017_huang.text: No sacrifice is meaningless, and no victory comes without a cost.

char_017_huang.title: 3-star Result
char_017_huang.text: The rights of the Infected will only be won by the actions of the Infected!

char_017_huang.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_017_huang.text: Let's work harder next time. We can always do better, right?

char_017_huang.title: Operation Failure
char_017_huang.text: Let's just say luck wasn't on our side this time.

char_017_huang.title: Assigned to Facility
char_017_huang.text: Any new facilities at Rhodes Island this time?

char_017_huang.title: Tap
char_017_huang.text: Hey, knock that off!

char_017_huang.title: Trust Tap
char_017_huang.text: Wait a second! I'm way too sweaty!

char_017_huang.title: Title
char_017_huang.text: Arknights.

char_017_huang.title: Greeting
char_017_huang.text: Doctor, when are we heading out on our next mission?

char_367_swllow.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_367_swllow.text: Fine. At least I can get a break from the dusty air outside, if I stay here with you.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk 1
char_367_swllow.text: I don't shy away from sensitive discussions about the Infected? That's true. They're obviously different from us. But they also have the right to seize hope, just like us. So they don't need me to do anything special for them. That's equality, isn't it?

char_367_swllow.title: Talk 2
char_367_swllow.text: Blaze is too reckless sometimes. I know she's strong, but… What? You know how to handle her?  Forget it, I'll ask Amiya what I should do to get along with her after we get back.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk 3
char_367_swllow.text: I was just speaking objectively. If you don't want to be discriminated against, then you shouldn't expect special treatment... What, she went back to her room crying? Look, I feel a little bad about it, but is someone that fragile really operator material?

char_367_swllow.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_367_swllow.text: Rhodes Island is changing, Doctor. Maybe you don't feel it, since you're the reason it's changing, and not everyone is so annoyingly outspoken as I am. Anyway, I do appreciate the direction Rhodes Island is moving.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_367_swllow.text: I used to prefer long-distance missions, like I was running away from Rhodes Island. I'll admit that was a little ungrateful, considering Rhodes Island adopted me. But now? Hehe, if you still have operators who like splattering blood all over the place, maybe I'll apply to serve in some faraway place again.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_367_swllow.text: Doctor, would you sometimes feel afraid? Catastrophes, Originium, Oripathy, and the Infected? Hm, I'm still plagued by nightmares even now. But these days, I have Amiya, and idiots like that Blaze. I guess I'm not as afraid as I used to be.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_367_swllow.text: Why are you called 'Doctor?' No, I'm not trying to get you to remember anything, it's just that title makes me very... wistful. Looking at all the Infected around you... Brings to mind a little bit of the past.

char_367_swllow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_367_swllow.text: I've known the whole time. When my mother brought me to Rhodes Island, she'd already lost her mind. I didn't feel the pain her inner conflicts caused her, but I can relate to it, because I relied on that obsession to get me to where I am today. Only now, I've found a new direction... I want to find her, and I want to save her.

char_367_swllow.title: Idle
char_367_swllow.text: You shoulder the future of Rhodes Island. And with the burden of that responsibility, you can't be so lackadaisical.

char_367_swllow.title: Onboard
char_367_swllow.text: So you're the Doctor? Amiya told me about you. I'm GreyThroat. Please don't disappoint me.

char_367_swllow.title: Watching Battle Record
char_367_swllow.text: For efficiency's sake, speed up the playback. I'll still be able to see it all clearly.

char_367_swllow.title: Promotion 1
char_367_swllow.text: Even now, I'm still on bad terms with a handful of operators. My promotion might spark controversy, just a reminder.

char_367_swllow.title: Promotion 2
char_367_swllow.text: Whether Infected or not, we all choose to walk upon this land of our own free will. And so we must all work hard to survive, right?

char_367_swllow.title: Added to Squad
char_367_swllow.text: I prefer working alone.

char_367_swllow.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_367_swllow.text: Whether or not they'll listen to my orders is another matter.

char_367_swllow.title: Depart
char_367_swllow.text: A panoramic view of the battlefield.

char_367_swllow.title: Begin Operation
char_367_swllow.text: I just have to rout them, right?

char_367_swllow.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_367_swllow.text: I'm here.

char_367_swllow.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_367_swllow.text: Too slow.

char_367_swllow.title: Deployment 1
char_367_swllow.text: I'll get going then.

char_367_swllow.title: Deployment 2
char_367_swllow.text: Can the others keep up?

char_367_swllow.title: In Battle 1
char_367_swllow.text: Such slow movements.

char_367_swllow.title: In Battle 2
char_367_swllow.text: I see them. Too bad they don't see me.

char_367_swllow.title: In Battle 3
char_367_swllow.text: I'm skilled enough to resolve this.

char_367_swllow.title: In Battle 4
char_367_swllow.text: Don't worry, their sights are totally empty.

char_367_swllow.title: 4-star Result
char_367_swllow.text: We won't see many victories like this, since our power is limited.

char_367_swllow.title: 3-star Result
char_367_swllow.text: I have no talent to speak of. So as a crossbowman, I can't let an enemy within three meters. Not even a corpse.

char_367_swllow.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_367_swllow.text: The medics should stay behind to tend the wounded. I will chase after them, considering I'm used to working alone anyway.

char_367_swllow.title: Operation Failure
char_367_swllow.text: Watch your flanks. I'll cover our retreat.

char_367_swllow.title: Assigned to Facility
char_367_swllow.text: I've been here for years, but I rarely wander around inside…

char_367_swllow.title: Tap
char_367_swllow.text: Huh?!

char_367_swllow.title: Trust Tap
char_367_swllow.text: Aren't you afraid of upsetting the Infected operators if they see you with me all the time?

char_367_swllow.title: Title
char_367_swllow.text: Arknights.

char_367_swllow.title: Greeting
char_367_swllow.text: Hello.

char_302_glaze.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_302_glaze.text: Any work to do today? If it's not urgent, just push everything back a bit.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk 1
char_302_glaze.text: I can detect nearby creatures with my Originium Arts, and this auxiliary device can further amplify the effect. Sounds great, huh? That's why the Garrison Team sent me to patrol the city, in case there were any students trying to skip school. They sure know how to put people to use.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk 2
char_302_glaze.text: Just to get this out of the way, this so-called secret of Laterano or whatever? I don't know a single thing about it. I just want to live a leisurely life. The less I know, the better off I'll be, wouldn't you agree?

char_302_glaze.title: Talk 3
char_302_glaze.text: Hmm? Isn't that person over there from the Notarial Hall? He wanted to make sure I'm 'fulfilling my obligations?' Oh please, I pay my taxes on time every month. Anyway, whether or not that's true, give me a whisper if he's looking for me so I have time to go on a run.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_302_glaze.text: I was bored earlier, so I headed down to the bridge to slack off... Err, I meant, I wanted to take a look at the scenery, but everyone was looking at me like I was getting ready to off somebody. Hey, doesn't that mean people see me as a killer? Like I'd ever want a job like that, way too messy.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_302_glaze.text: In the past, the top brass used to always harp on 'protecting the glory of Laterano with your life,' but I have no interest in that slogan, and I hate how static and immutable life was during that time. Working with you is way better, since you can give me something more practical.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_302_glaze.text: My hair's a bit messy? Oh, seems like I forgot to tidied up after getting out of bed. After all, it's not like I have anything to do today... What a pain in the butt. Anyway, come help me out, is my braid all crooked? It always feels a bit weird to me. You really should have a mirror in your office.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_302_glaze.text: Hey, I have some cake for you. What do you usually do during break? You really should take a lap around the city and get some fresh air, don't you think? As for security, just grab an Operator that can go 'pow pow' on any baddies near you, and you're set.

char_302_glaze.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_302_glaze.text: Wanna go watch a movie? Our work's just about done anyway. How about that romantic movie about the princess and the wanderer from afar? Wait, I need to hang up my do-not-disturb sign. Wouldn't want someone walking in.

char_302_glaze.title: Idle
char_302_glaze.text: ...Gotta take advantage of a time like this.

char_302_glaze.title: Onboard
char_302_glaze.text: Ambriel, sniper, from Laterano... Introductions are a pain in the butt, so that's it. Here, I just opened this pack of chocolate. Break off a stick.

char_302_glaze.title: Watching Battle Record
char_302_glaze.text: How long is this thing... Is there no option to play all of these at once?

char_302_glaze.title: Promotion 1
char_302_glaze.text: Thanks. Speaking of which, do these promotions come with a salary increase? There's something I've been looking at recently...

char_302_glaze.title: Promotion 2
char_302_glaze.text: Oh, thank you very much. I've been with Rhodes Island for quite some time now, right? Without realizing it, I've gotten a whole lot out of this, and made some good memories as well.

char_302_glaze.title: Added to Squad
char_302_glaze.text: My teammates seem quite capable this time.

char_302_glaze.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_302_glaze.text: I'll say this up front. My tactics are a little unorthodox.

char_302_glaze.title: Depart
char_302_glaze.text: Ready? Let's get going.

char_302_glaze.title: Begin Operation
char_302_glaze.text: I hope we can wrap this mission up before dinner.

char_302_glaze.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_302_glaze.text: Hmm?

char_302_glaze.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_302_glaze.text: Let me finish this piece first.

char_302_glaze.title: Deployment 1
char_302_glaze.text: Deploying sniper platform.

char_302_glaze.title: Deployment 2
char_302_glaze.text: Automatically calibrating.

char_302_glaze.title: In Battle 1
char_302_glaze.text: Over here.

char_302_glaze.title: In Battle 2
char_302_glaze.text: You should've hidden yourself better.

char_302_glaze.title: In Battle 3
char_302_glaze.text: It's very dangerous out there.

char_302_glaze.title: In Battle 4
char_302_glaze.text: I'll send you home.

char_302_glaze.title: 4-star Result
char_302_glaze.text: As expected, Doctor, you're the only one who can consistently achieve results like this!

char_302_glaze.title: 3-star Result
char_302_glaze.text: Not a single wasted shot - perfect.

char_302_glaze.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_302_glaze.text: Not the prettiest victory, but a win's a win, right?

char_302_glaze.title: Operation Failure
char_302_glaze.text: The number of targets is still increasing, and they're about to launch an attack. Doctor, let's get out of here...

char_302_glaze.title: Assigned to Facility
char_302_glaze.text: Doctor, it's about time to replenish the cookies in the vending machine.

char_302_glaze.title: Tap
char_302_glaze.text: What is it?

char_302_glaze.title: Trust Tap
char_302_glaze.text: I heard that a new line of clothing just arrived in the Procurement Division? Hehe, Doctor, you simply must take me to see it.

char_302_glaze.title: Title
char_302_glaze.text: Arknights.

char_302_glaze.title: Greeting
char_302_glaze.text: Yo.

char_2014_nian.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2014_nian.text: Man, I'm so bored... Might just go shopping... You know what, yeah, we're doing it! Come on, put your shoes on. Yeah, we're both going out, that's why I said 'we'!

char_2014_nian.title: Talk 1
char_2014_nian.text: That lame look of yours is grinding my gears... Here, have a toy to lighten up. You're busy with work? Who cares about some boring-ass work? Just one thing: don't lose sight of this little doll, or it'll vanish in the blink of an eye.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk 2
char_2014_nian.text: Maaan, I'm so hungry... But as they say, gourmet food takes a gourmet cook. My brother's a great chef, you get hungry at one of our family reunions, just call him up and he'll take care of you. Now that's what I call service! Rhodes Island's food tastes like crap compared to his.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk 3
char_2014_nian.text: Lungmen's a pretty chill place, but their cuisine? It's got no kick to it! How can they eat that flavorless baby food? Listen up: spice is a way of life. Once you taste a little pleasant pain and feel that explosion of heat on your tongue, you'll realize what you've been missing all this time.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2014_nian.text: I used to just focus myself on what I needed for daily life, but I'm the type to really absorb my surroundings. And somehow or other I keep getting into fights. So I guess I could say it feels weird to NOT carry a weapon around. So it goes, I guess.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2014_nian.text: Rituals get passed down from generation to generation not 'cause they have any inherent meaning, but because people find their own meaning in them. A performance has its rewards, and a wish has its fulfillment. And when one of my favorite stories is involved, you bet your ass I'm gonna participate.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2014_nian.text: If you're out of touch with reality, you'll end up crushed beneath its boot, sooner or later. You'd think that's common freakin' sense, but some of my siblings ignore reality for what it is. Their dull lives are only gonna get harder for 'em as time goes on.

char_2014_nian.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2014_nian.text: Your dreams turn to haze when you've lived as long as I have. But I've got better stuff to do than dream all day, and that's why l feel so alive. Sure, life is suffering, but seeing people carve something out for themselves is incredible. And as for you: think you got what it takes to be the anvil to my hammer?

char_2014_nian.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2014_nian.text: Blacksmithing may just be a regular old occupation, but it was also a part of early civilization. I'll keep metallurgy well and alive, even if everything else dies out. That's the future I chose for myself long ago. And you, you've made important choices before, haven'tcha? Don't ever go back on them. Stay true to the end and see it through. That's what it means to complete something.

char_2014_nian.title: Idle
char_2014_nian.text: You're sleeping AGAIN? Wake up, sunshine! We're going shopping! C'mon, hurry!

char_2014_nian.title: Onboard
char_2014_nian.text: Anybody home? Heard from one of your guys that I can make a comfy living here! Something about free lodging and food, with plenty of free time left over... Hm? This area is for staff only? Don't be like that! You make it sound like I don't belong here!

char_2014_nian.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2014_nian.text: Huh? What good do you think this stuff's gonna do me? Skills like these are only useful to people who value them.

char_2014_nian.title: Promotion 1
char_2014_nian.text: A promotion? That takes me back... I got something like this once before. Anyway, that's cool, I guess. You have my thanks!

char_2014_nian.title: Promotion 2
char_2014_nian.text: People are like tools; you can classify 'em. And you, you're an interesting one... Or should I say 'unusual'? I could forge you a good sword, but since you ain't gonna swing it, let alone fight in the first place, it'd just be a waste of metal.

char_2014_nian.title: Added to Squad
char_2014_nian.text: Guess one thing's never gonna change with time: swords will inevitably clash.

char_2014_nian.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2014_nian.text: Say what? Lead the team? Never led anyone before, but I guess I'll try.

char_2014_nian.title: Depart
char_2014_nian.text: A smith's gotta be ready to pay the debts accrued by the weapons she forges.

char_2014_nian.title: Begin Operation
char_2014_nian.text: My sword's gonna cleave your bodies and values alike.

char_2014_nian.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2014_nian.text: Oh? You want me to handle this(, personally)?

char_2014_nian.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2014_nian.text: A knife, a life; weapons are the basis for society.

char_2014_nian.title: Deployment 1
char_2014_nian.text: 'When 'tis a choice of life and death, why shouldst thou lay down thy arms?'

char_2014_nian.title: Deployment 2
char_2014_nian.text: Let's just get this done with.

char_2014_nian.title: In Battle 1
char_2014_nian.text: You dare strike my shield with your spear? That's gonna end with you in pieces!

char_2014_nian.title: In Battle 2
char_2014_nian.text: My body burns at over 1,400 degrees!

char_2014_nian.title: In Battle 3
char_2014_nian.text: Even a virtuous king must, from time to time, look to the sword.

char_2014_nian.title: In Battle 4
char_2014_nian.text: Why do I gotta waste my precious time on the likes of you third-rate amateurs?

char_2014_nian.title: 4-star Result
char_2014_nian.text: Not bad! I see some faint promise in you!

char_2014_nian.title: 3-star Result
char_2014_nian.text: These small fry ain't even close to quelling my hunger.

char_2014_nian.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2014_nian.text: Man, you sure messed up. What'd I tell you about air bubbles weakening the iron?

char_2014_nian.title: Operation Failure
char_2014_nian.text: Terrible... If I really let myself loose, things would get a whole lot nastier... for everyone involved.

char_2014_nian.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2014_nian.text: Mind if I do some redecorating in here?

char_2014_nian.title: Tap
char_2014_nian.text: Dude! Stop it!

char_2014_nian.title: Trust Tap
char_2014_nian.text: Hold still! I'm making you a little something for your ear. It'll look great, just don't move!

char_2014_nian.title: Title
char_2014_nian.text: Arknights.

char_2014_nian.title: Greeting
char_2014_nian.text: Yo, Doctor, you had lunch yet?

char_225_haak.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_225_haak.text: Oh yeah, my dude, when you're callin' my name to get my attention, don't forget to stress the K at the end. Or else I might assume you're stammering or somethin'.

char_225_haak.title: Talk 1
char_225_haak.text: Whoa, whoa, hold up! Is that vampire lady none other than 'Mr. Blood'?! Man, we've still not settled that medical score we had a while back, and this is the perfect opportunity! I'll have to set up my experiment equipment later... Heheheheh!

char_225_haak.title: Talk 2
char_225_haak.text: Lemme guess, Hung's still tellin' you to watch out around me, ain't he? Oh, just to 'look after me'? Yeah, that sounds like him all right. But listen, Boss, I know your type. You're like me, and you just wanna do whatever you want, right? Then just ignore that guy. We can do whatever fun stuff we like.

char_225_haak.title: Talk 3
char_225_haak.text: Yeah, I develop new drugs, do surgery, and nurture bacteria cultures, but those are all just fun hobbies to me. Doc. Aak? Nah, don't call me that. I don't save anyone, 'cuz I can't teach them the value of their lives. All I can do is just prevent 'em from dying.

char_225_haak.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_225_haak.text: The medical department guys are askin' for me? Man, give me a break. I don't dig those professional physicians. They firmly believe that being a doctor's this noble job, and are content with saving more lives... before everything just comes crashing down when their faith got shattered. I've seen that happen time and time again. Honestly, it makes me sad.

char_225_haak.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_225_haak.text: I don't dislike Rhodes Island. Instead, I think you guys are doing your job just fine. People are dyin' in the world right as we speak, and with all those doctors cooping up in labs, waiting for patients to knock on their clinics' doors, diseases ain't rid themselves of these lands. Hardly anyone gets it, but you people seem to have it in mind... Keep up the good stuff, will ya?

char_225_haak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_225_haak.text: Me, a cynic? You got me wrong, my dude. I simply pity all the people on this land. Everyone's got their own hardships to deal with, and I know that. But what's the point of curing pains and sufferings when we can't cure their source? What medicine saves a man who's being murdered? Terra doesn't need more doctors in suits, my dude.

char_225_haak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_225_haak.text: My pops was an amazing doctor, and he was all about saving people's lives. But his colleagues slandered him, sidelined him, and framed him. That's how he ended up as a underground doctor, the nastiest among the wicked. Stuff like that ain't so unusual, but I'll admit, what happened to him really changed my own life.

char_225_haak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_225_haak.text: Have Waai Fu and Hung left? Really? Aight, I'm gonna hang out in your office for a while then. Y'know, if anyone can make this land a better place, it's gotta be people like them. You, meanwhile... Well, guess we are simply two peas in a pod, aren't we?

char_225_haak.title: Idle
char_225_haak.text: Aha! You Feelin' tired? Then come try this new compound I made! Free of charge, of course!

char_225_haak.title: Onboard
char_225_haak.text: So you're the Doctor, eh? Nice to meet'cha. My name's Aak. That's right, two A's with a K. Anyway, I'm here 'cause the agency got some business here at Rhodes Island. A quick question before we start: does the phrase 'medical mishap' put you off?

char_225_haak.title: Watching Battle Record
char_225_haak.text: Huh... Does this mean I might get involved in combat scenarios like this? Surely not, right?

char_225_haak.title: Promotion 1
char_225_haak.text: A promotion? Almost too good to be true, man. I knew my agency has been exploiting me all along!

char_225_haak.title: Promotion 2
char_225_haak.text: Honestly, I dunno if I'm helpful or not. The way I see it, you've gotta be nice to be helpful, and I'm not blind to how people perceive me. But in any case, if you ever get sick, you know who to call.

char_225_haak.title: Added to Squad
char_225_haak.text: We goin' on a mission? Sure, let's do it.

char_225_haak.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_225_haak.text: All right, team, gimme your thoughts on my new meds after this is done.

char_225_haak.title: Depart
char_225_haak.text: Once I start an operation, there's no stoppin' it.

char_225_haak.title: Begin Operation
char_225_haak.text: Relax, guys. You just can't die with me by your side.

char_225_haak.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_225_haak.text: When prescribing, I always go double-down on the dosage.

char_225_haak.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_225_haak.text: I ain't one for battle, but treating peole is so much fun!

char_225_haak.title: Deployment 1
char_225_haak.text: Time for a clinical test of my new meds.

char_225_haak.title: Deployment 2
char_225_haak.text: Learn to treat yourself with kindness, or regret when sickness treats you.

char_225_haak.title: In Battle 1
char_225_haak.text: All lives are equal... while yours is a deviation.

char_225_haak.title: In Battle 2
char_225_haak.text: Just take the shot. You will be amazed.

char_225_haak.title: In Battle 3
char_225_haak.text: My potion might give the bad guys a new leaf to turn over!

char_225_haak.title: In Battle 4
char_225_haak.text: Medicine, a box you wish you've never opened!

char_225_haak.title: 4-star Result
char_225_haak.text: I doubt I can make the world a better place on my own, but at least I can stop it from gettin' any worse with your help.

char_225_haak.title: 3-star Result
char_225_haak.text: Could we capture some enemies for a little experimenting? It's not violating ethics as long as no one sees it. Not a chance? Aww.

char_225_haak.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_225_haak.text: Letting 'em get away like that? You are a saint.

char_225_haak.title: Operation Failure
char_225_haak.text: Don't worry, my dude. I can fix any injury as long as the patient's still breathing.

char_225_haak.title: Assigned to Facility
char_225_haak.text: Now, now, let's see. Which of these rooms is my new lab?

char_225_haak.title: Tap
char_225_haak.text: Ah?

char_225_haak.title: Trust Tap
char_225_haak.text: Yo, my dude! Found any new experiment samples for me?

char_225_haak.title: Title
char_225_haak.text: Arknights.

char_225_haak.title: Greeting
char_225_haak.text: Hey, my dude. What's cookin'?

char_226_hmau.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_226_hmau.text: Hi, Doc. Have you eaten yet? Here, I got some cookies if you're hungry.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk 1
char_226_hmau.text: Doc, I know Aak's been a nuisance to you, but could you be lenient with him? He teases people a lot, but he's not a bad person. Also, let me know if he ever gets under your skin, I'll give him a lesson on that.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk 2
char_226_hmau.text: Just call on me when you're hungry, Doc, and I'll make you a little something to eat. I may not look a like a chef, but I did learn a recipe or two from Mr. Lee.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk 3
char_226_hmau.text: Say, Doc, do you give any lectures on machines here at Rhodes Island? I've got an interest in that stuff and was hoping I could learn something new.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_226_hmau.text: Hahah, just between you and me, Doc, for the longest time I thought all detectives do the same stuff as Mr. Lee. You know, taking sips of tea at the scene of gang fights, that sort of thing.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_226_hmau.text: I'm sure you already know, but with the intellect and talent that Aak's got, he's destined for great things one day. But personally, all that matters to me is that he doesn't ever go back to what he used to be.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_226_hmau.text: Me and Mr. Lee, well... How should I put it... I was a bit scared of him at first. He seemed like a clever guy who's got a lot going on, which had me on edge... But now after knowing him for so many years, I know I have nothing to worry about, haha.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_226_hmau.text: Hey, Doc, If you need info on something or someone, just tell me and I'll ask Mr. Lee for you. Nothing in Lungmen happens without him knowing about it.

char_226_hmau.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_226_hmau.text: To be honest with you, I actually don't like getting into fights. I'd much rather we could all get along with each other. But I won't back down from inevitable conflicts; there are things I'll fight to protect. Things like the agency, and now, Rhodes Island as well.

char_226_hmau.title: Idle
char_226_hmau.text: Do— Phew, almost woke the Doc up... Guess I'll take this opportunity to rest too.

char_226_hmau.title: Onboard
char_226_hmau.text: You must be the doctor that Mr. Lee talked about. The name's Hung, it's a pleasure to meet you. My fields of expertise are security and repairing machinery. If you ever need a bodyguard for a public appearance, or if your TV or fridge break down, just give me a holler!

char_226_hmau.title: Watching Battle Record
char_226_hmau.text: Woah, your operators never cease to amaze me... I've got to work harder.

char_226_hmau.title: Promotion 1
char_226_hmau.text: Thanks, Doc! I'll be giving it 110% from here on out!

char_226_hmau.title: Promotion 2
char_226_hmau.text: Doc, don't hesitate to give me all the work you need done. I might not have the brain for many things, but I've got the brawn!

char_226_hmau.title: Added to Squad
char_226_hmau.text: A mission? I'm ready whenever.

char_226_hmau.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_226_hmau.text: I personally guarantee everyone's safety.

char_226_hmau.title: Depart
char_226_hmau.text: Stay close behind so we don't get split up.

char_226_hmau.title: Begin Operation
char_226_hmau.text: Don't worry, you've got me.

char_226_hmau.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_226_hmau.text: I'll handle this!

char_226_hmau.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_226_hmau.text: Where am I needed?

char_226_hmau.title: Deployment 1
char_226_hmau.text: I'll cover you!

char_226_hmau.title: Deployment 2
char_226_hmau.text: I'm here to protect you all!

char_226_hmau.title: In Battle 1
char_226_hmau.text: You shall not pass!

char_226_hmau.title: In Battle 2
char_226_hmau.text: Anyone need healing?

char_226_hmau.title: In Battle 3
char_226_hmau.text: You're not hurting anyone on my watch!

char_226_hmau.title: In Battle 4
char_226_hmau.text: A little scratch ain't gonna stop me!

char_226_hmau.title: 4-star Result
char_226_hmau.text: *pant*... *pant*... Sorry, Doc, but could you give me a minute? I'm totally burned out.

char_226_hmau.title: 3-star Result
char_226_hmau.text: You can stay here and rest, Doc. I'll clean up the battlefield.

char_226_hmau.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_226_hmau.text: Stay beside me, Doc. There are still enemies around.

char_226_hmau.title: Operation Failure
char_226_hmau.text: Hurry, Doc, climb onto my back! I'm getting you out of here!

char_226_hmau.title: Assigned to Facility
char_226_hmau.text: Leave patrol duty to me.

char_226_hmau.title: Tap
char_226_hmau.text: Any broken machines need fixing?

char_226_hmau.title: Trust Tap
char_226_hmau.text: Sup, Doc? Anything I can help you with?

char_226_hmau.title: Title
char_226_hmau.text: Arknights.

char_226_hmau.title: Greeting
char_226_hmau.text: Morning, Doc.

char_383_snsant.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_383_snsant.text: D-Doctor! Excuse me, but could you please move a little? You're stepping on a coin...

char_383_snsant.title: Talk 1
char_383_snsant.text: My dream is to be praised sincerely by the entire world... Ah, um, maybe just Lungmen... Well, maybe I should start with Rhodes Island, or, um, just you! Yes, that is my dream for the time being...

char_383_snsant.title: Talk 2
char_383_snsant.text: Ugh, I forgot to turn off the light when I left the office yesterday... Hm? Rhodes Island has a power generation facility so there's no need to pay for electricity? Really? Does that I mean I get to eat dinner in the future?

char_383_snsant.title: Talk 3
char_383_snsant.text: This is the Originium ammunition that Jessica ordered... Eh? D-Doctor! Isn't this dollar amount wrong? Or is this the currency of some small remote country? It's not? It's LMD? I, I, I, I, I see... Don't worry, I was just a l-l-l-little s-surprised.

char_383_snsant.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_383_snsant.text: Oripathy... Hm, even though it's a bit beyond my field of study, it does seem to be worth looking into... But if I add another research project, I'll go from two meals a day to two days a meal... Ugh...

char_383_snsant.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_383_snsant.text: Frugality is a type of virtue, but for me, it's closer to a habit... D-despite that, if you or my friends were in need, I'd gladly help out! I'm serious!

char_383_snsant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_383_snsant.text: You'd like to take a look at my clawhook? That's maybe fine... but whatever you do, don't push this button. And watch your thumb when you're holding the grip... W-wait, you're not winding the rope correctly, and... Ack! Sorry, don't mind me, you can keep looking at it...

char_383_snsant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_383_snsant.text: After I become a great, world-famous scientist with lots of money, I swear I'll have three meals a day and dessert too, just like Jessica... And then, with the money I'm not able to spend, I'd put it back into making Lungmen a better place. Um... if a day like that ever comes.

char_383_snsant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_383_snsant.text: Money is very important. Before I returned to Lungmen, I refused a large retention fee from the research institute, so my self-funded research project went under... But it's more important to be home. I can always save up more money, and now I won't go dizzy from looking at all those large numbers!

char_383_snsant.title: Idle
char_383_snsant.text: ...Did you fall asleep? Just let me handle the rest, though I am a bit hungry.

char_383_snsant.title: Onboard
char_383_snsant.text: Oww... my head! Sorry... Oh, y-you're the Doctor? It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Snowsant. Sorry, I shouldn't be walking with my head down...

char_383_snsant.title: Watching Battle Record
char_383_snsant.text: Woah... This isn't something you can learn with more effort...

char_383_snsant.title: Promotion 1
char_383_snsant.text: Ehh? A p-promotion? I feel a bit more pressure, but I'll be okay. This is the proof that I'm one step farther than when I first came.

char_383_snsant.title: Promotion 2
char_383_snsant.text: 'Heaven rewards the hard-working.' Wouldn't you agree, Doctor?

char_383_snsant.title: Added to Squad
char_383_snsant.text: It'll be all right, as long as I work just as hard as I did during training...

char_383_snsant.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_383_snsant.text: You want m-me to be the squad leader? I really don't know anything about battle though...

char_383_snsant.title: Depart
char_383_snsant.text: Clawhook inspection complete! Take a deep breath... I can do this!

char_383_snsant.title: Begin Operation
char_383_snsant.text: I found the enemy!

char_383_snsant.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_383_snsant.text: M-me?

char_383_snsant.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_383_snsant.text: I'll do my best!

char_383_snsant.title: Deployment 1
char_383_snsant.text: My clawhook won't malfunction, right?

char_383_snsant.title: Deployment 2
char_383_snsant.text: This is my first time being so close to a battlefield...

char_383_snsant.title: In Battle 1
char_383_snsant.text: Clawhook at the ready!

char_383_snsant.title: In Battle 2
char_383_snsant.text: Stop moving around, it'll be easier this way!

char_383_snsant.title: In Battle 3
char_383_snsant.text: O-owww!

char_383_snsant.title: In Battle 4
char_383_snsant.text: My equipment's in good shape!

char_383_snsant.title: 4-star Result
char_383_snsant.text: As long as we work together, there's no obstacle we can't overcome!

char_383_snsant.title: 3-star Result
char_383_snsant.text: What a flawless victory - not a bit of waste!

char_383_snsant.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_383_snsant.text: Some enemies got away, sh-should we chase after them?

char_383_snsant.title: Operation Failure
char_383_snsant.text: I, I'll go salvage some damage parts, to at least reduce our losses...

char_383_snsant.title: Assigned to Facility
char_383_snsant.text: Woah, so this is what it's like inside Rhodes Island... I'm so envious...

char_383_snsant.title: Tap
char_383_snsant.text: Eek!

char_383_snsant.title: Trust Tap
char_383_snsant.text: Doctor?

char_383_snsant.title: Title
char_383_snsant.text: Arknights.

char_383_snsant.title: Greeting
char_383_snsant.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_2013_cerber.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2013_cerber.text: Hm? What should I do? Just put this stack of papers on this box?

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk 1
char_2013_cerber.text: Doctor, are you working? Can I watch? Great! Sofa, here I come~

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk 2
char_2013_cerber.text: I'm super strong. Forget one bad guy, I can take on a hundred at once. Uhh, maybe a hundred is a bit much... But ninety-nine is no problem! Mhm!

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk 3
char_2013_cerber.text: I found a bunch of these little bottle things in some room, and the sauce inside tasted pretty good. Is it spicy? Yeah, seems to be a little hot, but it's also really tasty. Want some, Doctor?

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2013_cerber.text: My den is right here. Doctor's den is above my head, and Vulcan's is to my left... Okay, got it! Repeat it? Mm, sure. My den is above my head, Doctor's is to my left, and Vulcan's is right here...

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2013_cerber.text: So this is where I started from? Oh, oh, then where did I go before this? And where did you catch me? Can you find it all on this map?!

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2013_cerber.text: So hungry... My tummy's been grumbling for so long. Can we head to the cafeteria?

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2013_cerber.text: I don't know much about these Arts, but when other people try to use my weapons, they can't make all those cool sparkly things happen. But don't worry, as long as I'm here, the bad guys won't be able to hurt you. I know who the bad guys are.

char_2013_cerber.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2013_cerber.text: There's a whole bunch of bad guys out there, and my friends won't always be around. That's why the more weapons I have, the more power I have. Isn't that right? Hey, can you stuff another hammer back there? And a javelin too, those are super useful! Hm? No means no!

char_2013_cerber.title: Idle
char_2013_cerber.text: Doctor's snoring sure sounds funny.

char_2013_cerber.title: Onboard
char_2013_cerber.text: You seem like you're a pretty nice person. 'Doctor,' was it? My name is Ceobe, but if that's too hard to say, you can just call me Kay! I'll be in your care!

char_2013_cerber.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2013_cerber.text: I'm watching! I really am!

char_2013_cerber.title: Promotion 1
char_2013_cerber.text: This little button is for me? Do I look good wearing it?

char_2013_cerber.title: Promotion 2
char_2013_cerber.text: One's not enough, two gets the job done, and three is for safety. As long as I bring the right weapons for the job, I'll take out the bad guys as they come.

char_2013_cerber.title: Added to Squad
char_2013_cerber.text: Doctor, I'm all ears.

char_2013_cerber.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2013_cerber.text: Lead? What's a lead?

char_2013_cerber.title: Depart
char_2013_cerber.text: I wonder if there's gonna be anything tasty when I get back~

char_2013_cerber.title: Begin Operation
char_2013_cerber.text: Phew... All righty!

char_2013_cerber.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2013_cerber.text: Hmm?

char_2013_cerber.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2013_cerber.text: Loud and clear!

char_2013_cerber.title: Deployment 1
char_2013_cerber.text: Leave it to me!

char_2013_cerber.title: Deployment 2
char_2013_cerber.text: See you later!

char_2013_cerber.title: In Battle 1
char_2013_cerber.text: Haah!

char_2013_cerber.title: In Battle 2
char_2013_cerber.text: Gooooooo!

char_2013_cerber.title: In Battle 3
char_2013_cerber.text: Dadadadada!

char_2013_cerber.title: In Battle 4
char_2013_cerber.text: Prey should stay still!

char_2013_cerber.title: 4-star Result
char_2013_cerber.text: With your brains, my job is super easy! You're the best, Doctor!

char_2013_cerber.title: 3-star Result
char_2013_cerber.text: All that's needed is a bang, bang! And that takes care of them!

char_2013_cerber.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2013_cerber.text: Are you hurt? Do you need help?

char_2013_cerber.title: Operation Failure
char_2013_cerber.text: Hurry, run! We won't be able to get away if we don't hurry up!

char_2013_cerber.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2013_cerber.text: This fluffy thing is gonna feel absolutely amazing~

char_2013_cerber.title: Tap
char_2013_cerber.text: I'll bite you!

char_2013_cerber.title: Trust Tap
char_2013_cerber.text: Hey, can you take me with you?

char_2013_cerber.title: Title
char_2013_cerber.text: Arknights.

char_2013_cerber.title: Greeting
char_2013_cerber.text: Good morning, Doctor! Mhm, that's a proper greeting, right?

char_306_leizi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_306_leizi.text: Look carefully. The files are sorted by type, then time limit prioritization, then finally, by distance from nearest to farthest. This is the most efficient organization method! ...Wait, I seem to have done all the paperwork on accident. This... is supposed to be your job, right?

char_306_leizi.title: Talk 1
char_306_leizi.text: I've checked all files related to the elite Operator, Blaze, and there are no records of her real name, or place and date of birth. Don't tell me you don't know; aren't you supposed to be one of the leaders here? You really don't know? Then... nevermind. Sorry, I shouldn't have accused you.

char_306_leizi.title: Talk 2
char_306_leizi.text: You don't need to be so cautious around me. Other than the case at hand, I'll treat everything else on the ship as if it never happened. But if there's another explosion in the hallway outside my room, I'll make the perpetrator's hair stand on end for two weeks!

char_306_leizi.title: Talk 3
char_306_leizi.text: 'Assume the responsibilities for the post to which you are assigned.' As one of the leaders of Rhodes Island, is it not your duty to... Huh? My hair's standing up again? Hold on! G-give me a moment to fix my look first! Weird, I thought I had discharged all the static electricity this morning...

char_306_leizi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_306_leizi.text: Even today, I can vaguely recall the first time I saw you in Lungmen. You, Blaze, and Ch'en... are all holding onto countless secrets... and I will uncover them one by one. You're willing to exchange secrets? Wait, y-you... it's t-too early for that...!

char_306_leizi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_306_leizi.text: Ask me anything. Only when you speak up can I decide what is just and unjust, and whether I wish to take action. I need to take my identity into consideration? This has nothing to do with that! The Censorate, Central Judicial Office, and the Department of Discipline and Supervision... are only institutions. Laws can only be proven just when enforced by someone.

char_306_leizi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_306_leizi.text: Rhodes Island's ideals conflict with my beliefs. However, I do recognize the necessity of seeking common ground while understanding our differences... The same is true when providing assistance in exchange for information.

char_306_leizi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_306_leizi.text: No matter where I am, the electricity flowing through my body never ceases. The thunderbolt is the symbol of justice; it drives me forward and sometimes even wakes me up at night... Someone is complaining that I broke the AC unit? ...How rude! How is that possible?! I don't even need to use a remote for the AC, let alone touch it!

char_306_leizi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_306_leizi.text: Blaze was implicated in a major incident. All the clues have purposely been eliminated, but I have my doubts about the way the facts of the case are connected based upon a few coincidences between certain persons and times. This has nothing to do with you, but you should take adequate precautions. All I can do is offer you a fair warning.

char_306_leizi.title: Idle
char_306_leizi.text: You can't even properly manage your physical condition... how slovenly! Look at you sprawled out like this... Were you waiting for me to put a blanket over you or something? ...There won't be a next time.

char_306_leizi.title: Onboard
char_306_leizi.text: I've signed obtained an investigation authorization with your company. Don't worry about it, this is purely over personal matters. If you so wish, you may call me Leizi. Who am I? Have we met before? Are you serious?!

char_306_leizi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_306_leizi.text: I see, this is a completely different principle from military training.

char_306_leizi.title: Promotion 1
char_306_leizi.text: Elite status? Is this... a promotion? The promotion process at Rhodes Island seems to differ from that of ordinary private companies...

char_306_leizi.title: Promotion 2
char_306_leizi.text: I, Leizi, am the bearer of the thunder and the law, the vision and reach of Great Yan. My philosophy does not align with that of Rhodes Island, and I have no intention on bridging the gap between the Infected and non-Infected. However, we can now fight side by side against our enemies!

char_306_leizi.title: Added to Squad
char_306_leizi.text: With my own eyes, I shall judge what power Rhodes Island possesses.

char_306_leizi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_306_leizi.text: I can do that, yes, albeit at a price.

char_306_leizi.title: Depart
char_306_leizi.text: Heed my orders!

char_306_leizi.title: Begin Operation
char_306_leizi.text: I have no interest in the identity of my enemies.

char_306_leizi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_306_leizi.text: In place.

char_306_leizi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_306_leizi.text: It may be done.

char_306_leizi.title: Deployment 1
char_306_leizi.text: Very well, understood.

char_306_leizi.title: Deployment 2
char_306_leizi.text: Harken! The thunder rumbles!

char_306_leizi.title: In Battle 1
char_306_leizi.text: Rise, thunder of the five elements!

char_306_leizi.title: In Battle 2
char_306_leizi.text: No forgiveness unto sinners! Retribution of thunder!

char_306_leizi.title: In Battle 3
char_306_leizi.text: Through the three thunders is justice governed!

char_306_leizi.title: In Battle 4
char_306_leizi.text: The essence of Lei Fa... is my will becoming one with Terra.

char_306_leizi.title: 4-star Result
char_306_leizi.text: Well done. As my standards are quite high, you should be proud of yourself.

char_306_leizi.title: 3-star Result
char_306_leizi.text: Unacceptable. You can do even better! Do not rest upon your laurels - you have the ability to strive for greater heights!

char_306_leizi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_306_leizi.text: Impossible, what happened? How can this be?

char_306_leizi.title: Operation Failure
char_306_leizi.text: Shameful...! Begone, you! Go back and reflect! I will hold back the enemies, so just go!

char_306_leizi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_306_leizi.text: Where's the power outlet?

char_306_leizi.title: Tap
char_306_leizi.text: How rude!

char_306_leizi.title: Trust Tap
char_306_leizi.text: Oh... did that hurt? Please be careful of the static electricity around me.

char_306_leizi.title: Title
char_306_leizi.text: Arknights.

char_306_leizi.title: Greeting
char_306_leizi.text: Don't slack off, Doctor.

char_385_finlpp.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_385_finlpp.text: Smiling can help you feel revitalized. Why don't you try smiling, Doctor~

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Rhodes Island shouldn't be like those black-hearted corporations, right? Lungmen Industrial Waste Disposal License, Lungmen City Sewage Permit... Well, it seems like there are no problems with your certification, and the sewage treatment seems good enough... It's good that you're a law-abiding organization!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk 2
char_385_finlpp.text: Woah, this water tastes amazing~! It's cool and sweet, just like the springs back in my hometown... Where's the water source? How is it filtered? What are you using to filter it? Please tell me quickly, Doctor!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk 3
char_385_finlpp.text: There are signs of excessive wastewater discharge this mon-- Huh? Did I take too many baths again? ...Oh no, I must reflect upon my behavior!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_385_finlpp.text: I love my hometown! Although it's not as lively in the country as it is in the city, and daily life isn't as comfortable, the water there is cool and delicious, and the air is always fresh. Hehe, these are sometimes hard to come by in the city!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_385_finlpp.text: The pollution near the city is getting worse and worse. Earlier, we even had problems with the water supply in my hometown, and resolving that situation required a lot of effort. While Catastrophes pose a very clear threat to us, pollution will also erode away at our habitable spaces! Therefore, protecting our environment is also of great importance!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Heave, ho! That should be the last shoe... Got it! Phew, now, this waterway will be much cleaner, and my daily efforts here won't go to waste! Thank you for accompanying me, Doctor!

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_385_finlpp.text: There is a legend among my people that we came from a place far, far away. Now that there are fewer and fewer of us, nobody seems to know where we came from, or where we are going...

char_385_finlpp.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_385_finlpp.text: Back in my hometown during harvest season, each family will make lots and lots of delicious food! Braised, sweet and sour, steamed, fried, marinated, anything you can imagine! Doctor, why don't we go visit together? The people there are very hospitable~

char_385_finlpp.title: Idle
char_385_finlpp.text: Ugh... So dry... I want to soak in a bath...

char_385_finlpp.title: Onboard
char_385_finlpp.text: Hello, I am the municipal waterway cleaner, codename Purestream! From now on, I will handle the water treatment and sanitation of this ship, so please rest assured! Oh, these are pickled vegetables from my hometown. Everyone is welcome to try some - I assure you, it's delicious!

char_385_finlpp.title: Watching Battle Record
char_385_finlpp.text: If the purpose is to gain experience, wouldn't it be faster to do it directly?

char_385_finlpp.title: Promotion 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Am I getting a raise? With this promotion and salary increase, I'm well on my way to the top! Hehe, I'll have to tell everyone back home the good news~

char_385_finlpp.title: Promotion 2
char_385_finlpp.text: While there is a difference in urgency between visible threats and less evident threats, they are both dangerous to us! I'm glad you understand, Doctor.

char_385_finlpp.title: Added to Squad
char_385_finlpp.text: No problem, just leave it to me!

char_385_finlpp.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_385_finlpp.text: Such an important task... I'll do my best!

char_385_finlpp.title: Depart
char_385_finlpp.text: Rhodes Island Water Treatment Team, heading out!

char_385_finlpp.title: Begin Operation
char_385_finlpp.text: Surprise inspection! Seize that scoundrel who just poured paint down the sink!

char_385_finlpp.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Roll up my sleeves and fight? ...Um, my outfit doesn't have any sleeves though.

char_385_finlpp.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_385_finlpp.text: Woah, they're really fighting!

char_385_finlpp.title: Deployment 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Cleaning work is my specialty!

char_385_finlpp.title: Deployment 2
char_385_finlpp.text: I bring the gift of water~

char_385_finlpp.title: In Battle 1
char_385_finlpp.text: Breach!

char_385_finlpp.title: In Battle 2
char_385_finlpp.text: That's unauthorized discharge of sewage!

char_385_finlpp.title: In Battle 3
char_385_finlpp.text: Water works to the benefit of all.

char_385_finlpp.title: In Battle 4
char_385_finlpp.text: How's that? Feeling a bit more awake after being splashed with cold water?

char_385_finlpp.title: 4-star Result
char_385_finlpp.text: No more contaminants! Very good, this mission was a great success~

char_385_finlpp.title: 3-star Result
char_385_finlpp.text: Operation complete! I'll handle the post-battle clean-up.

char_385_finlpp.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_385_finlpp.text: Hey, where'd the enemy run off to? I-I can't find them!

char_385_finlpp.title: Operation Failure
char_385_finlpp.text: The situation is looking bad, but we have nothing to fear as long as we stay strong! Let's fall back for now?

char_385_finlpp.title: Assigned to Facility
char_385_finlpp.text: I hope I can get a nice, big bathtub~

char_385_finlpp.title: Tap
char_385_finlpp.text: Hmm?

char_385_finlpp.title: Trust Tap
char_385_finlpp.text: Let me tell you a secret - I can swim while standing up~

char_385_finlpp.title: Title
char_385_finlpp.text: Arknights.

char_385_finlpp.title: Greeting
char_385_finlpp.text: Good morning, Doctor! Would you like a cup of cool, refreshing spring water?

char_222_bpipe.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_222_bpipe.text: Assistant? The one where ye just stand next tae folk, aye? Nae bother, saw that plenty in the army myself. Wait, I have tae do paperwork too? And assess combat data? And compile reports?! Th-that sounds mighty hectic.

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk 1
char_222_bpipe.text: Back in school, Chenchen always had a pissed off look on her face, made no end of enemies at first, but tha's just the kind of girl she is. Nae time at all, she had people seein' her wi fresh eyes. But y'know, bandagin' up her wounds, cookin' for her, teamin' up wi her squad and all that... I had tae look after her a fair bit, and that was no easy thing.

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk 2
char_222_bpipe.text: I'm great at drivin' machines! Harvesters, tractors, tillers, I'll be right at home wi anythin'. Hm? PDAs? Screens? Wireless systems? If yer meanin' little gadgety stuff, I'm nae so—ah crims, I just barely touched this—why's it smokin'?

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk 3
char_222_bpipe.text: Ye didnae get a proper supper in yesterday, did ye? No, I dinnae want tae hear aboot 'work, work, work'! If yer body gives out on ye, ye willnae be able tae get a thing done. Tell me what ye'd like, and I'll whip it right up for ye. Ah, na anything too fancy though, aye? I'd be lost tryin'.

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_222_bpipe.text: This Rhodes Island ship is... crivens, it's a million times more wonderful than Victoria's warships! We've got sunlight, wheat fields, herds of stockbeasts... Doctor, what if, we try growin' somethin' too? Like potatoes, say? I know all aboot growin' potatoes!

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_222_bpipe.text: Where d'ye think someone's hometown ends? The hoose furthest from the tractors? Or where the land meets the sky? Does it stop at the fronts we keep drawin' and redrawin' maps wi, all reds and blues and lines and arrows...? Y'know, after so many battles... sometimes I cannae recall what my hometown looks like.

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_222_bpipe.text: I'm sure that I ran across her once, that Reed lass. But she looks so lonely the noo, so pitiful... can she really be the same terrifyin' person I met before? It's right strange. I should go ask her...  What? I cannae talk tae her? Why no?!

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_222_bpipe.text: My mum's part of the reason I ended up runnin' off to military school at all. Always bangin' on like 'Vouivre women must keep gettin' stronger', she is. ...S'pose I wanted to be cheeky about it, aye? Though lookin' back on it, no need to be AS tough as my mum. Och, I'm still more soft and cute than hard and chiselled, wouldn't you say? Go on, say?

char_222_bpipe.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_222_bpipe.text: When I was still in the army, I came across this spectre-like force. Hauntin' the dark edges of Victoria, and most of the people who witnessed them went missin'. I've a duty to expose them, and that's why I've been scramblin' aboot. Oh, dinnae you step in for me. You've got yer own callin' to worry about, na?

char_222_bpipe.title: Idle
char_222_bpipe.text: Ah! Fancy that, skivin' off! Aww, got me jealous. Doesnae beat a nice hay pile for a few winks though, aye? I'm noddin' off just thinkin' aboot it... Wouldn't hurt tae take a wee kip myself...

char_222_bpipe.title: Onboard
char_222_bpipe.text: Hello! You're the Doctor, aye? Officer Ch'en fae Lungmen said I'd be able tae find some helpers here! I need tae sign my name first? Aye, right enough. Baaag...pipe. There! Eh? 'Become an Operator?' 'Full-time bed and board'? Ach, what's goin' on here?!

char_222_bpipe.title: Watching Battle Record
char_222_bpipe.text: Whoa, you folks here at Rhodes Island sure can fight!

char_222_bpipe.title: Promotion 1
char_222_bpipe.text: A promotion? Hmm... cannae say if I like it or na. For soldiers, more responsibilities means more battles, and a greater risk of mistakes.

char_222_bpipe.title: Promotion 2
char_222_bpipe.text: Joinin' Rhodes Island has been a good thing for me. Oripathy and the Infected may seem a touch scary at first, but runnin' from it willnae solve a thing. That's what I've learned here, and I mean it when I say, thank you—I see my way now, right ahead of me.

char_222_bpipe.title: Added to Squad
char_222_bpipe.text: Stand to attention!

char_222_bpipe.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_222_bpipe.text: Assumin' leadership! Team will hereby carry out the operation!

char_222_bpipe.title: Depart
char_222_bpipe.text: Honor your orders! Move out!

char_222_bpipe.title: Begin Operation
char_222_bpipe.text: All units, spread out!

char_222_bpipe.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_222_bpipe.text: Orders, please.

char_222_bpipe.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_222_bpipe.text: Standing by.

char_222_bpipe.title: Deployment 1
char_222_bpipe.text: Forward!

char_222_bpipe.title: Deployment 2
char_222_bpipe.text: My spear and I hail from Victoria!

char_222_bpipe.title: In Battle 1
char_222_bpipe.text: 'Tactics sharpen the mind!'

char_222_bpipe.title: In Battle 2
char_222_bpipe.text: 'Discipline strengthens the will!'

char_222_bpipe.title: In Battle 3
char_222_bpipe.text: 'Bravery shall overcome evil!'

char_222_bpipe.title: In Battle 4
char_222_bpipe.text: 'Benevolence shall save lives!'

char_222_bpipe.title: 4-star Result
char_222_bpipe.text: Be it school or the military, I've still seen worse.

char_222_bpipe.title: 3-star Result
char_222_bpipe.text: Phew... I've managed tae live up t' the reputation of this uniform once more.

char_222_bpipe.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_222_bpipe.text: Enemy routed! All units, pursue only wi caution!

char_222_bpipe.title: Operation Failure
char_222_bpipe.text: You get out of here! Go!

char_222_bpipe.title: Assigned to Facility
char_222_bpipe.text: How do I get tae the greenhoose?

char_222_bpipe.title: Tap
char_222_bpipe.text: Whoa-whoa!

char_222_bpipe.title: Trust Tap
char_222_bpipe.text: Wanna go on a picnic? Just the two of us!

char_222_bpipe.title: Title
char_222_bpipe.text: Arknights.

char_222_bpipe.title: Greeting
char_222_bpipe.text: Doctor, how's about we go farmin'!

char_379_sesa.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_379_sesa.text: Hmm, is this the Doctor's room? How boring. It looks just like those never-changing hills of Sargon. At least get a game console, will you?

char_379_sesa.title: Talk 1
