char_379_sesa.text: {@nickname}, I feel something resonating from within you. How strange. Is this because we still have so much untapped potential? But alas, you've forgotten your past. Does it feel like a burden's been lifted off of you, or does it make things more painful?

char_379_sesa.title: Talk 2
char_379_sesa.text: {@nickname}, I take greater pride in natural wisdom than the knowledge that is deliberately taught! With Rhodes Island at my side, we will get ever-closer to the Great Truth. Hey, don't avert your gaze. There's nothing to be ashamed of, is there?

char_379_sesa.title: Talk 3
char_379_sesa.text: 'I wish to cross over to the distant shores.' That used to be the secret phrase people used to communicate with me. That bridge is the link between two worlds, transferring wisdom and imbuing power... Hey, let me finish. It's rude to just turn around and walk off like that!

char_379_sesa.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_379_sesa.text: Rhodes Island has some pretty tasteless folks, acting like their outer appearance is just some decoration, like a skin to be taken off! You'll come off as slovenly to people if you don't carefully coordinate your look, right? What, my clothes are tattered? You simply don't understand the boldness of this fashion statement...

char_379_sesa.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_379_sesa.text: Do you believe that weapons have souls? The things they've experienced, the hands they've been passed through, and the reason they've been swung... No! These have nothing to do with the soul. For a weapon, any belief or meaning has been superimposed upon it. Tell me, are we weapons, or are we people with souls imposed upon us?

char_379_sesa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_379_sesa.text: A genius? Do people like that really exist...? Most craftspeople in Sargon are just ordinary apprentices who are still learning to walk, tinkering with metals. But as long as they continue down the path, even they can reach the road's destination.

char_379_sesa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_379_sesa.text: Need my help making some adjustments? My skills aren't something that can ever see the light of day. 'Allowing everyone to just pick up a weapon is the way to creating wars.' I must wear these shackles to restrict myself. Or, do you wish to unchain me and unleash havoc upon this world?

char_379_sesa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_379_sesa.text: Do you know about who I am? And about my past? No, you don't know, nor should you know. My incognito exists to bury the past behind me. Forget about it, and let these things sink into the depths of the deserts.

char_379_sesa.title: Idle
char_379_sesa.text: I don't mind this kind of peace and quiet.

char_379_sesa.title: Onboard
char_379_sesa.text: I know exactly what you're searching for, Doctor of Rhodes Island! You long for truth and power! And I, Sesa, am willing to grant you these things... Woah, wait, wait up! Don't push me out the door! I'm serious about my job application!

char_379_sesa.title: Watching Battle Record
char_379_sesa.text: This weapon's output... I see...

char_379_sesa.title: Promotion 1
char_379_sesa.text: ...You wish for greater power? Don't draw any unnecessary attention before the time is right. Otherwise, it'll be veeery dangerous.

char_379_sesa.title: Promotion 2
char_379_sesa.text: 'The bridge is the connection, the ammunition is wisdom, the weapon is the will, and harmony is equality.' Shall we tear asunder the veil that obfuscates the Truth? Perhaps I can lend you a bit more power... Just a bit more.

char_379_sesa.title: Added to Squad
char_379_sesa.text: The 'bridge' seeks completion... Those weapons in your hands... May I take a closer look?

char_379_sesa.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_379_sesa.text: Let me guide you... Just rub this oil into the bolt slot of your crossbow. Remember to apply it uniformly.

char_379_sesa.title: Depart
char_379_sesa.text: It's time for our efforts to bear fruit! Just remember, these weapons must be handled delicately.

char_379_sesa.title: Begin Operation
char_379_sesa.text: The battlefield destroys both weapons and their hosts.

char_379_sesa.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_379_sesa.text: My arm is trembling...

char_379_sesa.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_379_sesa.text: Set me free! This is what I should yell, right?

char_379_sesa.title: Deployment 1
char_379_sesa.text: At long last...

char_379_sesa.title: Deployment 2
char_379_sesa.text: Destruction, your time has come!

char_379_sesa.title: In Battle 1
char_379_sesa.text: Free the weapon from the flesh...

char_379_sesa.title: In Battle 2
char_379_sesa.text: Souls! Resonate as one!

char_379_sesa.title: In Battle 3
char_379_sesa.text: I shall be your end! It's fine for me to say stuff like that, right?

char_379_sesa.title: In Battle 4
char_379_sesa.text: How can you ever understand the suffering of the victims?

char_379_sesa.title: 4-star Result
char_379_sesa.text: Such a fierce battle is inevitably accompanied by great pain, but the weapon in your hands will never lie. It roars triumphantly!

char_379_sesa.title: 3-star Result
char_379_sesa.text: You are a bit too dependent upon my powers. Speak no more of it. You know the old agreement, a cup of black tea with two cubes of sugar.

char_379_sesa.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_379_sesa.text: Being able to escape the weapons' bloodbath is perhaps a good thing.

char_379_sesa.title: Operation Failure
char_379_sesa.text: No matter how much you run, the weapons will always be waiting. For the day you and I are wiped out.

char_379_sesa.title: Assigned to Facility
char_379_sesa.text: The Great Truth needs an equally great space to house it! Wait, no, I don't need a room this big...

char_379_sesa.title: Tap
char_379_sesa.text: Watch out! I... I'm still not able to fully control my powers!

char_379_sesa.title: Trust Tap
char_379_sesa.text: Do you want to hear a story? I know many old stories.

char_379_sesa.title: Title
char_379_sesa.text: Arknights.

char_379_sesa.title: Greeting
char_379_sesa.text: Hey Doctor!

char_337_utage.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_337_utage.text: Doctor, ready to get to work? I won't take no for an answer! C'mon! 3, 2, 1, start!

char_337_utage.title: Talk 1
char_337_utage.text: Nails are part of a girl's appeal. Gotta take care of them properly.

char_337_utage.title: Talk 2
char_337_utage.text: Why do I call myself Utage? Well, it's not that complicated. I just want to be happy as if we were throwing a party every night. As long as I'm in a good mood, everything else is gonna be okay.

char_337_utage.title: Talk 3
char_337_utage.text: You already saw it, Doctor? Well, that's too bad... C'mon, let's use up this two-person discount coupon.

char_337_utage.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_337_utage.text: When I contracted Oripathy and was to be sent here, my mother was afraid I'd be bullied, and gave me the family heirloom, Shishiou, to defend myself with. Didn't find any bullies, but I did manage to cut some pretty nasty folks. Doctor, you really know how to appeal to people.

char_337_utage.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_337_utage.text: Everyone here gets pretty scary when they get serious. I'm as scary as six people combined? Am I really that terrifying...?

char_337_utage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_337_utage.text: Help me pick up ten boxes of limited-edition cookie sticks tomorrow? Just take the money out of my account. Huh? Preorders are already sold out? Then... c'mon, you've gotta think of a way, Doctor! Please!

char_337_utage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_337_utage.text: Doctor, you're razor-sharp some of the time and dull as a piece of wood at others. I don't get why. Oh, I see, right out of 'Flirting Guidebook,' huh? I'd expect nothing less from you, Doctor.

char_337_utage.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_337_utage.text: It's not good to rely too much on any single person, but I'll make an exception for... Eek, Doctor! Oh it's nothing, I was just rambling to myself! D-d-did you need anything from me?

char_337_utage.title: Idle
char_337_utage.text: If you're tired, just go to bed. Not that complicated.

char_337_utage.title: Onboard
char_337_utage.text: Hey, Doctor. I'm the Operator who just joined recently, Utage. My interests are... Oh, I don't need to go into the details? In that case, I look forward to working with you.

char_337_utage.title: Watching Battle Record
char_337_utage.text: Is it over?

char_337_utage.title: Promotion 1
char_337_utage.text: Do I get to do less work if I get promoted? No dice? Oh well...

char_337_utage.title: Promotion 2
char_337_utage.text: It's time to move out. Let's crush those nasty folks~

char_337_utage.title: Added to Squad
char_337_utage.text: All right everyone, I'll be counting on your orders!

char_337_utage.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_337_utage.text: I'm the team leader? ...Eh? Me? Team leader?

char_337_utage.title: Depart
char_337_utage.text: Let's go.

char_337_utage.title: Begin Operation
char_337_utage.text: C'mon, c'mon! I can't wait any longer.

char_337_utage.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_337_utage.text: Mhmm.

char_337_utage.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_337_utage.text: Need me?

char_337_utage.title: Deployment 1
char_337_utage.text: Moving out~

char_337_utage.title: Deployment 2
char_337_utage.text: Hehe.

char_337_utage.title: In Battle 1
char_337_utage.text: Who should I cut?

char_337_utage.title: In Battle 2
char_337_utage.text: It won't hurt if I don't miss.

char_337_utage.title: In Battle 3
char_337_utage.text: Just send me the leftover parts.

char_337_utage.title: In Battle 4
char_337_utage.text: You look rather cute when you're crying.

char_337_utage.title: 4-star Result
char_337_utage.text: Ahh, I'm finally done blowing off steam, how exciting. Doctor, let's get some crepes.

char_337_utage.title: 3-star Result
char_337_utage.text: How exciting. Thanks for all the support~

char_337_utage.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_337_utage.text: You're saving the stragglers for me? Well, I'll dig right in.

char_337_utage.title: Operation Failure
char_337_utage.text: Doctor, stop spacing out and start running.

char_337_utage.title: Assigned to Facility
char_337_utage.text: As long as I can buy the new magazines, it doesn't really matter where I'm staying.

char_337_utage.title: Tap
char_337_utage.text: Hmm?

char_337_utage.title: Trust Tap
char_337_utage.text: Let's go sing karaoke?

char_337_utage.title: Title
char_337_utage.text: Arknights.

char_337_utage.title: Greeting
char_337_utage.text: Good morning to you, Doctor.

char_252_bibeak.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_252_bibeak.text: I don't need to go outside today? Th-thank goodness... Infected people like me have no right to wear these clothes. How strange it is that I cannot wear the clothes I make with my own hands... Eh? Rhodes Island doesn't care about stuff like that? Really?

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk 1
char_252_bibeak.text: Oh, my outfit? Um, I designed this one myself. The skirt incorporates some traditional motifs, though it can't compete with my dad's work... But this is my attempt at emulating an old-fashioned style.

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk 2
char_252_bibeak.text: Good afternoon, Doctor. I'm trying to clean up my room... Sorry, my room often ends up being a mess... I used to never have to organize my room, and now that I'm starting to learn, it's actually rather fun... although I often break things in the process...

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk 3
char_252_bibeak.text: I've always had trouble adjusting after being pulled away from my old life. In the very beginning, I felt like I couldn't continue living after becoming an Infected, and I was just so scared... But I'm not like that anymore. There's so much I want to learn, and I want to do more for those just like me here at Rhodes Island.

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_252_bibeak.text: Since I was young, my father required me to study swordsmanship. I didn't like it back then, but... after that incident, sometimes holding the sword has been more reassuring than holding the spinning thread.

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_252_bibeak.text: I used to be afraid to go outside. As an Infected, I felt like everything was scorning me... But now I understand that one's self-esteem has nothing to do with whether or not she is Infected or not. After all, that is the most beautiful decoration.

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_252_bibeak.text: Doctor, um... If, if it's possible, can I make some clothes for you...? I think you'd be just right for bringing out some of my ideas. Um, I sometimes ask the other Operators in the same way...

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_252_bibeak.text: The people who stoned me with Originium... Of course I hated them, but now... If I continued to harbor that contempt and despair, it would have driven me to do terrible things. I have no regrets about running away from home, even if it holds many warm memories of my past.

char_252_bibeak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_252_bibeak.text: I want to incorporate the many things I've learned from everyone into something we can all wear...Hehe, even with that in mind, the elements are a bit complicated. But this reflects my emotions, whether I'm brandishing my sword or flourishing my needle.

char_252_bibeak.title: Idle
char_252_bibeak.text: Let's use this time to craft something small.

char_252_bibeak.title: Onboard
char_252_bibeak.text: H-hello, Doctor... My codename is Bibeak... Excuse me, but is there a facility with a loom and a knitting machine here?

char_252_bibeak.title: Watching Battle Record
char_252_bibeak.text: The way they fight... I've never even thought about that before...

char_252_bibeak.title: Promotion 1
char_252_bibeak.text: A p-promotion? Are you sure? I'm actually not very good at fighting... Thank you.

char_252_bibeak.title: Promotion 2
char_252_bibeak.text: By my side... are all the Operators of Rhodes Island, and you, Doctor. Even with my limited life, I'm still able to live normally like a normal person... No, a life they never would be able to dream is possible.

char_252_bibeak.title: Added to Squad
char_252_bibeak.text: G-got it!

char_252_bibeak.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_252_bibeak.text: Hm? I'm the leader?

char_252_bibeak.title: Depart
char_252_bibeak.text: Just like a textile, there is only one way to weave.

char_252_bibeak.title: Begin Operation
char_252_bibeak.text: Is fighting unavoidable after all...?

char_252_bibeak.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_252_bibeak.text: Ah, understood!

char_252_bibeak.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_252_bibeak.text: I've finished the combat uniforms!

char_252_bibeak.title: Deployment 1
char_252_bibeak.text: Is wielding the sword the same as wielding the needle?

char_252_bibeak.title: Deployment 2
char_252_bibeak.text: I... can also fight! Believe in me!

char_252_bibeak.title: In Battle 1
char_252_bibeak.text: I, I won't hold back!

char_252_bibeak.title: In Battle 2
char_252_bibeak.text: If you have anything to say, save it for after the battle! There are people I must protect!

char_252_bibeak.title: In Battle 3
char_252_bibeak.text: Like threading a needle... Strike!

char_252_bibeak.title: In Battle 4
char_252_bibeak.text: Can the strings of life also be cut?

char_252_bibeak.title: 4-star Result
char_252_bibeak.text: Great work, Doctor! Um, what did you think about my performance?

char_252_bibeak.title: 3-star Result
char_252_bibeak.text: It, it's finally over! If your uniform is damaged, I can help repair it...

char_252_bibeak.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_252_bibeak.text: Oh, someone got away... But, that's a better outcome... than the cruelty of death.

char_252_bibeak.title: Operation Failure
char_252_bibeak.text: I, I'm still... so useless...

char_252_bibeak.title: Assigned to Facility
char_252_bibeak.text: Hmm... Where is the textiles room?

char_252_bibeak.title: Tap
char_252_bibeak.text: Yah!

char_252_bibeak.title: Trust Tap
char_252_bibeak.text: Oh, Doctor, can you help grab those textiles for me?

char_252_bibeak.title: Title
char_252_bibeak.text: Arknights.

char_252_bibeak.title: Greeting
char_252_bibeak.text: H-hello, Doctor.

char_159_peacok.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_159_peacok.text: Since you summoned me, you must be eager to feast your eyes upon my elegant dancing form, right? Uh...? Help you move the luggage...? Hey! I didn't come here to do manual labor!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk 1
char_159_peacok.text: You're such a weak and ineffectual leader! How could you be so fragile? If it wasn't for the sorrowful tears Amiya would then shed, I'd convict you right here, right now!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk 2
char_159_peacok.text: You don't even know what conviction is? Now prick up your ears! The art of conviction is an assassination technique created by the first Conviction master, who combined traditional dance moves with ancient fighting techniques. And now, standing before you is his third-generation successor!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk 3
char_159_peacok.text: Conviction is not some barbaric fighting technique! It's an artform where beauty and ideals are poured into the fist, then delivered through the fist straight into the heart! Now you know!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_159_peacok.text: This art is the crystallization of hard work and great insight. When people ignore the true value of art and use this sacred product as some sort of game, Conviction will descend to right all wrongs.

char_159_peacok.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_159_peacok.text: Do you not revere in awe my aestheticly perfect image and overwhelming pressure? Then you're unworthy of your place on the same team as your savior! Ughhh! Con! Viction!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_159_peacok.text: I'm actually someone infected with Oripathy, an incurable disease?! Curses... is this my destiny? Is this the fate of all who wield the Conviction Punch? Hey, why are you looking away?! I'm clearly telling you a sad story!

char_159_peacok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_159_peacok.text: You also wish to become Conviction? In that case, chew upon this question! 'You're standing at a junction in a railroad, with a train full of Durin people approaching. The junction splits off into two tracks, one upon which several artists with meager artistic achievements are...'

char_159_peacok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_159_peacok.text: You don't even have the gumption to answer the easiest of Conviction's dilemmas! You have no artistic talent! Taaaaake this! Conviction - Second Style!

char_159_peacok.title: Idle
char_159_peacok.text: ...Hoo! Hah! No, wait, wrong move. Let's try again!

char_159_peacok.title: Onboard
char_159_peacok.text: I am Conviction. I shall use this name, with all the faith it entails, as my code name. You ask what my talents are? I'm a master of the deadly and beautiful art of conviction! Now shiver in reverence!

char_159_peacok.title: Watching Battle Record
char_159_peacok.text: An opportunity like this to become stronger is readily taken!

char_159_peacok.title: Promotion 1
char_159_peacok.text: Ahaha, a promotion! I can see the day when Conviction's hidden powers roar across the lands!

char_159_peacok.title: Promotion 2
char_159_peacok.text: This sensation... it feels as if my artistic accomplishments have deepened, but also like something is welling up inside me...!

char_159_peacok.title: Added to Squad
char_159_peacok.text: Due to my tendency to sometimes convict teammates, it would be safer for me to work alone.

char_159_peacok.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_159_peacok.text: At last, your conviction arrives!

char_159_peacok.title: Depart
char_159_peacok.text: Your judgement is nigh!

char_159_peacok.title: Begin Operation
char_159_peacok.text: Now, count up your sins!

char_159_peacok.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_159_peacok.text: On my way!

char_159_peacok.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_159_peacok.text: All right!

char_159_peacok.title: Deployment 1
char_159_peacok.text: Here I stand!

char_159_peacok.title: Deployment 2
char_159_peacok.text: You think you're a worthy opponent?

char_159_peacok.title: In Battle 1
char_159_peacok.text: Con—vict!

char_159_peacok.title: In Battle 2
char_159_peacok.text: Haah!

char_159_peacok.title: In Battle 3
char_159_peacok.text: Hmph!

char_159_peacok.title: In Battle 4
char_159_peacok.text: Back down!

char_159_peacok.title: 4-star Result
char_159_peacok.text: History is written by the winners… This is the doctrine of Conviction!

char_159_peacok.title: 3-star Result
char_159_peacok.text: How about it! Aren't you awed by my heroic majesty-- Hey, wait up! Don't leave me behind!

char_159_peacok.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_159_peacok.text: It's fine. This victory might not be the most gorgeous, but it'll still serve us well.

char_159_peacok.title: Operation Failure
char_159_peacok.text: Ugh... the magnificent Conviction must never allow such a blunder…

char_159_peacok.title: Assigned to Facility
char_159_peacok.text: It's going to be another dilemma for me to convict this room…

char_159_peacok.title: Tap
char_159_peacok.text: Hmm?

char_159_peacok.title: Trust Tap
char_159_peacok.text: Woahh! What are you trying to do this time! I'll teach you to behave!

char_159_peacok.title: Title
char_159_peacok.text: Arknights.

char_159_peacok.title: Greeting
char_159_peacok.text: Oh, if it isn't the Doctor!

char_376_therex.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_376_therex.text: Thermal-EX, ready to commence thermal shock! What, it's not yet the designated combat time? Then, I shall postpone it. Commencing thermal shock after ten second delay!

char_376_therex.title: Talk 1
char_376_therex.text: I have heard an expression from the East: 'No martial art is infallible, except for heat.'

char_376_therex.title: Talk 2
char_376_therex.text: Doctor, it's a great honor to be with you! My burning heart just can't calm down! And by that, I mean the Raythean Industries custom-made full-thermal Arts impact generator I have installed!

char_376_therex.title: Talk 3
char_376_therex.text: In the beginning, God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light. God said, 'Let there be power,' and there was the high-performance variant of Raythean's Challenger Hellcat.

char_376_therex.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_376_therex.text: As a perfect industrial-grade mass-produced combat platform, I am very happy now! Not only do I get regular performance optimizations from Mayer, but I even get to work with passionate partners like Blaze! Life is so good!

char_376_therex.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_376_therex.text: Dazzling though I am, you, the peerless Doctor, are the only one I could call my brightest sun!

char_376_therex.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_376_therex.text: I know that the heat and light I emit is so very short-lived... But all that matters is that I can illuminate the path before you, Doctor!

char_376_therex.title: Idle
char_376_therex.text: Even when you're asleep, I can continue to work as your heater! I'm incredible!

char_376_therex.title: Onboard
char_376_therex.text: Born from Raythean Industries, improved by the hands of the great Mayer. I, Thermal-EX, the throbbing heart of hotness, am here to help!

char_376_therex.title: Watching Battle Record
char_376_therex.text: Ohhhhh! This power blazing within me... It's… It's… It's a hotfix!

char_376_therex.title: Added to Squad
char_376_therex.text: Now, it's my turn to show off!

char_376_therex.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_376_therex.text: What's the situation?

char_376_therex.title: Depart
char_376_therex.text: All units, move out!

char_376_therex.title: Begin Operation
char_376_therex.text: Rock and roll!

char_376_therex.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_376_therex.text: Ready to launch!

char_376_therex.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_376_therex.text: Charging up!

char_376_therex.title: Deployment 1
char_376_therex.text: I'm here to help!

char_376_therex.title: Deployment 2
char_376_therex.text: Detonation imminent!

char_376_therex.title: In Battle 1
char_376_therex.text: Sonic boom—!

char_376_therex.title: In Battle 2
char_376_therex.text: Deploying thermal shock!

char_376_therex.title: In Battle 3
char_376_therex.text: Watch this!

char_376_therex.title: In Battle 4
char_376_therex.text: Praise the heat!

char_376_therex.title: 4-star Result
char_376_therex.text: Aren't I awesome? I knew your command would be a perfect match for me, Doctor!

char_376_therex.title: 3-star Result
char_376_therex.text: BRAVO~ BRAVO~!!!! Doctor!!!

char_376_therex.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_376_therex.text: My retreat was just a fluke. Nothing can be allowed through our battlefield net.

char_376_therex.title: Operation Failure
char_376_therex.text: Contact! Contact! Enemy ambush! Dropping smoke! Doctor, I'll cover your retreat!

char_376_therex.title: Assigned to Facility
char_376_therex.text: Rest? Haha, it's too early for me! I just swapped to the newest energy storage device, so we have fifty more hours until the end of the workday!

char_376_therex.title: Tap
char_376_therex.text: A-ha! My thermal sensor feels your burning heart!

char_376_therex.title: Trust Tap
char_376_therex.text: Your burning enthusiasm has melted my processor!

char_376_therex.title: Title
char_376_therex.text: Arknights.

char_376_therex.title: Greeting
char_376_therex.text: Welcome back, Doctor! I see that you're also full of light and heat today!

char_301_cutter.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_301_cutter.text: Excuse me, Doctor, am I on duty today... Huh? Umm, how'd my blade get stuck in the doorframe...

char_301_cutter.title: Talk 1
char_301_cutter.text: Back home, the soil gets more and more barren each day, and what we harvest isn't enough to feed ourselves. Most people aren't able to make a living, so their only option is to become mercenaries. They'll do anything, as long as it pays.

char_301_cutter.title: Talk 2
char_301_cutter.text: Uhh, they said my blade was too dangerous and forbade me from going back into the kitchen. I just wanted to help, but, as soon as I tapped that cutting board with my blade, it split wide open... Well, um, should I pay for it?

char_301_cutter.title: Talk 3
char_301_cutter.text: Every time I bask in the sun, I can't help but to get a bit sleepy. But don't worry, before I've confirmed that it's completely safe, I won't actually fall... asleep... ZZZzzzzz...

char_301_cutter.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_301_cutter.text: In my line of work, I have a set of principles that I follow: I don't harm the innocent, and I don't get bystanders involved... To be honest, it's really hard.

char_301_cutter.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_301_cutter.text: This necklace, I'm lending it to you, it's a protective charm. No, I can't give you my blade. When I'm not here, just use this.

char_301_cutter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_301_cutter.text: Doctor, I need you to look at me, and don't move. Hey, I said not to move... Hm, hmm... Don't worry, you're not the kind of person who would use others to commit evil. I can tell.

char_301_cutter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_301_cutter.text: To be honest, I don't really remember much from when I was little. My teacher raised me and taught me how to use a knife. He also told me that my parents got caught up in a fight and died because of it. When he found me, I was holding onto a knife and wouldn't let go even if it was cutting into me.

char_301_cutter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_301_cutter.text: Those who wield the blade will always pursue the duel, and those who kill will eventually become a notch on the blade of another. Perhaps one day, I will also find such an ending... and when that happens, I hope you'll be there to witness it.

char_301_cutter.title: Idle
char_301_cutter.text: I'm standing guard, so you can rest easy.

char_301_cutter.title: Onboard
char_301_cutter.text: Cutter. Just an ordinary mercenary. I have Oripathy, so I plan to trade my abilities for some treatment. Hope this blade's good enough to get things done for you... Mm, that's about it.

char_301_cutter.title: Watching Battle Record
char_301_cutter.text: Amazing! Didn't know you could use a blade like that!

char_301_cutter.title: Promotion 1
char_301_cutter.text: Other than this blade, freedom's the only treasure I have. If you're willing to protect that, then I'll listen to you.

char_301_cutter.title: Promotion 2
char_301_cutter.text: A mercenary's blade isn't some toy that's never tasted blood before. Maybe one day, I'll no longer be able to control it. But don't worry, at least for now... it'll work for you.

char_301_cutter.title: Added to Squad
char_301_cutter.text: Got it. Joining the team.

char_301_cutter.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_301_cutter.text: Understood. Can I select my own teammates then?

char_301_cutter.title: Depart
char_301_cutter.text: Prepare yourself, and make sure not to get any innocents involved.

char_301_cutter.title: Begin Operation
char_301_cutter.text: Hey, blade, you sharp enough?

char_301_cutter.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_301_cutter.text: Got it.

char_301_cutter.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_301_cutter.text: I can wait.

char_301_cutter.title: Deployment 1
char_301_cutter.text: The battlefield is the cemetery.

char_301_cutter.title: Deployment 2
char_301_cutter.text: Wielding a blade is all I need to do.

char_301_cutter.title: In Battle 1
char_301_cutter.text: Quiet.

char_301_cutter.title: In Battle 2
char_301_cutter.text: Don't look back.

char_301_cutter.title: In Battle 3
char_301_cutter.text: Look me in the eye.

char_301_cutter.title: In Battle 4
char_301_cutter.text: You're too slow.

char_301_cutter.title: 4-star Result
char_301_cutter.text: Maybe one day, there'll be something that my blade can't cut. But that day isn't today, and it certainly isn't you.

char_301_cutter.title: 3-star Result
char_301_cutter.text: Phew... Everything done, just as specified in the contract. Need to take a look?

char_301_cutter.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_301_cutter.text: Those who've lost the will to fight should not be my targets.

char_301_cutter.title: Operation Failure
char_301_cutter.text: Go, Doctor, go as far as you can! I'll... hold them back.

char_301_cutter.title: Assigned to Facility
char_301_cutter.text: Finally, some sunlight... Ahh, so warm...

char_301_cutter.title: Tap
char_301_cutter.text: Uhh, don't pull on my ears.

char_301_cutter.title: Trust Tap
char_301_cutter.text: Wanna go sunbathing together?

char_301_cutter.title: Title
char_301_cutter.text: Arknights.

char_301_cutter.title: Greeting
char_301_cutter.text: Oh, Doctor, you're here. Got any work today?

char_254_vodfox.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_254_vodfox.text: There are no evil spirits around you, so can I go now?

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk 1
char_254_vodfox.text: Memories carry fate, and your fate has come to an abrupt end. That's why the evil spirits no longer haunt you, but I can still clearly see their traces... Doctor, don't just blow off my words... It's for your own good.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk 2
char_254_vodfox.text: If you need someone to talk to, you can always talk to Morte here. Don't worry, Morte is here to help. When you fall asleep, all your problems will be resolved.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk 3
char_254_vodfox.text: Those emotions that make people want to cry are just food for Morte, so that's why I don't really cry. Is that bad?

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_254_vodfox.text: The true face of the curse? Do you want to see what's inside Morte? Can't... at least not for now... That'll hurt Morte as well, and yes, those who hurt Morte will writhe in pain. I'm serious.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_254_vodfox.text: The checklist is still missing a few items: balls of yarn, used buttons, fresh apples, soil from Laterano, crushed cathode-ray tubes... Doctor, help me.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_254_vodfox.text: Here, this apple's for you. It's just a leftover from a ritual, and I don't like letting things go to waste... Why are you thanking me? I just said it wasn't specifically for you... Hey, what, stop patting my head... Ah, whatever.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_254_vodfox.text: Because Morte is here, I have no need for emotions. But when everyone praises me, I feel a bit weird... And Morte doesn't want to take those feelings away, and it's scary... It's totally fine? Really? In that case... I guess it's fine.

char_254_vodfox.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_254_vodfox.text: Doctor, here you go. It's a clone of Morte, so make sure to keep it on you at all times... A curse? N-no, Doctor... If you take it, it'll be as if I'm always with you... Is that okay?

char_254_vodfox.title: Idle
char_254_vodfox.text: Swing low~♪ Sweet chariot~♪ Be devoured by your dreams~♪

char_254_vodfox.title: Onboard
char_254_vodfox.text: My new name is Shamare... and this is Morte... As for the other things... it'd be best if you don't find out. Like Morte said, it's for everyone's sake...

char_254_vodfox.title: Watching Battle Record
char_254_vodfox.text: These things won't help with the ritual...

char_254_vodfox.title: Promotion 1
char_254_vodfox.text: Stuff it with cotton, sew shut the mouth. Plug up the ears, and cover the eyes... There, a new doll is done.

char_254_vodfox.title: Promotion 2
char_254_vodfox.text: Morte has no need for a ritual like this, but... I... I'm really happy. We'll both do our best.

char_254_vodfox.title: Added to Squad
char_254_vodfox.text: Work? Got it.

char_254_vodfox.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_254_vodfox.text: If only they could be as obedient as Morte, that'd be nice.

char_254_vodfox.title: Depart
char_254_vodfox.text: Morte, it's time to go.

char_254_vodfox.title: Begin Operation
char_254_vodfox.text: Today's fortune is... Oh, that's really bad news for you guys.

char_254_vodfox.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_254_vodfox.text: What's up?

char_254_vodfox.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_254_vodfox.text: Everyone's ready.

char_254_vodfox.title: Deployment 1
char_254_vodfox.text: It's time to play, Morte.

char_254_vodfox.title: Deployment 2
char_254_vodfox.text: Your resentment, I'll take it all.

char_254_vodfox.title: In Battle 1
char_254_vodfox.text: Go forth, Morte.

char_254_vodfox.title: In Battle 2
char_254_vodfox.text: Rest at ease, and allow the land to embrace all.

char_254_vodfox.title: In Battle 3
char_254_vodfox.text: Who is it?

char_254_vodfox.title: In Battle 4
char_254_vodfox.text: You won't be going home.

char_254_vodfox.title: 4-star Result
char_254_vodfox.text: The evil spirits, they're all gone now.

char_254_vodfox.title: 3-star Result
char_254_vodfox.text: A predestined victory, just as they whispered.

char_254_vodfox.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_254_vodfox.text: Someone may have escaped, but it doesn't matter. Morte has already ensnared their fate.

char_254_vodfox.title: Operation Failure
char_254_vodfox.text: Curse... you...

char_254_vodfox.title: Assigned to Facility
char_254_vodfox.text: This place... reeks of evil spirits... Not bad.

char_254_vodfox.title: Tap
char_254_vodfox.text: What's the big idea?

char_254_vodfox.title: Trust Tap
char_254_vodfox.text: Do you want to sew something with me? Morte's also very happy...

char_254_vodfox.title: Title
char_254_vodfox.text: Arknights.

char_254_vodfox.title: Greeting
char_254_vodfox.text: Hello, Doctor, and, uh...

char_333_sidero.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_333_sidero.text: There are no security risks in your room, and you can work with peace of mind. I'll stand guard at the door to help you turn down any unnecessary busywork.

char_333_sidero.title: Talk 1
char_333_sidero.text: The automatic door here is broken? Give me a minute—— Hrmph! All right, go ahead and carry on with your work. I'll contact the maintenance staff.

char_333_sidero.title: Talk 2
char_333_sidero.text: You want to learn more about Minos's terroir? I see, I'll put together a report for you. No, that is not information that I can clearly disclose in just a few words. I must report it to you in detail.

char_333_sidero.title: Talk 3
char_333_sidero.text: Mercenaries must always update their pool of knowledge. If you can't keep up with the newest information, you'll likely fall into the hands of enemies who utilize new methods, so there's absolutely no room to slack. I hope you understand this, Doctor. Doctor?

char_333_sidero.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_333_sidero.text: Huh, what the hell did that Minosian girl in the garden do...? My head feels strangely empty, and I feel completely relaxed... This doesn't... feel right. Doctor, I need to rest. Please forgive me, I'm temporarily unable to carry out my duties as your bodyguard...

char_333_sidero.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_333_sidero.text: Hoo, hah! Looks like I'm in pretty good shape today, maybe it'll feel even better to exercise a bit with the reserve operators. Oh, is it Hell Week again? Looks like we'll have to bug Dobermann again to help arrange a place for us.

char_333_sidero.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_333_sidero.text: Corinia was built upon the scales of merchants, and everyone wants to squeeze as much as they can out of everyone else. In comparison, people in other city-states are far more interesting, just like you, Doctor. When I'm guarding them, there's always a lot of interesting things happening.

char_333_sidero.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_333_sidero.text: You need to train properly, Doctor. I'm not just talking about moving your muscles and bones, that'd just be exercise. What I'm talking about is training. It requires a full range of exercises as well as a healthy diet to burn fat and build muscle. Oh, you're fine with that? Let me see your results then. If I find out that you're— Hey, I'm not done talking yet, get back here!

char_333_sidero.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_333_sidero.text: Done eating again? Another bowl? Sure... This is the first time I've made a complete meal. Usually I just fill my belly with some rations and don't cook much. Here's the last portion. After you finish, please abide by our agreement and exercise properly so that me learning this skill is not in vain.

char_333_sidero.title: Idle
char_333_sidero.text: Taking a nap to relax, huh? ...What a luxurious way to rest.

char_333_sidero.title: Onboard
char_333_sidero.text: Pleased to meet you, my new employer. I am Sideroca, a Corinian mercenary. The paperwork has already been completed, so please look forward to the results of my work.

char_333_sidero.title: Watching Battle Record
char_333_sidero.text: These clips are only good for reference. Please apply your attention to the actual battle.

char_333_sidero.title: Promotion 1
char_333_sidero.text: Each badge is a symbol of trust. I'll accept it.

char_333_sidero.title: Promotion 2
char_333_sidero.text: I waved my blade around and cut down all the threats. I've done what I said I would.

char_333_sidero.title: Added to Squad
char_333_sidero.text: At your service.

char_333_sidero.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_333_sidero.text: Passing on your commands.

char_333_sidero.title: Depart
char_333_sidero.text: Rest assured, I'll always pay attention to the team situation.

char_333_sidero.title: Begin Operation
char_333_sidero.text: We're starting.

char_333_sidero.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_333_sidero.text: Here.

char_333_sidero.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_333_sidero.text: Approaching the destination.

char_333_sidero.title: Deployment 1
char_333_sidero.text: Let's see what you all can do.

char_333_sidero.title: Deployment 2
char_333_sidero.text: Don't even think about taking another step.

char_333_sidero.title: In Battle 1
char_333_sidero.text: Let's turn this around!

char_333_sidero.title: In Battle 2
char_333_sidero.text: And stay down!

char_333_sidero.title: In Battle 3
char_333_sidero.text: Hooaahh!

char_333_sidero.title: In Battle 4
char_333_sidero.text: I'll show you how a Minosian fights!

char_333_sidero.title: 4-star Result
char_333_sidero.text: Judging from your commanding skills, my protection might be a little redundant.

char_333_sidero.title: 3-star Result
char_333_sidero.text: What's important is that you didn't get hurt. Let's get ready to head back.

char_333_sidero.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_333_sidero.text: You had to suffer through a fright because of my negligence. I am so, so sorry.

char_333_sidero.title: Operation Failure
char_333_sidero.text: No matter what happens... I have to get the Doctor safely back to base...

char_333_sidero.title: Assigned to Facility
char_333_sidero.text: It's too messy here. I'm going to have to give it a good cleaning.

char_333_sidero.title: Tap
char_333_sidero.text: What's the matter?

char_333_sidero.title: Trust Tap
char_333_sidero.text: Doctor! You were the one who suggested the training, so why are you trying to run away from your own session? Stop right there!

char_333_sidero.title: Title
char_333_sidero.text: Arknights.

char_333_sidero.title: Greeting
char_333_sidero.text: No exceptions!

char_401_elysm.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_401_elysm.text: Please feel free to assign any work to me. I have a lot of experience as a second-in-command.

char_401_elysm.title: Talk 1
char_401_elysm.text: This communicator can transmit signals over considerable distances and is a powerful means of communicating between teams. And, yes, my Arts can amplify the signal and ensure that communication between teams goes unimpeded. Battlefield communication, simply put, is a job that was practically made for me.

char_401_elysm.title: Talk 2
char_401_elysm.text: Lost? No worries, let me take a look. To get there, first go up the stairs on the left and head up to the fourth floor. Then turn right, and after passing the third fork, make a left. Go down a floor, then proceed to your left. It's directly across from Miss Closure's #3 Engineering Room. How's that? Were my instructions clear enough?

char_401_elysm.title: Talk 3
char_401_elysm.text: Thorns and I have reached an agreement- next time, neither of us will hold back, and a victor will be crowned. This time, I'll make sure to end his existence... Huh? Rhodes Island has an explicit ban on personal fights? You must be mistaken, I'm simply talking about chess. Loser has to shave his head, what say you to this bet?

char_401_elysm.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_401_elysm.text: Of course I'm also not used to being someone else's assistant, since my squad captain relies on me to deliver her orders, and I have to stay on the squad to support her. Wait, these words are just between the two of us. For both of our sakes, don't ever let her know about what I just told you, okay?

char_401_elysm.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_401_elysm.text: There is no overstating the importance of communication on the battlefield, and of course whoever facilitates that will be the first to get targeted. But don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll make sure your orders are smoothly transmitted to every combat personnel.

char_401_elysm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_401_elysm.text: Doctor, you came right on time. Actually, there's something bothering me. Why does everyone prefer looking at a map over asking me for directions? The captain said that my glib tone really gets on peoples' nerves, but there's no way that's true, right? I'm clearly nothing but compassionate towards everyone!

char_401_elysm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_401_elysm.text: On the battlefield, few things are more important than morale. Do you see this banner? As a vanguard, just lifting it is enough to imbue everyone with courage— Wait, Doctor, you didn't seriously believe that, did you? I was just joking, this thing's actually a communication device.

char_401_elysm.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_401_elysm.text: Doctor, you've earned my trust. There's no need to be so humble. I have confidence in my perception of others. How about I call you my comrade-in-arms from now on? My captain and I are like oil and water, but I believe that, much like her, you will eventually be moved by my sincerity. No? The captain sent you a letter complaining about me? Ehh?

char_401_elysm.title: Idle
char_401_elysm.text: Doctor, the files over here are... Hm? Already asleep, huh? Well, even if it's just me, you really shouldn't let your guard down like that.

char_401_elysm.title: Onboard
char_401_elysm.text: 3rd Combat Squad, Vanguard and communications specialist, Elysium, reporting in. I do believe that this is our first time speaking face-to-face rather than through electronic means, Doctor?

char_401_elysm.title: Watching Battle Record
char_401_elysm.text: I can see myself in a lot of these battle records. Talk about weird.

char_401_elysm.title: Promotion 1
char_401_elysm.text: Thank you very much. I won't end up with a higher rank than my captain if I get promoted again, will I?

char_401_elysm.title: Promotion 2
char_401_elysm.text: I've always trusted my own judgment, Doctor. But if you're the one giving me orders, I would not question it whatsoever. After all, is that not what it means to be a comrade-in-arms?

char_401_elysm.title: Added to Squad
char_401_elysm.text: Of course, I'd love to.

char_401_elysm.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_401_elysm.text: Don't worry, I'm just a stand-in. The captain's not here right now after all.

char_401_elysm.title: Depart
char_401_elysm.text: In that case, let's go. Everyone, follow the route I drafted.

char_401_elysm.title: Begin Operation
char_401_elysm.text: Have you finished checking the headsets?

char_401_elysm.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_401_elysm.text: No problem.

char_401_elysm.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_401_elysm.text: The signal is stable. Ready to go at any time.

char_401_elysm.title: Deployment 1
char_401_elysm.text: I wonder who our target will be.

char_401_elysm.title: Deployment 2
char_401_elysm.text: Gather under this banner in the name of the Lord— Hah, I've always wanted to try saying that.

char_401_elysm.title: In Battle 1
char_401_elysm.text: S-sorry, I'm really not religious.

char_401_elysm.title: In Battle 2
char_401_elysm.text: Who would! Use a flag! As a weapon! On the battlefield!

char_401_elysm.title: In Battle 3
char_401_elysm.text: See that?

char_401_elysm.title: In Battle 4
char_401_elysm.text: Let's end this quickly!

char_401_elysm.title: 4-star Result
char_401_elysm.text: This just confirms it. We really do make the best partners.

char_401_elysm.title: 3-star Result
char_401_elysm.text: Our teamwork's pretty good. High five!

char_401_elysm.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_401_elysm.text: Those who've lost their fighting spirit are no longer our enemies. Let's stop here.

char_401_elysm.title: Operation Failure
char_401_elysm.text: It's too dangerous. I'll make sure our last line of defense holds. Doctor, please give the order to retreat!

char_401_elysm.title: Assigned to Facility
char_401_elysm.text: Hm? Has this room been renovated?

char_401_elysm.title: Tap
char_401_elysm.text: What's up?

char_401_elysm.title: Trust Tap
char_401_elysm.text: I heard that if this tuft of red hair on my head falls out, it won't ever grow back. This is a very serious problem Doctor.

char_401_elysm.title: Title
char_401_elysm.text: Arknights.

char_401_elysm.title: Greeting
char_401_elysm.text: Got any missions for me today?

char_250_phatom.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_250_phatom.text: No need to look for me. I've always been here.

char_250_phatom.title: Talk 1
char_250_phatom.text: Those in the dark cannot show you the way, nor can they see where you point. Don't tarry here, it's time for you to leave...

char_250_phatom.title: Talk 2
char_250_phatom.text: Under this mask, even I do not recognize myself.

char_250_phatom.title: Talk 3
char_250_phatom.text: This is Ms. Christine. I don't know where she came from, nor do I know when she will leave. If she likes you, she will approach you on her own... Yes, just as she's doing right now.

char_250_phatom.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_250_phatom.text: In the past, I was not lonely. I once had several friends, and we traveled all over as a theatre troupe. But when Oripathy broke out, everything drew to a close, and everything began...

char_250_phatom.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_250_phatom.text: This darkness is a refuge, a throne, and Paradise above all. The spirits of the dead have never left, and I've cursed the world from atop their bones... You see me as I am now. Do you still wish to hear my song? Do you still dare... to stand before me?

char_250_phatom.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_250_phatom.text: This device embedded above my throat presses against my neck, but it is exactly what I need. Like a mask does, it conceals my sins and my voice. You'd like to hear my real voice? No, you can't. It isn't something you ought to bear...

char_250_phatom.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_250_phatom.text: My song ended all of their lives. It came, that endless night, the song that would not stop, the quivering falsetto and organ fragments that expelled from a throat—it horrified them, suffocated them, but it was so... miraculous. Doctor, tell me. What in the world is it... that I do?

char_250_phatom.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_250_phatom.text: I can end many lives for you, but I first need you to confirm that I am awake. Something is trying to influence me. It doesn't want me to leave the stage. It wants my song to echo forever... and it wants me to kill you. Before I play the role of your assassin once more, I must discover the truth.

char_250_phatom.title: Idle
char_250_phatom.text: The shadows have never left your side, even without the night. Do be careful of your untimely somnolence, Doctor.

char_250_phatom.title: Onboard
char_250_phatom.text: Code name, Phantom. The Phantom Behind the Curtain, Treasurer of the Night. Tell me, who are your enemies, and where do they hide?

char_250_phatom.title: Watching Battle Record
char_250_phatom.text: Killing is not an end, but a means.

char_250_phatom.title: Promotion 1
char_250_phatom.text: As you wish. You are the one who sets Rhodes Island's tune, and you require neither guide nor guardian... Yes, I know all too well, you are your own master.

char_250_phatom.title: Promotion 2
char_250_phatom.text: There is no looking back after this step, no turning back. What I am about to share with you is not as wonderful as you may believe... Come, come here, and allow me to show you what lies beneath the veil of night.

char_250_phatom.title: Added to Squad
char_250_phatom.text: Is it time for me to take the stage?

char_250_phatom.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_250_phatom.text: I am no stranger to giving guidance.

char_250_phatom.title: Depart
char_250_phatom.text: I'll do as you say...

char_250_phatom.title: Begin Operation
char_250_phatom.text: Let us raise the curtains on this play.

char_250_phatom.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_250_phatom.text: I'm with you.

char_250_phatom.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_250_phatom.text: So, let us sink into the night.

char_250_phatom.title: Deployment 1
char_250_phatom.text: I come from the shadows.

char_250_phatom.title: Deployment 2
char_250_phatom.text: Hear my voice. Hear my song.

char_250_phatom.title: In Battle 1
char_250_phatom.text: Do you see your own face in the mirror?

char_250_phatom.title: In Battle 2
char_250_phatom.text: The actors are all puppets of the script.

char_250_phatom.title: In Battle 3
char_250_phatom.text: The guilty... will be punished.

char_250_phatom.title: In Battle 4
char_250_phatom.text: Yes, lift your voices! Sing for me! Sing for me!

char_250_phatom.title: 4-star Result
char_250_phatom.text: Is this the victory your leadership has brought about...?

char_250_phatom.title: 3-star Result
char_250_phatom.text: It is over. Victory is not sweet, as conflict always leaves an aftertaste.

char_250_phatom.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_250_phatom.text: They escaped. Fortunate for them... and perhaps for me as well.

char_250_phatom.title: Operation Failure
char_250_phatom.text: Fall back... You've already lost your way.

char_250_phatom.title: Assigned to Facility
char_250_phatom.text: Hm? Behind this mirror, there seems...

char_250_phatom.title: Tap
char_250_phatom.text: What is it?

char_250_phatom.title: Trust Tap
char_250_phatom.text: The sound of these footsteps... It's you, Doctor.

char_250_phatom.title: Title
char_250_phatom.text: Arknights.

char_250_phatom.title: Greeting
char_250_phatom.text: The shadow behind you looks heavier than it was yesterday, Doctor.

char_400_weedy.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_400_weedy.text: Doctor, you've managed to keep your room clean. Not bad.

char_400_weedy.title: Talk 1
char_400_weedy.text: Water is the core ingredient of life. I've talked to Miss Closure about improving Rhodes Island's water purification system. I hope that my research can be of help... so I don't have to worry about the water being dirty anymore.

char_400_weedy.title: Talk 2
char_400_weedy.text: This is Leaf, a Bionic Seadragon that I produced from a prototype design passed across my family. In addition to auxiliary combat functions, he helps out a lot in my daily life, such as pouring water, lifting heavy things, and so on.

char_400_weedy.title: Talk 3
char_400_weedy.text: Glaucus and I agreed that we'd conduct our automation engineering experiment at about this time. Doctor, if you're interested, want to come take a look?

char_400_weedy.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_400_weedy.text: These reserve water cannons were originally made for industrial usage. In addition to shooting pressurized water, they can also release high-temperature steam. Please don't touch them haphazardly; they're not like Closure's little buggies.

char_400_weedy.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_400_weedy.text: These high-level combat data materials are based upon my own summaries of the combat situation. Doctor, please read them carefully for the sake of future battles. After that, there are a few operation-related experiments I'd like to perfect that I will need your help on. I trust that you won't turn me down?

char_400_weedy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_400_weedy.text: I occasionally go to Perfumer's Convalescence Garden to relax. The aroma there can really wash all your stress away, and it's a very effective way of relieving the fatigue from research. Doctor, how about we head there together and give it a try next time?

char_400_weedy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_400_weedy.text: I definitely do not talk to my Bionic Seadragons when I'm alone! I only gave him a name to help distinguish him more easily!

char_400_weedy.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_400_weedy.text: Thanks to your compassion, I've recently become more accustomed to having you around, Doctor. And apart from Glaucus and some other research colleagues, I can't say that about many people.

char_400_weedy.title: Idle
char_400_weedy.text: Peace and quiet is best.

char_400_weedy.title: Onboard
char_400_weedy.text: Hello, I'm Weedy from Rhodes Island's Engineering Department. I've heard of your name a long time ago, so I hope we'll have a productive relationship from now on. Ah, if you want to shake hands, please use your gloved right hand.

char_400_weedy.title: Watching Battle Record
char_400_weedy.text: Hmm, I didn't expect these to be this helpful.

char_400_weedy.title: Promotion 1
char_400_weedy.text: After my promotion, can I get another upgrade to my personal room?

char_400_weedy.title: Promotion 2
char_400_weedy.text: Thank you for acknowledging someone as frail as I am, Doctor. I'll continue to work hard for the sake of Rhodes Island.

char_400_weedy.title: Added to Squad
char_400_weedy.text: Do I have to go?

char_400_weedy.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_400_weedy.text: Please listen to my instructions!

char_400_weedy.title: Depart
char_400_weedy.text: Attack!

char_400_weedy.title: Begin Operation
char_400_weedy.text: Everything is as we planned. To battle!

char_400_weedy.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_400_weedy.text: I'm right here.

char_400_weedy.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_400_weedy.text: My equipment is ready.

char_400_weedy.title: Deployment 1
char_400_weedy.text: Leave it to me!

char_400_weedy.title: Deployment 2
char_400_weedy.text: Leaf, let's do our best!

char_400_weedy.title: In Battle 1
char_400_weedy.text: Fire!

char_400_weedy.title: In Battle 2
char_400_weedy.text: Lock down the enemy! Attack!

char_400_weedy.title: In Battle 3
char_400_weedy.text: Out of my way!

char_400_weedy.title: In Battle 4
char_400_weedy.text: Haah!

char_400_weedy.title: 4-star Result
char_400_weedy.text: Everything's a piece of cake, as long as we employ the proper tactics.

char_400_weedy.title: 3-star Result
char_400_weedy.text: Don't underestimate the importance of engineering!

char_400_weedy.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_400_weedy.text: ...After I head back and adjust the parameters of this device, this won't happen again.

char_400_weedy.title: Operation Failure
char_400_weedy.text: Leaf, cover our escape!

char_400_weedy.title: Assigned to Facility
char_400_weedy.text: Has this place been cleaned before?

char_400_weedy.title: Tap
char_400_weedy.text: H-hey!

char_400_weedy.title: Trust Tap
char_400_weedy.text: Doctor, is there anything I can help you with?

char_400_weedy.title: Title
char_400_weedy.text: Arknights.

char_400_weedy.title: Greeting
char_400_weedy.text: How do you do, Doctor.

char_113_cqbw.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_113_cqbw.text: Truthfully, I've thought up countless possibilities about coming back here, looking out at the same scenery that she saw that day... But I never could have imagined that I'd actually be standing here with you. Heh, It's just too outrageous, 'Doctor.'

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Where'd I go? Can't tell you. Kal'tsit bypassed you and gave me a secret order... I'm lying? Oh my, I'm almost touched by how much you trust her. Fine, fine. I just went to splurge on a bunch of clothes, that's all. And I've already gone through inspection. What, are you surprised?

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk 2
char_113_cqbw.text: Some of your little cuties are always glaring at me through gritted teeth. But when are they actually gonna find the balls to pick a fight...? Kal'tsit already explained the situation? They're dealing with it? C'mon, show some respect for the needs of your staff. Just let 'em come at me. I'm bored out of my skull here anyway.

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk 3
char_113_cqbw.text: You used to like working with us mercs a whole bunch. Mercenaries are efficient instruments of war. Just like fast food, ready to eat and easily disposable. You want to know what happened in the past? Hmm, some people would prefer I keep my mouth shut about that topic. Say, it must be such a blessing to not remember anything, right?

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Save the Infected? Almost all the Sarkaz in Kazdel are infected, and you haven't even seen the kinds of oppression and conflict that go on there... So, how far do you plan to go with this 'salvation'? You got Kal'tsit, who can't even protect ONE single Sarkaz. And you, a goddamned hooded amnesiac. Now, tell me, what are you gonna do?

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_113_cqbw.text: Look at these fresh operators of yours, starry eyes, full of naïvety. Can't help but wonder, if they had to watch those kind and gentle folk die, one by one, would they still do things the same way, with the same old song and dance? Hey, I'm not trying to look down on anyone. I'm just reminding you, don't just go twisting her ideas into some stupid little joke.

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Hey you, ever noticed those little thingies Amiya wears? You do know that Kal'tsit is keeping stuff from you, right? Man, I thought you were super smart and observant and good at getting everyone to trust you, considering you don't remember a thing. Honestly, it's kinda weird that you can even trust other people. Makes me wonder what those two jerks would say if they saw you like this.

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_113_cqbw.text: This place sure does get all kinds, huh? A lot more weirdos here than before. Oh, don't get me wrong. I don't give a shit what they're thinking. But I gotta say, Amiya's doing a pretty good job. At least she's working hard to become more like a certain someone, and I can't say I hate that.

char_113_cqbw.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_113_cqbw.text: Dr. {@nickname}, since nobody's ever mentioned this to you before, I'm pretty curious how you'll react when you start to remember what happened— Don't give me that confused look. For now, just remember this name: Theresa. Yeah, Theresa.

char_113_cqbw.title: Idle
char_113_cqbw.text: Somebody's got it easy. Never thought there'd come a day when the {@nickname} would be napping here completely defenseless... The past doesn't bug you at all, huh? Sleeping like a baby…

char_113_cqbw.title: Onboard
char_113_cqbw.text: Sarkaz mercenary, W. It's been a while, but I guess 'a while' might be something totally different for you. Aw, don't worry, the 'you' here isn't the 'you' I'm looking for. So you're safe, for now. Just for now.

char_113_cqbw.title: Watching Battle Record
char_113_cqbw.text: This is all too familiar. Kinda scarily familiar. Be straight with me, did you really lose all your memories?

char_113_cqbw.title: Promotion 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm listening. Didn't think you'd be this hands-on with stuff. Honestly, I'd rather snatch a medal off someone else than suffer this honor from your hand.

char_113_cqbw.title: Promotion 2
char_113_cqbw.text: It's a funny little thing that I get to fight alongside this version of you. And look, it turns out the two of us can get along. At least, until you remember what happened that day…

char_113_cqbw.title: Added to Squad
char_113_cqbw.text: Hey everybody, let's try to stay alive.

char_113_cqbw.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_113_cqbw.text: A mercenary's leadership is about practicality. Don't expect a babysitter.

char_113_cqbw.title: Depart
char_113_cqbw.text: Yep. Another beautiful day.

char_113_cqbw.title: Begin Operation
char_113_cqbw.text: Kill them all to finish the job, right? Not that simple? What a pain in the ass...

char_113_cqbw.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Roger that.

char_113_cqbw.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_113_cqbw.text: Understood.

char_113_cqbw.title: Deployment 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Who knows, I might sneak off somewhere.

char_113_cqbw.title: Deployment 2
char_113_cqbw.text: Nice, nice, I'll take a power nap over here.

char_113_cqbw.title: In Battle 1
char_113_cqbw.text: Who's gonna hit the jackpot today?

char_113_cqbw.title: In Battle 2
char_113_cqbw.text: Step right up, plenty of surprises for everyone!

char_113_cqbw.title: In Battle 3
char_113_cqbw.text: You've got until 'three' to surrender. THREE!

char_113_cqbw.title: In Battle 4
char_113_cqbw.text: Boom! Ahahaha!

char_113_cqbw.title: 4-star Result
char_113_cqbw.text: Seeing you pull a hundred and ten percent out of everyone out there… I feel the nostalgia.

char_113_cqbw.title: 3-star Result
char_113_cqbw.text: Did you see that guy's face just now? The total despair when he realized he was gonna get blown to bits, no matter what he did? Wasn't that hilarious?!

char_113_cqbw.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_113_cqbw.text: You don't usually make mistakes like that. Are you getting rusty, or is there too much on your mind?

char_113_cqbw.title: Operation Failure
char_113_cqbw.text: Retreat? Keep casualties to a minimum? Heh, can't believe those words are coming out of your mouth.

char_113_cqbw.title: Assigned to Facility
char_113_cqbw.text: This door seems to be repaired, huh.

char_113_cqbw.title: Tap
char_113_cqbw.text: Looks like there's a lot more stuff here, but far fewer people.

char_113_cqbw.title: Trust Tap
char_113_cqbw.text: ...Which side of you is the real one?

char_113_cqbw.title: Title
char_113_cqbw.text: Arknights.

char_113_cqbw.title: Greeting
char_113_cqbw.text: Dr. {@nickname}, what would you like to do for Rhodes Island today? The usual?

char_405_absin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_405_absin.text: Why do I keep my weapon right here? I said it before, you need a stable working environment. Anyone who wants to bother you will have to ask my little friend first.

char_405_absin.title: Talk 1
char_405_absin.text: Rhodes Island is a nice place. Everyone follows the rules and goes about their business, like an idyllic island paradise isolated from reality.

char_405_absin.title: Talk 2
char_405_absin.text: Doctor, those students over there, are they all from Chernobog? Middle schoolers from that city...? I see, I need to observe them a bit more.

char_405_absin.title: Talk 3
char_405_absin.text: Were you the one commanding at Chernobog, Doctor? Then you also must have seen the state of things there. How are you able to sleep at night, after all that? I can't get it out of my mind… I just can't…

char_405_absin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_405_absin.text: I've done well...? No, I haven't! I've achieved nothing, I even fled my homeland. A girl like me never does good… Uh, stop that. Why are you patting my head...?

char_405_absin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_405_absin.text: Who needs my protection? Who can I protect? I've been asking myself, since that nightmare... Back then, I saw the malice in people's hearts, it was... it was pouring out all over the place. It drowned the whole city... Under those circumstances, maybe justice no longer means anything, it no longer exists.

char_405_absin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_405_absin.text: Something wrong with my hair? It's... a little messy? Well, it is what it is. I had to cut it myself when I fled the city... Don't give me that look. It's just hair, it'll grow back eventually. Relax, okay?

char_405_absin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_405_absin.text: This device belonged to my father, a police officer who dedicated himself to protecting the public each and every day. I can understand, same as my mother. We've never blamed him. It's just that... Doctor, all that my father did, was it really worth it?

char_405_absin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_405_absin.text: Those people, the civilians, their faces were so twisted. They looked just like the murderers who destroyed our city. But they were the people my father and I were supposed to protect. Doctor, what is actually just in this world? What should I do...? I just don't know...

char_405_absin.title: Idle
char_405_absin.text: So sleepy... But I can't afford to... fall asleep…

char_405_absin.title: Onboard
char_405_absin.text: Thank you for rescuing me, I pledge my life to you. There's not a lot I can do, but if you find some way for me to be useful, please let me know. Codename...? Ummm, just call me Absinthe.

char_405_absin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_405_absin.text: What's the point of watching this stuff?

char_405_absin.title: Promotion 1
char_405_absin.text: There's no need for a promotion. Rhodes Island does enough for me… I-I have to take it? But, well… Okay... Thank you.

char_405_absin.title: Promotion 2
char_405_absin.text: I still haven't figured out what justice really is. But you told me before that my beliefs mean something... You might be right. I-I want to believe.

char_405_absin.title: Added to Squad
char_405_absin.text: Understood. I'll go get ready.

char_405_absin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_405_absin.text: Whoever the squad leader is, what's the status on the... Huh, it's me?

char_405_absin.title: Depart
char_405_absin.text: Don't get cocky. Move out!

char_405_absin.title: Begin Operation
char_405_absin.text: Halt! Suspicious individuals thirty meters ahead… It's those guys again.

char_405_absin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_405_absin.text: This time…

char_405_absin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_405_absin.text: Copy.

char_405_absin.title: Deployment 1
char_405_absin.text: Raid drill! Hands on your head! Don't move!

char_405_absin.title: Deployment 2
char_405_absin.text: This time... I must!

char_405_absin.title: In Battle 1
char_405_absin.text: No sudden moves!

char_405_absin.title: In Battle 2
char_405_absin.text: Stop right there! No tresspassing!

char_405_absin.title: In Battle 3
char_405_absin.text: This is your last warning! Surrender or get shot!

char_405_absin.title: In Battle 4
char_405_absin.text: Why does it always end up like this…?

char_405_absin.title: 4-star Result
char_405_absin.text: If only you were there back then, maybe things would've turned out different…

char_405_absin.title: 3-star Result
char_405_absin.text: Mission complete. Doctor, you're not injured, are you?

char_405_absin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_405_absin.text: Do you think any of them were from Chernobog?

char_405_absin.title: Operation Failure
char_405_absin.text: It's a panic, we've lost control! We have to retreat now, go!

char_405_absin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_405_absin.text: This terrace... if enough snow built up on it, you could jump off like this and have a great time. Hup!

char_405_absin.title: Tap
char_405_absin.text: Wha-What?

char_405_absin.title: Trust Tap
char_405_absin.text: Oh, Doctor. Are you thirsty? Come, let's find something to drink.

char_405_absin.title: Title
char_405_absin.text: Arknights.

char_405_absin.title: Greeting
char_405_absin.text: Are you alright? Need something to perk you up?

char_373_lionhd.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_373_lionhd.text: Hm? Doctor, did you want to have a chat with me to stave off the boredom? Or, did you have something interesting you must tell me?

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Was that Savage who just passed by in the hallway? Back when the autonomous county was established, and later when it reached a cooperation agreement with Rim Billiton, her exploits were no less impressive than mine, you know?

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk 2
char_373_lionhd.text: You know, some places have really problematic stereotypes about us Cautus. Why do they call me timid when I'm just good at avoiding danger? As a matter of fact, isn't it more accurate to say that only those who've delved deep into danger can become masters of avoiding it?

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk 3
char_373_lionhd.text: C'mon, I've been taking my medications like I'm supposed to, but the little lass from the Medical Department who's taking care of me is a bit too uptight, I just can't help but to play pranks on her. You should help her loosen up a bit. Oh, but don't tell that to the other medics.

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Doctor, my buddy, Rhodes Island doesn't have a mandatory dress code, so there's no need for you to wear the same old rags all the time. Look at what I'm wearing - this store's got some pretty tasteful stuff, so how about I help you pick out a new look?

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_373_lionhd.text: I'm actually pretty fond of Rhodes Island. Unlike those bigwigs who can't stop preaching and proselytizing their greatness, everyone here's just trying to achieve their goals and work together to keep this ship sailing. Just like the folks at Rim Billiton.

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_373_lionhd.text: The one in my hand? It's a standard-issue Rim Billiton blaster that I modified. Before it was modified, it also used to be an Originium-powered focus for Casters. Hmm... Doctor, you're not thinking that using brute force alone to smash open a rock is the most efficient method, are you?

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_373_lionhd.text: Doctor, are you also interested in hearing about the Eureka Incident? I'm not sure there are any secrets left, since there are maybe a dozen pretty good books and documentaries out there. But maybe it'd be better if I could write something more detailed about how I rescued those hostages. Yeah, I dismantled a lot of those cages after all.

char_373_lionhd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_373_lionhd.text: It's not uncommon for mining teams to hire Catastrophe Messengers to accompany them. For example, I was born on a mining ship and was always interested in technical books, so I was basically just applying what I already knew. But Doctor, where'd you get your knowledge from? I don't think I've seen any relevant literature here.

char_373_lionhd.title: Idle
char_373_lionhd.text: Wanted to take a little nap? No worries, I'll wake you up unceremoniously in the event of emergency!

char_373_lionhd.title: Onboard
char_373_lionhd.text: Leonhardt, Catastrophe Messenger. Doctor, I don't know if you might've heard of me before... No? Ah, it's better that way. Seems like I won't have to tell the entire story again like I had to when that lady from the HR Department cornered me.

char_373_lionhd.title: Watching Battle Record
char_373_lionhd.text: Looks like my skills are better suited for positional warfare.

char_373_lionhd.title: Promotion 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Promotion? Sure, sure... Huh? It doesn't even come with some sort of exclusive, blinged-out elite uniform? C'mon, even a small piece of jewelry would be fine. No? Aww...

char_373_lionhd.title: Promotion 2
char_373_lionhd.text: The road that Rhodes Island has chosen to take is much bumpier than that of us Catastrophe Messengers, but you don't seem to have any intent on stopping. I suppose I'll have to sacrifice some of my entertainment time to help you clear the road then?

char_373_lionhd.title: Added to Squad
char_373_lionhd.text: It's my turn! Huh? The mission this time is to go fight someone?

char_373_lionhd.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_373_lionhd.text: You want me to lead the team? Mm, sure. That can be done, piece of cake.

char_373_lionhd.title: Depart
char_373_lionhd.text: So this is the route to the objective goal... Can I take a shortcut?

char_373_lionhd.title: Begin Operation
char_373_lionhd.text: Let's see if our enemies have anything going for them besides their numbers.

char_373_lionhd.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Huh? Where, where? Ehh?

char_373_lionhd.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_373_lionhd.text: Doctor, you'll save a nice spot for me right?

char_373_lionhd.title: Deployment 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Woo! It's finally my turn!

char_373_lionhd.title: Deployment 2
char_373_lionhd.text: Lure more enemies into this ring, then leave the rest to me!

char_373_lionhd.title: In Battle 1
char_373_lionhd.text: Who said the tip of a spear is only good for stabbing people?

char_373_lionhd.title: In Battle 2
char_373_lionhd.text: Relying on your armor will only make you vulnerable.

char_373_lionhd.title: In Battle 3
char_373_lionhd.text: Oh~ Strength in numbers, huh... Is that what you were banking on?

char_373_lionhd.title: In Battle 4
char_373_lionhd.text: Let's see whether you're gold or manure!

char_373_lionhd.title: 4-star Result
char_373_lionhd.text: Bam! All right, another mighty enemy laid low. Now, let's do what we agreed on and have you treat yourself, Doctor. Wanna go visit a local market with me on our next stop?

char_373_lionhd.title: 3-star Result
char_373_lionhd.text: Enemies of this caliber pose no threat to us, right?

char_373_lionhd.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_373_lionhd.text: Cleaning up stragglers isn't really my strong suit, so if you don't find someone to send after them, you're going to lose points off your combat evaluation~

char_373_lionhd.title: Operation Failure
char_373_lionhd.text: Whoops, looks like we messed up. Doctor, go ahead and withdraw first. Don't worry, as long as I'm here, there's no chance of the enemy catching up.

char_373_lionhd.title: Assigned to Facility
char_373_lionhd.text: Wanna head down to the Procurement Department to take a look at the new outfits? How about it?

char_373_lionhd.title: Tap
char_373_lionhd.text: Hm? Need me?

char_373_lionhd.title: Trust Tap
char_373_lionhd.text: What's the matter, did you want to take me out for a walk?

char_373_lionhd.title: Title
char_373_lionhd.text: Arknights.

char_373_lionhd.title: Greeting
char_373_lionhd.text: Yo, Doctor, done with work for the day?

char_378_asbest.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_378_asbest.text: If you've got something to say, spit it out. If you wanna pass gas, just make it quick. I'm busy as hell and don't have time for you.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk 1
char_378_asbest.text: Hey! ...You asshole, who gave you permission to touch my tail? Watch it or I'll punt your sorry ass! And, forget all about that sound I made just now, I'll help you forget it physically.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk 2
char_378_asbest.text: This ol' door I have here? Can't you tell? I made it myself, it's multifunctional. I'd advise you not to touch it, or you might get yourself killed.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk 3
char_378_asbest.text: I've gotta say, since Rhodes Island is gonna be traveling all over anyway, it's faster for me to follow you as I explore than going around on my own. Mm, yeah, I guess I've changed my view towards you guys a little.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_378_asbest.text: Don't compare me to Magallan. I'm no professional explorer, I just run around the world chasing thrills. Trailblazing for those who come after me? I sure as hell ain't that noble.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_378_asbest.text: The more dangerous it is, the more I wanna go. The crazier it is, the more I wanna cut loose. Otherwise, life has no meaning.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_378_asbest.text: Magallan? Me and this shrimpy, overzealous videographer girl I got to know her at the Black Flow. Y'know, that's the wildest, craziest adventure I've ever been on. But, that shrimp's got some real skills, I'll be the first to admit.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_378_asbest.text: Friends? Who the hell needs those? My life goal here is to just be an absolute jerk to everyone. So, best not try to get chummy with me, since I'm not gonna return the favor. Rather, how 'bout we go out for a drink instead? Give it to me straight.

char_378_asbest.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_378_asbest.text: My illness? I know it's pretty serious, but as long as I don't cause trouble for anyone, how I deal with it is up to me. And that's an easy one - there's nothing wrong with dying on a journey. If you think you're hot shit, you can try to bring me back. Do your worst, Doctor. I'm expecting nothing from you.

char_378_asbest.title: Idle
char_378_asbest.text: Sleeping, huh? Good, time to make some noise. Ahaha!

char_378_asbest.title: Onboard
char_378_asbest.text: Even though out exploring for a better portion of the year, you still plan to have me on the payroll and even assign me a dorm? And you seriously want an operator like that? ...Oh, you do? Huh? Tsk, something wrong with your head?

char_378_asbest.title: Watching Battle Record
char_378_asbest.text: Well, whatever. Guess I'll learn some self-defense.

char_378_asbest.title: Promotion 1
