char_378_asbest.text: 'Honorary Captain of the Rhodes Island Research Team?' Me? Hah?

char_378_asbest.title: Promotion 2
char_378_asbest.text: I can't guarantee that I'll be able to do anything for Rhodes Island, since that's not my style. However, if there are any mysteries of this world you'd like to uncover, I'll be the one to get the job done.

char_378_asbest.title: Added to Squad
char_378_asbest.text: Teamwork? Give me a break...

char_378_asbest.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_378_asbest.text: Tsk... If you wanna make my life hard, just say it to my face.

char_378_asbest.title: Depart
char_378_asbest.text: If you can't keep up, just find something to keep yourself busy.

char_378_asbest.title: Begin Operation
char_378_asbest.text: Tsk... What a pain in the ass.

char_378_asbest.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_378_asbest.text: Yeah, yeah.

char_378_asbest.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_378_asbest.text: Here, here.

char_378_asbest.title: Deployment 1
char_378_asbest.text: Yeah, got it.

char_378_asbest.title: Deployment 2
char_378_asbest.text: Sure, whatever.

char_378_asbest.title: In Battle 1
char_378_asbest.text: Eat shit.

char_378_asbest.title: In Battle 2
char_378_asbest.text: Here's a door for you.

char_378_asbest.title: In Battle 3
char_378_asbest.text: Hah... Boring as hell.

char_378_asbest.title: In Battle 4
char_378_asbest.text: Piss off already!

char_378_asbest.title: 4-star Result
char_378_asbest.text: I've braved the winds and the waves. Something like this ain't worth shit.

char_378_asbest.title: 3-star Result
char_378_asbest.text: *sigh* ...How boring. I'm gonna take a look around.

char_378_asbest.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_378_asbest.text: Good enough.

char_378_asbest.title: Operation Failure
char_378_asbest.text: Tsk... Am I supposed to comfort this bastard now...?

char_378_asbest.title: Assigned to Facility
char_378_asbest.text: Time to head back to the dorms and crash.

char_378_asbest.title: Tap
char_378_asbest.text: Huh?!

char_378_asbest.title: Trust Tap
char_378_asbest.text: Oh right, gotta take a trip to the Doctor's office first.

char_378_asbest.title: Title
char_378_asbest.text: Arknights.

char_378_asbest.title: Greeting
char_378_asbest.text: You got a lot of free time?

char_343_tknogi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_343_tknogi.text: You should take a little break. It's good for you. Of course that is true, aren't you glad to hear that?

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk 1
char_343_tknogi.text: 'Those who chase Catastrophes.' 'Catastrophe Patrols.' Or as they say here, 'Catastrophe Messengers.' The job is bitter and tiring, and we are often ridiculed by ordinary civilians and bureaucrats alike. Will my lot improve as an operator? No? Haha, such is life.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk 2
char_343_tknogi.text: Tomorrow... Ah, um, I see. My dear boss, remember to bring an umbrella with you when you leave tomorrow.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk 3
char_343_tknogi.text: If I could have stayed in Higashi, I would not have come all the way here. But... with these things planted inside my flesh, how could I consider anywhere my 'home?'

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_343_tknogi.text: It is better to give your salary to those in need than to store it inside your abode. Considering how little there is, if you put it within the hands of someone in need, just seeing their smile and hearing the words of appreciation is enough to warm my heart.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_343_tknogi.text: I often wonder if the strange words that occasionally come from my mouth are born of my own consciousness, or if they are bestowed upon me by the Great Spirit who I have never met. The ritual verses of my relatives are all drawn from ancient scriptures, but I've always blurted mine out. It is quite distressing.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_343_tknogi.text: Again and again we prance, posture, sing, and pray, with no tolerance for the slightest discrepancies. Some people find joy in filling their lives with these things, and tell others that it will bring joy to the high heavens. How truly sinful.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_343_tknogi.text: My clan and I lived in the mountains, not far from a Shinto shrine. At the foot of the mountain was a Buddhist temple, where the monks would return to at night. Now for the question, Doctor. What do you think would happen? Hehe, I shall leave the answer on your table, feel free to take a look when you have time.

char_343_tknogi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_343_tknogi.text: Up so late? Do you still have something on your mind? Being thoughtful and eloquent is your strong suit, but just don't let it get in the way of your sleep. Here, I have some incense from Higashi for you, what do you think of the scent? —Oh my, the effect seems to be a bit too strong? Heh, I suppose I shall stand guard for you tonight.

char_343_tknogi.title: Idle
char_343_tknogi.text: Close your eyes, and calm your mind. Good~

char_343_tknogi.title: Onboard
char_343_tknogi.text: Pleased to meet you. It simply would not do if I was to forget my introduction, yes? I am Tsukinogi, formerly part of a small 'Catastrophe Patrol' in Higashi. It is an honor to be able to work under you.

char_343_tknogi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_343_tknogi.text: Different communication methods? Interesting...

char_343_tknogi.title: Promotion 1
char_343_tknogi.text: Oh, a reward? Now, now, how should I use this?

char_343_tknogi.title: Promotion 2
char_343_tknogi.text: The white night is a raging fire, through which a dark haze lingers. I asketh thee, where dost thy steps cease? Take things one step at a time, and do not stray off the path.

char_343_tknogi.title: Added to Squad
char_343_tknogi.text: I will not fall short of your expectations.

char_343_tknogi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_343_tknogi.text: Great is the responsibility of leading others.

char_343_tknogi.title: Depart
char_343_tknogi.text: The time has come. Let us go.

char_343_tknogi.title: Begin Operation
char_343_tknogi.text: There are more important things to do than pray.

char_343_tknogi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_343_tknogi.text: Yes.

char_343_tknogi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_343_tknogi.text: Very well.

char_343_tknogi.title: Deployment 1
char_343_tknogi.text: Impurity be purged.

char_343_tknogi.title: Deployment 2
char_343_tknogi.text: Soul be cleansed.

char_343_tknogi.title: In Battle 1
char_343_tknogi.text: Rising haze, sunder the body.

char_343_tknogi.title: In Battle 2
char_343_tknogi.text: Drown in the gloaming, and never return.

char_343_tknogi.title: In Battle 3
char_343_tknogi.text: Wander through this vast land, blind and ignorant.

char_343_tknogi.title: In Battle 4
char_343_tknogi.text: O exalted brilliance, separate us from harm!

char_343_tknogi.title: 4-star Result
char_343_tknogi.text: I was not able to help at all, but that is a cause for celebration.

char_343_tknogi.title: 3-star Result
char_343_tknogi.text: Congratulations. A perfect conclusion to this mission.

char_343_tknogi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_343_tknogi.text: The small issues that besmirch our results can be left to me. You may take your leave.

char_343_tknogi.title: Operation Failure
char_343_tknogi.text: The consequences of our recklessness have been unsatisfactory. Let us reflect upon them once more.

char_343_tknogi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_343_tknogi.text: I have no requests for my accommodations, so please assign me as you wish.

char_343_tknogi.title: Tap
char_343_tknogi.text: Yeah?

char_343_tknogi.title: Trust Tap
char_343_tknogi.text: If there is anything displeasing to you, please let me know. Yes, anything at all.

char_343_tknogi.title: Title
char_343_tknogi.text: Arknights.

char_343_tknogi.title: Greeting
char_343_tknogi.text: I trust you've been well?

char_197_poca.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_197_poca.text: It is an honor to serve you, Doctor.

char_197_poca.title: Talk 1
char_197_poca.text: I was once naive enough to think I could have anything I wanted. Now I know, while that may be true for most things, it is not for others. Those I can never get. Not on my own.

char_197_poca.title: Talk 2
char_197_poca.text: Any work you might have, please feel free to let me try. Don't worry, after what I've have been through, the dignity of a noblewoman is the least of my concerns. Now I am just like Zima and the girls, an ordinary student under protection.

char_197_poca.title: Talk 3
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, if you would like to know more about Chernobog, I may be able to provide a unique perspective. I was only a student, but you know, the Student Council President does interact with society at large, in some ways.

char_197_poca.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_197_poca.text: People like Istina, who forgo the opiate that is entertainment in pursuit of greater knowledge, are quite rare. Even at a noble school like I attended. If she had been my classmate back then... No, it's no use thinking about that now.

char_197_poca.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_197_poca.text: To hate the world on account of a tragedy is as shortsighted as loving the world over a comedy——Is it? Doctor, have you already decided how to handle all that you will soon face? And how should I? I'm still unsure.

char_197_poca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, I have a favor to ask of you. Would you please look after Zima and the girls... specifically their mental health? They look like they're adjusting well, but I know they're not. Even I, occasionally, think back to those times...

char_197_poca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, I wonder if you could ever understand? I was a victim, at times, I know. But at some point, I found myself an unconscious victimizer. And I even… 'indulged' in it... I... I can never forgive myself for that.

char_197_poca.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, is it easier to forget, when you're fully grown? When I come of age, will I be able to forgive myself? Will becoming as mature as you allow me to finally deal with the misery in my heart?

char_197_poca.title: Idle
char_197_poca.text: The Doctor is asleep...  Looks kind of cute.

char_197_poca.title: Onboard
char_197_poca.text: Greetings, Doctor. Allow me to once again express my gratitude to Rhodes Island for taking in me and my friends. I've had enough of a break working in Logistics, and I'd like to do as Zima and the girls do.

char_197_poca.title: Watching Battle Record
char_197_poca.text: I too must prepare for the battlefield…

char_197_poca.title: Promotion 1
char_197_poca.text: It seems my experience in student government is paying dividends in my work life. How delightful.

char_197_poca.title: Promotion 2
char_197_poca.text: There is still much I don't understand about what I am doing, about my future, about myself, and about so much more. But I am young. I still have time to think. Don't I, Doctor?

char_197_poca.title: Added to Squad
char_197_poca.text: Let us put my training to the test.

char_197_poca.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_197_poca.text: I will do all I can.

char_197_poca.title: Depart
char_197_poca.text: Comrades, let us move out.

char_197_poca.title: Begin Operation
char_197_poca.text: Comrades, let us keep to the plan.

char_197_poca.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_197_poca.text: Leave it to me.

char_197_poca.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_197_poca.text: Is it my turn?

char_197_poca.title: Deployment 1
char_197_poca.text: Stay calm, relax…

char_197_poca.title: Deployment 2
char_197_poca.text: First, remember the combat manual…

char_197_poca.title: In Battle 1
char_197_poca.text: Ready, aim... FIRE!

char_197_poca.title: In Battle 2
char_197_poca.text: Huh? A misfire? Eek!

char_197_poca.title: In Battle 3
char_197_poca.text: Rosa, believe in yourself. You can do it!

char_197_poca.title: In Battle 4
char_197_poca.text: This is nothing personal...

char_197_poca.title: 4-star Result
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, we did it...! Oh, um, ahem, truly a delightful victory!

char_197_poca.title: 3-star Result
char_197_poca.text: I hope I've met Doctor's expectations.

char_197_poca.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_197_poca.text: My apologies, Doctor. If only I had tried harder...

char_197_poca.title: Operation Failure
char_197_poca.text: We must review this carefully after we get back…

char_197_poca.title: Assigned to Facility
char_197_poca.text: I wonder if there's anywhere quite like the salon?

char_197_poca.title: Tap
char_197_poca.text: Oh!

char_197_poca.title: Trust Tap
char_197_poca.text: Another lovely day today.

char_197_poca.title: Title
char_197_poca.text: Arknights.

char_197_poca.title: Greeting
char_197_poca.text: Doctor, it's great to see you.

char_258_podego.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_258_podego.text: Ehehe~ Oh, Doctor, is your day going well?

char_258_podego.title: Talk 1
char_258_podego.text: This is a floral tea that I made myself! Doctor, come try a cup, I promise you'll feel cozy all day!

char_258_podego.title: Talk 2
char_258_podego.text: The sunlight in the greenhouse is so comfortable. Even though I'm an operator, it sometimes makes me want to slack.

char_258_podego.title: Talk 3
char_258_podego.text: Use the fruits of your labor to make everyone forget about their sorrows and worries. That's probably the tenet of all gardeners, don't you think~?

char_258_podego.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_258_podego.text: I much rather prefer growing things to destroying them. But as long as I think about how I can help everyone, I can muster up my courage.

char_258_podego.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_258_podego.text: These bottles? Inside are all the pollen and seeds that I've been collecting. I usually wear a gas mask and gloves before handling them, or I might get poisoned.

char_258_podego.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_258_podego.text: Umm, everyone seems to be a bit weary these days. But, I'm sure they'll cheer right back up when they see the flowers I've planted!

char_258_podego.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_258_podego.text: Doctor, Doctor! Are you coming to the greenhouse today? It seems like everyone's been really busy the last few days... If nobody comes by the greenhouse, the blooming season's going to pass right by. Wouldn't that be a darn shame?

char_258_podego.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_258_podego.text: Tending to the greenhouse is really hard. But, as long as I can make others smile with the flowers I grow, all my hard work will be worth it!

char_258_podego.title: Idle
char_258_podego.text: Doctor? Oh, you're asleep... I hope the fragrance of these petals can drift over to your dreams.

char_258_podego.title: Onboard
char_258_podego.text: Doctor, this is Podenco, here to say hi! If you have time, I'd love if you could come by the greenhouse!

char_258_podego.title: Watching Battle Record
char_258_podego.text: Aw, I thought this was a video about gardening techniques.

char_258_podego.title: Promotion 1
char_258_podego.text: Artist? N-n-no, I'm just a normal gardener.

char_258_podego.title: Promotion 2
char_258_podego.text: Look, Doctor! The new varieties I've been tending to for so long have finally started to bloom! Aren't they so pretty?

char_258_podego.title: Added to Squad
char_258_podego.text: Hm? Am I coming along as well?

char_258_podego.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_258_podego.text: Ah... I only have experience in tending a greenhouse. Is there anything I can do?

char_258_podego.title: Depart
char_258_podego.text: I see the enemy! Everyone, let's go!

char_258_podego.title: Begin Operation
char_258_podego.text: Everyone, make sure to take care of yourselves!

char_258_podego.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_258_podego.text: Hmm?

char_258_podego.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_258_podego.text: Where are we going?

char_258_podego.title: Deployment 1
char_258_podego.text: Got it.

char_258_podego.title: Deployment 2
char_258_podego.text: I'll do as you say.

char_258_podego.title: In Battle 1
char_258_podego.text: The pollen is allergenic~

char_258_podego.title: In Battle 2
char_258_podego.text: Ah, I'll take care of them.

char_258_podego.title: In Battle 3
char_258_podego.text: I've seen weeds like these before.

char_258_podego.title: In Battle 4
char_258_podego.text: Let me protect everyone!

char_258_podego.title: 4-star Result
char_258_podego.text: Phew, is it safe already? Good job, everyone!

char_258_podego.title: 3-star Result
char_258_podego.text: Achieving a flawless victory is like cultivating a beautiful flower. Both require a lot of hard work.

char_258_podego.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_258_podego.text: Doctor, everyone is awaiting your next orders.

char_258_podego.title: Operation Failure
char_258_podego.text: Ah... I never thought things could become like this...

char_258_podego.title: Assigned to Facility
char_258_podego.text: Shall we plant some flowers over here?

char_258_podego.title: Tap
char_258_podego.text: Oh, Doctor?

char_258_podego.title: Trust Tap
char_258_podego.text: Doctor! Would you like to decorate your office with some flowers?

char_258_podego.title: Title
char_258_podego.text: Arknights.

char_258_podego.title: Greeting
char_258_podego.text: Hello, Doctor!

char_358_lisa.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_358_lisa.text: Do you need any help, Doctor? Then, I'll do my homework later...

char_358_lisa.title: Talk 1
char_358_lisa.text: You'd like to know more about my tails? Well, after I came to Rhodes Island, I realized that I have more tails than the other Vulpo sisters here, and I don't know who I should talk to about it... But, the people my dad worked with all had a lot of tails... How strange.

char_358_lisa.title: Talk 2
char_358_lisa.text: Upset? Thank you for your concern, Doctor. Everyone treats me well, so I can't be too needy, but... the beds here at Rhodes Island are a bit small, and it's hard to manage all my tails when I'm trying to sleep at night; And, someone's always watering the potted plants I've been growing, but they don't need that much attention.

char_358_lisa.title: Talk 3
char_358_lisa.text: Big sister Amiya is really amazing. She always has so many ideas that I haven't thought of, and she's a great role model. But, she's also just like me. She's not an adult yet, so she'll sometimes feel lost and confused. Doctor, you should spend more time with her.

char_358_lisa.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_358_lisa.text: That first time I took a really long ride from Higashi to Siracusa, I was so surprised! I never knew that other places could look so different! Even though right now I can only stay behind my mentors, and not all my memories are rosy, I still really love my life right now. Mhm!

char_358_lisa.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_358_lisa.text: The flame that my dad conjured was very beautiful. Of course it was fire, but it looked like crystal. After I came to Rhodes Island, I realized that it was the power my dad used to protect others. I can use what he taught me to help my mentors here! So, I'll continue to do my best!

char_358_lisa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_358_lisa.text: Since my arm was injured, my mom has rarely let me go out. I don't blame her though, and I'm even more worried about how she's going to deal with those bad people. That's why I should live the best life I can right now, so she doesn't have to worry about anything, right? As long as she stays calm, she's super strong!

char_358_lisa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_358_lisa.text: Although I haven't been an operator for very long, I know that what we're doing is very difficult, right? Even though my mentors are always chatting and laughing, they're also hiding their thoughts and feelings. If I can become a bit stronger, will I be able to help them share their troubles?

char_358_lisa.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor, you... lost your memories? Really? Dr. Kal'tsit only just told me about this today... Um, you should rest for the day. You also need some time to think about this, right? Just leave the rest of the work to me and, um, go spend some time with Amiya! Hehe!

char_358_lisa.title: Idle
char_358_lisa.text: You'll catch a cold like this. I'll need to find a blanket...

char_358_lisa.title: Onboard
char_358_lisa.text: Rhodes Island Operator, Lisa... Ah, I mean, Suzuran! Operator Suzuran! It's the code name I chose for myself. Starting today, I'm officially an operator, so I'll be in your care!

char_358_lisa.title: Watching Battle Record
char_358_lisa.text: S-so this is how my mentors fight... They seem so powerful...

char_358_lisa.title: Promotion 1
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor, earlier today, Dr. Kal'tsit praised me... Um, a promotion? Not just praise? Eh?

char_358_lisa.title: Promotion 2
char_358_lisa.text: Look, Doctor! Look at my Originium Arts! I've been working so hard on this! Now I'll be able to go to more places with my mentors, see more things, and help more people, right?

char_358_lisa.title: Added to Squad
char_358_lisa.text: I'll make sure to work hard and make good use of this opportunity!

char_358_lisa.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_358_lisa.text: Eh, I'll be leading my mentors? O-okay, leave it to me! As the captain, I mustn't be too weak!

char_358_lisa.title: Depart
char_358_lisa.text: Operation, start.

char_358_lisa.title: Begin Operation
char_358_lisa.text: The enemy appeared! Um, can't we persuade them to give up?

char_358_lisa.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_358_lisa.text: Ah, understood!

char_358_lisa.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor, your orders please!

char_358_lisa.title: Deployment 1
char_358_lisa.text: Don't be nervous, don't be nervous.

char_358_lisa.title: Deployment 2
char_358_lisa.text: We can all do this! Mm!

char_358_lisa.title: In Battle 1
char_358_lisa.text: B-be careful!

char_358_lisa.title: In Battle 2
char_358_lisa.text: Is everyone okay? Everyone's safe, right?

char_358_lisa.title: In Battle 3
char_358_lisa.text: Hang in there!

char_358_lisa.title: In Battle 4
char_358_lisa.text: Please hold on!

char_358_lisa.title: 4-star Result
char_358_lisa.text: So this is the actual battlefield that my mentors faced... Doctor, I think we can do even better. I'll work harder.

char_358_lisa.title: 3-star Result
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor, did I do a good job? I didn't hold the others back, right? Really? Thank goodness...

char_358_lisa.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor, are you okay? Is there anyone who's injured? I, I'll go take care of them!

char_358_lisa.title: Operation Failure
char_358_lisa.text: Sorry, it's my fault I didn't work hard enough...

char_358_lisa.title: Assigned to Facility
char_358_lisa.text: I've lived here for a long time, so I won't get lost.

char_358_lisa.title: Tap
char_358_lisa.text: Eek!

char_358_lisa.title: Trust Tap
char_358_lisa.text: Doctor? Oh, would you like some mini cakes? I was planning to take these to everyone in the Medical Department, but you also work very hard... so please help yourself!

char_358_lisa.title: Title
char_358_lisa.text: Arknights.

char_358_lisa.title: Greeting
char_358_lisa.text: Good work, Doctor.

char_328_cammou.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_328_cammou.text: Don't you just need me to push some papers around? I do this stuff all the time, piece o' cake.

char_328_cammou.title: Talk 1
char_328_cammou.text: Doctor, hurry up and check out my new video. You're gonna love it.

char_328_cammou.title: Talk 2
char_328_cammou.text: Yeah, that's the icon. Mind clicking on it for me? And if possible, can you click that icon next to it? Hehe, thanks a bunch.

char_328_cammou.title: Talk 3
char_328_cammou.text: Raw footage! Ideas! Plotlines! I can't think up any content! I'm gonna lose subs......

char_328_cammou.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_328_cammou.text: I'm just an amateur explorer. I only plan to take a few shots and then come right back, so I won't be gone for long. Besides, how could being outdoors be as cozy as chilling in my room?

char_328_cammou.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_328_cammou.text: The folks in the Medical Department must've put some weird ideas in your head again. Look, I admit, I get weird impulses every now and then, but I promise, I'll never cause you any trouble.

char_328_cammou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_328_cammou.text: My unique skill is video editing. Did you wanna do a Rhodes Island promo, Doctor? Got a plan for me? All righty, let's take a look. Hmm... Rhodes Island precautions, balanced diet videos, fire safety videos... What the hell are these?!

char_328_cammou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_328_cammou.text: My instincts are telling me, there's a terrible Feline approaching, Doctor. Don't let your guard down. The moment you're distracted, they'll jump out of a dark corner and smack you to the ground in a single swipe of the paw. Eh? They won't?

char_328_cammou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_328_cammou.text: The joy of living together with everyone, and the thrill of finding new things to film go hand in hand! It is for that reason I decided to become an operator, so I can share my happiness with you.

char_328_cammou.title: Idle
char_328_cammou.text: Time to quietly sneak in a photo op. Mm, just one.

char_328_cammou.title: Onboard
char_328_cammou.text: 'Sup everyone, this is the Click Channel! Eh? I'm not allowed to take footage of the Doctor's office? Fine...

char_328_cammou.title: Watching Battle Record
char_328_cammou.text: Let me do the filming next time.

char_328_cammou.title: Promotion 1
char_328_cammou.text: Promotion? Sweet! Let's take a group photo to celebrate the occasion, Doctor!

char_328_cammou.title: Promotion 2
char_328_cammou.text: Relax, Doctor. This happens every time I get excited, but there's nothing to be afraid of.

char_328_cammou.title: Added to Squad
char_328_cammou.text: 'Sup, everyone!

char_328_cammou.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_328_cammou.text: Leave it to me!

char_328_cammou.title: Depart
char_328_cammou.text: Doctor, you'd better not forget anything~

char_328_cammou.title: Begin Operation
char_328_cammou.text: Let's see what interesting things can be filmed this time~

char_328_cammou.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_328_cammou.text: Over here!

char_328_cammou.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_328_cammou.text: By your command.

char_328_cammou.title: Deployment 1
char_328_cammou.text: Fly, my drone!

char_328_cammou.title: Deployment 2
char_328_cammou.text: Let's get to work!

char_328_cammou.title: In Battle 1
char_328_cammou.text: Fire!

char_328_cammou.title: In Battle 2
char_328_cammou.text: Move aside!

char_328_cammou.title: In Battle 3
char_328_cammou.text: I see you!

char_328_cammou.title: In Battle 4
char_328_cammou.text: Hey, smile for the camera!

char_328_cammou.title: 4-star Result
char_328_cammou.text: That was a sweet clip I just got! Make sure to come by and watch it after you return to the ship.

char_328_cammou.title: 3-star Result
char_328_cammou.text: Wonderful! We can just use this as a real-time battle record!

char_328_cammou.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_328_cammou.text: I was too caught up with filming that someone slipped through.

char_328_cammou.title: Operation Failure
char_328_cammou.text: My lens broke...

char_328_cammou.title: Assigned to Facility
char_328_cammou.text: My video studio's about to open!

char_328_cammou.title: Tap
char_328_cammou.text: Wah!

char_328_cammou.title: Trust Tap
char_328_cammou.text: Hey Doctor, lemme show you something good!

char_328_cammou.title: Title
char_328_cammou.text: Arknights.

char_328_cammou.title: Greeting
char_328_cammou.text: Hiii~

char_344_beewax.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_344_beewax.text: Doctor, you'll be working hard today? Then, I'll stay with you. If you slack off, then I'll use this stick... Like this... and give you a smack on the head. Bonk, bonk.

char_344_beewax.title: Talk 1
char_344_beewax.text: Beeswax, Beeswax, Beeswax... Mm, okay. I should get used to it after reading it a few more times. Oh, Doctor, do you need something? I'm just trying to get used to hearing my code name... so I don't overreact and get made fun of when others call me.

char_344_beewax.title: Talk 2
char_344_beewax.text: This bug... Mister Midnight seemed very scared of it and jumped up into the air as soon as he saw it, so I helped him catch it. But, where should we put it now... Um, Doctor, why are you backing away?

char_344_beewax.title: Talk 3
char_344_beewax.text: My clothes are a bit big, so I feel at ease when drape over my body. I like that sensation. But, sometimes, I'll accidentally step on them— Uu, uwah, ahh...! ...Fweh, I tripped again... Ow...

char_344_beewax.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_344_beewax.text: The new piece the Folk Song Association put out this month is my new favorite song. Oh, you've never heard of them before, Doctor? The full name is the Folk Song and Originium Arts Research Association... Still haven't heard about it? What about the Electronic Arts Alliance? How about the Rap and Folk Joint Vantage? Haven't heard of any of them?

char_344_beewax.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_344_beewax.text: The mark on my head? Ah... this is a ceremonial seal passed down from generation to generation in my tribe, and it is a symbol of our Golden Gods' blessings towards our tribe and our peoples. The faceless gods will protect us, no matter where we go, whether or not we remember them......

char_344_beewax.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_344_beewax.text: Leaving the tribe and traveling to other city-states and countries is a trial of passage that all the members of our tribe must go through. Only by successfully passing it can one become a full-fledged adult like my sister. Um, Doctor, you don't think I'll run into any problems, right?

char_344_beewax.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_344_beewax.text: Hehe, my horns are big and pretty, right? There aren't many people in the tribe whose horns can compare to mine! The secret to maintaining them is to apply essential oils once a day, gently massage them with a soft brush— W-wait, doctor, I haven't finished today's maintenance yet, you can't just touch them like that!

char_344_beewax.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_344_beewax.text: Doctor, please come here. Mm, okay, close your eyes, and let me touch your forehead. The scorching sun, the raging storm, and waves of golden sand washing across the desert. The gods set foot upon the land where we were nurtured, and bestowed our tribe with their blessings. Now, I will share this blessing with you, Doctor.

char_344_beewax.title: Idle
char_344_beewax.text: Zz... zzz... Sister... you dummy... zzz... mm... H-huh, Doctor? I feel asleep...? Sleeptalking? Did I say something?

char_344_beewax.title: Onboard
char_344_beewax.text: Hmm... Wah, excuse me, I let my mind wander. Hello, Doctor, I am, my code name is... Umm... Ah, I remember! It's Beeswax. Do you like it? My tribe helped decide it for me.

char_344_beewax.title: Watching Battle Record
char_344_beewax.text: Hm...? I have to watch all of this?

char_344_beewax.title: Promotion 1
char_344_beewax.text: Promotion? Mm... I don't quite understand.

char_344_beewax.title: Promotion 2
char_344_beewax.text: Doctor, perhaps the path that lies ahead for Rhodes Island is destined to be long and difficult, but please remember, the gods' decrees and my blessings... will always be with you.

char_344_beewax.title: Added to Squad
char_344_beewax.text: Where are we going this time?

char_344_beewax.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_344_beewax.text: I'm the leader...? Even though I'm not sure how you select your team leaders, I'll try my best.

char_344_beewax.title: Depart
char_344_beewax.text: Well then, let's go.

char_344_beewax.title: Begin Operation
char_344_beewax.text: Someone's over there. Everyone, please be careful.

char_344_beewax.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_344_beewax.text: Yes, I'm here.

char_344_beewax.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_344_beewax.text: How can I help?

char_344_beewax.title: Deployment 1
char_344_beewax.text: Over here? Leave it to me.

char_344_beewax.title: Deployment 2
char_344_beewax.text: The land beneath my feet is the domain of the gods.

char_344_beewax.title: In Battle 1
char_344_beewax.text: Devour them.

char_344_beewax.title: In Battle 2
char_344_beewax.text: Crush them.

char_344_beewax.title: In Battle 3
char_344_beewax.text: Sleep beneath the golden sands.

char_344_beewax.title: In Battle 4
char_344_beewax.text: This is the blessing of the gods.

char_344_beewax.title: 4-star Result
char_344_beewax.text: May they also receive the blessing of the gods......

char_344_beewax.title: 3-star Result
char_344_beewax.text: Phew... It's over. Doctor, was I able to be of use?

char_344_beewax.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_344_beewax.text: Ooh, they got away! Mm... but I guess that's fine?

char_344_beewax.title: Operation Failure
char_344_beewax.text: We can't do this anymore, Doctor. I'll hold the enemies back, so please escape!

char_344_beewax.title: Assigned to Facility
char_344_beewax.text: What a beautiful room... It'd be troublesome if I accidentally spilled sand over it, right?

char_344_beewax.title: Tap
char_344_beewax.text: W-woah... I stepped on my clothes again...

char_344_beewax.title: Trust Tap
char_344_beewax.text: Ah, Doctor, please look at this! I caught another bug~!

char_344_beewax.title: Title
char_344_beewax.text: Arknights.

char_344_beewax.title: Greeting
char_344_beewax.text: Doctor, I've been waiting.

char_336_folivo.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_336_folivo.text: 'Please give any tasks that require doing directly to Lens.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Miss Scene is the simultaneous champion of the Nature and Still-Life categories in major photography competitions. If anyone is willing to wait, the probability of winning the Portrait category will also increase significantly. Doctor, do you want to be a model for Miss Scene?'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk 2
char_336_folivo.text: 'Detecting that the Doctor's patience is fading. Commencing conciliation sequence — there is only less than half an hour left before Miss Scene completes the shooting. Please hold on a bit longer.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk 3
char_336_folivo.text: 'The Zalak next door is looking for Miss Scene again. Though she hasn't laughed yet, I can tell she's very happy.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Truthfully, Miss Scene originally wanted to work as a full-time photographer for a giant photographic equipment company in Columbia, but she ended up as an operator here anyway. According to Lens, it may be because the other party asked her to take pictures that she didn't want to. Indeed, Miss Scene is very picky.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_336_folivo.text: W h e n   y o u   s e e   s o m e t h i n g   y o u   l i k e ,     y o u   h a v e   t o   t a k e   a   p h o t o .

char_336_folivo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Doctor, are you trying to get Miss Scene to laugh again? In actuality, she is already laughing, but if you want to see it, you'll have to wait, and wait, and wait... and continue waiting until the curvature of her mouth becomes perfect. This process will take time — I can't tell you in exactly how many minutes, but it all depends on how the lass is feeling today.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_336_folivo.text: 'Lens has long been waiting for someone who can understand Miss Scene, but now there are many people in Rhodes Island who are willing to interact with her. This makes Lens very happy, and I wish that one day Miss Scene can find someone who can replace me.'

char_336_folivo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_336_folivo.text: T h i s   c a m e r a.   F o r   y o u .  T h a n k  y o u .   D o c t o r  .

char_336_folivo.title: Idle
char_336_folivo.text: 'Now Playing —— [[ D.D.D. Smash Hits ]] '

char_336_folivo.title: Onboard
char_336_folivo.text: 'Photographer, Scene, and Robotic Photography Assistant, Lens. We are pleased to make your acquaintance.'  H e l l o .

char_336_folivo.title: Watching Battle Record
char_336_folivo.text: 'Please repeat it again. Repeat. Please repeat it again.'

char_336_folivo.title: Promotion 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Accessory upgrade complete. Miss Scene thanks you.'

char_336_folivo.title: Promotion 2
char_336_folivo.text: I s   t h e r e   s c e n e r y    y o u   w a n t   t o   s e e ?

char_336_folivo.title: Added to Squad
char_336_folivo.text: 'Teammate data has been obtained.'

char_336_folivo.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_336_folivo.text: 'Sub-data obtained.'

char_336_folivo.title: Depart
char_336_folivo.text: 'Signal to depart confirmed.'

char_336_folivo.title: Begin Operation
char_336_folivo.text: 'Cruise program activated.'

char_336_folivo.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Lens is here to work for you.'

char_336_folivo.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_336_folivo.text: Here.

char_336_folivo.title: Deployment 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Beginning photoshoot.'

char_336_folivo.title: Deployment 2
char_336_folivo.text: Mhmm.

char_336_folivo.title: In Battle 1
char_336_folivo.text: 'Shooting——'

char_336_folivo.title: In Battle 2
char_336_folivo.text: 'Lights——'

char_336_folivo.title: In Battle 3
char_336_folivo.text: 'Panorama——'

char_336_folivo.title: In Battle 4
char_336_folivo.text: 'Time Lapse——'

char_336_folivo.title: 4-star Result
char_336_folivo.text: C o n g r a t s .

char_336_folivo.title: 3-star Result
char_336_folivo.text: 'Mission complete! Miss Scene is currently being transported back to base.'

char_336_folivo.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_336_folivo.text: 'The way back to the base won't be smooth.'

char_336_folivo.title: Operation Failure
char_336_folivo.text: 'Please evacuate from the area! Please evacuate from the area!'

char_336_folivo.title: Assigned to Facility
char_336_folivo.text: 'Please order a hammock for Miss Scene. Thank you for your cooperation.'

char_336_folivo.title: Tap
char_336_folivo.text: Yeah?

char_336_folivo.title: Trust Tap
char_336_folivo.text: W a n t   a   p h o t o ?

char_336_folivo.title: Title
char_336_folivo.text: Arknights.

char_336_folivo.title: Greeting
char_336_folivo.text: H  e  l  l  o  . 'Hello! Hello!'

char_294_ayer.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_294_ayer.text: Before you leave, I am responsible for protecting you.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk 1
char_294_ayer.text: Doctor, I'm looking for a way to quickly increase the charge my body can carry. Look for an operator who uses electricity? That makes sense, I'll try it.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk 2
char_294_ayer.text: Go to Leonhardt if you need ore identified. I'm no good at this.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk 3
char_294_ayer.text: The boss lady of Rhine Lab frowned when she saw me, as if I was some kind of pest. What a pain. When did I ever do anything to her?

char_294_ayer.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_294_ayer.text: My ears are standing up? Don't worry, *bzzt*, it's just the static, and it actually feels pretty good. It'll, *bzzt*, come down on its own after a while.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_294_ayer.text: It took me two years of scrouging and going into debt to buy this baby. If not for its value, the Cautus profiteers on the black market would've thrown me away onto some mining ship. The fact that I can have a comfortable life today is all due to this little electricity-leaking guy.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_294_ayer.text: Oh, there you are. How about a fresh, chilled piece of salted edamame? Don't want it? You've gotta learn to appreciate this kind of food. Here, eat it.

char_294_ayer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_294_ayer.text: Leonhardt's too noisy and causes too much trouble. I prefer hanging out with you. What? He got surrounded by the Medical Department staff for pulling too many pranks on them? He just doesn't know what's pushing it too far, and I don't think he's ever going to learn. Tsk, I'm going to take a look. Doctor, want to come with me if you're free?

char_294_ayer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_294_ayer.text: I protect Wright because we've been together ever since we were little. Something happens to him, I pay it back, and vice versa. But as for us, we haven't had such a long and stable relationship. Don't think you can get close to me just because you helped bandage my wounds, got it? ...I said the same thing last time? Tsk, damn it.

char_294_ayer.title: Idle
char_294_ayer.text: Huh?! Oh... it's you. It's nothing, I'm just lying here to recuperate. If you want to rest as well, I'll make space for you.

char_294_ayer.title: Onboard
char_294_ayer.text: Catastrophe Messenger bodyguard, Ayerscarpe. Pleased to meet you.

char_294_ayer.title: Watching Battle Record
char_294_ayer.text: Very professional. Worth learning from.

char_294_ayer.title: Promotion 1
char_294_ayer.text: Haven't I been getting overpaid recently? A promotion? Oh, I see. Thank you.

char_294_ayer.title: Promotion 2
char_294_ayer.text: Being a bodyguard is not about defense, but rather control. Control the space around the target and eliminate all threats. Shall I prove it to you?

char_294_ayer.title: Added to Squad
char_294_ayer.text: Squad joined, awaiting deployment.

char_294_ayer.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_294_ayer.text: Begin the operation at your own pace.

char_294_ayer.title: Depart
char_294_ayer.text: No abnormal changes detected. The squad can begin moving.

char_294_ayer.title: Begin Operation
char_294_ayer.text: Target located. Move out!

char_294_ayer.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_294_ayer.text: Ah.

char_294_ayer.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_294_ayer.text: Awaiting your command.

char_294_ayer.title: Deployment 1
char_294_ayer.text: Device, activate.

char_294_ayer.title: Deployment 2
char_294_ayer.text: Let's get to work.

char_294_ayer.title: In Battle 1
char_294_ayer.text: It's over!

char_294_ayer.title: In Battle 2
char_294_ayer.text: Your life is mine!

char_294_ayer.title: In Battle 3
char_294_ayer.text: The best defense is a good offense.

char_294_ayer.title: In Battle 4
char_294_ayer.text: There is no winning or losing. Only life or death.

char_294_ayer.title: 4-star Result
char_294_ayer.text: Good job controlling the entire situation. Hmph. Congratulations.

char_294_ayer.title: 3-star Result
char_294_ayer.text: We made good time. We should get going.

char_294_ayer.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_294_ayer.text: I'm willing to believe that letting that person through was part of your plans.

char_294_ayer.title: Operation Failure
char_294_ayer.text: Don't worry about my injuries. Just make sure you get back safely.

char_294_ayer.title: Assigned to Facility
char_294_ayer.text: I'll leave the arrangements to you. I have no demands.

char_294_ayer.title: Tap
char_294_ayer.text: Don't touch my ears.

char_294_ayer.title: Trust Tap
char_294_ayer.text: You look troubled. What's on your mind?

char_294_ayer.title: Title
char_294_ayer.text: Arknights.

char_294_ayer.title: Greeting
char_294_ayer.text: Is there something you need?

char_349_chiave.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_349_chiave.text: Yo, Doctor, got anything fun for me?

char_349_chiave.title: Talk 1
char_349_chiave.text: Tsk, I need to think of some way to make all the bell peppers disappear from the cafeteria forever.

char_349_chiave.title: Talk 2
char_349_chiave.text: There's this Yan saying that goes something like, 'Live life in the present.' Heh, don't you think that saying is really well-suited for me? The future? Eh, I'll let Aosta chew on that kind of stuff.

char_349_chiave.title: Talk 3
char_349_chiave.text: Hey Doctor, don't just sit there all the time. Why don't we have some fun, like remodeling this whole office?

char_349_chiave.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_349_chiave.text: Aosta once said that I'm not gonna live long like this. At the time I told him, what's the point of living for a long time if I can't do what I want?

char_349_chiave.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_349_chiave.text: Fight for what you want, snatch up what you like. There's no such thing as 'giving up' in my vocabulary!

char_349_chiave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_349_chiave.text: I think up what to do, Aosta thinks up how to do it, and Broca's responsible for making sure we get it done together. That's how we've always done things, and it's how we ended up here.

char_349_chiave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_349_chiave.text: Doctor, what are you doing all frowny-faced over there? If there's anything weighing down on you, just lemme hear it. I'm good at that kind of stuff.

char_349_chiave.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_349_chiave.text: I told you, Doctor, if you decide that becoming the head of Rhodes Island ain't for you, how about you come work with us? I normally don't answer to anyone, but in your case, I'll make an exception.

char_349_chiave.title: Idle
char_349_chiave.text: Yo, Doctor... How the heck did you fall asleep? Whatever, guess I'll tell you later.

char_349_chiave.title: Onboard
char_349_chiave.text: Yo, are you the Doctor? Hello, and well met. The name's Chiave. I'm your underling from now on!

char_349_chiave.title: Watching Battle Record
char_349_chiave.text: Tsk, tsk. Hey Aosta, get over here. I'm gonna become this strong one day!

char_349_chiave.title: Promotion 1
char_349_chiave.text: Huh? Promotion? What's that?

char_349_chiave.title: Promotion 2
char_349_chiave.text: Incredible. There are just too many amazing people here at Rhodes Island. How am I supposed to just stay in my seat? I've gotta get stronger and stronger!

char_349_chiave.title: Added to Squad
char_349_chiave.text: Yo, let's go!

char_349_chiave.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_349_chiave.text: Listen up, everyone, I have a plan!

char_349_chiave.title: Depart
char_349_chiave.text: Haha, let's go make some noise!

char_349_chiave.title: Begin Operation
char_349_chiave.text: Just gotta knock 'em all down, right?

char_349_chiave.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_349_chiave.text: It's still not my turn yet?

char_349_chiave.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_349_chiave.text: Don't keep me waiting.

char_349_chiave.title: Deployment 1
char_349_chiave.text: I've already been waiting forever!

char_349_chiave.title: Deployment 2
char_349_chiave.text: Haha, you're all dead meat!

char_349_chiave.title: In Battle 1
char_349_chiave.text: Taste this!

char_349_chiave.title: In Battle 2
char_349_chiave.text: Hey, don't just run away!

char_349_chiave.title: In Battle 3
char_349_chiave.text: Fine, fine. You've all done a great job.

char_349_chiave.title: In Battle 4
char_349_chiave.text: I'm getting pumped up!

char_349_chiave.title: 4-star Result
char_349_chiave.text: Hah, now this kind of task is the fun stuff!

char_349_chiave.title: 3-star Result
char_349_chiave.text: Tsk, tsk. Where's the challenge in that, Doctor?

char_349_chiave.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_349_chiave.text: Huh? I left a few? Never even saw 'em.

char_349_chiave.title: Operation Failure
char_349_chiave.text: Che cazzo uomo！

char_349_chiave.title: Assigned to Facility
char_349_chiave.text: 'ello, bruthas and sistahs!

char_349_chiave.title: Tap
char_349_chiave.text: The hell?

char_349_chiave.title: Trust Tap
char_349_chiave.text: Yo, Doctor, you seem to be in a pretty good mood.

char_349_chiave.title: Title
char_349_chiave.text: Arknights.

char_349_chiave.title: Greeting
char_349_chiave.text: Doctor, have you eaten yet?

char_345_folnic.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_345_folnic.text: Tabletop, 60 points. Floor, 63 points. Air quality...... 56 points. There's room for improvement, Doctor.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk 1
char_345_folnic.text: Have you experienced any bodily discomfort recently? Umm, dry skin, err, um, stiff shoulders, dry eyeballs, hair loss, fatigue? ...Very good, just an old problem then, nothing serious. As long as you start exercising, these problems should go away in no time.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk 2
char_345_folnic.text: Life in the Medical Department is just daily meetings, visits around the Island, learning the operators' physical conditions, and developing new drugs. Never anything fresh and exciting.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk 3
char_345_folnic.text: Mother, no matter where you are, please watch over me.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_345_folnic.text: Thanks for always taking care of us medics. I feel so much less anxiety while working, and am very happy. Of course, there are troublesome things to deal with as well, for example, when Blaze comes back, her body is always covered in blood. Does she know how hard it is to clean up those bodily fluids?

char_345_folnic.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_345_folnic.text: How many times have I told you, don't stay up late, and don't overeat! You just won't listen, right? How are you going to take care of other peoples' health then? You might as well spend the rest of your life in that chair then!! ......I'm sorry, I need to go calm down first.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_345_folnic.text: I never quite know what Dr. Kal'tsit is thinking. Has she always been that... unique? I hope I can catch up to her one day, even if it's in just one area.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_345_folnic.text: As long as the wicked can be punished, what's a little bit of criticism? I don't mind spilling these poisons on my enemies. They deserve it.

char_345_folnic.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_345_folnic.text: The word 'Ursus' only gives me pain. I don't want to hear it, not again for the rest of my life. But it is a giant, and its voice is deafening. And I'm the only it's going to drive mad.

char_345_folnic.title: Idle
char_345_folnic.text: You also know that your previous environmental cleanliness evaluation scores weren't very high, right? If you don't turn things around, Doctor, you'll be on the business end of the Rhodes Island sanitation crane. Phew, I'll help you take care of these for now, so make sure you clean up the rest in your free time.

char_345_folnic.title: Onboard
char_345_folnic.text: I am Folinic from the Medical Department, and I am now participating in field medic missions. Meanwhile, per Dr. Kal'tsit's request, I will also help you manage your health. I look forward to working with you.

char_345_folnic.title: Watching Battle Record
char_345_folnic.text: It seems that the volume of drug input was insufficient last time, and it should be able to achieve its intended effect next time at triple the dosage.

char_345_folnic.title: Promotion 1
char_345_folnic.text: Thank you for your acknowledgment. I am simply doing what I should.

char_345_folnic.title: Promotion 2
char_345_folnic.text: One day, I will become as capable a physician as Dr. Kal'tsit. Just you wait and see.

char_345_folnic.title: Added to Squad
char_345_folnic.text: I will do my best to protect everyone's life.

char_345_folnic.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_345_folnic.text: The whole squad has been covered by medical support. The rest is up to you, Doctor.

char_345_folnic.title: Depart
char_345_folnic.text: No problem, I can handle some psychological burden.

char_345_folnic.title: Begin Operation
char_345_folnic.text: Enemy engaged. Preparing for counterattack and treatment.

char_345_folnic.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_345_folnic.text: Haven't decided yet?

char_345_folnic.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_345_folnic.text: The clock's ticking.

char_345_folnic.title: Deployment 1
char_345_folnic.text: Medical support has arrived.

char_345_folnic.title: Deployment 2
char_345_folnic.text: Permission to attack has been granted.

char_345_folnic.title: In Battle 1
char_345_folnic.text: Begin administering medication.

char_345_folnic.title: In Battle 2
char_345_folnic.text: Don't worry, the effects will kick in soon.

char_345_folnic.title: In Battle 3
char_345_folnic.text: Three, two, one!

char_345_folnic.title: In Battle 4
char_345_folnic.text: Overdose decoction prepared, begin use!

char_345_folnic.title: 4-star Result
char_345_folnic.text: I was able to be of some help, right?

char_345_folnic.title: 3-star Result
char_345_folnic.text: Saving medical supplies is a good thing, but there's no need for that on the battlefield, is there?

char_345_folnic.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_345_folnic.text: Luckily, it's just a scratch. Just apply a bandage after cleansing the wound.

char_345_folnic.title: Operation Failure
char_345_folnic.text: Transfer the wounded! Get ready for emergency operation! Prepare for intraosseous infusion!

char_345_folnic.title: Assigned to Facility
char_345_folnic.text: Inspection complete. This area is habitable.

char_345_folnic.title: Tap
char_345_folnic.text: Huh?

char_345_folnic.title: Trust Tap
char_345_folnic.text: Sometimes the things I say to you can be a bit... excessive, but you should also recognize that you have your shortcomings, all right?

char_345_folnic.title: Title
char_345_folnic.text: Arknights.

char_345_folnic.title: Greeting
char_345_folnic.text: You've been working hard.

char_293_thorns.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_293_thorns.text: Before you start working, take some of this. Good. Now, for the duration of this drug, you won't be slacking off, right?

char_293_thorns.title: Talk 1
char_293_thorns.text: Separation and analysis of the extract are almost complete, next step is purification. Actual effect needs further testing... Huh? Why are you staring at my hair, Doctor? My hair... is a total mess? Don't worry about it. Wouldn't be the first time my experiment has failed, or the second.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk 2
char_293_thorns.text: The drugs I carry on me? They're not fatal, but it'd be best not to touch them.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk 3
char_293_thorns.text: Always keep your mind running. Giving up on thought is tantamount on handing your keys to your enemies. I've been taught this many times, and always think back to it.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_293_thorns.text: My people originally had a completely different appearance. Our skin was as hard as a carapace, and our hair was as smooth as flowing water. However, the scorching sun and dry air have turned us into what we are today. You believed that? Sorry, I was just speaking gibberish just now.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_293_thorns.text: If you are not a follower of the Laterano religion, it is best not to go to Iberia. Their so-called 'purest faith' is rooted in that land, and the people there are so pious that even the Laterano people are ashamed of it. As for me? None of that concerns me in the slightest.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_293_thorns.text: Doctor, have you heard anything about the past history of the Iberian Correctional Army? If you've heard even anything remotely relevant, you should know that the inhabitants of that chunk of land are far crazier than their cold, plain gray buildings suggest.

char_293_thorns.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_293_thorns.text: The angle of attack, the vector of evasion, the posture of defense. Every action is calculated, and there are no wasteful movements. This is what they call the 'Destreza.' Don't you think this is similar to your commanding style, Doctor?

char_293_thorns.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_293_thorns.text: I need to unwind a bit more when I'm resting? Not thinking about anything and just bask in the sun or let my hair blow in the wind? ...Well, it might be nice to give it a try every now and then. Come up, over here. The breeze up here reminds me of my hometown...

char_293_thorns.title: Idle
char_293_thorns.text: Zzz... zzz... Huh? ...What happened? Did I fall asleep too?

char_293_thorns.title: Onboard
char_293_thorns.text: So you're the Doctor? I'll give a brief introduction then. Code name, Thorns. Starting today, I'll be taking my post— Huh? One trouser leg is rolled up? ...Don't worry about it, this happens a lot.

char_293_thorns.title: Watching Battle Record
char_293_thorns.text: Hmm... This information does have some merit.

char_293_thorns.title: Promotion 1
char_293_thorns.text: A promotion? You should decide on things like that. Can I go now?

char_293_thorns.title: Promotion 2
char_293_thorns.text: Quickly and efficiently seal the opponent's ability to act, and attain victory at the lowest cost — I think I fully understand your orders. In that case, I'll use this paralytic neurotoxin in tandem with my attacks. I take it that you have no issue with this?

char_293_thorns.title: Added to Squad
char_293_thorns.text: Let me see how Rhodes Island fights.

char_293_thorns.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_293_thorns.text: Team leader? It'd be best not to have any expectations. I'm not very good at leading.

char_293_thorns.title: Depart
char_293_thorns.text: Let's make this quick. My time is valuable.

char_293_thorns.title: Begin Operation
char_293_thorns.text: Be careful. Don't get overconfident.

char_293_thorns.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_293_thorns.text: Understood.

char_293_thorns.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_293_thorns.text: Give me your orders.

char_293_thorns.title: Deployment 1
char_293_thorns.text: This won't take long.

char_293_thorns.title: Deployment 2
char_293_thorns.text: Let's just incapacitate them and move on.

char_293_thorns.title: In Battle 1
char_293_thorns.text: Stop moving around. It'll spare all of us the effort.

char_293_thorns.title: In Battle 2
char_293_thorns.text: Your attacks are all within my calculations.

char_293_thorns.title: In Battle 3
char_293_thorns.text: Futile.

char_293_thorns.title: In Battle 4
char_293_thorns.text: Watch carefully, this is the Destreza of Iberia!

char_293_thorns.title: 4-star Result
char_293_thorns.text: A pristine outcome. Was this also a part of your calculations?

char_293_thorns.title: 3-star Result
char_293_thorns.text: Mission complete. Very precise and efficient command, Doctor.

char_293_thorns.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_293_thorns.text: There was an omission in your command, and my improper execution amplified this omission. We should both reflect upon this after we return.

char_293_thorns.title: Operation Failure
char_293_thorns.text: Considering the losses of our squad, there is no better option than to retreat immediately.

char_293_thorns.title: Assigned to Facility
char_293_thorns.text: How are the protective measures here?

char_293_thorns.title: Tap
char_293_thorns.text: Shoot, the potion's going to spill.

char_293_thorns.title: Trust Tap
char_293_thorns.text: My hair? Gah... I just combed it, why's it messed up again?

char_293_thorns.title: Title
char_293_thorns.text: Arknights.

char_293_thorns.title: Greeting
char_293_thorns.text: You seem tired. Should I help wake you up, Doctor?

char_218_cuttle.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_218_cuttle.text: I hope you're not a pain to deal with like Monica, Doctor.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Monica has a strange taste in just about everything. For example, when selecting her code name, her alternatives were all weird things like Wiseman or Baker. At least Incandescence is somewhat normal-sounding.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk 2
char_218_cuttle.text: That Skadi and Spectre, those friends from the same race, when I see those two, it's almost as if... I don't know exactly how to describe it, but it's kind of like that love at first sight from those fairy tales? No way, huh. If that was the case, maybe I should get dressed up...

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk 3
char_218_cuttle.text: To be honest, I wasn't really interested in coming to Rhodes Island at first. After all, Monica was the one you hired, and I'm just her bodyguard. But after she left, I ended up unemployed and finding new work is a pain in the ass, so I decided to take my chances.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Monica and I lived together when we were in Iberia. It was a real hassle taking care of someone like that with no semblance of regularity in her life. But that's just how things are. I don't get along with my family, and I have nowhere else to go. So she just took me in.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_218_cuttle.text: Because of the way my weapon looks, I often got visits from the Tribunal. They disassembled it, saw its structure, and then chewed me out. Though I know it gives them the wrong idea, but that's not really my problem. They get used to it after a while, as long as I don't go around scaring people with it. Heheh.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Doctor, Rhodes Island doesn't have any restrictions on their operators making friends, right? ...No, um, I just wanted to make friends with those Laterano folks. I've always loved Laterano's guns ever since I was little, so I tried to emulate one when I made this gun.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_218_cuttle.text: Speaking of which, the old hag once told me that I got myself involved in something when I was little, though I was too young to remember anything at that time. She also doesn't want to tell me anything. In any case, my life's pretty normal now, so it must not have been a huge deal.

char_218_cuttle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_218_cuttle.text: Doctor, you really amaze me at times. Just dealing with Monica already takes everything out of me, and yet you have to take care of so many operators... In any case, let me know if you ever have any difficulties. I have some experience looking after people.

char_218_cuttle.title: Idle
char_218_cuttle.text: Your work-rest balance is all out of whack, just like Monica. *sigh*...Blanket, blanket...

char_218_cuttle.title: Onboard
char_218_cuttle.text: I used to be Monica's... Err, I guess I should call her Incandescence now... Anyway, I used to be her bodyguard. She finally found herself a proper job now, so I'm free to do other stuff. Anyway, pleased to meet you.

char_218_cuttle.title: Watching Battle Record
char_218_cuttle.text: So this is how the pros do things...

char_218_cuttle.title: Promotion 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Before I came here, I thought being a security guard at a pharmaceutical company would be pretty chill. If I didn't make the cut, I could've been doing janitorial work or something. Not going to lie, I'm starting to regret that a bit now.

char_218_cuttle.title: Promotion 2
char_218_cuttle.text: To be honest, I never thought I'd be able to achieve something like this... I never really gave it much thought before, but the feeling of getting stronger isn't half bad. Thanks, Doctor.

char_218_cuttle.title: Added to Squad
char_218_cuttle.text: Time for the mission? Got it.

char_218_cuttle.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_218_cuttle.text: I'm leading? Mm... I'll try my best.

char_218_cuttle.title: Depart
char_218_cuttle.text: Hopefully we don't run into any trouble.

char_218_cuttle.title: Begin Operation
char_218_cuttle.text: Ugh, here we go again.

char_218_cuttle.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Ready to move.

char_218_cuttle.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_218_cuttle.text: *sigh* I'd like to listen to some music.

char_218_cuttle.title: Deployment 1
char_218_cuttle.text: The enemy doesn't seem to have noticed yet.

char_218_cuttle.title: Deployment 2
char_218_cuttle.text: The visibility's pretty good here.

char_218_cuttle.title: In Battle 1
char_218_cuttle.text: Focus...

char_218_cuttle.title: In Battle 2
char_218_cuttle.text: Hello. And goodbye.

char_218_cuttle.title: In Battle 3
char_218_cuttle.text: That person's pretty fashionable...

char_218_cuttle.title: In Battle 4
char_218_cuttle.text: There's a lot of 'em. What a pain.

char_218_cuttle.title: 4-star Result
char_218_cuttle.text: Doctor, want some candy? You should relax a bit. I'm pretty tired too.

char_218_cuttle.title: 3-star Result
char_218_cuttle.text: I'll double-check to see if we missed anything.

char_218_cuttle.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_218_cuttle.text: Good enough? All right. I don't want to deal with that annoying stuff either.

char_218_cuttle.title: Operation Failure
char_218_cuttle.text: Let's go, Doctor. I've secured the retreat route.

char_218_cuttle.title: Assigned to Facility
char_218_cuttle.text: Guess I'll take a look around first.

char_218_cuttle.title: Tap
char_218_cuttle.text: Hey...

char_218_cuttle.title: Trust Tap
char_218_cuttle.text: Doctor, is there anything I can help with?

char_218_cuttle.title: Title
char_218_cuttle.text: Arknights.

char_218_cuttle.title: Greeting
char_218_cuttle.text: Doctor, want some candy?

char_272_strong.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_272_strong.text: Need a midnight snack, Boss?

char_272_strong.title: Talk 1
char_272_strong.text: Here you go, Boss. And this. You mentioned it before... Everyone says I have a good memory, but I don't know.

char_272_strong.title: Talk 2
char_272_strong.text: When I'm off, I practice cooking... Not just seafood. What do you like to eat, Boss?

char_272_strong.title: Talk 3
char_272_strong.text: ...Boss, is it usually on me to find something to talk about?

char_272_strong.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_272_strong.text: Boss, if you ever want to see a Lungmen night market, I can take you. It's fun, but not exactly safe.

char_272_strong.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_272_strong.text: Boss Lady Kal'tsit gave me permission to use Rhodes Island's special channels to get some new stuff. Any requests, Boss?

char_272_strong.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_272_strong.text: I had Officer Hoshiguma on me for a while, for a couple of reasons... But I know she was just looking out for me, same as the neighborhood aunties and uncles.

char_272_strong.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_272_strong.text: I've been told that with my looks, plus my knife skills, I was born to be evil. I didn't like that, but what could I do...? After coming to Rhodes Island, I realized I should just do what makes me happy.

char_272_strong.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_272_strong.text: Boss, do you think there's any way to put my memory to good use...? I never thought about it before, but it would be nice if I could help.

char_272_strong.title: Idle
char_272_strong.text: Bo... Oh, you're asleep. I'll just keep reading.

char_272_strong.title: Onboard
char_272_strong.text: Hey, Boss. I'm Jaye. Officer Hoshiguma said I'd be better off working here, so here I am. I know seafood, I can cook, and I'm pretty good with a knife. I think I can help.

char_272_strong.title: Watching Battle Record
char_272_strong.text: Huh, so cooking and warfare are pretty much the same.

char_272_strong.title: Promotion 1
char_272_strong.text: Boss, does this mean I can spread out a bit more?

char_272_strong.title: Promotion 2
char_272_strong.text: Boss, I figured it out. If you just treat the enemy as food, this battle thing is a lot easier.

char_272_strong.title: Added to Squad
char_272_strong.text: Oh, I forgot to close up...

char_272_strong.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_272_strong.text: I know how to lead a fishing crew.

char_272_strong.title: Depart
char_272_strong.text: ...Oh? We're going?

char_272_strong.title: Begin Operation
char_272_strong.text: That's a lot.

char_272_strong.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_272_strong.text: Yeah, what?

char_272_strong.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_272_strong.text: Here.

char_272_strong.title: Deployment 1
char_272_strong.text: I'll try.

char_272_strong.title: Deployment 2
char_272_strong.text: Ughh...

char_272_strong.title: In Battle 1
char_272_strong.text: Scale.

char_272_strong.title: In Battle 2
char_272_strong.text: Gut.

char_272_strong.title: In Battle 3
char_272_strong.text: Clean.

char_272_strong.title: In Battle 4
char_272_strong.text: Slice.

char_272_strong.title: 4-star Result
char_272_strong.text: Boss, did we just do something special?

char_272_strong.title: 3-star Result
char_272_strong.text: Boss, is it... over?

char_272_strong.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_272_strong.text: Boss, should we go after them?

char_272_strong.title: Operation Failure
char_272_strong.text: Boss, I think we should probably run.

char_272_strong.title: Assigned to Facility
char_272_strong.text: I don't know if there's a suitable place to set up my stall...

char_272_strong.title: Tap
char_272_strong.text: Hm?

char_272_strong.title: Trust Tap
char_272_strong.text: Boss, I don't know if you have any vices...

char_272_strong.title: Title
char_272_strong.text: Arknights.

char_272_strong.title: Greeting
char_272_strong.text: Hey Boss, the weather's not bad today.

char_366_acdrop.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_366_acdrop.text: No problem, Doctor. I've got your back.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk 1
char_366_acdrop.text: How do I aim while I'm skating? It's real simple, want me to show you? Here, put your hand on mine.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk 2
char_366_acdrop.text: Way back when, I, like a lot of my friends, took pride in being different. But after I became infected, I realized that alone wasn't cool. Life isn't something that you should let a little bit of Originium dust control, you gotta take charge yourself.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk 3
char_366_acdrop.text: An old cop taught me how to shoot with a crossbow, and his daughter taught me how to skate. As for how to put the two together... that's called being self-taught.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_366_acdrop.text: Don't get me wrong, skateboarding is just one of my hobbies... and the first way I had to really find myself. The real exciting part comes after that though, wanna hear?

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_366_acdrop.text: Why'd I want to become a combat operator...? Doctor, what do you think is most important for us giggling and laughing 'street gangsters?' Of course it's freedom. I'm willing to fight for freedom, so that's why I'm fighting for Rhodes Island.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_366_acdrop.text: I have a lot of regrets about becoming Infected, such as the graffiti mural at the park that I left half-finished. Also, I can't eat any more of that old cop's secret-formula onion rings, huh? That's about it.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_366_acdrop.text: I came to Rhodes Island with the mindset of getting my illness treated. Thought it'd be some stuffy place that reeked of disinfectant where everyone would be confined to their rooms... But man, I was surprised to find out, even though tagging isn't allowed inside the ship and all, that Ethan guy... Actually, nevermind.

char_366_acdrop.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_366_acdrop.text: I found a way to express myself through donut hamburger combo meals, skateboarding, and hip-hop competitions. How 'bout you, Doctor? If you get burnt out, you should come kick it with me and Vigna. We'll just... hang out. Hanging out is in our DNA. Gotta respect it.

char_366_acdrop.title: Idle
char_366_acdrop.text: If you're tired, just go rest. I'll be here.

char_366_acdrop.title: Onboard
char_366_acdrop.text: Aciddrop, Operator. This skateboard here is a piece of registered equipment, yeah. If you have any problems, just give me a holler.

char_366_acdrop.title: Watching Battle Record
char_366_acdrop.text: Damn, that's cool.

char_366_acdrop.title: Promotion 1
char_366_acdrop.text: A promotion, huh? Thanks. The last time this happened was when I just won the Crab Cup, huh?

char_366_acdrop.title: Promotion 2
char_366_acdrop.text: That old geezer originally taught me to use a crossbow so I could protect myself from the chaos on the streets. Who would've thought that one day, I'd be using it to protect the freedom of the Infected?

char_366_acdrop.title: Added to Squad
char_366_acdrop.text: You got it.

char_366_acdrop.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_366_acdrop.text: Teamwork's an important part of scoring as well.

char_366_acdrop.title: Depart
char_366_acdrop.text: Let's go.

char_366_acdrop.title: Begin Operation
char_366_acdrop.text: Enemy sighted.

char_366_acdrop.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_366_acdrop.text: I'm right here.

char_366_acdrop.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_366_acdrop.text: C'mon, how do I deal with these guys?

char_366_acdrop.title: Deployment 1
char_366_acdrop.text: Now this is some exciting stuff.

char_366_acdrop.title: Deployment 2
char_366_acdrop.text: That's some sweet terrain.

char_366_acdrop.title: In Battle 1
char_366_acdrop.text: Jump!

char_366_acdrop.title: In Battle 2
char_366_acdrop.text: Time to show off a bit.

char_366_acdrop.title: In Battle 3
char_366_acdrop.text: I'm over here~

char_366_acdrop.title: In Battle 4
char_366_acdrop.text: Kickflip, then kick ass.

char_366_acdrop.title: 4-star Result
char_366_acdrop.text: Good work out there, Doctor... Oh, can you come with me to get a couple screws switched out after we get back?

char_366_acdrop.title: 3-star Result
char_366_acdrop.text: The moment when you overcome a challenge is always the best feeling, right?

char_366_acdrop.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_366_acdrop.text: Should we chase after 'em? If you ask me, I can still catch up.

char_366_acdrop.title: Operation Failure
char_366_acdrop.text: Ugh... Can't believe I messed up such an amateur move...

char_366_acdrop.title: Assigned to Facility
char_366_acdrop.text: This bit of wall here looks pretty suitable... Uh, I didn't say anything.

char_366_acdrop.title: Tap
char_366_acdrop.text: Wahh!

char_366_acdrop.title: Trust Tap
char_366_acdrop.text: Wanna head down to the canteen together? If I don't make any mistakes on this trip, promise to treat me to some juice.

char_366_acdrop.title: Title
char_366_acdrop.text: Arknights.

char_366_acdrop.title: Greeting
char_366_acdrop.text: Hey, Doctor.

char_411_tomimi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_411_tomimi.text: Gavial doesn't know how to do this kind of work, and nobody in the tribe thought to do this stuff either. So, that's why I'll do a little bit when I have the time.

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk 1
char_411_tomimi.text: If there's no trainee nurse at the Medical Department, I can give it a try. I have some basic nursing knowledge.

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk 2
char_411_tomimi.text: Doctor, the pen seems to be out of ink. Ah, wait, please don't throw that out! If it's not too much to ask, um, could I hang onto that?

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk 3
char_411_tomimi.text: Rhodes Island can't dig underground? Are there no treasures underground? All the precious things are locked inside the rooms? That's too bad...

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_411_tomimi.text: My tail got longer again. If it keeps getting longer like this, other people will really start to reject me. Ugh... so upsetting.

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_411_tomimi.text: A big tail is something you're born with. Being strong and cool are things you're born with. Being smart is also something you're born with. Since we can't choose how we're born, let's just live life and embrace what makes us unique. Um, of course, if you can help me out every now and then, Doctor... that would be best.

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_411_tomimi.text: It's understandable that Gavial would skip work, but why would she skip a meal? Is there something bothering her to the point that it's sending her into hiding? No one seems to have noticed yet. I'm the only one who can save her! Ah, Doctor, there you are. Can you help me with something?

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_411_tomimi.text: Are you sure you want to see? I have a whole lot of stuff in my backpack. All right, I also haven't checked through everything in quite some time either. Um, let's take a look: a piece of amber wrapped in a leaf, a loose fang? A black crystal with a speck of blood... and a stack of signatures?! Doctor, that's as far as you can go! Stop right there!

char_411_tomimi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_411_tomimi.text: Someone who steals your gaze, making you not want to close your eyelids until the flames have burned your eyes from their sockets. You know, Gavial is the kind of person who shines just like this. Oh, by the way, I read that previous description in a book and thought it sounded pretty neat, so I memorized it so I could use it myself.

char_411_tomimi.title: Idle
char_411_tomimi.text: Here's a dreamcatcher. I'll leave it over here. I hope you'll be able to have pure and peaceful dreams.

char_411_tomimi.title: Onboard
char_411_tomimi.text: Hello, Doctor. Um, I'm not here to make trouble. I'm, uh, yeah. Here to study. Right, study. Since Gavial is over here, it wouldn't make sense for me to stay back home alone, right?

char_411_tomimi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_411_tomimi.text: I, I think it'd be better to directly practice on the battlefield, right?

char_411_tomimi.title: Promotion 1
char_411_tomimi.text: Thank you for giving me such a pretty badge, Doctor. Huh? Oh, a promotion badge? Ah, um, uhhh... Am I really qualified to have this?

char_411_tomimi.title: Promotion 2
char_411_tomimi.text: I'll be worthy of this flag one day, I swear it.

char_411_tomimi.title: Added to Squad
char_411_tomimi.text: Let me try learning some of your techniques. It'd be great if I could pick them up.

char_411_tomimi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_411_tomimi.text: You're leaving it to me? Really?

char_411_tomimi.title: Depart
char_411_tomimi.text: Let's go. Fight. Mm, we're going to beat them up.

char_411_tomimi.title: Begin Operation
char_411_tomimi.text: Wait, I'm not ready yet!

char_411_tomimi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_411_tomimi.text: You didn't see me, you didn't see me...

char_411_tomimi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_411_tomimi.text: Wanna try?

char_411_tomimi.title: Deployment 1
char_411_tomimi.text: I, I'm going!

char_411_tomimi.title: Deployment 2
char_411_tomimi.text: Anyone who needs a good beating, step forward!

char_411_tomimi.title: In Battle 1
char_411_tomimi.text: Cheer up!

char_411_tomimi.title: In Battle 2
char_411_tomimi.text: Hold on a bit longer, hold on a bit longer!

char_411_tomimi.title: In Battle 3
char_411_tomimi.text: Haah!

char_411_tomimi.title: In Battle 4
char_411_tomimi.text: Who's next!

char_411_tomimi.title: 4-star Result
char_411_tomimi.text: You used to smack me around like that before, Doctor.

char_411_tomimi.title: 3-star Result
char_411_tomimi.text: We won.

char_411_tomimi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_411_tomimi.text: Ugh, my back's sore. Need to take a break.

char_411_tomimi.title: Operation Failure
char_411_tomimi.text: I... I'm sorry...

char_411_tomimi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_411_tomimi.text: Ah, um, you can't throw that away yet. Please give it to me, I'll take care of it myself.

char_411_tomimi.title: Tap
char_411_tomimi.text: M-my tail...

char_411_tomimi.title: Trust Tap
char_411_tomimi.text: Want to try Sargon's local barbecue? I'll do all the barbecuing, so you can just enjoy the food.

char_411_tomimi.title: Title
char_411_tomimi.text: Arknights.

char_411_tomimi.title: Greeting
char_411_tomimi.text: Ugh... Doctor...

char_415_flint.title: Appointed as Assistant
