char_415_flint.text: Handling files? Alright, then. Teach me how. Right. Sort them first. Like this? Then put them in order. By chronological... uh. Paper got torn... S-sorry. I didn't mean to.

char_415_flint.title: Talk 1
char_415_flint.text: Some of the people here. Don't you think they're a little too tall? ...No, I don't care. Not actually. How tall you are and how strong you are don't relate. I just need to bring every last one of them down.

char_415_flint.title: Talk 2
char_415_flint.text: What's my tribe gonna do now that I'm gone? What a dumb question that is. See who has the bigger fists. Pick a new leader that way and just carry on. That's it.

char_415_flint.title: Talk 3
char_415_flint.text: I heard a lot about Gavial. Like how she can crush a rock with her abs. Tear a raging beast apart with one hand. Is she actually that strong? Stronger than Chief Blaze? Warfarin said if I get treatment from Gavial, I can learn firsthand how strong she is... huh? Doctor, why are you stopping me?

char_415_flint.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_415_flint.text: I came here so I could get stronger, and that hasn't changed. It's not just Chief Blaze and Gavial. There's a lotta people worthy enough for me to challenge here... what? You think I look happy? Well, that's not wrong. I don't hate it, being here.

char_415_flint.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_415_flint.text: Everyone in Rhodes Island. Don't they all think too much? You too, Doctor. You have to think about so much every day. You get tired, right. You don't? You have to do it? ...I guess that's true. There's a lotta stuff only you know how to sort out. No other way. Yeah. Then keep it up. Shout any time if you ever need me.

char_415_flint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_415_flint.text: Doctor, give me a hand. Up there. The flower basket up there. Help me get it down. What? You can't reach either? This sucks... Okay. What if I lift you up? Why don't we try that?

char_415_flint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_415_flint.text: Zumama's going on the same mission as me this time? Don't worry. I'm not gonna start hitting her out of nowhere. If we wanna settle a score, we've got all the opportunities we want. Also, I mean, if we start fighting, that makes things hard for you, right? Yeah. I don't really want to do that to you.

char_415_flint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_415_flint.text: This flower. Don't you think it's pretty? I grew this one myself. Hey, what makes you so surprised? I'm not the kind of battle lunatic who only cares about getting stronger. Having a hobby or two is completely normal, right. Huh? You like it too? Then I'll give you this one. Yeah. Not bad. Suits you well.

char_415_flint.title: Idle
char_415_flint.text: Doctor, I picked a flower and... huh? Fell asleep? Heh, you're real laid-back. The flower... I'll just put it on your head. Yeah, that looks pretty good.

char_415_flint.title: Onboard
char_415_flint.text: We meet again, huh. I'm the tallest, strongest warrior of my tribe, Flint. I hear you've got a lot of strong people around here? Great. I'll challenge them one by one. Oh, right. Do you know where I can find Chief Blaze?

char_415_flint.title: Watching Battle Record
char_415_flint.text: Not bad. This technique's not bad! Doctor, I wanna challenge them! Where can I find where this warrior is?

char_415_flint.title: Promotion 1
char_415_flint.text: Promotion? Sure, do whatever you want. Anyway, I can keep fighting like I was already, right?

char_415_flint.title: Promotion 2
char_415_flint.text: Doctor, you. You've been thinking too much. Any enemies, we can hit them away with our fists! C'mon. Relax a little. You need to loosen up when it's time to take a rest. Wanna come over here and lie down with me?

char_415_flint.title: Added to Squad
char_415_flint.text: Got it. Shout for me when it's time to go.

char_415_flint.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_415_flint.text: No problem. Leave it to me.

char_415_flint.title: Depart
char_415_flint.text: We're going. Each of you, watch your cover. Don't leave any signs.

char_415_flint.title: Begin Operation
char_415_flint.text: Here comes the prey.

char_415_flint.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_415_flint.text: On it.

char_415_flint.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_415_flint.text: Sure.

char_415_flint.title: Deployment 1
char_415_flint.text: One round, let's go.

char_415_flint.title: Deployment 2
char_415_flint.text: Wanna come one by one? Or all at once?

char_415_flint.title: In Battle 1
char_415_flint.text: Heh. Fine by me!

char_415_flint.title: In Battle 2
char_415_flint.text: How's this fist for you!

char_415_flint.title: In Battle 3
char_415_flint.text: The look in all your eyes. Screw that.

char_415_flint.title: In Battle 4
char_415_flint.text: Don't look down on me!

char_415_flint.title: 4-star Result
char_415_flint.text: You can find victory even without your fists? Heh. I guess that's your style...

char_415_flint.title: 3-star Result
char_415_flint.text: Good job. Didn't know it. You've got something going up there.

char_415_flint.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_415_flint.text: Tch. If the small fry wanna escape, let 'em. They're not worth chasing.

char_415_flint.title: Operation Failure
char_415_flint.text: Don't blame yourself. I'm just still not strong enough.

char_415_flint.title: Assigned to Facility
char_415_flint.text: Hey. Can I hang a sandbag or two in my room?

char_415_flint.title: Tap
char_415_flint.text: Guh!

char_415_flint.title: Trust Tap
char_415_flint.text: Huh? What are you doing squatting down over here? You want me to pat your head?

char_415_flint.title: Title
char_415_flint.text: Arknights.

char_415_flint.title: Greeting
char_415_flint.text: Let's pull it together. Anything you need me to help with today?

char_416_zumama.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_416_zumama.text: Anything you need help with, Boss? Good.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk 1
char_416_zumama.text: We aren't allowed to sleep on the ground here? I'll put up a tent in the hallway, then... that won't do either? Why not? At my tribe, we'd just sleep wherever we were when we got tired.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk 2
char_416_zumama.text: Doctor, why was my application to room with Lancet-2 rejected? Because she's a robot? You're mistaken. The two of us are sisters now. She's my big sister, and I'm her little sister.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk 3
char_416_zumama.text: Doctor, are medics outside always like Gavial? When she gives me my Oripathy checkups, it always feels like she's just trying to beat me up... That's why we always end up fighting each other as soon as my tolerance runs out.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_416_zumama.text: The Big Priest? Yeah, he didn't come with me, but he did say he'd come visit from time to time. Speaking of which, does he even know where Rhodes Island is...?

char_416_zumama.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_416_zumama.text: Before, my dream was to build a gigantic robot like the nomadic cities. Now, my dream is not only to build a gigantic robot like the nomadic cities, but one that can talk too. Master Closure has already promised to teach me the best of the best about machineries.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_416_zumama.text: ...Oh, I get it now. So, just like 'Great Chieftain', 'Doctor' is a title we use to honor people who are knowledgeable. So that means everyone will start calling me Dr. Zumama once I learn everything I can here, right? Oh, they won't?

char_416_zumama.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_416_zumama.text: Doctor, I was hoping you could accompany me back to Sargon when you have time to teach me how to go about all sorts of things there. But you look busy... In that case, may I ask Lancet-2 to accompany me? Otherwise, Master Closure is fine.

char_416_zumama.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_416_zumama.text: People outside are always worried about things that don't matter and fighting over them. It's so strange. You too, Doctor. You always look like you're giving yourself a hard time over everything. Here, take this wrench. Let's build some machines together. I'm sure you'll enjoy seeing a machine in the works getting bigger and greater bit by bit.

char_416_zumama.title: Idle
char_416_zumama.text: I'm starting to get a bit tired myself, watching the Doctor sleeping... *yawn*...

char_416_zumama.title: Onboard
char_416_zumama.text: I passed all the exams, so that means I can stay here, right? I want to learn how to build a talking robot like Lancet-2... Oh, codename? My name is Zumama. Can't I use that as my codename?

char_416_zumama.title: Watching Battle Record
char_416_zumama.text: To think there's someone who could go up against Gavial on an equal footing...

char_416_zumama.title: Promotion 1
char_416_zumama.text: A promotion? Is that something like going from a fighter to a warrior? ...In that case, we must celebrate. I think I'll have a barbeque with Lancet-2 on the bridge tonight.

char_416_zumama.title: Promotion 2
char_416_zumama.text: The High Priest told me before it's a vast, big world out here. He sounded kind of heartbroken when he said that. I didn't understand why at the time, but I'm starting to understand after having spent so much time here. The world being so vast, might not necessarily be a good thing.

char_416_zumama.title: Added to Squad
char_416_zumama.text: Is it time to hunt?

char_416_zumama.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_416_zumama.text: What are we hunting?

char_416_zumama.title: Depart
char_416_zumama.text: Are you coming too, Doctor?

char_416_zumama.title: Begin Operation
char_416_zumama.text: I just need to take care of all of them, right?

char_416_zumama.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_416_zumama.text: Ready to go anytime.

char_416_zumama.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_416_zumama.text: I'll go.

char_416_zumama.title: Deployment 1
char_416_zumama.text: It'll be even more efficient if someone who can work with me comes along.

char_416_zumama.title: Deployment 2
char_416_zumama.text: Hold the fort? Easy.

char_416_zumama.title: In Battle 1
char_416_zumama.text: You people are no match for Gavial!

char_416_zumama.title: In Battle 2
char_416_zumama.text: I'm not all that weak either!

char_416_zumama.title: In Battle 3
char_416_zumama.text: I'll give it my all no matter the prey!

char_416_zumama.title: In Battle 4
char_416_zumama.text: Got you!

char_416_zumama.title: 4-star Result
char_416_zumama.text: What a great haul!

char_416_zumama.title: 3-star Result
char_416_zumama.text: Compared to Gavial, you've still got a ways to go.

char_416_zumama.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_416_zumama.text: I'll go after them.

char_416_zumama.title: Operation Failure
char_416_zumama.text: Don't worry about it. I've lost to Gavial too many times myself. It's nothing to be ashamed of.

char_416_zumama.title: Assigned to Facility
char_416_zumama.text: Where's Lancet-2?

char_416_zumama.title: Tap
char_416_zumama.text: Yeah?

char_416_zumama.title: Trust Tap
char_416_zumama.text: What do I need to do to become as educated as the Doctor?

char_416_zumama.title: Title
char_416_zumama.text: Arknights.

char_416_zumama.title: Greeting
char_416_zumama.text: Doctor, good timing. There's something I wanted to ask you.

char_271_spikes.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_271_spikes.text: The files are in order. Is that all we have to do today? Why don't we talk about the operation the other day, Professor?

char_271_spikes.title: Talk 1
char_271_spikes.text: Try not to come too close when I use Arts, okay? Not moving out of the way? Okay, if you insist.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk 2
char_271_spikes.text: Why do I call you 'Professor', you ask? Because I'm actually learning quite a lot from you. The placement of personnel on the battlefield, how to command, among other things... What more reason do we need?

char_271_spikes.title: Talk 3
char_271_spikes.text: Here, you can have this. I think it's some sort of candy? No need to thank me. I got it from someone else anyway, and I don't really like these things very much.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_271_spikes.text: You don't see Sankta using staves much? The guys who shoot up everything day and night and solve all their problems with violence must have given you a bad impression. Not all Sankta use guns as their weapons. At the very least, I don't like them.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_271_spikes.text: Rather than sharing a single secret, we should exchange our secrets with each other. That's how you build a strong, equal relationship. So if you want to learn any of my secrets, you better come up with something just as saucy for me, Professor.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_271_spikes.text: There are no Infected in Laterano. Once a Sankta contracts Oripathy, he is immediately exiled. But even if you become Infected, no matter where you are, you still enjoy all kinds of privilege as a Laterano... You just don't get to set foot in your homeland again, that's all.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_271_spikes.text: My parents' will left me with quite a bit of trouble, and it was really a hassle to get it taken care of. If it wasn't for that uptight executor making things difficult for me, it all could've been much easier... Oh, whatever, it still went according to plan.

char_271_spikes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_271_spikes.text: I want to capture a few people to try out some new Arts in our next operation. I can't...? Alright, fine. It's a shame, but if that's what you say, Professor, maybe some other time, then.  Eh? Not this time, and not ever? Geez, don't be so uptight.

char_271_spikes.title: Idle
char_271_spikes.text: Are you asleep? People who fall asleep at work get their faces drawn on, you know...? Just kidding, I know you're awake.

char_271_spikes.title: Onboard
char_271_spikes.text: Codename Arene, officially joining today, it seems. So you are the Doctor... I hope we'll get along, Professor {@nickname}.

char_271_spikes.title: Watching Battle Record
char_271_spikes.text: Studying tactics? Sounds kinda interesting.

char_271_spikes.title: Promotion 1
char_271_spikes.text: This doesn't seem all that different than before. Or are you going to teach me some secret strategies you have, Professor?

char_271_spikes.title: Promotion 2
char_271_spikes.text: Doctor, you aren't testing me, are you? Alright then, I'm just getting in the mood. Okay, starting right now, whatever that happens is going to be our own little secret.

char_271_spikes.title: Added to Squad
char_271_spikes.text: Okay, I'll follow your orders.

char_271_spikes.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_271_spikes.text: So actual combat for my next assignment? Okay, let me think about the placement...

char_271_spikes.title: Depart
char_271_spikes.text: As long as we achieve our goals, it doesn't matter if the process of getting there is a little rough, huh?

char_271_spikes.title: Begin Operation
char_271_spikes.text: Welcome. I'll be waiting.

char_271_spikes.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_271_spikes.text: My turn?

char_271_spikes.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_271_spikes.text: No need to rush.

char_271_spikes.title: Deployment 1
char_271_spikes.text: Not a bad position.

char_271_spikes.title: Deployment 2
char_271_spikes.text: I can do whatever I want, right?

char_271_spikes.title: In Battle 1
char_271_spikes.text: I've given my warning.

char_271_spikes.title: In Battle 2
char_271_spikes.text: Does it hurt?

char_271_spikes.title: In Battle 3
char_271_spikes.text: Tell me. How are you feeling right now?

char_271_spikes.title: In Battle 4
char_271_spikes.text: That's not a bad scream at all.

char_271_spikes.title: 4-star Result
char_271_spikes.text: That went far better than I expected. I shouldn't have thought so little of you.

char_271_spikes.title: 3-star Result
char_271_spikes.text: That was just as expected. No surprises, even a little boring.

char_271_spikes.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_271_spikes.text: A few of them slipped past. Should I go after them? Strategically speaking, I don't recommend it.

char_271_spikes.title: Operation Failure
char_271_spikes.text: This is quite the bad situation... I shouldn't have to tell you what the appropriate course of action is now, right?

char_271_spikes.title: Assigned to Facility
char_271_spikes.text: Isn't there a closer room to the Professor's?

char_271_spikes.title: Tap
char_271_spikes.text: Hmm?

char_271_spikes.title: Trust Tap
char_271_spikes.text: We have some time to spare. Why don't we review our last mission, Professor?

char_271_spikes.title: Title
char_271_spikes.text: Arknights.

char_271_spikes.title: Greeting
char_271_spikes.text: You look tired. It's okay if you sleep a little longer, Professor.

char_365_aprl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, anything I can help with?

char_365_aprl.title: Talk 1
char_365_aprl.text: Ahhh... A hot shower every day is amazing... After I got infected and had to move, it was really hard for me to find a hot shower. And the food here is so clean. Oh, I love Rhodes Island~

char_365_aprl.title: Talk 2
char_365_aprl.text: 'April'? 'April' is a song about spring. The lyrics are about the feeling of lying on the grass on a warm spring day, looking up at the sky and thinking about stuff. You wanna hear it? I'm sure you'll love it~

char_365_aprl.title: Talk 3
char_365_aprl.text: Hey, where's my lip gloss...? Oh, I remember. I lent it to Rope. Hm? Oh, because I was gonna teach her to do makeup. She's got a good foundation, so she'll be super cute after some sprucing up.

char_365_aprl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_365_aprl.text: Back in Rim Billiton, the company promised a pension for the Infected, but you only get scraps in the end, and there's no jobs... Good thing I decided to try Rhodes Island as soon as I saw the ad. You treat me like a human being here.

char_365_aprl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_365_aprl.text: After I got infected, people started asking me like 'what's an Infected wearing such bright colors for' and 'what's an Infected listening to music for'... I always just tell them: 'Because I wanna.'

char_365_aprl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_365_aprl.text: Back in Rim Billiton, I was a professional hunter. I had to keep animals away from the city and sometimes escort company people. But after I got Oripathy, I lost my job and had to hunt on my own for a living. It was real rough...

char_365_aprl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_365_aprl.text: My parents died in a mining accident when I was little, and I grew up on a company pension, so I was always real grateful to the company. I figured getting Oripathy was my own dumb fault... But that's not really what happened, is it, Doctor?

char_365_aprl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_365_aprl.text: Doing something for the Infected... I never thought about it before. I mean, it's hard enough to keep yourself alive. But after coming to Rhodes Island, I decided I wanted to try to do something not just for myself, but for everyone who suffers like me.

char_365_aprl.title: Idle
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, if you wanna nap, I can lend you my earplugs.

char_365_aprl.title: Onboard
char_365_aprl.text: Rhodes Island has such great stuff, and they treat you so good... Oh, sorry, Doctor, I'm just a little shocked. My codename is April. Yeah, it's the name of my favorite song.

char_365_aprl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_365_aprl.text: The pros are amazing...

char_365_aprl.title: Promotion 1
char_365_aprl.text: Huh? A raise...? Oh, it's not that I'm disappointed, I'm thrilled. It's just been a long, long time since anyone told me I was doing a good job.

char_365_aprl.title: Promotion 2
char_365_aprl.text: Back in Rim Billiton, I liked to sit on the roof and listen to my music while I watched the whole city go by. Now, I can see even more from the bridge of Rhodes Island. There was a silver lining to me getting sick, huh, Doctor?

char_365_aprl.title: Added to Squad
char_365_aprl.text: Heyo~

char_365_aprl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_365_aprl.text: Come with me, everybody!

char_365_aprl.title: Depart
char_365_aprl.text: Here we go!

char_365_aprl.title: Begin Operation
char_365_aprl.text: Earphones in, let's get started~

char_365_aprl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_365_aprl.text: My bow is ready~

char_365_aprl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_365_aprl.text: Who's the target?

char_365_aprl.title: Deployment 1
char_365_aprl.text: Nice visibility~

char_365_aprl.title: Deployment 2
char_365_aprl.text: Leave it to me~

char_365_aprl.title: In Battle 1
char_365_aprl.text: Let's get some fast music going.

char_365_aprl.title: In Battle 2
char_365_aprl.text: Now this is a good rhythm!

char_365_aprl.title: In Battle 3
char_365_aprl.text: I've got a lock on you~

char_365_aprl.title: In Battle 4
char_365_aprl.text: This one won't miss!

char_365_aprl.title: 4-star Result
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, how would you like to relax with some music?

char_365_aprl.title: 3-star Result
char_365_aprl.text: Didn't miss a single one~

char_365_aprl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, a few got away, should we chase them?

char_365_aprl.title: Operation Failure
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, I'll cover you!

char_365_aprl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_365_aprl.text: I've been around Rhodes Island a couple times and I think it's really big.

char_365_aprl.title: Tap
char_365_aprl.text: Huh?

char_365_aprl.title: Trust Tap
char_365_aprl.text: The Doctor should be in the office, right?

char_365_aprl.title: Title
char_365_aprl.text: Arknights.

char_365_aprl.title: Greeting
char_365_aprl.text: Doctor, wanna hear some tunes?

char_388_mint.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_388_mint.text: Can I read any of the books here? I can read all of them? Mm-hm, mm-hm, I'll be careful! I won't mess them up!

char_388_mint.title: Talk 1
char_388_mint.text: Ah. Sorry, no. You shouldn't just carelessly touch my book. It might bite your hand. I'm actually not joking. I'm serious. Look. I even have to tie it shut like this.

char_388_mint.title: Talk 2
char_388_mint.text: Doctor, do you know where the library is? I asked someone just now, but they were talking too fast. It was hard to understand.

char_388_mint.title: Talk 3
char_388_mint.text: Skyfire, um, Skyfire, wait for me! Uwwhh, please don't walk so fast... I promise I won't run off halfway this time, I promise!

char_388_mint.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_388_mint.text: I like reading, but I like hanging out with everyone too! It makes me so happy when I can be with the people I like. Also, don't be fooled. I'm really good at sporty stuff! Especially climbing trees. I can climb super high!

char_388_mint.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_388_mint.text: I got some new inspiration after talking to Miss Eyjafjalla today! She's very well-researched on environmental geology. Thank goodness my group's research wasn't stopped because of my accident. Heheh! If I get results this time, I can reapply to the Institution to resume my studies.

char_388_mint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_388_mint.text: Skyfire is an alumna from my university. Although she skipped a year and graduated soon after I entered, there's times she's looked after me... Oh, that's right! She's also the one who introduced me to Rhodes Island so I could receive treatment.

char_388_mint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_388_mint.text: Um, are you wondering why I always follow you, Doctor? It's because when I'm near you, I feel really at ease, so I just unconsciously... Doctor, am I just annoying you... Do you want me to go away?

char_388_mint.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_388_mint.text: Doctor, this is for you. Yep, I found it on the way back with a whole lot of nice-looking stones, but then I realized I'd gotten separated from the others. Eh? The ore chunk on your desk from before? I put that there too, yes... Did you like it, Doctor?

char_388_mint.title: Idle
char_388_mint.text: Nnh... mmmmnnh... there! Ah, Doctor! Sorry! Did I wake you up? A bug landed on your head just now, and for a moment, I, um... did it hurt? I can shush it better!

char_388_mint.title: Onboard
char_388_mint.text: Thank you for helping me move all these books! Just leave them here, please. Um, my codename is Mint. What's yours? ...Huh? Doctor? Wait, so you're the Doctor Skyfire was telling me about?

char_388_mint.title: Watching Battle Record
char_388_mint.text: Wow... incredible! Everyone's so incredible!

char_388_mint.title: Promotion 1
char_388_mint.text: Are there any rewards for promotion? Can I borrow even more books than before?

char_388_mint.title: Promotion 2
char_388_mint.text: Doctor, come sit down here. How is it? The sun feels really nice, right? Eheheh. This is my secret base. I love it here more than anywhere. Don't tell anyone else about it, okay?

char_388_mint.title: Added to Squad
char_388_mint.text: Got it. Are you coming with us, Doctor?

char_388_mint.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_388_mint.text: Eh? Me, the leader?

char_388_mint.title: Depart
char_388_mint.text: We're off.

char_388_mint.title: Begin Operation
char_388_mint.text: Are those our enemies, then?

char_388_mint.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_388_mint.text: Whuh? What is it? I'm listening, I'm listening!

char_388_mint.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_388_mint.text: Yep! Leave it to me.

char_388_mint.title: Deployment 1
char_388_mint.text: And, there...

char_388_mint.title: Deployment 2
char_388_mint.text: Please don't get in our way!

char_388_mint.title: In Battle 1
char_388_mint.text: Oi!

char_388_mint.title: In Battle 2
char_388_mint.text: Please calm down a little!

char_388_mint.title: In Battle 3
char_388_mint.text: I've got you now.

char_388_mint.title: In Battle 4
char_388_mint.text: Would you like to see some of my magic?

char_388_mint.title: 4-star Result
char_388_mint.text: Everything went just like you said it would, Doctor! That was amazing...!

char_388_mint.title: 3-star Result
char_388_mint.text: Phew... it's over. We can finally head back now.

char_388_mint.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_388_mint.text: It doesn't look like any more are coming for us... This is fine for now, right?

char_388_mint.title: Operation Failure
char_388_mint.text: We can't, it's too dangerous... Doctor, you need to get away!

char_388_mint.title: Assigned to Facility
char_388_mint.text: Um, to tell the truth, I'd be alright sleeping in the library too.

char_388_mint.title: Tap
char_388_mint.text: Yah!

char_388_mint.title: Trust Tap
char_388_mint.text: Ah! Doctor, would you like to read with me? It's really comfortable sitting here.

char_388_mint.title: Title
char_388_mint.text: Arknights.

char_388_mint.title: Greeting
char_388_mint.text: So this is where you were, Doctor! Found you.

char_350_surtr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_350_surtr.text: You've failed to complete the tasks within your purview, and are now asking me for help?

char_350_surtr.title: Talk 1
char_350_surtr.text: Don't expect me to instruct others in Originium Arts. I have no interest in wasting time with plebeians.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk 2
char_350_surtr.text: I'm not here because I have to, but because I want to.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk 3
char_350_surtr.text: The people I hate most are the ones who ask too many questions. I hope you are not one of them.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_350_surtr.text: It appears that you have gained some understanding of my Arts by now. I do hope you are aware of the danger as well.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_350_surtr.text: Before I realized it, these Arts and this staff had already become my steadfast companions. I do not remember when I gained such power. Of course, I do not actually care.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_350_surtr.text: I possess all kinds of memories. I don't know from whence did they came, nor do I know which truly belong to me. To discover the source of my memories, I have been traveling back and forth, from country to country, and now I have arrived at Rhodes Island.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_350_surtr.text: There is truly nothing better than an ice-cream to calm me down when I am absorbed in chaotic memories. I always relied on ice-cream, when I was alone.

char_350_surtr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_350_surtr.text: These memories of Rhodes Island are completely different from those before. They have a sense of realism about them. For the first time, I'm able to feel that I am truly myself. All of this is thanks to you, and all of Rhodes Island. ...What? I am capable of giving thanks where it is deserved, all right?

char_350_surtr.title: Idle
char_350_surtr.text: Tch... what a waste of time.

char_350_surtr.title: Onboard
char_350_surtr.text: I am Surtr. Are you the Doctor they mentioned? I will be working at Rhodes Island, starting today. I hope that you will not bore me too much.

char_350_surtr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_350_surtr.text: That's it?

char_350_surtr.title: Promotion 1
char_350_surtr.text: Have you started to value me after witnessing my power?

char_350_surtr.title: Promotion 2
char_350_surtr.text: You value not my power, but me myself? Then I shall put in the appropriate level of effort to repay you.

char_350_surtr.title: Added to Squad
char_350_surtr.text: Am I needed now?

char_350_surtr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_350_surtr.text: I alone am enough.

char_350_surtr.title: Depart
char_350_surtr.text: Let's go.

char_350_surtr.title: Begin Operation
char_350_surtr.text: Are they the ones to be eliminated?

char_350_surtr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_350_surtr.text: Do not order me around.

char_350_surtr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_350_surtr.text: Enough, I understand.

char_350_surtr.title: Deployment 1
char_350_surtr.text: Not a bad position.

char_350_surtr.title: Deployment 2
char_350_surtr.text: I'm on it!

char_350_surtr.title: In Battle 1
char_350_surtr.text: Die!

char_350_surtr.title: In Battle 2
char_350_surtr.text: Don't even think about running!

char_350_surtr.title: In Battle 3
char_350_surtr.text: Laevatain!

char_350_surtr.title: In Battle 4
char_350_surtr.text: Foolish fools.

char_350_surtr.title: 4-star Result
char_350_surtr.text: Hmph. Piece of cake.

char_350_surtr.title: 3-star Result
char_350_surtr.text: Naturally.

char_350_surtr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_350_surtr.text: Can you not even do such a simple thing?

char_350_surtr.title: Operation Failure
char_350_surtr.text: If you can do nothing to help, just retreat! I'll handle this.

char_350_surtr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_350_surtr.text: An acceptably clean room, I suppose.

char_350_surtr.title: Tap
char_350_surtr.text: I know how to walk on my own.

char_350_surtr.title: Trust Tap
char_350_surtr.text: Silence.

char_350_surtr.title: Title
char_350_surtr.text: Arknights.

char_350_surtr.title: Greeting
char_350_surtr.text: Oh, here you are.

char_381_bubble.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_381_bubble.text: Let's see what goodies the Doctor hides in this drawer.

char_381_bubble.title: Talk 1
char_381_bubble.text: I'm probably only about as big as one of Papa's legs right now, but I'm gonna be as big as him and trample over all the bad guys! Graaagh!

char_381_bubble.title: Talk 2
char_381_bubble.text: I'm really, really sorry! I won't run in the hallways ever again!

char_381_bubble.title: Talk 3
char_381_bubble.text: Fighting is easy. I point my shield one way, and nobody can beat me. Huh? What if they get behind me? Uh oh, why didn't I think of that?

char_381_bubble.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_381_bubble.text: Gavial? Never heard of her. She's tough? And famous in Sargon? Okay, whatever. I'll see for myself how tough she is.

char_381_bubble.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_381_bubble.text: Oh, you're talking about Gavial? I'm Gavial's number one fan. See, she even signed my shield for me. That's her autograph! I think, besides Papa, pretty much nobody could take down Gavial.

char_381_bubble.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_381_bubble.text: Doctor, shhh, tell me the truth. Kay says Vulcan can hammer straight through the floor, can she? No? I knew it. That means my Papa is definitely stronger. He could bust down a Rhodes smoke stack with one punch.

char_381_bubble.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_381_bubble.text: Do I really... have to keep writing this...? Fine... 'I knocked over Lancet-2 today. I won't do it again.'

char_381_bubble.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_381_bubble.text: This is my shield. It'll be one of my greaves someday, or maybe a pauldron. Then as long as I'm standing behind you, hehe, nobody'll ever bully you.

char_381_bubble.title: Idle
char_381_bubble.text: Doctor, wake up! Somebody's here to see you.

char_381_bubble.title: Onboard
char_381_bubble.text: You're the boss of this training camp? And they call you the Doctor? Hrm... But you don't look strong... Whatever. I'm Bubble. I may be the weakest in my tribe right now, but you're gonna train me until I'm the second strongest.

char_381_bubble.title: Watching Battle Record
char_381_bubble.text: Hit 'em! Hit 'em again! What, why'd they stop. Is it over?

char_381_bubble.title: Promotion 1
char_381_bubble.text: A reward for my training? Great! I can't eat it? Grrr...

char_381_bubble.title: Promotion 2
char_381_bubble.text: I think I got a good chance of beating Kay now! Okay, lemme at her. Doctor, you come watch!

char_381_bubble.title: Added to Squad
char_381_bubble.text: Be good? I'll try.

char_381_bubble.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_381_bubble.text: I count down to one and we charge, okay?

char_381_bubble.title: Depart
char_381_bubble.text: Chaaarge!

char_381_bubble.title: Begin Operation
char_381_bubble.text: Waaar!

char_381_bubble.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_381_bubble.text: I got this.

char_381_bubble.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_381_bubble.text: Hehe.

char_381_bubble.title: Deployment 1
char_381_bubble.text: Get the bad guys!

char_381_bubble.title: Deployment 2
char_381_bubble.text: Shield up!

char_381_bubble.title: In Battle 1
char_381_bubble.text: Traaaaaample!

char_381_bubble.title: In Battle 2
char_381_bubble.text: Baaaaash!

char_381_bubble.title: In Battle 3
char_381_bubble.text: Shield striiiike!

char_381_bubble.title: In Battle 4
char_381_bubble.text: Bam!

char_381_bubble.title: 4-star Result
char_381_bubble.text: Doctor, if you're strong enough, you gotta be warrior like my Papa!

char_381_bubble.title: 3-star Result
char_381_bubble.text: What did I tell you? I'm super strong.

char_381_bubble.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_381_bubble.text: Huh? Some of them got away? Did I let them through?

char_381_bubble.title: Operation Failure
char_381_bubble.text: I can't beat them! What do I do?!

char_381_bubble.title: Assigned to Facility
char_381_bubble.text: I need a way, waaay bigger room. How can anyone live in a little place like this?

char_381_bubble.title: Tap
char_381_bubble.text: Oof. That tickles.

char_381_bubble.title: Trust Tap
char_381_bubble.text: Doctor, let's play hide-and-seek!

char_381_bubble.title: Title
char_381_bubble.text: Arknights.

char_381_bubble.title: Greeting
char_381_bubble.text: Doctor!

char_346_aosta.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_346_aosta.text: If you want me to be your assistant, is it okay if I do some craftwork here?

char_346_aosta.title: Talk 1
char_346_aosta.text: Doctor, if you like excitement, you should probably hang out in Siracusa for a while. You won't enjoy it so much after that.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk 2
char_346_aosta.text: Considering his personality, sometimes even I wonder why no one's beaten Chiave to death yet.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk 3
char_346_aosta.text: Doctor, are you interested in DIY? See, the three of us actually design and make our weapons and outfits ourselves. You could join us sometime, if you want.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_346_aosta.text: I came to realize one thing while I was cleaning up after Chiave's messes: If you want to be really strong, you aren't going to get there with just violence.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_346_aosta.text: In Siracusa, most people my age just want to join a family, but there are also a lot of people who want to live an honest life instead. Sometimes, I think those ones are the best of us all.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_346_aosta.text: (Yawn) ...Sorry, Doctor, I didn't get much sleep last night. Rhodes Island is way too safe. It's taking some time to get used to.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_346_aosta.text: Chiave, Broca, and me. The three of us are like brothers, and we've done all kinds of things together. But, sometimes, I really wonder if this really is the life for us.

char_346_aosta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_346_aosta.text: To tell you the truth, I wanted to be a public servant when I was a kid. Up until my dad made me pick up a weapon for the first time, that is. I don't hate drifting around with the two of them, but I always felt like there was something I was missing, and I know what it is now. I wanted to become someone as strong-willed as you, Doctor.

char_346_aosta.title: Idle
char_346_aosta.text: Doctor... you're asleep? Taking it easy, aren't we?

char_346_aosta.title: Onboard
char_346_aosta.text: Hello, Doctor. I'm Aosta. It's thanks to you that the three of us are still alive. If you don't mind, please let us work here for the time being.

char_346_aosta.title: Watching Battle Record
char_346_aosta.text: ...Looks like it's just luck that the three of us only managed to survive this long.

char_346_aosta.title: Promotion 1
char_346_aosta.text: Doctor, is Rhodes Island really a pharmaceutical company? I've got the feeling that we might just be able to take over a Siracusan city if everyone here put themselves to it.

char_346_aosta.title: Promotion 2
char_346_aosta.text: I think I might just be able to live the life I've always wanted at Rhodes Island... Doctor, do I have permission to open a DIY shop here?

char_346_aosta.title: Added to Squad
char_346_aosta.text: I hope this isn't going to be too much of a pain in the back.

char_346_aosta.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_346_aosta.text: I'll give it my best shot.

char_346_aosta.title: Depart
char_346_aosta.text: Let's avoid any unnecessary fights.

char_346_aosta.title: Begin Operation
char_346_aosta.text: Guess we don't have a choice. Let's get this taken care of.

char_346_aosta.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_346_aosta.text: I'll go.

char_346_aosta.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_346_aosta.text: Hmm?

char_346_aosta.title: Deployment 1
char_346_aosta.text: Take all of them down?

char_346_aosta.title: Deployment 2
char_346_aosta.text: I'll give it a try.

char_346_aosta.title: In Battle 1
char_346_aosta.text: Hello.

char_346_aosta.title: In Battle 2
char_346_aosta.text: Goodbye.

char_346_aosta.title: In Battle 3
char_346_aosta.text: Time to put an end to this.

char_346_aosta.title: In Battle 4
char_346_aosta.text: Tsk.

char_346_aosta.title: 4-star Result
char_346_aosta.text: Phew... phew... Doctor, do you enjoy challenging yourself so much?

char_346_aosta.title: 3-star Result
char_346_aosta.text: I got all of them. I just hope they're worth it.

char_346_aosta.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_346_aosta.text: A few of them got through, but I think we'll be fine.

char_346_aosta.title: Operation Failure
char_346_aosta.text: Doctor, you go on ahead. I'll clean up the mess here. It's what I'm good at.

char_346_aosta.title: Assigned to Facility
char_346_aosta.text: I'll just sorta walk around, then.

char_346_aosta.title: Tap
char_346_aosta.text: I can walk, Doctor.

char_346_aosta.title: Trust Tap
char_346_aosta.text: How do you do, Doctor.

char_346_aosta.title: Title
char_346_aosta.text: Arknights.

char_346_aosta.title: Greeting
char_346_aosta.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_265_sophia.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_265_sophia.text: You hear about burdenbeasts who don't even drag themselves to work until they're whipped. You're not like that, Doctor. You're smarter than a beast, aren't you?

char_265_sophia.title: Talk 1
char_265_sophia.text: Doctor. Just to put any scary little misunderstandings to rest, let me say this now. Maria might call me her aunt, but that's only because I'm higher in the family. I'm not much older than her. I'm still young. I'm still not married. Clear?

char_265_sophia.title: Talk 2
char_265_sophia.text: A spat between me and Dobermann? Oh, don't worry, she's a top-of-the-top instructor, I know that. We've just had a bit of a... bit of a difference on how we like to train our people, that's all.

char_265_sophia.title: Talk 3
char_265_sophia.text: There's plenty at Rhodes Island packing personality AND strength, hm? You could pick your fancy, turn them into competition knights and grab everyone in there by the eyes... Mm, well, or maybe let's not stir that pot.

char_265_sophia.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_265_sophia.text: Doctor, can I borrow you? I just want you to help me carry some things. If you're asking, well... er, just... all sorts of random things I buy when the mood strikes me.

char_265_sophia.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_265_sophia.text: Oh, my injury...? I'm not setting foot on that stage ever again, and I've long since learned to get along with my right, so let's not worry yourself, okay. Or maybe you're just being polite, Doctor? Tiptoeing around saying I can't fight at operator standards?

char_265_sophia.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_265_sophia.text: Honestly, Maria. She runs away to the Engineering Department any time she's free. You get used to it fast. *Sigh* I wonder where her education gave her those ideas... Well! Compared to forcing herself to arm up and do what she doesn't want to, I think things are fine this way.

char_265_sophia.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_265_sophia.text: Hm? Hello, Doctor. No, I've just been feeling a little empty. Margaret never wants fussing over, Maria's found what she's wanted to do here, and what about me...? Oh, god, what am I doing talking to you about this? Don't you worry about me, let me make that clear.

char_265_sophia.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_265_sophia.text: Doctor, we don't get along half bad, but you don't just lie there and leave it all up to me, not in your wildest dreams. I hate danger plenty, but layabouts leave another bad taste in my mouth. Though, when your back's against the wall... *cough* Well, we can talk about it then!

char_265_sophia.title: Idle
char_265_sophia.text: Someone's easygoing, aren't you? Well, I can let you rest for ten minutes or so.

char_265_sophia.title: Onboard
char_265_sophia.text: Ahh, this is Rhodes Island, is it? I'm Zofia the Whislash, then. As a former competition knight of Kazimierz, trust me when I say I'll whip your operators into shape.

char_265_sophia.title: Watching Battle Record
char_265_sophia.text: These are ways of fighting I've never even heard of before!

char_265_sophia.title: Promotion 1
char_265_sophia.text: So this is a Rhodes Island promotion, then...? Why not. I don't pay much attention to my wages, but being compensated for my troubles isn't all that bad a feeling. Thank you.

char_265_sophia.title: Promotion 2
char_265_sophia.text: Hmm, thinking about it carefully, the pay's not bad, life is good enough here, and I get to see Maria and Margaret all the time. Staying here as an instructor sounds nice.

char_265_sophia.title: Added to Squad
char_265_sophia.text: Let's take a look at how you all deploy.

char_265_sophia.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_265_sophia.text: Leave the team to me, then.

char_265_sophia.title: Depart
char_265_sophia.text: Turn up the heat! We're going out!

char_265_sophia.title: Begin Operation
char_265_sophia.text: You haven't forgotten what you need to do, right?

char_265_sophia.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_265_sophia.text: My time to shine.

char_265_sophia.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_265_sophia.text: Well-timed, Doctor.

char_265_sophia.title: Deployment 1
char_265_sophia.text: Assess the battle first.

char_265_sophia.title: Deployment 2
char_265_sophia.text: Zofia the Whislash, attacking!

char_265_sophia.title: In Battle 1
char_265_sophia.text: Don't underestimate me!

char_265_sophia.title: In Battle 2
char_265_sophia.text: Perfect chance!

char_265_sophia.title: In Battle 3
char_265_sophia.text: Pushover!

char_265_sophia.title: In Battle 4
char_265_sophia.text: You're finished!

char_265_sophia.title: 4-star Result
char_265_sophia.text: Really, I was going to have a word with you about taking such a dangerous mission, but seeing you tie things up so beautifully, I'll just let it slide...

char_265_sophia.title: 3-star Result
char_265_sophia.text: A perfectionist, then... well, nothing wrong with that.

char_265_sophia.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_265_sophia.text: We won, and that's enough, no? Don't obsess over it.

char_265_sophia.title: Operation Failure
char_265_sophia.text: Doctor, don't just stand there! Follow me!

char_265_sophia.title: Assigned to Facility
char_265_sophia.text: Well, this interior's got taste!

char_265_sophia.title: Tap
char_265_sophia.text: Eek?!

char_265_sophia.title: Trust Tap
char_265_sophia.text: Doctor, focus on your work.

char_265_sophia.title: Title
char_265_sophia.text: Arknights.

char_265_sophia.title: Greeting
char_265_sophia.text: How do you do, Doctor?

char_423_blemsh.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_423_blemsh.text: Though I wouldn't dare boast of my prowess with a sword or Originium Arts... If you ever have any problems with equipment maintenance, you can come talk to me!

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk 1
char_423_blemsh.text: Zofia is my distant aunt, as well as my swordsmanship instructor. It's thanks to her that I can survive in the knight sports scene, but my aunt sometimes— Gaah! I mean, my sister! Um, Doctor! Please don't tell her I let that slip, she's actually super sensitive about it!

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk 2
char_423_blemsh.text: Doctor, to be honest, I'm a much better craftsman than I am a knight! Whether it's repairing an alarm clock or forging armor, I can help! That's why, Doctor! Can you please take me to see Vulcan's and Closure's workshops? Pretty pleeease!

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk 3
char_423_blemsh.text: Those two Sarkaz ladies seem hard to talk to, but if my sister trusts them so much, they must be pretty awesome. The Radiant Knight fighting alongside the Sarkaz for the sake of the Infected... Woahh, doesn't that sound like a breaking news headline?

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_423_blemsh.text: I actually never got an official title like my sister's 'Radiant Knight.' 'Blemishine' is the codename I chose for myself... But if I was to continue down the path of knighthood, maybe Blemishine wouldn't be a bad name.

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_423_blemsh.text: Kazimierz's knight sports are nothing more than a huge commercial game, and we all eat out of its palm... I didn't realize it until after I came to Rhodes Island, but Kazimierz's sickness might run deeper than the fact that we've strayed from our knightly traditions... much, much deeper.

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_423_blemsh.text: Rhodes Island's operators are way more like the ancient knights in the novels than the competition knights. In fact, I've been pretty obsessed with these knight novels for a long time. Knights, enemies, adventures, and treasures. But anyone can get that stuff from knight sports, so they're not as big as they used to be.

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_423_blemsh.text: When I first saw my sister after all this time, it was like she was a totally different person. Instead of that dazzling, blinding light she used to give off, she was more like the gentle sun, warm and stalwart. Did she change for Rhodes Island? Then I want to see for myself what my sister found here!

char_423_blemsh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_423_blemsh.text: I couldn't become a real knight, but maybe that's why I was able to see the wider world. I might be seeing things a bit more clearly now. 'To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land.' Doctor, you will bear witness to my resolve.

char_423_blemsh.title: Idle
char_423_blemsh.text: Doctor? Huh, you fell asleep? I wonder if you also have dreams~

char_423_blemsh.title: Onboard
char_423_blemsh.text: Kazimierz knight, codename 'Blemishine.' Hehe, I've heard all about you from my sister, Doctor. You can just call me Maria if you want~

char_423_blemsh.title: Watching Battle Record
char_423_blemsh.text: Wait, hold on... Ehhh? You can do it like that?

char_423_blemsh.title: Promotion 1
char_423_blemsh.text: A promotion...? For the glory of the Nearl family, I'll continue to give it my all!

char_423_blemsh.title: Promotion 2
char_423_blemsh.text: I just realized this, but it's all older folks around me, and don't really have any friends around to ask... So, Doctor? What do you think about this equipment I made for myself? Pretty cool, yeah? Does it look good on me?

char_423_blemsh.title: Added to Squad
char_423_blemsh.text: Blemishine will not disappoint!

char_423_blemsh.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_423_blemsh.text: S-squad leader? Me? But I don't have any experience with team battles...

char_423_blemsh.title: Depart
char_423_blemsh.text: Leave the front to me!

char_423_blemsh.title: Begin Operation
char_423_blemsh.text: Our family motto is, 'fear neither hardship nor darkness!'

char_423_blemsh.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_423_blemsh.text: All ready.

char_423_blemsh.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_423_blemsh.text: Pray for the coming battle.

char_423_blemsh.title: Deployment 1
char_423_blemsh.text: I'll never back down!

char_423_blemsh.title: Deployment 2
char_423_blemsh.text: The light holds resolute here!

char_423_blemsh.title: In Battle 1
char_423_blemsh.text: Light, heed me!

char_423_blemsh.title: In Battle 2
char_423_blemsh.text: I am here!

char_423_blemsh.title: In Battle 3
char_423_blemsh.text: Don't you worry!

char_423_blemsh.title: In Battle 4
char_423_blemsh.text: Repent!

char_423_blemsh.title: 4-star Result
char_423_blemsh.text: Small as it may be... our light persisted until the end!

char_423_blemsh.title: 3-star Result
char_423_blemsh.text: Each victory will become a light that illuminates the path forward. Good job, Doctor.

char_423_blemsh.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_423_blemsh.text: This... this isn't over yet!

char_423_blemsh.title: Operation Failure
char_423_blemsh.text: I'll protect the wounded. Take the others and retreat, quickly!

char_423_blemsh.title: Assigned to Facility
char_423_blemsh.text: So this is the inside of Rhodes Island... I'd sure love to see the schematics.

char_423_blemsh.title: Tap
char_423_blemsh.text: Woah! D-don't scare me like that...

char_423_blemsh.title: Trust Tap
char_423_blemsh.text: Doctor! Shh! I snuck over here to hide from auntie Zofia. Hehe, let me take the day off!

char_423_blemsh.title: Title
char_423_blemsh.text: Arknights.

char_423_blemsh.title: Greeting
char_423_blemsh.text: Oh, hey there, Doctor.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, what's wrong? Oh, I'm fine, just a little tired. Please check these two files in a moment. A lot of new Operators have joined Rhodes Island, and we can't disappoint them.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: Rhodes Island and this land at large have already lost so much. We will put a stop to it... Rage may destroy us, but when confronting malice, ever more people have no other choice. Until the land finds peace, no one will be able to extinguish this fury.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: My rings look different? I couldn't hide it from you, Doctor... You're right, one of them broke. But it's okay, Dr. Kal'tsit helped me switch it for a new one. Did... that have something to do with when I blacked out, you ask? Doctor...

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk 3
char_1001_amiya2.text: In this whole operation, we gained no commercial profit at all, and we gave so much... But there are many things you can't weigh in terms of business value. Rhodes Island was never a company born exclusively for profit, and this land needs more than just physical medications.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: Chernobog's Reunion... it's over, and is there any more point to denouncing what they've done? Think of the people who trampled them, abused them, massacred them... hatred breeds hatred. That was something that should've never happened in the first place.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: Once, there was a Sarkaz betrayed, who walked this land bent on vengeance, only to cast his own life into the cycle of revenge. What I can't understand is, he'd already settled on his own end before he drew his sword. In his rage… he settled on death, with a clear mind.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: Death should be carved into our memories, never to be forgotten, no matter who brought that death about, nor who was brought to. Our mistakes will never be right... those scars should always remind us, warn us how frail we are.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: Even now, they still sometimes come to mind. Misha's gaze, FrostNova's roars, Patriot's cries... Ace, Scout, and so many operators sacrificed their lives for a single belief. But the Infected all across Terra—what is it that they've died for?

char_1001_amiya2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor... recently... have I been a little less like myself? The nameless anger that rises up, time and again... is that mine? If so... no, even if so, I won't give up. I will protect you, Doctor, by this sword.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Idle
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, are you okay? Do you need to rest a little? I'll help carry you. Don't worry, I'm doing fine. So long as you're rested.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Onboard
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, it's so good to see you. My appearance? Um, please don't be afraid... I can explain this. But don't worry, Doctor. Whatever happens, I won't ever let you come to harm. I swear it.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1001_amiya2.text: 'If the fight is unavoidable...' This is what the person I most trusted once taught me.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Added to Squad
char_1001_amiya2.text: Got it.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1001_amiya2.text: I shoulder the wrath of so many others.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Depart
char_1001_amiya2.text: Operation commencing. Let's go!

char_1001_amiya2.title: Begin Operation
char_1001_amiya2.text: Incoming! Ready, all members!

char_1001_amiya2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: Amiya here.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: This sword thirsts for revenge... I won't permit it.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Deployment 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: My sword is cloaked in Chi Xiao's shadow.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Deployment 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: Madam Ch'en's swordsmanship... flows within this weapon.

char_1001_amiya2.title: In Battle 1
char_1001_amiya2.text: Drop your weapon!

char_1001_amiya2.title: In Battle 2
char_1001_amiya2.text: Your thought, your Arts, I can cut them.

char_1001_amiya2.title: In Battle 3
char_1001_amiya2.text: 'With what do I answer your failure of justice?'

char_1001_amiya2.title: In Battle 4
char_1001_amiya2.text: Do not... make me angry.

char_1001_amiya2.title: 4-star Result
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, thank you for always supporting me. Our battles will only get harder from here, but we can't give up.

char_1001_amiya2.title: 3-star Result
char_1001_amiya2.text: How long do we fight? How long until the flames of anger on this land die down...

char_1001_amiya2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, good job. Let me handle the clean-up.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Operation Failure
char_1001_amiya2.text: ...What happened? This shouldn't have...

char_1001_amiya2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1001_amiya2.text: Phew... we can take a little breather now, right?

char_1001_amiya2.title: Tap
char_1001_amiya2.text: Whuh, Doctor...!

char_1001_amiya2.title: Trust Tap
char_1001_amiya2.text: Doctor, could you... hear me out for a bit? Is that okay?

char_1001_amiya2.title: Title
char_1001_amiya2.text: Arknights.

char_1001_amiya2.title: Greeting
char_1001_amiya2.text: Welcome home, Doctor!

char_311_mudrok.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_311_mudrok.text: Hm? Ah, this soil... it can murmur. It can dance. It is my friend.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk 1
char_311_mudrok.text: Miss Closure told me I shouldn't walk about Rhodes Island 'fully equipped'... but I'm not used to... revealing... myself. Sorry...

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Thank-you letters? Ah, from the Sarkaz workers yesterday? My equipment and type of Arts are a good match for physical work. Besides, their materials and fuel weren't featherweight. And they relied on the power of flesh and blood to ensure Rhodes Island sails smooth... it's incredible.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk 3
char_311_mudrok.text: That elite operator... I thought I'd seen enough bizarre Originium Arts in Leithanien to write any wild fantasy. But the moment he pushed apart the fog with a wave of his hand, I understood, as a Sarkaz, he was young yet incredibly ancient.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_311_mudrok.text: I often think of the soldiers and companions that have left us. Sometimes, I have a sort of delusion that even now, I'm still fleeing... Doctor, have you been to Kazdel before? That was where my journey started, and once, where I'd thought it would end.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Dr. Kal'tsit, huh... She startled me, but she's reassuring in spades... One thing, though. Rhodes Island seems to get along well with another mercenary group, too. Could you tell me about them, Doctor? It's best I don't know? I see... then I think I can more or less guess who.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_311_mudrok.text: I became a Rhodes Island Operator so they could be treated properly, live on properly, and only then would those warriors... have died with meaning. But... since coming to Rhodes Island, I've seen clearly what I, myself, am truly fighting for. That was a first for me.

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Me, alone, talking to a clay doll...? You're... you're telling you saw me? That was just a kind of ceremony... huh? So everyone already knew? Really? Then I'll be more careful next time, do it late when nobody's up... um, I shouldn't?

char_311_mudrok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_311_mudrok.text: From Kazdel to Leithanien, so many marks have been carved onto the suffering. The moment they had no choice but to fight, I realized I had nothing at all. How do you see me, Doctor? You trust me? Will that trust... allow me to live on?

char_311_mudrok.title: Idle
char_311_mudrok.text: ...The person napping there is the Doctor. Remember that well. Our road together is sure to be long and far.

char_311_mudrok.title: Onboard
char_311_mudrok.text: Sarkaz mercenary, Mudrock... You're the Doctor, then. Rhodes Island has saved me many times, and now, I'd like you to let me return the favor.

char_311_mudrok.title: Watching Battle Record
char_311_mudrok.text: I've had a taste of how Rhodes Island fights before, but, well, this still makes a great reference...

char_311_mudrok.title: Promotion 1
char_311_mudrok.text: I used to be known as Reunion, and then under the Mudrock Squad, and now... I've been promoted by my former enemy. Is this what they meant by 'life is a rollercoaster?'

char_311_mudrok.title: Promotion 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Hm? This seems fresh? I never take my helmet off in battle, after all... There's a lot of reasons why, but things have changed now. S... staying like this? If I have to...

char_311_mudrok.title: Added to Squad
char_311_mudrok.text: I'm simply a Rhodes Island Operator, now. I'll obey your command.

char_311_mudrok.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_311_mudrok.text: The captain... I don't like leading, but... I'm used to it.

char_311_mudrok.title: Depart
char_311_mudrok.text: It's time to fight.

char_311_mudrok.title: Begin Operation
char_311_mudrok.text: The enemy...

char_311_mudrok.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_311_mudrok.text: The soil answers my will.

char_311_mudrok.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Speak. The rocks are listening.

char_311_mudrok.title: Deployment 1
char_311_mudrok.text: Battlefield never changes.

char_311_mudrok.title: Deployment 2
char_311_mudrok.text: I'll fight for myself.

char_311_mudrok.title: In Battle 1
char_311_mudrok.text: The land is as my friend.

char_311_mudrok.title: In Battle 2
char_311_mudrok.text: Be as the mountains.

char_311_mudrok.title: In Battle 3
char_311_mudrok.text: Heed my call.

char_311_mudrok.title: In Battle 4
char_311_mudrok.text: Arise, great boulder.

char_311_mudrok.title: 4-star Result
char_311_mudrok.text: Running is useless... resist it, even if you are not willing to resist. This is the only way I've come to know to face suffering.

char_311_mudrok.title: 3-star Result
char_311_mudrok.text: My friends are whispering their celebration. They cheer our victory, Doctor.

char_311_mudrok.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_311_mudrok.text: Chase them... I'll watch over the battlefield with my friends' eyes.

char_311_mudrok.title: Operation Failure
char_311_mudrok.text: It's not the first I've fled with my back to the enemy. If even more can live on this way... I'll cover your backs.

char_311_mudrok.title: Assigned to Facility
char_311_mudrok.text: The ceiling's... a little lower than I imagined.

char_311_mudrok.title: Tap
char_311_mudrok.text: ...Mm? Did you touch me just now?

char_311_mudrok.title: Trust Tap
char_311_mudrok.text: Doctor? Could you stay with me for a bit? I'd like... to ask you a little about Kazdel. Ah, and my friends have missed you, too.

char_311_mudrok.title: Title
char_311_mudrok.text: Arknights.

char_311_mudrok.title: Greeting
char_311_mudrok.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_391_rosmon.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_391_rosmon.text: Umm, Doctor... I'm not very good at filing and writing reports. Do you think you can assign me to another position? Eh? I don't need to do anything. All I need to do is hang out here? Doctor... You're a weirdo.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk 1
char_391_rosmon.text: Everyone at Rhodes Island is my friend. The elite operators and my squad mates are my family. Ms. Kal'tsit doesn't want me to treat them as family. I didn't get it at first, but I do now. They're like flowers in a vase. If you don't pay attention to them, they'll wither. But they're all I have.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk 2
char_391_rosmon.text: What am I reading? Oh, it's an entry from two days ago. Closure spilled her coffee that morning and stained a couple scrolls in the library. And she got cursed, I think. For every five words she says, she ends up spitting on someone's face. Scary, isn't it?

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk 3
char_391_rosmon.text: Painful things, sad things, and scary things all go away when you least expect them to. But it's not okay to forget them. I need to remember them, because those emotions are still there inside me. I don't want to end up crying without knowing why. Memories are a burden, and I have to carry my own burden.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_391_rosmon.text: I can't use a shield, I can't use a bow, I can't make guns glow, and I can't turn those iron rods into weapons very well. More importantly, the other elite operators are much warmer than me. This warmth is what helps them fight for everyone else and for what's right. I will do my best.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_391_rosmon.text: Ms. Kal'tsit has lost lots of family, right? I see it in her eyes. How does she keep it to herself and manage to live with it? Just thinking about how everyone will disappear eventually one after another is enough to make my heart ache. Like it's going to explode. Is it because she's a grown-up? Then I want to grow up soon.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_391_rosmon.text: Doctor, could you tell me what this word means? I asked Blaze about it, and she just kept giggling, and Amiya just kept hitting her. Oh, it means kissing? I know what that is, then. Doctor, bend down a little, okay? Can I kiss you on the cheek? Thanks for always taking care of us. Meow.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_391_rosmon.text: I won't forget about those people. They created me and those monsters. They wanted to use us to do bad things. Before the world finally stops hurting us all... I'll punish these people. I will make it really, really hurt, so they never, ever forget.

char_391_rosmon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_391_rosmon.text: Oh... You're the Doctor, right? I went over the records on the terminal just yesterday. Yep, I remember now, Doctor. You can give me orders. Let's go on a mission? Make sure to use my powers well.

char_391_rosmon.title: Idle
char_391_rosmon.text: Hmm... the Doctor is taking a nap. Looks restless, too. Must be tired. If I give the Doctor a hug, it should feel a little better, right? Just relax and sleep well. I know how it feels... It hurts even in your dreams, right? I can tell.

char_391_rosmon.title: Onboard
char_391_rosmon.text: Hello, Doctor. I am Elite Operator Rosmontis. Ms. Kal'tsit has given her permission. You can give me and my team orders now. Use my power where it matters, Doctor. I also tend to forget about things pretty easily. Be sure to remind me if it looks like I might forget something.

char_391_rosmon.title: Watching Battle Record
char_391_rosmon.text: Yeah... I got that down now. I can use this in battle.

char_391_rosmon.title: Promotion 1
char_391_rosmon.text: I asked Ms. Kal'tsit why I'm an elite operator. Lots of people talk behind my back. They say I'm not right for the job. Ms. Kal'tsit said that if I become an elite operator, I'll remember more, and I'll become a better person. Yep, I'm doing my best.

char_391_rosmon.title: Promotion 2
char_391_rosmon.text: This world isn't going to get better so easily, but humans tend to get worse because of their surroundings. Doctor, we can't turn into bad people. If you do, I am sure you'll be really, really bad. I won't let you turn out like that.

char_391_rosmon.title: Added to Squad
char_391_rosmon.text: Time for a mission? Yeah, I know. I will protect all of Rhodes Island's operators. I promise.

char_391_rosmon.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_391_rosmon.text: I am the leader? Don't worry. They may not be from my team, but I'll make sure their support doesn't go to waste.

char_391_rosmon.title: Depart
char_391_rosmon.text: Don't worry. I know how to control my Arts.

char_391_rosmon.title: Begin Operation
char_391_rosmon.text: I don't want to see my family get hurt. I will destroy everything that could hurt my family.

char_391_rosmon.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_391_rosmon.text: I won't remember you.

char_391_rosmon.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_391_rosmon.text: Give me your order. I will see it through.

char_391_rosmon.title: Deployment 1
char_391_rosmon.text: It's starting.

char_391_rosmon.title: Deployment 2
char_391_rosmon.text: Stand back. If you don't want to see what's about to happen, don't look.

char_391_rosmon.title: In Battle 1
char_391_rosmon.text: If it hurts, just cry out. It'll feel better.

char_391_rosmon.title: In Battle 2
char_391_rosmon.text: If you surrender now, I won't hurt you.

char_391_rosmon.title: In Battle 3
char_391_rosmon.text: You won't die... I'll make sure you don't die.

char_391_rosmon.title: In Battle 4
char_391_rosmon.text: There are things that have to be done by someone. There are things that only I can do.

char_391_rosmon.title: 4-star Result
char_391_rosmon.text: If there comes a day when I can't use these Arts again... Hmm. What will that day be like? I can't imagine.

char_391_rosmon.title: 3-star Result
char_391_rosmon.text: That was very nice, Doctor. There, there. Thanks.

char_391_rosmon.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_391_rosmon.text: I will take care of the rest. It won't take long.

char_391_rosmon.title: Operation Failure
char_391_rosmon.text: No... I won't retreat. I can't disappoint the others. I still have my sword... Even without my sword, I can still fight! I won't leave!

char_391_rosmon.title: Assigned to Facility
char_391_rosmon.text: P-Please don't lock me in a small room. They're scary... I... I don't really like those kinda rooms.

char_391_rosmon.title: Tap
char_391_rosmon.text: D-Don't touch me! ...You'll get hurt.

char_391_rosmon.title: Trust Tap
char_391_rosmon.text: Um... I-I'll try to bear with it... and not break your hand...

char_391_rosmon.title: Title
char_391_rosmon.text: Arknights.

char_391_rosmon.title: Greeting
char_391_rosmon.text: Oh, you're the Doctor, right?

char_436_whispr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_436_whispr.text: Please, leave all these reports to me. Being able to handle text-related work makes me very happy...

char_436_whispr.title: Talk 1
char_436_whispr.text: I wonder if I shouldn't have turned that Suzuran girl down just now? But she said I'd be drinking tea with everyone, and I'm not too good with those sorts of things.

char_436_whispr.title: Talk 2
char_436_whispr.text: My body is more frail than most others. I may easily die, forget all that happened, then come to be young, and born anew.  'Rejuvenation'... what a cruel fate it is...

char_436_whispr.title: Talk 3
char_436_whispr.text: All memories become foam on the waves in the end. Whether suffering, happiness, inevitably, quietly, pasts I do not want to forget will shed themselves from my side.

char_436_whispr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_436_whispr.text: I no longer can remember it, but there is still something flowing within my blood. Be careful of the sea, Doctor. It is capable of devouring us all, a stygian nightmare. It is... fear itself.

char_436_whispr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_436_whispr.text: There are times I become curious. For races with true longevity like Miss Warfarin's, how do they view death and parting? If such things no longer cause them to suffer, is it only because they long since hurt, until they were used to it... until they were numbed?

char_436_whispr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_436_whispr.text: Doctor, could you take these flowers to the children being treated, for me? Yes, just like always, place them by their bedsides. ...Thank you, for helping keep this secret.

char_436_whispr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_436_whispr.text: Doctor, come quickly, we need to find Miss Closure! It seems Mr. Thorns and his companions burst a water pipe open in the corridor, and it's provoked Weedy's interminable wrath! I'm soaked to the skin... Um, I seem—like I'm enjoying myself? Wh-What do you mean?!

char_436_whispr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_436_whispr.text: Every time I watch a film, I'll keep the ticket stub afterwards. Even if I've forgotten all its contents, these leftover vestiges will always serve as a reminder to me. ...Doctor, could you come watch a film with me? I'd like to preserve the time I've passed with you, too.

char_436_whispr.title: Idle
char_436_whispr.text: Sleep sound, now. *chuckle* By the time you wake, will you have forgotten about me?

char_436_whispr.title: Onboard
char_436_whispr.text: My code name is Whisperain—but I'm a mere roving doctor. If possible, treat me like a traveler lodging under the eaves, away from the rain. You needn't pay me much mind...

char_436_whispr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_436_whispr.text: In the face of such fierce combat, I worry... I wouldn't survive.

char_436_whispr.title: Promotion 1
char_436_whispr.text: Thank you very much. But I hope you treat me same as always...

char_436_whispr.title: Promotion 2
char_436_whispr.text: Those sorrows I could not wash away with one death—I always feel they're like strands, wisps, winding about my skin... Doctor, you've come to forget the past too—could you maybe understand this feeling?

char_436_whispr.title: Added to Squad
char_436_whispr.text: Please leave the assistive work to me.

char_436_whispr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_436_whispr.text: I'm the... leader? Um?

char_436_whispr.title: Depart
char_436_whispr.text: Please keep with me. Don't go too far.

char_436_whispr.title: Begin Operation
char_436_whispr.text: Please, everyone, be careful. You must keep yourselves safe.

char_436_whispr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_436_whispr.text: Yes.

char_436_whispr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_436_whispr.text: Injections have been prepared.

char_436_whispr.title: Deployment 1
char_436_whispr.text: Wounded, over to me, please.

char_436_whispr.title: Deployment 2
char_436_whispr.text: Let me dispel the pain.

char_436_whispr.title: In Battle 1
char_436_whispr.text: Disinfection comes first.

char_436_whispr.title: In Battle 2
char_436_whispr.text: Do not be afraid.

char_436_whispr.title: In Battle 3
char_436_whispr.text: My treatment will not hurt.

char_436_whispr.title: In Battle 4
char_436_whispr.text: I know this scent of death well.

char_436_whispr.title: 4-star Result
char_436_whispr.text: Sleep, now. May all dream well in the sound of rainfall.

char_436_whispr.title: 3-star Result
char_436_whispr.text: This is how their story ends. One tragedy, following another...

char_436_whispr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_436_whispr.text: Leave the pursuit for later. Please let me treat everyone first.

char_436_whispr.title: Operation Failure
char_436_whispr.text: I'm sorry, I've been such a burden on everyone...

char_436_whispr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_436_whispr.text: Such a peaceful place this is. I can hear the patter of rainfall.

char_436_whispr.title: Tap
char_436_whispr.text: Eh? Y... you startled me...

char_436_whispr.title: Trust Tap
char_436_whispr.text: P—please don't move! My hair's gotten tangled...

char_436_whispr.title: Title
char_436_whispr.text: Arknights.

char_436_whispr.title: Greeting
char_436_whispr.text: What will we be doing today, Doctor?

char_347_jaksel.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, let me help!

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk 1
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, you've been sitting there for a while, that's really unhealthy. Come do some stretches with me! Exercise and recover your energy. That way, you'll be able to work better.

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk 2
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, Doctor! She's here at Rhodes Island! Ah, her codename should be Dur-nar now. Anyway, she's really amazing! I've only ever seen her in recruitment ads before! She's also a really good person! She gave me so many snacks, ehehe.

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk 3
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, I'm actually pretty lithe for my age, you know. Let me show you a standing backflip! Watch!

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_347_jaksel.text: This gun? Oh, it's a gun-type Arts... Arts something. Ah, right, Arts Unit! I applied for one out of habit when I came here, but I still prefer my fists over Arts.

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_347_jaksel.text: Even though I know I'm very lucky, I only realized how badly other Infected are doing after coming to Rhodes Island... Doctor, what can I do to help? I really want to help them!

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_347_jaksel.text: ...Hm? Ah, Doctor! I'm writing a letter to my dad. Eh, I haven't introduced my dad to you yet? He's a really amazing policeman, you know! Let me tell you how great he is!

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_347_jaksel.text: Actually, it was my dad who suggested Rhodes Island. After he found out you could treat Oripathy, he pushed really hard for me to be able to come here. I don't really want to be away from him, but I know that he'll be happiest if I live a healthy life.

char_347_jaksel.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_347_jaksel.text: You're really reliable, although dad is still better. Yup, you're now the second most reliable person in my heart! Hehe. Ah, Doctor, I talked a lot about you in my letters to dad. He said he really wants to meet you!

char_347_jaksel.title: Idle
char_347_jaksel.text: Doc——! Ah, Doctor's asleep. I'll have to be quieter...

char_347_jaksel.title: Onboard
char_347_jaksel.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor! I'm the new operator, codename Jackie! I used to be an auxiliary police officer in Columbia. Let's get along!

char_347_jaksel.title: Watching Battle Record
char_347_jaksel.text: Amazing... It feels even more amazing than dad...

char_347_jaksel.title: Promotion 1
char_347_jaksel.text: Eh, am I being promoted? Wow, that's great!

char_347_jaksel.title: Promotion 2
char_347_jaksel.text: I've learnt a lot living at Rhodes Island... Maybe I can even catch up to dad one day! Doctor, I'll continue to work hard. Please guide me well~

char_347_jaksel.title: Added to Squad
char_347_jaksel.text: I'm here!

char_347_jaksel.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_347_jaksel.text: I'll work hard!

char_347_jaksel.title: Depart
char_347_jaksel.text: Let's do our best!

char_347_jaksel.title: Begin Operation
char_347_jaksel.text: Mission start!

char_347_jaksel.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, is it my turn?

char_347_jaksel.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_347_jaksel.text: Warming up complete!

char_347_jaksel.title: Deployment 1
char_347_jaksel.text: Leave it to me!

char_347_jaksel.title: Deployment 2
char_347_jaksel.text: Time for me to show my power!

char_347_jaksel.title: In Battle 1
char_347_jaksel.text: Grit Those Teeth!

char_347_jaksel.title: In Battle 2
char_347_jaksel.text: You shall not pass!

char_347_jaksel.title: In Battle 3
char_347_jaksel.text: Don't look down on me!

char_347_jaksel.title: In Battle 4
char_347_jaksel.text: I'll do it in one go!

char_347_jaksel.title: 4-star Result
char_347_jaksel.text: I thought we were gonna lose a few time, but we actually won in the end. Doctor, you're amazing!

char_347_jaksel.title: 3-star Result
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, Doctor, I've worked hard!

char_347_jaksel.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_347_jaksel.text: Doctor, want me to chase after them?

char_347_jaksel.title: Operation Failure
char_347_jaksel.text: Sorry, Doctor. If only I'd put in more effort...

char_347_jaksel.title: Assigned to Facility
char_347_jaksel.text: It's so big inside!

char_347_jaksel.title: Tap
char_347_jaksel.text: Ahhhh!

char_347_jaksel.title: Trust Tap
char_347_jaksel.text: Hi, Doctor~

char_347_jaksel.title: Title
char_347_jaksel.text: Arknights.

char_347_jaksel.title: Greeting
char_347_jaksel.text: Ah, it's Doctor!

char_264_f12yin.title: Appointed as Assistant
