char_264_f12yin.text: It's a good thing to be alert, Doctor. Well, please continue with your work. Rest assured, I'm here to protect you.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk 1
char_264_f12yin.text: I've met plenty of people who claim to practice martial arts, but they are all just weaklings putting up a front. Not that girl, Waai Fu, however. She's an interesting one... and although she still has a ways to go, I look forward to fighting her once she grows up.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk 2
char_264_f12yin.text: Rhodes Island doesn't have a cellar, you say? Now that won't do. Alcohol is indispensable. Not only is it something that can be savored and enjoyed, you can also drown your sorrows with it. So there you have it, Doctor. Get a cellar built. I dare say I know a thing or two about alcohol, should you need my assistance.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk 3
char_264_f12yin.text: I built a library back in Mansfield, but most of the books I could get my hands on there were Columbian. It gets boring after a while. The collection there simply doesn't hold a candle to what Rhodes Island has. The library here has a sizable collection of literature from other countries. It's marvelous.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_264_f12yin.text: When you find yourself in the face of oppression, it is futile to even try to come up with countermeasures... I used to believe that, but I later realized that there's no power out there that's absolute. At the very least, I don't have that kind of power, and that's why I'll never look down on anything again, no matter how insignificant.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_264_f12yin.text: I used to think that Rhodes Island was just another Mansfield, a prison of 'freedom.' And you. You are me. You are a prisoner of freedom. You are the king. Yet now I know that's not the case. This is not a prison, and you are the friend of everyone here.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_264_f12yin.text: Are the ones over there from Rhine Lab? Don't worry. I don't really have a grudge about Rhine Lab itself, and they are my colleagues now. I wouldn't do anything that gives you a headache. It's just I may have something to ask them one of these days.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_264_f12yin.text: Doctor, do you have some time later? Let me take you out for a drink... Oh, it's nothing important. I merely have a few secrets that I'd really like to get off my chest. I haven't made a new friend for a long time, after all.

char_264_f12yin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_264_f12yin.text: You are a very good friend, Doctor. When I have everything sorted out, should I still be alive, do pay Mansfield a visit. That is my kingdom, and I am willing to share all that I have there with you.

char_264_f12yin.title: Idle
char_264_f12yin.text: For you to fall asleep so defenselessly in the company of others... I can't tell if you are being trusting or negligent.

char_264_f12yin.title: Onboard
char_264_f12yin.text: I owe Rhodes Island my life, so allow me to be completely honest, Doctor. I am going after a certain department within Rhine Lab. If you don't want your relationship with them ruined, now is the time to turn me away.

char_264_f12yin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_264_f12yin.text: Battlefield experience, huh? Indeed, that's something that I don't have. Thank you, Doctor.

char_264_f12yin.title: Promotion 1
char_264_f12yin.text: Doctor, don't be afraid. I don't fight anyone undeserving of my rage.

char_264_f12yin.title: Promotion 2
char_264_f12yin.text: Doctor, take a good look. That mask of composure, calm, and politeness is off. This is the truest you'll ever find me. Bloodthirsty, violent, and destructive. Look at me and be my friend.

char_264_f12yin.title: Added to Squad
char_264_f12yin.text: Perfect. It's just about time to get a little exercise in.

char_264_f12yin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_264_f12yin.text: I'm the leader, so follow my lead.

char_264_f12yin.title: Depart
char_264_f12yin.text: Let's go.

char_264_f12yin.title: Begin Operation
char_264_f12yin.text: Never underestimate the enemy.

char_264_f12yin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_264_f12yin.text: I'm right here.

char_264_f12yin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_264_f12yin.text: Where would you like me?

char_264_f12yin.title: Deployment 1
char_264_f12yin.text: I'll hold myself back.

char_264_f12yin.title: Deployment 2
char_264_f12yin.text: I won't let them go much further.

char_264_f12yin.title: In Battle 1
char_264_f12yin.text: Face me!

char_264_f12yin.title: In Battle 2
char_264_f12yin.text: Haven't had breakfast? Come with all you've got!

char_264_f12yin.title: In Battle 3
char_264_f12yin.text: Bring it on, you scoundrels!

char_264_f12yin.title: In Battle 4
char_264_f12yin.text: Warm-up's over!

char_264_f12yin.title: 4-star Result
char_264_f12yin.text: A precarious situation is the perfect opportunity to better ourselves, but we must also know our own limits.

char_264_f12yin.title: 3-star Result
char_264_f12yin.text: Doctor, there is no need to put ourselves in the spotlight when the time's not right.

char_264_f12yin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_264_f12yin.text: Unnecessary violence is just a way to blow off steam. I got myself under control a long time ago.

char_264_f12yin.title: Operation Failure
char_264_f12yin.text: As long as we're still alive, that's hardly a defeat.

char_264_f12yin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_264_f12yin.text: The ceiling here is a little low, isn't it?

char_264_f12yin.title: Tap
char_264_f12yin.text: Huh?

char_264_f12yin.title: Trust Tap
char_264_f12yin.text: Doctor, why don't we discuss these books?

char_264_f12yin.title: Title
char_264_f12yin.text: Arknights.

char_264_f12yin.title: Greeting
char_264_f12yin.text: Stay alert, Doctor.

char_214_kafka.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_214_kafka.text: You give Kafka the work that needs doing, Doctor, and then I pass it all on... okay. This's just like how underground work goes!

char_214_kafka.title: Talk 1
char_214_kafka.text: Seeing as you're my friend now, Doctor, you can ask me for anything. Uh, apart from lending you my shears.

char_214_kafka.title: Talk 2
char_214_kafka.text: Rhodes Island's fulla people I never met before. Everywhere I go, I see what I wants. Hm? You're wonderin' WHAT it is I want? Thaaat's a secret, y'know. Seee-cret.

char_214_kafka.title: Talk 3
char_214_kafka.text: Hmm... still can't read your eyes. They're calm as a lake... but there'll come a day when I get your number, Doctor, just you wait!

char_214_kafka.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_214_kafka.text: Doctooor, Silence kicked me out againnn, I just can't take it, sob, sob... huh? I started it by messing up her experiment? Hmm, Silence got to you first... eh-hem, well, I'm just gonna go now!

char_214_kafka.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_214_kafka.text: Well, until I can get what I want, I guess I'll lend you a hand. Just lending it, though, okay?

char_214_kafka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_214_kafka.text: Story goes, I used to live in a real baaad place, dealing with bad people almost everyday. Then ever since I came here, everyone's been nice with me, givin' me snacks and all! Mm-hm, that's why I like it here at Rhodes Island!

char_214_kafka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_214_kafka.text: ...Y'know the secrets everyone tries their best to hide? They're like monsters, hidden in the dead shadows, waitin' for their chance. Beautiful... and dangerous. That's exactly why I do my darndest to collect them! Doctor, don't you got anything for my hoard?

char_214_kafka.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_214_kafka.text: Doctor, if you've ever got a problem, we can always call my 'friends' from Columbia in to help... though you don't really gotta. One Kafka'll sort out all your troubles head to tail!

char_214_kafka.title: Idle
char_214_kafka.text: Bet you think I'm goofing off right now, Doctor. But I aiiin't~

char_214_kafka.title: Onboard
char_214_kafka.text: What did you need me for...? Wait, not in front of everybody! Just treat me like a normal gardener, okay?

char_214_kafka.title: Watching Battle Record
char_214_kafka.text: Just gotta figure what they're aiming for, and I can draw up some counterplans. C'mon, ain't I a wiz?

char_214_kafka.title: Promotion 1
char_214_kafka.text: Seeing as you really need my power, Doctor, just c'mon and say it. Be like Kafka here, all serious and open, yeah?

char_214_kafka.title: Promotion 2
char_214_kafka.text: Gardenin' or fightin', I didn't start doing either for compliments. But having my own efforts get noticed by you and the rest, well, that makes a Kafka real happy.

char_214_kafka.title: Added to Squad
char_214_kafka.text: Wonder what we can harvest this time?

char_214_kafka.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_214_kafka.text: Just leave it to me. I guarantee you're all in for a fun time!

char_214_kafka.title: Depart
char_214_kafka.text: Ah, thinkin' sucks... I guess I'll be listenin' to you, Doctor.

char_214_kafka.title: Begin Operation
char_214_kafka.text: Look at all these naughty li'l saplings. Ain'tcha cute... sit tight and Kafka'll trim ya up~

char_214_kafka.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_214_kafka.text: Huh?

char_214_kafka.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_214_kafka.text: Kafka, roger~

char_214_kafka.title: Deployment 1
char_214_kafka.text: Right here, I guess.

char_214_kafka.title: Deployment 2
char_214_kafka.text: Hm-hmmm~

char_214_kafka.title: In Battle 1
char_214_kafka.text: Watch your eyes... I see all your weakpoints in 'em.

char_214_kafka.title: In Battle 2
char_214_kafka.text: You're all just hedges who know how to walk~

char_214_kafka.title: In Battle 3
char_214_kafka.text: Lemme break ya right there.

char_214_kafka.title: In Battle 4
char_214_kafka.text: Kafka knows you're scared. Tremblin' li'l bare branches.

char_214_kafka.title: 4-star Result
char_214_kafka.text: Smooth sailin' just like always, Doctor. Alright, makes a Kafka wanna go get 'em!

char_214_kafka.title: 3-star Result
char_214_kafka.text: Man, were those enemies pushovers. If I'd known sooner, I woulda messed with 'em some.

char_214_kafka.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_214_kafka.text: Hmm, guess I gotta be more careful with the pruning next time.

char_214_kafka.title: Operation Failure
char_214_kafka.text: So I guess I couldn't read their plans in the end, huh.

char_214_kafka.title: Assigned to Facility
char_214_kafka.text: Where's Silence's lab, again?

char_214_kafka.title: Tap
char_214_kafka.text: ...Whaddaya think you're doin'.

char_214_kafka.title: Trust Tap
char_214_kafka.text: Doctor, Kafka here wants to deck out your office with some bonsai. Don'tcha worry, I'll make 'em look real good~

char_214_kafka.title: Title
char_214_kafka.text: Arknights.

char_214_kafka.title: Greeting
char_214_kafka.text: What work you got for me today, Doctor?

char_451_robin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_451_robin.text: Doctor. Should I help with anything?

char_451_robin.title: Talk 1
char_451_robin.text: Doctor. You always seem busy with work. Don't you have any hobbies? Me, I like seeing old movies people don't really remember.

char_451_robin.title: Talk 2
char_451_robin.text: Truthfully, I learned how to fight because of this movie I saw when I was young. Main character used all these knives and homemade traps, and I thought it was really cool, so I started learning myself. My knives here, they're actually the same kind as the ones in that movie.

char_451_robin.title: Talk 3
char_451_robin.text: In Columbia, anything can be bought with money. It sounds great, maybe, until you turn it around. Without money, nothing's yours at all.

char_451_robin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_451_robin.text: Rhodes Island feels just like a company in a movie. Medical corp on the outside, actually a private military underneath. Operating to save more and more people... feels pretty cool.

char_451_robin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_451_robin.text: Doctor, do you think I come off gloomy to others? ...Uh, I didn't used to be like this. It was ever since my pop got the way he did, and I had to start worrying about keeping the family afloat. *Sigh*...

char_451_robin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_451_robin.text: I don't hate Anthony. If we have to talk about the past, I think my pop's to blame too. And honestly, I thank Anthony. If he weren't where he was, I might've done something by now I could never take back.

char_451_robin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_451_robin.text: Pop never understood. Mom didn't leave because we had no money. It was 'cause his temper got worse every day. I've thought about if I went with Mom instead, but Pop used to be... so nice to me.

char_451_robin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_451_robin.text: Doctor, there's times I'm following you, and I ease up so much I forget my own stuff. I have the money for treating my pop's illness now, but he's got troubles, and I can't cure that just on my own... Doctor, could you help me?

char_451_robin.title: Idle
char_451_robin.text: So you drop right where you are when you're tired too, Doctor...

char_451_robin.title: Onboard
char_451_robin.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor. I'm a new Operator. Robin's the name. I've got money issues, so if it's okay with you, you can send me to do whatever.

char_451_robin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_451_robin.text: Intense. Feels just like I'm watching an action movie...

char_451_robin.title: Promotion 1
char_451_robin.text: Huh? I got a raise so quick...? That's great. Thank you, Doctor!

char_451_robin.title: Promotion 2
char_451_robin.text: I never stuck with my old jobs for very long. The company itself had problems, or it was something with my pop... This time, it feels like I'll be able to stick with Rhodes Island.

char_451_robin.title: Added to Squad
char_451_robin.text: Leave it to me.

char_451_robin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_451_robin.text: I'm not too good at figuring teamwork...

char_451_robin.title: Depart
char_451_robin.text: Wonder what kind of place we're going this time.

char_451_robin.title: Begin Operation
char_451_robin.text: Status check, first...

char_451_robin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_451_robin.text: Am I up?

char_451_robin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_451_robin.text: I'm ready to go.

char_451_robin.title: Deployment 1
char_451_robin.text: I see the enemy.

char_451_robin.title: Deployment 2
char_451_robin.text: Mm.

char_451_robin.title: In Battle 1
char_451_robin.text: I get mad too!

char_451_robin.title: In Battle 2
char_451_robin.text: Haah!

char_451_robin.title: In Battle 3
char_451_robin.text: Where are you looking?

char_451_robin.title: In Battle 4
char_451_robin.text: I'm wielding more than knives here!

char_451_robin.title: 4-star Result
char_451_robin.text: Doctor, can we cut this sort of mission down a little? Bad for the heart...

char_451_robin.title: 3-star Result
char_451_robin.text: I bet everybody dreams of having a boss like you, Doctor.

char_451_robin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_451_robin.text: Doctor, need me to chase them?

char_451_robin.title: Operation Failure
char_451_robin.text: Doctor, you go! I'll cover you!

char_451_robin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_451_robin.text: Let's get to know this place, then.

char_451_robin.title: Tap
char_451_robin.text: Huh?

char_451_robin.title: Trust Tap
char_451_robin.text: Doctor. Taking a walk?

char_451_robin.title: Title
char_451_robin.text: Arknights.

char_451_robin.title: Greeting
char_451_robin.text: Doctor. Need me to guard you today?

char_440_pinecn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_440_pinecn.text: Doctor? No, I wasn't taking a nap! I... I was just spacing out!

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Is it raining outside? I used to really hate rainy days... There's mud everywhere, and the rain affects construction. My father always came home really late on those days. But it also feels really comfortable once the rain lets up, and it feels really nice to just stay inside my room, just like what we are doing right now.

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk 2
char_440_pinecn.text: When I used to be a construction worker back in Columbia, every day was a struggle. I had to get up early every morning and go to bed late every night. Sometimes, I even had to work overtime and didn't have any time to sleep...

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk 3
char_440_pinecn.text: Oh, Doctor, would you like to go somewhere together? Hm? Ahh...! W-Where's my tool bag...? Did I leave it at the construction site again? I-I'm sorry, I'll be back right away!

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_440_pinecn.text: What I want to do...? Hmm... as long as I have a stable job and get to live a honest life, I think that's good enough for me. In that case, why did I become an operator here, you ask? Well... The pay is a little better, and the work here isn't all that different, either... so I thought I'd give it a try... I guess?

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_440_pinecn.text: The Infected... There were a lot of Infected workers in Columbia... Everyone told me to stay away from them, but, just going by the way they work, I don't think they're any different from the rest of us.

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Oh... What was it that Ms. Closure wanted me to do for her again...? She's gonna be really mad if I go back and ask her... Um, Doctor? Do you think you can help me out...?

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_440_pinecn.text: My father always told me to study hard if I want a better life. Doctor, you know all sorts of things, right? Do you think you can teach me? I'll try my best to not zone out. I'll really try to.

char_440_pinecn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_440_pinecn.text: I never thought that much about the future before. I figured I would find work in the exploration teams and work as a craftsman my whole life. But now... I really need to thank the big guy. I wouldn't have met you if it wasn't for him... Uh... A-Anyway, I really appreciate what he did for me.

char_440_pinecn.title: Idle
char_440_pinecn.text: Fwahh... I'm so tired... I guess maybe I'll take a nap with the Doctor...

char_440_pinecn.title: Onboard
char_440_pinecn.text: Codename Pinecone... I'm starting at Rhodes Island today... Um... Have you seen my portable battery?

char_440_pinecn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_440_pinecn.text: Um... Umm... I don't get it...

char_440_pinecn.title: Promotion 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Thank you, Doctor... But what should I do now? Oh... Do I just need to follow the others' examples? All right...!

char_440_pinecn.title: Promotion 2
char_440_pinecn.text: Hm...? Another promotion? Ehehe, you're pretty forgetful yourself, Doctor. Didn't you already give me a promot—This is a new one? Um... Okay. I'll always listen to what you say. So, when are we leaving?

char_440_pinecn.title: Added to Squad
char_440_pinecn.text: It's my turn to shine now.

char_440_pinecn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_440_pinecn.text: I guess it's just like being foreman at a construction site?

char_440_pinecn.title: Depart
char_440_pinecn.text: Um... Where are we going again...?

char_440_pinecn.title: Begin Operation
char_440_pinecn.text: It's the enemy! Don't hold back, anyone!

char_440_pinecn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Yes, I'm listening!

char_440_pinecn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_440_pinecn.text: Your orders please, Doctor!

char_440_pinecn.title: Deployment 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Here, right?

char_440_pinecn.title: Deployment 2
char_440_pinecn.text: I'll stay right here like a nail.

char_440_pinecn.title: In Battle 1
char_440_pinecn.text: Haah!

char_440_pinecn.title: In Battle 2
char_440_pinecn.text: I still have lots of batteries on me!

char_440_pinecn.title: In Battle 3
char_440_pinecn.text: Pull the trigger!

char_440_pinecn.title: In Battle 4
char_440_pinecn.text: Just gotta think of it as driving nails!

char_440_pinecn.title: 4-star Result
char_440_pinecn.text: Phew... That was a lot harder than building a house. Doctor, that makes us kinda impressive, don't you think?

char_440_pinecn.title: 3-star Result
char_440_pinecn.text: That was perfect... Doctor, are you happy with how we did?

char_440_pinecn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_440_pinecn.text: Hmm... Maybe I did it in the wrong order...? I'm sorry. It didn't go as well as I was hoping.

char_440_pinecn.title: Operation Failure
char_440_pinecn.text: Eh? Why are there sparks... S-Sorry... It's all my fault...

char_440_pinecn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_440_pinecn.text: Yes, is there anything that needs maintaining?

char_440_pinecn.title: Trust Tap
char_440_pinecn.text: Doctor, want to watch the rain together? There's not much to see, though...

char_440_pinecn.title: Title
char_440_pinecn.text: Arknights.

char_440_pinecn.title: Greeting
char_440_pinecn.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_332_archet.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_332_archet.text: Doctor, have you ever considered some more... practical ornamentation for Rhodes Island? Such as monastery brewing caskets, or...

char_332_archet.title: Talk 1
char_332_archet.text: Landen Monastery's clerics form no normal clergy, you know? Rather than prayer, we're much more about taking up arms to defend Laterano... That's how it goes, but our finances have been in a sorry state these past few years. The justice of guarding others with the faith we harbor—surely the Lord permits us that.

char_332_archet.title: Talk 2
char_332_archet.text: Doctor, do you have any interest in beer or bread? Landen Monastery Fermented Goods Contest CCCLXXVII first-place, at your service! No need? Ah, alright... Truly, I want our soft, springy bread and fragrant beer to be known across all of Terra. That would do wonders for our revenues!

char_332_archet.title: Talk 3
char_332_archet.text: E—Exusiai? *cough*! I never thought the legend who blew up her alma mater seventeen times in three years would be here at Rhodes Island... She does seem to have some learned business experts at her side, but the risk of an explosion while rebuilding the Monastery... best not for now.

char_332_archet.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_332_archet.text: Different kinds of arrows entail different uses. There may be plenty of capable archers amongst my sisters, but I don't boast when I proclaim that I'm the only one able to adapt multiple combat modes at once! Heheh! At least, out of my year I am!

char_332_archet.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_332_archet.text: It was only once I left the Monastery that I realized my arrows may do more than defend the Apostle. It can aid so many Infected, beset by injustice... I'm very proud, but occasionally I'll remember the days gone past where I simply drew my bow, and loosed. Now, every arrow has become so much more weighty.

char_332_archet.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_332_archet.text: So as to rebuild the Monastery, my sisters have left to seek cooperation across all of Terra. *sigh*! Landen Monastery, age-old guard of Laterano, is now a dispatch agency... If only those old men would grant a little more funding. What kind of an excuse is 'teach with gift, not with gifts!?'

char_332_archet.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_332_archet.text: Rhodes Island is a world apart from Laterano. All with a different scape in their hearts, mingling together. It truly is an extraordinary thing. Doctor, you must consider coming to the Monastery to teach after you retire. Issues of faith? That'll be no problem! None of us will mind.

char_332_archet.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_332_archet.text: At the start of spring, we'll prune the overgrown vines, and then open up the cellar come evening and retrieve the wine. The moment the setting sun catches through our glasses, we'll down them in one gulp. Ceremony? No, it's just a custom of ours. Life and faith became one long ago, and we don't want to lose it, that's all.

char_332_archet.title: Idle
char_332_archet.text: I feel like I heard bells... mm, just my imagination.

char_332_archet.title: Onboard
char_332_archet.text: Cleric of Landen Monastery, Operator Archetto. Today on, I'll be in formal cooperation with you, for the rebuilding of the Landen Monastery famed far and wide! Doctor, if you would, please look over these contract terms!

char_332_archet.title: Watching Battle Record
char_332_archet.text: I see, I see, so this is how Rhodes Island's operators fight! Truly, they're exemplary!

char_332_archet.title: Promotion 1
char_332_archet.text: A promotion? My greatest thanks. Hm? I seem at peace? Of course. When you spend five years partaking in commendation ceremonies for outstanding clerics where everyone sleeps the whole way through from hangover, these things don't get to you much.

char_332_archet.title: Promotion 2
char_332_archet.text: Another promotion? Hmm... all the companies outside seem to strongly emphasize a hierarchical structure. Well, seeing as my promotion's been set in stone, does that mean Rhodes Island is willing to agree and sign to long-term cooperative terms with our Monastery?

char_332_archet.title: Added to Squad
char_332_archet.text: May Rhodes Island see for itself the distinguished tactical accomplishments of Landen Monastery.

char_332_archet.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_332_archet.text: Cooperating with my Sisters, everyone always drowned each other out... but under my command, things may be a little terser. I'll do my utmost.

char_332_archet.title: Depart
char_332_archet.text: Arrow nocked.

char_332_archet.title: Begin Operation
char_332_archet.text: Enemy sighted.

char_332_archet.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_332_archet.text: Your orders.

char_332_archet.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_332_archet.text: What arrow should I use?

char_332_archet.title: Deployment 1
char_332_archet.text: I've found our prey.

char_332_archet.title: Deployment 2
char_332_archet.text: May the Lord bless us.

char_332_archet.title: In Battle 1
char_332_archet.text: Draw. Take aim. Loose.

char_332_archet.title: In Battle 2
char_332_archet.text: Feel the bowstring's shake...

char_332_archet.title: In Battle 3
char_332_archet.text: Gospel, gather at my fingertips...

char_332_archet.title: In Battle 4
char_332_archet.text: My bow has three choices, and the enemy three hardships.

char_332_archet.title: 4-star Result
char_332_archet.text: 'Long may the Monastery's bells sound.' This is a prayer for victory. Though we've already won!

char_332_archet.title: 3-star Result
char_332_archet.text: Right! I joined in this battle. Now nobody will think Landen Monastery's just an ornament of Laterano, will they?

char_332_archet.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_332_archet.text: ...Please allow me the chance to remedy this! This is my mistake, and in no way represents the Monastery!

char_332_archet.title: Operation Failure
char_332_archet.text: Were battles beyond the walls... always so cruel?

char_332_archet.title: Assigned to Facility
char_332_archet.text: It's too stifling in here. There's near to none of the Monastery's sunshine!

char_332_archet.title: Tap
char_332_archet.text: Oh—is something wrong?

char_332_archet.title: Trust Tap
char_332_archet.text: Ah, Doctor, I've been thinking whether I should invite you with me to come see Laterano. Perhaps you'd have more interest in the Monastery then...

char_332_archet.title: Title
char_332_archet.text: Arknights.

char_332_archet.title: Greeting
char_332_archet.text: May the Lord bless you, Doctor.

char_338_iris.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_338_iris.text: What? You think this work is going to do itself? Hmph! There's no such fairy who'd finish somebody's work off while they go dozing off. Forget your wild ideas and get your nose to the grindstone, Doctor.

char_338_iris.title: Talk 1
char_338_iris.text: I and my companions will often receive children who come to the castle. Of course, on occasion we'll have a good and honest adult come lodging, but that sort of person is few and far between.

char_338_iris.title: Talk 2
char_338_iris.text: I came to find a girl named Mabel. Ah, twenty years ago she was a girl. She's a woman by now. ...Codename? How would I know what her codename is? But I know for certain she's here, without a doubt!

char_338_iris.title: Talk 3
char_338_iris.text: If there's nothing to keep us, then let me take my leave. I'm still quite busy. I have an appointment with the children being treated here, and I'll be telling them stories today.

char_338_iris.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_338_iris.text: Children are much better off compared to adults. Children are much more innocent. They have fine qualities. They are the most valuable, cherished thing upon this world.

char_338_iris.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_338_iris.text: A beloved rag doll, a pretty flower, a storybook turned until its pages are worn... Children who've come to Wonderland have left much to the castle. Things they believe are precious, that they haven't much way of keeping safe themselves, all can be put into our care.

char_338_iris.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_338_iris.text: Now come wisplight and lamplight, come light up the way~ Come to our little tea party to stay~♪ Here come the guards, and they dance and sing for us, carrying scissors to chop-chop away♪ I sang this song about my friends to entertain the children with me. Learned the words? I shan't sing them to you again.

char_338_iris.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_338_iris.text: I know. Mabel's no longer with us. You called her Bluishsilver, didn't you? I've seen records... asked after her with her teammates—her tale is so sad. How strange. Though this is the time we'd set, I can't help but feel I was too late...

char_338_iris.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_338_iris.text: 'Wonderland,' 'Slumberland,' 'the Cradle'... have you never heard these names before? Oh, you poor soul. Had no-one ever told you any bedtime stories? ...Sigh. Oh, I suppose. Close your eyes, now. I'd rather not, but let's have you see for yourself, just once.

char_338_iris.title: Idle
char_338_iris.text: Oh, really! How do you fall asleep somewhere like this? And the files are all still at sixes and sevens! ...Fine. Seeing that you work so hard normally, I'll help you just this once...

char_338_iris.title: Onboard
char_338_iris.text: I am Iris, Master of the Castle of Dreams, Keeper of the Cradle. As per our agreement, I've come to return something a guest once left to the castle... How strange. Why can I not find her?

char_338_iris.title: Watching Battle Record
char_338_iris.text: How barbarous, though it does have its merits.

char_338_iris.title: Promotion 1
char_338_iris.text: I'm the master of a castle. If we're to talk promotions, I ought to be giving one to you.

char_338_iris.title: Promotion 2
char_338_iris.text: Right, then! You'll see first-hand the full power of the Master of the Castle! Fairytales uphold such purity, such beauty, and they owe it only to their protectors' sufficient strength. Is Rhodes Island not like this, too?

char_338_iris.title: Added to Squad
char_338_iris.text: Oh, fine, I suppose.

char_338_iris.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_338_iris.text: Listen to my orders, now. Agreements made are not to be violated.

char_338_iris.title: Depart
char_338_iris.text: I will lead you all to the proper place.

char_338_iris.title: Begin Operation
char_338_iris.text: And those are the people we're driving off, then?

char_338_iris.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_338_iris.text: Right.

char_338_iris.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_338_iris.text: Don't push me.

char_338_iris.title: Deployment 1
char_338_iris.text: The air is quite thick here.

char_338_iris.title: Deployment 2
char_338_iris.text: Hmph! I'll help you just this once.

char_338_iris.title: In Battle 1
char_338_iris.text: Would you all like a bedtime story too?

char_338_iris.title: In Battle 2
char_338_iris.text: You shan't pass!

char_338_iris.title: In Battle 3
char_338_iris.text: Impertinent!

char_338_iris.title: In Battle 4
char_338_iris.text: Seeing dreamland, now?

char_338_iris.title: 4-star Result
char_338_iris.text: How's that? I've driven them all off, now!

char_338_iris.title: 3-star Result
char_338_iris.text: So this is the taste of victory. Yet... I wonder why I can't feel happy about it...

char_338_iris.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_338_iris.text: Hmph. They've run off by themselves. Doesn't that sort things?

char_338_iris.title: Operation Failure
char_338_iris.text: What's going on? Did you fall asleep?! Quick, with me, out of here!

char_338_iris.title: Assigned to Facility
char_338_iris.text: What a strange place. Is there no larger bed anywhere?

char_338_iris.title: Tap
char_338_iris.text: Ah—my fan! Give that back!

char_338_iris.title: Trust Tap
char_338_iris.text: Careful, there, don't ruffle the headdress... yes, quite, comb just like that...

char_338_iris.title: Title
char_338_iris.text: Arknights.

char_338_iris.title: Greeting
char_338_iris.text: Good day to you, Doctor.

char_452_bstalk.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_452_bstalk.text: Want my help? Hehe, I'll think about it if you give my buddies three days of luxury pet food! How about it, sounds like a deal, isn't... Hey, wait up! I'm just kidding! Don't go!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Outta the way, outta the way~ Beanstalk Breeding Center coming right through! Watch your feet! Careful not to step on any of us~

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk 2
char_452_bstalk.text: Doctor! Click is here at Rhodes Island? I can't believe you haven't ever told me! I'm a huge fan of her outdoorsy videos! She called Pea cute, and she even said she'll bring Pea along the next time she goes on a shoot!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk 3
char_452_bstalk.text: There's been all these morons saying they'd go mining and then dug up a bunch of holes out in the wilderness. Fine, but how dare they make a mess of everyone's home! If I ever catch those bastards, I'm blowing a hole in their asses with my crossbow!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Doctor, I'm done with my breeding proposal. Take a look, will ya? Huh? The budget doesn't add up...? Tsk, he found out, huh? Oh, my bad! I probably got the numbers messed up somewhere! I'll get it fixed right away~

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_452_bstalk.text: Before I came to Rhodes Island, I sent my resume to so many companies out there, and they all turned me down. Well, just look at how helpful my little buddies are now, both in the battlefield and in logistics. Those big shots only have themselves to blame. It's their loss!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_452_bstalk.text: You see, Pea may be the smallest of the Metal Crabs I brought with me, but she's also the brightest of the bunch! She's gonna be so amazing in the future~! My little buddies are nothing like the normal Metal Crabs out there. They're so smart! They won't be controlled by anyone out there so easily!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_452_bstalk.text: 1, 2! 1, 2! Line up! Defense position, and block! Okay! All of you are doing amazing! Here's your reward. Eat up~! Let's switch it up now. Attac—Whoa, Doctor, how long've you been here? How come you're always so quiet when you walk?!

char_452_bstalk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_452_bstalk.text: My old man doesn't really support me raising my little pals. He says they're useless, and that I'd be better off raising burdenbeasts. Hmph, I'm show him. I'll make it big with my buddies, and we'll see if he has anything to say then! Hey, Doctor, have you ever thought of investing in me? I guarantee you you'll be raking in lots of money!

char_452_bstalk.title: Idle
char_452_bstalk.text: Alright, focus! Doctor, you can't just space out while you're working. Take a look at what a good girl Pea is. Be more like her.

char_452_bstalk.title: Onboard
char_452_bstalk.text: Hello, Doctor. My name's Beanstalk. Starting today, I'll be... Eh? What's in my case? Oh, this is Peacake. Here, Pea, say hi to the Doctor.

char_452_bstalk.title: Watching Battle Record
char_452_bstalk.text: Aha! That was awesome! Did you see that, Pea?

char_452_bstalk.title: Promotion 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Ehe, you're promoting us because of how well we did in the last operation, right?

char_452_bstalk.title: Promotion 2
char_452_bstalk.text: Doctor, thanks for giving me and my buddies a chance to prove ourselves! I'll cut the formalities. We'll get even more amazing than this! You're in for a surprise!

char_452_bstalk.title: Added to Squad
char_452_bstalk.text: It's our time to shine~

char_452_bstalk.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_452_bstalk.text: Alright! Everyone, do what I say!

char_452_bstalk.title: Depart
char_452_bstalk.text: Team Beanstalk, here we go!

char_452_bstalk.title: Begin Operation
char_452_bstalk.text: Huh? Are these who we're up against?

char_452_bstalk.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Here you are.

char_452_bstalk.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_452_bstalk.text: All ready to go~

char_452_bstalk.title: Deployment 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Go! Show them what we've got!

char_452_bstalk.title: Deployment 2
char_452_bstalk.text: Let's go!

char_452_bstalk.title: In Battle 1
char_452_bstalk.text: Hehe, you can't hit me~

char_452_bstalk.title: In Battle 2
char_452_bstalk.text: Stop them!

char_452_bstalk.title: In Battle 3
char_452_bstalk.text: I won't let you get past us!

char_452_bstalk.title: In Battle 4
char_452_bstalk.text: You assholes! I won't let you hurt my buddies!

char_452_bstalk.title: 4-star Result
char_452_bstalk.text: Hehe, you guys are no match for us~

char_452_bstalk.title: 3-star Result
char_452_bstalk.text: Mission complete~! How's that? My buddies did great, huh?

char_452_bstalk.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_452_bstalk.text: Oh, some of them got through! Wait here, Doctor. I'll go after them!

char_452_bstalk.title: Operation Failure
char_452_bstalk.text: *Sob*. It's okay, everyone. Don't cry. I'll beat those jackasses up next time!

char_452_bstalk.title: Assigned to Facility
char_452_bstalk.text: I don't mind sleeping anywhere. Where's the breeding room, though?

char_452_bstalk.title: Tap
char_452_bstalk.text: Why'd you do that? Stop pulling my ribbon!

char_452_bstalk.title: Trust Tap
char_452_bstalk.text: Hm? What's up? Wanna pet Pea?

char_452_bstalk.title: Title
char_452_bstalk.text: Arknights.

char_452_bstalk.title: Greeting
char_452_bstalk.text: Yo~ Whatcha doing, Doctor?

char_402_tuye.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_402_tuye.text: You want me on work this boring thing...? Fine, fine. You're interesting enough to me. I'll go along with you.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk 1
char_402_tuye.text: If you want something moved, don't ask me. I'm not that brand of Forte.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk 2
char_402_tuye.text: This is some insanely precise instrument... huh? What, familiar sight? Huhhh. Oh, right. If that Mayer person comes 'round, don't tell her I'm here.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk 3
char_402_tuye.text: Never seen the equipment on my back before? Right, come over, put your hand here... keh-ka-hahahahahah! Look at your dumb face! You wanna know what just came out? It's water! And what's mixed in? Heh. You don't get to know.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_402_tuye.text: My interest in helping others is zip. But higher efficiency is good for everybody.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_402_tuye.text: Battles finish up faster now. Good to know, I guess.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_402_tuye.text: Cake? Soft and squishy—not my speed. But. Mmp, mmnm... the umeboshi on top's not bad, sure.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_402_tuye.text: No rain in the ship? Wow. Like I don't know that? Now try and predict how it goes down out there. Next time there's a storm, just try it, get a little closer. Bet you won't stop thanking me then.

char_402_tuye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_402_tuye.text: Oi. How does a day trip in the desert sound? I'll take you. I mean, anywhere else is fine too. As long as we have my multifunction jetpack, following the scent of the wind... heh. You must be dumb happy, having a guide as stellar as me.

char_402_tuye.title: Idle
char_402_tuye.text: You out cold? Then let me just try this. Harder flow, greater spray area... And you get no right to complain.

char_402_tuye.title: Onboard
char_402_tuye.text: You the Doctor? They all say you're the one here who knows more than the rest. You're gonna let me figure that out.

char_402_tuye.title: Watching Battle Record
char_402_tuye.text: Combat's just like crossing the desert, where experience means nothing. Your only need is survival instincts.

char_402_tuye.title: Promotion 1
char_402_tuye.text: Doesn't this Elite Medal have any other kind of function? No fun there.

char_402_tuye.title: Promotion 2
char_402_tuye.text: Medical pro? It's a weird world where I get called that. Anyway, it's all about getting my jobs done, either way, right?

char_402_tuye.title: Added to Squad
char_402_tuye.text: Out for field work again? Fine, fine. You're helping me test new equipment when we get back.

char_402_tuye.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_402_tuye.text: Leading team combat doesn't differ much from being a guide.

char_402_tuye.title: Depart
char_402_tuye.text: Route, OK. Equipment, check. Go.

char_402_tuye.title: Begin Operation
char_402_tuye.text: More boring than running into a sandstorm.

char_402_tuye.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_402_tuye.text: Speak up.

char_402_tuye.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_402_tuye.text: I'm thinking...

char_402_tuye.title: Deployment 1
char_402_tuye.text: Good. Efficiency up by 17%.

char_402_tuye.title: Deployment 2
char_402_tuye.text: Need to move faster.

char_402_tuye.title: In Battle 1
char_402_tuye.text: Faster.

char_402_tuye.title: In Battle 2
char_402_tuye.text: Time to test my upgraded equipment.

char_402_tuye.title: In Battle 3
char_402_tuye.text: How's the newest nutritional fluid taste?

char_402_tuye.title: In Battle 4
char_402_tuye.text: Scent of the wind's changed...

char_402_tuye.title: 4-star Result
char_402_tuye.text: Tch. The sandstorms I've seen beat this any day.

char_402_tuye.title: 3-star Result
char_402_tuye.text: Scraped through, huh. Wasn't a waste of time.

char_402_tuye.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_402_tuye.text: Efficiency lacking. Gotta head back and adjust my equipment, or switch reagents, maybe.

char_402_tuye.title: Operation Failure
char_402_tuye.text: At least you figured a good retreat route...

char_402_tuye.title: Assigned to Facility
char_402_tuye.text: You have a lot of rooms, huh...

char_402_tuye.title: Tap
char_402_tuye.text: You gotta stop the boring crap.

char_402_tuye.title: Trust Tap
char_402_tuye.text: Wanna try touching my bag again? Won't hit your face this time. Promise.

char_402_tuye.title: Title
char_402_tuye.text: Arknights.

char_402_tuye.title: Greeting
char_402_tuye.text: Rain again. Good weather, huh, Doctor?

char_2015_dusk.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2015_dusk.text: Hm? Did I not explain that you were forbidden to enter without my express permission, after knocking? Oh? This is your office? You're working? Then have I not come out of my room to work as well? What is the meaning of 'your office'? Get out! I'm still sketching it out.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk 1
char_2015_dusk.text: You want to see my painting? You may. For you, I could even give you the painting. But if you like it, I won't give it to you. You don't like it? Huh, then you wouldn't want it anyway. This is who I am. Deal with it.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk 2
char_2015_dusk.text: Haa… I'm trapped on this ship. If anyone asks, you tell them so, and you do not let them into my room. I'm taking up space? I'm refusing to perform my operator duties? Hello, I am Dusk, the great painter trapped in this room.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk 3
char_2015_dusk.text: I'm not going out. Don't try to make me go out, I don't want to go out. I no longer care for the world outside. Do I dislike it? I like it fine. The mountains and rivers, the flowers and feathers, the pools and forests, the common folk, young and old, I could paint forever, I could watch forever, and yet, I will not go. It does not hold my interest forever.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2015_dusk.text: I loathe the word 'taste.' What gives these people the confidence to demand something good just as they open their mouths to lock the gates to others? It is unbecoming. If you are satisfied, you are satisfied. Should you enter, you must not bar the gate. Do you see the twin moons thinking only of themselves?

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2015_dusk.text: An opportunity to watch me paint in earnest comes but once in a lifetime to one in ten thousand individuals. 'When the time comes, the strength of heaven and earth are one.' Ch'i, bone, shape, color, method, pouring out as a vast river, fine like the shadow of mountain bamboo, such is my brush, and it will not stop.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2015_dusk.text: I took the time to partake of some contemporary works. Films are not bad, they are like paintings. The good ones all have a unique strength of character, with form, and with decent meaning. Right, poetry and painting have a legacy. Do you have time to help me burn Nian's mountain of garbage? She is denigrating the very concept of cinema. Please.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2015_dusk.text: Food? Oh, thank you. Hm, where does this drink come from? It's good. Quite good. But I feel like it's missing something. You want to know what I usually eat? Then close your eyes. Ah~ You feel nothing, yes? That's because if you don't look, the food in my paintings does not exist.

char_2015_dusk.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2015_dusk.text: Take a look at Nian's carefree expression. You know the truth, don't you? She cares quite a bit about our lives, and our deaths. As for me? I may not get along with the wretched scribbler, but neither of us care much. When people die, the paintings remain. When I die, my work remains.

char_2015_dusk.title: Idle
char_2015_dusk.text: Dreams are like unto life, like unto the scroll. One sleeps this sleep, will one sleep for millennia?

char_2015_dusk.title: Onboard
char_2015_dusk.text: Oh? {@nickname}? Another contract? Very well, please don't bother me again after I sign this one. Here... I should tell you here and now: I, Dusk, do not give out my paintings. Not to anyone. And I don't take commissions!

char_2015_dusk.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2015_dusk.text: Hm? A swing of an axe becomes rivers of blood. Do you mean... you want me to paint this?

char_2015_dusk.title: Promotion 1
char_2015_dusk.text: Why use a sword? There is a reason. 'With an inkstone sheath, one may learn the annals. With a brush sword, one may paint the celestial.' Is it true? Naturally, I speak off the cuff.

char_2015_dusk.title: Promotion 2
char_2015_dusk.text: Ahh, to make it this far with me... I should paint you a scroll. But be careful! Do not get caught up within it. The world I paint is much more fascinating than this one. How many have been lost, since ancient times? How many have escaped?

char_2015_dusk.title: Added to Squad
char_2015_dusk.text: Don't keep me too long.

char_2015_dusk.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2015_dusk.text: Captain? What does a captain do?

char_2015_dusk.title: Depart
char_2015_dusk.text: Let's get this over with.

char_2015_dusk.title: Begin Operation
char_2015_dusk.text: I'm in a good mood today. I'll give you this one I've titled 'Bones on the Sand'.

char_2015_dusk.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2015_dusk.text: Don't go too far.

char_2015_dusk.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2015_dusk.text: Better leave the fine brush at home.

char_2015_dusk.title: Deployment 1
char_2015_dusk.text: Would any of you like to be my paint?

char_2015_dusk.title: Deployment 2
char_2015_dusk.text: This battlefield would do well with a splash of ink.

char_2015_dusk.title: In Battle 1
char_2015_dusk.text: Too difficult to explain, let me paint it for you.

char_2015_dusk.title: In Battle 2
char_2015_dusk.text: With the setting of the sun, the brush draws up the peaks!

char_2015_dusk.title: In Battle 3
char_2015_dusk.text: Copy the infinite with the tangible, bring the intangible to life!

char_2015_dusk.title: In Battle 4
char_2015_dusk.text: I am rather attached to you. Most of the time.

char_2015_dusk.title: 4-star Result
char_2015_dusk.text: Once, painting and war were quite different. But with this power, battle is art.

char_2015_dusk.title: 3-star Result
char_2015_dusk.text: Not bad.

char_2015_dusk.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2015_dusk.text: Hm... a failed painting must be destroyed. It will bring shame.

char_2015_dusk.title: Operation Failure
char_2015_dusk.text: Slipped on a stroke? Start over.

char_2015_dusk.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2015_dusk.text: Do not bother preparing the room for me. I will handle it myself.

char_2015_dusk.title: Tap
char_2015_dusk.text: You'll spill my ink!

char_2015_dusk.title: Trust Tap
char_2015_dusk.text: Hey, don't get paint everywhere.

char_2015_dusk.title: Title
char_2015_dusk.text: Arknights.

char_2015_dusk.title: Greeting
char_2015_dusk.text: What was your name again? Oh, {@nickname}?

char_362_saga.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_362_saga.text: I shall come! Doctor, so long as I am here, thou mayst be at ease in thy work!

char_362_saga.title: Talk 1
char_362_saga.text: I grew from childhood in the monastery. Though I could recite the texts from heart, I never fully understood their inner meanings, and my old head priest and the other great masters gave explanations from which I could comprehend even less. Doctor, thou art of learned stature. Mayst thou be able to teach me?

char_362_saga.title: Talk 2
char_362_saga.text: Rhodes Island truly lacks none for novel machinery... hm? Doctor, underestimate me not. I may begin clueless, but I am no contrarian to the times. If I do not know how, then I need only learn. My personal music player even holds some songs of the good Miss Sora within it.

char_362_saga.title: Talk 3
char_362_saga.text: So as to evade Catastrophe, I once accompanied my old head priest and fellow monastery apprentices over mountain and valley. My head priest spoke that Catastrophes were the wrath of the gods. Yet, I have never witnessed one by my own eyes. I am somewhat curious.

char_362_saga.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_362_saga.text: I am not a true monk, merely raised by the monastery. At my departure, Saga was the name my old head priest gave to me. Its meaning is of high mountains and rugged roads. And only when I left the monastery, did I come to know how the world was no straightforward thing.

char_362_saga.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_362_saga.text: I swallow hardship, and fear not fatigue, yet there is still one thing I cannot assent to. My master spoke that all living beings are equal. The Infected are people all the same, people only fallen ill. Why can they not be permitted to live?

char_362_saga.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_362_saga.text: Ho-ho. I may have only erred upon a Rhodes Island recruitment spot at first, but whether the food or the beds, it is all of great quality, and the pay pales not. I truly have stumbled upon a wonderful place.

char_362_saga.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_362_saga.text: When I left the monastery, I had thought that entering society would involve no more than dealing with pests, ridding some despots. I had never dreamt it would be so treacherous as this. There are times I do not even know what I draw my blade for. Doctor... I do not understand.

char_362_saga.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_362_saga.text: I still puzzle over much in my heart, but I have understood at least that some answers I must seek myself, and some thoughts I must think through myself. Doctor, until I have sorted it all out, I wish to continue my training by thine side. Pray, allow me this!

char_362_saga.title: Idle
char_362_saga.text: Doctor... ho, thou art quite skillful to fall asleep sitting. In that case, I shall meditate for a while.

char_362_saga.title: Onboard
char_362_saga.text: Thou art the Doctor? Hail and well... ah, ought not I be more serious at times like these? Ahem—my name is Saga. I am a wandering monk. Should there be any place thou mayst need me, refrain not in sending me!

char_362_saga.title: Watching Battle Record
char_362_saga.text: Ho-ho. To think such strategy does exist in the world. My horizons have broadened.

char_362_saga.title: Promotion 1
char_362_saga.text: A raise? Splendid! I have been watering at the mouth to try the deluxe set at the cafeteria for quite some time, yet have been embarrassingly out of pocket... today, I am finally able to feast!

char_362_saga.title: Promotion 2
char_362_saga.text: Dear head priest. In my heart yet is wild disarray. The ways of this world I still cannot see through, nor cut down. Though I am fortunate to have met with great people, and with their guidance, there will come a day in our turbulent mortal world where I cut through to the heavens!

char_362_saga.title: Added to Squad
char_362_saga.text: I shall come!

char_362_saga.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_362_saga.text: Am I the captain? Not a problem!

char_362_saga.title: Depart
char_362_saga.text: I shall go!

char_362_saga.title: Begin Operation
char_362_saga.text: My blade cuts only evil!

char_362_saga.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_362_saga.text: Takuan-zuke... hah! I am right here!

char_362_saga.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_362_saga.text: Leave this to me!

char_362_saga.title: Deployment 1
char_362_saga.text: I am here!

char_362_saga.title: Deployment 2
char_362_saga.text: Who dares be rash!

char_362_saga.title: In Battle 1
char_362_saga.text: Sever all desires!

char_362_saga.title: In Battle 2
char_362_saga.text: Cleanse the six senses!

char_362_saga.title: In Battle 3
char_362_saga.text: Natto gohan!

char_362_saga.title: In Battle 4
char_362_saga.text: Aburaage!

char_362_saga.title: 4-star Result
char_362_saga.text: 'Twas truly an arduous trial. I have gained greatly for it.

char_362_saga.title: 3-star Result
char_362_saga.text: As expected of the Doctor! Alone, I would surely have let quite a few through.

char_362_saga.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_362_saga.text: My head priest spoke that one must have a merciful heart, and I believe that this suffices, more or less.

char_362_saga.title: Operation Failure
char_362_saga.text: Doctor, go quickly! Leave the rear to me!

char_362_saga.title: Assigned to Facility
char_362_saga.text: What is this scent?!

char_362_saga.title: Tap
char_362_saga.text: What-ho?!

char_362_saga.title: Trust Tap
char_362_saga.text: Call, and I shall surely come running.

char_362_saga.title: Title
char_362_saga.text: Arknights.

char_362_saga.title: Greeting
char_362_saga.text: Doctor, hast thou eaten? An unfilled stomach will surely leave thee powerless at work.

char_455_nothin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_455_nothin.text: Hm. The office of the vaunted Doctor, then? Marvelous, truly. Allow me a brief moment to consult my feng shui crash-course guidebook...

char_455_nothin.title: Talk 1
char_455_nothin.text: I'm no mere braggart! Beyond a little kickboxing in a scuffle, I can rustle up meals, practice acupuncture, divine with feng shui, work masonry, tend to rice and angle fish alike—I'm a maestro of all kinds! Doctor, you need only give the order, and I'll see everything through!

char_455_nothin.title: Talk 2
char_455_nothin.text: D-Doctor, I was a little idle, see, and went to make myself useful at HR, and by carelessness glimpsed at a few operator files, and... er, well, could FEater be the very star of 'Fiends of the Gods Reincarnated Immortal' herself? Truly? Could I go get an autograph?

char_455_nothin.title: Talk 3
char_455_nothin.text: Who was my master? Hmm, a question as complex as a showdown of Yan cuisines. Normally I'd refrain from answering that, as slipping up would get me beaten sideways. That said... you need only know, Doctor, I'm the last descendant of the Lien line. Ah, but my family name's not Lien. I'm a Ch'u.

char_455_nothin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_455_nothin.text: M-Miss Dusk really did... come to Rhodes Island with us, then? My, um... what was it now? My recollection's quite fuzzy now, yet I have the vague impression that within her painted dreams, I had a peek into my own miserable future. Ah, let's never we mind. Dear, oh, dear. You be quite careful too, Doctor.

char_455_nothin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_455_nothin.text: Now, now, Doctor, don't worry about me. I and the Infected do get along well. Back at my old place, a Catastrophe once struck not too far away. It frightened all of us, seeing the world go pitch black. My master remarked then that Catastrophes were Heaven's false charge against the human realm. Ah, truly a bitter thing.

char_455_nothin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_455_nothin.text: Benefactor Lava? Yes, I call her my benefactor. She once saved me, and as time went on, it became second nature. Throughout my life I've been saved thrice, and every time, I engrave it upon my soul. The gloompincer incident, you mean? No, not that. She showed to me a path, and that was true grace beyond all.

char_455_nothin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_455_nothin.text: Say, Doctor, are people able to brush the past away as they live? Certainly not, hm? If the bonds you once left behind still hold fast, what ought you do? You've no idea either? Well, then. It seems we're companions in our misery. Here, what say we crack some sunflower seeds?

char_455_nothin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_455_nothin.text: Countless, they were, the ancient parasol trees about Kou-wu City. Oh, just reminiscing all of a sudden. I remember the leaves scattered across the ground come fall, when my parents would visit me from the country. Only then would my strict master speak nothing but good, and her other disciples, my brothers and sisters, wouldn't bully me. No, well, just reminiscing.

char_455_nothin.title: Idle
char_455_nothin.text: Hmm. I've been pondering a fan for you too, but what ought we write on it?

char_455_nothin.title: Onboard
char_455_nothin.text: My codename? 'Mr. Nothing.' The latter man of Tzu-hsu and Wu-yu; Nonexistent and Nothing indeed. And you, fine soul, are the Doctor? That is to say, my new boss? Well, then, would you like me to massage your back? Loosen up your legs?

char_455_nothin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_455_nothin.text: Ho, what a hundredfold bouquet of martial prowess. You've got my eyes wide open now!

char_455_nothin.title: Promotion 1
char_455_nothin.text: A promotion and a raise?! Ohh, ohh, I thank you, Doctor, in all respects possible! Be it for you, I would brave the greatest fires and waters, I would not hesitate to... well, that said, how much might my wages be growing by?

char_455_nothin.title: Promotion 2
char_455_nothin.text: Sooner or later, I plan to return to Kou-wu City and set every debt in my books straight. My only worry is I may invite trouble and sweep others up in its path. You know this, dear Doctor, and yet you still wish to bestow such partiality on me...? Your kindness toward me is a grace, and I will never, in eternity, forget it.

char_455_nothin.title: Added to Squad
char_455_nothin.text: Very well! Doctor, I'll see to it that you have nothing at all to worry about.

char_455_nothin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_455_nothin.text: Me, the captain? Hold one moment, just let me find my secret tomes for the art of war, now...

char_455_nothin.title: Depart
char_455_nothin.text: As they say, all have their own methods, whether arms against a force or earth to a waterspout. There'll be a way!

char_455_nothin.title: Begin Operation
char_455_nothin.text: I'm witnessing fiends, one and all! Quite frightening!

char_455_nothin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_455_nothin.text: Might you need me?

char_455_nothin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_455_nothin.text: Here! Right here!

char_455_nothin.title: Deployment 1
char_455_nothin.text: Very well! Leave this to me.

char_455_nothin.title: Deployment 2
char_455_nothin.text: The Doctor, you are! What a sagacious decision!

char_455_nothin.title: In Battle 1
char_455_nothin.text: Compose yourself. Collect yourself!

char_455_nothin.title: In Battle 2
char_455_nothin.text: A perfect technique makes freedom to act!

char_455_nothin.title: In Battle 3
char_455_nothin.text: The moon waxes and wanes. The fan opens and shuts!

char_455_nothin.title: In Battle 4
char_455_nothin.text: Let's have you make a move first, now.

char_455_nothin.title: 4-star Result
char_455_nothin.text: More hands bring more fuel for the fire. When we concert our efforts together, yes, we truly can burn the sky a red to rival sunsets. Not bad, not bad.

char_455_nothin.title: 3-star Result
char_455_nothin.text: As they say, those of just ways have much support, and those of lost ways find little. Seen as such, our victory is assured.

char_455_nothin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_455_nothin.text: Pursue not the cornered. Suppose anything troublesome should happen, we'll just bear it together.

char_455_nothin.title: Operation Failure
char_455_nothin.text: Go on ahead, everyone. No worries. My runaway act is first in class. I'll be just fine.

char_455_nothin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_455_nothin.text: Oh-hoh, Rhodes Island truly is a wondrous land. I feel quite dizzy just looking.

char_455_nothin.title: Tap
char_455_nothin.text: Hoh? What's this for exactly, Doctor?

char_455_nothin.title: Trust Tap
char_455_nothin.text: Doctor, what say I teach you a thing or two about some moves?

char_455_nothin.title: Title
char_455_nothin.text: Arknights.

char_455_nothin.title: Greeting
char_455_nothin.text: Well, if it isn't the Doctor! What a happy coincidence!

char_1011_lava2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1011_lava2.text: I have some free time, so I guess I could help you out... What's this? This has got nothing to do with disasters and Arts, just some normal paperwork? Hey!

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk 1
char_1011_lava2.text: You wanna try some fortune-telling? Well, that brings me back. I haven't done it for a while. I could take a look at your fortune to kill some time, I guess. Hmm, if your luck isn't beyond words as always... Well, you're gonna have to prove my results wrong.

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk 2
char_1011_lava2.text: I do research on Arts because it's part of my responsibilities as a Caster. If I can't even do that, how am I supposed to protect those who... Huh? You got sweets? For me? Uh, thanks...

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk 3
char_1011_lava2.text: Hibiscus... My sister always helps people whenever they need, even if it's not part of her mission. It's like she's not a Sarkaz at all, what with how kind she is. She treats this world with kindness, but how many people know to repay it?

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1011_lava2.text: Why I'm not into fortune telling anymore? 'cause the fear and curiosity that people have about the future usually has to do with natural phenomena. That, and I've realized the results you get with fortune telling don't really mean much, having come face to face with so many cruelties.

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1011_lava2.text: In terms of performance, books and staffs are just about the same as Arts conductors. If you ask me, I think knives are much more practical. When you run short of your Arts and have to throw yourself into a melee, or you're out in the wilderness, just trying to survive, all those words in the books aren't going to do you much good.

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1011_lava2.text: It's a pain to fight as a team, but when I look back on those times I fought side by side with my Reserve Ops teammates now... It brings back memories, I guess. If I get the chance to fight alongside them again... No, never mind.

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1011_lava2.text: I wasn't that grumpy and curt now, was I? How come Hibiscus still treats me like a kid who hasn't grown up yet? It's like she's doing it to pick on me! We finally managed to make up, but it just ticks me off when I see her act so calm about it!

char_1011_lava2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1011_lava2.text: The times we live in are so messed up, there's just way too much malevolence going around in this world. We have to change that. I can't stand all those rotten hypocrites acting all kindhearted treating my fellow Sarkaz like that... just because of who we are.

char_1011_lava2.title: Idle
char_1011_lava2.text: Sheesh... You always look so peaceful in your sleep.

char_1011_lava2.title: Onboard
char_1011_lava2.text: Hey, what's the big idea? Who let you come in without knock—Oh, it's you, Doctor. Why am I wearing this? Well... I'm hitting the training grounds to test my limits once more. Wanna come watch, Doctor?

char_1011_lava2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1011_lava2.text: I got it all down.

char_1011_lava2.title: Promotion 1
char_1011_lava2.text: There are lots of talented Casters out there, but I'm not so lucky. That's why I have to get stronger if I want to be able to save the world. Thanks for helping me out, Doctor.

char_1011_lava2.title: Promotion 2
char_1011_lava2.text: I've got the hang of fire Arts now. If I keep working on this, I might just make it to the boundaries of modern Arts theory... I might even be able to manipulate space and matter.

char_1011_lava2.title: Added to Squad
char_1011_lava2.text: I've got a good idea of the enemy's weaknesses. Let's go.

char_1011_lava2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1011_lava2.text: I'm not good at this kinda stuff... Just gotta get this over with quickly, right?

char_1011_lava2.title: Depart
char_1011_lava2.text: I'm counting on you to have my back while I take care of the enemies.

char_1011_lava2.title: Begin Operation
char_1011_lava2.text: You've strayed from the path of righteousness. Your sinful souls deserve no mercy.

char_1011_lava2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1011_lava2.text: No time to hesitate.

char_1011_lava2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1011_lava2.text: It's time!

char_1011_lava2.title: Deployment 1
char_1011_lava2.text: Let's get this started.

char_1011_lava2.title: Deployment 2
char_1011_lava2.text: Prepare to cast.

char_1011_lava2.title: In Battle 1
char_1011_lava2.text: Hah!

char_1011_lava2.title: In Battle 2
char_1011_lava2.text: Tear them apart!

char_1011_lava2.title: In Battle 3
char_1011_lava2.text: Too weak. There's no point in hiding!

char_1011_lava2.title: In Battle 4
char_1011_lava2.text: Your tricks won't work here!

char_1011_lava2.title: 4-star Result
char_1011_lava2.text: It's only by overcoming challenges that we manage to accomplish something.

char_1011_lava2.title: 3-star Result
char_1011_lava2.text: Hmph... Accept your defeat in pain and fear. Evil will always be defeated.

char_1011_lava2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1011_lava2.text: This shows how powerful we are now. It's far from enough, though. I know I can do better than this. I have to do better.

char_1011_lava2.title: Operation Failure
char_1011_lava2.text: Gah... I gotta... eradicate all evil...

char_1011_lava2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1011_lava2.text: I still have lots to do. Let me stay here.

char_1011_lava2.title: Tap
char_1011_lava2.text: D-Don't pat my head!

char_1011_lava2.title: Trust Tap
char_1011_lava2.text: I'm reading. There's still a lot I need to learn... It's time for tea already? Let's get going, then.

char_1011_lava2.title: Title
char_1011_lava2.text: Arknights.

char_1011_lava2.title: Greeting
char_1011_lava2.text: Morning, Doctor.

char_456_ash.title: Talk 1
char_456_ash.text: The most important thing my safta taught me was that life shouldn't have too many taboos.

char_456_ash.title: Talk 2
char_456_ash.text: Focus on the work at hand and don't jump to any conclusions.

char_456_ash.title: Talk 3
char_456_ash.text: Tachanka's taught me a thing or two about how to build defenses.

char_456_ash.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_456_ash.text: I have some questions, Doctor. I hope you can answer them for me.

char_456_ash.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_456_ash.text: Overcoming obstacles and breaking down barriers makes a lot of things easier.

char_456_ash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_456_ash.text: I'm willing to try, as long as the reward is commensurate to the risk.

char_456_ash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_456_ash.text: You think I'm strict, huh? I'll take that as a compliment.

char_456_ash.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_456_ash.text: Do me a favor. You worry about the strategy and let me worry about the tactics.

char_456_ash.title: Onboard
char_456_ash.text: Rainbow Operator, codename Ash. I have my authorization and I'm ready for assignment.

char_456_ash.title: Watching Battle Record
char_456_ash.text: The more we can learn about their attack patterns, the better off we'll be.

char_456_ash.title: Promotion 2
char_456_ash.text: You can't really understand a conflict until you've been on both sides.

char_456_ash.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_456_ash.text: Let's get our heads in the game.

char_456_ash.title: Depart
char_456_ash.text: Let's show them what we can do.

char_456_ash.title: 4-star Result
char_456_ash.text: That worked out better than I expected.

char_456_ash.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_456_ash.text: We knew the risks. We still have to see this through.

char_457_blitz.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_457_blitz.text: Instead of sitting here, why don't we walk out together?

char_457_blitz.title: Talk 1
char_457_blitz.text: I'm in the starting lineup for next week's football match. Come watch the game!

char_457_blitz.title: Talk 2
char_457_blitz.text: If you know how we can improve my G52 Tactical Shield, please submit a test application. I'll be there anytime.

char_457_blitz.title: Talk 3
char_457_blitz.text: Ease up, there's nothing to be nervous about. Should I invite Tachanka to dance a little ballet for you?

char_457_blitz.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_457_blitz.text: The doctors don't test me because I'm sick. They test me because I'm too healthy. Good thing I'm not afraid of needles!

char_457_blitz.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_457_blitz.text: Flash! Bash! Kapow! That's all you need to know.

char_457_blitz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_457_blitz.text: Not only am I sweet, but I've got a great sense of humor.

char_457_blitz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_457_blitz.text: If you find something interesting to play with, count me in.

char_457_blitz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_457_blitz.text: We have a responsibility to look after one another. I take that very seriously.

char_457_blitz.title: Idle
char_457_blitz.text: This is really interesting, but not to me.

char_457_blitz.title: Onboard
char_457_blitz.text: RAINBOW Operator, codename Blitz. Give the order and I'll bash 'em in the face with my shield!

char_457_blitz.title: Watching Battle Record
char_457_blitz.text: This is pretty good. The popcorn, I mean. Want some?

char_457_blitz.title: Promotion 1
char_457_blitz.text: Medals, awards, promotions. They go really well with my shield, don't you think?

char_457_blitz.title: Promotion 2
char_457_blitz.text: I don't like photos of myself. The lighting is always wrong.

char_457_blitz.title: Added to Squad
char_457_blitz.text: Should we go get the bad guys maybe? Just a suggestion.

char_457_blitz.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_457_blitz.text: Remember: point your guns at the bad guys.

char_457_blitz.title: Depart
char_457_blitz.text: Let's look alive out here.

char_457_blitz.title: Begin Operation
char_457_blitz.text: Bad guys in our way!

char_457_blitz.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_457_blitz.text: Do think I have time to use the bathroom?

char_457_blitz.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_457_blitz.text: If anyone needs to sneeze, do it now.

char_457_blitz.title: Deployment 1
char_457_blitz.text: Let's go!

char_457_blitz.title: Deployment 2
char_457_blitz.text: Move, quickly!

char_457_blitz.title: In Battle 1
char_457_blitz.text: Kapow!

char_457_blitz.title: In Battle 2
char_457_blitz.text: Boom!

char_457_blitz.title: In Battle 3
char_457_blitz.text: Surprise!

char_457_blitz.title: In Battle 4
char_457_blitz.text: Do you like it!

char_457_blitz.title: 4-star Result
char_457_blitz.text: Are we good? Can we go home now?

char_457_blitz.title: 3-star Result
char_457_blitz.text: Everything will be fine, I'm here after all.

char_457_blitz.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_457_blitz.text: Am I going to need to save all your asses again?

char_457_blitz.title: Operation Failure
char_457_blitz.text: Dammit, did anyone remember to bring the ammo?

char_457_blitz.title: Assigned to Facility
char_457_blitz.text: Let's go say hello to our neighbors first.

char_457_blitz.title: Tap
char_457_blitz.text: Wow!

char_457_blitz.title: Trust Tap
char_457_blitz.text: You should invite me over for dinner. We are friends, after all.

char_457_blitz.title: Title
char_457_blitz.text: Arknights.

char_457_blitz.title: Greeting
char_457_blitz.text: Is it time to go?

char_458_rfrost.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_458_rfrost.text: Here's the schedule. You'll also need to review the weekly reports, expense records, and meeting agendas. Which do you want to do first?

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk 1
char_458_rfrost.text: We'll overcome any obstacle as long as we work together.

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Excuse me, sir, but do you mind if I tidy up the bookshelf?

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk 3
char_458_rfrost.text: Sometimes humans behave exactly like wild animals. Understanding this makes me a more efficient operator.

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_458_rfrost.text: To see the really interesting things, you have to get out of the city. That's why I'm always so far away.

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Putting out the Welcome Mat is the first step. Luring the prey takes a bit more doing.

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_458_rfrost.text: No, no. This is all wrong. Let me reconsider for a bit.

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Is there anything I can help with?

char_458_rfrost.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_458_rfrost.text: Who's the hunter? Who's the hunted? That's up to Mother Nature and the battlefield in question.

char_458_rfrost.title: Idle
char_458_rfrost.text: Simply pull this string and there's the Welcome Mat...

char_458_rfrost.title: Onboard
char_458_rfrost.text: RAINBOW Operator, codename Frost. At your service, sir.

char_458_rfrost.title: Watching Battle Record
char_458_rfrost.text: I've got a good idea.

char_458_rfrost.title: Promotion 1
char_458_rfrost.text: Thank you for your trust, sir.

char_458_rfrost.title: Promotion 2
char_458_rfrost.text: There are two things we absolutely need in a survival situation: water and hope.

char_458_rfrost.title: Added to Squad
char_458_rfrost.text: Let's work together.

char_458_rfrost.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_458_rfrost.text: Don't forget, we're a team and we have a plan.

char_458_rfrost.title: Depart
char_458_rfrost.text: Time for all the planning to pay off.

char_458_rfrost.title: Begin Operation
char_458_rfrost.text: I've got eyes on the hostiles.

char_458_rfrost.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_458_rfrost.text: We're ready for company.

char_458_rfrost.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Setting barricade.

char_458_rfrost.title: Deployment 1
char_458_rfrost.text: Don't let them get the drop on you.

char_458_rfrost.title: Deployment 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Stay alert.

char_458_rfrost.title: In Battle 1
char_458_rfrost.text: Laying out the Welcome Mat.

char_458_rfrost.title: In Battle 2
char_458_rfrost.text: Setting up.

char_458_rfrost.title: In Battle 3
char_458_rfrost.text: Welcome Mat set.

char_458_rfrost.title: In Battle 4
char_458_rfrost.text: Deployed.

char_458_rfrost.title: 4-star Result
char_458_rfrost.text: Stay two steps ahead of the enemy at all times.

char_458_rfrost.title: 3-star Result
char_458_rfrost.text: Always think ahead.

char_458_rfrost.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_458_rfrost.text: Maintain a perimeter.

char_458_rfrost.title: Operation Failure
char_458_rfrost.text: Administering aid. Friendly injured.

char_458_rfrost.title: Assigned to Facility
char_458_rfrost.text: This isn't so bad.

char_458_rfrost.title: Tap
char_458_rfrost.text: Hey! Be careful!

char_458_rfrost.title: Trust Tap
char_458_rfrost.text: Come along, join our hunt.

char_458_rfrost.title: Title
char_458_rfrost.text: Arknights.

char_458_rfrost.title: Greeting
char_458_rfrost.text: Would you like a bonfire?

char_459_tachak.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_459_tachak.text: If you invited me, you must not be looking for a tactician.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk 1
char_459_tachak.text: I love my country, for better or for worse.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk 2
char_459_tachak.text: Have you met my sister? She's the one in the white coat in the photo, and those are her children.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk 3
char_459_tachak.text: Survive. Be a leader. You don't want your loved ones crying over your grave, do you?

char_459_tachak.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_459_tachak.text: I don't want my kids to follow in my footsteps. Being a soldier is too dangerous.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_459_tachak.text: In my country, focusing firepower on a target is considered a simple and effective way to achieve victory.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_459_tachak.text: I like the way you think.

char_459_tachak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_459_tachak.text: Personally, I prefer the enemies come to us in search of death. How about you?

char_459_tachak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_459_tachak.text: Relax, baby. When this is all over, I'll buy you some vodka.

char_459_tachak.title: Idle
char_459_tachak.text: Are you bored? Why not clean your weapon?

char_459_tachak.title: Onboard
char_459_tachak.text: RAINBOW Operator, codename Tachanka. I'm ready. Where do you want me?

char_459_tachak.title: Watching Battle Record
char_459_tachak.text: First, we learn about them. Then we outsmart them.

char_459_tachak.title: Promotion 2
char_459_tachak.text: They told me I'd died. They were wrong. I was reborn.

char_459_tachak.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_459_tachak.text: Just don't play hero, it never works.

char_459_tachak.title: Deployment 1
char_459_tachak.text: Guys, you are all lucky I was there.

char_459_tachak.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_459_tachak.text: We're not out of the woods, bratan.

char_459_tachak.title: Trust Tap
char_459_tachak.text: Call me in for support if you need it.

char_472_pasngr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_472_pasngr.text: To be of assistance to you would be my great honor.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk 1
