char_472_pasngr.text: The Originium crystal on my forehead is oft regarded as an adornment. A very convenient mistake; it lets me save the effort of concealing my Infected status. That said, every time pain crosses my brow, I'm deeply struck by my own foolishness. To say I leave Sargon asks just where my path now leads.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk 2
char_472_pasngr.text: Sesa is still a young one. Yes, I am only a scant few years his senior. But his approach to patience is slightly ungainly, and his resentment not firm enough. If he wants for a drop of verity to set his passion for vengeance alight, I would be much willing to provide... Ah, should you forbid it, I would not act out of turn.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk 3
char_472_pasngr.text: I abhor the black market. Only lowly, vapid ruses circle it. People all believe themselves the most veteran players, yet all end dismally. At times, you need only think with some care, and you can send someone to their demise—even a padishah's very own appointed lord ameer. Hm, might you be curious?

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_472_pasngr.text: That great fire, then? Do you look to fault me? Quite, I would not challenge it. But not a single innocent came to suffer in that fire. Nor did a single perpetrator survive. In the black market of Sargon, the good have only ever come in one variety; they are the ones who live on. And I have lived on.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_472_pasngr.text: I and Kal'tsit... Dr. Kal'tsit, are indeed former acquaintances. To be precise, she was my rescuer and savior, but be at ease; I am yours now. Oh, was that not your concern? How remarkable, that as a coworker of our 'Kal'tsit,' you could yet be so unwary?

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_472_pasngr.text: 'Were I to return to Columbia.' I cannot say I've never entertained the possibility in these years, but such supposition would only serve to shake me. Doctor, I hope you should use me to the utmost. If such mild civilian techniques have become a stranger to me, I would now much rather renounce them.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_472_pasngr.text: Elliot? How do you... Hm. Elliot. His parents gone before their time, his one beloved, esteemed teacher dead in Sargon, the work which bore his faith but a stepping stone in someone else's conspiracy. To this day, he is bereft of anything. Elliot Glover is merely a laughable life lived.

char_472_pasngr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_472_pasngr.text: I know a scientist. Of a brightest star, an elegant gentleness, as if a born leader. I admire him, depend on him, regard him as my elder brother. But his end is not a good one, considerably not. So you must protect yourself well, Doctor. After all, we do get along quite pleasantly.

char_472_pasngr.title: Idle
char_472_pasngr.text: How long it has been—since such clear skies.

char_472_pasngr.title: Onboard
char_472_pasngr.text: Your Operator, Passenger. I have been looking forward to the day I work with you, Doctor; we will together enjoy this journey.

char_472_pasngr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_472_pasngr.text: Admirable tactics. I see great benefit is drawn from your command.

char_472_pasngr.title: Promotion 1
char_472_pasngr.text: I shall, for you and Rhodes Island both, offer ever more perfected service. I invite you to trust me, that the Reefsteep Black Market's 'Sand Soldier' still hides further means.

char_472_pasngr.title: Promotion 2
char_472_pasngr.text: I truly hope that my amusing Operator codename may be able to remind you—Doctor, there is no need to trust others, and you are capable of doing everything yourself. Oh? It seems you have other views. I shall duly accede, then.

char_472_pasngr.title: Added to Squad
char_472_pasngr.text: Allow me to show you how a true exceptional weapon of war may perform.

char_472_pasngr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_472_pasngr.text: I am quite familiar with strategy and planning. Of course, it is contingent, should you have other notions of your own.

char_472_pasngr.title: Depart
char_472_pasngr.text: Let us depart.

char_472_pasngr.title: Begin Operation
char_472_pasngr.text: Now then, we have everything in place.

char_472_pasngr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_472_pasngr.text: I heed your command.

char_472_pasngr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_472_pasngr.text: As you wish.

char_472_pasngr.title: Deployment 1
char_472_pasngr.text: Should this be your intent...

char_472_pasngr.title: Deployment 2
char_472_pasngr.text: I am prepared.

char_472_pasngr.title: In Battle 1
char_472_pasngr.text: Now go.

char_472_pasngr.title: In Battle 2
char_472_pasngr.text: Now punish these people.

char_472_pasngr.title: In Battle 3
char_472_pasngr.text: All as you desire.

char_472_pasngr.title: In Battle 4
char_472_pasngr.text: Now begone with no trace.

char_472_pasngr.title: 4-star Result
char_472_pasngr.text: You must pardon me; it seems my lowly weapons have barely served to accomplish this mission. Should you assent to my adopting more... extreme methods, we may thus have an easier time.

char_472_pasngr.title: 3-star Result
char_472_pasngr.text: Thunder and lightning are but a form of punishment, and they have paid the price for their ill deeds. How good it is, do you not think?

char_472_pasngr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_472_pasngr.text: I cannot permit the punished to leave my sight in peace. Doctor, I plead you permit me to perform this aftercare.

char_472_pasngr.title: Operation Failure
char_472_pasngr.text: It is not a sweet loss, Doctor, but have peace of mind. Those who have snatched away victory from your hands—will be privileged to enjoy suffering in full.

char_472_pasngr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_472_pasngr.text: It is a captivating landship, Doctor. Sargon has never accorded me such treatment.

char_472_pasngr.title: Tap
char_472_pasngr.text: Oh. Might something be the matter?

char_472_pasngr.title: Trust Tap
char_472_pasngr.text: Doctor, are you soon to take coffee? These are my own hand-tended coffee beans—it was my singular recreation in Sargon.

char_472_pasngr.title: Title
char_472_pasngr.text: Arknights.

char_472_pasngr.title: Greeting
char_472_pasngr.text: My greetings, Doctor.

char_363_toddi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_363_toddi.text: Just let 'em burn. You weren't gonna give those papers a second look anyway.

char_363_toddi.title: Talk 1
char_363_toddi.text: If you wanted me to lay defenses in here, I'd break up the floor for starters. Not that I mind, it's up to you to think about it.

char_363_toddi.title: Talk 2
char_363_toddi.text: You've got people from Royal Guard knocking about too? Heh—ain't that interesting.

char_363_toddi.title: Talk 3
char_363_toddi.text: Calibrate the sight? Nah, the stuff I ordered last should be here almost, I'll make the arrows first... Push off! Out my way!

char_363_toddi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_363_toddi.text: Most who leave Vouivre don't agree with the mercenary life in Sargon. Move to Victoria, end up doing something else instead. You know, like... yeah, factory-working, farming. Right. Having their own little touch of land.

char_363_toddi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_363_toddi.text: You could probably tell, but I didn't used to be artillery. Recon, infiltration, CQC, mainly learned all that. I know I didn't like it, and the instructors wouldn't let me switch, so I dropped out, simple as. Where's the point in learning things you hate?

char_363_toddi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_363_toddi.text: Oh, you're helpless! How am I going to the workshop wearing this?!

char_363_toddi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_363_toddi.text: It's meant for attacking nomadic cities, this weapon. Using it to help you lot cope with skirmishers? It's like a hatchet to a cupcake. Let me try hitting a city or two sometime for practice, won't you?

char_363_toddi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_363_toddi.text: Don't you think these crystals on my shoulder here match well with my hair color? I like my off-the-shoulder clothes too, so it's perfect. Shame, though, it would've been nice if they covered the whole way like that Siracusan Messenger girl.

char_363_toddi.title: Idle
char_363_toddi.text: I'll be heading back to sort stuff out, then. No point wasting time on this rotter.

char_363_toddi.title: Onboard
char_363_toddi.text: Arianrot, codename Toddifons. I don't like working for ordinary people. Here's hoping you can show me any signs you're not like them.

char_363_toddi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_363_toddi.text: Boring. Off we go.

char_363_toddi.title: Promotion 1
char_363_toddi.text: What goes on in those Logistics' minds, cleaning up my side projects... tch. Fine, I accept. Your feelings are loud and clear. See you.

char_363_toddi.title: Promotion 2
char_363_toddi.text: You have to have seen a Draco's flames before. Ever imagined how it'd be to rain them down on the enemy? I... can make that your reality!

char_363_toddi.title: Added to Squad
char_363_toddi.text: I'm listening.

char_363_toddi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_363_toddi.text: Work's on. Focus.

char_363_toddi.title: Depart
char_363_toddi.text: You lot go ahead. I've got things to prepare.

char_363_toddi.title: Begin Operation
char_363_toddi.text: Visibility clear. Awaiting orders.

char_363_toddi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_363_toddi.text: Still not done?

char_363_toddi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_363_toddi.text: Yeah?

char_363_toddi.title: Deployment 1
char_363_toddi.text: Mounting complete.

char_363_toddi.title: Deployment 2
char_363_toddi.text: In position.

char_363_toddi.title: In Battle 1
char_363_toddi.text: I don't need visuals. Give me the map.

char_363_toddi.title: In Battle 2
char_363_toddi.text: This area is cleared. Next!

char_363_toddi.title: In Battle 3
char_363_toddi.text: Nothing remains after it rains arrows!

char_363_toddi.title: In Battle 4
char_363_toddi.text: Hah! Why would fire go out before burning everything up?

char_363_toddi.title: 4-star Result
char_363_toddi.text: Not that many people can make this thing shine—I guess you're one of them.

char_363_toddi.title: 3-star Result
char_363_toddi.text: Out without too much ash on me. Good.

char_363_toddi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_363_toddi.text: Ammo's more precious than that little lot. Deal with 'em yourself.

char_363_toddi.title: Operation Failure
char_363_toddi.text: Still good to move? We're heading home. Grab on.

char_363_toddi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_363_toddi.text: Like this titchy bit of space is enough? Let's break this wall down and I'll have the whole area behind, thanks.

char_363_toddi.title: Tap
char_363_toddi.text: Think it through before you put your hand out.

char_363_toddi.title: Trust Tap
char_363_toddi.text: Go on if you need something. No point in waiting for me to switch my contacts.

char_363_toddi.title: Title
char_363_toddi.text: Arknights.

char_363_toddi.title: Greeting
char_363_toddi.text: So it's you. If you need something, out with it.

char_304_zebra.title: Talk 1
char_304_zebra.text: I may sit down? No, I mustn't. I'm a bodyguard. As a bodyguard, I must protect my target no matter the time and circumstance... Am I perhaps being a bother, standing here next to you?

char_304_zebra.title: Talk 2
char_304_zebra.text: I've met Spot before... Oh, no, the squad I was a part of traveled through a city he was stationed in, and he gave me a hand then. He most likely doesn't remember. It's okay.

char_304_zebra.title: Talk 3
char_304_zebra.text: (I'm not sure what the Doctor is doing, but that looks so amazing...) Eh? Uh... I-I didn't say anything. You misheard, Doctor.

char_304_zebra.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_304_zebra.text: Doctor, you mentioned this just now, so I thought I'd bring you some. Umm, I'm not doing anything unnecessary, right?

char_304_zebra.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_304_zebra.text: Doctor, I'm so sorry. I rushed ahead by myself on my last mission... I noticed somebody was wounded, and it felt like the blood in my head just started to boil. I forgot your order and ran straight to her. I didn't mean to do that. P-Please don't hate me...

char_304_zebra.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_304_zebra.text: Umm, Doctor, were you looking for me...? No, I wasn't trying to hide from you, and I definitely don't hate you... It's just that... Sorry, I'm not sure how to explain...

char_304_zebra.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_304_zebra.text: When I was in the Sargon army, most people didn't like me, but there was one person who treated me really well. She was my best friend, but... in the end... she betrayed me. Doctor, I don't know anymore. I'm not sure how to trust anyone now.

char_304_zebra.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_304_zebra.text: (The Doctor is such a nice person. Everybody hates me, but he talks to me willingly. There shouldn't be any problem if I put my trust in the Doctor, right?) Oh, Doctor, I'm listening. Yes, I will always trust you. Whoever makes an enemy of you, they're making an enemy of me too!

char_304_zebra.title: Idle
char_304_zebra.text: (I kind of want to... watch the Doctor sleep.)

char_304_zebra.title: Onboard
char_304_zebra.text: (Looks like a kind person, but is this guy really going to be as easy to get along with as Amiya said...?) Uh, um, I'm sorry, I-I was spacing out. Operator codename Heavyrain, reporting in.

char_304_zebra.title: Watching Battle Record
char_304_zebra.text: Yes, I should be able to reach this level too.

char_304_zebra.title: Promotion 1
char_304_zebra.text: (Amiya is here too. Am I getting fired...?) Eh? I'm getting promoted?

char_304_zebra.title: Promotion 2
char_304_zebra.text: Doctor, is it okay if I don't get promoted...? No, everyone is being so kind... I'm a little scared...

char_304_zebra.title: Depart
char_304_zebra.text: (I mustn't betray the Doctor's high hopes...)

char_304_zebra.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_304_zebra.text: Doctor, let me go after them.

char_304_zebra.title: Greeting
char_304_zebra.text: Doctor, can I assist you in any way?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1012_skadi2.text: As I am now, will my presence inconvenience you? Will I remind you of past miseries? I... long for being with you. When the time comes, we will leave this place together, okay?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: You thought we could not survive if away from the sea? A myth, it is. My kin and I will soon be able to swim through the air. In the end, even those places devoid of anything will be our ocean. We simply need to evolve, and we only need to adapt.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: My former friends tried to grant me my eternal rest with their hands. They refused to confront their true selves, but I do not resent them, and I could not hurt them, even if they rejected and attacked me so vehemently... Perhaps everything I did was bringing them harm. My regrets died along with them.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk 3
char_1012_skadi2.text: This box? My past lies within it...the fragments of my past. Fractured as they are, they still suffice to tell that I am not an empty puppet... that I am not a phantom. Gradually, I was reborn into what I am now, bit by bit.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: Dr. {@nickname}, was a future like this also in your past vision? You may have nothing but hatred for me now, but I do not fear it. Hate me as your heart desires... while you are still able to.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: Your companions, Kal'tsit and Amiya, said that you are worthy of my trust until the very end. But one can never save the others. I failed to save my friends, and you failed to save yours. We both have lost everything, but I was granted a rebirth, and following that, a new future. This... is just unfair to you.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: Long ago, my family was murdered when I was still in Ægir. I always assumed the sea monsters did it, but I never expected to learn that it was all the handiwork of the Ægir. My blood kin and my songs are scary, they all say, but they are wrong. It is the people who are scary.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: I did struggle, I did resist. But to what avail? When the tide rises, no traces of lesser lifeforms will remain undrowned. You are my very last friend. Will you also be like them, rejecting the ocean for a futile end, even if it costs you everything? Do you wish to be what I used to be?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1012_skadi2.text: Am I sick? Or am I still dreaming? I dreamt that the black sky was our ocean. When the others and I swam up, we did not feel ourselves sinking at all. Strange, so strange. Is this our future? Their faces are so blurry, they... They... No, no.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Idle
char_1012_skadi2.text: Dream... What kind of dream will you have? Where are you now? Will you find it there... just another dream?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Onboard
char_1012_skadi2.text: Dr. {@nickname}, I have been waiting for you. It's been so long, far too long that... I have forgotten why I am waiting for you here... But none of this is important anymore. It's not that important anymore.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1012_skadi2.text: These things... I have seen them too many times. Nobody needs things like these anymore.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Promotion 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: Formalities of the past... what good are they now? Nothing has survived, except you and me. We will cast those aside, and all we need is to be a step closer... Join me, Dr. {@nickname}, and be my blood kin.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Promotion 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: Nevermore shall my eroded sword cleave, Nevermore shall my former friends breathe, and nevermore shall I feel the warm blood flow inside me. Still, I am satisfied. I have become one with the ocean. Doctor, come with me — your true form is still waiting for you beneath the waves.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Added to Squad
char_1012_skadi2.text: Fight alongside the others? Against whom?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1012_skadi2.text: No more lives should be lost.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Depart
char_1012_skadi2.text: What will it feel like... when their arms penetrate this body?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Begin Operation
char_1012_skadi2.text: Treat me not as a calamity, for death is not my wish.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: What do you wish to do? I shall obey.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: No longer do I walk alone. My blood kin are with me.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Deployment 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: Now, harken to the song of the distant sea...

char_1012_skadi2.title: Deployment 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: Rest at ease. The tide also rises.

char_1012_skadi2.title: In Battle 1
char_1012_skadi2.text: The sky and the land... both a drought to relieve.

char_1012_skadi2.title: In Battle 2
char_1012_skadi2.text: May the song seep into your souls.

char_1012_skadi2.title: In Battle 3
char_1012_skadi2.text: With me, to our eternal home we will return.

char_1012_skadi2.title: In Battle 4
char_1012_skadi2.text: Fear not, my kin… The time is nigh.

char_1012_skadi2.title: 4-star Result
char_1012_skadi2.text: They will become our blood kin. They no longer need to feel the suffering of aridity. Their prior existence was already too painful.

char_1012_skadi2.title: 3-star Result
char_1012_skadi2.text: Will you treat me the same way? Is this also the ending you designed for me? If that is what you wished for, I will not deny it.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1012_skadi2.text: Why must you flee? This futile struggle will only bring about more senseless terror.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Operation Failure
char_1012_skadi2.text: Run, Doctor... Run away, from here, from me... Leave.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1012_skadi2.text: Sooner or later, this place too will return to its primordial form.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Tap
char_1012_skadi2.text: ...Why am I still wearing this hat?

char_1012_skadi2.title: Trust Tap
char_1012_skadi2.text: We failed to protect everything. The harmonious future is our only hope.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Title
char_1012_skadi2.text: Arknights.

char_1012_skadi2.title: Greeting
char_1012_skadi2.text: Doctor... Come, with me.

char_003_kalts.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_003_kalts.text: Doctor, please sit. I'm just here to give you a physical examination, so relax. If there are any irregularities, please tell me in full. Meaning? We'll set aside what it means to Rhodes Island for now. To me, the meaning it holds is quite significant.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk 1
char_003_kalts.text: I will conduct scientific examinations on you at regular intervals, recording your vital signs and state of consciousness. No other personnel have this authority. If anyone wishes to conduct an examination on you, you have the right to refuse. Do you understand?

char_003_kalts.title: Talk 2
char_003_kalts.text: Medical is the core Department of Rhodes Island. Theoretical research and practical treatment both require medical talent, and the need for medical staff on field missions is always growing. Please remember that in the time to come, you will need to recruit ever more Medic Operators.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk 3
char_003_kalts.text: I'm sure, on a daily basis, you interact with many Operators. When you converse with them, you must be alert for any speech that attempts to influence your will. Remember to preserve your ego; at necessary times, I suggest you seek my help. Of course, for you... I should be unnecessary, shouldn't I?

char_003_kalts.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_003_kalts.text: Amiya has left to eat with the young Operators. She is a child too, and you should accompany her well. These lands has no mercy on the basis of age, but children will always be our unvarying hope. I very much admire this notion of... a certain someone's.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_003_kalts.text: Doctor, do you ever doubt the meaning in your own existence? I do. Life upon these lands is tremendously tenacious. It evolves to suit a unique niche, often finding nurtured tameness and confrontation futile. What is our destination, Doctor? I believe you will find an answer. I can only persevere in that belief.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_003_kalts.text: Don't spare too much worry for me. Rhodes Island shouldn't be so fragile that one person's departure would leave it unable to proceed on. What is it? No, it's only a slightly hyperbolic supposition. No matter what, I thank you for your concern, Doctor. But more than myself, I am concerned for you.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_003_kalts.text: The path along which Amiya grew into Rhodes Island's leader was considerably troubled, and the sacrifices we've made bear testimony to that. From the faintest glimpse you caught in that stretch of the past, you may gradually come to understand the meaning of it all. You can make your own choices, Doctor... someone once told me that.

char_003_kalts.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_003_kalts.text: My hope? It is to protect yours and Amiya's hopes, Doctor. Though our definitions of 'protect' have nothing in common, it's an oath I will never abandon. I will be standing here with you, until the very end. We are unable to forget the past, but a different future may await you.

char_003_kalts.title: Idle
char_003_kalts.text: Are you awake, or still in a dream?

char_003_kalts.title: Onboard
char_003_kalts.text: Doctor, my appearance here indicates that the situation has turned for the worse. You must concentrate on continuing to accomplish your mission.

char_003_kalts.title: Watching Battle Record
char_003_kalts.text: Not bad.

char_003_kalts.title: Promotion 1
char_003_kalts.text: With strength comes fragility. Such is the principle of all living things.

char_003_kalts.title: Promotion 2
char_003_kalts.text: Mon3tr and I will protect everyone. Especially you, Doctor.

char_003_kalts.title: Added to Squad
char_003_kalts.text: I will see to them.

char_003_kalts.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_003_kalts.text: Now you need only devote yourself to operation planning.

char_003_kalts.title: Depart
char_003_kalts.text: Let's go.

char_003_kalts.title: Begin Operation
char_003_kalts.text: You know the plan. Move to intercept.

char_003_kalts.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_003_kalts.text: What's the situation?

char_003_kalts.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_003_kalts.text: Optimize your deployment.

char_003_kalts.title: Deployment 1
char_003_kalts.text: Arrived at designated position.

char_003_kalts.title: Deployment 2
char_003_kalts.text: Mon3tr, with me.

char_003_kalts.title: In Battle 1
char_003_kalts.text: Mon3tr.

char_003_kalts.title: In Battle 2
char_003_kalts.text: Peform your task.

char_003_kalts.title: In Battle 3
char_003_kalts.text: Awake.

char_003_kalts.title: In Battle 4
char_003_kalts.text: Go ahead.

char_003_kalts.title: 4-star Result
char_003_kalts.text: Make sure a video record of this battle is properly cataloged.

char_003_kalts.title: 3-star Result
char_003_kalts.text: Mon3tr, collect tissue samples.

char_003_kalts.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_003_kalts.text: Assess the risk coefficient of those fleeing, as well as the possibility of a reprisal attack by enemy forces.

char_003_kalts.title: Operation Failure
char_003_kalts.text: Secure evac route. Prepare to operate!

char_003_kalts.title: Assigned to Facility
char_003_kalts.text: How is the infrastructure project here developing?

char_003_kalts.title: Tap
char_003_kalts.text: What are you doing?

char_003_kalts.title: Trust Tap
char_003_kalts.text: You seem to have grown used to your own work and responsibility. You've become much like a leader.

char_003_kalts.title: Title
char_003_kalts.text: Arknights.

char_003_kalts.title: Greeting
char_003_kalts.text: Doctor.

char_474_glady.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_474_glady.text: Please leave for the moment. I will not permit any disturbance as I work. I appreciate your understanding.

char_474_glady.title: Talk 1
char_474_glady.text: I wish to avoid unnecessary headaches. On that point, we stand together. Given your rich experience, I am certain you are already well aware, but even when it is not their intention to do so, humans tend to lead themselves to their destruction. That said, until the time the others are fully prepared, it doesn't matter how much you rack your brains about the sea. It's all but futile.

char_474_glady.title: Talk 2
char_474_glady.text: Could you let your operators know to never touch my body or my weapons after combat? It would make me feel bad if anyone complained about any burns.

char_474_glady.title: Talk 3
char_474_glady.text: I sound a little too polite...? I'm not yet familiar with the language used on the land. Besides... and this is my only my own opinion, you wouldn't want to see me impolite, would you?

char_474_glady.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_474_glady.text: As Abyssal Hunters, we must fulfill our responsibilities. To abandon the sacrifices of the past would be an unforgivable act of betrayal. That being said, how many Hunters can I still save other than Specter and Skadi? Even if I save another Hunter who survived, the fear may have crushed them whole long ago. It would only be dragging out their agony.

char_474_glady.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_474_glady.text: Do you like to sing? What about dancing? How about a dance with me, then? It doesn't matter if you don't know the steps. I will teach you. Songs, art, music... You must never forget these things. These expressions are proof that all those who stand beneath that sky full of stars once lived. That's how they take form and live on. Come, let's dance.

char_474_glady.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_474_glady.text: Kal'tsit implored me to seek your help, but I don't completely trust you yet. Your technology is primitive compared to Ægir, and your mental state is even more problematic... Many of you are fearful and cowardly. I cannot begin to imagine you people taking on 'that.'

char_474_glady.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_474_glady.text: The air here is dry. Fighting on land sometimes leaves me feeling dry. This is better than being surrounded by the dead bodies of my comrades, however... when the sea was filled to the brim with shreds of their bodies. Their deaths get etched onto your brain, and the stench of their rotting bodies will fill your mouth each and every time you open it. Even so, we must never hang our heads.

char_474_glady.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_474_glady.text: We are not of the same race. Do you think we can form an alliance in spite of that? Kal'tsit is far older than me, and I cannot begin to imagine the burden she carries, but they are all things that you must face one day... You need to get stronger. You need to not fear loss. I will watch you by your side.

char_474_glady.title: Idle
char_474_glady.text: Hmph...

char_474_glady.title: Onboard
char_474_glady.text: Dr. {@nickname}. I am Gladiia, the officer in charge of Rhodes Island's Ægir affairs. We will have many opportunities to collaborate in the future, but please see me as an outsider. I am not worthy of your trust yet.

char_474_glady.title: Watching Battle Record
char_474_glady.text: I see. Your tactics and equipment match your kind's development progress.

char_474_glady.title: Promotion 1
char_474_glady.text: A new contract? I appreciate your recognition, but I already have many important missions assigned to me. It will be a while until I get to these new missions from you. I apologize for the inconvenience.

char_474_glady.title: Promotion 2
char_474_glady.text: War. The concept of victory doesn't exist in a war that revolves around the continuance of a race. The only conclusion it can lead to is the destruction of all other races under the night sky. We Abyssal Hunters put our lives on the line to fend off and delay this fate. Always, unrelenting, and without any regrets.

char_474_glady.title: Added to Squad
char_474_glady.text: As your squadron's aide, I will participate in your trainings.

char_474_glady.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_474_glady.text: It seems this won't be a difficult battle. Allow me to use this as an opportunity to train your operators' hunting abilities.

char_474_glady.title: Depart
char_474_glady.text: You are as slow as though you are bogged down in mud, but don't let it get to you. I will slow down and wait.

char_474_glady.title: Begin Operation
char_474_glady.text: Considering the level of this battle, allow me to save my strength.

char_474_glady.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_474_glady.text: Please, go ahead.

char_474_glady.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_474_glady.text: As you wish.

char_474_glady.title: Deployment 1
char_474_glady.text: Who's the prey?

char_474_glady.title: Deployment 2
char_474_glady.text: I'll take care of it right away.

char_474_glady.title: In Battle 1
char_474_glady.text: Be careful. The currents here will swallow the weak whole.

char_474_glady.title: In Battle 2
char_474_glady.text: Have you asked for my permission before you tried to run away from me, my dear prey?

char_474_glady.title: In Battle 3
char_474_glady.text: It won't take even half a second. This lance will pierce your heart.

char_474_glady.title: In Battle 4
char_474_glady.text: That's enough playtime with toys.

char_474_glady.title: 4-star Result
char_474_glady.text: Live. That's the only rule you must follow.

char_474_glady.title: 3-star Result
char_474_glady.text: An archetypical victory. One day, you will be able to defeat all feeble creatures that come your way.

char_474_glady.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_474_glady.text: If the preys that got away have no means to share information, then you still have a chance to live.

char_474_glady.title: Operation Failure
char_474_glady.text: How mediocre.

char_474_glady.title: Assigned to Facility
char_474_glady.text: I appreciate the sentiment, but I'm perhaps more comfortable staying in my own little cramped dwelling.

char_474_glady.title: Tap
char_474_glady.text: Please, respect the land's etiquette, Doctor, or perhaps discourtesy is more your thing?

char_474_glady.title: Trust Tap
char_474_glady.text: Best be careful. My kind are all monsters in nature.

char_474_glady.title: Title
char_474_glady.text: Arknights.

char_474_glady.title: Greeting
char_474_glady.text: Hello, Dr. {@nickname}.

char_475_akafyu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_475_akafyu.text: What did you need me here for? Hah, that's a huge pile of papers on the desk. Filled to the brim with words, too. Just the sight of them makes me want to cut them in half!

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk 1
char_475_akafyu.text: Hfph—haah! Leave me alone. I'm trying to feel what my new technique is. Aren't techniques meant to be conceived instead of felt, you say? Hmph, I don't need to think. I just need to quiet down and feel it in my heart, and my technique will naturally unfold on my blade when the time comes.

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk 2
char_475_akafyu.text: That ninja... She may be able to stay out of your sight, but she cannot fool my senses. I know not what she's scheming, but I can promise you I shall not engage her right here and now. That said, if I find her trying to do harm to my master—You won't be able to stop my blade.

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk 3
char_475_akafyu.text: Who says I cannot see? Hmph, this medical report is full of shit. If you don't believe me, just try taking me on. Bring as many men as you want, and bring your strongest, swiftest men. Attack me from whichever direction you wish. If you make it anywhere close to my body, I'll accept defeat.

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_475_akafyu.text: It hurts my head when I have to listen to those righteous men and their principles, especially the ones that go on and on like they are preaching their scriptures. It doesn't matter what a feast for the ears their words are. They won't hesitate to stab even their family in the back if it benefits them. How is there any righteousness in what they say? They are hypocrites, and my blade will slice them apart!

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_475_akafyu.text: I've seen winters like that many times. The snow fell on the ground and turned red in an instant. They were everywhere, either lying prone or still sitting. I could not make out their faces, nor did I want to figure it out. My face and my chest were frozen cold, though my hands, with my blade held tight, felt hotter than ever. Tsk, why am I even telling you all this? You needn't listen, either.

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_475_akafyu.text: Hm? How many times have I told you? Don't stand in front of me without a word! What? You wanted to make yourself more clearly seen? You're a strange fellow. I don't need to look at you to tell you apart from others! You think I just let anybody come this close to me?

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_475_akafyu.text: {@nickname}, you look just like my master when you have such a serious look on you. I suppose... it's because both you and her are forced to go forward in chase of a grand, ambitious goal.

char_475_akafyu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_475_akafyu.text: My master had me come to Rhodes Island for some peace and quiet, but there is no peace to be had as long as the flames of war rage in my homeland. Nonetheless, as a commander, you have my respect. {@nickname}, I am under your command. Together, we will take to the battlefield, and I shall slay everyone that stands in our way as your blade!

char_475_akafyu.title: Idle
char_475_akafyu.text: The air here is nice and cool. Move over a little. Let me lay down a little too.

char_475_akafyu.title: Onboard
char_475_akafyu.text: Akafuyu, a swordsman, and the strongest you'll find. Taking a fancy to my katana? I will never set my katana down wheresoever I go. Haha, you better keep your distance if you are scared.

char_475_akafyu.title: Watching Battle Record
char_475_akafyu.text: Hey, I'm as strong as it gets already. Stop wasting my time!

char_475_akafyu.title: Promotion 1
char_475_akafyu.text: I don't need anyone's acknowledgement, but I appreciate your kindness. I will work to repay the favor.

char_475_akafyu.title: Promotion 2
char_475_akafyu.text: Heh... if these guys are still here, they should be dragging me into their celebrations any minute now. How about this, {@nickname}, come with me! We'll drink till we drop tonight!

char_475_akafyu.title: Added to Squad
char_475_akafyu.text: Let's get going already. My katana is starting to rust.

char_475_akafyu.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_475_akafyu.text: Now we're talking! All of you, come with me!

char_475_akafyu.title: Depart
char_475_akafyu.text: Now! Sortie!

char_475_akafyu.title: Begin Operation
char_475_akafyu.text: No matter who, I shall slay them by my katana!

char_475_akafyu.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_475_akafyu.text: I'm here.

char_475_akafyu.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_475_akafyu.text: I've been waiting to draw my katana.

char_475_akafyu.title: Deployment 1
char_475_akafyu.text: Let's take to the field!

char_475_akafyu.title: Deployment 2
char_475_akafyu.text: Try taking on my blade head on!

char_475_akafyu.title: In Battle 1
char_475_akafyu.text: Just watch... Here I go!

char_475_akafyu.title: In Battle 2
char_475_akafyu.text: It doesn't matter whether there's one or a thousand of you! I shall slay all that come my way!

char_475_akafyu.title: In Battle 3
char_475_akafyu.text: I'll slay even your will to fight back!

char_475_akafyu.title: In Battle 4
char_475_akafyu.text: My katana knows exactly where my foes are.

char_475_akafyu.title: 4-star Result
char_475_akafyu.text: Where are the foes actually worth fighting?

char_475_akafyu.title: 3-star Result
char_475_akafyu.text: That was hardly a battle. I didn't so much as break a sweat.

char_475_akafyu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_475_akafyu.text: We had enemies slip past us? Impossible. There's no way I didn't see them.

char_475_akafyu.title: Operation Failure
char_475_akafyu.text: I won't run away. As long as my katana is in one piece, I can still fight!

char_475_akafyu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_475_akafyu.text: What a small room! Don't keep me waiting in here for too long! I might not be able to keep myself from drawing my katana!

char_475_akafyu.title: Tap
char_475_akafyu.text: Hmph... Hey, if you were my enemy, I would already have cut you into two halves.

char_475_akafyu.title: Trust Tap
char_475_akafyu.text: Now, now! Let's get ourselves all the ale and meat!

char_475_akafyu.title: Title
char_475_akafyu.text: Arknights.

char_475_akafyu.title: Greeting
char_475_akafyu.text: Hey, Doctor, how about some sword training together?

char_426_billro.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_426_billro.text: You pulled an all-nighter, and you're still not done? Sheesh, what should I do with you...? How much do you have left? I'll help. You should get some rest. Work on your time management next time.

char_426_billro.title: Talk 1
char_426_billro.text: I can confirm we've received this shipment of medicine without issues. The quantities are right. As for the payment, could you please let Kal'tsit know I'll take care of that pain-in-the-neck mission for her.

char_426_billro.title: Talk 2
char_426_billro.text: Count Hohenlohe, some call him the Hyacinth Count. The way I see it, he's quite a handful with that personality of his. I'm serving as attendant to this Leithanian noble family because of some trouble. What trouble, you ask? Hm... Let's keep this a secret for the time being.

char_426_billro.title: Talk 3
char_426_billro.text: That little squirt... Her codename here is uh... Beeswax? Looks like she tripped in the hallway this morning. Can she really cut it? She sure knows how to keep her sister worrying.

char_426_billro.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_426_billro.text: Rhodes Island provides what the count and I need. In return, I take care of Rhodes Island's troubles in Leithanien. This is what you call a win-win situation, isn't it? Come, shake my hand. This is the beginning of a beautiful friendship, Doctor.

char_426_billro.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_426_billro.text: The Leithanians' research on Arts has far exceeded my expectations, and their architecture, music, and education... All are worthy of study. One day, I will bring all this back home. Yeah, and I might bring something else along, though.

char_426_billro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_426_billro.text: The longer we acclimate to an environment and the different people there, the harder it will get for us to free ourselves, and eventually we'll be made to fit its mold... Don't you agree, Doctor? Well, that's not going to get me tied down here. Not unless I allow it.

char_426_billro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_426_billro.text: I'm sure the nobles think of me as an odd thorn in their side. No matter. I don't mind. Though I'd rather keep all this trouble a secret from Beeswax. It's too dangerous... Well, now that I mention it, I can't quite stop worrying about you, either.

char_426_billro.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_426_billro.text: If it's at all possible, I'd rather stay out of the nobles' bickering. Do you know how much I have to worry about each and every day with all the chaperone work and missions I have? Maybe I should talk the count into letting me hop over here full time. I'm counting on you to help me when the time comes, Doctor.

char_426_billro.title: Idle
char_426_billro.text: My little sister sometimes talks in her sleep. This one time, I even caught her talking bad about me. Heheh, Doctor, do you know what you said in your sleep the other day?

char_426_billro.title: Onboard
char_426_billro.text: Hello, you must be the Doctor? I'm Carnelian, attendant to Count Hohenlohe... Oh, I'm just a normal operator here at Rhodes Island. Watch what you say around my sister, okay?

char_426_billro.title: Watching Battle Record
char_426_billro.text: I see. This is worth studying.

char_426_billro.title: Promotion 1
char_426_billro.text: There is no need, but I appreciate your sentiment. Thank you.

char_426_billro.title: Promotion 2
char_426_billro.text: You see, there's a huge number of people and things that I can't stop worrying about, and that number is growing by the day. It's been a while since I was able to do as I please, but since you're up for it... Well, let's put on a show.

char_426_billro.title: Added to Squad
char_426_billro.text: This is not part of our agreement, but fine. I'm happy to help.

char_426_billro.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_426_billro.text: Don't worry. I'll bring everyone back.

char_426_billro.title: Depart
char_426_billro.text: Follow the plan, everyone!

char_426_billro.title: Begin Operation
char_426_billro.text: Elegance and etiquette are the way of nobility. Not mine.

char_426_billro.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_426_billro.text: As you wish.

char_426_billro.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_426_billro.text: Between a refined combat style or something more direct, which do you prefer?

char_426_billro.title: Deployment 1
char_426_billro.text: It's been a long time since my blood boiled like this.

char_426_billro.title: Deployment 2
char_426_billro.text: Greetings... Let's forgo the bothersome formalities and get this thing started.

char_426_billro.title: In Battle 1
char_426_billro.text: Gnaw them to shreds and drink their blood!

char_426_billro.title: In Battle 2
char_426_billro.text: Run them down and beat them to a mash!

char_426_billro.title: In Battle 3
char_426_billro.text: Careful! Don't let me tear you to shreds so quickly!

char_426_billro.title: In Battle 4
char_426_billro.text: My oh my, what a pitiful sight. Why are you covered in blood all over?

char_426_billro.title: 4-star Result
char_426_billro.text: Nothing to worry about then. That was easy enough for you.

char_426_billro.title: 3-star Result
char_426_billro.text: Okay, that concludes the mission, and right on time, too... Are you hurt, Doctor?

char_426_billro.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_426_billro.text: Calm down. Just leave the rest to me. They won't get away.

char_426_billro.title: Operation Failure
char_426_billro.text: Fall back, now! Don't panic. As long as I'm still standing, no one will touch you!

char_426_billro.title: Assigned to Facility
char_426_billro.text: Just as I thought. I can relax better in a room without much decoration.

char_426_billro.title: Tap
char_426_billro.text: Oh... Watch out. My horns could get you.

char_426_billro.title: Trust Tap
char_426_billro.text: What's wrong? Are you tired? Get some rest. You've worked hard enough already.

char_426_billro.title: Title
char_426_billro.text: Arknights.

char_426_billro.title: Greeting
char_426_billro.text: More work today? Don't spend the whole day sitting, Doctor.

char_478_kirara.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_478_kirara.text: Done with everything. Um... Sorry, do you mind if I read my manga here?

char_478_kirara.title: Talk 1
char_478_kirara.text: Doing human relationships is so not working out... And all you've gotta do on SNS is send a request and you're friends. Reality is a nightmare.

char_478_kirara.title: Talk 2
char_478_kirara.text: Utage was my classmate in middle school, and the one who introduced me here. What are we like? Not bad, I guess... but, Doctor, this is what you wanna remember: riajuu are a terrifying species!

char_478_kirara.title: Talk 3
char_478_kirara.text: Whuh? Why send messages even though we're face to face? I mean... it's 'cause it's easier that way, right, of course...

char_478_kirara.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_478_kirara.text: Back in Higashi, I saw Koga election vans on the street a bunch. I guess their representative was pretty cool... uh, but I don't understand much about that whole side of things, so usually I just voted whatever.

char_478_kirara.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_478_kirara.text: My family says that we all came out of the sea onto dry land forever ago, and that's how we settled down. Huh? Would I wanna go back into the sea? Mmnn... honestly, I could take it or leave it. As long as none of them get Oripathy, all of them are doing pretty fine in Higashi anyway.

char_478_kirara.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_478_kirara.text: World's been kinda messy lately, huh. I hear us and the Kougon guys up north of us are getting heated again. This could suck... I wonder if the new games from them are gonna make it over...

char_478_kirara.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_478_kirara.text: Doctor, do you... think my hobbies are weird, or anything? When I was young, all the other kids made fun of me a bunch, like, I was so gloomy, or gross, stuff like that. H-Hmph. Who cares what they said, not like it was anything to care about...

char_478_kirara.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_478_kirara.text: Doctoooor, I'll lend you this game, and this manga and CD too! These are all masterpieces I chose from the heart so once you know them all we'll be soulmates, and then we can have so much to talk about! If you have any other genres you like you can tell me—oh—okay, how about you come over to mine and pick something out?

char_478_kirara.title: Idle
char_478_kirara.text: Oh jeez, gimme a sec here, just a little bit more... just need to land one more hit! —Nice! Rare drop, please and thank you!

char_478_kirara.title: Onboard
char_478_kirara.text: ...I'm Kirara. Nice to meet you... Uh, um... So that's all then? Can I leave?

char_478_kirara.title: Watching Battle Record
char_478_kirara.text: Crap, this goes... uhhhh, but this is kind of a... humiliating name to give a special move, isn't it.

char_478_kirara.title: Promotion 1
char_478_kirara.text: A promotion? As in a whole job upgrade...? Ugh, middle management is gonna wear us all out in the end.

char_478_kirara.title: Promotion 2
char_478_kirara.text: I wanted to thank everyone for sticking by me all this way, and... uh, I guess this isn't something you should really do by text, so... um, tha-I mean, it-it's not anything other than that, even! I just wanted to say that!

char_478_kirara.title: Added to Squad
char_478_kirara.text: If you want a supporter, I guess I can help out... I think.

char_478_kirara.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_478_kirara.text: ...Huh? Me? Captain? Me? Are you being serious?

char_478_kirara.title: Depart
char_478_kirara.text: Alright. Begin quest.

char_478_kirara.title: Begin Operation
char_478_kirara.text: Ah. Yeah, look over there. Enemy came right out of the tall grass.

char_478_kirara.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_478_kirara.text: Huh? Started already?

char_478_kirara.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_478_kirara.text: Hfff... phew...

char_478_kirara.title: Deployment 1
char_478_kirara.text: Oh, crap. I think I'm getting a little nervous.

char_478_kirara.title: Deployment 2
char_478_kirara.text: I've... seriously never seen scenes like this beyond manga before.

char_478_kirara.title: In Battle 1
char_478_kirara.text: Cakewalk, coming through.

char_478_kirara.title: In Battle 2
char_478_kirara.text: This is good, right? Okay, I got it.

char_478_kirara.title: In Battle 3
char_478_kirara.text: Give me five seconds.

char_478_kirara.title: In Battle 4
char_478_kirara.text: Huh? Hey, that move was kind of... kind of pretty cool just now, right?

char_478_kirara.title: 4-star Result
char_478_kirara.text: Hoooooh, holy crap! You're kidding! You can take no-damage runs this far?!

char_478_kirara.title: 3-star Result
char_478_kirara.text: Quest complete. Phew... done.

char_478_kirara.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_478_kirara.text: Aaarrnngh, missed, darn. No savescumming in real life. Whatever...

char_478_kirara.title: Operation Failure
char_478_kirara.text: Yeah, this is done for. Let's quit out.

char_478_kirara.title: Assigned to Facility
char_478_kirara.text: I mean, if it's an option, I'd like to just stay in my room forever...

char_478_kirara.title: Tap
char_478_kirara.text: Whah! Aaaahh, mispress... this one's seriously not happening.

char_478_kirara.title: Trust Tap
char_478_kirara.text: Oh, hey, Doctor. What, hey, you want me to step in to clear an action game or something?

char_478_kirara.title: Title
char_478_kirara.text: Arknights.

char_478_kirara.title: Greeting
char_478_kirara.text: Oh, good stuff on the login bonuses today.

char_369_bena.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_369_bena.text: Do you think me a princess, sitting elegantly in an office?

char_369_bena.title: Talk 1
char_369_bena.text: Don't take Iris's songs as true. They're for the young children, you know. What? Yes, I'm the guards with the scissors—what about it? Chop-chop? That's me making clothes—what did you think it was? *sigh* Adults, honestly. So eager to assume worse.

char_369_bena.title: Talk 2
char_369_bena.text: Preservation techniques? I wouldn't know. Even Iris hasn't the faintest clue how I keep things safe, so why would I be telling you?

char_369_bena.title: Talk 3
char_369_bena.text: Let me introduce Annie to you. She's my very best friend, and another 'me.'

char_369_bena.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_369_bena.text: Don't ask me. I don't know why the Castle takes things in from everywhere to keep and then sends them back out. Granny wants me to do it, so I do it. In adult terms, it's work, isn't it? Something someone has to do.

char_369_bena.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_369_bena.text: Annie's a quiet one by nature, nothing at all like me. C-Controlling her? What are you talking about?! She's a person, she goes where she wants to! She's only by my side because she likes being with me. That's what best friends are like. Aren't they, Annie? 'Mm.'

char_369_bena.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_369_bena.text: There's too many children here. No wonder Iris doesn't want to leave. Hrmm... if this goes on any longer, we may as well move the whole Castle of Dreams here onto Rhodes Island. It'll save time, and effort.

char_369_bena.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_369_bena.text: What even is a good girl? Are you saying I'm not good? —Well, I suppose Granny has said there's situations you can't do as you please in, where you need to 'act' a little. Like? Well... 'My greetings to you, I come from the County of Linton. My name is Bena.' More or less like that, you know!

char_369_bena.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_369_bena.text: Granny brought me into the Castle when I was young, and I grew up there. When she retired, I took over her post at the Castle. How am I anything like Iris who just inherits the whole place? What, you think I'm jealous? Not a chance! Iris has to watch out for her figure, and me? I can eat all I want without putting on a pound, ahah!

char_369_bena.title: Idle
char_369_bena.text: 'Rest soundly. Doctor.' Who cares about that Doctor? Come out and let's go play! 'Alright.'

char_369_bena.title: Onboard
char_369_bena.text: I'm Bena, here to retrieve an idiot who went out and forgot to come home. But I hear there's still things she has to do, and I suppose that's fair. I'll stay and keep her company for a while.

char_369_bena.title: Watching Battle Record
char_369_bena.text: You can't show something this violent to Annie and me.

char_369_bena.title: Promotion 1
char_369_bena.text: Ahah! Well, looks like you know how to work with children after all!

char_369_bena.title: Promotion 2
char_369_bena.text: Annie, are you ready? We're going to show this eternally hooded hoodlum what our Arts are made of! 'Alright, Bena.'

char_369_bena.title: Added to Squad
char_369_bena.text: Two people for a single job. This won't be tricky.

char_369_bena.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_369_bena.text: Annie's got some ideas for you. Listen to me, now, everyone.

char_369_bena.title: Depart
char_369_bena.text: Let's take it just like a walk in the forest.

char_369_bena.title: Begin Operation
char_369_bena.text: Interested in pulling these toys apart too?

char_369_bena.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_369_bena.text: Heheh.

char_369_bena.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_369_bena.text: Don't you rush me!

char_369_bena.title: Deployment 1
char_369_bena.text: Annie, don't go too far.

char_369_bena.title: Deployment 2
char_369_bena.text: Have to be careful, now.

char_369_bena.title: In Battle 1
char_369_bena.text: It's trimming time!

char_369_bena.title: In Battle 2
char_369_bena.text: Chop-chop!

char_369_bena.title: In Battle 3
char_369_bena.text: Whatever breaks needs to be fixed.

char_369_bena.title: In Battle 4
char_369_bena.text: If there's no fixing it, turn it to pieces.

char_369_bena.title: 4-star Result
char_369_bena.text: What did you expect? I'm a dab hand at doing bad things to bad people!

char_369_bena.title: 3-star Result
char_369_bena.text: No piece of work who still needs trimming, then?

char_369_bena.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_369_bena.text: Leave the rest to the adults, then. We're going home.

char_369_bena.title: Operation Failure
char_369_bena.text: Annie, where are you?!

char_369_bena.title: Assigned to Facility
char_369_bena.text: We're two people here! This room's not big enough!

char_369_bena.title: Tap
char_369_bena.text: Wagh!

char_369_bena.title: Trust Tap
char_369_bena.text: Annie's off on an adventure. Want to come along?

char_369_bena.title: Title
char_369_bena.text: Arknights.

char_369_bena.title: Greeting
char_369_bena.text: Hey, no hiding things! What's that you're playing with?

char_469_indigo.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_469_indigo.text: Hm... Huh? Did you say something? W-Why, I'm not ignoring you... I'm just... thinking of something else.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk 1
char_469_indigo.text: I... I'm not very good at making conversation. I've always been alone. When I first left home to the outside world, I came across many people who were afraid of me. I even got my things stolen. It's no problem, though... As long as I still have my staff, I can work, so I don't often go hungry for long.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk 2
char_469_indigo.text: Life inside the lighthouse was hardly boring at all. The seas are always changing. However, my teacher drove me out of the lighthouse, and said to me, 'If you don't see more of this world, you won't be able to protect even a small corner of the sea.' That's how I made my way here.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk 3
char_469_indigo.text: Blue Poison gave me a new pair of gloves. Pretty, aren't they? She said the materials are improved as well. With these, it'll be harder for me to come in contact with any poison even if I hang out with my poison-wielding friends more. Actually, since I've been touching poisons by mistake all the time... it seems I may have built up an immunity.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_469_indigo.text: I used to gaze out at the sea each and every night. No one in town knew what it was we were guarding, and my teacher never told me. All I know is that, where there is darkness, there must always be lighthouses. I will stand firm, with all my power, until that day comes.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_469_indigo.text: Some people say this light is Originium Arts, but according to my teacher, this is a power that originates from my heart. With the light's guidance, those who sail through the foggiest nights will be able to resist the raging tides and find the correct bearing. That is why I will do my best to protect this light.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_469_indigo.text: My tail has a beautiful color? Thank you very much. It's okay. You may touch it. Despite the color, it's not poisonous.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_469_indigo.text: My hair can get tangled up if they get too long. Could you hold it for me? It takes time to get my hair set properly, but it makes it much easier to stay on the move while I'm on the battlefield. I want to be able to help you even more.

char_469_indigo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_469_indigo.text: I've been starting to think that humans and lighthouses are very much alike... Some people can shine much farther and brighter than even lighthouses. Like you, Doctor. Would it be okay if I stay beside you for a little longer before I go back?

char_469_indigo.title: Idle
char_469_indigo.text: You don't need me to keep watch while you're asleep? Huh? You want me to join you? I-I'll try...

char_469_indigo.title: Onboard
char_469_indigo.text: Hello, Doctor. My name is Aria... Uh, my mistake. It's Indigo. I used to be a lighthouse keeper... apprentice. Now, I'm a Caster... Also an apprentice. Please look after me.

char_469_indigo.title: Watching Battle Record
char_469_indigo.text: Are these techniques for fending off enemies? My teacher taught me a little, but I didn't know you could do this.

char_469_indigo.title: Promotion 1
char_469_indigo.text: Huh...? A promotion? A lighthouse needs only one keeper. Is that... not the case here?

char_469_indigo.title: Promotion 2
char_469_indigo.text: Eh? I can do much more? It's true. My light is able to shine on a much larger area than before... Thank you. I will keep doing all I can.

char_469_indigo.title: Added to Squad
char_469_indigo.text: Indigo at the ready.

char_469_indigo.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_469_indigo.text: Very well... I'll keep this light up. Please be careful not to wander off.

char_469_indigo.title: Depart
char_469_indigo.text: Follow the light, please.

char_469_indigo.title: Begin Operation
char_469_indigo.text: If you won't let us pass through, then we have no choice but to defeat all of you.

char_469_indigo.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_469_indigo.text: I'm all ready.

char_469_indigo.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_469_indigo.text: The seas are roaring.

char_469_indigo.title: Deployment 1
char_469_indigo.text: My staff has warmed up.

char_469_indigo.title: Deployment 2
char_469_indigo.text: The light is building.

char_469_indigo.title: In Battle 1
char_469_indigo.text: These enemies do not compare to the seas' ferocity.

char_469_indigo.title: In Battle 2
char_469_indigo.text: I will stand guard here until daybreak.

char_469_indigo.title: In Battle 3
char_469_indigo.text: It's only for the evil in your heart that you fear the light.

char_469_indigo.title: In Battle 4
char_469_indigo.text: If you want to run away, let me guide you.

char_469_indigo.title: 4-star Result
char_469_indigo.text: Why, if we are so strong, perhaps we don't need to fear the coming of that day.

char_469_indigo.title: 3-star Result
char_469_indigo.text: Thank goodness. Another calm evening.

char_469_indigo.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_469_indigo.text: S-Some enemies got away? I saw. We must let everyone know.

char_469_indigo.title: Operation Failure
char_469_indigo.text: Doctor, this way... Don't be afraid. It doesn't matter how dark the path up ahead is, I'll light it for you.

char_469_indigo.title: Assigned to Facility
char_469_indigo.text: It's okay. I'll be fine by myself.

char_469_indigo.title: Tap
char_469_indigo.text: Oh... Be careful... My hair's all tangled up... It'll hurt if I trip...

char_469_indigo.title: Trust Tap
char_469_indigo.text: You will stay here with me? Why, if there's two of us, the nights won't feel as quiet.

char_469_indigo.title: Title
char_469_indigo.text: Arknights.

char_469_indigo.title: Greeting
char_469_indigo.text: Doctor, would you like me to make the light brighter?

char_485_pallas.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_485_pallas.text: Become an assistant? If the job is similar to that of a priestess of the Hall of the Twelve Heroes, I shall be fine.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk 1
char_485_pallas.text: Ugh... Ehem, I must not drink, drink so much next time... Ah, Dr. {@nickname}. Why do you sway, so much in your movement today?

char_485_pallas.title: Talk 2
char_485_pallas.text: The city is a grand sight during the festivals. Theatrical performances, sparkling wine, sports competitions... To be frank, I have even once participated in amateur Formula Chariot racing. That chariot was not cheap. I wonder if its fate was being inherited, or if it was simply abandoned after I left.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk 3
char_485_pallas.text: To think that there were so many like-minded comrades in Rhodes Island. Yes, poetry! War! Freedom! To gather the people's strength from within the torrent of history, and fight to change this world. How exhilarating! These tragic yet extraordinary stories should be immortalized and passed down forevermore.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_485_pallas.text: After contracting Oripathy, I moved to a small village at the border of Minos. There was a small ongoing war against the Sargon incursions... In the end, the Minoans were victorious. However, rather than the so-called reality, I would rather wish that it spreads slowly as a story.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_485_pallas.text: Simply light the flames of resistance, and it shall burn hot and fierce. Just pass on the story of the 'Goddess of War' to those that dearly wish for liberation! All that I have, is but this infected body of mine, and this unchanging faith.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_485_pallas.text: Is that so. Vulcan, once the champion of weapon forging, is here? This is great news indeed! This weapon in my hand has confounded many a smith, and I have had great difficulty in getting it repaired. Look upon this signature, which belongs to her... Oh? I shouldn't mention it?

char_485_pallas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_485_pallas.text: The stories of Minoan heroes... There exist both comedies and tragedies alike. However, the noblest part of the Twelve Heroes is that——Without exception, each and every one of them returned to a simple, ordinary life.

char_485_pallas.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_485_pallas.text: To be oppressed for so long that one becomes numb to it is a most pitiable thing. A heart without hope will not burn with the fires of rage. I would never wish for anyone to face cruelty, but those who aspire to become a warrior must possess a bit of hope, a little spark and a timely opportunity.

char_485_pallas.title: Idle
char_485_pallas.text: I am used to thinking while standing upright. From time to time, I am suddenly poked, simply to check if I have fallen asleep on my feet.

char_485_pallas.title: Onboard
char_485_pallas.text: I am the Minoan priestess, Pallas. I shall be convalescing at Rhodes Island for a time... Be that as it may, I hope to enjoy my share of alcohol and theatre, and I yearn even more for battle.

char_485_pallas.title: Watching Battle Record
char_485_pallas.text: To be able to record the acts of the warriors in battle with such realism, what a great convenience it is.

char_485_pallas.title: Promotion 1
char_485_pallas.text: Abandoning glory, the hero decided to return to normal life, but could not, due to Oripathy infection? No... It should not be so...

char_485_pallas.title: Promotion 2
char_485_pallas.text: I am... a believer chasing after the will of the heroes. My weapon shall remain ever sharp and free of rust, to be employed against the forces of injustice and cruelty. My humility shall not be forgotten, and it will remind me of my mission to save others.

char_485_pallas.title: Added to Squad
char_485_pallas.text: Heroes who promise victory, I shall receive your blessings.

char_485_pallas.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_485_pallas.text: I am with you, o great warriors, to fight by your side.

char_485_pallas.title: Depart
char_485_pallas.text: The next time you turn your head, it shall be us returning with victory in hand.

char_485_pallas.title: Begin Operation
char_485_pallas.text: Fear not, for we shall claim victory over these reckless fellows!

char_485_pallas.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_485_pallas.text: Rejoice!

char_485_pallas.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_485_pallas.text: Come——

char_485_pallas.title: Deployment 1
char_485_pallas.text: There is no room for regret.

char_485_pallas.title: Deployment 2
char_485_pallas.text: We need not retreat.

char_485_pallas.title: In Battle 1
char_485_pallas.text: O' heroes, for this greatest faith of ours, please stand on our side.

char_485_pallas.title: In Battle 2
char_485_pallas.text: Tremble, in the face of true bravery.

char_485_pallas.title: In Battle 3
char_485_pallas.text: Weep, for that worthless faith of yours.

char_485_pallas.title: In Battle 4
char_485_pallas.text: You shall kneel here.

char_485_pallas.title: 4-star Result
char_485_pallas.text: Have we done it...? I feel only the greatest honor and joy.

char_485_pallas.title: 3-star Result
char_485_pallas.text: Turn about, o heroes. We have achieved a perfect victory, and it is now time to return and enjoy the fruits of our labors.

char_485_pallas.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_485_pallas.text: Listen well, the laments have ceased. This calm heralds the arrival of peace and joy.

char_485_pallas.title: Operation Failure
char_485_pallas.text: Even though the wars of humanity have no end in sight... At this moment, we have protected our dignity. Leave. Keep your heads held high.

char_485_pallas.title: Assigned to Facility
char_485_pallas.text: My horns are a danger to furniture. I shall be vigilant.

char_485_pallas.title: Tap
char_485_pallas.text: What would you do, should you possess wisdom and strength?

char_485_pallas.title: Trust Tap
char_485_pallas.text: Shall we go and enjoy ourselves at the Minoan-themed multimedia room event?

char_485_pallas.title: Title
char_485_pallas.text: Arknights.

char_485_pallas.title: Greeting
char_485_pallas.text: Are you rested, Doctor?

char_421_crow.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_421_crow.text: Be your bodyguard? Sure.

char_421_crow.title: Talk 1
char_421_crow.text: I don't know how my papa is doing nowadays... But, I trust the mayor, so it should be fine.

char_421_crow.title: Talk 2
char_421_crow.text: Though Dossoles is noisy and filled with unsavory people, life is still a lot better there than for the Bolívarians outside... Have you not been there yet, Doctor? Let's go together next time then.

char_421_crow.title: Talk 3
char_421_crow.text: Phew... Staying indoors all day is so stifling. Doctor, let's head up to the deck to get some fresh air, yeah? I'm sure you must be tired from working for so long.

char_421_crow.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, do you like the whole fighting and killing business? I'm actually not a fan, but I've seen too much of that stuff, as well as too many people around me doing it. And it kinda rubbed off on me...

char_421_crow.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_421_crow.text: Getting stronger is a good thing, but there doesn't seem to be anything to do after getting stronger... Doctor, how'd you decide on the things you wanted to do?

char_421_crow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_421_crow.text: For the longest time, papa didn't actually want me helping him with work. Given my personality, as you know, I'm not really cut out for it. But, I still gave it my all, because I became his daughter.

char_421_crow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_421_crow.text: Hey Doctor, can I scooch over a little closer to you? Um, because the office is so big, it feels a little deserted if I sit this far away. Can I?

char_421_crow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, you clearly can't throw a punch, but you're just as reliable as papa. It feels like I can just obey your every word, and not have to think about anything. Huh? For me, that's a good thing.

char_421_crow.title: Idle
char_421_crow.text: I wonder what's under the Doctor's mask. Lemme sneak a peek...

char_421_crow.title: Onboard
char_421_crow.text: Hello, Doctor. I'm Rafaela, the one Miss Ch'en introduced, and I'll be formally joining Rhodes Island today. Huh, a code name? Hmm... let's go with La Pluma then.

char_421_crow.title: Watching Battle Record
char_421_crow.text: Hmm... Wonder if I can really do this.

char_421_crow.title: Promotion 1
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, did you need me for something? Oh, a promotion? Hmm... did I do something special?

char_421_crow.title: Promotion 2
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, I'm stronger now than I was before? Really? I don't feel it... But if you say so, it must be true.

char_421_crow.title: Added to Squad
char_421_crow.text: Oh, time for a mission?

char_421_crow.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_421_crow.text: I'm pretty good at leading the way.

char_421_crow.title: Depart
char_421_crow.text: Where are we going this time?

char_421_crow.title: Begin Operation
char_421_crow.text: Now then, I can't afford to get sidetracked.

char_421_crow.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_421_crow.text: Woah, Doctor, don't scare me like that.

char_421_crow.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_421_crow.text: I'll do as you say.

char_421_crow.title: Deployment 1
char_421_crow.text: Sure.

char_421_crow.title: Deployment 2
char_421_crow.text: All I have to do is keep them from passing, right?

char_421_crow.title: In Battle 1
char_421_crow.text: Haah!

char_421_crow.title: In Battle 2
char_421_crow.text: I'll cut you in two!

char_421_crow.title: In Battle 3
char_421_crow.text: It's a little harder than I expected...

char_421_crow.title: In Battle 4
char_421_crow.text: Let's finish this.

char_421_crow.title: 4-star Result
char_421_crow.text: Huh, I had no clue I'd even be able to complete a mission like this...

char_421_crow.title: 3-star Result
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, you're incredible!

char_421_crow.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, leave the rest to me. I'll get them.

char_421_crow.title: Operation Failure
char_421_crow.text: Doctor, this way. We need to run.

char_421_crow.title: Assigned to Facility
char_421_crow.text: The corridors in Rhodes Island are so wide...

char_421_crow.title: Tap
char_421_crow.text: Hrmm?

char_421_crow.title: Trust Tap
char_421_crow.text: Let's go see what Doctor is up to.

char_421_crow.title: Title
char_421_crow.text: Arknights.

char_421_crow.title: Greeting
char_421_crow.text: Ehh... Doctor, when'd you get here?

char_437_mizuki.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_437_mizuki.text: Dr. Kal'tsit told me if you ever chose to place me at your side, it means you've decided to protect me. From the looks of things though, Doctor, I don't think you understand what that means? But I know she must've said it for a reason.

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk 1
char_437_mizuki.text: Fine dining, comics, games, and the people who created them, are all psalms laid out beneath the starry firmament. And my journey is to taste them all— and to eliminate anything that seeks to threaten them.

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk 2
char_437_mizuki.text: Ah, Doctor, you came at just the right time. Quick, come have a taste, I prepared this special sashimi dish using a special technique that best preserves the nutrients and vitality of the ingredients!

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk 3
char_437_mizuki.text: This one, huh? It's a classic arcade game from Higashi, though it's kind of niche now. Want to give it a try, Doctor? Here, you move that yellow mouth around and try to eat as much stuff as you can. But until you've absorbed enough nutrients to become strong, you'll only be prey to others.

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_437_mizuki.text: A strong sense of justice? You have the wrong idea, Doctor. I'm personally not that concerned about bad guys, but for various reasons, the people here usually can't do much to them, right? In times like that, if there was some way to make those bad guys disappear... Nobody would lose sleep over that, right? It'd be a breath of fresh air, right?

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_437_mizuki.text: Though I don't really understand your rationale, Doctor, what you're basically saying is, only eliminate the people who you've designated as bad guys, right? Because you're a good person, Doctor. What if you were actually a bad guy? Don't say that, that'd be quite troublesome. There's no way I could...

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_437_mizuki.text: Sometimes, it feels like there's something on this ship... Familiar, yet also foreign. Gentle, yet also seemingly full of hostility. Doctor, it makes me rather uneasy...

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_437_mizuki.text: Doctor, what does it feel like to take charge of the lives of so many others with your own hands? If I was in your position, I'd feel very warm, maybe wouldn't even be able to resist trembling... Huh? I was talking about you as a commander, holding on to everyone's lifeline.

char_437_mizuki.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_437_mizuki.text: I sometimes think, since the food we eat and the nutrients we absorb become a part of us, if we were to eat the same things and do the same things, would we gradually become the same? Doctor... can we?

char_437_mizuki.title: Idle
char_437_mizuki.text: It's time to take a little break, Doctor. Come here, lie down. I'll go grab a blanket.

char_437_mizuki.title: Onboard
char_437_mizuki.text: Ah, hello there, Doctor. Dr. Kal'tsit tells me you're my commander from today on! It's too bad I don't count as an official operator, but as long as you need my help, I'll do whatever I can.

char_437_mizuki.title: Watching Battle Record
char_437_mizuki.text: I need to absorb and digest all this, right? I'll do my best.

char_437_mizuki.title: Promotion 1
char_437_mizuki.text: I got the nod? Does that mean I can go with you to more places and take care of more bad guys?

char_437_mizuki.title: Promotion 2
char_437_mizuki.text: On one rainy day, I received an unexpected gift that changed me, but I was not taught how to face the future. Doctor, if it were you, would you have shown me the path yourself?

char_437_mizuki.title: Added to Squad
char_437_mizuki.text: It'd be best to not expose myself to others, even my teammates? Mm, I'll do as you say, Doctor.

char_437_mizuki.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_437_mizuki.text: I will protect you from the shadows, Doctor, as well as everyone else participating in the operation.

char_437_mizuki.title: Depart
char_437_mizuki.text: The deployment plan and secret missions for this operation... Yes, flawless indeed.

char_437_mizuki.title: Begin Operation
char_437_mizuki.text: The enemies, huh. They don't look half bad.

char_437_mizuki.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_437_mizuki.text: Your orders are my beacon.

char_437_mizuki.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_437_mizuki.text: I'm ready to go whenever~

char_437_mizuki.title: Deployment 1
char_437_mizuki.text: You always help me find my place.

char_437_mizuki.title: Deployment 2
char_437_mizuki.text: Weave the tapestry of your tactics boldly and without worry.

char_437_mizuki.title: In Battle 1
char_437_mizuki.text: A piece of cake.

char_437_mizuki.title: In Battle 2
char_437_mizuki.text: Thanks for the treat.

char_437_mizuki.title: In Battle 3
char_437_mizuki.text: When did you delude yourself into thinking that these tentacles are mere illusions?

char_437_mizuki.title: In Battle 4
char_437_mizuki.text: Where there are people, there must be someone to cull the evildoers among them.

char_437_mizuki.title: 4-star Result
char_437_mizuki.text: What a tough nut to crack. It'll take some time to digest this battle.

char_437_mizuki.title: 3-star Result
char_437_mizuki.text: There are fewer bad guys out there now, and it's all thanks to you, Doctor!

char_437_mizuki.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_437_mizuki.text: Hm? Doctor, why'd you let some bad guys through? I'll go clean them up for you.

char_437_mizuki.title: Operation Failure
char_437_mizuki.text: If you want to cover everyone as they evacuate, I still have an idea... No, just saving everyone isn't good enough. Only by eliminating all the bad guys here...

char_437_mizuki.title: Assigned to Facility
char_437_mizuki.text: Shall I whip up something tasty to help everyone unwind?

char_437_mizuki.title: Tap
char_437_mizuki.text: Hmm? What's up?

char_437_mizuki.title: Trust Tap
char_437_mizuki.text: Achoo! Ugh... Why does it feel like someone's looking right through me...

char_437_mizuki.title: Title
char_437_mizuki.text: Arknights.

char_437_mizuki.title: Greeting
char_437_mizuki.text: Did you miss me, Doctor?

char_1013_chen2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1013_chen2.text: You're not the type to sit around the office. It's easier to guard you if I dress more casually.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk 1
char_1013_chen2.text: I won't doubt Rhodes Island anymore. Your cause, Amiya and Dr. Kal'tsit, and all the other operators here are worthy of my respect.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk 2
char_1013_chen2.text: The way operators are supposed to see things and deal with problems is nothing I've known before. It'll take some time to get used to this.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk 3
