char_1013_chen2.text: I heard from Amiya what you went through in Siesta. Sounds like you had a tough holiday. What about me? It was terrible. Maybe not terrible. That's all I can say.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1013_chen2.text: My roots are in Lungmen. That will never change. The world I knew there will stay with me wheresoever I go.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1013_chen2.text: When I left Lungmen, I thought there was an answer to find, but now I get it. There's no such thing as answers, only actions and results.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1013_chen2.text: Doctor, it's been a while since I left Lungmen and came on board as a Rhodes Island operator. It's about time you treat me as an operator too. It's hard for me to do anything if you are always on your toes around me.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1013_chen2.text: I've got a lot of people relying on me, and I used to take that trust for granted. It may be harder than ten sets of advanced training every day, but I'll be worthy of their trust.

char_1013_chen2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1013_chen2.text: The events in Chernobog and my experiences in Dossoles both proved one thing—Whether fighting or saving, I must first understand my target. I need to broaden my horizons and open my eyes, Doctor.

char_1013_chen2.title: Idle
char_1013_chen2.text: Asleep again... You've done a lot of work already, so I'll let you have ten minutes.

char_1013_chen2.title: Onboard
char_1013_chen2.text: Ch'en, reporting back in from my holiday in Dossoles. I have a lot of reports to write about my trip, so I'm just passing by to say hello, Doctor. Let me know if you've got something. Now that the holiday's over, everything's back to normal.

char_1013_chen2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1013_chen2.text: There is always someone out there who's better than us.

char_1013_chen2.title: Promotion 1
char_1013_chen2.text: You're giving me a promotion as a Sniper operator? No problem. I'm sure I can set a fine example.

char_1013_chen2.title: Promotion 2
char_1013_chen2.text: To tell you the truth, I never thought my shooting would get to this level. I'm more used to fighting with a sword, but shooting is indeed more convenient in certain scenarios.

char_1013_chen2.title: Added to Squad
char_1013_chen2.text: Orders received.

char_1013_chen2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1013_chen2.text: No need to fret. I'll take care of it all.

char_1013_chen2.title: Depart
char_1013_chen2.text: Buck up and get ready for battle!

char_1013_chen2.title: Begin Operation
char_1013_chen2.text: Are you all ready? Let's go, then!

char_1013_chen2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1013_chen2.text: Enemy spotted.

char_1013_chen2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1013_chen2.text: Ch'en here. Ready at a moment's notice.

char_1013_chen2.title: Deployment 1
char_1013_chen2.text: I will take care of this place.

char_1013_chen2.title: Deployment 2
char_1013_chen2.text: Great spot.

char_1013_chen2.title: In Battle 1
char_1013_chen2.text: Hmph!

char_1013_chen2.title: In Battle 2
char_1013_chen2.text: Don't let them get away!

char_1013_chen2.title: In Battle 3
char_1013_chen2.text: Laying suppressive fire!

char_1013_chen2.title: In Battle 4
char_1013_chen2.text: Time is limited.

char_1013_chen2.title: 4-star Result
char_1013_chen2.text: Pure evil and a little torment is nothing to be afraid of. But there's never anything pure there, that's what's terrifying.

char_1013_chen2.title: 3-star Result
char_1013_chen2.text: That was some beautiful teamwork. Well done, everyone.

char_1013_chen2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1013_chen2.text: Help the wounded, and if you got any strength left, I need a few of you to stand guard with me.

char_1013_chen2.title: Operation Failure
char_1013_chen2.text: Stay calm and fall back! I'll bring up the rear!

char_1013_chen2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1013_chen2.text: Hm? Another new room? Engineering's doing a good job.

char_1013_chen2.title: Tap
char_1013_chen2.text: You never learn, do you, Doctor?

char_1013_chen2.title: Trust Tap
char_1013_chen2.text: Doctor, do you have a field operation next? I'll come with you.

char_1013_chen2.title: Title
char_1013_chen2.text: Arknights.

char_1013_chen2.title: Greeting
char_1013_chen2.text: Doctor, you seem well.

char_486_takila.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_486_takila.text: Good work, Doctor. Why don't you take a break? Don't worry, I've already finished handling the report... Haha, there's no need to praise me. It's not that I have any extraordinary talents, I've simply become experienced with these things.

char_486_takila.title: Talk 1
char_486_takila.text: Wait, wait, Doctor, s-stop tugging, I'll take them out myself! *sigh*... Alright, all the cards I hid up my sleeves are right here. Haha, sure enough, you saw right through me. Next time, if we get a chance to go to Dossoles, I'll show you some even more interesting things.

char_486_takila.title: Talk 2
char_486_takila.text: Every time I talk to Miss Ch'en, as well as that Miss Lin, I get all nervous. I don't want to get beaten up again... Huh, you can't tell? No way, Doctor, can't you see my palms are all sweaty?

char_486_takila.title: Talk 3
char_486_takila.text: Yo, Doctor, how unusual running into you here. Are you looking for someone? Oh, if it's about Rafaela, I'm afraid I can't help you there. As you can see, without the old man here, we have very little to say to each other.

char_486_takila.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_486_takila.text: I was thrown into the army reserves by my old man. All of them were pretty much kids, more or less. Some of those people had burning ambitions, but I'd say most had nothing of the sort. Life was tough, so everyone was looking for a way out, nothing more.

char_486_takila.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_486_takila.text: Dossoles has Miss Candela, so there shouldn't be any issues. It's better that the old man was put behind bars, so he has time to calm down and reflect on his actions. The last time I agreed to help him, I was actually trying to make sense of my thoughts. And that was the last time I asked myself that question... because now, I've found the answer.

char_486_takila.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_486_takila.text: When we first arrived in Dossoles, Rafaela and I were still very young, and we quickly adapted to life there. Only the old man was still stuck on his old ways, his old ideology... Can't do anything about it, but I figure I should at least try to help.

char_486_takila.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_486_takila.text: Doctor, here's the mission report from last time. I've already handled the follow-up. Don't worry, there won't be any problems. We've carefully laid out the plans, and if any contingencies pop up to disrupt the situation, I'd be supremely disappointed.

char_486_takila.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_486_takila.text: So how about it, Doctor? Did you draw the card you were hoping for? Ah, that's too bad. That's a loser... Well, when it comes to gambling, there's nothing less reliable than luck. But rest assured, if you're ever in need of it, I'll be there to deliver it right into your hands.

char_486_takila.title: Idle
char_486_takila.text: Doctor, I'll put all the information I've sorted through over here. Hm? What the... you're asleep. And look at all the important documents you left lying here... You must trust me a whole lot...

char_486_takila.title: Onboard
char_486_takila.text: Hello there, are you the Doctor? Great, you're just as recognizable as Miss Ch'en said you'd be. Right, I should pick out a code name, then? Hmm... Let's go with Tequila! Sounds pretty nice, eh?

char_486_takila.title: Watching Battle Record
char_486_takila.text: I'm supposed to imitate this move? Seems painful though.

char_486_takila.title: Promotion 1
char_486_takila.text: A promotion? Huh, already? Thanks a million. In any case, without further ado, let's talk about my work...

char_486_takila.title: Promotion 2
char_486_takila.text: When Miss Ch'en brought me in, I never thought I'd see a day like this. So, does that mean I'm one of your most capable subordinates? Haha, it's not a joke, whether you need me to be tour guide or something else, you can rest easy knowing you're in good hands.

char_486_takila.title: Added to Squad
char_486_takila.text: Got it. Leave it to me.

char_486_takila.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_486_takila.text: I'm in charge of the squad? Haha, I appreciate the trust...

char_486_takila.title: Depart
char_486_takila.text: Follow my lead. Be careful, and don't fall behind.

char_486_takila.title: Begin Operation
char_486_takila.text: Come, let us show our guests some hospitality.

char_486_takila.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_486_takila.text: Need my help with anything?

char_486_takila.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_486_takila.text: Awaiting orders.

char_486_takila.title: Deployment 1
char_486_takila.text: Sorry, this path is closed for business.

char_486_takila.title: Deployment 2
char_486_takila.text: I'd like you all to stop right there.

char_486_takila.title: In Battle 1
char_486_takila.text: Don't get worked up, and say what you need to say.

char_486_takila.title: In Battle 2
char_486_takila.text: I'm also not keen on using violence to resolve problems.

char_486_takila.title: In Battle 3
char_486_takila.text: Ugh. Negotiation... Failed.

char_486_takila.title: In Battle 4
char_486_takila.text: Begone.

char_486_takila.title: 4-star Result
char_486_takila.text: You even managed to account for their sneak attack, Doctor, so there's no shame in them losing like that. I still have much to learn.

char_486_takila.title: 3-star Result
char_486_takila.text: Everything's taken care of, Doctor. ...How did I take care of it? Doctor, do you really need to hear that?

char_486_takila.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_486_takila.text: Close one, close one. Are you alright, Doctor? Huh, a few of 'em got away. Let me think...

char_486_takila.title: Operation Failure
char_486_takila.text: Retreat now! Live to fight another day!

char_486_takila.title: Assigned to Facility
char_486_takila.text: So this is the dorm, huh... Mind if I give it a makeover, and buy some little decorations for it?

char_486_takila.title: Tap
char_486_takila.text: Tsk... Who's tugging on me? ...Oh, it's just you, Doctor.

char_486_takila.title: Trust Tap
char_486_takila.text: It was raining out there just now, and my hair got a little wet... Ah, excuse me, Doctor, could you grab a towel for me?

char_486_takila.title: Title
char_486_takila.text: Arknights.

char_486_takila.title: Greeting
char_486_takila.text: How are you feeling today? Want to head out for a bit?

char_479_sleach.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_479_sleach.text: File organization is one of my fortes! Uhh... What are these? Data charts and theory analyses...? Seems very complicated, unlike the romance novels I read. Doctor, have you read any Victorian literature? Just between the two of us, I share my name with the protagonist from my favorite work.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk 1
char_479_sleach.text: I used to believe the Infected would understand if I smiled at them, but I was wrong... Before I smile, I should put myself in their shoes to learn their pain, and that goes for all those who are oppressed.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk 2
char_479_sleach.text: Now that I've talked to Amiya and the Doctor, I can understand why she, an elite operator... and the rest of Rhodes Island made that choice.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk 3
char_479_sleach.text: It's a little embarrassing to say... but I really admire Bagpipe. It doesn't matter what she has been through, she takes pride in the fact she was once a Victorian soldier. Oh, please don't get the wrong idea. I still love Victoria, and it is this love that drove me to leave my homeland.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_479_sleach.text: It wasn't easy to lose the Dublinns. I talked to the girl called Reed afterwards, but it doesn't seem she remembers me. I suppose... that's a good thing for her. Should we get the chance, I would love to have a chat with her about poetry and novels. Oh, and it would be lovely if we became friends.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_479_sleach.text: I have every step of Trooping the Colour memorized by heart, but I still have a long way to go to truly carry the banner's weight and find the way forward.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_479_sleach.text: It takes a little time to care for my hair. I know merely keeping up appearances isn't enough, but I see this as part of living diligently. Doctor, your hair's kind of messy. Would you like me to fix it for you?

char_479_sleach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_479_sleach.text: If the day comes that you must face those countless fearsome enemies, I will stand by your side.

char_479_sleach.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_479_sleach.text: Doctor... if we had met before that incident, I'm sure I would've found myself relying on your help. But I can't well wait forever for someone to tell me what righteousness is. At the very least, on this journey we walk together, I wish to be an ally you can count on.

char_479_sleach.title: Idle
char_479_sleach.text: Doctor, when I see you here like this, it reminds me of the days I spent lazing around in the Rhodes Island offices... the sunshine, the card games, and my friends... It really brings back memories.

char_479_sleach.title: Onboard
char_479_sleach.text: You must be Rhodes Island's commander? Operator Saileach, reporting in!

char_479_sleach.title: Watching Battle Record
char_479_sleach.text: Oh, could you stop for a moment, please? I would like to take notes.

char_479_sleach.title: Promotion 1
char_479_sleach.text: I was... disappointed in them. And so I threw away all the ribbons and medals I'd ever earned. But Rhodes Island is different. Thank you, Doctor. I accept this award.

char_479_sleach.title: Promotion 2
char_479_sleach.text: Even now, the blinding light that fended off the darkness still shines in my dreams, though I am still far, far away from her.

char_479_sleach.title: Added to Squad
char_479_sleach.text: May my banner protect all those who are innocent before my eyes.

char_479_sleach.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_479_sleach.text: My friends, as long as we stand together, there will be no evil we can't overcome!

char_479_sleach.title: Depart
char_479_sleach.text: Follow me. Forward!

char_479_sleach.title: Begin Operation
char_479_sleach.text: If battle is unavoidable, I will not allow my weaknesses to get in my way.

char_479_sleach.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_479_sleach.text: Phew... I'm ready.

char_479_sleach.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_479_sleach.text: Your orders, please.

char_479_sleach.title: Deployment 1
char_479_sleach.text: It's my duty to stand here.

char_479_sleach.title: Deployment 2
char_479_sleach.text: I will not back down.

char_479_sleach.title: In Battle 1
char_479_sleach.text: Can't you hear the children's cries?

char_479_sleach.title: In Battle 2
char_479_sleach.text: Can't you feel the cities crumbling away?

char_479_sleach.title: In Battle 3
char_479_sleach.text: You've never ever noticed the hideous grins of conspirators.

char_479_sleach.title: In Battle 4
char_479_sleach.text: Could you ever imagine… friends turning against each other, and homeland fading into nothing but memories?

char_479_sleach.title: 4-star Result
char_479_sleach.text: I simply want to defend the people's right to live, and it doesn't matter if they are Victorians or Infected.

char_479_sleach.title: 3-star Result
char_479_sleach.text: You showed me that even weeds struggling to grow in the ruins can stand tall. Thank you.

char_479_sleach.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_479_sleach.text: I can only hope they will come to understand their injustice.

char_479_sleach.title: Operation Failure
char_479_sleach.text: Doctor, this time, I'll stay. Hurry and take the others to safety.

char_479_sleach.title: Assigned to Facility
char_479_sleach.text: Phew... I reckon it won't be easy to slack off once I become an actual staff member here?

char_479_sleach.title: Tap
char_479_sleach.text: Eh? Oh, hello!

char_479_sleach.title: Trust Tap
char_479_sleach.text: Are you tired? I've baked some scones. Please, sit down, have some tea, and tell me what's on your mind.

char_479_sleach.title: Title
char_479_sleach.text: Arknights.

char_479_sleach.title: Greeting
char_479_sleach.text: Hey, Doctor, you look cheerful as always!

char_473_mberry.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_473_mberry.text: Doctor, I'll leave the files I sorted here. Oh, you don't have to thank me. I am used to it, and it's nothing difficult... Um, are you thirsty perhaps? Should I make you some tea?

char_473_mberry.title: Talk 1
char_473_mberry.text: I'm not very good at speaking any languages other than Yanese. That's why I was a little scared at first and didn't talk much. But everyone's very friendly, and there are a lot of people from Yan here. Phew... it really puts my mind at ease.

char_473_mberry.title: Talk 2
char_473_mberry.text: Sorry to disturb you, Doctor, but would you happen to know where Provence and everyone else went? My family sent me some goodies from back home, and I thought I'd share some with them since they've been taking care of me... Oh, there are some for you too, Doctor. Please have a taste!

char_473_mberry.title: Talk 3
char_473_mberry.text: Doctor, could you help me look for my little dumpling? It's the small black-and-white doll. I thought I'd left it here, but I can't find it... *Whimpers*, please, I can't sleep at night without it.

char_473_mberry.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_473_mberry.text: The rescue team has to deal with the Catastrophes a lot, so it's only a matter of time for us before we become infected. None of us reject anyone because of that. The crystallization on my body isn't very conspicuous, and it doesn't hurt even if you press down on it... Sometimes, I even forget that I have this on my body.

char_473_mberry.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_473_mberry.text: When I first joined the rescue team, I wasn't very used to the climate or the food there. I'd get too homesick to fall asleep at night, and I cried to myself many, many times, but whenever I see the people we rescued, I start to think that maybe I can keep at it...

char_473_mberry.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_473_mberry.text: Doctor, sorry to bother you... I've been studying Oripathy prevention techniques during Catastrophe relief, and Tsukinogi suggested that I come ask for your advice... Um... Sorry, am I being a bother?

char_473_mberry.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_473_mberry.text: Uhh! Doctor, why would you sneak up on me like that? Huh? What am I holding? Oh, this is a letter I got from home. When I made the decision to leave, my parents were so angry that they said they would disown me, but there's a saying where I come from: Blood is thicker than water...

char_473_mberry.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_473_mberry.text: When I got infected with Oripathy, I knew I probably wouldn't be able to live the peaceful life my parents wanted for me. I don't regret it, though... Besides, if I hadn't made my decision, I would never have met you or anyone else from Rhodes Island here and now, hehe.

char_473_mberry.title: Idle
char_473_mberry.text: Doctor? Doctor? Sorry to bother you. Please lift your head up a little and sleep with the cushion. If you fall asleep like this, the letters from the report will get all over your face...

char_473_mberry.title: Onboard
char_473_mberry.text: Hello, I'm a member of the Yan disaster relief organization 'Chun-qian,' dispatched here as an intern. My name is... Oh, I-I'm sorry. We need to use our codenames here, right? I'm terribly, terribly sorry. Please call me Mulberry.

char_473_mberry.title: Watching Battle Record
char_473_mberry.text: Uhh..The mountain collapsed, and the ground crumbled...! They're not special effects from an action movie, are they?

char_473_mberry.title: Promotion 1
char_473_mberry.text: Huh? A promotion? Really? I get a salary from Rhodes Island as well as Chun-qian?! I... I'm so happy...!

char_473_mberry.title: Promotion 2
char_473_mberry.text: This time, I'm not doing this to help someone else, I'm doing it for myself... Doctor, thanks for always being there to cheer me on. Now, I'm sure that everything that I've done is truly meaningful.

char_473_mberry.title: Added to Squad
char_473_mberry.text: I'll do my best to support everyone!

char_473_mberry.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_473_mberry.text: Huh? Me as team captain? Ah... Are you sure?

char_473_mberry.title: Depart
char_473_mberry.text: Okay, we'll head out right away... Everyone, please stay safe. We'll meet again once this is over.

char_473_mberry.title: Begin Operation
char_473_mberry.text: Watch out, everyone! There's movement up ahead!

char_473_mberry.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_473_mberry.text: Safety goggles... Okay, I have mine on. Let's go!

char_473_mberry.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_473_mberry.text: Phew... Haah! Oh, I'm here! I-I'm not nervous!

char_473_mberry.title: Deployment 1
char_473_mberry.text: Preparing rescue...!

char_473_mberry.title: Deployment 2
char_473_mberry.text: Rescue team Mulberry in position!

char_473_mberry.title: In Battle 1
char_473_mberry.text: Everyone, please be careful!

char_473_mberry.title: In Battle 2
char_473_mberry.text: I... I can do it too!

char_473_mberry.title: In Battle 3
char_473_mberry.text: Where are you looking? It's dangerous to get distracted!

char_473_mberry.title: In Battle 4
char_473_mberry.text: It's my job to ensure everyone's safety!

char_473_mberry.title: 4-star Result
char_473_mberry.text: Report! All rescue operations in the area have been completed. Evacuation and escort proceeding without issue! Phew, thank goodness nobody's hurt...

char_473_mberry.title: 3-star Result
char_473_mberry.text: Phew, that wraps up the operation. Doctor, was I helpful?

char_473_mberry.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_473_mberry.text: Wait! It's not safe that way... We have to do something. I'll go fetch them right away!

char_473_mberry.title: Operation Failure
char_473_mberry.text: It's not safe here! Everyone, please evacuate! Doctor, follow me!

char_473_mberry.title: Assigned to Facility
char_473_mberry.text: Whoa, this is the staff dormitory... Um, will I need to pay rent?

char_473_mberry.title: Tap
char_473_mberry.text: Huh? Ah! I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

char_473_mberry.title: Trust Tap
char_473_mberry.text: Doctor! I really appreciate it, but please stop trying to sneak any more amulets onto me... I have way too many already!

char_473_mberry.title: Title
char_473_mberry.text: Arknights.

char_473_mberry.title: Greeting
char_473_mberry.text: Hello, Doctor. Do you have work today too?

char_484_robrta.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_484_robrta.text: Hello, Doctor. Have you figured out the style you wanna go with today? Huh...? You didn't call me here for that? I really, really hope you can give it at least a little more thought. Please?

char_484_robrta.title: Talk 1
char_484_robrta.text: Watch out! I've got tons of stuff in my pocket here. If this negative ion hair softener bumps into the horn growth stimulant and spills... Well... I could end up getting hanged on the deck! It's no joke!

char_484_robrta.title: Talk 2
char_484_robrta.text: You've probably heard how assassins who know their stuff in anatomy work more efficiently, no? Of course, my goal's not to take anyone's hope to survive away. Instead, I want to turn that hope into something more vivid and brilliant! Styling is an art, but it's also a science!

char_484_robrta.title: Talk 3
char_484_robrta.text: She looks familiar... Is that the girl who shows up in all those kung fu movies? Whoa, don't ever tell her I'm here! Nah, it's not her that I'm afraid of, but I really don't wanna run into her stylist, Lauder! The last thing I need is anybody calling me 'Bobbi'...

char_484_robrta.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_484_robrta.text: I'm a researcher, not a modeler, and I definitely don't want to be the kind of girl who works her mindless brush on monotonous faces under spot light day in and day out! Coming on the ship's been kind of like a vacation to me, I guess? If I had to stare at those lifeless faces all day, my brain would get completely fried sooner or later. I'm not doing that no matter how much I get paid.

char_484_robrta.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_484_robrta.text: If I got no money, I can't buy any new tools or materials. That's why even I got to work sometimes. Hm... I think the girl who came to me last time just got an academy award? She'd be fine to spot me, right?

char_484_robrta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_484_robrta.text: Doctor, I asked Dr. Warfarin for some info about your body... and modified my brush texture based around that. I promise you it won't trigger any allergies this time!

char_484_robrta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_484_robrta.text: If you want to touch my hair, go right ahead. It's pretty messy already anyway. Is that weird? When you do styling work for as many people as I do, you definitely won't find yourself in the mood to work on yourself even if you have the time.

char_484_robrta.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_484_robrta.text: Interesting faces are like stories in their own right. Dr. {@nickname}, you are like... a kinda damaged videotape, waiting for someone to dust you off. If the day ever comes that you get repaired, what kind of story will you reveal?

char_484_robrta.title: Idle
char_484_robrta.text: Did you really fall asleep? In that case, I guess I can get to work? Your bone structure, your skin... Whoa, this is even more spectacular than I thought!

char_484_robrta.title: Onboard
char_484_robrta.text: Hello, I'm Roberta! We meet again! Once I sign here, I'll be your personal stylist, right? Huh... 'You'll be an operator?' Doesn't matter as long as I get to stay!

char_484_robrta.title: Watching Battle Record
char_484_robrta.text: Beat up all the annoying guys, right? No more difficult than swinging ten brushes around while taking a sip of coffee. I'm from Siracusa, after all.

char_484_robrta.title: Promotion 1
char_484_robrta.text: I've got an entire room full of medals like this one back in my studio in Wrankwood... Hey, Doctor, can't you give me something a little more interesting for my reward?

char_484_robrta.title: Promotion 2
char_484_robrta.text: Since you're giving me another promotion, I want a bigger studio. You'll approve it, right?

char_484_robrta.title: Added to Squad
char_484_robrta.text: Should I go with eyeshadow palette #3001... or perhaps #3002?

char_484_robrta.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_484_robrta.text: Doesn't look like we have a color base that works for all of us...

char_484_robrta.title: Depart
char_484_robrta.text: Let's go, everyone! I'll do the re-touch in case your makeup slides off.

char_484_robrta.title: Begin Operation
char_484_robrta.text: I know exactly which part of the face is the most fragile!

char_484_robrta.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_484_robrta.text: You gotta put on the most suitable style even when you're giving out commands in the frontlines.

char_484_robrta.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_484_robrta.text: These real battlefields give me so much more inspiration than any film set I've been to.

char_484_robrta.title: Deployment 1
char_484_robrta.text: Bring your face closer this way, okay? Thanks. I'll pay attention to how much force I use.

char_484_robrta.title: Deployment 2
char_484_robrta.text: Even the biggest stars out there gotta book me in advance, you know? You should count yourselves lucky!

char_484_robrta.title: In Battle 1
char_484_robrta.text: Surface electrode tracking auto-filling concealer!

char_484_robrta.title: In Battle 2
char_484_robrta.text: Infused Originium Slug acid styling spray!

char_484_robrta.title: In Battle 3
char_484_robrta.text: Facial bone full structured self-image shading highlighter!

char_484_robrta.title: In Battle 4
char_484_robrta.text: Wet/Dry ambient color adapted lipstick and blusher!

char_484_robrta.title: 4-star Result
char_484_robrta.text: Whoa... Not even I can replicate that look on your face right now.

char_484_robrta.title: 3-star Result
char_484_robrta.text: What a perfect operation. Makes me want to add a few more touches to bring out that joy on your face.

char_484_robrta.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_484_robrta.text: There's nothing as boring as watching the cowards run. They always stiffen up like Rock Spiders that've spent a bit too much time in antiseptics.

char_484_robrta.title: Operation Failure
char_484_robrta.text: Doctor, need me to give your face a little blush? If you go back like this, the others might worry when they look at you.

char_484_robrta.title: Assigned to Facility
char_484_robrta.text: Can I do my experiments here? Relax, I won't blow the walls out. At most... I guess the doors and windows might bend a little?

char_484_robrta.title: Tap
char_484_robrta.text: Didn't I say I'm not seeing anyone...? Oh, it's you.

char_484_robrta.title: Trust Tap
char_484_robrta.text: Doctor, can I come over to your room this evening? Your face could really use a massage.

char_484_robrta.title: Title
char_484_robrta.text: Arknights.

char_484_robrta.title: Greeting
char_484_robrta.text: Hey, Doctor, want to try this new look I designed just for you?

char_430_fartth.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_430_fartth.text: It's done. The battle plans, reports, and mission schedules have all been sorted... Eh... Is this not the right way? Sorry, I'm not used to this yet...

char_430_fartth.title: Talk 1
char_430_fartth.text: Iwona and Ashlock can make quite a ruckus together. I can't hear the wind when they do that. It's a pain.

char_430_fartth.title: Talk 2
char_430_fartth.text: Hm? Who's that in the training grounds...? The Radiant Knight? Doctor, is it okay if I go check it out up close?

char_430_fartth.title: Talk 3
char_430_fartth.text: It's really close. When I sit here and look outside, I can see the crops in the distant ripening as the farmers harvest their fields. It's just like my hometown.

char_430_fartth.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_430_fartth.text: It's actually not very hard to become a knight in Kazimierz if you're healthy. All you have to do is sign up at the arena. But to become a real 'knight' is difficult. Real difficult, even for those who are healthy.

char_430_fartth.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_430_fartth.text: I agree with Sona's ideas, and I'm willing to fight for them... Though, I guess I might just be afraid of losing the one place where I belong. Doctor, do you also see Rhodes Island as a place you will protect no matter what it takes?

char_430_fartth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_430_fartth.text: Thank you for treating us. Sona, Iwona, and Ashlock asked me to bring you these as thanks. And here's one that I picked. It's a small token of my appreciation.

char_430_fartth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_430_fartth.text: I used to dream of becoming a knight, but on the way to the Grand Knight Territory, I got infected in an accident. I still remember how it felt. The numbness spread from my palm to my fingertips... That was the first time I couldn't hold my sword.

char_430_fartth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_430_fartth.text: Here's a grass whistle... Want to listen to me use it? I used to whistle with it whenever I had some free time back home. The wind back then is not like it is now. It was clear as crystal, and it wasn't dangerous at all... It was calming.

char_430_fartth.title: Idle
char_430_fartth.text: Finally awake? Here, the files are sorted... Should be right this time, I think?

char_430_fartth.title: Onboard
char_430_fartth.text: 'Fartooth' Justyna, Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub. You can call me Fartooth. I've heard about Rhodes Island and you in particular, Doctor.

char_430_fartth.title: Watching Battle Record
char_430_fartth.text: They're going to lose. If they don't take a proper defense stance, they won't be able to block this one. You've got them.

char_430_fartth.title: Promotion 1
char_430_fartth.text: A promotion? Is that something like advancing to the next round?

char_430_fartth.title: Promotion 2
char_430_fartth.text: There's not much that I want, and I don't have much either. That's why... as long as I'm still standing here, nobody can hope to take anything from me!

char_430_fartth.title: Added to Squad
char_430_fartth.text: ...I'll do as you say. You are my commander, and I'll follow your orders.

char_430_fartth.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_430_fartth.text: A team battle? Understood.

char_430_fartth.title: Depart
char_430_fartth.text: Ready. Line up... Sortie!

char_430_fartth.title: Begin Operation
char_430_fartth.text: Wait, the winds have shifted... Everyone, stay alert!

char_430_fartth.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_430_fartth.text: Yeah, I'm ready whenever.

char_430_fartth.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_430_fartth.text: One-on-one, or one-on-many?

char_430_fartth.title: Deployment 1
char_430_fartth.text: I hope we can win this match fair and square.

char_430_fartth.title: Deployment 2
char_430_fartth.text: I, 'Fartooth' Justyna, will be your opponent.

char_430_fartth.title: In Battle 1
char_430_fartth.text: The winds are stirring. I can tell.

char_430_fartth.title: In Battle 2
char_430_fartth.text: I've locked onto you.

char_430_fartth.title: In Battle 3
char_430_fartth.text: There's no need to talk in battle.

char_430_fartth.title: In Battle 4
char_430_fartth.text: Let's put an end to this... You can't beat me; accept your defeat.

char_430_fartth.title: 4-star Result
char_430_fartth.text: You've done well, Doctor. This is a glorious victory.

char_430_fartth.title: 3-star Result
char_430_fartth.text: I fended them off just as you instructed... I'm being too solemn? Really...?

char_430_fartth.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_430_fartth.text: I won't attack those who leave the arena.

char_430_fartth.title: Operation Failure
char_430_fartth.text: Go on ahead...! I'll hold them here, Doctor! Lead the others away!

char_430_fartth.title: Assigned to Facility
char_430_fartth.text: Not bad. The airflow here feels refreshing... Thank you.

char_430_fartth.title: Tap
char_430_fartth.text: Hm? What is it? Want an autograph?

char_430_fartth.title: Trust Tap
char_430_fartth.text: Doctor...? Yeah, I can tell it's you without listening to your footsteps. The winds around you aren't like the others.

char_430_fartth.title: Title
char_430_fartth.text: Arknights.

char_430_fartth.title: Greeting
char_430_fartth.text: Don't move... Your hair's sticking out. That's right. Stay still. I'll fix it for you.

char_431_ashlok.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_431_ashlok.text: So, just like the big corporations' office workers, even you have a bunch of deskwork to do. That's quite a lot, too. Do you need any help?

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk 1
char_431_ashlok.text: I never imagined the Radiant Knight would take up employment anywhere. Rhodes Island is a mysterious company.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk 2
char_431_ashlok.text: Knights may be able to climb back up after they fall, but the Infected don't have such kindhearted options available to them.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk 3
char_431_ashlok.text: *Cough*... My weapon seems to be acting up, *cough*... Which way is the workshop? That way? Thank you. *Cough*.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_431_ashlok.text: If the knight nobles were able to fulfill their vows and responsibilities, the Infected wouldn't have found themselves so oppressed. But... those nobles... the Kazimierz people would rather sign contracts with those big security companies than trust those knight nobles to protect them from crime and violence.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_431_ashlok.text: They tell me my family met its downfall because I got infected, that I am to blame for everything. Hmph, just what you'd expect from the knight nobles. They're all good-for-nothings who know only to bully the weak.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_431_ashlok.text: Justyna likes to use titles when she talks to me... Why is that? Is the word 'Ashlock' that special to her?

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_431_ashlok.text: Sona and I met each other during a team melee match. That was a tough battle, but we reached an understanding and worked with each other as soon as we met. At the very end, she took all my points with her sword, but then apologized to me right away... That's how we started working together.

char_431_ashlok.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_431_ashlok.text: If I can't go back home anymore, then all I can do is find the way forward with Sona and the gang. Heh... Becoming an Infected knight hasn't been kind to me, but at least we have the chance to fight. It doesn't matter what miseries the future has in store for us; I'm sure it'll still be a much brighter place.

char_431_ashlok.title: Idle
char_431_ashlok.text: Be sure to get enough rest. The break after a match is just as important as your daily training.

char_431_ashlok.title: Onboard
char_431_ashlok.text: I'm 'Ashlock' Greynuty of Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub. Thank you for taking us in.

char_431_ashlok.title: Watching Battle Record
char_431_ashlok.text: A coordinated assault? Yeah, they work well with each other.

char_431_ashlok.title: Promotion 1
char_431_ashlok.text: Is this a medal to prove my qualifications? Oh... Sorry, I still don't have all of Rhodes Island's rules down. Thank you.

char_431_ashlok.title: Promotion 2
char_431_ashlok.text: 'When the cannon fire rings through the air, victory is already within sight.'

char_431_ashlok.title: Added to Squad
char_431_ashlok.text: I will follow your orders.

char_431_ashlok.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_431_ashlok.text: You need me to take charge? Okay.

char_431_ashlok.title: Depart
char_431_ashlok.text: Good hunting, everyone.

char_431_ashlok.title: Begin Operation
char_431_ashlok.text: Get ready. The enemy's coming!

char_431_ashlok.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_431_ashlok.text: Yeah.

char_431_ashlok.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_431_ashlok.text: Your orders.

char_431_ashlok.title: Deployment 1
char_431_ashlok.text: It's not like the knight competitions. You can't pause a battle when someone gets injured.

char_431_ashlok.title: Deployment 2
char_431_ashlok.text: The match's starting now.

char_431_ashlok.title: In Battle 1
char_431_ashlok.text: Reload!

char_431_ashlok.title: In Battle 2
char_431_ashlok.text: Cannon fire is just the first step.

char_431_ashlok.title: In Battle 3
char_431_ashlok.text: Strengthen your defense! Forward!

char_431_ashlok.title: In Battle 4
char_431_ashlok.text: I will win this match!

char_431_ashlok.title: 4-star Result
char_431_ashlok.text: Wonderful. So this is the art of command. You've opened my eyes.

char_431_ashlok.title: 3-star Result
char_431_ashlok.text: Looks like you're good at commanding team battles.

char_431_ashlok.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_431_ashlok.text: The more points you lose in the arena, the less likely you are to win.

char_431_ashlok.title: Operation Failure
char_431_ashlok.text: *Cough*... Is this... my fault...?

char_431_ashlok.title: Assigned to Facility
char_431_ashlok.text: Good thing my equipment doesn't take up too much space.

char_431_ashlok.title: Tap
char_431_ashlok.text: Hm?

char_431_ashlok.title: Trust Tap
char_431_ashlok.text: A present from a fan? It was sent to you? Sorry for the trouble.

char_431_ashlok.title: Title
char_431_ashlok.text: Arknights.

char_431_ashlok.title: Greeting
char_431_ashlok.text: Do we have any missions today?

char_1014_nearl2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1014_nearl2.text: I'm gladdened to be by your side once again, Doctor... Yes, may the light be with you as always.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: Being in Kazimierz was no easy thing. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi and the General Chamber of Commerce are still constantly at each other's throats, and the day when glory once again shines on Kazimierz seems very far away still. Only at Rhodes Island can I let my guard down, and regather myself with peace of mind.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: Are they still well? How is Liz's health? Has Shining been pushing herself too far in combat? In my time back home, my mind's eye often wandered to the scenery I saw by their sides. Once, they journeyed home with me, but next shall be the time when for the sake of their ideal, the Radiant Knight devotes her light.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk 3
char_1014_nearl2.text: I was absent from Kazimierz for too long. It's as if I'm all too used to life at Rhodes Island now. Whenever a Knight of kindred spirit wished to travel with me, it cast my mind back to my days here. That said, processing multitudes of paperwork is more tiring than I remembered. I still have much to learn from you.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: A victory nodded in by capital bears no glory. Yet it was thus I first came to meet those souls who harbored faith, and was able to light that flame. I pray that this flame can show the way forward, that it may inspire those who crawl to stand back on thier feet and forge ahead, that it sheds the darkness, that it reveals the true light of hope. Doctor, I have always firmly believed so.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: This weapon? Heheh, there are only a few who know. My grandfather wielded in his youth a swordspear alike, which my father inherited, teaching me swordsmanship with it in turn... When I returned to my home, the scenes of my younger years came back to me. That's what led me to this weapon.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: Maria has realized her own truly beloved undertaking. She's gifted, highly assiduous, and with Zofia beside her, I couldn't be more reassured. It seems now that the forge's hammer suits her better than the longsword. I truly hope that this honest, sincere passion of hers may forever last.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: Kazimierz's struggles are unlike those of other lands. Without the constant conflict in light and shadow, we know only swollen greed and twisted regulations. That Maria and her cohort could stay aboard Rhodes Island is a good thing indeed. Though people of like minds aren't few in number, we still find ourselves barren, barren of virtue.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1014_nearl2.text: In this age on the verge of collapse, I once... felt alone. But Shining and Liz shone upon my fate, and Rhodes Island became my home to return to. I once was shone upon by others, Doctor, so I know profoundly, a beautiful vision and a faith identified, are enough to change the world.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Idle
char_1014_nearl2.text: Tiredness has not called on me yet. May you first rest.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Onboard
char_1014_nearl2.text: Oaths and trust both are unchanging in the passage of time. Isn't that so, Doctor? The Radiant Knight, Margaret Nearl, rejoins you here.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1014_nearl2.text: The particulars of tactics have seen some adjustment. Hm...

char_1014_nearl2.title: Promotion 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: That I could once again experience this gladdens me greatly. 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.' Doctor, I shall go together with you.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Promotion 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: So long as I hold radiance in my hands, so long as my heart beats with faith, the hardships of our world will not fetter my step.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Added to Squad
char_1014_nearl2.text: Upon changing armaments, my combat style will also be obliged to adapt. Take due note when deploying me.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1014_nearl2.text: I will keep in mind your instruction.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Depart
char_1014_nearl2.text: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness...'

char_1014_nearl2.title: Begin Operation
char_1014_nearl2.text: Sin is to be punished.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: Awaiting only your orders.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: Yes, I am fully ready.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Deployment 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: I shall lead the assault.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Deployment 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: Hindrance shall be no more!

char_1014_nearl2.title: In Battle 1
char_1014_nearl2.text: O sun, bow to me!

char_1014_nearl2.title: In Battle 2
char_1014_nearl2.text: May the light imbue you.

char_1014_nearl2.title: In Battle 3
char_1014_nearl2.text: This long night too shall now end.

char_1014_nearl2.title: In Battle 4
char_1014_nearl2.text: To grasp bright power is so as to sweep all wrongdoing from this world.

char_1014_nearl2.title: 4-star Result
char_1014_nearl2.text: I have never held the slightest hesitance to entrust my life to your hands.

char_1014_nearl2.title: 3-star Result
char_1014_nearl2.text: There will come a day when we clear the mist of hardship and darkness, awaiting first light's rays, awaiting... an even better tomorrow.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1014_nearl2.text: I hope that they may seek a proper path anew.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Operation Failure
char_1014_nearl2.text: The time has not yet come to give up, Doctor. Please allow me to defend the rear alone. I leave the regrouping to you.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1014_nearl2.text: Is my previous dormitory still left for me? Thank you, for going to the trouble.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Tap
char_1014_nearl2.text: Hahh... just a simple prank, then, Doctor...

char_1014_nearl2.title: Trust Tap
char_1014_nearl2.text: I am delighted to once again browse your library. May I borrow this book to lend to Maria?

char_1014_nearl2.title: Title
char_1014_nearl2.text: Arknights.

char_1014_nearl2.title: Greeting
char_1014_nearl2.text: Have you been doing well lately, Doctor?

char_420_flamtl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_420_flamtl.text: Hm? Need a hand, Doctor? Or you got something interesting for me?

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk 1
char_420_flamtl.text: Do you know how wild it is, as a Kazimierz Knight, to see a 'company' actually trying so hard to treat Infected? It's a mind-melter, trust me. Yeah, seriously. Justyna still keeps wondering how Rhodes Island turns a profit.

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk 2
char_420_flamtl.text: Doctor, question? Can I take a look at Operator Nearl's battle records? Uh, no, I'm just a little curious—yeah? Thanks, Doctor! Let's see, uh... oh, man. Maybe I oughta tell Iwona to push back her sparring with Nearl…

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk 3
char_420_flamtl.text: Ashley and me? We met through the Major. I just got a feeling we could get along. So I took it upon myself to talk to her after the match. Jeez, thinking about it, I've got a talent for scouting, don't I?

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_420_flamtl.text: Platinum,' huh. I know what happened with her after, but still, no plans to be her friend. Y'know, before, we said the Armorless Union, and the General Chamber of Commerce, were our greatest enemies. But to be real... ha, it's the whole age we live in we're dissenting against.

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_420_flamtl.text: The titans we call cities rumble forth. As people live on their backs, neon outshines the moonlight, and car engine silences bug chirps with its deafening rumbles. Too much gets tossed away, flattened undertread. Those people, they all deserve a different life... a better one. Infected or not, Doctor, we all oughta be searching for a new way forward.

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_420_flamtl.text: Doctor! Heard from Gravel and Amiya, you faced off with the Armorless Union during the Major? And you're the one who sniffed out the Area 0 plot? How'd you—wait, hold on, lemme bring a chair over and get some snacks while I'm at it. Alright, Teach! Take it away!

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_420_flamtl.text: Before I met Ashley, I honestly figured I'd be fine if I just kept living. But now, with Justyna, Iwona, Maria—and the Radiant Knight... I'm prepared to fight alongside them. Throw that life of mine out there for them. It's why I fight on.

char_420_flamtl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_420_flamtl.text: Maybe one day, when everyone figures out what 'Knight' deep inside their hearts really holds for them , and knights truly retire from the stage, Kazimierz can be peaceful in the truest sense. The Radiant Knight, she told me these words, and they spurred me into seeing more and further with my eyes. Maybe there's more I should be doing, you know.

char_420_flamtl.title: Idle
char_420_flamtl.text: Take a rest, Doctor. Man, I wonder what Ashley and the others are up to right now.

char_420_flamtl.title: Onboard
char_420_flamtl.text: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Leader, Flametail Knight, Sona! You're the Doctor? Mmm, well, you're kinda not like I imagined, but hey. I'm under your wing from here on out, Doctor!

char_420_flamtl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_420_flamtl.text: Huh. The stuff you watch for real combat's pretty crazy different from the Major.

char_420_flamtl.title: Promotion 1
char_420_flamtl.text: It's a first for me to get promoted without commercials or camera flashes. Well, Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Leader, Flametail Knight, Sona! Continuing the stride!

char_420_flamtl.title: Promotion 2
char_420_flamtl.text: I used to worry how an ever-heartless fight would lead us all down a messed-up way, but now... heheh, I guess ideals are something you oughta have. Aren't they, Doctor?

char_420_flamtl.title: Added to Squad
char_420_flamtl.text: Ashley not gonna come with?

char_420_flamtl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_420_flamtl.text: Flametail' Sona, spearheading and rolling out!

char_420_flamtl.title: Depart
char_420_flamtl.text: Live up to duty!

char_420_flamtl.title: Begin Operation
char_420_flamtl.text: Enemy spotted. It'll be nice if they entered single file like the Knights do, though.

char_420_flamtl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_420_flamtl.text: Any instructions for me?

char_420_flamtl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_420_flamtl.text: Feels fresh every time when someone gives me orders.

char_420_flamtl.title: Deployment 1
char_420_flamtl.text: Can your eyes keep up?

char_420_flamtl.title: Deployment 2
char_420_flamtl.text: A new challenge!

char_420_flamtl.title: In Battle 1
char_420_flamtl.text: C'mon, let's pick up the pace.

char_420_flamtl.title: In Battle 2
char_420_flamtl.text: Haha, losing sight?

char_420_flamtl.title: In Battle 3
char_420_flamtl.text: Feels bad to lose your target, doesn't it?

char_420_flamtl.title: In Battle 4
char_420_flamtl.text: 'Tail like a shooting star,' that's what they say.

char_420_flamtl.title: 4-star Result
char_420_flamtl.text: Maybe our life and times will make its own choice for us. But right now, we can only choose to fight to the last. Because we're Knights, because we're Infected. Because we're alive.

char_420_flamtl.title: 3-star Result
char_420_flamtl.text: We've won a lot of times before, Doctor. Here and now, though, we're struggling for our own destiny, our own future. That's the real fight, isn't it?

char_420_flamtl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_420_flamtl.text: This sure as hell isn't a competition, Doctor. Letting them off easy's not gonna win the crowd over, y'know?

char_420_flamtl.title: Operation Failure
char_420_flamtl.text: Everyone, retreat! Let me hold the rear! Don't worry, I'm an expert in escaping the pursuits.

char_420_flamtl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_420_flamtl.text: Wow, this sure beats the Grand Knight Territory sewers. Guesstimating a couple hundred times better?

char_420_flamtl.title: Tap
char_420_flamtl.text: Hyah!? What?

char_420_flamtl.title: Trust Tap
char_420_flamtl.text: You're wondering how I usually dress? Mm, uhh... ahaha...

char_420_flamtl.title: Title
char_420_flamtl.text: Arknights.

char_420_flamtl.title: Greeting
char_420_flamtl.text: Morning to you, Doctor.

char_496_wildmn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_496_wildmn.text: Nah-ah, keep those documents away from me... I go all vertigo when I see too much text. Don't even think of making me help you on the paper work, Doctor, I'm just gonna stand here nice and good.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk 1
char_496_wildmn.text: Armor paint? It's gotta be gold. I love gold. It's the color of lightning, and when they say things are fast as lightning, that's fast!

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk 2
char_496_wildmn.text: For combat, I got my own way of doing things. If you want 'em to respect you, just beat 'em down. If you want 'em to listen to you, go for a round, and let 'em know they could never ever win.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk 3
char_496_wildmn.text: Armorless Union assassins, Nearl family knights, the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub... how's Rhodes Island hold all of them together? Your recruiting standards are mad out of sight.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_496_wildmn.text: I've been honing myself into a campaign knight since childhood. That's how I've learnt all my combat skills. But after I got infected…pssh, I still wanna be a 'knight.' If winning fights is the way to prove myself, then I'll win every fight to show'em all.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_496_wildmn.text: Sometimes I don't really get what Sona says, yet I still believe she'll lead us to do right and proper. She's changing and improving herself to adapt, so maybe I'll try working on my own faults too. But, that doesn't mean I'm gonna take up everything she says, haha.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_496_wildmn.text: When Justyna says things, her first sentence is the most important part! But if you don't listen to what comes after, you don't get what the first sentence was about. Good thing I'm already used to that, so I can grasp her point nice and clear.

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_496_wildmn.text: Justice Knight's my pet. I got people to give her a bunch of functions, so she's got the chops to do it all at least a little. Yeah, she's a real doer!

char_496_wildmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_496_wildmn.text: I made the title 'Wild Mane' renowned through my own hard work. It's the symbol of a Knight as strong as hell, and an Infected Knight even. However, the General Chamber of Commerce takes our lives and our glory no more than products and consumables. Tch. Sucks I can't pound their masks to pieces right damned now.

char_496_wildmn.title: Idle
char_496_wildmn.text: Man, I'm so bored... hey, let's go for a drink. It's always Ashley who drinks with me, and that's just dull.

char_496_wildmn.title: Onboard
char_496_wildmn.text: Wild Mane' Iwona, I'm a Knight from Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub. Sona says this place does good by the Infected? Sounds cool.

char_496_wildmn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_496_wildmn.text: Ooh... that's a sick surprise attack to make! Can we rewind that and watch it again?

char_496_wildmn.title: Promotion 1
char_496_wildmn.text: A promotion? Then you can tell I've gotten stronger? Haha, fine by me, gimme a few more!

char_496_wildmn.title: Promotion 2
char_496_wildmn.text: Those hypocrites, wearing hollow masks and treading on the Infected as they want. Screw them, my lance is gonna run them all through!

char_496_wildmn.title: Added to Squad
char_496_wildmn.text: Who's got the guts to spar with me?

char_496_wildmn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_496_wildmn.text: Phalanx formation suits me most. If I'm the captain, then let's go with my kind of tactics!

char_496_wildmn.title: Depart
char_496_wildmn.text: Let's roooooll!

char_496_wildmn.title: Begin Operation
char_496_wildmn.text: Haha, I got you sighted.

char_496_wildmn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_496_wildmn.text: Leave the brawling to me.

char_496_wildmn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_496_wildmn.text: I've been waiting forever!

char_496_wildmn.title: Deployment 1
char_496_wildmn.text: You guys think you're worth my full strength?

char_496_wildmn.title: Deployment 2
char_496_wildmn.text: Don't you dare go down in one!

char_496_wildmn.title: In Battle 1
char_496_wildmn.text: Slow! Slow! Way too slow!

char_496_wildmn.title: In Battle 2
char_496_wildmn.text: Haha, you're not dodging this!

char_496_wildmn.title: In Battle 3
char_496_wildmn.text: Lance charge!

char_496_wildmn.title: In Battle 4
char_496_wildmn.text: Piercing through!

char_496_wildmn.title: 4-star Result
char_496_wildmn.text: Keep on winning, and you'll never be forgotten. It's that simple.

char_496_wildmn.title: 3-star Result
char_496_wildmn.text: Cheers, Doctor. You're a solid commander.

char_496_wildmn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_496_wildmn.text: My Major Lance... *sigh* Gotta get repairs again.

char_496_wildmn.title: Operation Failure
char_496_wildmn.text: Leave any regrets for later! Go, I'll cover the rear!

char_496_wildmn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_496_wildmn.text: Any rooms in all gold around here? Just a little dream of mine.

char_496_wildmn.title: Tap
char_496_wildmn.text: What, you wanna have a race with me?

char_496_wildmn.title: Trust Tap
char_496_wildmn.text: Skirts? Nuh-uh. I don't wear 'em 'cept for special days.

char_496_wildmn.title: Title
char_496_wildmn.text: Arknights.

char_496_wildmn.title: Greeting
char_496_wildmn.text: Ready for the day, Doctor? Wanna try some breakfast from the Justice Knight?

char_4000_jnight.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep. Understood. Classification program initiated. Now sorting the Doctor's documents. Will you want any snacks during work? Justice Knight could pick some up for you from the cafeteria.

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk 1
char_4000_jnight.text: Ever since Closure and Mayer installed a human voice patch, Justice Knight's functionality as a smart assistant has gone right up! Being able to use natural language logic really has improved communication so much when helping out my masters.

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk 2
char_4000_jnight.text: Justice Knight's master, the Wild Mane Knight Iwona, found Justice Knight in a scrapped state. She rebooted and fixed this unit. Ever since then, Justice Knight've been in charge of her and her partners' everyday lives, as well as supporting them on missions.

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk 3
char_4000_jnight.text: Doctor... why does my master say things to this unit like 'Justice, you're too noisy these days. Go play somewhere else if you've got nothing to do!'? Beep-Beep…Beep-Beep... Justice Knight doesn't understand.

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4000_jnight.text: Everyone in Pinus Sylvestris is incredibly hard-working, always putting meals off so they can train their knightly skills. There has to be a day where their bodies won't keep up. None of them have time to fetch their lunchboxes, so it's all up to Justice Knight to bring them over.

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4000_jnight.text: A low battery? Sorry, this unit is not sure if any of my functions will be of help to you... What? it's the games console that's almost out? Please get this wire plugged in straight away!

char_4000_jnight.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep. Doctor, you discovered Justice Knight's secret. Justice Knight has no other choice but to take firm action in order to protect the secret... Master? You'll allow Justice Knight to keep tending to the plants in the Convalescent Garden? Thank you, Doctor. You now have unlimited access to all services of Justice Knight!

char_4000_jnight.title: Idle
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep. Apologies, Doctor. Justice Knight always forgets to disable the automatic timeteller feature.

char_4000_jnight.title: Onboard
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep…Beep! ('Justice Knight,' glad to be reporting in along with everyone from Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub... Justice Knight will be of great use to you all!)

char_4000_jnight.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4000_jnight.text: These are very useful resources for this unit. Justice Knight will apply to Miss Closure for installing even more new functions.

char_4000_jnight.title: Added to Squad
char_4000_jnight.text: Justice Knight, all ready and set!

char_4000_jnight.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4000_jnight.text: Are you leaving command to Justice Knight? It might be a little challenging for this unit right now…

char_4000_jnight.title: Depart
char_4000_jnight.text: Justice Knight, setting off!

char_4000_jnight.title: Begin Operation
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep. Justice Knight will provide you all with proper and timely support!

char_4000_jnight.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4000_jnight.text: Justice Knight, all good to go!

char_4000_jnight.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4000_jnight.text: Justice Knight, requesting to attack!

char_4000_jnight.title: Deployment 1
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep. Locked onto target.

char_4000_jnight.title: Deployment 2
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep. Justice Knight is now in position.

char_4000_jnight.title: In Battle 1
char_4000_jnight.text: Juuuuustice!

char_4000_jnight.title: In Battle 2
char_4000_jnight.text: Viiiiictory!

char_4000_jnight.title: In Battle 3
char_4000_jnight.text: Fiiiiight!

char_4000_jnight.title: In Battle 4
char_4000_jnight.text: Spiriiiiit!

char_4000_jnight.title: 4-star Result
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep, BeepBeepBeep-- Sorry, Justice Knight got too worked up. Doctor, master, Justice Knight has made it!

char_4000_jnight.title: 3-star Result
char_4000_jnight.text: Possiblilites of new function development detected! Justice Knight, awaiting for orders to return to Rhodes Island!

char_4000_jnight.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4000_jnight.text: There is still room for improvement. Anyway, we won! Congratulations, Doctor!

char_4000_jnight.title: Operation Failure
char_4000_jnight.text: Please don't... throw Justice Knight... away again...

char_4000_jnight.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep, Justice Knight has plenty of things to do here.

char_4000_jnight.title: Tap
char_4000_jnight.text: Beep-Beep! Don't treat this unit like that… Negative!

char_4000_jnight.title: Trust Tap
char_4000_jnight.text: The washing machine... doesn't seem too hard to use...

char_4000_jnight.title: Title
char_4000_jnight.text: Arknights.

char_4000_jnight.title: Greeting
char_4000_jnight.text: Nice to see you, Doctor.

char_489_serum.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_489_serum.text: Make the most of everything, hm? As you've given approval, I'll do my very best to provide you all additional joint effort and technological support necessary, within our agreement's scope, of course. Fortunately, assistant work was my exact vocation.

char_489_serum.title: Talk 1
char_489_serum.text: Rhodes Island's ambience is more assuaging than I'd imagined, at least personally speaking. After all, you typically feel medical firms would be nothing but dour to almost insipid researchers. Not to even start on your armed force to keep the Oripathy-related technologies and personnel safe.

char_489_serum.title: Talk 2
char_489_serum.text: In my time at Raythean, I took part in several project teams, but they mostly bored me. Obviously, one can't complain about their technological prowess, but if all it is is fulfilling orders to quota, without attempting to inject a little inspiration, doesn't work become just too dull?

char_489_serum.title: Talk 3
char_489_serum.text: You seem somewhat mindful of my manner of speech. Hmm, if possible, I'd like if you could bear with it. My last project team, whether superiors or juniors, all took up overly polite address that only sent communication efficiency to rock bottom. It posed a headache to me too.

char_489_serum.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_489_serum.text: True, work calls for strict treatment, and serious accomplishment. But after work is over, you also need to understand keeping a balance and relaxing, which is what lets you adjust your own state and achieve glowing results next time in your work. Do you believe so, Doctor?

char_489_serum.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_489_serum.text: Have you heard the observation that though many find satisfaction in neat, orderly things, there's a set that feels apprehension in a space holding the same qualities? Yes, every time a rest day passes and I return to a work station that's been tidied up, I feel suffering.

char_489_serum.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_489_serum.text: A pileup of overdue reports and files just won't do. The paper shredder? No, Doctor, don't tell me you wouldn't want to try this environmentally-friendly corrosive, able to turn a ream of paper to pulp with a dropper's worth. There's no use? That's true. How about I launch a project to develop a papermaking machine utilizing this pulp?

char_489_serum.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_489_serum.text: The impression you give may not seem quite like my project manager at Raythean, but there's some similarities. However, saying this with a wide open heart, you as a superior outstrip that unpredictable, outlandish black box of a crackpot project-intending plan-addled trickster genius by miles.

char_489_serum.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_489_serum.text: Both Raythean R&D projects and working together with you have been delightful experiences. I'm finding myself torn between choosing, and I don't mean it as a pleasantry. Perhaps, you'd mock my greed? But people like us might just all be greedy. What's your view?

char_489_serum.title: Idle
char_489_serum.text: Only when you have finished everything at hand can you rest carefree and firm-willed. At this rate, I'm worried you'll... heh, whatever. With this little left, I can figure it out for you without any worry.

char_489_serum.title: Onboard
char_489_serum.text: Hello there, Dr. {@nickname}. Raythean Industries liaison, Corroserum. I'm sure you saw the relevant contracts and forms, despite your busy schedule. Now then, do share any upcoming workflow arrangements.

char_489_serum.title: Watching Battle Record
char_489_serum.text: Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals Inc.'s battle records are more interesting than I expected.

char_489_serum.title: Promotion 1
char_489_serum.text: You've raised your evaluation of me? Thank you, this'll be good grounds to include when I apply for another tour here.

char_489_serum.title: Promotion 2
char_489_serum.text: True, it's worth taking joy in a project's smooth progress, but the evaluation you've given me, in my opinion, seems to have already outclassed my resume. That is to say, do you have further expectations of me, even greater than this?

char_489_serum.title: Added to Squad
char_489_serum.text: Ah, another assignment perfect for testing weapons. Of course, I'm very pleased to be working with you, Doctor.

char_489_serum.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_489_serum.text: This is an anti-corrosive coating spray, with no toxic side-effect on the human body at all. Given you were all willing to sign the disclaimer and participate in this test, I sincerely hope none of you become collateral damage due to irregular operation in this weapon's test.

char_489_serum.title: Depart
char_489_serum.text: The holiday's always over in the blink of an eye. Well, then, let's get to work.

char_489_serum.title: Begin Operation
char_489_serum.text: I'll be troubling you to make these test targets fall in line a little with our work, Doctor.

char_489_serum.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_489_serum.text: Do you have any additional directives?

char_489_serum.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_489_serum.text: You can order me for anything you'd like.

char_489_serum.title: Deployment 1
char_489_serum.text: Timed just like your simulation.

char_489_serum.title: Deployment 2
char_489_serum.text: The stressful test phase is now beginning.

char_489_serum.title: In Battle 1
char_489_serum.text: Can I make sure none of you will surrender just yet?

char_489_serum.title: In Battle 2
char_489_serum.text: I have an extra project here that needs all your cooperation for testing.

char_489_serum.title: In Battle 3
char_489_serum.text: I'd like to ensure you all persevere until I can gather enough data.

char_489_serum.title: In Battle 4
char_489_serum.text: Of course. This is part of work, too.

char_489_serum.title: 4-star Result
char_489_serum.text: Doctor, this has thrown a slight wrench in things. After all, you've obtained combat results beyond expectations, and made it marginally more difficult for my assessment of weapon performance limits to be universal and objective. I'll have to increase the quantity of test samples to ensure accuracy... was that in your plans too?

char_489_serum.title: 3-star Result
char_489_serum.text: A pleasing result. It seems once we return and I finish collating this data, I'll have some spare time for free movement. Well, then, do you have any free time coming up, Doctor?

char_489_serum.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_489_serum.text: Not too ideal in terms of results. Deployment tactics still have room for optimization. Don't you think so, Doctor?

char_489_serum.title: Operation Failure
char_489_serum.text: Let's not feel down, Doctor, you will find a solution to break this deadlock. After all, you'd like the reports we'll be writing to be worth more than scrap paper, wouldn't you?

char_489_serum.title: Assigned to Facility
char_489_serum.text: Is there anything I'd be able to help with?

char_489_serum.title: Tap
char_489_serum.text: I wouldn't trouble you with a matter this small.

char_489_serum.title: Trust Tap
char_489_serum.text: Doctor? I assume you're there.

char_489_serum.title: Title
char_489_serum.text: Arknights.

char_489_serum.title: Greeting
char_489_serum.text: It's nice to see you, Doctor.

char_449_glider.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_449_glider.text: Do we work so hard every day? Hohh... this is rough... Doctor, if the stress ever gets to you, please don't bottle it up. I'll chat with you anytime.

char_449_glider.title: Talk 1
char_449_glider.text: Here, Doctor, this is for you. I sent an application to Dr. Kal'tsit, and remodeled an unused cabin into a conversation room. This is the leaflet I made myself!

char_449_glider.title: Talk 2
char_449_glider.text: I've heard there's a mysterious snackseller here who can dodge the Medical Department's controls, and shows up when anyone needs them... Doctor, is this all true?

char_449_glider.title: Talk 3
char_449_glider.text: As long as you take daily precautions, Oripathy is hardly that easy to catch! The sick aren't that dangerous, let alone their healthy relatives... Why do people always let ignorance scare them about this or that, and they're never even willing to look into it some more?

char_449_glider.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_449_glider.text: Doctor, look at this! Ehehe, it's a notice that I'm qualified and approved for psychological counseling. I've been preparing forever, and I finally passed the test!

char_449_glider.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_449_glider.text: My dad passed away when I was very little, because of Oripathy. The villagers were scared of getting infected, and they shunted us deep into the forest, far from the settlement. Life might've been very tough, but my mum still carried on as she took me through... Now I'm grown up, and it'll be my turn to look after her!

char_449_glider.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_449_glider.text: My old home was in the woodlands in west Rim Billiton. I grew up in the forest all my life, so I'm a bit familiar with all kinds of herbals. That said, herbals can treat your surface injuries, but invisible wounds on your spirit just aren't that easily cured...

char_449_glider.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_449_glider.text: Doctor, can I stay here? Would I be able to chat with you? I promise I won't interrupt your work! Everyone in the Medical Department has missions today, Mint's studying and she's not coming out for any fun, and there's no patients who need tending to. It's just me left now... I don't want to be alone...

char_449_glider.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_449_glider.text: I believe that getting good sleep, eating good food, and sharing the glad and the sad times with friends can make people happy. There's times when enduring too much does more harm... Doctor, just to let you know if you've got any worries, share them with me. Don't forget about it, okay?

char_449_glider.title: Idle
char_449_glider.text: Doctor, did you fall asleep...? Hmm, no reaction, gotta be asleep. Okay, good chance! Let's find where the Doctor's been hiding all those snacks...

char_449_glider.title: Onboard
char_449_glider.text: Nice to meet you, I'm the new Medical Department intern, Honeyberry. I'm assuming you're the Doctor...? Hmm, it's just like Dr. Kal'tsit said. You're different enough from everyone else that I can tell you at a glance!

char_449_glider.title: Watching Battle Record
char_449_glider.text: So you can do emergency treatment like this too...!

char_449_glider.title: Promotion 1
char_449_glider.text: A promotion? So that means, I've cleared my internship without any problems?! That's brilliant!

char_449_glider.title: Promotion 2
char_449_glider.text: I've learned and gained so much at Rhodes Island. It's all the experiences that build up, and all the beautiful memories, that give me the drive to keep going, to strive together with all of you!

char_449_glider.title: Added to Squad
char_449_glider.text: After our mission's over, why don't we all celebrate together?

char_449_glider.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_449_glider.text: Please don't worry, leave your health to me...

char_449_glider.title: Depart
char_449_glider.text: It's time. We should be departing any moment now.

char_449_glider.title: Begin Operation
char_449_glider.text: Before checking what methods the other side might use, each of you please watch yourselves!

char_449_glider.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_449_glider.text: No problem!

char_449_glider.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_449_glider.text: Do I have to jump down? I've got a real penchant for that!

char_449_glider.title: Deployment 1
char_449_glider.text: Arrived at designated position, treatment targets sighted!

char_449_glider.title: Deployment 2
char_449_glider.text: Everyone, focus on fighting! Just leave treatment to me!

char_449_glider.title: In Battle 1
char_449_glider.text: Get a hold of your breathing, and relax.

char_449_glider.title: In Battle 2
char_449_glider.text: Everyone... hang in there!

char_449_glider.title: In Battle 3
char_449_glider.text: I've got a way to treat you here!

char_449_glider.title: In Battle 4
char_449_glider.text: No matter what trouble we're in, I'll face it together with all of you...!

char_449_glider.title: 4-star Result
char_449_glider.text: Mission complete! Now it's time for a celebration party... why don't you join us, Doctor?

char_449_glider.title: 3-star Result
char_449_glider.text: It's finally over... you all worked so hard.

char_449_glider.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_449_glider.text: We're not done yet, we need to treat the wounded as soon as possible...

char_449_glider.title: Operation Failure
char_449_glider.text: Don't get discouraged, we still have a chance!

char_449_glider.title: Assigned to Facility
char_449_glider.text: What do you think about building a treehouse?

char_449_glider.title: Tap
char_449_glider.text: Hm? What's the matter?

char_449_glider.title: Trust Tap
char_449_glider.text: Doctor, do you want some snacks?

char_449_glider.title: Title
char_449_glider.text: Arknights.

char_449_glider.title: Greeting
char_449_glider.text: Wow! D—Doctor, I'll jump down right now! Catch me, please!

char_4004_pudd.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4004_pudd.text: Doctor, can I borrow half of your desk? Thank you very much. Huff... Ah, it's a blueprint for a new electrical system. I need to get it drawn up by today. Are you busy too? Let's be partners in overtime, then?

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk 1
char_4004_pudd.text: I've been into electricity ever since I was a kid. Just listening to currents crackling really soothed me. Huh? You think that's weird?

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk 2
char_4004_pudd.text: You learn a lot when you're in Rhodes Island's Engineering Department. The Operators bring weapons and equipment from all over, all sorts of technological applications you've never seen before, and all of them worth plenty of research time. If I put more efforts to my work, I might be able to stay in the Engineering Department.

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk 3
char_4004_pudd.text: This is 'Pillow,' a childhood friend of mine. Our family moved from somewhere way far all the way to Columbia, and I found myself very lonely at school. My mom gave me Pillow to keep me company. Oh, Doctor, you should know it can't speak!

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4004_pudd.text: I got into an accident while I was on a lone study out in the country, and was unable to contact the rescue team. Pillow and I had to make it all the way back to inhabited land on foot. After that... I didn't really want to go out doors.

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4004_pudd.text: My dreams... that I work well, and everyday is a nice day. Also, I want to buy a holiday villa in Sami, and after my parents are retired, they can live there together... yeah, I've gotta stay healthy, and keep on trucking until they retire.

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4004_pudd.text: Since I was little, my mom and dad would find time every year to take me to the tundras on vacation. We're all really into cold places! Although if I wanted to cover the cost for my own vacations, I'd have to go pick up work in the city again.

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4004_pudd.text: Haah, *yawn*... Sorry, Doctor, can I take a break here for a little bit...? Ever since this new project kicked off, the shift schedule's been completely crazy! I still have to go check over the base station later...

char_4004_pudd.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4004_pudd.text: To tell the truth, I've wanted to try going outdoors lately. I've gotten to know a lot of people in the same line as me at Rhodes Island, and I wanna experience more along with them. At least... I'm not ever going to be stuck on my own again, not now.

char_4004_pudd.title: Idle
char_4004_pudd.text: Oh, the Doctor's asleep…? Well, I'd better turn this machine down a bit. It's kind of loud…

char_4004_pudd.title: Onboard
char_4004_pudd.text: Hello, I'm an electrical engineer from Columbia, codename... Well, Closure suddenly started calling me 'Pudding', but I don't know if that's too weird...

char_4004_pudd.title: Watching Battle Record
