char_4004_pudd.text: So this is how professionals fight… Alright, I'd better put in some training if I'm gonna make it through this safely.

char_4004_pudd.title: Promotion 1
char_4004_pudd.text: Thank you for the recognition. I still have a ways to go compared to Rhodes Island's other Operators, so if there's any more high-effort work, throw it my way. If I just get enough sleep, I can hold out for some real long shifts.

char_4004_pudd.title: Promotion 2
char_4004_pudd.text: Combat missions in the tundra? At this point, I think I can be of help. Doctor, thank you, and all of Rhodes Island for always encouraging me. I'd like to pitch in some of my own strength now.

char_4004_pudd.title: Added to Squad
char_4004_pudd.text: I'm being assigned to combat? Just give me a bit more time to get ready... I... I can do this.

char_4004_pudd.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4004_pudd.text: I don't have much confidence in commanding, but I do know a thing or two about basic survival in the countryside.

char_4004_pudd.title: Depart
char_4004_pudd.text: Pillow, don't you go leaving my sight.

char_4004_pudd.title: Begin Operation
char_4004_pudd.text: Getting shocked hurts, you know?

char_4004_pudd.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4004_pudd.text: Yep... understood.

char_4004_pudd.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4004_pudd.text: Phew—Pillow, let's do our best!

char_4004_pudd.title: Deployment 1
char_4004_pudd.text: Waaaah, careful!

char_4004_pudd.title: Deployment 2
char_4004_pudd.text: Alright, I... I'm up!

char_4004_pudd.title: In Battle 1
char_4004_pudd.text: Collector on standby!

char_4004_pudd.title: In Battle 2
char_4004_pudd.text: Electric diffusion!

char_4004_pudd.title: In Battle 3
char_4004_pudd.text: Electric charge!

char_4004_pudd.title: In Battle 4
char_4004_pudd.text: Live discharge!

char_4004_pudd.title: 4-star Result
char_4004_pudd.text: Mission complete. Right now, I got the same feeling I get seeing a blueprint come perfectly to life. What a relief!

char_4004_pudd.title: 3-star Result
char_4004_pudd.text: That wasn't too bad of a job... heheh, can you put this in my evaluation?

char_4004_pudd.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4004_pudd.text: Ugh... no. A discrepancy like this should be totally avoidable.

char_4004_pudd.title: Operation Failure
char_4004_pudd.text: Everyone, orderly retreat, please! I don't want anyone to fall behind!

char_4004_pudd.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4004_pudd.text: Phew, now where should I put Pillow...

char_4004_pudd.title: Tap
char_4004_pudd.text: Oh, careful, you'll get shocked!

char_4004_pudd.title: Trust Tap
char_4004_pudd.text: Ahh... please don't throw out any of the pink household goods in the Engineering Department. Those are for overtime use!

char_4004_pudd.title: Title
char_4004_pudd.text: Arknights.

char_4004_pudd.title: Greeting
char_4004_pudd.text: Good morning, Doctor. *yawn*... I should probably catch up on some sleep.

char_206_gnosis.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_206_gnosis.text: I can spend some time discussing matters with you before my next experiment.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk 1
char_206_gnosis.text: You are spending far too much time outside the laboratory, Doctor. As a researcher, you must know this only hinders you from making great strides.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk 2
char_206_gnosis.text: SilverAsh's sisters? Yes, I've met them several times... Hm...? What more do you want me to say? I know nothing about those frolicsome, ever-changing creatures, and I certainly am not interested in them.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk 3
char_206_gnosis.text: It is incredibly ignorant to simply write off the symptoms that arise upon Oripathy infection as a mere disease, and then to go on to think only about how to 'control' and 'heal' this disease. Don't tell me this is how you think as well.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_206_gnosis.text: Shining. I knew I would find her here... Hm? No, she is an excellent scholar, and we collaborated for a period of time until she disappeared one day. That's all.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_206_gnosis.text: I am not working for SilverAsh; our objectives merely overlap. Of course, I won't deny what he is trying to achieve holds great significance for the future of the Snow Realm.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_206_gnosis.text: The best way you can earn my trust is by showing me your true academic strengths, and it seems you've already realized as much, Doctor. I am not like SilverAsh. I am not interested in deeper emotional exchanges.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_206_gnosis.text: If you understand SilverAsh well enough, you know he is not a callous man. From my point of view, he might even be a little indecisive... That, is your weakness too, Doctor.

char_206_gnosis.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_206_gnosis.text: Much like SilverAsh's, your endeavors require the help of countless supporters. However, the more supporters you have, the more you have to worry about. Since you cannot disregard them, you should avoid getting entangled. That is my one and only piece of advice for you, Doctor.

char_206_gnosis.title: Idle
char_206_gnosis.text: It seems you are rather lax in maintaining your own health, Doctor.

char_206_gnosis.title: Onboard
char_206_gnosis.text: Pleasure to finally make your acquaintance, Doctor of Rhodes Island. I've been eager to meet you ever since Karlan began its relationship with your company. You may call me Gnosis.

char_206_gnosis.title: Watching Battle Record
char_206_gnosis.text: War is merely a means to an end. That said, if you claim there are more efficient ways, I'm happy to learn.

char_206_gnosis.title: Promotion 1
char_206_gnosis.text: I am far more interested in gaining access to Rhodes Island's databases than I am in a salary increase.

char_206_gnosis.title: Promotion 2
char_206_gnosis.text: If Rhodes Island is willing the cross the line, I am sure you will see results that far surpass what you are currently achieving... That said, with SilverAsh as an example, I do understand the reasons behind your convictions. Hmph, allow me to offer a helping hand, then.

char_206_gnosis.title: Added to Squad
char_206_gnosis.text: You're in luck. I just completed my experiment.

char_206_gnosis.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_206_gnosis.text: Fulfill your roles, and leave the rest to me.

char_206_gnosis.title: Depart
char_206_gnosis.text: I can only hope this mission won't prove to be a waste of time.

char_206_gnosis.title: Begin Operation
char_206_gnosis.text: Follow the plan.

char_206_gnosis.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_206_gnosis.text: Right.

char_206_gnosis.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_206_gnosis.text: You disrupted my train of thought, Doctor.

char_206_gnosis.title: Deployment 1
char_206_gnosis.text: A fine choice.

char_206_gnosis.title: Deployment 2
char_206_gnosis.text: Let's put an end to this as soon as possible.

char_206_gnosis.title: In Battle 1
char_206_gnosis.text: As expected.

char_206_gnosis.title: In Battle 2
char_206_gnosis.text: I have an idea.

char_206_gnosis.title: In Battle 3
char_206_gnosis.text: What a ruckus.

char_206_gnosis.title: In Battle 4
char_206_gnosis.text: Do not disrupt my thought process.

char_206_gnosis.title: 4-star Result
char_206_gnosis.text: I look forward to seeing such spectacular results from you in your research, Doctor.

char_206_gnosis.title: 3-star Result
char_206_gnosis.text: Having prepared appropriately, these results are unsurprising.

char_206_gnosis.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_206_gnosis.text: Sometimes, there is much to gain from the unexpected.

char_206_gnosis.title: Operation Failure
char_206_gnosis.text: Were there too many variables outside our control...?

char_206_gnosis.title: Assigned to Facility
char_206_gnosis.text: Time to head to the lab.

char_206_gnosis.title: Tap
char_206_gnosis.text: Hey.

char_206_gnosis.title: Trust Tap
char_206_gnosis.text: I have an idea. Care to hear it?

char_206_gnosis.title: Title
char_206_gnosis.text: Arknights.

char_206_gnosis.title: Greeting
char_206_gnosis.text: You should spend your time more efficiently, Doctor.

char_422_aurora.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_422_aurora.text: You can hand me whatever work you want, as long as I'm capable of handling it. After all, I'm here to let you catch your breath, Doctor.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk 1
char_422_aurora.text: My sickness isn't that bad. It hurts once in a while, but I can take it. Doctor, I'll continue working, be sure of that. I don't want to let anyone down.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk 2
char_422_aurora.text: I think… I ate them all. Eh...? Those were your snacks for the week? I'm so sorry... I can make you some cheese fondue for your afternoon teatime.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk 3
char_422_aurora.text: I still can't help but bow whenever I meet Master SilverAsh and the Saintess in the corridors, even though they tell me that at Rhodes Island, I should treat them as coworkers. I'll try, somehow.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_422_aurora.text: I... wouldn't make a good explorer. I want to protect much more than explore. Driving the posts in, building a home. People as tenacious as you always need someone to watch your flanks, right? That's who I want to be, Doctor.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_422_aurora.text: Master SilverAsh says that Kjerag can't forever rely on Kjeragandr, let alone another country. One day I hope to stand against the blizzard with this shield, for the sake of my family.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_422_aurora.text: I have dreams of snowy mountains all the time. Dreams of... running across lakes frozen deep. But my home isn't just snow and ice. Grass covers the valleys, and trains weave swiftly between the slopes. Those, too, form the Kjerag of my memories.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_422_aurora.text: ...I'm always asleep when you come to see me? No, I'm not feeling unwell or anything. It's a habit; I work for days at a time, and the moment I lie down, I fall into a long, deep sleep. But just call my name, Doctor, and I'll wake up straight away. Don't worry about me.

char_422_aurora.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_422_aurora.text: Doctor, have you ever seen the aurora? When I was a student, I saw it just once in the northernmost tundra. It was very soon after I got sick, and I had to say goodbye to the survey group. If I can ever go back... would you come see the aurora with me?

char_422_aurora.title: Idle
char_422_aurora.text: Doct... you can have my jacket, okay? You'll catch a cold, sleeping somewhere like this.

char_422_aurora.title: Onboard
char_422_aurora.text: Doctor, I'm Aurora. My boss Closure talks about you a lot. I promised her I'd protect you.

char_422_aurora.title: Watching Battle Record
char_422_aurora.text: Is this... a record from the battle in Lungmen? So this is another way you can use shields... I've learned a lot.

char_422_aurora.title: Promotion 1
char_422_aurora.text: Captain Sharp's assessment... is so high? And you agree as well? I... I'm so happy!

char_422_aurora.title: Promotion 2
char_422_aurora.text: Could I send this medal home? I want my mother to know, I might be sick, but not everything looks bad. I have made my way.

char_422_aurora.title: Added to Squad
char_422_aurora.text: A field mission again? I'm with you, Doctor.

char_422_aurora.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_422_aurora.text: You want me leading? I... I'll work to follow Captain Sharp's example.

char_422_aurora.title: Depart
char_422_aurora.text: Aurora, moving out.

char_422_aurora.title: Begin Operation
char_422_aurora.text: You there, stay back! Don't come any closer.

char_422_aurora.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_422_aurora.text: Doctor, give the word.

char_422_aurora.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_422_aurora.text: Awaiting orders.

char_422_aurora.title: Deployment 1
char_422_aurora.text: Appropriate terrain for me.

char_422_aurora.title: Deployment 2
char_422_aurora.text: Don't even think of coming through.

char_422_aurora.title: In Battle 1
char_422_aurora.text: The snows of my home... are with me.

char_422_aurora.title: In Battle 2
char_422_aurora.text: Snow, be what boils my blood.

char_422_aurora.title: In Battle 3
char_422_aurora.text: Snow, be what freezes their blood.

char_422_aurora.title: In Battle 4
char_422_aurora.text: Snow, be what warms my family.

char_422_aurora.title: 4-star Result
char_422_aurora.text: I'll become stronger than I was, to make your victories easier.

char_422_aurora.title: 3-star Result
char_422_aurora.text: Stay back, for just a second... I'm too icy now. Let me just rub a bit to warm up... good, that's better! Alright, now it's safe to high-five!

char_422_aurora.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_422_aurora.text: Next time, I won't let a single one escape.

char_422_aurora.title: Operation Failure
char_422_aurora.text: Doctor, we have to retreat! Can you still move? Get on my back... no, I'll carry you!

char_422_aurora.title: Assigned to Facility
char_422_aurora.text: It's so hot in here...

char_422_aurora.title: Tap
char_422_aurora.text: M-My cookies are gonna spill!

char_422_aurora.title: Trust Tap
char_422_aurora.text: Are you heading out? I'll be your bodyguard.

char_422_aurora.title: Title
char_422_aurora.text: Arknights.

char_422_aurora.title: Greeting
char_422_aurora.text: You're looking well, Doctor. Just say if you need anything.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4019_ncdeer.text: The files that needed sorting have all been put away. I hope it'll help reduce some of your pressure, Doctor.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: The atmosphere in here is duly soothing, much like my mountain forest. Doctor, you're free to come play when you're not busy.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: I've talked a lot with the Medical Department's operators, and now I can understand what everyone's goal is. Doctor, allow me to rescue this land together with you.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk 3
char_4019_ncdeer.text: This herbal pill... it's fine work. Myrrh's combined the properties of the medicinals and processed them in a special way. Hmm... I've never attempted such a manner of processing myself. In a little while, I'll see about learning from Myrrh.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Aid and sanctuary are unalike. The former cures the body, the latter saves the soul.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: To live is an endless cycle, reaping what one sows, all beings beholden to this. I imagine you can understand, having been through so much. Leaving your own memories behind in a different incarnation, constructing your own view of the outside world; that is the purpose of this life.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: These pills have not just the aroma of tea, but all sorts of flowers too. Many patients consider herbal pills bitter, so I've put my mind to diminishing that bitterness. I hope... the people of Rhodes Island won't dislike this flavor.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: I very much agree with the tea here, its aroma calm, its true flavor apparent. As with tea, so with man. In this dwelling, those irrelevant rumors can be kept away; it's a rare place of respite.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Doctor, the operators can have the dishes labelled with my name to eat, as well as some bottles of drinks I made myself. Everyone's been to truly tiresome lengths as of recent, and I wanted to do a thing or two to help alleviate their fatigue...

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Idle
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Are you tired? Rest well for a while. Don't worry; I'll protect you.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Onboard
char_4019_ncdeer.text: It's nice to meet you; I'm Nine-Colored Deer. Hm? Are these motifs so beautiful? Th-Thank you... please, observe them as you like.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4019_ncdeer.text: May I go with you next time? I want to ensure everyone's safety.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Promotion 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: You've endorsed me? So I have been of help to you, then. Wonderful...

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Promotion 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: The things I've learned may save many, but there remain yet more in need of aid. Doctor, can I still be more powerful than I am now?

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Added to Squad
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Worry not, I won't betray your trust.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Am I taking command? No problem.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Depart
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Don't worry, I'll bring everyone home safely.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Begin Operation
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Don't separate. We meet the battlefield now.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: I see them... an unknown enemy.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Are these new orders? Mm, acknowledged.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Deployment 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: This... is the chill of the battlefield.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Deployment 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: I'm ready.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: In Battle 1
char_4019_ncdeer.text: The mind is as truth, a mirror reflecting all ways.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: In Battle 2
char_4019_ncdeer.text: A thought leaving reality, delusion in all cases.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: In Battle 3
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Heaven and earth come alike, all beings come together.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: In Battle 4
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Everything has its way, per flame and per current.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: 4-star Result
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Mm... this battle was very smooth.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: 3-star Result
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Life is sincerely precious, but base and wicked life is punished in the end.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4019_ncdeer.text: You needn't be sad. Though there were slight faults, with a little more of a try, you will always succeed.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Operation Failure
char_4019_ncdeer.text: If it has no power, no one should be shown that mercy.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4019_ncdeer.text: What a strange place. So much I've never seen before.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Tap
char_4019_ncdeer.text: 'Kindness' is something not to be exploited, Doctor.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Trust Tap
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Doctor, here's a scented tea for you. It'll perk you up.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Title
char_4019_ncdeer.text: Arknights.

char_4019_ncdeer.title: Greeting
char_4019_ncdeer.text: You seem very energetic, Doctor.

char_4013_kjera.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor! Was it me you wanted? Or did you want me to find Enya for something?

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk 1
char_4013_kjera.text: I can't just pop up anywhere I want like I can back in Kjerag, Doctor. So if you want something delivered for you, you'll want someone else.

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk 2
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor! Is your belly empty? I've learned how to use Rhodes Island's kitchen, so I can put something together for you.... ah, but I can only do Kjerag food for the time being. Hmm... how about some cheese fondue?

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk 3
char_4013_kjera.text: Enya... Enya? Doctor, have you seen Enya? It's about time we return to Kjerag, and with all the things that need her attention, she has to come with us. Just where has that girl scurried off to now...?

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4013_kjera.text: 'Prayer that will be found, devotion that will be rewarded...' If anything that convenient truly existed, I'd like to see it myself. Me? I'm hardly even perfect knitting sweaters—how could I grant anyone's wishes? Oh, but if you'd like a blizzard, that's something I can do for you.

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4013_kjera.text: In a certain way, Enya and Enciodes are the same to me. Both siblings want to change Kjerag, after all. But if I had to say why I'm so much closer to Enya... it's because she became my Saintess. Not Enciodes.

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor, next time you visit Kjerag, would you like to see the view from the peak of Karlan? Standing at the summit above the clouds amidst the mountains, seeing the sun once again is a heavenly feeling. You'll love it—ah, but there is the chance you'll freeze to death before then. Tricky, that...

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4013_kjera.text: Enya's attitude towards her brother, well... I'm sure you understand—the opposite of intimacy isn't hatred, but indifference. And she likes to say as much, though it's not actually quite that bad between them. That said, in time... I have no clue at all.

char_4013_kjera.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4013_kjera.text: The world outside sprawls vast and far, Doctor. But I've come to realize something. It's like people are the same no matter where you go. The palette of emotions outside does not differ from what I have seen in Kjerag. It truly is a fascinating thing, though just as dull too.

char_4013_kjera.title: Idle
char_4013_kjera.text: Oh, my, your sleeping posture is terrible... I'll run you a bowl of water. You can wash your face as soon as you come round.

char_4013_kjera.title: Onboard
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor... shh. I came out in secret with Enya. Make sure Ensia and the Karlan Trade people don't find out, or things will get messy for her.

char_4013_kjera.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4013_kjera.text: *Sigh*. No matter how advanced our weapons get, combat is still so barbarous...

char_4013_kjera.title: Promotion 1
char_4013_kjera.text: Oh! A promotion...Well, I've come here with Enya quite a few times now...

char_4013_kjera.title: Promotion 2
char_4013_kjera.text: The Rhodes Islanders by and large seem to know who I am now. Which means I can get a little closer to them, right...? Oh, can't I?

char_4013_kjera.title: Added to Squad
char_4013_kjera.text: Oh, won't you want me leading, Doctor?

char_4013_kjera.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4013_kjera.text: I'll see you all safely through.

char_4013_kjera.title: Depart
char_4013_kjera.text: Anyone we've left behind?

char_4013_kjera.title: Begin Operation
char_4013_kjera.text: Let me quell the enemy!

char_4013_kjera.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4013_kjera.text: Dear me, I'm not done readying yet!

char_4013_kjera.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4013_kjera.text: Let's assist others, shall we?

char_4013_kjera.title: Deployment 1
char_4013_kjera.text: Don't you fret. No matter the environment, I can 'see' them just fine.

char_4013_kjera.title: Deployment 2
char_4013_kjera.text: No need for mercy on the enemy, correct?

char_4013_kjera.title: In Battle 1
char_4013_kjera.text: You thought I couldn't see you?

char_4013_kjera.title: In Battle 2
char_4013_kjera.text: I'm aimed at you, you know?

char_4013_kjera.title: In Battle 3
char_4013_kjera.text: You didn't think it'd come from this angle, did you?

char_4013_kjera.title: In Battle 4
char_4013_kjera.text: You're not getting close to me that easily, you know?

char_4013_kjera.title: 4-star Result
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor, you can't be overzealous in challenging your limits, or you might hurt yourself.

char_4013_kjera.title: 3-star Result
char_4013_kjera.text: What a splendid job, Doctor! You make me want to pat you on the head~

char_4013_kjera.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4013_kjera.text: Now, now, it's alright. These are fine enough results, aren't they?

char_4013_kjera.title: Operation Failure
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor, fear not. I'm here.

char_4013_kjera.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4013_kjera.text: Let's see, here's... whereabout is this?

char_4013_kjera.title: Tap
char_4013_kjera.text: Oh?!

char_4013_kjera.title: Trust Tap
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor, would you like to go on a walk together?

char_4013_kjera.title: Title
char_4013_kjera.text: Arknights.

char_4013_kjera.title: Greeting
char_4013_kjera.text: Doctor! Did you sleep well last night?

char_4025_aprot2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4025_aprot2.text: Doctor, might these be the books and documents you were looking for? No, no need to thank me, I'm simply glad to be of help. How would I have known what you needed? Heheh. That would be... secret.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: Phantom and I certainly have... our similarities, in what we've been through. Though now he pursues the truth, I only wish to be far removed from it.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: Doctor. About that lady who came to borrow your books... was her name Mint? She seems to be curious about a great many things. Curiosity in excess usually invites disaster, you see, and I have my reservations.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk 3
char_4025_aprot2.text: It is quite the relief you were with us last mission, Doctor. I find myself dazed by the sight of you when you command. As if something crosses past the curtain of night and the stirring stars, leading your way...

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: Dance, music. Both soothe the soul, twin arts calling on us to focus and follow. But at times, too great a fixation can be our undoing. Such stories were already far too plenty where I formerly lived. Even I... am no exception to the rule.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: Doctor? What are you standing there for...? I see... you overheard me talking with someone...? Cease with the jests, please. There is no one here... but me.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: You wish to learn of the Crimson Troupe's affairs? Of course, I know of them all. But take caution, Doctor, for should you stray like they from the proper path... or come near to too many of them, you may be taken hold of. And that is not, whatsoever, desirable.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: Here you are once more. Please, sit. Be reassured that I will not drive you out. So, what's the matter this time? Could Hibiscus have made another healthy meal? Or is Sideroca bound to whisk you away for training again?

char_4025_aprot2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4025_aprot2.text: My stories are hackneyed, bereft of novelty. Likely, not as engaging as you imagine. You would like to hear them nonetheless? Very well. Then I will tell you tales... but in exchange, Doctor, would you grant me a request?

char_4025_aprot2.title: Idle
char_4025_aprot2.text: Doctor. Doctor? Beg pardon, I know I should not disturb your rest... but it is far too still here for me to fully be at ease.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Onboard
char_4025_aprot2.text: I envisaged the scene in which we would formally meet, Doctor, and this very moment brings it to life. Operator Shalem, pleased to make your acquaintance.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4025_aprot2.text: At times, I do feel the battlefield and the stage resemble one another, in ways.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Promotion 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: Promotion, did you say...? Ah, I'm sorry, it just startled me. Thank you for your acknowledgement, Doctor.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Promotion 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: Unlike him, still wreathed in his struggle, I had long since fled the past, never to concern me again... yes, Doctor, so I once hoped.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Added to Squad
char_4025_aprot2.text: Worry not, coordinating with others is a strength of mine. So long as nothing untoward happens...

char_4025_aprot2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4025_aprot2.text: I may lack for power, but I will do all that I can.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Depart
char_4025_aprot2.text: Everyone, follow me, please.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Begin Operation
char_4025_aprot2.text: See those on the stage... knowing nothing of their fates.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: Fret not.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: Their future is clear to see.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Deployment 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: I hope we may resolve this peacefully.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Deployment 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: To kill and to be killed, to do battle. Far too many plays are penned on these themes.

char_4025_aprot2.title: In Battle 1
char_4025_aprot2.text: And may this end as swiftly as can be.

char_4025_aprot2.title: In Battle 2
char_4025_aprot2.text: The path you all now walk bears not one hope.

char_4025_aprot2.title: In Battle 3
char_4025_aprot2.text: Surely, your skulls... would be mesmerizing to see, right?

char_4025_aprot2.title: In Battle 4
char_4025_aprot2.text: Hahahaha... haha, hahahahahahaha...

char_4025_aprot2.title: 4-star Result
char_4025_aprot2.text: This is far beyond my wildest dreams. The best outcome, Doctor.

char_4025_aprot2.title: 3-star Result
char_4025_aprot2.text: It is done. Be at ease, for no danger remains. Well done, Doctor.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4025_aprot2.text: Our mission is complete, Doctor. As for those who escaped... they have their own fates to meet.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Operation Failure
char_4025_aprot2.text: Haste not; ponder leisurely. We still have opportunities.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4025_aprot2.text: Shall we rest here a while? How about some music?

char_4025_aprot2.title: Tap
char_4025_aprot2.text: Ah... I'm sorry, I was lost in thought.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Trust Tap
char_4025_aprot2.text: Doctor, could you hold my coat for me briefly? I'll be done in a moment. My thanks.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Title
char_4025_aprot2.text: Arknights.

char_4025_aprot2.title: Greeting
char_4025_aprot2.text: Welcome, Doctor. Indeed, I knew you would surely come.

char_476_blkngt.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_476_blkngt.text: Your files are all fully sorted. Hm? Was that fast? I wasn't dozing off on your last shift, after all. I have your whole workflow noted right inside my head.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk 1
char_476_blkngt.text: Stop! You're triggering one of my traps. Move any further, and a bolt will blow your brains out. How could I fall asleep surrounded by traps? That's a strange question. I couldn't sleep at all without these little trinkets around me.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk 2
char_476_blkngt.text: What we stole from the Leithanian nobles, they plundered from the land before that. We're the children of the wilds, but we are not unreasonable. Lungmen traders do good to others, and Siracusans keep to the rules, so I told my team not to lay a finger on them.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk 3
char_476_blkngt.text: Is that Lee guy here too? He got me when I was careless, and now I want a rematch. No, no need to worry, none of the trinkets he carries interest me. You go tell him as much.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_476_blkngt.text: Infected? Only city people would call themselves that. In the endless and cutthroat wilds, whether beast or human, survival means you can call yourself the strongest.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_476_blkngt.text: There's plenty who think the wilds are a frightening place, but to me, they were my home. I made a mistake once. It torn my family apart,  and these slumberfoots are the only ones left to roam with me. I'll never make a mistake like it again.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_476_blkngt.text: The name Blacknight was given to me by a Yan storyteller. I always used to do my work at night, pulling the floor from under them when those merchants were drowsy. Me and my slumberfoots would take away their wealth, and 'devour' their dreams too.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_476_blkngt.text: Don't act so nice to me... you never know when my crossbow will be aimed at your head. You don't believe I'm like that? Up to you, then. I've got no interest in dealing with a penniless good guy.

char_476_blkngt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_476_blkngt.text: They called me their boss. So I protected them, gave them food and a place to rest. But now, for as long as I haven't beaten you, you're my boss. I'll protect you, and I'll follow your orders.

char_476_blkngt.title: Idle
char_476_blkngt.text: ...Fell asleep hugging Helmet? Light, bring a blanket over. Keep your movements low.

char_476_blkngt.title: Onboard
char_476_blkngt.text: You're the best tactician on Rhodes Island? I'm Blacknight, and excuse me but we're going to need a showdown. If I lose, you'll be my boss from then on, and I ask to be trained properly.

char_476_blkngt.title: Watching Battle Record
char_476_blkngt.text: Mm, all memorized. Anything else?

char_476_blkngt.title: Promotion 1
char_476_blkngt.text: You're not worried I'll take the bonus and run? I'm joking. For that matter, a badge like this won't fetch any real money anyway.

char_476_blkngt.title: Promotion 2
char_476_blkngt.text: Work and earn a living. I wonder if my parents lived a life like this in Rim Billiton? It's fine, but I'm not letting my crossbow rust.

char_476_blkngt.title: Added to Squad
char_476_blkngt.text: Good timing. I need something to do.

char_476_blkngt.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_476_blkngt.text: You want me leading? Then you'll want to watch how I do it.

char_476_blkngt.title: Depart
char_476_blkngt.text: Listen up, darlings. Once we're on the battlefield, you need to listen to the Doctor too.

char_476_blkngt.title: Begin Operation
char_476_blkngt.text: You want to run? Before you do, remember to leave your valuables behind.

char_476_blkngt.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_476_blkngt.text: I'm right by you. Don't make a sound.

char_476_blkngt.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_476_blkngt.text: Understood. Just as planned, then.

char_476_blkngt.title: Deployment 1
char_476_blkngt.text: I'm heading that way.

char_476_blkngt.title: Deployment 2
char_476_blkngt.text: Let's clear this path up first.

char_476_blkngt.title: In Battle 1
char_476_blkngt.text: Helmet, lure the enemy left!

char_476_blkngt.title: In Battle 2
char_476_blkngt.text: Light, harass the closest enemy!

char_476_blkngt.title: In Battle 3
char_476_blkngt.text: Cart, set mines in the bushes!

char_476_blkngt.title: In Battle 4
char_476_blkngt.text: Drill, open a hole!

char_476_blkngt.title: 4-star Result
char_476_blkngt.text: How'd me and the darlings do? No compliments for us?

char_476_blkngt.title: 3-star Result
char_476_blkngt.text: Not bad! I've learned some more moves.

char_476_blkngt.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_476_blkngt.text: I'll take a few to the next crossing. We need to get this cleaned up.

char_476_blkngt.title: Operation Failure
char_476_blkngt.text: No, you have to get out of here! Do as I said, or the enemy will have you trapped. We'll retreat for now and think of a better way to fight back.

char_476_blkngt.title: Assigned to Facility
char_476_blkngt.text: Roaming under the night sky is just one hundred times better than getting shut in here.

char_476_blkngt.title: Tap
char_476_blkngt.text: Who was that?!

char_476_blkngt.title: Trust Tap
char_476_blkngt.text: Tired? You can have Helmet to hug for a little bit, then. At least until tomorrow.

char_476_blkngt.title: Title
char_476_blkngt.text: Arknights.

char_476_blkngt.title: Greeting
char_476_blkngt.text: Hey, Helmet, no running about in the corridor! Don't think I can't see you just because you're hiding in someone's arms... oh, fine, I'll let you off, for {@nickname}'s sake.

char_2023_ling.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2023_ling.text: Evocative so. Years and an age ago, the very palace rained and drizzled in the whisperers of consultants.

char_2023_ling.title: Talk 1
char_2023_ling.text: Yea, when Yan scholars speak of Sui, that is us, and It too. Facts hardly worth covering up; Nian's worries are not mine. After all, I am only me, and my death, no more than death is. The only shames would be this wine and world, for at day's end I love them long.

char_2023_ling.title: Talk 2
char_2023_ling.text: I was of the mind I would finally meet someone past, an old friend. Never did I think this is how you now present yourself. From knowing not one is one, isn't this like a dream? However, {@nickname}. It is fine to be as yourself. Long have I contended with myself; myself I shall prefer to act.

char_2023_ling.title: Talk 3
char_2023_ling.text: Where the heart is as will, and its utterance is as verse. If wells your chest with depths manifold, wouldn't failing their writing be shame to meet yourself? Hm? My tail? Ah, so too do I make use of a common brush, naturally. But it is at times inconvenient, as an extremity would be. My body is an unfettered one; who says I can't use my tail?

char_2023_ling.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2023_ling.text: Poetry, speech, lyric, essay. Though they all differ as their own, they are common in places. A pity the people of now are, by and large unable to exercise patience. To listen to a song, to read a poem. I take no objection to it, but how must our present scholars suffer.

char_2023_ling.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2023_ling.text: Nian is too impetuous, Dusk timid, yet to see the two as they are now, it seems they already know what they like, and want to do. So why probe at veracity or falsity or object or subject? To bicker and squabble every day, knowing emotion's gamut, is that not what a person is?

char_2023_ling.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2023_ling.text: {@nickname}, would you want for me to compose you a verse? Hm? Nay, I'm simply in the mood. I need not write it, nor record it. Ah, wait, if it were a song... that would be quite good too! But to dance a song, I fear I would need some preparation. Good! You sit there, and await me a short while.

char_2023_ling.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2023_ling.text: I am drunk? Hah... I have not yet seen the sky throw wide, moon rise, seas race, ice break, to wait true for all the world's sobriety would be but the withering of a bud, to want true for deep intoxication would be far too early still... {@nickname}, now, why do you say I am drunk?

char_2023_ling.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2023_ling.text: Last night I dreamt of you. Nay! Perhaps it's you who dreamt of me. Oh, can you not recall? A shame; it delighted me so, yet I cannot share this revelry. Delighted how? Hmm. That eight thousand years of springs, eight thousand of winters, all dreamt, were no more than a brief handful of autumns. That is all.

char_2023_ling.title: Idle
char_2023_ling.text: Clouds ranged as billows, distant-run roads withered. I, departed of the vistas, sailed a ferry in late autumn.

char_2023_ling.title: Onboard
char_2023_ling.text: Ling, you can call me. Have my two troublemaking sisters vexed you any? Hm? You've seen me before? Ah... perhaps so, in a dream.

char_2023_ling.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2023_ling.text: Though antithetical at a glance, your nature is quite similar.

char_2023_ling.title: Promotion 1
char_2023_ling.text: Hm... 'General, I heed thy order,' should I say? Ha, do not take it seriously. I only suppose that if you were truly a field marshal, then I may not mind once again serving as a strategist.

char_2023_ling.title: Promotion 2
char_2023_ling.text: Nian was not wrong. This farcical dream of a thousand autumns is only right to wake from.

char_2023_ling.title: Added to Squad
char_2023_ling.text: The river bends a thousand times, a city lone in desolation, vivid in the mind's eye.

char_2023_ling.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2023_ling.text: To scatter the fill of a brimming cup, to share the sip for a soothed sorrow.

char_2023_ling.title: Depart
char_2023_ling.text: Plotted schemes, waged wars, crossed arms, shed blood. An eternity, unaltered and unfailing in its challenge.

char_2023_ling.title: Begin Operation
char_2023_ling.text: To gaze the fire from afar, knowing not its heat.

char_2023_ling.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2023_ling.text: Has it come to my turn?

char_2023_ling.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2023_ling.text: Truly evocative.

char_2023_ling.title: Deployment 1
char_2023_ling.text: And thus has autumn made reckoned her arrival.

char_2023_ling.title: Deployment 2
char_2023_ling.text: For the marching, a warsong. For the fallen, a lament.

char_2023_ling.title: In Battle 1
char_2023_ling.text: The split halberd sinks in the sand, great aspirations unrecompensed.

char_2023_ling.title: In Battle 2
char_2023_ling.text: One word to address all beneath the heaven, one scope to spare none upon the earth.

char_2023_ling.title: In Battle 3
char_2023_ling.text: When will the hate sunk beneath the battlefield disperse?

char_2023_ling.title: In Battle 4
char_2023_ling.text: Speak as your heart wills, and be as your intoxication wishes.

char_2023_ling.title: 4-star Result
char_2023_ling.text: Another song, sublime and majestic. {@nickname}, perhaps you and I truly are as two entwined friends.

char_2023_ling.title: 3-star Result
char_2023_ling.text: Duly satisfying, as a cup filled to the brim. We should remain level and humble, yet... we ought to sing your praises, yes. You did well.

char_2023_ling.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2023_ling.text: Mm... things disappoint on occasion; there's no need to blame yourself too hard. Leave the rest to me.

char_2023_ling.title: Operation Failure
char_2023_ling.text: Victory and defeat are commonplace in war. As we have freedom to maneuver, this is not a complete loss.

char_2023_ling.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2023_ling.text: Rhodes Island's interior... I'm lost as to whether I should say it's reminiscent or curious.

char_2023_ling.title: Tap
char_2023_ling.text: Hm? Do you need me?

char_2023_ling.title: Trust Tap
char_2023_ling.text: What is it? Would you like a cup? You wouldn't? What a shame.

char_2023_ling.title: Title
char_2023_ling.text: Arknights.

char_2023_ling.title: Greeting
char_2023_ling.text: Why, how are you, {@nickname}?

char_322_lmlee.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_322_lmlee.text: Sorting files? Whoa, I've suddenly gotten this headache. I can't take it, I need a break. Well, keep at it, Doctor. Such little paperwork should be a walk in the park for you, right?

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk 1
char_322_lmlee.text: A job? Of course, I'm all ears. Or maybe you'd like something a little spicier than detective work? Some wet work? Haha, just pulling your leg. We don't do that sort of thing. We're fine, upstanding citizens running a legitimate business.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Having Waai Fu and Hung around to keep an eye on that Aak boy really saves me a broken back. I'll admit, it's shameful, but I started out babysitting these kids, and now they're all taking care of me. Kids these days do more than we did when I was young, and that's great.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk 3
char_322_lmlee.text: It's thanks to your patronage that the agency is still running smoothly, give or take. Lungmen's a place with the human touch—live there long enough, and sooner or later you'll know a crowd, find the right connections. We don't like spilling blood in our line of work—always best to solve things friendly.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_322_lmlee.text: How do you like it, Dr. {@nickname}? Jaye makes mean finballs, doesn't he? Old Tung taught that boy his trade and his way of treating people. It all combines for a flavor unique to Lungmen. Come on, have a try. It'll warm you up.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Under this heading, you had the third row on the left here wrong, so I patched that up, no need for thanks. Oh, do I come off very fluent? Not at all, this is still my first time accounting on a scale so small outside of the agency. Things used to be very—ah, I'm getting distracted, don't you mind.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_322_lmlee.text: Why are the lights all on at this hour... oh? Ah, Dr. {@nickname}. Are you still processing battle records? Well, I never thought you were such a workaholic. I'm impressed. But! You'd better turn in sooner. It's not worth it to break your body doing it.

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Everyone's chasing fame and profit. But after so many winning and losing, how many people get to end up as what they like? Living a decent little life of your own is sometimes a lot to ask for. Ah, what are we all doom and gloom for? I'll go stir-fry something up, so you wait for me, Dr. {@nickname}. A drink together would be even better, don't you think?

char_322_lmlee.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_322_lmlee.text: My hexagram says to avoid going out, so I'll pass on this mission today... what, I can't? I have to go, no two ways about it? Hah, I see. Then this is a special exception, once only! I'm lending you a hand, so dinner's on you tonight! Look, I'm all decided! This is the joint!

char_322_lmlee.title: Idle
char_322_lmlee.text: Why a busy life when you can have a leisurely cup of tea. *gulp* Dr. {@nickname}, you do keep some good tea leaves here.

char_322_lmlee.title: Onboard
char_322_lmlee.text: Hello, hello there, you must be the Dr. {@nickname}? You've been looking after my employees for me. They haven't made trouble for you, have they? Oh, that reminds me, here's a card for my agency. Take it, go ahead.

char_322_lmlee.title: Watching Battle Record
char_322_lmlee.text: How about a quick scrap? No, no, I'm just joking. I'm no good in a fight.

char_322_lmlee.title: Promotion 1
char_322_lmlee.text: A promotion...? There's a first for me. Feels quite fresh, too. I think times like these call for some magic words—thank you very much, boss?

char_322_lmlee.title: Promotion 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Life goes by in a flash. If you're always jostling for the lead, when do you stop to smell the roses? Don't think too hard about things. Enjoy the moment. No matter how paranoid you are, it'll happen if it's going to happen. And you've dealt with it, all's right with the world.

char_322_lmlee.title: Added to Squad
char_322_lmlee.text: Do I have to come along too? *Sigh*... fine, fine. Let's get going.

char_322_lmlee.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_322_lmlee.text: Good. Follow my instructions closely, then. Alright, everyone, dismissed—wait, hold it, don't head off for real! I was joking! Joking!

char_322_lmlee.title: Depart
char_322_lmlee.text: It's like we're on a school trip here, eh?

char_322_lmlee.title: Begin Operation
char_322_lmlee.text: Fortune favors the bold, but you still need a few tricks up your sleeves to win the battle.

char_322_lmlee.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_322_lmlee.text: I'm sure you can sort them... wait, hold it. Am I up now?

char_322_lmlee.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_322_lmlee.text: There, there. Put your worries to rest. I'm right here.

char_322_lmlee.title: Deployment 1
char_322_lmlee.text: Hello, friends, what are we talking about?

char_322_lmlee.title: Deployment 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Time for a little telling off. But not too harshly.

char_322_lmlee.title: In Battle 1
char_322_lmlee.text: Come on, man. Friendliness is good for business.

char_322_lmlee.title: In Battle 2
char_322_lmlee.text: Hey, buddy! Calm it down! You nearly spilled my tea!

char_322_lmlee.title: In Battle 3
char_322_lmlee.text: My friends, I implore you to reconsider-- Is there REALLY no room for negotiation here?

char_322_lmlee.title: In Battle 4
char_322_lmlee.text: *Grumble* I told you. Don't get so worked up.

char_322_lmlee.title: 4-star Result
char_322_lmlee.text: My thanks. It couldn't have happened without you, Dr. {@nickname}... I owe you for this one. I won't forget.

char_322_lmlee.title: 3-star Result
char_322_lmlee.text: Well done, Dr. {@nickname}. What, where was I just now? Well, given your capability, it was better for me to be your moral support. Cheered the whole time, you see.

char_322_lmlee.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_322_lmlee.text: Now, now, hold it! Do not press an enemy at bay. Let them run free.

char_322_lmlee.title: Operation Failure
char_322_lmlee.text: Risky, risky. There's a terrifying fortune to get. Thank goodness we run fast.

char_322_lmlee.title: Assigned to Facility
char_322_lmlee.text: Dr. {@nickname}? Here, take this. Decorate your room with it. Ah, but not at the head of your bed. What does it do? Haha, now that would be telling.

char_322_lmlee.title: Tap
char_322_lmlee.text: I'm sure we can talk this out, nice and easy. No need for physical contact, right?

char_322_lmlee.title: Trust Tap
char_322_lmlee.text: No smoking here? But this isn't a cigarette, it's white stick candy. You don't believe me? Go on, try some.

char_322_lmlee.title: Title
char_322_lmlee.text: Arknights.

char_322_lmlee.title: Greeting
char_322_lmlee.text: Welcome to Lee's Detective Agency, do you have any work... Well if it isn't Dr. {@nickname}!

char_1021_kroos2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1021_kroos2.text: We'll be alright without sorting these files, won't we? Then you can lie down and sleep for a bit longer. It's good for your health. At least you can get rid of those bags under your eyes.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: Got a heap of useful info from our mission in Yan this time. It's all written up in a report, submitted and filed. Come on, Doctor, I'm not a reserve op anymore. I can pull up my socks and write a report start to finish, easy enough.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: At the end of the day, the best thing to do with apples is munch them outright, or bake them into pies so you can share with everyone—it's too wasteful using them as targets. And if you just want to split one in two, you're better off with a kitchen knife.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk 3
char_1021_kroos2.text: I've got a bucketload of magic tricks to bring friends closer. The 'marathon alarms,' the 'invisible warning tape,' the 'hollow cake,' they're all brilliant. Which ones do you fancy learning, Doctor?

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: I'm awake, Doctor. I'm not like I was then—it's not that easy to sleep even if I want to. So where do you need me? Any field missions? Maybe instructing the reserve ops?

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: Accidents always happen too quickly. Quicker than a bolt flies, even. And I can never react in time. And then I just watch things happen one after another, and... Sigh, it'd be nice if I could see things coming a mile away like you, Doctor. At least, when it comes to preparing, I've got confidence I don't botch anything.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: Doctor, don't tiptoe behind me again! I know when you're close up most times, but on the off-chance you sneak a bit too well, I might just give you a bad scare out of reflex.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: We all came out of that fight in Rim Billiton a bit more grown up, but... *exhale*... It'd be nice if getting better didn't come with a cost, you know...

char_1021_kroos2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1021_kroos2.text: There's no place you can escape to, and no dreams you don't wake up from. When we face something terrible, we can only choose to give it our all, hard as we can. Might leave a sting or an ache, but at the very least, you won't carry that regret all your life.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Idle
char_1021_kroos2.text: You know, it's a happy thing to fall asleep like that.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Onboard
char_1021_kroos2.text: Hi-hiii~! Doctor! I'm back! Haven't got caught up in hassle lately, have you? Haha, that's good. Right, I'm heading back to my room to rest up. If there's anything you want dealing with, remember to give me a shout.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1021_kroos2.text: Some still fight the same as ever. It's nice to see.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Promotion 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: I've gotten these badges how many times now? But whenever hand me one, Doctor, I'm as happy as could be.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Promotion 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: Once you raise your crossbow, the only things left swimming in your eyes are your sight and your target. But before you pull the trigger, there's so much you've got to think about... I won't be careless or neglectful ever again.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Added to Squad
char_1021_kroos2.text: Hi, everyone! I'm here to slack off~

char_1021_kroos2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1021_kroos2.text: Alright, time to assign the tasks.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Depart
char_1021_kroos2.text: We're heading out. Remember, mind your cover.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Begin Operation
char_1021_kroos2.text: Relax, the targets aren't that bad.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: Go ahead, I'm all ready and set.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: Oh? Is it my turn?

char_1021_kroos2.title: Deployment 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: Shh, don't make any more noise.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Deployment 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: On alert.

char_1021_kroos2.title: In Battle 1
char_1021_kroos2.text: Where d'you think you're going?

char_1021_kroos2.title: In Battle 2
char_1021_kroos2.text: Here I am.

char_1021_kroos2.title: In Battle 3
char_1021_kroos2.text: Stand still.

char_1021_kroos2.title: In Battle 4
char_1021_kroos2.text: Bye byeeee~

char_1021_kroos2.title: 4-star Result
char_1021_kroos2.text: That's spot-on work. Have a rest, Doctor, I'll keep a watch on the follow-up.

char_1021_kroos2.title: 3-star Result
char_1021_kroos2.text: So long as it turns out well, a little pain's no big problem.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1021_kroos2.text: They won't be much threat. Do you want me to catch up with them?

char_1021_kroos2.title: Operation Failure
char_1021_kroos2.text: Orderly retreat! Don't panic!

char_1021_kroos2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1021_kroos2.text: This place is nice! Maybe I can find some beauty sleep in here.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Tap
char_1021_kroos2.text: Heheh.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Trust Tap
char_1021_kroos2.text: Not that way, Doctor. I've left an extra-special 'surprise' for my friends over there!

char_1021_kroos2.title: Title
char_1021_kroos2.text: Arknights.

char_1021_kroos2.title: Greeting
char_1021_kroos2.text: Yaaawn... good morning~

char_377_gdglow.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_377_gdglow.text: Am I really going to be helpful? Um... alright, if you say so...

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk 1
char_377_gdglow.text: Hmm... your hair is close to coming out of your hood. If you've got the time, remember to give it a trim.

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk 2
char_377_gdglow.text: I can't use anything like a compass. No matter what I do, they all end up pointing at me. *Sigh*... I had no clue as a child, so I tried to use them to find my way home... Now that I think about it, I'm lucky I have a sense of direction.

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk 3
char_377_gdglow.text: You wanna touch my ears? Of course, touch them however you want... but people usually only do it a tiny bit. Why? Heheh, you'll find out if you try, won't you?

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_377_gdglow.text: My Arts are... how do I put it? They affect a lot of things, but because they don't have a form, it's hard to grasp them properly... if I can get a handle on their nature some day, I might be able to live a normal life.

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_377_gdglow.text: Static electric pulse theory says... okay, okay, I see. I just need to apply my Arts Unit, and start the antistatic equipment up, and that should... Yagh! That's not working at all. Where did I mess it up...? Here? Alright, once more.

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_377_gdglow.text: Welcome~! Oh, Doctor! You finally decided to get your hair sorted, then? Good, sit down. Today, I'll be your... That's right, it's a salon in here, you're not imagining things. Um, don't go! This is my speciality, trust me, please! You won't regret this, I guarantee!

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_377_gdglow.text: My dad told me I should pick up another craft in addition to Originium Arts, so this is what I went with. It turns out the only hair I can't fix is my own... Okay! How's that? Are there any bits you want fixed? None? Heheh, I thought as much. Alright, I'm finished for the day, then.

char_377_gdglow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_377_gdglow.text: Before I got Infected, I was actually in really good shape. I got second place in a cross-country race! Once my Oripathy's a bit better, I want to start training again, and carry the gold medal back. Can I ask you to present it to me, Doctor? Heheh, then it's a promise.

char_377_gdglow.title: Idle
char_377_gdglow.text: The circuit's grounded... okay, now my hair shouldn't poof out. I'll have a break while the Doctor's asleep.

char_377_gdglow.title: Onboard
char_377_gdglow.text: Finally made it here... nice to meet you, Doctor. I'm a new Operator onboard, Goldenglow. I look forward to working under you.

char_377_gdglow.title: Watching Battle Record
char_377_gdglow.text: Mmgh... it still doesn't really make sense. Maybe I should visit my Instructor and see if she can help.

char_377_gdglow.title: Promotion 1
char_377_gdglow.text: There's no tingling feeling, is there? If not, we should be fine. Okay! I'll accept this medal from you graciously, Doctor. Thank you!

char_377_gdglow.title: Promotion 2
char_377_gdglow.text: Doctor! Stay away from here! I just need a—a-are you alright?! Are you hurt anywhere? I took all the protective measures, didn't I? Why...

char_377_gdglow.title: Added to Squad
char_377_gdglow.text: Is there really a use for me on the front?

char_377_gdglow.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_377_gdglow.text: Doctor, are you sure I should be the captain?

char_377_gdglow.title: Depart
char_377_gdglow.text: I've got this, I've got this. I can do this!

char_377_gdglow.title: Begin Operation
char_377_gdglow.text: There's enemies?!

char_377_gdglow.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_377_gdglow.text: I'm so tense...

char_377_gdglow.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_377_gdglow.text: Can I really do it?

char_377_gdglow.title: Deployment 1
char_377_gdglow.text: Now's the time to help everyone out.

char_377_gdglow.title: Deployment 2
char_377_gdglow.text: I'll do my best!

char_377_gdglow.title: In Battle 1
char_377_gdglow.text: Get away from me, please!

char_377_gdglow.title: In Battle 2
char_377_gdglow.text: Stay back!

char_377_gdglow.title: In Battle 3
char_377_gdglow.text: Yaah!

char_377_gdglow.title: In Battle 4
char_377_gdglow.text: Keep a good distance—there!

char_377_gdglow.title: 4-star Result
char_377_gdglow.text: Huh? Oh—no, it's nothing! Let's get going!

char_377_gdglow.title: 3-star Result
char_377_gdglow.text: I managed to help a little, didn't I? Heheh.

char_377_gdglow.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_377_gdglow.text: Phew, we're finally saved. Are you hurt?

char_377_gdglow.title: Operation Failure
char_377_gdglow.text: We were so, so close...

char_377_gdglow.title: Assigned to Facility
char_377_gdglow.text: I need to keep away from the electronics...

char_377_gdglow.title: Tap
char_377_gdglow.text: Hwah!

char_377_gdglow.title: Trust Tap
char_377_gdglow.text: Could you help me comb my hair down? Thank you so much, Doctor.

char_377_gdglow.title: Title
char_377_gdglow.text: Arknights.

char_377_gdglow.title: Greeting
char_377_gdglow.text: Hope you have another good day today.

char_492_quercu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_492_quercu.text: Last time I was an assistant, I think I was still thirteen or fourteen, treating people with my mum. Of course, I can do much more than hand out herbals and sing well-wishing verses now. If you need my help, ask away! Don't be shy.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk 1
char_492_quercu.text: I think I've seen a few new faces this time after returning to Rhodes Island. Dr. {@nickname}, how does it feel to have more and more people under you? Do you feel that brimming and bursting vitality? We always say back home, rage against death with new life.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk 2
char_492_quercu.text: Rhodes Island Bridge-Climbing Competition? Dr. Kal'tsit shut that down midway, didn't she? Citing lack of safety ropes for all the contestants and so on. Well, I wasn't that likely to win it, and the look on Dr. Kal'tsit's face was a much greater sight to see anyway.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk 3
char_492_quercu.text: You look put out with all these reports on your desk. Don't worry, if there's any danger, I'll know it by the scent. But! If you just don't want to work, I can't help you there.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_492_quercu.text: Of course it's much easier to gather intel when you're a lone operator. But every time I'm in the country, I pick a bag full of berries while I'm free, and I think to myself, maybe I want someone to share with after all. Otherwise, I've got no one to tell me how great I am at picking.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_492_quercu.text: You get the sense I served from how I work? You only got that impression from seeing my files. Service members come in all shapes and sizes, too. Some only like to read and research their comms tech, some spend all day dreaming about going on holidays in the city to see idol concerts...

char_492_quercu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_492_quercu.text: Dr. {@nickname}, you might be covering your face, but I can tell you've perked up a lot more compared to when you came back from Chernobog. But if you spend the whole time under this low of a ceiling, your mind'll get dull. Head out onto the deck every now and then. Get some fresh air. It's good for you.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_492_quercu.text: When I looked after the ill back home, I ran across a couple Infected calling themselves 'Reunion'... and then I got into a fight with them. I can't stand it, seeing those children with firelight in their eyes lost in all the pointless violence, about to burn themselves through.

char_492_quercu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_492_quercu.text: Those who depart us receive the land's forgiveness, and rest in her embrace... but some people go too quickly, the roots of the forests of their homes unable to hold onto their hands. Was that not like me, being so serious? You really should've seen me when I worked back home.

char_492_quercu.title: Idle
char_492_quercu.text: Not sure if the Doctor's a light sleeper... I'd better stand watch quietly.

char_492_quercu.title: Onboard
char_492_quercu.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor. Call me Quercus. It's the first time we've met, but the intel on your desk about northern Victoria is straight from me... What, even you're going to tell me my reports aren't standard?

char_492_quercu.title: Watching Battle Record
char_492_quercu.text: I wish I'd learned all this a little earlier.

char_492_quercu.title: Promotion 1
char_492_quercu.text: What's this promotion come out of nowhere for? My candied fruit must make a strong impression.

char_492_quercu.title: Promotion 2
char_492_quercu.text: In my hometown, you had to make a choice with Originium Arts. Whether to terrorize others, or to aid them... The result of my greed was that I couldn't commit properly to either. Even so, would you still have faith in me?

char_492_quercu.title: Added to Squad
char_492_quercu.text: As long as it's your decision, I'll have no objections.

char_492_quercu.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_492_quercu.text: It's a major responsibility.

char_492_quercu.title: Depart
char_492_quercu.text: Shouldn't we consider marching routes other than on the ground?

char_492_quercu.title: Begin Operation
char_492_quercu.text: The more defined a battle's goal is, the clearer tactics become.

char_492_quercu.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_492_quercu.text: Will the land shake with fury, or display her mercy?

char_492_quercu.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_492_quercu.text: If you're still hesitating, I can give some advice.

char_492_quercu.title: Deployment 1
char_492_quercu.text: I will stand guard here.

char_492_quercu.title: Deployment 2
char_492_quercu.text: Beginning collection of battlefield information.

char_492_quercu.title: In Battle 1
char_492_quercu.text: The land will forgive all in the end, but not now.

char_492_quercu.title: In Battle 2
char_492_quercu.text: The wind blows through; the leaves tell stories of those who sleep.

char_492_quercu.title: In Battle 3
char_492_quercu.text: Arbor, reach your hands to me.

char_492_quercu.title: In Battle 4
char_492_quercu.text: I remember your face as well, now.

char_492_quercu.title: 4-star Result
char_492_quercu.text: Wow, incredible! I've got the urge to snap a formal salute just to show my respect.

char_492_quercu.title: 3-star Result
char_492_quercu.text: That was a perfect operation! Once we're back, dinner will taste even better.

char_492_quercu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_492_quercu.text: They can't be running far. Do you plan to pursue?

char_492_quercu.title: Operation Failure
char_492_quercu.text: It's alright, let me organize the retreat. I leave our next counterattack to you.

char_492_quercu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_492_quercu.text: It always feels a little hard to catch my breath when I'm shut in here for long.

char_492_quercu.title: Tap
char_492_quercu.text: Oh? Are you as much of a prank-lover as all those kids?

char_492_quercu.title: Trust Tap
char_492_quercu.text: You want to hear me sing? Do you know who our songs are sung for? Usually, it's for the gravely ill.

char_492_quercu.title: Title
char_492_quercu.text: Arknights.

char_492_quercu.title: Greeting
char_492_quercu.text: You're back here in your office again, Dr. {@nickname}. Have you refreshed your body and mind well?

char_300_phenxi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_300_phenxi.text: Stay sharp. Focus, finish your work. If everyone could just get their own work done, it might as well not help at all, but it's not going to make anything worse either. Lecturing? Who am I to lecture you, I'm just... reminding myself.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk 1
char_300_phenxi.text: Whatever it is you want, it can wait until I get my hands on Mostima! It has to be that damn idiot who spiked my finballs with chili! Get to the side and make sure you stay there, this day's not done until I put a bolt in her—

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk 2
char_300_phenxi.text: I tried using guns before, but it didn't pan out, so I gave up. What, are you surprised? Guns aren't some huge mystery, but they need practice... and maybe you practice until you're smooth, or you blow yourself up in a burst.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk 3
char_300_phenxi.text: If it's deemed necessary, taking measures to block intel leakage is part of my work. ...Hey, stop staring at my back! Those idiots at the Notarial stuck those wing stickers there, they're not coming off! *cough* Anyway, don't count on me telling you anything. Keeping secrets is my job.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_300_phenxi.text: Too much curiosity's never good. That goes for Lemuen's sister, and it goes for you too, Doctor. Am I worried about you? ...Hardly. I'm just tasked with making sure *someone* doesn't leak secrets or make trouble, and anything else is beyond my care.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_300_phenxi.text: I've been to plenty of nations before. It's not like nowhere moves me more than Laterano, but I'm all too clear about what I have to do right now. I've got no intent of letting anybody harm this city of Laterano. There's no more answers I need to seek from anyone.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_300_phenxi.text: ...Don't call me 'Suffering.' And don't call me 'Chosen Overseer' or 'Flaming Envoy' either! That's it, no matter what that Mostima-on-low told you, I want you to forget all of it right now! Immediately! On the double!

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_300_phenxi.text: Thanks to a certain *someone*, I couldn't be more familiar with all the food streets around. I seriously don't know what's so good about this place. See the shooting gallery at the entrance? I could hit their targets from the roof of the skyscraper opposite. You want me to bring you along next time? ...I'll consider it.

char_300_phenxi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_300_phenxi.text: Can people really cut everything loose without looking back, even shatter the order that was there, all to chase ideals? That's a dedication that... I can comprehend, but can't identify with. I know you all have your own beliefs at Rhodes Island, too. Here's hoping we don't come into direct conflict one day, Doctor.

char_300_phenxi.title: Idle
char_300_phenxi.text: Beats me how you sleep while standing up... and you even look pretty normal. It's a cut above everyone back then who sneaked naps in class.

char_300_phenxi.title: Onboard
char_300_phenxi.text: My duty's to monitor Mostima, so I'll be acting alongside her here, if you don't mind. You need a codename? ...Just call me Fiammetta. I've had enough of those codenames my bosses keep giving me.

char_300_phenxi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_300_phenxi.text: Keeping battle records is a pretty good habit.

char_300_phenxi.title: Promotion 1
char_300_phenxi.text: A promotion? Let me get this out of the way—this is my chance to use my own name, and you *cannot* give me any more weird job titles.

char_300_phenxi.title: Promotion 2
char_300_phenxi.text: Laterano code says whoever breaks it, pays for it, but reasonable loss of property in missions can be expensed. You order my actions, thus compensation fees naturally land with you too... what? You can't be regretting it now.

char_300_phenxi.title: Added to Squad
char_300_phenxi.text: Less dawdling, come on.

char_300_phenxi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_300_phenxi.text: Fine. But I'm not waiting for anyone who falls behind.

char_300_phenxi.title: Depart
char_300_phenxi.text: We're heading up. It'll be faster by rooftop.

char_300_phenxi.title: Begin Operation
char_300_phenxi.text: Don't make too big of a show.

char_300_phenxi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_300_phenxi.text: Sights locked.

char_300_phenxi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_300_phenxi.text: Boring.

char_300_phenxi.title: Deployment 1
char_300_phenxi.text: I only do what I need to.

char_300_phenxi.title: Deployment 2
char_300_phenxi.text: What, you've got time to take in the sights?

char_300_phenxi.title: In Battle 1
char_300_phenxi.text: Anyone in front of me who still feels like blinking?

char_300_phenxi.title: In Battle 2
char_300_phenxi.text: Sorry, forgot to hold that back.

char_300_phenxi.title: In Battle 3
char_300_phenxi.text: I don't like damage—unless it's necessary.

char_300_phenxi.title: In Battle 4
char_300_phenxi.text: There's no fluking between success and failure.

char_300_phenxi.title: 4-star Result
char_300_phenxi.text: You did a better job than I imagined. The feeling of fighting in a squad... it's been a long time.

char_300_phenxi.title: 3-star Result
char_300_phenxi.text: Mission complete. Look, this much is granted—don't make a fuss over nothing.

char_300_phenxi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_300_phenxi.text: If you're fine, we're fine. If something happened to you while I was on the job, I know *someone* would be laughing at me.

char_300_phenxi.title: Operation Failure
char_300_phenxi.text: Sorry, I was careless this time. I'll remedy it somehow.

char_300_phenxi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_300_phenxi.text: Ventilation's fine, visibility's excellent. Good, that's conducive to getting my work done.

char_300_phenxi.title: Tap
char_300_phenxi.text: Don't touch that. It'll explode.

char_300_phenxi.title: Trust Tap
char_300_phenxi.text: Doctor... is that your job title? How normal. How nice.

char_300_phenxi.title: Title
char_300_phenxi.text: Arknights.

char_300_phenxi.title: Greeting
char_300_phenxi.text: Same old, then?

char_4016_kazema.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4016_kazema.text: Please don't take all that artistic license for reality. Putting a doppelganger to use takes a lot of energy, and it won't happen for odd jobs like this.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk 1
char_4016_kazema.text: I imagine the few Higashi professionals here at Rhodes Island hid their backgrounds from you. If needs be, I can investigate for you—I guarantee any information you get will be the absolute truth.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk 2
char_4016_kazema.text: I've worked for Rhodes Island for ages now; I know the ins and outs of everything. If you have any questions, I can always help—hm? What is today's special at the cafeteria? I... have no idea... I'll go investigate.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk 3
char_4016_kazema.text: When you're out gathering info, the right clothes can avoid you a lot of hassle. For example, these—once they're all coordinated, you can seem just like a Victorian student taking their first steps into society. In another outfit... I'll demonstrate sometime else if we get the chance.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4016_kazema.text: Zzz... zzz... what a peaceful day... no bothersome cases, no quarrels in the street, and nobody to disturb you even if you sleep in... it's a shame moments of rest are always so short. Come on, Doctor, what do you need me to do?

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Since birth, I was meant as a hidden blade in the hands of others. Infiltration, tracking, luring, they became as natural as breathing to me. Being able to use these abilities on the way of right... ha, I never did imagine that. Thank you, Doctor.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4016_kazema.text: After the lord passed away, the young master set up a company with the family property. He tore up his oath too, signing contracts with us instead, and just like that, the famed ninjas were completely made over as white-collar workers. As for why I quit... I think I didn't take to sitting in an office, haha.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Dietary habits in Victoria are surprisingly close to those at home. I realized, ever since then, that maybe one day the people of Terra could lay down their prejudices and work hand in hand. But considering the... emm, unique ways they have of cooking locally, I still have some reservations.

char_4016_kazema.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4016_kazema.text: When I was young, my father drilled 'that which you should, you must' into me, and I always thought he meant I should do everything for myself. But after going from Higashi to Rhodes Island to Victoria, I came to see it anew. Distinguishing what I should and what I must, what to give and what to take—that's the true meaning of it.

char_4016_kazema.title: Idle
char_4016_kazema.text: You're thinking about something, aren't you... carry on, I won't disturb you.

char_4016_kazema.title: Onboard
char_4016_kazema.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor. Rhodes Island Branch Operator, Kazemaru, aboard from today on.

char_4016_kazema.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4016_kazema.text: I see... There's still more progress I can make on myself.

char_4016_kazema.title: Promotion 1
char_4016_kazema.text: Watch, just take the corner of this origami and ever so lightly—pull! And now it's just like a real beast cub. I just wanted to show off a little something to you, and I hope it turned out nice.

char_4016_kazema.title: Promotion 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Ever was my family's forte to be protean, and by this piece of paper, all that lives is imitable. Watch now, Doctor—Mimesis!

char_4016_kazema.title: Added to Squad
char_4016_kazema.text: I'll see to the role I should.

char_4016_kazema.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4016_kazema.text: Am I going to be leading? Oh, wow... I'll value this chance, you can be sure!

char_4016_kazema.title: Depart
char_4016_kazema.text: Off we go!

char_4016_kazema.title: Begin Operation
char_4016_kazema.text: Target visible. Beginning pursuit.

char_4016_kazema.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4016_kazema.text: All ready.

char_4016_kazema.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Danger? As if I should fear it.

char_4016_kazema.title: Deployment 1
char_4016_kazema.text: Beginning assignment.

char_4016_kazema.title: Deployment 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Success is inevitable. No need to leave it to chance.

char_4016_kazema.title: In Battle 1
char_4016_kazema.text: Wind, rise!

char_4016_kazema.title: In Battle 2
char_4016_kazema.text: Fall!

char_4016_kazema.title: In Battle 3
char_4016_kazema.text: Elusion!

char_4016_kazema.title: In Battle 4
char_4016_kazema.text: Shadow!

char_4016_kazema.title: 4-star Result
char_4016_kazema.text: Under your command, I've been far too spoiled.

char_4016_kazema.title: 3-star Result
char_4016_kazema.text: Mission complete. Good, no tracks left behind.

char_4016_kazema.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4016_kazema.text: You've noticed how serious I was during the fight? Well—they weren't very friendly, after all.

char_4016_kazema.title: Operation Failure
char_4016_kazema.text: Flee Doctor... ahead of me...

char_4016_kazema.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4016_kazema.text: Nmm, I'd love to relax~

char_4016_kazema.title: Tap
char_4016_kazema.text: What is it?

char_4016_kazema.title: Trust Tap
char_4016_kazema.text: Ah, Doctor, this is for you! I just finished folding it.

char_4016_kazema.title: Title
char_4016_kazema.text: Arknights.

char_4016_kazema.title: Greeting
char_4016_kazema.text: Hello to you, Doctor~

char_4036_forcer.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4036_forcer.text: Doctor, do all these files need to be filled out by today? It's just, with this much left... so be it, I'll help you out. If we sort this out together, it shouldn't eat into our break hours.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk 1
char_4036_forcer.text: When I decided to violate orders and act independently, I was expecting a severe reprimand. What I never predicted was that Mr. Executor would recommend me here…

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk 2
char_4036_forcer.text: Doctor, do you know if there's anywhere to borrow storybooks here? Operators at the Medical Department have asked me to care for the children under treatment, and I'd like to read them a tale or two.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk 3
char_4036_forcer.text: The Notarial Hall employs more than just field executors; there's plenty of civil service posts. I actually aspired for one in the first place, but when it came to the evaluation, I accidentally... um, collapsed a few rooms in the examination venue, which got me put in my current position.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4036_forcer.text: I don't rue leaving Laterano; it was my own choice. There's so many places I'm still not familiar with, but I feel that being able to see the breadth of Terra like I am now is more than worth it.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk after Promotion 2
