char_4036_forcer.text: The Sankta ability to perceive each other's states of mind is common sense to us, not something that needs real elaboration. But I'm sad to say, at some point, I suddenly realized I lost that reciprocation with my own people. It wasn't any physical disease, I just... began to think.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4036_forcer.text: Stop, Doctor! Phew. You took the wrong cup—that's the espresso I brewed for myself, with no sugar. Yours was the one next to it. Sorry, I assume it was too bitter? ...It's fine, it tastes great? A—Alright, I'm glad you like it.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4036_forcer.text: Doctor, could you lend me your comms device for a moment? I usually turn my comms off after work, and don't get any messages. ...There we go, I've granted you emergency contact privileges. You can get in touch with me whenever for whatever, this way.

char_4036_forcer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4036_forcer.text: You seem to be having plenty of fun. Yes, I can tell. Joy, sorrow, anger... emotions can propagate between all of us, regardless of what city or race we come from. When you're happy, it's no wonder I can sense it too.

char_4036_forcer.title: Idle
char_4036_forcer.text: Doctor, are you still awake? It's just a little longer now. We can be on break once this work's done. Here, I have your coffee.

char_4036_forcer.title: Onboard
char_4036_forcer.text: Hello, I'm a dispatch at Rhodes Island via a transfer agreement with the Notarial Hall. A codename? Let's think... You can call me Enforcer. Here's the files pertaining to the agreement. I'll be counting on you to show me the ropes.

char_4036_forcer.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4036_forcer.text: Brilliant. It'll be quick for me to adapt to this combat style.

char_4036_forcer.title: Promotion 1
char_4036_forcer.text: A promotion... Is this going to impact my specific working hours?

char_4036_forcer.title: Promotion 2
char_4036_forcer.text: Maybe it's immature of me to approach things this way, but every step I've taken up to today is of my own choosing, and I'm satisfied with that. Doctor, thank you so much for watching over me all this time.

char_4036_forcer.title: Added to Squad
char_4036_forcer.text: A new mission? Understood.

char_4036_forcer.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4036_forcer.text: If we run into any contingency situations, I will independently judge how to proceed.

char_4036_forcer.title: Depart
char_4036_forcer.text: The sooner we're out, the sooner we're on break.

char_4036_forcer.title: Begin Operation
char_4036_forcer.text: Do we have to compensate for damages incurred in combat?

char_4036_forcer.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4036_forcer.text: By your order.

char_4036_forcer.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4036_forcer.text: Enforcing.

char_4036_forcer.title: Deployment 1
char_4036_forcer.text: This battle is by no means out of animosity.

char_4036_forcer.title: Deployment 2
char_4036_forcer.text: We all simply have differing viewpoints, no more.

char_4036_forcer.title: In Battle 1
char_4036_forcer.text: This is as far as you go.

char_4036_forcer.title: In Battle 2
char_4036_forcer.text: A struggle with an ideal to support it is far from meaningless.

char_4036_forcer.title: In Battle 3
char_4036_forcer.text: I will hear you all out afterwards.

char_4036_forcer.title: In Battle 4
char_4036_forcer.text: Be careful not to fall from here, everyone.

char_4036_forcer.title: 4-star Result
char_4036_forcer.text: They have what they uphold, and we have ours. Thank you for the willingness to realize, Doctor.

char_4036_forcer.title: 3-star Result
char_4036_forcer.text: Mission complete. Good work, Doctor. Let's take a good break once we're back.

char_4036_forcer.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4036_forcer.text: The ones who ran—did they give up? Or, maybe...

char_4036_forcer.title: Operation Failure
char_4036_forcer.text: No need to be so dejected. We can still try again.

char_4036_forcer.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4036_forcer.text: So these are the renowned Rhodes Island dormitories? Very... well, frugal.

char_4036_forcer.title: Tap
char_4036_forcer.text: Careful! You could've spilled the coffee.

char_4036_forcer.title: Trust Tap
char_4036_forcer.text: I wear eyemasks while I'm on break, so I can only tell you all apart by your footsteps. Was that just now... the Doctor?

char_4036_forcer.title: Title
char_4036_forcer.text: Arknights.

char_4036_forcer.title: Greeting
char_4036_forcer.text: Want some coffee, Doctor?

char_4039_horn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4039_horn.text: I'll sort out your battlefield reports for you. My officialese isn't too shabby. I'll stand guard during your rest hours. Anything else required...? I'd prefer you don't keep me idle.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk 1
char_4039_horn.text: Has Bagpipe kept up her habit of humming around you? Me? I'm more the type to appreciate music in peace. The only thing a horn can play is the order to charge—I'm joking of course, Doctor.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk 2
char_4039_horn.text: The name 'White Wolf' goes as far back in history as the Aslan monarchy. Why are you interested, though? ...Ah. You saw... my fangs? I'm sorry, I lost control of myself then. I won't let it happen again.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk 3
char_4039_horn.text: I have beautiful handwriting? Thank you. It just comes with the facade when you're raised noble, which I've never been keen on. But sometime these days, I'm grateful for it—whenever I pick up a pen, everything else leaves my mind, and my focus is only on how I write every letter in the proper way.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4039_horn.text: As that city spat great black crystals from its gaping wounds, I thought there could be no hope left for it... Is this place familiar with those made Infected not by Catastrophe, but by human hands, Doctor of Rhodes Island?

char_4039_horn.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4039_horn.text: Rhodes Island Operator Misery managed to rescue me twice, and I'm sincerely grateful for it. I won't ask why I was the one he rescued. Those who live on are to carry forth the wishes of those who didn't make it.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4039_horn.text: I always feel stifled by gloomy indoor atmospheres. Do you want to go out and take a walk, Doctor? It might be overcast, but at least there'll be a breeze. There are times you can hear singing on the wind too, not just the echo of your own words.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4039_horn.text: I can vaguely remember the portraits of my ancestors decorated with medals in the hall. I also recall the épée carved with the Lion King's orders, and the maples my father planted in the front courtyard... but that's all that comes to me. I haven't returned home in a long, long while. In Her chaotic theater, Victoria's soldiers have no time to file for leave.

char_4039_horn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4039_horn.text: Doctor, does a commander as outstanding as you ever feel sorrow? Or anger? Or... hate? I try as hard as I can not to let personal emotions sway me, but I can't forget. I promised them I would never forget.

char_4039_horn.title: Idle
char_4039_horn.text: How do you sleep, after having witnessed so much cruelty...? If I could do the same as you, with a simple shut of my eyes, would I feel any better?

char_4039_horn.title: Onboard
char_4039_horn.text: Tempest Platoon Leader Horn reporting in, Doctor of Rhodes Island. I've already borne witness to your own tactics, and the fighting spirit of Rhodes Island's operators. Under our ensuing cooperation, I and my troops will heed your orders.

char_4039_horn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4039_horn.text: No amount of training can ever suffice.

char_4039_horn.title: Promotion 1
char_4039_horn.text: Thank you. I'll regard this as a commendation of my performance, and not a reflection of my status.

char_4039_horn.title: Promotion 2
char_4039_horn.text: Confer your emblems of rank on me. I'm willing... No. I must bear the hopes of more. Of those past, now, and to come.

char_4039_horn.title: Added to Squad
char_4039_horn.text: Victoria's servicemen should take pride in their own discipline.

char_4039_horn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4039_horn.text: I trust in my platoonmates at any and all times. I'd like you to put that same trust in me.

char_4039_horn.title: Depart
char_4039_horn.text: We have no time to hesitate. There are souls waiting for us, behind the firing line.

char_4039_horn.title: Begin Operation
char_4039_horn.text: I'll put up my shield. Don't stand in front of me.

char_4039_horn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4039_horn.text: Allow me to study your command style in this battle, Doctor.

char_4039_horn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4039_horn.text: At attention. Ready to fall in.

char_4039_horn.title: Deployment 1
char_4039_horn.text: Orders received.

char_4039_horn.title: Deployment 2
char_4039_horn.text: I will complete my assignment.

char_4039_horn.title: In Battle 1
char_4039_horn.text: The Tempest must wipe out all that blocks the way.

char_4039_horn.title: In Battle 2
char_4039_horn.text: Come! Best me if you can!

char_4039_horn.title: In Battle 3
char_4039_horn.text: I'll impart on you all the cries I've heard.

char_4039_horn.title: In Battle 4
char_4039_horn.text: You want to topple me? By what?

char_4039_horn.title: 4-star Result
char_4039_horn.text: One victory may not be enough to impact a whole war, but it can at least give more people a chance to see the open sky.

char_4039_horn.title: 3-star Result
char_4039_horn.text: Target has been suppressed.

char_4039_horn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4039_horn.text: Any mercy on the enemy is a potential disaster. Let me lead my troops to settle this.

char_4039_horn.title: Operation Failure
char_4039_horn.text: Not a worry, Doctor. Until you've gotten everyone away, I will not fall.

char_4039_horn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4039_horn.text: It doesn't resemble Victoria here, but... it reminds me of when I studied at the Royal Guard Academy.

char_4039_horn.title: Tap
char_4039_horn.text: Sorry, I'm not used to setting down my weapons. Did I bruise you?

char_4039_horn.title: Trust Tap
char_4039_horn.text: Hm...? I'm just reading an ordinary novel. I've gone an awfully long time without reading something new. All the written word went up in the fires of war.

char_4039_horn.title: Title
char_4039_horn.text: Arknights.

char_4039_horn.title: Greeting
char_4039_horn.text: Hello, Doctor. Have you rested well?

char_4040_rockr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4040_rockr.text: You want me to be your assistant? I can't, I barely know how to read. It'll just be a waste of your time. But if you need something fixed, then I can help.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk 1
char_4040_rockr.text: I'm too frugal? I don't think so, I just live the way I want. Machinery is good, but I don't need it to do anything fancy. Same goes for my clothes, only the stuff I make myself suits me best. If you have fewer needs, then of course you spend less money.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk 2
char_4040_rockr.text: When my dad was killed, I honestly thought there wasn't a single good man among the Sarkaz. But now that I think about it, I was too naive at the time. How can stuff like race or appearance decide if someone's good or bad? No matter what your race is, as long as you look out for one another, you're family.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk 3
char_4040_rockr.text: This outfit? Made it myself - it's gotta be as cool as possible since it gets really hot in the boiler room. It...doesn't look like work attire? What d'ya mean? There's all sorts of different workers, and each has her own needs.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4040_rockr.text: Neighbors who take care of each other, simple but comfortable furniture, an ever-growin' pile of spare parts, and machinery that clanks together like the growl of thunder. Now, that's the good life. I thought my dad'd grow old with his factory, and I'd grow old with the next-generation factory, but...

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4040_rockr.text: Doesn't matter what it is - as long as you make it yourself, it feels like home. Same goes for Londinium. Every brick and tile was laid down by Londiniers. We know what Londinium is thinkin', and we're gonna take it back with our own hands.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4040_rockr.text: Sometimes the commander reads books that are really hard to understand.. I remember a line went somethin' like this, 'People built cities, but refused to adapt to them.' Not sure I agree with that though. As long as you find your own way to live, it doesn't make a difference whether you're in the city or in the middle o' nowhere.

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4040_rockr.text: My dad and my old friends always used to say I was stubborn, stroppy, and foul-tempered. Don't think there's anything wrong with being stubborn, you need a bit of that to protect people around you. But, I failed... Cause... Where are they now...?

char_4040_rockr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4040_rockr.text: Here, Dr. {@nickname}. Why am I givin' money to you? 'Cause I can't spend it all, there's no point keepin' it around, and you happened to pass by. No need to be polite, I always used to give money to my friends, so they all got used to it. Huh, you don't need it? Damn it, gotta find someone else then...

char_4040_rockr.title: Idle
char_4040_rockr.text: Dr. {@nickname}, Dr. {@nickname}... Oh, havin' a sleep? Let me find a blanket for ya... Hmm, if I made a new blanket, the Doctor would probably find that helpful…

char_4040_rockr.title: Onboard
char_4040_rockr.text: Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps Caster, Rockrock, reporting in. Dr. {@nickname}, we've had a few misunderstandings in the past, but I'm not blinded by those old prejudices anymore. I hope we can have a good working relationship.

char_4040_rockr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4040_rockr.text: That's crazy... I gotta ask again, are you sure you're a drug company?

char_4040_rockr.title: Promotion 1
char_4040_rockr.text: I don't care about my rank. As long as I'm with friends... I'm always ready for the next battle.

char_4040_rockr.title: Promotion 2
char_4040_rockr.text: I fight to reclaim my home, and to put an end to the war. I hope that one day, we'll be able to put down our weapons and pick up the tools to rebuild Londinium. Just like... in the past.

char_4040_rockr.title: Added to Squad
char_4040_rockr.text: Of course, it's my job to protect my family.

char_4040_rockr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4040_rockr.text: Be careful. Your safety is more important than victory.

char_4040_rockr.title: Depart
char_4040_rockr.text: My drones are ready, Doctor. Should I scout ahead?

char_4040_rockr.title: Begin Operation
char_4040_rockr.text: Found 'em. They're not gettin' away!

char_4040_rockr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4040_rockr.text: I'm here, Doctor. I can see the enemy's tracks.

char_4040_rockr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4040_rockr.text: Standing by. Doctor, where do you need me?

char_4040_rockr.title: Deployment 1
char_4040_rockr.text: Ready to deploy my drones.

char_4040_rockr.title: Deployment 2
char_4040_rockr.text: Activating Rock-18 attack module.

char_4040_rockr.title: In Battle 1
char_4040_rockr.text: Rock-18, track the enemy!

char_4040_rockr.title: In Battle 2
char_4040_rockr.text: It's up to us to protect our homes!

char_4040_rockr.title: In Battle 3
char_4040_rockr.text: I'm not watching my friends die again!

char_4040_rockr.title: In Battle 4
char_4040_rockr.text: Rock-18, maximum power!

char_4040_rockr.title: 4-star Result
char_4040_rockr.text: I know my drone better than anyone else. It can't do that on its own. The fact that you've used it so effectively just shows how great a commander you are, Dr. {@nickname}.

char_4040_rockr.title: 3-star Result
char_4040_rockr.text: A total victory with no casualties. Dr. {@nickname}, if you were around back then, would things have... turned out differently?

char_4040_rockr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4040_rockr.text: The enemies are gettin' away, after them... Wait, no, scrap that. They might be leadin' us into a trap... Safety's gotta come first.

char_4040_rockr.title: Operation Failure
char_4040_rockr.text: Run, Doctor, I'll hold them off! ...It's alright, there's no need to worry... When I joined the Self-Salvation Corps, I was prepared for this moment.

char_4040_rockr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4040_rockr.text: This place... isn't the same as my home, but it's just as warm. I really like it here.

char_4040_rockr.title: Tap
char_4040_rockr.text: Aw!... Is something wrong? I'm just lookin' at this exhaust fan. Closure said this model's five years old, but it's the first time I've seen it... So ingenious.

char_4040_rockr.title: Trust Tap
char_4040_rockr.text: Oh, Dr. {@nickname}? I'm makin' a wooden carving for you. The things I make are usually only good for me, but it should be fine givin' away simple stuff like decorations, right?

char_4040_rockr.title: Title
char_4040_rockr.text: Arknights.

char_4040_rockr.title: Greeting
char_4040_rockr.text: Good mornin', Dr. {@nickname}. Time for another day of hard work.

char_4041_chnut.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4041_chnut.text: Um, Doctor, the documents on the shelves are a bit messy. Back home, I had a tabletop assistant device that automatically organized our files. All you had to do was stick the files in, then it would package and seal them. I think you should get something like that too.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk 1
char_4041_chnut.text: Wanting to see new places is a pretty common reason for leaving home, isn't it? But every time I climb a tall mountain or dive into a deep lake, I feel like I've made the right choice.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk 2
char_4041_chnut.text: Doctor, are you fan of wide-open landscapes? For example, imagine yourself next to a lake, watching the surface of the water rise and fall, the clouds gathering and dispersing, the sun slowly drooping behind the horizon, painting the lake a dazzling gold... That's the kind of scenery I love.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk 3
char_4041_chnut.text: A Catastrophe? Are we really going to cruise past a Catastrophe?! I didn't get to see the last one up close, so I can't let this opportunity slip by! Lemme see—— Huh? The door to the bridge is locked?

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4041_chnut.text: My staff turns minerals into healing agents, sometimes with other special effects depending on the type of material used. Don't believe me? I'm being serious here, Doctor!

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4041_chnut.text: I've helped more and more people, which gives me a sense of accomplishment. But as a physician, I still wish there were fewer and fewer casualties from people fighting each other.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4041_chnut.text: Doctor, have you seen fluorescent mushrooms before? There used to be a bunch of them growing by the rocks near the waterfall I played at as a kid. Some of them grew taller than the tallest person in the clan, bringing light to places where the city could not reach.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4041_chnut.text: My original reason for coming above ground was simple — I wanted to survey the geography around my homeland, and soak up the sights and sounds along the way. But the more I traveled, what kept me up here wasn't the places I had been, but the people who needed my help.

char_4041_chnut.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4041_chnut.text: Doctor, why do people bloody themselves fighting each other? I can treat a wound or two, maybe even a lot more than that, but what can I do as a physician if we can't change their minds?

char_4041_chnut.title: Idle
char_4041_chnut.text: Your desk is still a bit messy. Let me clean things up for you.

char_4041_chnut.title: Onboard
char_4041_chnut.text: Please to meet you, Dr. {@nickname}. This is for you. It's a specimen box made from gemstones I collected — lapis lazuli, turquoise, plum tourmaline, chalcedony...

char_4041_chnut.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4041_chnut.text: The lens doesn't move, Doctor. Do you think if we gave this to Operator Durin, she'd be able to upgrade it so it automatically followed the subject? I should do it, since I thought of it? Hrmm...

char_4041_chnut.title: Promotion 1
char_4041_chnut.text: I... never expected to be promoted so soon! I'll carry on my research into the curative properties of gemstones!

char_4041_chnut.title: Promotion 2
char_4041_chnut.text: I left home so I could realize my dreams, I gained recognition here, and found a place where I could learn even more from my peers in the Medical Department. I've truly found a good job.

char_4041_chnut.title: Added to Squad
char_4041_chnut.text: The mood among the squad members might deteriorate over time due to injuries sustained in battle...

char_4041_chnut.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4041_chnut.text: I don't like war, but that's my personal feelings. As a squad leader, I vow to uphold my responsibility.

char_4041_chnut.title: Depart
char_4041_chnut.text: Be careful, everyone! Nothing's more important than your own safety!

char_4041_chnut.title: Begin Operation
char_4041_chnut.text: Is this really the only way to settle our problems?

char_4041_chnut.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4041_chnut.text: Direct me.

char_4041_chnut.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4041_chnut.text: I trust the Doctor will lead us to victory.

char_4041_chnut.title: Deployment 1
char_4041_chnut.text: I will take away your pain.

char_4041_chnut.title: Deployment 2
char_4041_chnut.text: Don't worry, I've got your back.

char_4041_chnut.title: In Battle 1
char_4041_chnut.text: If you feel unwell, report it right away!

char_4041_chnut.title: In Battle 2
char_4041_chnut.text: Don't push yourself too hard in battle!

char_4041_chnut.title: In Battle 3
char_4041_chnut.text: Feel any better?

char_4041_chnut.title: In Battle 4
char_4041_chnut.text: Relax, tense muscles will only make your treatment more difficult.

char_4041_chnut.title: 4-star Result
char_4041_chnut.text: The more prep work we do, the more beautiful scenery we'll get to see. Hard work pays off.

char_4041_chnut.title: 3-star Result
char_4041_chnut.text: Now's a great time to watch the sunset. Let's head over there and sit down for a spell.

char_4041_chnut.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4041_chnut.text: We fight now so there may be peace later...? If only our enemies felt that way.

char_4041_chnut.title: Operation Failure
char_4041_chnut.text: Run, I'll cover you!

char_4041_chnut.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4041_chnut.text: The decor here is really different from back home.

char_4041_chnut.title: Tap
char_4041_chnut.text: Hmm, who's there...? Oh, it's you, Doctor.

char_4041_chnut.title: Trust Tap
char_4041_chnut.text: I'm putting together a new specimen box, Doctor. Want to see it?

char_4041_chnut.title: Title
char_4041_chnut.text: Arknights.

char_4041_chnut.title: Greeting
char_4041_chnut.text: Want to head up to the deck for some fresh air?

char_4045_heidi.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4045_heidi.text: You need an assistant too...? Ah, I just heard a little about you from Kal'tsit. Don't mind that. Is there any work I can help with?

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk 1
char_4045_heidi.text: What a surprise, Doctor. Where did you pick up my novel? It only got praise from a few fellow writers thanks to some friendly connections; it's not worth spending your time with.  Unfortunately, it's the only sort of thing I can write, given the state of Victoria. I'm sorry about that.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk 2
char_4045_heidi.text: I have a fair insight into coordinating formalwear and jewelry, you know. Right now, though? Treat this sort of dress-up as an actor's costume. The gentry and aristocracy are all at their drinking parties trembling for dear life, putting on a play of peace, watching for an explosion without knowing when it'll come.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk 3
char_4045_heidi.text: It's a pity you chose a bad place and time to arrive, or else I would've invited all you Rhodes Islanders to visit the theater as the Victorians do. The epic of the Aslan King owes its celebration to bards, after all, not letters on paper. Besides, my theater friends always leave me a seat.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4045_heidi.text: Kal'tsit's always called herself a doctor, but before I actually came to Rhodes Island, I couldn't understand why she'd fixated on Oripathy treatment. After all, there were so many tricky issues she could solve.I mean... Really... She could have solved anything. Anything except Oripathy... But I see now. You're bringing hope.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4045_heidi.text: Teaching a group of barehanded commoners to stand off against Sarkaz warriors—hard to believe, even for them. Some advised me not to even waste time trying... But when I met Kal'tsit, I was still very tender myself. The small and weak have their own strength, by all rights.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4045_heidi.text: Without even looking, I know how Golding would evaluate that book. After all, we once wrote for the same newspaper and inked practically the same sentences between two articles—no, it wasn't a rapport, just that there's few words Victoria will allow you to pronounce loudly these days.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4045_heidi.text: Has Amiya been sleeping well...? She really is just like Clovisia. Though their hearts have grown to the point they can bear everyone's hopes, their bodies are still so easily overwhelmed. I'll be off in a while, to see how I can help them.

char_4045_heidi.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4045_heidi.text: Ever since I was very young, I sat by my father's desk, watching him read and write. Even when writing letters to Kal'tsit, he never pushed me away. Just like he said, sooner or later I'd understand this all, and I'd have to at that.

char_4045_heidi.title: Idle
char_4045_heidi.text: Oh, you fell asleep... I wonder what you dream of, Doctor? The past, perhaps?

char_4045_heidi.title: Onboard
char_4045_heidi.text: I've been wanting to meet all you Rhodes Islanders since a good long time ago. Very glad to make your acquaintance again, Doctor. Just call me Heidi.

char_4045_heidi.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4045_heidi.text: Oh my... This is all a lot harder to learn than what Kal'tsit taught me...

char_4045_heidi.title: Promotion 1
char_4045_heidi.text: Do you need me taking on greater responsibilities? Of course I'd be glad to; I appreciate your faith in me. But as her Messenger, it's crucial I don't draw too much attention.

char_4045_heidi.title: Promotion 2
char_4045_heidi.text: What sort of clothes should I wear to match with this 'jewelry' Rhodes Island confers on me, Doctor?

char_4045_heidi.title: Added to Squad
char_4045_heidi.text: And by this, I will protect my home.

char_4045_heidi.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4045_heidi.text: I'll see your orders relayed to every last one.

char_4045_heidi.title: Depart
char_4045_heidi.text: I have the intel for what lies ahead all sorted. Go forth with aplomb.

char_4045_heidi.title: Begin Operation
char_4045_heidi.text: Let's go by the plan.

char_4045_heidi.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4045_heidi.text: Let me witness this with my own eyes.

char_4045_heidi.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4045_heidi.text: Is there anything you need me delivering?

char_4045_heidi.title: Deployment 1
char_4045_heidi.text: Dust, and the scent of rust...

char_4045_heidi.title: Deployment 2
char_4045_heidi.text: Give me your orders.

char_4045_heidi.title: In Battle 1
char_4045_heidi.text: 'The young prince saw the other reach for the crown, and he raised his sword.'

char_4045_heidi.title: In Battle 2
char_4045_heidi.text: 'We sing our elegy at full strain, in rivers of blood formed by fear.'

char_4045_heidi.title: In Battle 3
char_4045_heidi.text: 'The girl, expelled from the city, still returns to rescue it.'

char_4045_heidi.title: In Battle 4
char_4045_heidi.text: 'He lifted his slaughterer's blade, not believing that he could earn the love of a different line.'

char_4045_heidi.title: 4-star Result
char_4045_heidi.text: I venture no one could have envisaged a victory so marvelous. Doctor, it seems the intel on you needs another update.

char_4045_heidi.title: 3-star Result
char_4045_heidi.text: There will surely be an end to suffering.

char_4045_heidi.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4045_heidi.text: There's nowhere nearby for them to hide. I know where they're likely headed.

char_4045_heidi.title: Operation Failure
char_4045_heidi.text: This is the risk we must face for the sake of ultimate victory. There are times we must bear the cost of defeat too, am I wrong?

char_4045_heidi.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4045_heidi.text: I really wish Londinium's workers could have an environment as fine as this.

char_4045_heidi.title: Tap
char_4045_heidi.text: Oh? I'm here if you need me.

char_4045_heidi.title: Trust Tap
char_4045_heidi.text: That's odd, I wonder where my bookmark fell.

char_4045_heidi.title: Title
char_4045_heidi.text: Arknights.

char_4045_heidi.title: Greeting
char_4045_heidi.text: Have you rested well, Doctor?

char_4009_irene.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4009_irene.text: All my tasks must relate to the sea or Iberia. Huh? You have too much work? Okay, I'll make some time to help you out.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk 1
char_4009_irene.text: I have to get back to my handcannon practice once I'm done with my work here. Rhodes Island has shooting lessons? No, I'll pass. An inquisitor's handcannon isn't your normal firearm. It's not better aim you need to fully master it. It's an indomitable will.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk 2
char_4009_irene.text: It's been bugging me, so I really have to ask. Is Skadi like that when she talks to you, too? Like... Does she always say only the bare minimum, nothing more? Huh? No? She's actually very sentimental? Wait, are we really talking about the same Ægir?

char_4009_irene.title: Talk 3
char_4009_irene.text: I make the other Iberian Operators nervous? To fear the Inquisition is to fear the law. Isn't that only natural? Unless... Some of our Ægirs have their reasons to dodge my gaze. I'll make it clear now. I can't promise I won't fight them.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4009_irene.text: 'For Iberia's prosperity, for Iberia's defense, and for Iberia's orderliness and integrity, I shall raise my sword and my light!'—I may not be an Inquisitor anymore, but I know very well that my duty remains the same.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4009_irene.text: The scriptures tell us the light of an Inquisitor's lantern is the light of faith within our hearts. It wasn't until I saw my master's last ray of light that I truly understood what this means. When an Inquisitor lays down judgment, her ruling should be based not on law, but instead her own heart.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4009_irene.text: Um... Do you have any old Iberian records? Any that can still play? I brought my master's record player... I know it's silly to dwell in our past glory, but I really want to know what Iberians could have been.

char_4009_irene.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4009_irene.text: The truth felt like it swallowed me whole when it happened. Was I wavering? Crumbling? Despairing? No, I couldn't feel anything... until I killed another Sea Terror. I finally realized that I fought only because I wanted to live. Isn't that just like Iberia today?

char_4009_irene.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4009_irene.text: All I did was sprain my shoulder on my last mission. The bite wound the mission before that's almost all healed up, too. Stop selling me short! I'm pretty jealous of those Ægir hunters power... Hmph forget it! When I get back... Um, you said I could go to the Rhodes Island ball. That's a promise, right?

char_4009_irene.title: Idle
char_4009_irene.text: We're still in deep water, and you managed to fall asleep in a blink of an eye? It makes me wonder if I should be jealous... Fine, you can have your rest for now. I'll be waiting here.

char_4009_irene.title: Onboard
char_4009_irene.text: Irene, Inquisition Messenger of Iberia. Are you the Doctor of Rhodes Island? It seems the Ægir hunters really trust you... Do show me how special you are as we work together in the future.

char_4009_irene.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4009_irene.text: Hm... Are these all your operators? Is it just me or do some of them seem like an actual security risk? Alright, fine. I will try my best to focus on their combat techniques…

char_4009_irene.title: Promotion 1
char_4009_irene.text: What I need is Rhodes Island's power, not a commendation. But… I mean... this ribbon looks nice… Okay, I'll take it.

char_4009_irene.title: Promotion 2
char_4009_irene.text: It doesn't matter if Iberia faces ferocious tides or heavy storms. I will never back down, and my blade will never waver again!

char_4009_irene.title: Added to Squad
char_4009_irene.text: Perfect. I've been very curious to see how Rhodes Island carries out its missions.

char_4009_irene.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4009_irene.text: I thought it would be years before I could lead a team alone... I won't disgrace my master.

char_4009_irene.title: Depart
char_4009_irene.text: Follow my light. Watch out for the tides and mist.

char_4009_irene.title: Begin Operation
char_4009_irene.text: The most dangerous enemies are usually masters of disguise .

char_4009_irene.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4009_irene.text: See the light of my lantern? I'm right here.

char_4009_irene.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4009_irene.text: Don't step into the shadows.

char_4009_irene.title: Deployment 1
char_4009_irene.text: My sword will respond the instant I spot the movement.

char_4009_irene.title: Deployment 2
char_4009_irene.text: Locked and Loaded.

char_4009_irene.title: In Battle 1
char_4009_irene.text: My light will purge the vice!

char_4009_irene.title: In Battle 2
char_4009_irene.text: My blade will cleave the tides!

char_4009_irene.title: In Battle 3
char_4009_irene.text: My eyes will find the truth!

char_4009_irene.title: In Battle 4
char_4009_irene.text: My heart will be the judge.

char_4009_irene.title: 4-star Result
char_4009_irene.text: The tide still comes in. We can't let our guard down yet. Hm...? I'm smiling? What? Is there a rule that you can't smile after a victory?

char_4009_irene.title: 3-star Result
char_4009_irene.text: Is this how you command the Ægir hunters too? Seems like the victory that the arrogant doctor promised might actually be plausible.

char_4009_irene.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4009_irene.text: Letting even a single enemy slip by could crumble our line of defense! Hurry, give me the order! Let me eliminate the threat!

char_4009_irene.title: Operation Failure
char_4009_irene.text: An Inquisitor must never yield in the face of evil! But I also made a promise to my master. I can't die here. Not yet.

char_4009_irene.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4009_irene.text: You have a pretty big ship here, but it's not nearly as roomy as an old Iberian flagship.

char_4009_irene.title: Tap
char_4009_irene.text: Sea Terror?! Oh, it's you.

char_4009_irene.title: Trust Tap
char_4009_irene.text: Didn't you promise to show me around? If you were going to disappear the moment things got busy, you could've asked me to help.

char_4009_irene.title: Title
char_4009_irene.text: Arknights.

char_4009_irene.title: Greeting
char_4009_irene.text: Doctor, there's new movement on the tides. We need to talk.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1023_ghost2.text: Doctor, if you want me to talk to you, then at leaaast give me some topics I can show interest in.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: Doctor, don't blame me for having no interest in your grand endeavors. To be honest, the reason I became an Abyssal Hunter is hardly as lofty as you imagine. Abyssal Hunters bear a grave mission, but me? I just think the life suits me more, that's all.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: You want to know about my life in Ægir...? After so much time, my childhood memories are a bit of a blur. Maybe I'll remember a thing or two by telling you about it. Originally, I was meant to be a sculptor...

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk 3
char_1023_ghost2.text: My combat style shows no restraint compared to the past? Doctor, I think you might be misunderstanding me. If you call me mad, I'll take it as an insult. But if you call my combat style mad... I'll take that as a commendation.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: Hark... to the boundless master of all creation, embraced by darkness, murmuring soliloquy... Let me take a stab, Doctor. Maybe you like the old me rather more than the present me? I'll be honest, I've got a soft spot for that me too. It's nice to be so pure, isn't it?

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: Doctor, you always worry so much. Do something for me, tear this sheet up, yes, just like that. Sometimes, things aren't so complicated. Survival is splitting everything in your way in two. It's just that simple.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: *Sigh* Doctor, I'm dying to get you visiting our city. That's the only way you can understand how tender my comment is on the life quality of Rhodes Island. It's a shame your body'd be too delicate for it. All the more shame I don't even know whether our city still exists.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: Even if I've got a list of gripes about Rhodes Island, you people haven't abandoned the collection and preservation of art. I can retract all my criticisms just for that. Doctor, forget your job for a moment. This, is a work you shouldn't miss, not in a lifetime.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1023_ghost2.text: You want to hear me sing? Of course I can indulge you. But I'm so sorry, singing has a special significance to us that you just can't share, not being one of us. Doctor, Doctor, it vexes me that I have so many things I want to share with you. Just how could I convey them to you?

char_1023_ghost2.title: Idle
char_1023_ghost2.text: May you too stay lucid in your dreams.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Onboard
char_1023_ghost2.text: I recognize you, and you recognize me. We don't need all those boring introductions. But you still don't know me, and I still don't know you. If I recall correctly, dry-landers use simple enough means to get to know each other, so let's get communicating.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1023_ghost2.text: Are you trying to tell me… my combat style should be more 'fit-in?'

char_1023_ghost2.title: Promotion 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: For politeness's sake, I accept your commendation. But, to us Abyssal Hunters, combat is the means we have to master to survive. We don't need applause or flowers for it.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Promotion 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: You chose a dangerous way to learn of the Abyssal Hunters and our enemies, Doctor. With nothing but your delicate body, the tides will drown you. But at the same time, you can count your lucky stars, because I invite you to hide behind me.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Added to Squad
char_1023_ghost2.text: Shall the hunt begin?

char_1023_ghost2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1023_ghost2.text: Just let me think, whether you are here to help, or to trouble me like a whelp.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Depart
char_1023_ghost2.text: It's high tide.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Begin Operation
char_1023_ghost2.text: The time for fun has now begun.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: My patience is limited, Doctor.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: Waiting is its own art, too.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Deployment 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: Every battle deserves to be enjoyed.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Deployment 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: I'm in a... gorgeous mood right now!

char_1023_ghost2.title: In Battle 1
char_1023_ghost2.text: Good morning.

char_1023_ghost2.title: In Battle 2
char_1023_ghost2.text: Good night.

char_1023_ghost2.title: In Battle 3
char_1023_ghost2.text: I'm not yet satisfied.

char_1023_ghost2.title: In Battle 4
char_1023_ghost2.text: Come, more, more!

char_1023_ghost2.title: 4-star Result
char_1023_ghost2.text: We might not define danger the same way, but I'm willing to respect the genuine joy of others.

char_1023_ghost2.title: 3-star Result
char_1023_ghost2.text: Do we have a ballad of victory? Yes, but not now. We're still a long way from true victory, aren't we?

char_1023_ghost2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1023_ghost2.text: Incompletion has its own beauty. That's how you're comforting yourself, isn't it?

char_1023_ghost2.title: Operation Failure
char_1023_ghost2.text: I'm to blame too for placing my trust in you. But don't worry, I'll bear the responsibility together with you.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1023_ghost2.text: You want to hear my opinion of this landship? You'll be disappointed.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Tap
char_1023_ghost2.text: Oh? I knew it was you.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Trust Tap
char_1023_ghost2.text: You've got a strong hunger for knowledge, but it lacks direction at times, Doctor.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Title
char_1023_ghost2.text: Arknights.

char_1023_ghost2.title: Greeting
char_1023_ghost2.text: I hope you have a meaningful day today, Doctor.

char_4042_lumen.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4042_lumen.text: Hm? Am I able to be of help to you? I can't contribute anything towards your meticulous plans or lofty ideals, but if you wish me to attend you... that happens to be my specialty.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk 1
char_4042_lumen.text: Sitting for extended periods of time will cause muscular atrophy, and that's not going to help, Doctor. Come, I'll walk with you around the deck. I've also been wanting to hear about some of Rhodes Island's legends. No, sifting through the archives isn't as interesting as hearing it from you.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk 2
char_4042_lumen.text: My grandfather was involved in the construction of that great lighthouse. But now, haha, all I do is stay behind in the church, tending to the sick and elderly... No, I'm not complaining about my job as a caregiver; seeing their smiles brings me great joy! It's just that...

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk 3
char_4042_lumen.text: Skadi, Gladiia, and Specter... I never thought a day would come when I would stand on the same side as those Ægir greats; I mean, I barely know anything about the Ægir... Huh? You're putting me on the same team as them? Please, have mercy on me...

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4042_lumen.text: That Inquisitor fought to the last breath for our sake. When I saw the light of his lantern pierce the darkness, I suddenly realized: they are all fighting for our future. And though I might not be as strong as them, I don't wish to remain a bystander. I want to stand with them.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4042_lumen.text: Achieving great things is not easy for me, but even facing life itself is not a trivial task. Doctor, don't worry, I won't give up. I will try my best to catch up with everybody on Rhodes Island.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4042_lumen.text: For us Iberians, our relationship with the 'sea' is a complicated one. The sea symbolizes terror and danger, while also holding nostalgia for a bygone era. But even as the great vessels of Iberia sink before our eyes, we... we require a bit of change.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4042_lumen.text: Caregivers have to respond to all sorts of different situations. Some people are difficult to deal with, but the gratitude we receive makes it worth it. Doctor, all that you do, day in and day out, must be for a very similar pursuit, right? You know the joy of being able to make a difference.

char_4042_lumen.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4042_lumen.text: Working in the Inquisition is difficult, and not everyone is as fair as Lady Irene... But, had I not experienced it, I never would've gotten to work with amazing people like you, right?

char_4042_lumen.title: Idle
char_4042_lumen.text: Doctor, Doctor? You're going to catch a cold if you fall asleep like this... Let me fetch you a blanket. Is it alright if I dim the lights for you a bit?

char_4042_lumen.title: Onboard
char_4042_lumen.text: So you're... the Doctor? Pleased to meet you. My codename is 'Lumen,' and I will now be serving as a Rhodes Island Operator. Even if I can only bring you a thin filament of light, I will give all my strength.

char_4042_lumen.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4042_lumen.text: Do we... really have to face such terrifying things?

char_4042_lumen.title: Promotion 1
char_4042_lumen.text: No, I can't accept this. I've just been doing my job, nothing worthy of a promotion. Please, you don't need to look so dejected. Fine, I'll take it!

char_4042_lumen.title: Promotion 2
char_4042_lumen.text: I'm just an ordinary person, and it takes a huge amount of effort to even keep up with the others. However, if you really need what little I can offer... then I will be there for you at any time.

char_4042_lumen.title: Added to Squad
char_4042_lumen.text: Don't worry, Doctor. I'll catch up to the others.

char_4042_lumen.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4042_lumen.text: Me, squad leader? Umm... Can you give me a few minutes to sort things out in my head?

char_4042_lumen.title: Depart
char_4042_lumen.text: Looks like it's too late for second thoughts. Time to move out.

char_4042_lumen.title: Begin Operation
char_4042_lumen.text: I'll do my best to keep everyone safe!

char_4042_lumen.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4042_lumen.text: At your disposal.

char_4042_lumen.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4042_lumen.text: As long as I can help.

char_4042_lumen.title: Deployment 1
char_4042_lumen.text: I can handle this!

char_4042_lumen.title: Deployment 2
char_4042_lumen.text: It's fine, as long as I can muster up the courage!

char_4042_lumen.title: In Battle 1
char_4042_lumen.text: Don't worry, I'm here with you.

char_4042_lumen.title: In Battle 2
char_4042_lumen.text: You can do this. Here, the first step is a deep breath.

char_4042_lumen.title: In Battle 3
char_4042_lumen.text: Hang in there, the treatment will be done in no time!

char_4042_lumen.title: In Battle 4
char_4042_lumen.text: Please stay calm. It's a bit tricky, but as long as you give me some time...

char_4042_lumen.title: 4-star Result
char_4042_lumen.text: Dr. {@nickname}, that you've shown me such a great project, let me become a part of it, and even had me stand by your side, means the world to me.

char_4042_lumen.title: 3-star Result
char_4042_lumen.text: We did it, Doctor! Even though this was a small victory, the day will come when these small rays of light will grow numerous enough to dispel the darkness.

char_4042_lumen.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4042_lumen.text: Enough frowning, Doctor, it's bad for your health. If everything always went according to plan, what would motivate us to work harder and better ourselves?

char_4042_lumen.title: Operation Failure
char_4042_lumen.text: Doctor, please evacuate! If I can hold the line and buy you a future, then I...

char_4042_lumen.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4042_lumen.text: Rhodes Island is a beautiful ship, but sadly... I cannot feel the breath of the sea breeze.

char_4042_lumen.title: Tap
char_4042_lumen.text: Do you need a hand?

char_4042_lumen.title: Trust Tap
char_4042_lumen.text: The thing I enjoy most is looking out the window at the surrounding scenery, relaxing away my afternoon. Want to join me, Doctor?

char_4042_lumen.title: Title
char_4042_lumen.text: Arknights.

char_4042_lumen.title: Greeting
char_4042_lumen.text: Doctor, need me to give you a shoulder massage? I'm pretty well-known for my PT skills.

char_433_windft.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_433_windft.text: I get oil on me real easy, so I don't clean my apron often... There's some on my face too? Uhh, I'll go get it off.

char_433_windft.title: Talk 1
char_433_windft.text: Doctor, I don't know if this is offensive to ask, but... say you start things out with a mindset that gets people to live in peace with the Infected. Do you ever feel like your effort is in vain? What do you do, in times like that?

char_433_windft.title: Talk 2
char_433_windft.text: I consulted with my profs and sent a lot of resumes out close to graduation, but got no reply. I was told later how a lot of spots and big companies  are fixed in advance, and not for students with no background like me. So the day I got Rhodes Island's hiring invitation, I thought it was some employment scam.

char_433_windft.title: Talk 3
char_433_windft.text: Doctor! I ever tell you about my club at college? We used the funds from the school to buy new machines on the market, tear 'em down and reassemble 'em. Learnt a lot of new stuff that way. Is Rhodes Island about that too? Check this one out! It's smoking right now, sure, but it's got new functionality.

char_433_windft.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_433_windft.text: I helped out at my parents' factory when I was a kid. Lots of stuff you've just gotta count on pure manual labor for. I've gone over all the notes the vets at Engineering lent me. If we can pass all this new tech down to my parents, we can save 'em a lot of effort.

char_433_windft.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_433_windft.text: My parents saved hard for a good school when I was a kid. I had classmates clowning on us for being poor, so I was dead set on learning something, showing them who's boss. They might still be living a cushier life than me, but nowadays, I just focus on myself.

char_433_windft.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_433_windft.text: Doctor, Rhodes Island is all real passionate folks. Saying they wanna make me clothes, they wanna gimme a haircut, and then they drag me off to show me around their own stalls. What do I do...? H—Hug 'em? Got it. I'll go try right now.

char_433_windft.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_433_windft.text: Doctor, I've never had a boss like you before. Ones I met before were all money-grubbing owner types, so... y'know hugs have really worked out. Can I hug you? C'mon, here we go!

char_433_windft.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_433_windft.text: I used to feel like this world was unfair, no matter where you went, and no one could do a thing to change it. But here, poverty or infection, none of that discrimination exists, and everyone gets rewarded equal to what they put in. Doctor, pulling this whole thing off...it's incredible.

char_433_windft.title: Idle
char_433_windft.text: You out? Real quiet... Woof! —Ooh, awake now, Doctor?

char_433_windft.title: Onboard
char_433_windft.text: Nice meeting you, Doctor, I'm Windflit, new Operator at Engineering. You said you saw ability in me? Real thankful for that.

char_433_windft.title: Watching Battle Record
char_433_windft.text: Effort is the root of progress. Regular review lets me realize a lotta issues I overlooked before.

char_433_windft.title: Promotion 1
char_433_windft.text: I really love Rhodes Island's standards for promotion. No unfairness about 'em.

char_433_windft.title: Promotion 2
char_433_windft.text: Getting to this level of endorsement makes all my previous effort really kinda pay off. Doctor, Rhodes Island truly is a company worth sticking with for a long time.

char_433_windft.title: Added to Squad
char_433_windft.text: I've got no combat experience, but I'll give it my best shot.

char_433_windft.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_433_windft.text: I'm not circling you all because I wanna. You're all too scattered apart. It'll be dangerous.

char_433_windft.title: Depart
char_433_windft.text: Can't let 'em bully us. Let's go!

char_433_windft.title: Begin Operation
char_433_windft.text: I wonder if these guys have their own problems too...

char_433_windft.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_433_windft.text: All ready.

char_433_windft.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_433_windft.text: When do we get going?

char_433_windft.title: Deployment 1
char_433_windft.text: No need to worry.

char_433_windft.title: Deployment 2
char_433_windft.text: I can do this.

char_433_windft.title: In Battle 1
char_433_windft.text: Woof!!

char_433_windft.title: In Battle 2
char_433_windft.text: Device set!

char_433_windft.title: In Battle 3
char_433_windft.text: What is it you guys fight for?

char_433_windft.title: In Battle 4
char_433_windft.text: Still coming closer?

char_433_windft.title: 4-star Result
char_433_windft.text: Phew... Each new battle teaches me a lotta new things. Maybe one day, I can finally get my own issues figured out.

char_433_windft.title: 3-star Result
char_433_windft.text: Doctor, how was my equipment this time? Real useful, right?!

char_433_windft.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_433_windft.text: Let's forget chasing 'em, maybe they've got their own problems. They chose to run, so no need to corner 'em now.

char_433_windft.title: Operation Failure
char_433_windft.text: Ugh... how did this happen...

char_433_windft.title: Assigned to Facility
char_433_windft.text: Real spacious room. And real clean.

char_433_windft.title: Tap
char_433_windft.text: Huh? Was that my ears?

char_433_windft.title: Trust Tap
char_433_windft.text: I welded together this little metal doll kinda thing to look like you, hahaha...

char_433_windft.title: Title
char_433_windft.text: Arknights.

char_433_windft.title: Greeting
char_433_windft.text: Doctor, wanna play Ultimate?

char_4043_erato.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4043_erato.text: You want me to be your accompanist? Sure thing.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk 1
char_4043_erato.text: Whether in harpistry or archery, my skill is second to none in all of Minos. Look, this is the medal I won in Hymnic archery. Beautiful, isn't it? Proof of my skills as a harpist? Several troupes have asked me to accompany them, you know~ Hmm... Actually, sit down. I'll play something for you.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk 2
char_4043_erato.text: Minos is a land of Romance. Day in and day out, you can see philosophers debating, warriors competing, and actors rehearsing grand epics. I will say though, our booze is some dangerous stuff. It's enough to drive one crazy, make one do fearsome things... How do I know? As if I'd tell you!

char_4043_erato.title: Talk 3
char_4043_erato.text: Tragedies are the most dazzling gems among our grand epics... or so I'd like to say, but Pallas's story is one of great disappointment. There is no greater humiliation than for a hero to remain unsung. 'There must be no flaws in a hero's mythos?' She said that? I simply cannot agree.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4043_erato.text: From Minos to Bolívar, from Columbia to Leithanien. Each place has its own scenery and its own romance, and it is precisely because of this uniqueness that endless enmity and conflict are inevitable. But just as roses do not lose their beauty simply because they have thorns, this great land is equally worthy of love.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4043_erato.text: Even the mightiest hero cannot win a war alone. Just as an epic must be passed down to be meaningful, a hero must stand with others to even become a hero. In the past, I always felt as if something was missing from my journey. That 'something' has been found since I came here.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4043_erato.text: The Supreme One spread an incurable disease across the land, and the Healer was banished for opposing Him. The Healer, stripped of the power of divinity, descended to alleviate humankind's suffering through knowledge... Oh, this isn't Minos mythology or anything, it's just a story I made up.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4043_erato.text: Is this instrument a bow or a harp? Both~ The techniques behind the two are similar, both requiring discipline and elegance. Like this, gently place your fingertips on the strings, and thoughtfully acquaint yourself with the vibration from your fingertips. Want to give it a try? No, no, not like that. Give me your hand, I'll teach you.

char_4043_erato.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4043_erato.text: What am I reading? A volume of Victorian love poems. Shall I read some aloud for you? There's no need to be bashful; love and courage are one in the same — they should be red-hot and eye-catching, things that need not be concealed. Come, let's read some poetry together, Doctor.

char_4043_erato.title: Idle
char_4043_erato.text: Doctor, Doctor? Oh, you're asleep, huh? I was thinking about playing a little song for you, oh well...

char_4043_erato.title: Onboard
char_4043_erato.text: So this is Rhodes Island, huh? At last, at long last... No, all of this was ordained by fate, so I should be saying, it's about time! You can call me Erato. Is Pallas here, may I ask?

char_4043_erato.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4043_erato.text: I didn't realize there was still so much to learn when it comes to team combat...

char_4043_erato.title: Promotion 1
char_4043_erato.text: Rankings? Promotions? No, no, heroes ought not focus their sights on such trivial things. But, I will accept this accolade as proof of our mutual trust.

char_4043_erato.title: Promotion 2
char_4043_erato.text: Should I celebrate this occasion by playing a song, or no? Let me think about what to say... Hmm, in the name of the Twelve Heroes of Minos, I dedicate my bowstring to thee, and my harp shall accompany thee into the ages.

char_4043_erato.title: Added to Squad
char_4043_erato.text: Witness the crown jewel of Minoan archery.

char_4043_erato.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4043_erato.text: Leave everything to me.

char_4043_erato.title: Depart
char_4043_erato.text: My arrow points toward victory.

char_4043_erato.title: Begin Operation
char_4043_erato.text: I shall witness your end.

char_4043_erato.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4043_erato.text: As you wish.

char_4043_erato.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4043_erato.text: I will not disappoint.

char_4043_erato.title: Deployment 1
char_4043_erato.text: What wonderful scenery. A fine place for a battle.

char_4043_erato.title: Deployment 2
char_4043_erato.text: Fate guides me here.

char_4043_erato.title: In Battle 1
char_4043_erato.text: One shot, one kill.

char_4043_erato.title: In Battle 2
char_4043_erato.text: Sleep to the sound of my harp. Sleep and death are of a kind.

char_4043_erato.title: In Battle 3
char_4043_erato.text: Listen well to the requiem I play for thee.

char_4043_erato.title: In Battle 4
char_4043_erato.text: Be scattered upon the wind!

char_4043_erato.title: 4-star Result
char_4043_erato.text: Life must eventually end, but legends live on forever. We've done it, Doctor.

char_4043_erato.title: 3-star Result
char_4043_erato.text: A victory worth celebrating. Let us sing! Doctor, did you witness my performance?

char_4043_erato.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4043_erato.text: Chasing stragglers is scarcely fit for heroes of legend. Let them be.

char_4043_erato.title: Operation Failure
char_4043_erato.text: Hurry, run...! Our story mustn't end here!

char_4043_erato.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4043_erato.text: Can I play some music here?

char_4043_erato.title: Tap
char_4043_erato.text: Hm?

char_4043_erato.title: Trust Tap
char_4043_erato.text: You seem to be in a good mood today, Doctor. Did you want to share a dance?

char_4043_erato.title: Title
char_4043_erato.text: Arknights.

char_4043_erato.title: Greeting
char_4043_erato.text: Doctor, did you want to listen to me sing?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: I'll be your assistant today, Doctor... I will disclaim. I have absolutely no secretarial experience. Thus, so I'm not hindering you, I will be doing nothing at all.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: You'd like to see Leithanien, you say? Heh, it's a fine place. The Empresses regard their subjects like their own children, the healthy regard the Infected as brethren, the faces of the people brim with blessing—lies? That's true, they are lies. Contemplate visiting Leithanien again once you can sit through the whole game with a straight face.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Routine health inspections? Allow me a moment to ready my—hold on, isn't Hibiscus the one on duty today? I'd rather avoid her if I can. I'm sure I needn't explain why... I'm not frightened of her! I'm just not quite prepared for—could you amend my timeslot? Thank you!

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk 3
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Please relay to the Medical Department that my headaches and physical condition are no matter, and no cause for such alarm. There's nothing to examine—what? They're already expecting me? They've even made the consultation room available? I... You tell them that my headache has flared up and I'm not going anywhere—ugh.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Social etiquette of Leithanian nobles? Hah, it's an endless subject. Shaking off commoners, spreading rumors of other nobles behind their backs—not to go on, but it all demands a cheek I find slightly hard to conjure myself. You'd best consult an expert, not me.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: There'll always be a cohort eager to associate me with the previous Graf Urtica. I can't blame them though, I simply wish to live as a regular Infected. Abhorring inequality ... You say I'm faking to be common? Whatever you say. Even I am faking, I prefer to keep it that way till the very end.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: You noticed as much, Doctor? Indeed, I like to repeat what others have said in times of stress... it's the safest method I—no—Graf Urtica has of buying time to think. So long as he doesn't speak his own mind, he won't bear blame for what he says.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: It's Hibiscus on duty again—should I reschedule my examination? Nein, never mind. I'm deeply grateful for your help in avoiding her days, but I can't hide forever. Even after so long, I still close my eyes and see the wretched misery of that concert... perhaps it's time I face it.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Evening on the deck reminds me of the spiretop in Urtica—it had just as fine a breeze. I used to fantasize there how happy life must be, down on the ground. I only understood later that up there, freedom was the one thing stripped from me, while so many in the land had, save for freedom, nothing at all.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Idle
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: No issue dozing off in this sort of place? Hmph, I suppose it's times like these when the assistant does the work. Pain in the neck—agh, I'm misspelling. Never mind, never mind. Let's find out what music's on the Doctor's headphones...

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Onboard
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: I extend my sincere gratitude to you, Doctor of Rhodes Island. Thank you for sheltering an insignificant down-and-outer. If such mediocrity as even mine can benefit Rhodes Island's cause, then I couldn't be more relieved.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: A very fascinating recording. Hm? I don't say that with irony. Nobody ever thought to buy video tapes for Graf Urtica save for himself, and he couldn't leave the spire.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Promotion 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Promotion? Allow me to decline. No, not for lack of necessity, but of knowledge of who is being recognized. Is it myself... or the Witch King's remnants lodging within me?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Promotion 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Graf Urtica fears his ego's engulfment by the Witch King, yet has to employ powers inherited from the tyrant. But now, he is dead. Now, I am first and foremost an operator of Rhodes Island, and only after that am I the Witch King's botched replica. That suffices for me—that suffices.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Added to Squad
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: This power is not mine. However, Rhodes Island has need of it, so I will employ it to its fullest.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: I hate it when I'm ordered around without rhyme or reason, but ordering others sits just as badly with me.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Depart
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Prolonged casting makes my headaches flare up, and I even hallucinate if I'm unlucky. Let's make it a Blitzkrieg, shall we?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Begin Operation
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: I am at your command.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Stronger dynamics?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Faster tempo?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Deployment 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Careful of music on the battlefield, especially when you face a Leithanian.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Deployment 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: The performance will begin soon, but it seems our audience can't contain themselves?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: In Battle 1
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: As graceful as three-four.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: In Battle 2
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: As startling as a tritone.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: In Battle 3
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: As doleful as a clarinet.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: In Battle 4
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Gah! Get out of my head!

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: 4-star Result
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: If you're lacking an appreciator to applaud and call for encore, then allow me to fill the role. Congratulations, Doctor.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: 3-star Result
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Is it over? Very well, I need somewhere to rest for a moment before my headache gets any worse.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: An unsatisfactory performance'... No, it's fine, it's just something I often heard not so long ago. You can ignore it.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Operation Failure
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: We can hardly call this ending good. Are you the one who just got a headache, not me?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: This place might be far from a Leithanian spire, but I still prefer the feeling of standing on solid ground.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Tap
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Agh, here it is aga—huh? It's you, Doctor? That wasn't the headache?

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Trust Tap
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Doctor, if you want to learn an instrument, I'd say ask someone else. A lot of my understanding has little to do with myself.

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Title
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: Arknights

char_4046_ebnhlz.title: Greeting
char_4046_ebnhlz.text: How did you rest, Doctor? I used to love staying up myself, until one time I went a full night without closing my eyes, and had splitting headaches for a week after... It was a horrifying experience.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor—oh, no need to panic, I'm not dragging you into a checkup, I'd just like to sit down in here for a moment... Out of all of Rhodes Island, it feels like your office is the one place that hasn't changed.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, we're about to partially renovate Rhodes Island's wards to better meet patient aftercare needs. I've written down all the supplies we need here. Would you like to check over it quickly? Yes, I am in charge of this work now.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, I've adjusted the flavor of my healthy meals based on everyone's input. I came to realize that blindly insisting on my own views might not actually be best—you can only resolve conflicts better once you listen to the other side, and stand in their shoes... It would've been nice if I'd realized that sooner.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk 3
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I've always been so hard on everyone, keeping them to healthy schedules, never letting them do anything bad for their illness. It turns out I was the one failing at all of that, heheh... But don't worry, there's still a lot I've got to do. I'm not giving in yet.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Diseases don't just torment the body—they impact the mind too. 'How will others see me? Can I ever live how I used to?' Everyone has worries like that... If I can't help my patients put them to rest, then my treatment isn't done yet.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I once saved a child in Leithanien. When she came to and saw me, she screamed for her life and ran away. Before that, I never thought there was much of a difference between Caprinae horns and Sarkaz horns. We can't change how everyone sees things, but at the very least, I don't want my patients to fear me.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I think Lava's really changed lately. She gets up and sleeps early without needing me to remind her, and she barely ever talks back when I nag her, but it's all the more worrying for some reason... Doctor, if you ever feel tired or depressed, you can come vent to me! I'd be perfectly happy!

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: This flute? It's actually an Arts staff. It's from when I went to Vyseheim. It was there I used Arts to harm someone for the first time, and it was the first I saw a friend leave us forever, just out of reach. Every time I hold this staff, all my feelings in that moment come back to me.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1024_hbisc2.text: We happily see off recovered patients, and say goodbye to former companions with a smile. People come and leave. Our varied dreams may lead us to different paths, but we'll always mean something to  each other... Doctor, would you be open for food with me today? I'll go and ask Lava along.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Idle
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, you might be reliable with work, but you act just like a child when you're off. Now you're sleeping on desk again. I've told you so many times, it's bad for your spine, and you might catch a cold just like that... *sigh* If I'm not there one day, could you really take care of yourself?

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Onboard
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, I'm back—Umm, Doctor, I know my last field assignment took longer than usual, but don't look at me like you don't recognize me... Medic Operator Hibiscus, reporting in.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Everyone's taking charge of themselves, now—that's nice to see.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Promotion 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I'm suddenly reminded of my time in A1, training with everybody... Everyone's matured so much now. I'll keep up the effort, for all we've been through.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Promotion 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Bodily trauma can be treated through medicine and surgery, but how do we cure the pain from hostility and prejudice? Healing people's hearts, Doctor, that's what I will devote myself to.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Added to Squad
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I won't fail you—this time, I'll be sure to protect everyone.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I'm leading? I wasn't usually the one doing that before... No, I won't shirk responsibility.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Depart
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Don't be afraid. I've got your backs.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Begin Operation
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I'm not going to let you harm my friends.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I'll make sure everyone's safe.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, I'm here.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Deployment 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: First aid ready. Medical support standying by.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Deployment 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I wish this to be the last time, if possible…

char_1024_hbisc2.title: In Battle 1
char_1024_hbisc2.text: If we can prevent more harm this way, I'll stand my ground.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: In Battle 2
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Please tell me if this hurts.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: In Battle 3
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I can do more than just heal.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: In Battle 4
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Hold it. There's no sense in getting any more hurt.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: 4-star Result
char_1024_hbisc2.text: It's always easier to harm than heal. But... is it really something to be proud of...?

char_1024_hbisc2.title: 3-star Result
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I'm so glad everyone could come back safe...

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Prioritize treating the wounded. I'll guard against counterattacks.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Operation Failure
char_1024_hbisc2.text: I still couldn't... protect everyone...

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Some beds have emptied.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Tap
char_1024_hbisc2.text: You need me, Doctor?

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Trust Tap
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Doctor, here's your healthy recipe for today. Make sure you eat on time.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Title
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Arknights.

char_1024_hbisc2.title: Greeting
char_1024_hbisc2.text: Staying healthy is just as important as working hard, Doctor. Don't let either slip.

char_4047_pianst.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4047_pianst.text: I've never been an assistant before. It's a novel experience, but rest assured that I will not be remiss, even if this work is not my forte.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk 1
char_4047_pianst.text: If any children aboard Rhodes Island wish to learn piano, you may send them to me, but I am a strict teacher. I am not one to release a student partway once he begins his studies.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk 2
char_4047_pianst.text: I hear a musical school known as 'jazz' is currently popular in Columbia. I've had the fortune to hear a few records. The free, unweighted playing style greatly amuses me, but sadly, I seem to lack the temperament for performing in such a swing.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk 3
char_4047_pianst.text: Are you curious about my hands? Indeed, they're broader than others' at a glance. Please, they're no freakish things. I have them to thank that I can rain every melodie that swims in my head down onto the keys.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4047_pianst.text: The Infected are only comparatively freer in Leithanien, and not that free. Outside of the Afterglow, there was hardly anywhere I could live, or eat... there was almost nowhere to turn.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4047_pianst.text: My near-death experience unleashed a sudden, completely new melodie upon my mind. Compared to it, the musical forms I'd once learnt seemed like shackles. Just what tremendous feeling brought about its birth? Perhaps in the face of Death, I was nowhere near as fearless as I imagined.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4047_pianst.text: Thank you for your concern. I'm not feeling ill—my writing is merely bottlenecked, and I haven't slept in several days. My hair, well... I often unconsciously grab at it while composing, if that explains its current unruliness.

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4047_pianst.text: Doctor, would you like to exercise with me? You seem surprised. Fräulein Hibiscus requested it. Most artists are the frail sort, but my recitals often exceed two hours in length. How could I handle it without a sturdy physique to support me?

char_4047_pianst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4047_pianst.text: You flatter me. So many voices have been snuffed out in the rapids of history. Their owners were hardly without talent; they simply left too soon, before anyone could stop and listen to their masterpieces fine as nature's song. And I was but slightly luckier, enough so to escape with my life.

char_4047_pianst.title: Idle
char_4047_pianst.text: Asleep? I hardly expected the lullabies I wrote to have an actual effect on you...

char_4047_pianst.title: Onboard
char_4047_pianst.text: Greetings, Doctor, my name is Czerny. Any charm or taste I may have had has been poured entirely into my compositions. And as for myself, I am no more than a run-of-the-mill performer. That's all the introduction you need.

char_4047_pianst.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4047_pianst.text: I will commit to watching these as you require, but this is hardly how I prefer to study. I have always approached others' second-hand experiences with skepticism.

char_4047_pianst.title: Promotion 1
char_4047_pianst.text: I'm extremely grateful for your sponsorship, Doctor; I am currently struggling financially. The annals of Leithanian art will commemorate your giving.

char_4047_pianst.title: Promotion 2
char_4047_pianst.text: I thank you for your approval. I had never seriously pursued Originium Arts before, and I hope henceforth that my Arts may be cast as freely as my melodien.

char_4047_pianst.title: Added to Squad
char_4047_pianst.text: Through my creations, both pain and joy become immortal.

char_4047_pianst.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4047_pianst.text: Compared to my piano, my ability with a baton actually fares quite well.

char_4047_pianst.title: Depart
char_4047_pianst.text: I've finished tuning. I may perform now.

char_4047_pianst.title: Begin Operation
char_4047_pianst.text: Please be seated.

char_4047_pianst.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4047_pianst.text: Shall I open?

char_4047_pianst.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4047_pianst.text: Shall I close?

char_4047_pianst.title: Deployment 1
char_4047_pianst.text: To tremble in my music is your honor.

char_4047_pianst.title: Deployment 2
char_4047_pianst.text: Extraordinary melodies can only be played by the soul that quakes.

char_4047_pianst.title: In Battle 1
char_4047_pianst.text: Silence, immediately!

char_4047_pianst.title: In Battle 2
char_4047_pianst.text: Listen or leave!

char_4047_pianst.title: In Battle 3
char_4047_pianst.text: Shut up or else!

char_4047_pianst.title: In Battle 4
char_4047_pianst.text: Get out! Right now!

char_4047_pianst.title: 4-star Result
char_4047_pianst.text: Huff... I may be—exceptionally tired in both body and mind, but I do not want the music to end here.

char_4047_pianst.title: 3-star Result
char_4047_pianst.text: Drawing the final barline here is perfect. I hardly want any movement of mine to approach tedium.

char_4047_pianst.title: Sub 3-star Result
