char_4047_pianst.text: There are times when stubborn pursuit of a technique hinders more than helps. Allowing your emotion to follow the music's natural flow can take you further.

char_4047_pianst.title: Operation Failure
char_4047_pianst.text: Please, don't be disheartened. Not every composition is smooth from start to finish. There'll always be a few rounds of polish before you land where you want to.

char_4047_pianst.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4047_pianst.text: The deck of this ship is very spacious. Have you ever considered holding a concert there?

char_4047_pianst.title: Tap
char_4047_pianst.text: Watch that the noten in my pocket don't spill out.

char_4047_pianst.title: Trust Tap
char_4047_pianst.text: Perhaps you like to try learning an instrument? I could teach you; I'm qualified to tutor for the majority of them.

char_4047_pianst.title: Title
char_4047_pianst.text: Arknights.

char_4047_pianst.title: Greeting
char_4047_pianst.text: I've written a new song. Would you like to hear?

char_4048_doroth.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4048_doroth.text: I was an assistant for other researchers before I got my own lab... That being said, shall I begin your day with a cup of coffee?

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk 1
char_4048_doroth.text: Doctor... Doctor who? Oh, it's your codename? Sorry. At Rhine Lab, calling for a 'Doctor' usually gets a response from everyone in earshot. You must be very special to Rhodes Island, Doctor.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk 2
char_4048_doroth.text: The rumbling grapevine says Saria is at odds with Control. But I get the feeling they're both idealists, and those with a strong will tend to have an edge to them. I... am I any different? I hope you'll never see my edge.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk 3
char_4048_doroth.text: You think scientists are weird? Yes, obsession may drive us to ignore certain other things, including social and ethical norms. Our jobs aside, though, we're all normal people at heart.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4048_doroth.text: Research is like exploration; the further you go, the more dangerous it gets. But every step we take has a chance to change lives, which is why we keep going, even if death or public scorn await. We're kindred spirits, Doctor… And that is a fact.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4048_doroth.text: I made lots of friends in the world of science. They often discuss their dreams with me; some are not so good at expressing themselves, but I can guess. You say I've guessed wrong sometimes? Hm... perhaps. Maybe I should reflect...

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4048_doroth.text: It's getting cool outside. Remember to dress warm when you go into the field... *sneeze* I, er, forgot to do so myself. I often forget these things if Elena isn't there to remind me. *Sneeze* Oh, thanks for the coat. That's so kind of you.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4048_doroth.text: I never thought of myself as a genius. I'm just fortunate. My father and other people in the Pioneer team saved the money to send me to school, while the government sponsorship also allowed me to pursue scientific research. I'm here today thanks to the help of many people. That's why I want to do my best to help others too.

char_4048_doroth.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4048_doroth.text: Sometimes, I wake up in the middle of the night in the labs and feel... scared. Scared that people will end up abandoning me, even after all I've done, and even... with hatred in their hearts. What should I do? All I want is to bring them happiness. Can you help me, Doctor?

char_4048_doroth.title: Idle
char_4048_doroth.text: All work and no play makes it a sleepy day... We have so much in common, don't we... Let me turn up the temperature. Noise-canceling mode... Oh, seems your cabin isn't equipped with that…?

char_4048_doroth.title: Onboard
char_4048_doroth.text: Hello, I'm Dorothy, head of the Originium Art Section at Rhine Lab. Dr. Silence already introduced me? Then it saves both of us the formalities. Please, just call me Dorothy.

char_4048_doroth.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4048_doroth.text: Are these simulations or... hm, Rhodes Island feels different from how I imagined, but I understand.

char_4048_doroth.title: Promotion 1
char_4048_doroth.text: As a matter of fact, I was worried about not spending enough time on the Rhodes Island Landship... maybe I should apply to Kristen for another long-term cooperation project.

char_4048_doroth.title: Promotion 2
char_4048_doroth.text: Doctor, how do you like my lab? I'm thinking about what equipment I should bring over. Mechanist says my command of resonance might come in handy in obstacle removal and weapon development.

char_4048_doroth.title: Added to Squad
char_4048_doroth.text: What sights will the Doctor show us this time?

char_4048_doroth.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4048_doroth.text: Don't worry, I'll take care of the others.

char_4048_doroth.title: Depart
char_4048_doroth.text: The battlefield is an extension of the laboratory.

char_4048_doroth.title: Begin Operation
char_4048_doroth.text: Strayed, aren't you?

char_4048_doroth.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4048_doroth.text: Security systems online. Monitoring intruders.

char_4048_doroth.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4048_doroth.text: Initiating environmental scan.

char_4048_doroth.title: Deployment 1
char_4048_doroth.text: Do you need the traps activated?

char_4048_doroth.title: Deployment 2
char_4048_doroth.text: Terrain data collection complete.

char_4048_doroth.title: In Battle 1
char_4048_doroth.text: The sand will reshape the land.

char_4048_doroth.title: In Battle 2
char_4048_doroth.text: The slightest vibration can change the result.

char_4048_doroth.title: In Battle 3
char_4048_doroth.text: Stay down, and you won't get hurt any worse.

char_4048_doroth.title: In Battle 4
char_4048_doroth.text: No, I won't let you take another step… I promised them.

char_4048_doroth.title: 4-star Result
char_4048_doroth.text: Whether it's by your calculation or instinct… All I could say is, marvelous.

char_4048_doroth.title: 3-star Result
char_4048_doroth.text: Your decisions were on the mark. Were you kissed by the goddess of truth? Can I touch your forehead? For good luck, you know, while I tackle my next experiment.

char_4048_doroth.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4048_doroth.text: 70% of my experiments don't turn out the way I want them to. The answer lies in the next attempt, Doctor.

char_4048_doroth.title: Operation Failure
char_4048_doroth.text: I won't let anyone hurt you! I'll take care of things here. Go, and never turn back...

char_4048_doroth.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4048_doroth.text: Rhodes Island is always so lively.

char_4048_doroth.title: Tap
char_4048_doroth.text: Oh, it was you tugging at me? Thank goodness, I thought I skipped too many meals and was hallucinating...

char_4048_doroth.title: Trust Tap
char_4048_doroth.text: What is it that keeps you staring at me, Doctor? Did you find an interesting problem to tackle?

char_4048_doroth.title: Title
char_4048_doroth.text: Arknights.

char_4048_doroth.title: Greeting
char_4048_doroth.text: Doctor, I was thinking about going out for a walk. Would you like to join me?

char_1027_greyy2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1027_greyy2.text: There's a limit to the types of documents I can help you with, Doctor. But I'll try to learn. I'm hoping to lead my own major engineering project someday, so I gotta accumulate knowledge from different domains.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: Just spending some time reading. No, I'm not pushing myself too hard. Oripathy doesn't leave me too much time, so I must... Oh, sorry, I didn't mean to make things awkward.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: I've gotten quite a bit taller in the last couple of years? Hehe, I'm still growing, after all. My ears have gotten perkier? Er, I guess it's also because I'm still growing...?

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk 3
char_1027_greyy2.text: No, Doctor, I haven't gotten more talkative... but Engineering veterans say we have to sound certain of ourselves, in order for our skills and designs to feel certain... I'll keep working at it.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: Looks like the upcoming courses are even more complicated, and Engineering's idea of an internship is a little… *sigh*… never mind, I can handle it. Yes, I'll be sure to get enough rest. Rest is important to studying efficiently.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: Mankind may have learned to overcome the darkness of night, but there are always shadows that even the brightest lights cannot breach. If I can continue to improve this technology, and bring warmth and light to those who shiver in the cold night...

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: Though I now fully leave the line patrol work to my drones, it doesn't mean my early intership years are worthless. Look at my physique now, even Medical doesn't have to worry about me anymore... um, Doctor? Why are you crying?

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: Volvort Kochinski... I've seen their mark on Mamá's equipment. Not even Rhodes Island intelligence has been able to track down Mamá since the incident. Is she covering her tracks, running from something?

char_1027_greyy2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1027_greyy2.text: Doctor, I'm going to visit a client to help with PLC testing. It won't take too long. You can use Rhodes Island Messengers to contact me if you need something... but I'm sure you can handle anything that comes up.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Idle
char_1027_greyy2.text: Doctor... Doctor? Asleep already?... I see... This next segment is prone to bugs. I should set alerts to silent...

char_1027_greyy2.title: Onboard
char_1027_greyy2.text: Hello, Doctor. This equipment was my graduation project. My initial plan was to... huh? Putting it into service? Dios mío(My goodness), so this is the 'Doctor's Thesis Defense' that Closure talked about?

char_1027_greyy2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1027_greyy2.text: No matter how much I watch, I just can't help but feel… everyone's style is so individualized, it's hard to summarize anything for general application…

char_1027_greyy2.title: Promotion 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: It's an honor to earn your recognition, and that of Engineering. I know this is just the starting point, and I'll keep working to make sure that I don't let you down.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Promotion 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: Countless frontiers remain uncharted on this land named science, waiting to be mapped and discovered. Though our latest technologies help get their views from afar, we have yet to set our foot on them. My dream, Doctor, is to be the pioneer that explores these realms with engineering.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Added to Squad
char_1027_greyy2.text: A practical field study... in combat?  Sure, no problem.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1027_greyy2.text: Understood. I'll compile a deployment report with suggestions for improvement.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Depart
char_1027_greyy2.text: We're into an assault mission. Before we breakthrough the enemy defenses, I'm counting on you to hold the line.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Begin Operation
char_1027_greyy2.text: Battlefield is where soldiers and war machines witness their own prime… and their own end.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: Output stable.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: On your call.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Deployment 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: Environ parameters set.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Deployment 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: EM trajectory calibrated.

char_1027_greyy2.title: In Battle 1
char_1027_greyy2.text: I'll create an opening.

char_1027_greyy2.title: In Battle 2
char_1027_greyy2.text: Hit them in the face!

char_1027_greyy2.title: In Battle 3
char_1027_greyy2.text: This will be the breakthrough!

char_1027_greyy2.title: In Battle 4
char_1027_greyy2.text: I choose you!

char_1027_greyy2.title: 4-star Result
char_1027_greyy2.text: Things were worse than expected, Doctor. Even our contingency plan was pushed to its limit... but we still did it!

char_1027_greyy2.title: 3-star Result
char_1027_greyy2.text: Phew… Everything went according to plan. All equipment in good condition. We're ready for the next phase.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1027_greyy2.text: Effect on target below expectations, risk of potential failure… The re-simulation of both Doctor and PRTS  are required for next steps.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Operation Failure
char_1027_greyy2.text: No obstacles on the evacuation path. It's time to retreat, Doctor!

char_1027_greyy2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1027_greyy2.text: These facilities could use an upgrade...

char_1027_greyy2.title: Tap
char_1027_greyy2.text: One moment, I'm almost done here... just a few lines more...

char_1027_greyy2.title: Trust Tap
char_1027_greyy2.text: Here so early, Doctor? Give me a moment, I'm almost done...

char_1027_greyy2.title: Title
char_1027_greyy2.text: Arknights.

char_1027_greyy2.title: Greeting
char_1027_greyy2.text: Everything going well, Doctor?

char_135_halo.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_135_halo.text: No problem. I've done all of this before, and I won't have any trouble handling it, but let's be up front, Doctor: If you come to me in the evening with a stack of documents and tell me to sort everything out that night, chances are that you might not get what you want.

char_135_halo.title: Talk 1
char_135_halo.text: Research is actually kind of a pain. Sometimes, you go all in on your research. Other times, you have to spend time going over progress with somebody else. You need to know your specialty like the back of your hand, and you also need people skills. If I wasn't already decent at both, my head would've exploded a long time ago.

char_135_halo.title: Talk 2
char_135_halo.text: My sister Astesia is really good at our family's chicanery, but she only ever uses it to help people. To think there would be such a pure, kind-hearted shyster running around... Oh, Doctor, don't tell anyone about this! Please, I'm begging you! If she finds out I told, Astesia will whap me upside the head!

char_135_halo.title: Talk 3
char_135_halo.text: Rhine Lab? Hmm... Sorry, I don't really want to talk about them right now. If that place were really so great, I wouldn't have asked for a transfer to Rhodes Island, right? Okay, break time's over! Back to work!

char_135_halo.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_135_halo.text: I'm the one who got infected, but then even Astesia... *sigh*... You probably can't tell, but she's actually pretty depressed. Enough is enough, I gotta do something to help her.

char_135_halo.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_135_halo.text: Columbia's technology keeps advancing, and as a researcher, I can almost see that future I'm looking for. My dream is right there, and I'm going to make it come true.

char_135_halo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_135_halo.text: Our family's... well, how should I say this? My parents are the old-fashioned type that like to order people around. They don't care about your opinions, only the joy of being in control. It sucks. That's why I haven't been back home since college. Now they can't stop me from studying the stuff I like.

char_135_halo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_135_halo.text: There are those who help because they really want people to have a better life, but there are also those who help so they can use people as stepping stones. Doctor, you know how to tell the two apart, don't you? It's easy. You just need to look at the way they smile.

char_135_halo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_135_halo.text: My dad's kinda famous back in the city, and our names are a little peculiar, so I thought I'd give myself a new name to get away from all that trouble. But feel free to call me whatever you want, Doctor. We're friends, don't sweat it.

char_135_halo.title: Idle
char_135_halo.text: Yes, this is the Doctor's office. Yes, the Doctor is resting right now. Please call back later.

char_135_halo.title: Onboard
char_135_halo.text: Researcher Elena Urbica of Rhine Lab. A pleasure to make your acquaintance. We're supposed to call each other by codenames here, right? No problem. In that case, call me Astgenne. It's simple and easy to remember.

char_135_halo.title: Watching Battle Record
char_135_halo.text: I don't think I've seen a problem like that before. Gotta take notes...

char_135_halo.title: Promotion 1
char_135_halo.text: What a pretty medal! Let me help you pin it on. Hm? How come you're the one wearing it instead of me? Isn't this commemorating your good eye for people?

char_135_halo.title: Promotion 2
char_135_halo.text: Let's join together and break the shackles, Doctor! The future is unfolding right before our eyes!

char_135_halo.title: Added to Squad
char_135_halo.text: Hello, everybody!

char_135_halo.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_135_halo.text: Hold on a sec. I'll finish reading the team leader's messages in a jiffy.

char_135_halo.title: Depart
char_135_halo.text: All charged up and ready to go.

char_135_halo.title: Begin Operation
char_135_halo.text: I'll show you the power of technology.

char_135_halo.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_135_halo.text: Hmm?

char_135_halo.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_135_halo.text: How about here?

char_135_halo.title: Deployment 1
char_135_halo.text: Alright.

char_135_halo.title: Deployment 2
char_135_halo.text: Acknowledged.

char_135_halo.title: In Battle 1
char_135_halo.text: Miracles don't just drop out of the sky.

char_135_halo.title: In Battle 2
char_135_halo.text: Computations complete.

char_135_halo.title: In Battle 3
char_135_halo.text: I'm not gonna sit here and wait for my demise.

char_135_halo.title: In Battle 4
char_135_halo.text: My lightning will illuminate the starry sky!

char_135_halo.title: 4-star Result
char_135_halo.text: You had even the finest details under control. You must be a professional.

char_135_halo.title: 3-star Result
char_135_halo.text: I knew everything was going to be okay.

char_135_halo.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_135_halo.text: Everything's under control~ Just a little scuffed, that's all...

char_135_halo.title: Operation Failure
char_135_halo.text: No way... How could my calculation have...?

char_135_halo.title: Assigned to Facility
char_135_halo.text: Let's see how far this is from my workstation...

char_135_halo.title: Tap
char_135_halo.text: Ahh?!

char_135_halo.title: Trust Tap
char_135_halo.text: Oh, Doctor! What a coincidence running into you here! Why don't we go shopping together?

char_135_halo.title: Title
char_135_halo.text: Arknights.

char_135_halo.title: Greeting
char_135_halo.text: Hello, Doctor. Need a hand?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, got any trouble for me to handle? What? Just haul these files for you?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: I gotta hand it to her, Doctor, this axe Zumama made for me turned out great, but I've already got this muscle memory from whacking enemies with my staff. See, still carrying it with me. I'm here to save people, after all, not beat 'em up. Gotta work that out.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, check it out. Getting extra weapons' kind a juggling act, so I found a solution. Trained my tail a little, and now, I can use it to hold my staff. Only downside is—I think my tail got thicker after all that exercise.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk 3
char_1026_gvial2.text: How's that, Doctor? Shoulders feel much better, right? I told you, controlling my strength's a piece of cake, it's just none of you wanna believe me. I've been practicing medicine as a pro for years now. It's about time you recognized the fact, don't you think?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: Oh, right, Doctor, it's been a while since your last trip to Acahualla, right? Join me next time I visit my home, if you can spare the time. They told me it's a party there now. Even I'm wondering what my home's gonna be like when I visit again.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, you know there's times you can trust your intuition. You've got all these Operators who trust you, see. Even with your eyes closed, your fists are still real strong—What? Compared to mine? Hey... I could K.O. you before you even made it out of this office, so I'm the stronger one there!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: Zumama can build machines, Tomimi can manage people, and Inam's a damn-good lord ameer... Man, my friends rule! But my medical skills aren't bad either! Huh? What do you mean that's the one thing they'd argue?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: Y'know, Doctor, I never understood why you made everything so complicated all the time. But now, I kinda get it, in a small sorta way. To put it in plaintalk, you're just finding ways to get bigger fists. So let me get real here, Doc. It's time you worked out with me.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1026_gvial2.text: Zumama was right. All I gotta do is think about how to get stronger, and how to throw my fists. So I've got an extremely serious question to ask you, Doctor... If I get Zumama to build us a two-seater Raging Ironhide, do you wanna ride driver-side or passenger?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Idle
char_1026_gvial2.text: Alright, how should I wake the Doc up...?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Onboard
char_1026_gvial2.text: Hold on, Doctor, I know what you wanna ask, and my files are still up in Medical. But, y'know, Dr. Kal'tsit's got a point. Doesn't reflect well on Medical to have a physician steamrolling around the front lines, so from now on, this is how I'm heading out.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1026_gvial2.text: There... wouldn't a quick axe chop do the job?!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Promotion 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: *sigh* Just doesn't give me the same kick I get being endorsed for my medical skills...

char_1026_gvial2.title: Promotion 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, doesn't matter if I've got an axe or staff in hand, I'm just hoping to accomplish a little something, make everyone's lives a little bit happier. I've managed to do a bunch so far, and before my body gives out on me here, I'm gonna do more.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Added to Squad
char_1026_gvial2.text: Leave the front to me. The rear's all yours!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1026_gvial2.text: You get to follow me under one condition—you all stay alive and well. Got it?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Depart
char_1026_gvial2.text: Let's go! Oh, speaking of which, what was our objective again?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Begin Operation
char_1026_gvial2.text: Alright, guys! Let's make some noise!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, leave the big guys to me!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: I'll charge the weak spots!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Deployment 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: Fear not, here I come!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Deployment 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: I'll take the lead! The rest is up to you guys!

char_1026_gvial2.title: In Battle 1
char_1026_gvial2.text: Relax, it'll be over in an instant.

char_1026_gvial2.title: In Battle 2
char_1026_gvial2.text: Face me!

char_1026_gvial2.title: In Battle 3
char_1026_gvial2.text: Who's next?!

char_1026_gvial2.title: In Battle 4
char_1026_gvial2.text: Ha! Kick ass!

char_1026_gvial2.title: 4-star Result
char_1026_gvial2.text: Uh... might be kind of weird to say at this point, Doctor, but nailing down a tough mission on nothing but trust for others—that's pretty damn neat.

char_1026_gvial2.title: 3-star Result
char_1026_gvial2.text: Everybody good? We've got another battle waiting for us. Pump yourselves up! We're gonna crush this mission together!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1026_gvial2.text: No rush. Doesn't matter if we're chasing 'em down or watching for a counterattack, just leave it to me. I want anyone who needs it to rest up!

char_1026_gvial2.title: Operation Failure
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor, hold on tight to my shoulders! Don't go blaming me if you fall off.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1026_gvial2.text: I guess I'll drop in at Medical before the mission.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Tap
char_1026_gvial2.text: What's the rush, Doc? Not like I'm gonna run away.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Trust Tap
char_1026_gvial2.text: You look pretty free to me, Doctor. Just so happens I am too. Wanna take a walk?

char_1026_gvial2.title: Title
char_1026_gvial2.text: Arknights.

char_1026_gvial2.title: Greeting
char_1026_gvial2.text: Doctor! ...Oops, my bad. Didn't bruise you, did I?

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Hello, Doctor. I'll be acting as your assistant from here on. Please keep an appropriate distance from me; I'll be more at ease that way.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I recall my first time ordering a fountain pen from Zeruertza's artisans, where I didn't make my requirements clear. Then I ended up with this crossbow. It plagues me to have had the peace-loving Durin forges a weapon… Operator Myrtle? Calling herself Generalissimo? That's just a childish fan—Ahem, it's her own self-styling.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: If you'll permit my frankness, it's my belief Rhodes Island should build work and living environments more suited to the Durin operators. At least the cafeteria menu should be decided by vote—they're all satisfied? They can't be! I'll go and ask them, lest you—lest someone be tricking them.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk 3
char_4055_bgsnow.text: You require me to draft some slogans? I'd be happy to. It was routine work of mine in Zeruertza. You only need to provide me a typewriter, and that's all... Why do I not use a pen? My fountain pen is typically for more private things, more... not-so-Durin things.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I was a steadfast teetotaler back in Ursus, but to my surprise, I could keep more drink down than most in Zeruertza. Truth be told, I didn't immediately understand why they loved their drink so, but I did eventually come to realize. We only drink in excess when hope is lost, and a forever stagnant, easy life can lose us hope as well as anything.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I still hold that life in the Durin cities far surpasses that of the surface, but I have to admit, the flowerets that vie to bloom in the ruins have more of a power than all the blossoms of Durin greenhouses... Hah. All these years, and yet I'm a surface-dweller through and through.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Ursus desserts and wine? Let someone else have the pastries, please. 'Ursus-style' is an exceptional stranger to me by now. That said, do leave the liquor here. Zeruertzans love their drink, and I'm no exception—wait, this isn't mead. Is this pure spirits? Oh, my head...

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Noble? Correct, I was once a noble. Until a conspiracy wrested my family away, and left me with the sole luck of escaping underground to Zeruertza. There was no avaricious nobility in the city, nor any commoners who'd take advantage for their own gain. Only kindhearted Durins... What more could I ask for?

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Doctor, I'd like to talk with you of beauty and virtue, of those things I consider vanished from the surface. I've witnessed their existence aboard Rhodes Island, and you've told me that more of their sparks are alight upon this land still... I don't dare trust. I have to go and see it for myself.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Idle
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Doctor, are you asleep? No? Well, no matter. If you're planning to hold the same posture for a while, perhaps I might draw a fountain pen sketch of you.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Onboard
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I believe you're the Doctor? It's nice to meet you. Please accept my gratitude; thank you for allowing me to lodge here, a refuge on the unseemly surface.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I could never imagine. Do you show these violent, bloody tapes to the Durins as well?

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Promotion 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Thank you for the gesture of confidence. I'll endure the urge to flee the award ceremony as best I can, so please, if you could wrap it up soon... There's no ceremony, it's just a normal presentation? Oh, that's a relief.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Promotion 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Another promotion, is it? Thank you. I'll accept this honor with my chest out in pride... And of course, we don't need to end this presentation as quickly as last time. Do not be afraid of those I should not fear—this is what life aboard Rhodes Island has taught me.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Added to Squad
char_4055_bgsnow.text: The day shall come for every land dweller, the day they find a cold weapon in their arms. And I learned it the hard way.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4055_bgsnow.text: For those of you who've spent not a second out of the fight, decades-old tactical thinking from Ursus must be far past its prime.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Depart
char_4055_bgsnow.text: May we all return safely.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Begin Operation
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Enemy... A noun I hardly want to reunite with outside of writing. It's been so long.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Your orders, please.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: With pleasure.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Deployment 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Good visibility. I'm ready to fire.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Deployment 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: I'll cover my allies.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: In Battle 1
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Bolt pierces deeper than nib on the battlefield.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: In Battle 2
char_4055_bgsnow.text: For a life of peace...!

char_4055_bgsnow.title: In Battle 3
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Abandon resistance now, or I pull the trigger!

char_4055_bgsnow.title: In Battle 4
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Hff... haa... Fire!

char_4055_bgsnow.title: 4-star Result
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Surface civilization is no different to the ferocious vile beasts, but perhaps you can become one who loops its reins.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: 3-star Result
char_4055_bgsnow.text: The battle is over. It's time to return and write, and do something more meaningful than this.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Apologies, Doctor. I'm still unaccustomed to the sensation of combat.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Operation Failure
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Doctor, evacuate everyone as fast as you can, I—I'll bring up the rear! Don't mind me, go!

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Zeruertza has molded me. I'm still a little unused to moving about these narrow spaces.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Tap
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Hands off! ...Apologies, that wasn't intentional.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Trust Tap
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Doctor, if you insist on chatting with me, what say we talk about your favorite books?

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Title
char_4055_bgsnow.text: Arknights.

char_4055_bgsnow.title: Greeting
char_4055_bgsnow.text: *yawn*... Good morning, Doctor. The book you recommended was very interesting. I finished reading it overnight.

char_497_ctable.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_497_ctable.text: Doctor, watch your hands. If you aren't careful around my weapons, you'll get hurt.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk 1
char_497_ctable.text: Here are the instruments I used to play. There aren't too many of them, but the gems on them are very valuable. Sell them, and they should cover my medical fees... Once my debt's cleared, I'd like to go back to living on my own. Would that be alright?

char_497_ctable.title: Talk 2
char_497_ctable.text: I've seen pets kept around your hospital here, and you have a training room. I've seen some of the children you're giving intensive care in the wards. 'Instructor?' 'Professor?' My previous savior brought me to those with the same title, and look how I ended up.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk 3
char_497_ctable.text: This? This is my lyre. I may be better with other instruments, but I like playing this one most. Listen. Such an airy, lingering timbre, and the hand moves so beautifully when playing. But when you fully lose yourself in the melody, the knife concealed inside will... I'm sorry, I got carried away.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_497_ctable.text: Doctor, do you intend only to treat me here? Strange. You really don't need me to do anything? I can't trust kindness with no strings attached. Let me do a little something for you, okay? I'm sure you'll be satisfied, no matter the task—But, you must share with me your motivations.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_497_ctable.text: I remember coming back from my first fulfilled mission when I was young, weeping and throwing up, scared I didn't do well enough, that I would starve to death in some forgotten corner, unknown to anyone... No longer do I fear these things. Thanks to the days with Rhodes Island, I now know how it feels to be truly alive.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_497_ctable.text: The Originium on my arm... it hurts terribly, but it's much more manageable by now. I know none of the physicians, but I can tell how sincerely they're working to save me. Doctor, once my illness has stabilized to a point, can I... stay here?

char_497_ctable.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_497_ctable.text: A lot of my past mistakes were made out of fear. I was scared—I felt that if I didn't listen to them, I was dead. But after catching Oripathy, they threw me out there to die. I should have been terrified at that moment, but instead I was... relieved. The sun shining on my face—it was so warm, it really was.

char_497_ctable.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_497_ctable.text: Doctor, could you take me with you on your next field mission? I want to know the reasoning behind your every decision. Why did you save me, a stranger? Just what does my life mean to you...? I want to figure you out, just a little clearer.

char_497_ctable.title: Idle
char_497_ctable.text: All the ones before you would sleep with one eye open, when I was around. Do you... trust me that much?

char_497_ctable.title: Onboard
char_497_ctable.text: So you're the Doctor from Rhodes Island...? Thank you for what you did. I'll pay for my treatment in time. Otherwise, I'd like to be on my own for now.

char_497_ctable.title: Watching Battle Record
char_497_ctable.text: I'm a fast learner, don't worry.

char_497_ctable.title: Promotion 1
char_497_ctable.text: So this is how it feels... to hold my life in my own hands.

char_497_ctable.title: Promotion 2
char_497_ctable.text: This isn't the first time someone saves my life. But, if I had a chance to get back to those barrens, a chance to weigh up what's behind those helping hands again, I would choose to starve to death there. Doctor, I've been thinking... how nice it would've been, if you were there offering your hand instead.

char_497_ctable.title: Added to Squad
char_497_ctable.text: I trust your judgment. You won't lead me astray.

char_497_ctable.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_497_ctable.text: If I make any mistakes, please point them out to me.

char_497_ctable.title: Depart
char_497_ctable.text: Things are different. I don't want to hide myself any longer.

char_497_ctable.title: Begin Operation
char_497_ctable.text: It's them, right?

char_497_ctable.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_497_ctable.text: What is it?

char_497_ctable.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_497_ctable.text: I'm listening.

char_497_ctable.title: Deployment 1
char_497_ctable.text: In time, I'll find the right place for myself too.

char_497_ctable.title: Deployment 2
char_497_ctable.text: This is the position, right?

char_497_ctable.title: In Battle 1
char_497_ctable.text: I'm aware of what I'm doing.

char_497_ctable.title: In Battle 2
char_497_ctable.text: I know what it is I want.

char_497_ctable.title: In Battle 3
char_497_ctable.text: I obey my own heart.

char_497_ctable.title: In Battle 4
char_497_ctable.text: You've gone astray.

char_497_ctable.title: 4-star Result
char_497_ctable.text: That's one more step in the right direction, isn't it?

char_497_ctable.title: 3-star Result
char_497_ctable.text: Someday in the future, I'll have as clear a direction as you do.

char_497_ctable.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_497_ctable.text: We have a few runaways. A little like I once was.

char_497_ctable.title: Operation Failure
char_497_ctable.text: This isn't happening, don't abandon me... Doctor, where are you?

char_497_ctable.title: Assigned to Facility
char_497_ctable.text: Are you interested in my instruments? I can teach you how to play.

char_497_ctable.title: Tap
char_497_ctable.text: Ah! Doctor... that's dangerous.

char_497_ctable.title: Trust Tap
char_497_ctable.text: If I leave someday, you'll send me off, won't you?

char_497_ctable.title: Title
char_497_ctable.text: Arknights.

char_497_ctable.title: Greeting
char_497_ctable.text: I heard the sound of your footsteps, Doctor.

char_4054_malist.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4054_malist.text: You want me to do file collation work...? These documents of yours all look dusty. I don't want to touch them. And how was your office even planned in the first place? Did you genuinely not feel personally, utterly disgusted leaving this cabinet here?

char_4054_malist.title: Talk 1
char_4054_malist.text: I propose swapping for more corrosion-proof materials next time you do maintenance on the ship's core structure. Why? Because when all's said and done, it's not you or me that'll be left behind. It's this landship's skeleton. That's what's going to endure. That's what will stand for us.

char_4054_malist.title: Talk 2
char_4054_malist.text: You've got some planning work for me? I'll ask to review my partners' design styles first. As long as they aren't too complex about it, I might be able to accept—okay, okay, fine, I'll do it, I'll take it, it's not as if collaborations are some big deal. Besides, it's not that you have disastrous taste.

char_4054_malist.title: Talk 3
char_4054_malist.text: What is it... Ah, darn it, the pencil smudged my belt again. I just got it replaced... Last time it was Gavial, saying she'd get me a new one of the same look. As if! The emblem on the clasp was straight from my designs, and obviously she didn't even give those an honest look!

char_4054_malist.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4054_malist.text: I know, I'll go to the infirmary in a bit. I don't want to interrupt my thought process at the moment. And you know, Doctor, the moment is the exact thing I most value—you called Gavial in? Was she on duty at the Medical Department today? You can't fool—hello, Gavial, no no, I wasn't just working on any designs.

char_4054_malist.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4054_malist.text: I used to appreicate a fan base of one, one who can truly see to the core of my designs, rather than having a crowd of followers with their superfacial admiration. For me, the latter holds absolutely no significance. But now… I suppose it's not all bad to let the masses see them. Discussion swirling around my work means I'm still alive.

char_4054_malist.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4054_malist.text: Why do I tend not to greet anyone? Because once I do, I have to make small talk, and that forces me to crane my head up to speak with them, which makes me seem insignificant. We should be seeing eye-to-eye, on EQUAL footing... Are you asking if it weighs on me? As if! It just makes my neck ache.

char_4054_malist.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4054_malist.text: I was genuinely full of anxiety back then. I always felt I didn't have enough time, though I'd never even accomplished a thing. But nowadays, I've gotten to the point where I can appreciate my own designs. The only thing is, it's been years since I last saw my teacher. I wonder if he'd be proud of me?

char_4054_malist.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4054_malist.text: A close look is all it takes to unearth the core sense of a man from his work. Just like how I used to disdain anything superfluous. I treated my own life in the same way. Doctor, an artwork is a microcosm of its creator's life. Yours, I can understand.

char_4054_malist.title: Idle
char_4054_malist.text: Hmm. Such a counter-conventional sleeping posture, such a complex yet stable load-bearing structure... miraculous. Is this not going to give you neck arthritis?

char_4054_malist.title: Onboard
char_4054_malist.text: I'm Operator Minimalist, freshly dragged here by Gavial. So this is what a nomadic landship's like? You must have a much easier time avoiding Catastrophes than we do underground. Hmph, the only thing in those fools' heads is merrily drinking their lives away—ow, Gavial, what did you hit me for?!

char_4054_malist.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4054_malist.text: ...If it's not architecture-related, I don't want to see it.

char_4054_malist.title: Promotion 1
char_4054_malist.text: A medal? Decently tasteful. You just give this to me, and that's it, right? I've absolutely no need for any sort of commendation ceremonies, and I imagine you don't like to waste time anyway. But I will—ahem—thank you for acknowledging me.

char_4054_malist.title: Promotion 2
char_4054_malist.text: Everyone's experiences are different, and the significance lying behind my works will be out of sight to most... but there are some, like you, like my mentor, that I hope can understand.

char_4054_malist.title: Added to Squad
char_4054_malist.text: If Gavial's going, I'm not.

char_4054_malist.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4054_malist.text: You want me for captain? What are you even... You're joking, aren't you? Hey!

char_4054_malist.title: Depart
char_4054_malist.text: Hm... alright, let me be clear, I don't have any prior combat experience. However, I am going to take this mission seriously.

char_4054_malist.title: Begin Operation
char_4054_malist.text: Instrument debugging complete. I can begin any time.

char_4054_malist.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4054_malist.text: I am aware. Don't push me.

char_4054_malist.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4054_malist.text: If you break anything, you're paying!

char_4054_malist.title: Deployment 1
char_4054_malist.text: Instrument is operating fine. Now scanning terrain.

char_4054_malist.title: Deployment 2
char_4054_malist.text: So this... is war.

char_4054_malist.title: In Battle 1
char_4054_malist.text: Keep away!

char_4054_malist.title: In Battle 2
char_4054_malist.text: We're not here to be courteous.

char_4054_malist.title: In Battle 3
char_4054_malist.text: I just don't get you people...

char_4054_malist.title: In Battle 4
char_4054_malist.text: What a waste of time.

char_4054_malist.title: 4-star Result
char_4054_malist.text: Huh. You're mightier than you let on, aren't you?

char_4054_malist.title: 3-star Result
char_4054_malist.text: *cough* *cough* *cough*... There's so much dust—it's filthy. Gah.

char_4054_malist.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4054_malist.text: What are you looking at me for? You want me to chase them?

char_4054_malist.title: Operation Failure
char_4054_malist.text: Snap out of it! Get running!

char_4054_malist.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4054_malist.text: I don't want to open my eyes . I'm worried the interior design is going to scare the life out of me.

char_4054_malist.title: Tap
char_4054_malist.text: Hold on, I'm busy.

char_4054_malist.title: Trust Tap
char_4054_malist.text: Phew... what time is it? No, what day of the week? Er... did I eat anything yet? I don't think I did...?

char_4054_malist.title: Title
char_4054_malist.text: Arknights.

char_4054_malist.title: Greeting
char_4054_malist.text: Doctor, sitting for too long can leave you prone to neck arthritis. I suggest you watch out for yourself.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4067_lolxh.text: This table's really high! I guess it's easier if I just use my old form to jump up.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: What are you doing here? There's these Medic Operators who keep chasing my tail all the time saying they wanna study me! I need to lay low! Still, why are you hiding here too? You're not slacking off, right, Doctor?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: My power is controlling metal, stuff like the thing on your table. I can make it turn pointy, round, or flat, and even more complicated shapes too.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk 3
char_4067_lolxh.text: The people here look a lot like the spirits in our world. So maybe, the spirits in this world look like you do, Doctor?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: This place is a lot like the Hall for Spirits to me, with all the Infected staying here because they have nowhere to go. But... the Infected have it really different from spirits. They can't even escape just by staying far away from everyone.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: There's so many Catastrophes here... Is this why your cities have to keep wandering everywhere all the time?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: I get it! Operators are Executors, aren't they? Executors do errands for the Hall for Spirits, and Operators do errands for Rhodes Island! Huh? No?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: I'll be an Executor someday, just like my master. My master's really mighty! Um... you too. Everyone on this battleship listens to you, so you've got to be somebody incredible.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor, are we friends now? Then if you can, you should visit our side to play sometime!

char_4067_lolxh.title: Idle
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor, are you eating something secret there?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Onboard
char_4067_lolxh.text: Hello, Doctor, my name's Xiaohei, and I'm a spirit.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor... if I don't understand these tapes, can I ask you about them?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Promotion 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: Promotion? What does that mean?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Promotion 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: I still don't really get it, but thanks, Doctor.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Added to Squad
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor, I'm here! Huh? Is there something on my face? Ah, I just finished eating, haha.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4067_lolxh.text: I'm gonna be the captain? Can I handle that...?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Depart
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor, grab onto me, I'll use my power to send us there. It's quicker that way.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Begin Operation
char_4067_lolxh.text: Are... all of them bad guys?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: Heixiu, we have to help the Doctor out.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: Uh-huh, Doctor, I'm here, don't worry.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Deployment 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: I'm actually pretty good at assassinating.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Deployment 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: I won't let you hurt them!

char_4067_lolxh.title: In Battle 1
char_4067_lolxh.text: Don't come near.

char_4067_lolxh.title: In Battle 2
char_4067_lolxh.text: If you get any closer, I'll get mean!

char_4067_lolxh.title: In Battle 3
char_4067_lolxh.text: I'm super strong! I'll show you how mighty I am!

char_4067_lolxh.title: In Battle 4
char_4067_lolxh.text: Sshaaa!

char_4067_lolxh.title: 4-star Result
char_4067_lolxh.text: Is everyone okay? I'm so, so glad!

char_4067_lolxh.title: 3-star Result
char_4067_lolxh.text: There's just mighty people everywhere.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4067_lolxh.text: Phew—lucky. You're still fine, right?

char_4067_lolxh.title: Operation Failure
char_4067_lolxh.text: It's all my fault for being so weak, Doctor...

char_4067_lolxh.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4067_lolxh.text: I can't forget about the mission the Doctor gave me. But this mat's so comfortable, and the sun's so warm. I think I'm getting kinda sleepy...

char_4067_lolxh.title: Tap
char_4067_lolxh.text: Doctor, don't mess with my ears!

char_4067_lolxh.title: Trust Tap
char_4067_lolxh.text: What are you still working for, Doctor? It's almost food time!

char_4067_lolxh.title: Title
char_4067_lolxh.text: Arknights.

char_4067_lolxh.title: Greeting
char_4067_lolxh.text: Hello, Doctor!

char_4064_mlynar.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4064_mlynar.text: If you've thought it through, I have no qualms with it. Please let me know when the documents are due.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: ...Please, go ahead. It's okay. Reading the paper is just an unhelpful habit I picked up in the Grand Knight Territory, but one can learn much more from a day's trip outside the city than a hundred papers can teach... It's true that the Nearl name often shows up in the headlines, but there's no need to pay that any mind.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: I'm afraid I can't advise Rhodes Island on its affairs in Kazimierz. I may have spent a decade in that tower, but only as an unambitious nobody. I'm in no position to express my views on the General Chamber of Commerce. The sword...? Yes, I know how to use one, and I've always used the same one.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk 3
char_4064_mlynar.text: No need to have Maria come see me. She's not a child anymore, and ought to make her own decisions, lest she embarrass her parents. A knight should temper themselves through travel, and no matter what she does under Rhodes Island's wing, she must always be responsible for her own actions.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: Leithanien's conspiracies... Nothing more than trifles that happened years ago. It doesn't change the fact that I'm an ordinary citizen, nor does it change anything else. To Kazimierzians, stars and heroes come and go. The success they enjoy is only that which they are permitted.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: Seems Margaret kept the title she earned from that charade. Hmph, so she still sees her actions as a victory, after squandering the Nearls' glory in those cheap commercial performances... My Originium Arts? Alas, I can nary illuminate a thing.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: No need to teach me how to get along with the Infected...You should be aware of my time spent living among the refugees…? The Infected, the disabled, the bankrupt, the famished and poor... they're all the same in the ways that matter. The most honorable thing they can hope to achieve is climbing out of their tent in the settlement before their final moments arrive.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: You, too, encourage the others to throw themselves at a cause that will yield no results. Those who attempt to walk through fire in the dark night will only find themselves immolated. That said, you don't need my advice, given the path you so obstinately walk alone.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4064_mlynar.text: In the first two years after they left the Grand Knight Territory, the campaign knights would often bring me their letters. By the time the last one arrived, Maria was already old enough to understand its gist... Whether the letters were written beforehand makes no difference to me, but given the weight of their lives and deaths, they wouldn't have disappeared without so much as a peep.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Idle
char_4064_mlynar.text: A wilderness without light…

char_4064_mlynar.title: Onboard
char_4064_mlynar.text: Młynar Nearl. Per our contract's provisions, I shall assist Rhodes Island with its operations in Kazimierz. ...You already knew my name. I'm neither a knight, nor do I have a title.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4064_mlynar.text: A Kazimierzian is smart after the damage is done…

char_4064_mlynar.title: Promotion 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: I appreciate your appraisal, if you consider such ordinary performance worthy of promotion.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Promotion 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: Titles and positions are both meaningless. The knights of the Nearl family do not require recognition to walk their paths. Even in modern Kazimierz, where every path leads to darkness.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Added to Squad
char_4064_mlynar.text: Man has forgotten true struggle… as well as those who require it to survive.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4064_mlynar.text: ...Follow me.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Depart
char_4064_mlynar.text: Sand, dust, and blood. Most fail to imagine the sight of their admixture.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Begin Operation
char_4064_mlynar.text: To think they are unaware of their own shame...

char_4064_mlynar.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: I'm fully prepared.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: Hm.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Deployment 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: These so-called foes… not even worth drawing my sword.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Deployment 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: Just like the old days?… No.

char_4064_mlynar.title: In Battle 1
char_4064_mlynar.text: This won't hurt your eyes.

char_4064_mlynar.title: In Battle 2
char_4064_mlynar.text: How very tiring.

char_4064_mlynar.title: In Battle 3
char_4064_mlynar.text: It rains.

char_4064_mlynar.title: In Battle 4
char_4064_mlynar.text: That sigh... still haunts my mind.

char_4064_mlynar.title: 4-star Result
char_4064_mlynar.text: You still have full confidence in everything... With these people's fate in your hand, you still believe there will be a happy ending.

char_4064_mlynar.title: 3-star Result
char_4064_mlynar.text: If you have no other work for me, I shall take my leave.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4064_mlynar.text: Deserters… they always have somewhere to hide, among their like-minded brethren.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Operation Failure
char_4064_mlynar.text: Mark my words, there will be battles you cannot win. Have you considered the consequences of those inevitable failures?

char_4064_mlynar.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4064_mlynar.text: You... accommodate quite a few people here.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Tap
char_4064_mlynar.text: ...I believe I've made a suggestion regarding this matter?

char_4064_mlynar.title: Trust Tap
char_4064_mlynar.text: Kazimierz's knight novels... Hmph... The Grand Knight Territory no longer has room for such fantasies.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Title
char_4064_mlynar.text: Arknights.

char_4064_mlynar.title: Greeting
char_4064_mlynar.text: Good day... 'Doktor.'

char_4032_provs.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4032_provs.text: These documents won't take me long to take care of. Why don't you show me Rhodes Island's old business contracts? You never know what kind of restitutions there might be hidden in a contract's terms.

char_4032_provs.title: Talk 1
char_4032_provs.text: Doctor, when you work out your business plans, feel free to put off the legal ramifications till the very end. I've never lost a case as a defense attorney.

char_4032_provs.title: Talk 2
char_4032_provs.text: Huh? Even that ice-cold Młynar is here? And here I thought he'd want a breather after leaving his job behind in the Grand Knight Territory. Well, Rhodes Island isn't a bad place. At least they don't expect you to wine-and-dine clients here. Otherwise, considering his alcohol tolerance...

char_4032_provs.title: Talk 3
char_4032_provs.text: Is that a Kazimierzian newspaper you're reading, Doctor? 'Despite Conclusive Evidence, Knight Sports Match Fixers Found Innocent'—Oh, I was in charge of that case. What does that mean? Hehe, if they walked away scot-free, then obviously the evidence wasn't conclusive enough.

char_4032_provs.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4032_provs.text: I've never actually worked for a multinational corporation before, so I've been reading up on other countries' laws, too. But no matter where you are, the lawbooks make it clear as day who benefits under their rules.

char_4032_provs.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4032_provs.text: The courtroom is a place of victory and defeat. Both sides submit their evidence, and their disputes are arbitrated within the confines of the law. I never expected to find any justice in that process, but when the law can be freely trampled on by capitalism, being a lawyer gets real boring, don't you think?

char_4032_provs.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4032_provs.text: Ugh, my back hurts. I kind of want a massage chair, but money's tight with my current salary. But considering Rhodes Island's revenue, I suppose the pay isn't completely unreasonable—Speaking of which, what do you think of my plan to demand compensation from companies we've worked with? What? How can it be extortion when we're asking for pocket change?!

char_4032_provs.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4032_provs.text: Doctor, I think there are a lot of problems with the medical malpractice liability clauses in Rhodes Island's contracts. In most countries, we as a medical company wouldn't be liable for a lot of the scenarios listed in there—You don't want to fix it? Alright, I'll give it some more thought.

char_4032_provs.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4032_provs.text: I'm slowly starting to understand that expecting the law be able to judge all disputes fairly isn't just naive, it's intellectually lazy. The law is not perfect, and it will always be riddled with holes that we need to fill with humanity.

char_4032_provs.title: Idle
char_4032_provs.text: So even the Doctor likes to sleep at the desk, just like me. I'll be worried about your spine if this keeps up, though…

char_4032_provs.title: Onboard
char_4032_provs.text: Hello, my name is Deszcz. I'm your new legal consultant. If you need to call me by a codename, then use Proviso. Let me get this out of the way first, though. The general practice of obfuscating all your employees' identities isn't going to fly with me.

char_4032_provs.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4032_provs.text: If you're putting me in charge, I can make sure the enemies will be liable for all damages.

char_4032_provs.title: Promotion 1
char_4032_provs.text: A promotion? Let me take a look at the new contract... Alright, everything checks out. My salary did go up. Thanks!

char_4032_provs.title: Promotion 2
char_4032_provs.text: If you're letting me read these high clearance level materials, this is going way beyond a normal partnership, isn't it...? Thanks for your trust, Doctor. I hope I'll be able to accomplish with law what I never could before I came here.

char_4032_provs.title: Added to Squad
char_4032_provs.text: I'm glad to help, but before we get started, can we be more explicit with regards to the terms of compensation?

char_4032_provs.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4032_provs.text: Everyone, please be sure to handle the work you're assigned. Do not give our opponents any loopholes.

char_4032_provs.title: Depart
char_4032_provs.text: The court is now in session!

char_4032_provs.title: Begin Operation
char_4032_provs.text: I've gathered enough materials on our opponents. They will lose this case.

char_4032_provs.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4032_provs.text: I never prepare drafts.

char_4032_provs.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4032_provs.text: Ahem. Allow me to present my argument.

char_4032_provs.title: Deployment 1
char_4032_provs.text: If you are not party to this suit, please leave at once.

char_4032_provs.title: Deployment 2
char_4032_provs.text: Order! The court will soon reach a verdict.

char_4032_provs.title: In Battle 1
char_4032_provs.text: Hold it! The evidence submitted by the opposing party is suspect.

char_4032_provs.title: In Battle 2
char_4032_provs.text: Objection! The witness's testimony is self-contradictory.

char_4032_provs.title: In Battle 3
char_4032_provs.text: Anything you say can and will be used against you. I suggest you exercise your right to remain silent.

char_4032_provs.title: In Battle 4
char_4032_provs.text: Based on the above, you are found guilty.

char_4032_provs.title: 4-star Result
char_4032_provs.text: No surprise there. As long as you understand how to use the system, the results follow naturally.

char_4032_provs.title: 3-star Result
char_4032_provs.text: I take it I met your expectations, Doctor? Now, per our contract, let's discuss legal fees.

char_4032_provs.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4032_provs.text: Don't worry, we'll get this case thrown out and win the retrial.

char_4032_provs.title: Operation Failure
char_4032_provs.text: Something must've gone wrong somewhere... I won't let this kind of failure happen again.

char_4032_provs.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4032_provs.text: Can I apply for a more comfortable chair?

char_4032_provs.title: Tap
char_4032_provs.text: What?

char_4032_provs.title: Trust Tap
char_4032_provs.text: Doctor, I took a photo of what you just did as evidence.

char_4032_provs.title: Title
char_4032_provs.text: Arknights.

char_4032_provs.title: Greeting
char_4032_provs.text: Hello, Doctor. I'm happy to report that Rhodes Island is not currently involved in any legal disputes, for now.

char_4066_highmo.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4066_highmo.text: If some work is beyond even your power, then how can I possibly take on a share?

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk 1
char_4066_highmo.text: That nightmare still comes to mind, even now. My life denied by some grand ecology... no, not denied. It would admit everything, it was more sublime than life itself... it made me feel shame at the selfishness of life.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk 2
char_4066_highmo.text: I don't want to belittle the Medical Department's effort, but I don't believe life can be 'cured' like a disease. Human or Sea Terror, I'm doomed to live on as half-baked, and that's the price I pay for my own foolishness.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk 3
char_4066_highmo.text: That special 'collaborator' of yours is just something other right now, using biological function to imitate his old form, and you should know that better than him. You're still seeking possibilities in him? I hope you aren't repeating my mistakes.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4066_highmo.text: I've felt at ease in my time residing aboard the landship, even come to recognize it as a feeling similar to my long-lost home... You don't need to be concerned. Even if Iberia will never be a home to the Ægir, I'd never refuse to execute my responsibilities there, such as we've agreed.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4066_highmo.text: Anything that seems to be given for free will eventually demand some price of you. That's the lesson I learned. And some of what you do appears to practically overturn that... I'll have to wait and see.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4066_highmo.text: You're wondering what this song is? It's just something my mother taught me when I was young. I didn't take much interest back then, only humming perfunctory notes to follow along. It was only after losing her, I realized... these melodies form one of the few things I still have to my name.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4066_highmo.text: An ignorant girl gives up her song, and gains naught but a dream snuffed as quickly as the foam in return. It sounds just like a fairytale, doesn't it? And the fact that such a stupid girl could be saved at the story's end... seems like a fairytale, too.

char_4066_highmo.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4066_highmo.text: You've helped me recover the courage to trust in other beings, so I hope you see this responsibility through. Lead those willing to follow you, and put an end to those disasters that should never have befallen the innocent. Please, don't disappoint me.

char_4066_highmo.title: Idle
char_4066_highmo.text: You see them in your dreams too, don't you? All those faces who've quietly left your life.

char_4066_highmo.title: Onboard
char_4066_highmo.text: So, you'd be the 'Doctor'. I don't have much to introduce about myself. If I'm standing here, you must have read and approved all the files about me.

char_4066_highmo.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4066_highmo.text: Maybe I shouldn't doubt the value of these records, like I did before.

char_4066_highmo.title: Promotion 1
char_4066_highmo.text: The more you seek from a power you should reject, the deeper you fall into it. Eventually, it will engulf your entire being. You understand this, don't you?

char_4066_highmo.title: Promotion 2
char_4066_highmo.text: You wish to forge a space that can admit me, and hope for me to admit everything surrounding me...? An arrogant notion, truly. But maybe I could bear witness with you, until the day you give up.

char_4066_highmo.title: Added to Squad
char_4066_highmo.text: Looks like we've gotten our approvals. It's time to go.

char_4066_highmo.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4066_highmo.text: I might bring their ruin, but only you can bring our victory.

char_4066_highmo.title: Depart
char_4066_highmo.text: Let us reap those naive delusions and immature obsessions.

char_4066_highmo.title: Begin Operation
char_4066_highmo.text: I hear the sound of the flooding tide.

char_4066_highmo.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4066_highmo.text: Do you have instructions for me?

char_4066_highmo.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4066_highmo.text: Do I still have to wait?

char_4066_highmo.title: Deployment 1
char_4066_highmo.text: As you ask.

char_4066_highmo.title: Deployment 2
char_4066_highmo.text: I have no doubt.

char_4066_highmo.title: In Battle 1
char_4066_highmo.text: They have no position to evade.

char_4066_highmo.title: In Battle 2
char_4066_highmo.text: They have no power to withstand.

char_4066_highmo.title: In Battle 3
char_4066_highmo.text: They have no way to advance.

char_4066_highmo.title: In Battle 4
char_4066_highmo.text: They have no path to escape.

char_4066_highmo.title: 4-star Result
char_4066_highmo.text: Sometimes, your grasp of the surrounding situation makes me instinctually fearful. Yes, I believe you could make even Sea Terrors comprehend fear. So, do you intend to feel happy about this?

char_4066_highmo.title: 3-star Result
char_4066_highmo.text: The waves have subsided. If you have no other tasks, I should leave immediately to undergo a 'routine' inspection.

char_4066_highmo.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4066_highmo.text: Were you showing mercy? Are enemies of this level worth your indulgence?

char_4066_highmo.title: Operation Failure
char_4066_highmo.text: We should go. Before the next wave has us drowned.

char_4066_highmo.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4066_highmo.text: So this, too, is the place you promise I can belong.

char_4066_highmo.title: Tap
char_4066_highmo.text: Did you need me?

char_4066_highmo.title: Trust Tap
char_4066_highmo.text: This place might be more... calming than expected.

char_4066_highmo.title: Title
char_4066_highmo.text: Arknights.

char_4066_highmo.title: Greeting
char_4066_highmo.text: We still have some time, before the tide floods the soil beneath us.

char_157_dagda.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_157_dagda.text: Siege's ordered me to serve as your assistant. I'll be a harsh supervisor for you, if it's called for.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk 1
char_157_dagda.text: Huh? Do you have a problem with my metal claws? They're totally brill! ...I mean... They're very... Wieldy. Please don't get the wrong idea about my taste.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk 2
char_157_dagda.text: Morgan picked this outfit. Obviously, something with a knightly air would definitely suit me more. Although this street style... is just a little bit... wicked.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk 3
char_157_dagda.text: Indra's a mess, both the way she lives and fights. That said, she'll go through hell and high water for her mates, and she'll fight to her last breath for Siege—maybe, she's more knight than some knights out there, and she's never even had to try.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_157_dagda.text: Most of Victoria's people live out their whole lives in their own cities, while everyone aboard Rhodes Island has left their homes to drift around this land. It just bowls me over.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_157_dagda.text: The Montague name and the title of Knight of the Tower used to be more precious to me than anything. But gradually, I came to see how change for Victoria was unavoidable, and it doesn't just stem from the flames of war before us. I may have to abandon my past to follow Siege, but I'll follow through, unto the very end.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_157_dagda.text: Bound to uphold Victoria's dignity, the Knights of the Tower never once shrank back in the face of the Sarkaz's blades. I was the only one who escaped, protected by my brothers and sisters in arms... I often think to myself—if... just if... I could've fought to the end with them...

char_157_dagda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_157_dagda.text: Siege said I should choose the life I truly want to live when the war is over. Once that day arrives, how will Victoria turn out to be? And how will I turn out to be? I... I can't imagine it. All I hope is I'm still able to stay by their sides.

char_157_dagda.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_157_dagda.text: Dr. {@nickname}... From here onwards, my blade belongs to both Victoria, and you. You can call me either Dagda or the 'Dark Blade.' Isa? T-Too frivolous! But if you've got to... then keep your voice down!

char_157_dagda.title: Idle
char_157_dagda.text: It's a Knight of the Tower's duty to stand night watch. May you rest well, Doctor.

char_157_dagda.title: Onboard
char_157_dagda.text: Knight of the Tower Isabella Montague. On behalf of Siege and our little alliance, I express our sincerest gratitude… What do you mean I don't dress like a knight? L-Looks can be bloody deceiving!

char_157_dagda.title: Watching Battle Record
char_157_dagda.text: Umm...I'm seeing a wide gap between these tactics and my old training.

char_157_dagda.title: Promotion 1
char_157_dagda.text: A medal? I can't accept any that's not Victorian... hmm, but you are the Doctor of Rhodes Island. Okay, I'm making an exception just this once.

char_157_dagda.title: Promotion 2
char_157_dagda.text: Ever since we left Londinium, I've trained up a million more techniques than just knightly combat! Now you're going to see my true strength!

char_157_dagda.title: Added to Squad
char_157_dagda.text: I've got no need to hide my identity if I'm fighting for Rhodes Island, yeah?

char_157_dagda.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_157_dagda.text: What style of command do you want from me? The knight type, or the gang type?

char_157_dagda.title: Depart
char_157_dagda.text: A fight? Wicked, bring it on... Ahem, as a Knight of the Tower, I accept your challenge.

char_157_dagda.title: Begin Operation
char_157_dagda.text: These punks are nothing compared to the foes Victoria's surmounted!

char_157_dagda.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_157_dagda.text: Is this an order?

char_157_dagda.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_157_dagda.text: I await your word.

char_157_dagda.title: Deployment 1
char_157_dagda.text: To the death I go.

char_157_dagda.title: Deployment 2
char_157_dagda.text: As you bid.

char_157_dagda.title: In Battle 1
char_157_dagda.text: Forward, back, forward. Got ya!

char_157_dagda.title: In Battle 2
char_157_dagda.text: For Victoria!

char_157_dagda.title: In Battle 3
char_157_dagda.text: Even without a blade, I can run you through!

char_157_dagda.title: In Battle 4
char_157_dagda.text: Any soldier's will is worthy of respect.

char_157_dagda.title: 4-star Result
char_157_dagda.text: Be of firm enough conviction, and it won't matter what difficulties you face. You'll have nothing to be afraid of.

char_157_dagda.title: 3-star Result
char_157_dagda.text: Is that it? I didn't get to show off my real skills yet... If there is a next time, permit I continue to stand by your side.

char_157_dagda.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_157_dagda.text: You can't reach perfection without pushing yourself to the limit. I must do better.

char_157_dagda.title: Operation Failure
char_157_dagda.text: If only I had a blade on me, I could... No, I can't give up now. Doctor, I'm ready to enter the next battle.

char_157_dagda.title: Assigned to Facility
char_157_dagda.text: I'll assume guard duties for this room.

char_157_dagda.title: Tap
char_157_dagda.text: Where do ya need me?

char_157_dagda.title: Trust Tap
char_157_dagda.text: Stop calling me Isa...

char_157_dagda.title: Title
char_157_dagda.text: Arknights.

char_157_dagda.title: Greeting
char_157_dagda.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_4062_totter.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4062_totter.text: You keep the place so messy but find what you need anyway? *sigh* Well, that's also a talent, I guess.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk 1
char_4062_totter.text: Doctor, am I able to file for exemption from paperwork? I have a bad case of farsightedness. It's a lot of strain to read, and fatigue strikes easily.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk 2
char_4062_totter.text: I'm a repressed sort, not talkative. If you're not entertained, you can head out for now. No, I don't mean to drive you off, I just...

char_4062_totter.title: Talk 3
char_4062_totter.text: I don't need to be issued a scope. In my crossbow's killing range, my naked eye sees clearly enough.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4062_totter.text: My bolt points are a custom make. They pierce armor and cause massive blood loss in a short time. They're based on what Sargon hunters specially use to hunt big beasts, then I made modifications after coming to Victoria. Now they fly lighter, and kill harder.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4062_totter.text: The merc business is tough, absolutely. Sometimes I'd be in the snow and an entire day would pass on my watch, and my feet would be frostbitten by the end. I appreciate your look of concern, but it was fine. Even lucky. My left foot hurt less when it was frozen.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4062_totter.text: Why I like snow, you wonder? Let me think... Does never seeing it in Sargon count? Heh, it's not really that deep. People always have their inexplicable fancies.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4062_totter.text: ...If it's alright for me to ask, could you read the poem in this book to me, Doctor? I borrowed it from Istina. She says it's a fine poem, about winter in Deity Grypherburg.

char_4062_totter.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4062_totter.text: Do you know what's most precious? Someone to peacefully watch the snow with. Maybe I've met one at some point before, but who knows? Once the snow descends, it covers all traces of anything, including the fading footprints.

char_4062_totter.title: Idle
char_4062_totter.text: How about a mug of hot water? You seem a little pale.

char_4062_totter.title: Onboard
char_4062_totter.text: Hello, Doctor, I'm Totter. Long-range sniping's my specialty. You can leave any task to me as long as it's a workday.

char_4062_totter.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4062_totter.text: Hold on, Doctor, it's too close. Let me put on my glasses and try again.

char_4062_totter.title: Promotion 1
char_4062_totter.text: If you're pleased with my work, then I couldn't ask for more.

char_4062_totter.title: Promotion 2
char_4062_totter.text: Thank you, Doctor, but your appreciation actually leaves me at a loss. Err. If I'm being honest, I don't have big dreams for my work.

char_4062_totter.title: Added to Squad
char_4062_totter.text: Orders ASAP, please.

char_4062_totter.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4062_totter.text: Everyone, please coordinate. Thanks in advance.

char_4062_totter.title: Depart
char_4062_totter.text: Let's move. Time waits for nobody.

char_4062_totter.title: Begin Operation
char_4062_totter.text: They're fast on the move, but I can still read their tracks.

char_4062_totter.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4062_totter.text: Foggy today. Bad luck.

char_4062_totter.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4062_totter.text: Great luck. Got a tail wind today.

char_4062_totter.title: Deployment 1
char_4062_totter.text: I see clouds rising. Probable hostiles in the snow.

char_4062_totter.title: Deployment 2
char_4062_totter.text: I see fowl taking off. Probable ambush in the grass.

char_4062_totter.title: In Battle 1
char_4062_totter.text: Come out. Stop hiding!

char_4062_totter.title: In Battle 2
char_4062_totter.text: I see you.

char_4062_totter.title: In Battle 3
char_4062_totter.text: Stop moving.

char_4062_totter.title: In Battle 4
char_4062_totter.text: It won't be any use.

char_4062_totter.title: 4-star Result
char_4062_totter.text: The best kills are one-shot. Less pain for them.

char_4062_totter.title: 3-star Result
char_4062_totter.text: Target down. Mission clear, no setbacks.

char_4062_totter.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4062_totter.text: *Tut*, not my best shot.

char_4062_totter.title: Operation Failure
char_4062_totter.text: Sorry, Doctor, target's out of range. I can't hit them.

char_4062_totter.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4062_totter.text: Nice. Luxurious compared to my safehouse.

char_4062_totter.title: Tap
char_4062_totter.text: Speak. I'm all ears.

char_4062_totter.title: Trust Tap
char_4062_totter.text: Doctor, is that you? You're blurry, but you've got distinct footsteps. I can tell them apart.

char_4062_totter.title: Title
char_4062_totter.text: Arknights.

char_4062_totter.title: Greeting
char_4062_totter.text: Hello.

char_4071_peper.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4071_peper.text: I'm not good at this stuff either. Huh? They need it done today? Eh... Fine, I told you I'd help. I keep my word. Give it here. I'll take half, but you gotta finish the rest on your own!

char_4071_peper.title: Talk 1
char_4071_peper.text: Got any salt on you, Doc? Here, gimme some. I made potatoes. They taste so good when you sprinkle salt on them! We eat them like this a lot when we're out on a job! I roasted some fruit, too. Take it to W and Ines... Don't tell them it's from me! Got it?

char_4071_peper.title: Talk 2
