char_4071_peper.text: I heard I might run into W here? Seriously? She and Ines saved me a while back, and I'm thankful for it, but she can be real annoying sometimes... Doc, I'm surprised you had the guts to hire her.

char_4071_peper.title: Talk 3
char_4071_peper.text: Manfred, that jackass! He actually did it! And he was serious about it, too! I totally thought I was going to die... Ugh, I know he's got his reasons... but I still can't let it slide! I've got a grudge!

char_4071_peper.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4071_peper.text: You were leading the squad then, right? Hmph, how could I forget? You gave me a real bad time! But if I had to do it again, I'd still choose to take everybody and bug out... I don't want to have to watch somebody sacrifice themselves ever again.

char_4071_peper.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4071_peper.text: Is rebuilding Kazdel really a good idea? I don't know. All I know is I care more about the people around me—my squadmates, everyone from Rhodes Island... of course, that includes you, Doctor! We're buddies now, right?

char_4071_peper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4071_peper.text: If Kazdel really gets rebuilt, does that really mean us Sarkaz all get to come back and reunite together? What will the Victorian rebels think of us? I can't see how this all ends... I don't know...

char_4071_peper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4071_peper.text: Doc! Is the mail in? Anything for me? Thing is, I was raised by my nana in a small town in Columbia, and we still write to each other! I'm always telling everyone here to write home more often, but for some reason they get pretty upset about it. I wonder why.

char_4071_peper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4071_peper.text: C'mere, Doc. Try this on! Hm... Looks great on you. My nana knitted it for you! It matches mine, too! How's it feel? Comfy and warm, right? I told Nana all about you, and she called you a good egg!

char_4071_peper.title: Idle
char_4071_peper.text: So bored... Maybe I should knit something. What do you think of this little pouch? It's very practical!

char_4071_peper.title: Onboard
char_4071_peper.text: Hey there! Starting today, my squad and I are at your beck and call, Doctor. Call me Paprika. You seem like a solid employer, but you're still on probation! I've got my eye on you!

char_4071_peper.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4071_peper.text: Are these the ancient Sarkaz tricks the old folks talk about?

char_4071_peper.title: Promotion 1
char_4071_peper.text: Awesome, I finally got promoted! Hehe, you said you'd let me lead my own squad after my promotion. You're a doctor of your word, aren't you?

char_4071_peper.title: Promotion 2
char_4071_peper.text: Doctor! You're a mighty fine employer! Amiya looks real dependable, too. There's no going wrong, hitching my wagon to you. If you've got any more high-paying gigs, be sure to give me a holler!

char_4071_peper.title: Added to Squad
char_4071_peper.text: Hehe, you picked the right girl for the job!

char_4071_peper.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4071_peper.text: Just leave it to me! I've got some experience leading a squad.

char_4071_peper.title: Depart
char_4071_peper.text: Stay safe and keep in contact. Remember, the mission comes second. Your lives come first!

char_4071_peper.title: Begin Operation
char_4071_peper.text: Let's clear the place in one fell swoop!

char_4071_peper.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4071_peper.text: Don't worry. I've been standing by here.

char_4071_peper.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4071_peper.text: I don't pick fights I can't win.

char_4071_peper.title: Deployment 1
char_4071_peper.text: Not one of you is getting away!

char_4071_peper.title: Deployment 2
char_4071_peper.text: Don't get careless just because I'm here!

char_4071_peper.title: In Battle 1
char_4071_peper.text: Everyone hanging in there?

char_4071_peper.title: In Battle 2
char_4071_peper.text: Get behind me, if you feel yourself slipping!

char_4071_peper.title: In Battle 3
char_4071_peper.text: We can't have any more casualties...

char_4071_peper.title: In Battle 4
char_4071_peper.text: You bastards... Scram! I'm busy here!

char_4071_peper.title: 4-star Result
char_4071_peper.text: You're pretty amazing, coming up with a strategy like that... I gotta say, you're a lot better than W just lobbing bombs at everything.

char_4071_peper.title: 3-star Result
char_4071_peper.text: Awesome, smooth like butter! Hehe, I didn't need any backup that time. Let's see what W and Ines have to say!

char_4071_peper.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4071_peper.text: A few footmen slipped past us, but that's no big deal, right? Yep, everyone made it out of the fight alive. I call that a big win!

char_4071_peper.title: Operation Failure
char_4071_peper.text: N-No way... Doctor, you aren't trying to hold the line here, are you? C'mon, quit spacing out. Hurry up and run!

char_4071_peper.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4071_peper.text: Rhodes Island really treats us well... Oh, don't be so humble. This is much better than the dump we used to live in!

char_4071_peper.title: Tap
char_4071_peper.text: Whoa! What's up?

char_4071_peper.title: Trust Tap
char_4071_peper.text: This poncho feels great, right? Nana knitted it for me. It's so warm.

char_4071_peper.title: Title
char_4071_peper.text: Arknights.

char_4071_peper.title: Greeting
char_4071_peper.text: Hey, Doc. What kind of missions do we have today? Oh, right. Let me get this out of the way. I'm not taking anything too crazy!

char_4072_ironmn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, do you mind me tinkering with a few things here, or would that be too much noise? Just give me a tap on the back when you want to chat, of course.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, I hear you've got a lot of books here. Could you lend me a few to read? They don't have to be on mechanical engineering, I'm plenty curious about stuff I don't know. Like this one, for instance, it's a beauty of a doorstopper... what was that? Don't touch? I-It's got a curse? Hold on, who put that on it?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: The Sarkaz deserve sympathy for what they've been through, but one man can't steal another's home for the sake of his own. Peace will come to Londinium, and I hope, one day, every wanderer gets to build a homeland. It's what Rhodes Island wants too, isn't it?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk 3
char_4072_ironmn.text: A lot of people'll say the lord nobles do nothing but cling onto the privilege and wealth they inherit, and never think to build on this land with their own hands. Me? I don't mind fighting side-by-side with nobles, just don't make me call them 'lord.'

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: I didn't used to believe things could ever really be dire. Not until an almighty enemy showed up to me, and stole my pals from me, one after the other. They all trusted me, and I failed them. Granny was right. 'Being smart isn't enough to fool death.'

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: I'm a big fan of red. It makes me think of fireplaces on freezing nights. And all the friends who've left us along the way... I'm telling you, their sacrifices meant something. Londinium will come back to us, back to our hands, and it'll be better than before.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, I find it easy to trust people, but don't take me for stupid. If you were just another lot of plotting schemers, I would've taken up arms with no hesitation. But you see, if I offer a shake when I meet someone, that's all the more likely I've got a new friend. Haha, I'm glad my bet paid off here.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: When we were on break, me and my work pals liked climbing up to the workshop ceiling. Thirty, forty-odd meters. We'd step out of the window and go jumping between buildings. Wind'd blow by with the smell of the factory heat and rust, stars'd squeeze down past the buildings and smile on me. I could feel my city in its warm embrace.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4072_ironmn.text: *sigh* It's a beauty of a place at Rhodes. I almost want to apply to stay aboard. Shame I've still got all those people and all that work waiting for me in Londinium... Doctor, when it's clear skies once more at home, how about you let me be your guide again? What do you say?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Idle
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, you must be bored out of your mind sitting at work all day. Want me to take you out for some exercise? Don't worry, no ziplines this time.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Onboard
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, we've faced so much danger together. Do we still need this paperwork to stand for us being friends? Wait, you mean once I sign, I get to take any of Engineering's beauties apart? That's a promise, you hear? 'Stainless'—done.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4072_ironmn.text: Cor, I suppose you really do make your logistics people fight too. Not that that's much of a problem... How about a little pay bump, eh?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Promotion 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: 'Top Engineering Operator?' If I want to be Chief Engineer, I'm still a few steps away, aren't I? Haha, I'm just pulling your leg. I've got no plan to jockey for Closure's living.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Promotion 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: It's a luxury now, just having free time like this to work with my drill and spanner. Doctor, thank you. I'm all willing to take to the field for my homeland and freedom. But it's you and Rhodes Island that won back this moment of refuge for me.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Added to Squad
char_4072_ironmn.text: Squad 11 of Self-Salvation Corp, joining up with Rhodes Island.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4072_ironmn.text: I'm a little nervous. Still, pressure's a good motivator, right?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Depart
char_4072_ironmn.text: Remember, everyone! Not one fewer when we come back!

char_4072_ironmn.title: Begin Operation
char_4072_ironmn.text: Hello, everyone over there, you can breathe easy. What's the line? 'I'm just your average mechanic.'

char_4072_ironmn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: About time for us to shine?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: I'll bring you back victory.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Deployment 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: Picked a good place for me.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Deployment 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: Down to work!

char_4072_ironmn.title: In Battle 1
char_4072_ironmn.text: Swing your hammers!

char_4072_ironmn.title: In Battle 2
char_4072_ironmn.text: Hold the barricades!

char_4072_ironmn.title: In Battle 3
char_4072_ironmn.text: Drill through darkness!

char_4072_ironmn.title: In Battle 4
char_4072_ironmn.text: Fight for Londinium! Victory to Londiniers!

char_4072_ironmn.title: 4-star Result
char_4072_ironmn.text: We'll come together, we'll fight all the way, for this city we stand on, until we fall.

char_4072_ironmn.title: 3-star Result
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, with you for company all the time, I start imagining I fight even better than the mercs. Don't you let me get too cocky. If Granny and Rockrock saw, they'd be knocking on my head with spanners.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4072_ironmn.text: Hah... haha, made it through another battle. Hard as nails, though. Don't look so glum, Doctor. I know it's back to the Commander for a tactical meeting, but how about a bite to eat before then?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Operation Failure
char_4072_ironmn.text: Time to scram, Doctor. The zipline's ready. Give me your hand! It's only a win once you survive.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4072_ironmn.text: So it wasn't Victoria with the best construction technology.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Tap
char_4072_ironmn.text: Watch it! Drill didn't hurt you, did it?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Trust Tap
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, you always show up where I wasn't looking. I bet Rhodes Island has secret passages too, doesn't it?

char_4072_ironmn.title: Title
char_4072_ironmn.text: Arknights.

char_4072_ironmn.title: Greeting
char_4072_ironmn.text: Doctor, I'm just back from patrol. Safe as houses all around! You can break for a bit longer. The tenser the state of things, the more you need a proper stretch now and then.

char_4063_quartz.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4063_quartz.text: I'm not so good at desk work, but if all you need is someone to stay by your side and help you arrange your tasks and schedule... I can give it a shot, perhaps.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk 1
char_4063_quartz.text: This pocket watch? My father gave it to me before he left home. It's nothing fancy, but it keeps time if you keep the movement and dial maintained… Uh, Doctor, is there anyone at Rhodes Island who can fix watches?

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk 2
char_4063_quartz.text: Out in the field, you can leave the cooking to me. That's what they had me doing back in the Columbian barrenlands. I can't promise, you know that, it's gonna taste very good… But at least it won't give you a stomachache.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk 3
char_4063_quartz.text: Back when I was with the Pioneer Team, the company left us undersupplied, and we did not take that sitting down. We ended up escaping into the barrelands. That's when I got this scar on my eye. It's not a disgrace, but it's not a badge of honor either. It's just the kind of bad luck that us regular Columbians deal with all the time. Mine's just a little more obvious than others.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4063_quartz.text: Planning your time and planning your life couldn't be more different. When you're eking out a living, you've got no choice but to use every last second. Even when you space out, you have to keep an eye on the clock. On the other hand, to plan out your life, you need enough time to think and feel. Those aren't contradictory. It's just the second one's more of a luxury to most people.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4063_quartz.text: Is my sword heavy? You bet it is. But I need a heavy one to protect my friends and defend our overdue freedom. The truer the weight I carry is, the mightier I can wield it... And when I'm hurt, it also comes in handy as a walking stick.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4063_quartz.text: When my mother died, I didn't even get to mourn her. I had a huge pile of medical debt waiting for me to pay off. Why did I join the Pioneer Team, and why did I become a merc? It's not like I had other options. But I came to Rhodes Island after giving it serious thought.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4063_quartz.text: A free mercenary only takes a mission she thinks is worth the time. There was this one night when I was sitting by the fire, affixing some beast teeth to my sword. My friends were sleeping, and the only sound in the air was my watch ticking away. Time is always on my mind, but that was the first time I really felt its passing.

char_4063_quartz.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4063_quartz.text: The mercenary crew I joined was doomed to disband, sooner or later. Without a clear goal and strict discipline, you can't survive in the wilderness… Maybe only an organization like Rhodes Island can really protect what's beautiful out there. I'm thankful that I could come here.

char_4063_quartz.title: Idle
char_4063_quartz.text: Doctor, if you don't need anything from me, I'll just zone out here for a bit... Feel free to talk to me anytime you need me.

char_4063_quartz.title: Onboard
char_4063_quartz.text: Hello, Doctor. I'm Quartz... I think I'm on time.

char_4063_quartz.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4063_quartz.text: I wish our squad could've fought like this back there.

char_4063_quartz.title: Promotion 1
char_4063_quartz.text: Thanks for your recognition, but remember to tell me if there's anything I can improve on.

char_4063_quartz.title: Promotion 2
char_4063_quartz.text: Rhodes Island's promotion process and standards are pretty transparent. That's not easy to do.

char_4063_quartz.title: Added to Squad
char_4063_quartz.text: Hope I can help.

char_4063_quartz.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4063_quartz.text: Don't worry. I think my decisions through.

char_4063_quartz.title: Depart
char_4063_quartz.text: I propose we begin our operation at the top of the hour. It'll be easier to keep track of time.

char_4063_quartz.title: Begin Operation
char_4063_quartz.text: Hide, and make sure to put out the cooking fire.

char_4063_quartz.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4063_quartz.text: Doctor, I'm in position.

char_4063_quartz.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4063_quartz.text: Sheathe my weapon for the time being? Then my sword…

char_4063_quartz.title: Deployment 1
char_4063_quartz.text: Perfect timing!

char_4063_quartz.title: Deployment 2
char_4063_quartz.text: A bit late, not a big problem.

char_4063_quartz.title: In Battle 1
char_4063_quartz.text: Time your strike. It's more important than brute strength.

char_4063_quartz.title: In Battle 2
char_4063_quartz.text: Keep your distance. I only want to strike the enemy.

char_4063_quartz.title: In Battle 3
char_4063_quartz.text: You're staring at my eyepatch, it reveals a lot.

char_4063_quartz.title: In Battle 4
char_4063_quartz.text: Take this!

char_4063_quartz.title: 4-star Result
char_4063_quartz.text: When every phase of the mission proceeds with watchlike precision, victory is assured.

char_4063_quartz.title: 3-star Result
char_4063_quartz.text: This is worth celebrating... When we get back to Rhodes Island, we won't have to eat my cooking anymore.

char_4063_quartz.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4063_quartz.text: Even the most accurate of watches isn't always accurate. Don't be so fixated on perfection

char_4063_quartz.title: Operation Failure
char_4063_quartz.text: Sorry, Doctor, we had a few problems with the plan because my watch is broken. Go, and leave the rest to me.

char_4063_quartz.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4063_quartz.text: This is much more comfortable than a tent in the wilderness... Will someone stand watch at night?

char_4063_quartz.title: Tap
char_4063_quartz.text: Oh, Doctor. What's the matter?

char_4063_quartz.title: Trust Tap
char_4063_quartz.text: Let's space out together, Doctor. We can chill for as long as we need... No need to watch the clock like we used to.

char_4063_quartz.title: Title
char_4063_quartz.text: Arknights.

char_4063_quartz.title: Greeting
char_4063_quartz.text: Hello, Doctor. Careful. You almost bumped into my sword.

char_466_qanik.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_466_qanik.text: Doctor! Do you want these files here? A Liberi lady just taught me how to use a printer! Look, I even learned how to print on both sides! This needs to be single-sided? Uh-oh, sorry! I'll print it again!

char_466_qanik.title: Talk 1
char_466_qanik.text: My mother has gotten a lot better. That time, even divination showed a dark future. If not for the medical equipment we got from the explorers, she might have left us... Since then, I decided to go out into the world. I hope to bring more equipment like that back to the village.

char_466_qanik.title: Talk 2
char_466_qanik.text: I'm really grateful to Magallan. We've only met a few times during search and rescue operations, but she put me in touch with Rhodes Island after hearing my situation. And she's an incredible lady. Not many people dare to explore the ice fields like her. Even people in our tribe seldom set foot there. It's a place that's feared and revered.

char_466_qanik.title: Talk 3
char_466_qanik.text: I'm part of my tribe's rescue team, helping people who accidentally wander into the bog, or get lost in the snowstorms. That's how I met a lot of explorers from Columbia. Woah, Doctor, how did you know they always compliment my tail?

char_466_qanik.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_466_qanik.text: I never thought I would leave the tribe and come here. I was never interested in things from the outside world. But that shiny medical equipment blew me away. They went against our divination. That's a miracle to me.

char_466_qanik.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_466_qanik.text: The explorers told me things I've never heard before, about 'corporations', 'timetables', 'entrepot'... we don't even have these words because we've never had a use for them. But I learned them quickly, thanks to my conversations with the explorers.

char_466_qanik.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_466_qanik.text: Can I see the future like Gitano? I suppose I could divine your future, but I'm not great at it. If you really want me to tell your fortune for the day, let's see... Okay, it says... the stars will fall from the sky, and eggplant must go on top of rice.

char_466_qanik.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_466_qanik.text: Doctor, Accounting says my 'reimbursement claim' has been delayed. What does 'reimbursement claim' mean? Sorry, but there's still so much I don't understand about paperwork…

char_466_qanik.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_466_qanik.text: Doctor! I'm back from my field mission! We delivered some equipment to my tribe and taught them how to use it. Turns out aunt's leg pains were caused by bone spurs. Now that we know how to treat it, she won't have to rely on my cousin's Arts to relieve the pain.

char_466_qanik.title: Idle
char_466_qanik.text: Oh, the phone is ringing! What did the Doctor say I should do in this situation… Okay... He-hello? Um, nice to hear you. This is the Doctor's office.

char_466_qanik.title: Onboard
char_466_qanik.text: I forgot to ask the Perro man what I should call you. I only learned the word 'company' from the Columbians. Do you have a name? Oh, just 'Doctor'? I can do that!

char_466_qanik.title: Watching Battle Record
char_466_qanik.text: Is this one of your technologies? How do you manage to record everything like that?

char_466_qanik.title: Promotion 1
char_466_qanik.text: Doctor, is this what you call a 'contract'? It's very difficult to understand. Do I have to sign it? You say if I don't sign it, I'll be forced to work day and night by a cruel boss? But Doctor, you are not cruel… What? What do you mean don't be so sure?

char_466_qanik.title: Promotion 2
char_466_qanik.text: I won't make a fool of myself like before, Doctor! You've helped me so much. My mother's getting better, and my tribe is learning to use Rhodes Island medical equipment. I hope I can do even more for them in the future.

char_466_qanik.title: Added to Squad
char_466_qanik.text: Don't worry, I've been on a lot of rescue operations.

char_466_qanik.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_466_qanik.text: Everyone, follow my orders and don't run off on your own.

char_466_qanik.title: Depart
char_466_qanik.text: Begin rescue operation!

char_466_qanik.title: Begin Operation
char_466_qanik.text: Make sure you're well-prepared. That's the foundation of a successful rescue.

char_466_qanik.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_466_qanik.text: A new rescue objective?

char_466_qanik.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_466_qanik.text: I have the map here.

char_466_qanik.title: Deployment 1
char_466_qanik.text: Don't worry, help is on the way.

char_466_qanik.title: Deployment 2
char_466_qanik.text: Please save your strength, we will get you out!

char_466_qanik.title: In Battle 1
char_466_qanik.text: Rescue targets identified.

char_466_qanik.title: In Battle 2
char_466_qanik.text: Rescue location confirmed.

char_466_qanik.title: In Battle 3
char_466_qanik.text: Formulating a rescue plan.

char_466_qanik.title: In Battle 4
char_466_qanik.text: Don't worry. You're going to be fine!

char_466_qanik.title: 4-star Result
char_466_qanik.text: I was nervous, but my experience really came in handy!

char_466_qanik.title: 3-star Result
char_466_qanik.text: A well-planned and well-executed rescue operation, our target has been brought to safety.

char_466_qanik.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_466_qanik.text: The victim was injured… Don't worry, I'll ease the pain for you.

char_466_qanik.title: Operation Failure
char_466_qanik.text: Over here! We need backup!

char_466_qanik.title: Assigned to Facility
char_466_qanik.text: Oh, so this is where I'm supposed to use this 'access card.'

char_466_qanik.title: Tap
char_466_qanik.text: Oh!

char_466_qanik.title: Trust Tap
char_466_qanik.text: Doctor, you don't really want me to divine your future, do you?

char_466_qanik.title: Title
char_466_qanik.text: Arknights.

char_466_qanik.title: Greeting
char_466_qanik.text: Boo! Did that scare you? Not at all? Aw, I used to spook lots of people in the snow.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4014_lunacu.text: Assistant? File Work? Not sure I followed. Anyway, I found a nice-looking mountain with a great view the other day. Want to see it?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: This makes no sense. Why did you build so many walls and corridors? They block your vision. A mad burdenbeast could crash into this little room without any warning, and you don't seem to be a bit conerned. Danger can be prowling at any corner and you must stay on your guard. That's what Agnese taught me.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: You call the outside 'the wilds', but you can find everything out there. Put in a little effort and you'll find food and water just fine. But in the city, there are no places to hunt. How do you even survive?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk 3
char_4014_lunacu.text: Um, Doctor, have you ever been to one of those 'parties' Exusiai talks about? They're scary! Those little balls of exploded plant seeds, those sweet, smooth milk puffs! Listen, this is not how you should live... What? They're having another party today? I wanna go.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: Agnese told about a dangerous scent on Rhodes Island, but she and the pack would stay with me. Hmm? You can't see her? But she was just here a moment ago... Maybe she went to go get food?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: The man named Bernardo died, and Zaaro ran back to his territory with his tail between his legs... Seems like the hunt Agnese told us about is in the bag. But still she doesn't look happy. Why? The pack has more than enough food.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: Can I get a couple extra sets of Rhodes Island clothes? They're well-made, very warm, make good tents, and you can tear them up for bandages. No? Awww… Then how about the storage depot? I'd like to go and... uhh, take a look around.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: Doctor, Agnese spoke highly of you, and told me to learn from your 'cunning.' What does cunning mean? Oh! Is it cunning when you hide here by yourself, eating in secret, not sharing with anyone else? I don't think that's hard to do.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4014_lunacu.text: Recently, I've started thinking that maybe life under a roof isn't so bad. Here, you are not a pack, you don't group up and subject yourself to one another. You're, well, something strange... Ugh! It doesn't make any sense! Anyways, I'll stay here a few more days! So get me something good to eat!

char_4014_lunacu.title: Idle
char_4014_lunacu.text: Asleep? That means nothing for me to do? Agnese, let's go play outside.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Onboard
char_4014_lunacu.text: Agnese called me Lunacub, so you can call me that too. I heard there's a 'canteen' place here, where you can eat whatever you want. Is that true? Where is it? Can I go there right now?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4014_lunacu.text: Too much trouble! Hunting really isn't that complicated.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Promotion 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: A promotion? Does that mean you'll listen to me? How many of these shiny... 'medals' does it take for you to obey me?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Promotion 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: Agnese always tells me that humans are dangerous and cunning, their bellies full and hearts wicked, but you've proved you are different. You are allowed to join my pack.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Added to Squad
char_4014_lunacu.text: I still prefer hunting with my pack. They are much more open than humans.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4014_lunacu.text: Since I'm the luna wolf, you all must listen to me. I'll make it clear first: if I don't see your fangs bared in the hunt, you won't get a share of the kill.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Depart
char_4014_lunacu.text: How much will we bring back today?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Begin Operation
char_4014_lunacu.text: The hunt begins.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: My fangs are sharp.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: Where are the idiots who came to die?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Deployment 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: Hurry, the pack and I are waiting.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Deployment 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: Patience is key.

char_4014_lunacu.title: In Battle 1
char_4014_lunacu.text: Pipe down already! I'm not going to miss!

char_4014_lunacu.title: In Battle 2
char_4014_lunacu.text: Take down their packleader!

char_4014_lunacu.title: In Battle 3
char_4014_lunacu.text: Drive them into a corner!

char_4014_lunacu.title: In Battle 4
char_4014_lunacu.text: Stupid burdenbeast, you're not getting away!

char_4014_lunacu.title: 4-star Result
char_4014_lunacu.text: Good hunt. If you lived in the wild, I'm sure you would survive for long.

char_4014_lunacu.title: 3-star Result
char_4014_lunacu.text: Tired. Already did what you asked me. Can I go eat now? What's on the menu today?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4014_lunacu.text: Hey! Some of them just got away! Do you even know how to keep the prey surrounded? I'm gonna teach you next time!

char_4014_lunacu.title: Operation Failure
char_4014_lunacu.text: Grr... Agnese, the hunt failed. Come help us! Don't let this idiot die here!

char_4014_lunacu.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4014_lunacu.text: I don't like roofs.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Tap
char_4014_lunacu.text: Don't scare me like that! You wanna die?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Trust Tap
char_4014_lunacu.text: Hey, Doctor, don't you get tired of staying in these little cubes every day?

char_4014_lunacu.title: Title
char_4014_lunacu.text: Arknights.

char_4014_lunacu.title: Greeting
char_4014_lunacu.text: What took you so long? Next time you make me wait for you in a stuffy little box, don't blame me if I get a little rude.

char_427_vigil.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_427_vigil.text: Organizing documents? Doctor, we have much more important things to do. Bene, I'll give you a hand, if you insist. But do remember, I expect you to come up with a plan that's worth my while. Do not disappoint me.

char_427_vigil.title: Talk 1
char_427_vigil.text: What do you want to know? Secrets of the Siracusan famiglie? There's hardly anything worth mentioning there. The things we do are no different from the wolves fighting in the wilderness thousands of years ago. Only, time has taught us some new tricks. Heh, you see 'order' could be the official name for 'tearing your prey to pieces.'

char_427_vigil.title: Talk 2
char_427_vigil.text: For many years, I couldn't really understand my father. He paid the ultimate price, only to betray almost everything in the end... But I still remember the question my father posed to me many years ago, when we were sitting together in a park: 'Siracusa, sara un posto migliore senza le famiglie?'

char_427_vigil.title: Talk 3
char_427_vigil.text: Judge Lavinia never realized what she was getting herself into. The game with Signora Sicilia won't be won through courage or resourcefulness alone... She's looking for me? To discuss my unbalanced diet…? Tell her I'm not here.

char_427_vigil.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_427_vigil.text: The old ways make it impossible to find a new path. If the new Siracusa is built on violence, it will fall back into the same well. The destruction of a few individual famiglie is far, far from enough. We must kick the entire 'habit.'

char_427_vigil.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_427_vigil.text: The disputes among the famiglie were petty and stupid. The dons clung on to whatever authority they had, thinking they were the masters of Siracusa. But I invite you, Doctor, to join me in shaping a new era.

char_427_vigil.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_427_vigil.text: If you want to show respect to the Siracusans, then hire a proper Siracusan chef. The next time I see any 'innovative Siracusan cuisine' out of your minions... Beh, let's just say somebody knows about your little office naps, and it'd be a shame if the beans got spilled on your beauty sleep.

char_427_vigil.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_427_vigil.text: Something on your mind? If it calls for blackmail, bribery, or something worse... none of that would be much trouble for me. Underhanded business is pretty much all I inherited from my famiglia. As for how to use my knowledge, that's your call.

char_427_vigil.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_427_vigil.text: Zaaro, il Signore dei Lupi... the shadow lurking behind me and my father. Don't be fooled by his pretentious words. A wild beast's hunt won't slow the progress of humanity. If he appears before you one day, I will drive him away.

char_427_vigil.title: Idle
char_427_vigil.text: Hey. Is our 'cooperation' just me watching you sleep?

char_427_vigil.title: Onboard
char_427_vigil.text: Buongiorno, Doctor. I am Famiglia Bellone's... Lasci perdere. My famiglia doesn't exist anymore, but that was the price we paid to buy change in Siracusa. As for what comes next... Operator Vigil is at your service, Doctor. I hope our partnership will be productive.

char_427_vigil.title: Watching Battle Record
char_427_vigil.text: I am no stranger to violence. As long as I'm on the scene, things should be a little more efficient.

char_427_vigil.title: Promotion 1
char_427_vigil.text: A promotion? There's no need to test me like that, Doctor. I've played this game too... winning people over with small rewards. But if you're just trying to show your faith in me... Va bene, grazie.

char_427_vigil.title: Promotion 2
char_427_vigil.text: Our partnership has been productive, Doctor. A made man would sell out anybody for his ambitions, but I can promise you one thing: you've bought my loyalty with yours.

char_427_vigil.title: Added to Squad
char_427_vigil.text: Va bene. Let's see if your plan is worthy of my work.

char_427_vigil.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_427_vigil.text: The process is just as important as the end result. Don't go dying on me, ragazzi.

char_427_vigil.title: Depart
char_427_vigil.text: Remember, our purpose is not violence itself, but rather the victory it brings.

char_427_vigil.title: Begin Operation
char_427_vigil.text: Chi morirà qui oggi?

char_427_vigil.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_427_vigil.text: Ready to move.

char_427_vigil.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_427_vigil.text: They'll be sleeping with the fins in no time.

char_427_vigil.title: Deployment 1
char_427_vigil.text: Don't make this harder than it needs to be.

char_427_vigil.title: Deployment 2
char_427_vigil.text: Anything outside the plan, I'll judge for myself.

char_427_vigil.title: In Battle 1
char_427_vigil.text: Let's put an end to this show, pronto.

char_427_vigil.title: In Battle 2
char_427_vigil.text: And what purpose do you think your sacrifice will serve?

char_427_vigil.title: In Battle 3
char_427_vigil.text: This hunt has dragged on for too long.

char_427_vigil.title: In Battle 4
char_427_vigil.text: A valiant struggle, but you won't get away.

char_427_vigil.title: 4-star Result
char_427_vigil.text: They have no idea who they're messing with. Bravo, Doctor. I was right to partner with you. I hope you'll find even more challenges for me in the next battle.

char_427_vigil.title: 3-star Result
char_427_vigil.text: Are we done yet? What are you looking all smug for? These stronzi have already wasted too much of our time.

char_427_vigil.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_427_vigil.text: They're getting away. Do you need me to walk you through this? Ma dai! Whack them already.

char_427_vigil.title: Operation Failure
char_427_vigil.text: I'll take care of the evacuation. You get moving, fast. I hope this won't happen again, Doctor.

char_427_vigil.title: Assigned to Facility
char_427_vigil.text: Careful with the moisture-proofing. I hate the smell of rotting wood.

char_427_vigil.title: Tap
char_427_vigil.text: Are you having fun? Because I'm not.

char_427_vigil.title: Trust Tap
char_427_vigil.text: Ah... Mi mancano le osterie di Siracusa. Doctor, is the kitchen available right now? I can make something myself.

char_427_vigil.title: Title
char_427_vigil.text: Arknights.

char_427_vigil.title: Greeting
char_427_vigil.text: None of these documents matter at all, Doctor. The only thing that matters is how you act.

char_4065_judge.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4065_judge.text: It's been a long time since I've felt like there was any conviction or meaning in my work. Rather than sit through show trial after show trial, I prefer to wade through these thorny, complicated files.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk 1
char_4065_judge.text: You don't have to tiptoe around me. I don't judge good or evil on any ironclad law. And with all the crimes staged in the name of order… Ah, pay no mind to this judge's grumble, a powerless judge waiting to be indicted for misconduct in office.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk 2
char_4065_judge.text: The thorns on this codex? Yes, of course the spikes hurt, but I wish for the pain to remind me: No matter how weak the statutes in Siracusa, no matter how highly I think of my calling, perversion of justice and blasphemy against the law are crimes.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk 3
char_4065_judge.text: They say 'the law is the basis of morality,' but that's not a natural truth. It emerges from a consensus of the people. When the people come to see violence as order, the law is nothing but a fantasy to dream of. And I, as the keeper of that fantasy, am the most ridiculous of all.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4065_judge.text: In Siracusa, being a city court judge is a dangerous job. Either you join 'them,' or... you disappear. I thought I could strike a balance between the two, but there's no way to stay clean when you're surrounded by mud. In the end, I was just another accomplice.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4065_judge.text: Maybe Siracusa really is that hard to change. The gangs, the famiglie... They shared a womb with Siracusa and shaped it into the country it is today. But we can't take them for granted. We must believe that a different path exists.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4065_judge.text: Oh, mi dispiace, I didn't see you there. If you're all done with work, how about joining me for a drink?… Why that look in your eyes? I'm not an alcoholic. But everyone needs some liquid assistance every now and then, whether for fatigue or for suffering. Ecco. It's on the strong side, so sip slowly.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4065_judge.text: If you ever get a chance to visit Siracusa, please avoid the rainy season. However, if you really are that unfortunate... best thing you can do is find a little shop on the street and sit for a while. Maybe only after the rain can one enjoy the momentary illusion that the city is clean.

char_4065_judge.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4065_judge.text: In my many years as a judge, I've only handed down a few verdicts I could feel good about. I still remember the look on those two kids' faces when I broke up their little scuffle and told the aggressor to apologize. What, why are you laughing? Even the greatest justice must start from somewhere small.

char_4065_judge.title: Idle
char_4065_judge.text: You're sleeping? There's nothing more valuable than these rare moments of peace. Conserviamo questi momenti.

char_4065_judge.title: Onboard
char_4065_judge.text: I am Lavinia Falcone, formerly a judge of Siracusa. Today, I report to you as Operator Penance. I hope that in working for Rhodes Island, I can absolve myself of my past mistakes.

char_4065_judge.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4065_judge.text: So much violence in the name of order... Doctor, I can only pray that your efforts are more than futile.

char_4065_judge.title: Promotion 1
char_4065_judge.text: I am honored to earn your support. We can certainly work together and offer mutual assistance, but let me be frank — that doesn't mean you can influence my decisions. Sorry, no offense intended, but that's a lesson I learned the hard way.

char_4065_judge.title: Promotion 2
char_4065_judge.text: Be it a famiglia, a society, or a country, people are often bound by mutual interest... I used to assume this was the way of the world, but Doctor, you showed me a different path. I hope we can share this mutual trust long into the future.

char_4065_judge.title: Added to Squad
char_4065_judge.text: Sitting around in an office won't bring about justice. That's one thing I know for a fact.

char_4065_judge.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4065_judge.text: Whether or not you are burdened by a criminal record is unimportant to me. All I ask is that in this coming battle, our goals might be aligned.

char_4065_judge.title: Depart
char_4065_judge.text: Contempt for the law is a crime. The words of my codex will prove their own worth.

char_4065_judge.title: Begin Operation
char_4065_judge.text: This time, I will hand down a fair verdict.

char_4065_judge.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4065_judge.text: No matter what I might encounter, I will not back down.

char_4065_judge.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4065_judge.text: What the law does not specify, I will reveal through practice.

char_4065_judge.title: Deployment 1
char_4065_judge.text: This gavel of justice is weighty. Spero che siate pronti.

char_4065_judge.title: Deployment 2
char_4065_judge.text: I am fighting for more than just the law. Also the justice and virtue that extend beyond it.

char_4065_judge.title: In Battle 1
char_4065_judge.text: The law is a means, not an end.

char_4065_judge.title: In Battle 2
char_4065_judge.text: There is no such thing as absolute justice, but I still invoke it!

char_4065_judge.title: In Battle 3
char_4065_judge.text: Can crimes be punished through methods outside of the law?

char_4065_judge.title: In Battle 4
char_4065_judge.text: Your crimes are irrefutable.

char_4065_judge.title: 4-star Result
char_4065_judge.text: Even a crime-ridden swamp is not beyond salvation. Doctor, thank you for once again reminding me of this fact.

char_4065_judge.title: 3-star Result
char_4065_judge.text: A trial in all its vaunted glory will not bring about any substantive change. It matters more what we do after the trial. Doctor, I've seen what you've done, and find it praiseworthy.

char_4065_judge.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4065_judge.text: Doctor, prepare a team to arrest the fugitives. There is no difference between a moment of mercy and a miscarriage of justice. They have not yet been read their verdict.

char_4065_judge.title: Operation Failure
char_4065_judge.text: Naturally, they and the darkness behind them will occasionally prevail... But mark my words, even the most frustrating rainy season will pass in time. Until then, all we can do is persevere, and keep trying.

char_4065_judge.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4065_judge.text: This place is nothing like stagnant, old Siracusa. The breath of hope flows here.

char_4065_judge.title: Tap
char_4065_judge.text: Please show proper respect.

char_4065_judge.title: Trust Tap
char_4065_judge.text: Are you here to discuss criminal procedure with me? No? Eccellente. I hope you never need my knowledge in that regard.

char_4065_judge.title: Title
char_4065_judge.text: Arknights.

char_4065_judge.title: Greeting
char_4065_judge.text: Doctor, I've categorized these documents according to their importance. Let me remind you that some of your operations land in a legal gray zone. I'm not opposed to them, but you need to think things through. I'll offer my advice as well.

char_1028_texas2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1028_texas2.text: I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times, Doctor. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk 1
char_1028_texas2.text: How does it feel to be back in Siracusa? Not great. It's for wise guys and famiglie, not me. I'm only staying long enough to cut ties with the past. After I'm done washing my hands of the whole business, I'm heading back to Lungmen to pick up the girls, and then going out for a nice drive.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk 2
char_1028_texas2.text: I didn't want to get Penguin Logistics involved, but it was a relief to see them in Siracusa. My noisy friends, that life of freedom... Looking back now, staying with them in Lungmen was the best decision I ever made. Just, don't tell them I said that.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk 3
char_1028_texas2.text: Sometimes I hear Siracusans talking about the downfall of Famiglia Texas. No two versions of the story are the same. Most are pretty dull, and some make for interesting fairytales, but in the end, they're all pretty embellished. The real story is... I just got exhausted, and decided to leave.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1028_texas2.text: Ever noticed how even the rain here stains the walls outside? Dirty rainwater can't wash anything clean. And that's Siracusa. Siracusans might be used to it, but I'm not.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1028_texas2.text: I've got no interest in joining Greyhall. The dons sit in their chairs, acting all high and mighty, hiding their plans. I decided to confront Signora Sicilia because she thinks she can tame everyone, and that's one thing I can't stand.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1028_texas2.text: I saw Lappland in Siracusa. Oh, you haven't seen her in a while? Not like she needs anyone worrying about her. If she's over me now, she'll find something else to cut. As for the score we haven't settled, I say it doesn't matter. We'll meet again soon enough.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1028_texas2.text: I was born in Columbia, but my grandfather wanted me to become a proper mafiosa and sent me to Siracusa to learn the trade. But to this day I don't understand why the people here like macaroni so much? I used to go to this little place for macaroni myself, but it closed down a long time ago. The owner died in a back alley.

char_1028_texas2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1028_texas2.text: In Siracusa, there were a whole lot of people trying to guess what I'd do. It wasn't that complicated. I was there to do what I had to do, and help those who deserved help. Doctor, all I ask is that we continue to get along just like we used to. This relationship, built on real trust, is hard to find there.

char_1028_texas2.title: Idle
char_1028_texas2.text: It's quiet here. No hitmen haunting the shadows, no wolves waiting in the alleys.

char_1028_texas2.title: Onboard
char_1028_texas2.text: We meet again, Doctor. The Siracusan rainy season always gets my tail wet, so I prefer the climate here. Don't worry, Exusiai and the girls will keep taking care of the deliveries, but I'll handle any jobs assigned to me personally.

char_1028_texas2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1028_texas2.text: Thanks. Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.

char_1028_texas2.title: Promotion 1
char_1028_texas2.text: I'm not helping you for the money, Doctor. But still, go ahead and send my salary over to Penguin Logistics as usual. I'll pick it up from Emperor.

char_1028_texas2.title: Promotion 2
char_1028_texas2.text: I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.

char_1028_texas2.title: Added to Squad
char_1028_texas2.text: Order confirmed, crystal clear.

char_1028_texas2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1028_texas2.text: Alright. Try to keep up. Let me know if you can't.

char_1028_texas2.title: Depart
char_1028_texas2.text: No need to make a scene.

char_1028_texas2.title: Begin Operation
char_1028_texas2.text: Don't leave bloodstains. They're hard to clean.

char_1028_texas2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1028_texas2.text: Moving to designated location.

char_1028_texas2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1028_texas2.text: Need speed to succeed.

char_1028_texas2.title: Deployment 1
char_1028_texas2.text: Got a problem that needs solving?

char_1028_texas2.title: Deployment 2
char_1028_texas2.text: I see them. I'll be right back.

char_1028_texas2.title: In Battle 1
char_1028_texas2.text: Bad luck, you ran into me.

char_1028_texas2.title: In Battle 2
char_1028_texas2.text: You saw nothing.

char_1028_texas2.title: In Battle 3
char_1028_texas2.text: Pass on your last words? No.

char_1028_texas2.title: In Battle 4
char_1028_texas2.text: This will keep you quiet.

char_1028_texas2.title: 4-star Result
char_1028_texas2.text: The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.

char_1028_texas2.title: 3-star Result
char_1028_texas2.text: A battle without an explosion or cheering makes me feel a little uneasy. Let's head back. A drink? Maybe next time.

char_1028_texas2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1028_texas2.text: There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?

char_1028_texas2.title: Operation Failure
char_1028_texas2.text: I can take out a few more. You go ahead and retreat.

char_1028_texas2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1028_texas2.text: This place reminds me of Lungmen. It's quiet. Doesn't have the constant pitter patter of the rain.

char_1028_texas2.title: Tap
char_1028_texas2.text: Hey. Stop it.

char_1028_texas2.title: Trust Tap
char_1028_texas2.text: Doctor, where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.

char_1028_texas2.title: Title
char_1028_texas2.text: Arknights.

char_1028_texas2.title: Greeting
char_1028_texas2.text: Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?

char_4017_puzzle.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4017_puzzle.text: Sorting files, serving tea, and transcribing meetings? Of course, I'm at your disposal... Come to think of it, in my first mission, I also approached the target under the guise of a secretary. One week later, I'd hollowed them of all valuable intel, and torn their influence down to rubble.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: If you don't trust me, you have permission to search my briefcase, and ascertain whether any data inside is critical to Rhodes Island. The Curio Collector's Guide to Antique Appraisal? Learning material for skills required under certain guises—nothing more, certainly not a personal interest. Pardon me if you wanted specifics, but no comment.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: The Dublinn Feline, name of Harmonie. Her plan had a lot of moving parts, and almost went off without a hitch—shame she still left an opening. Even your smallest mistake can have irredeemable consequences, such is the cutthroat nature of intelligence work. Yes? Do I consider her an enemy? Hardly; there is no value in a spy whose identity is exposed.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk 3
char_4017_puzzle.text: I'm working on a puzzle... Sorry, please be quiet for a while; your voice is disturbing the pieces. A puzzle's answer is unique; do you solve it through incessant trial-and-error, or through calm analysis and a hold of every detail? Only morons would elect for the former... Well then, did you need me for something?

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Inside the aristocrat's ballroom, you need to mind every gaze, to pry into or guard against one another. That is the battlefield the spy roams. It demands of us the proficiency to cruise through it, but I highly doubt anyone truly enjoys it.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: I rarely make decisions based on emotion, but my saving a completely unrelated civilian was out of fear, it's true. It didn't amount to a mistake, Doctor, and it won't impact anything... War only showed me some of its spiny thorns, but I know It will crush every emotion we feel and every concept we hold

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Rhodes Island's doctors constantly limit my usage of Originium Arts. Aside from ensuring my condition doesn't worsen, they must be concerned that I'll cause some sort of uncontrollable accident... You can put your worries to rest, I know my limits. But nevertheless, thank you for caring.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: It was on a mission that an unanticipated explosion infected me with Oripathy. Of course, that mission was still a success... Why didn't I take cover? Doctor, a variable like that could impact the entire operation. But we could also accept it, and implement it as part of the plan.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4017_puzzle.text: Thanks to work reasons, I've met quite a few people as unique and interesting as you. And for those same work reasons, the 'me' they got to know has vanished. Is it a shame? No, it's just the piecing of a new puzzle. All that said, I don't plan to ditch my current codename, for the time being.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Idle
char_4017_puzzle.text: No pending intelligence work for the moment... What a rare break.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Onboard
char_4017_puzzle.text: You'll have received personal correspondence from the Duke. I'll be stationed and active aboard under the codename Puzzle. No need to bother investigating me; I've handed you all personal information that's been made public.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4017_puzzle.text: This deployment is somewhat sloppy... or does it speak to your confidence in their individual abilities?

char_4017_puzzle.title: Promotion 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Doctor, you need caution when promoting intelligence workers. It may well add danger to your situation... But I'll let this one pass, seeing as you're affirming my work ability with it.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Promotion 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: The last promotion wasn't that long ago... I appreciate your trust. Of course, if Rhodes Island is wishing to work on closer terms with any nobility I serve, I'd be willing to pass on the message.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Added to Squad
char_4017_puzzle.text: Doctor, my public activity with Rhodes Island is better kept on the minimal end.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4017_puzzle.text: An intelligence worker in this position is barely a good fit... I have no reason to decline, naturally, if you have your own considerations.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Depart
char_4017_puzzle.text: Do you need me to tell you all, you seem like a pack of children at a holiday camp?

char_4017_puzzle.title: Begin Operation
char_4017_puzzle.text: Within expectations.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Let's establish a code.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: The intel work began long beforehand.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Deployment 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Probing the enemy's weak points, posthaste.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Deployment 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: Be ready at a moment's notice for the info I send back.

char_4017_puzzle.title: In Battle 1
char_4017_puzzle.text: Don't leave it written across your face.

char_4017_puzzle.title: In Battle 2
char_4017_puzzle.text: Every look you take has value.

char_4017_puzzle.title: In Battle 3
char_4017_puzzle.text: Every expression you make is an opening.

char_4017_puzzle.title: In Battle 4
char_4017_puzzle.text: I can read you like an open book.

char_4017_puzzle.title: 4-star Result
char_4017_puzzle.text: Such adaptability and command proficiency... I'm all too glad you're not my target.

char_4017_puzzle.title: 3-star Result
char_4017_puzzle.text: Intelligence is the invisible scaffold, each battle merely following whatever course it lays out. With the boon of our preceding work, this victory should come as little surprise, Doctor.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4017_puzzle.text: Check for lost weaponry, cover all tracks, don't let anyone in the future discover what happened here.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Operation Failure
char_4017_puzzle.text: A comprehensive plan must include a contingency for failure at every step. We're prepared, so evacuate ASAP... wait, destroy this intel before we leave.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4017_puzzle.text: If certain Victorian nobles decorated their residences the way you do, my work would be more than twice as difficult.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Tap
char_4017_puzzle.text: That's extremely rude.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Trust Tap
char_4017_puzzle.text: I was out of practice with a few skills—it seems I can revise here.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Title
char_4017_puzzle.text: Arknights.

char_4017_puzzle.title: Greeting
char_4017_puzzle.text: Oh, I see it's you again, Doctor.

char_297_hamoni.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_297_hamoni.text: If you didn't have the time to get to all these files, why didn't you come ask me for help? I would've been more than glad.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Don't worry, there wouldn't be anything in it for me if I left Rhodes Island, at this point. You're free to get up to whatever it is you usually do, never mind the fact I'm here. And as recompense for your trust, I won't leak a single detail of your work. Now come on, chop-chop. I'm deathly concerned for you, what with that doorstopper of a document.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk 2
char_297_hamoni.text: 'Darling Rita.' I assume you're curious, if you bring it up? You know those certain few students who always leave their mark on you in your school years? I took quite a fancy to one of them—such an excellent soldier she turned out to be. Still, we have the space to keep out of each other's ways here, and that suits my fancy just as well.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk 3
char_297_hamoni.text: Anything you'd like of me, Doctor of Rhodes Island? If it's in my power to deepen our bilateral trust, then I would be willing to stop gazing out at the window scenery, and focus a little instead on whatever it is that's vexing you.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Shame you're short on people with a shrewd eye for Londinium affairs—I was quite curious what they'd think of me. After all, a medical organization like Rhodes Island, unaffiliated with any nation, opting to work with us? Either you did it out of sheer idiocy, or if not, then you must've known a little too much.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_297_hamoni.text: So what's your next step? Keep throwing yourself into the maelstrom of Victoria, or continue to build the peaceful paradise that Rhodes Island hopes for? The Leader once gave me a display of land torched to ash by her fires, and I'm ever so curious. If you had flames, what color would they be?

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_297_hamoni.text: 'Reed.' Such a darling codename—I can practically guess what was on her mind when she came up with it. Still, I'd be more the fool for claiming the prospect of a book club partner drove me here. She just happens to be somebody very useful, hence my need to protect her.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_297_hamoni.text: Just making a little bookside conversation, but... how do you regard the act of dancing? You know, when hands rest on collars, and gazes lock, and involuntary reactions let slip the true intentions of you or I—my my, your heart's hardly fluttering at all. No wonder The Leader's so interested in you.

char_297_hamoni.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_297_hamoni.text: I've gone through the files on my desk. Not at all surprised Rhodes Island would be going after my true reasons for coming here. That said, you were kind enough to drop the papers off with me? You must not be planning to boot me out any time soon, let alone hand me off to a duke. So, what is it you want me to do for Rhodes Island, or perhaps, for you?

char_297_hamoni.title: Idle
char_297_hamoni.text: Hm-hmm, time to paint my nails. What pattern shall we go with?

char_297_hamoni.title: Onboard
char_297_hamoni.text: Pleased to meet you, and my codename is Harmonie. Here's a dossier on Victoria for Rhodes Island's perusal, as a gesture of goodwill. Don't umm and ahh about it, now—that's basic etiquette for when someone thanks you. May we get along smashingly in the days to come, Doctor.

char_297_hamoni.title: Watching Battle Record
char_297_hamoni.text: Oh, what a splendid war command.

char_297_hamoni.title: Promotion 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Ah, well, thank you very much. It's my honor to receive your endorsement.

char_297_hamoni.title: Promotion 2
char_297_hamoni.text: What you're doing here has me startlingly curious. What could you be up to, placing me in this position?

char_297_hamoni.title: Added to Squad
char_297_hamoni.text: What would you have me do for Rhodes Island?

char_297_hamoni.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_297_hamoni.text: I thank Rhodes Island for its trust.

char_297_hamoni.title: Depart
char_297_hamoni.text: I do hope none of you turn on the waterworks anytime soon.

char_297_hamoni.title: Begin Operation
char_297_hamoni.text: Get yourselves ready.

char_297_hamoni.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Present.

char_297_hamoni.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_297_hamoni.text: Received.

char_297_hamoni.title: Deployment 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Operation commencing.

char_297_hamoni.title: Deployment 2
char_297_hamoni.text: On your command.

char_297_hamoni.title: In Battle 1
char_297_hamoni.text: Take a breath, go on. It's not as if I'm crushing your throat.

char_297_hamoni.title: In Battle 2
char_297_hamoni.text: Stop flailing about, and do as I tell you.

char_297_hamoni.title: In Battle 3
char_297_hamoni.text: Now now, close your eyes.

char_297_hamoni.title: In Battle 4
char_297_hamoni.text: This'll all be over before you're bored of it.

char_297_hamoni.title: 4-star Result
char_297_hamoni.text: If I hadn't seen the battle for myself, I just might have been shocked by your command style.

char_297_hamoni.title: 3-star Result
char_297_hamoni.text: I'm sure if The Leader saw you now, she'd be delighted.

char_297_hamoni.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_297_hamoni.text: Oh, there's a rare sight. Maybe you have other things on your mind?

char_297_hamoni.title: Operation Failure
char_297_hamoni.text: Right, what else can I do here?

char_297_hamoni.title: Assigned to Facility
char_297_hamoni.text: Minimalistic, but not at all design-deficient. I have to laud your tastes.

char_297_hamoni.title: Tap
char_297_hamoni.text: Tut...! Ah. Was something the matter, Doctor? Do tell.

char_297_hamoni.title: Trust Tap
char_297_hamoni.text: If you're free, we could always chat about your bookshelf.

char_297_hamoni.title: Title
char_297_hamoni.text: Arknights.

char_297_hamoni.title: Greeting
char_297_hamoni.text: Hello, Dr. {@nickname}. Cup of tea?

char_1020_reed2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1020_reed2.text: There's a lot more I can do for you now—more than secretarial work. I won't be opposed to fighting anymore. But still, to be here, writing for you, is... a great honor of mine.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk 1
char_1020_reed2.text: What would you like to ask? Maybe you want to know—how much power Dublinn has... no? Oh, just how I'm personally doing? I'm still no more than a shadow, but—not my sister's. Dublinn's flame is lit by so many people, so many ideals, and the shadow cast by that firelight—that is what I am now.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk 2
char_1020_reed2.text: It's getting dark. Around this hour, there'd be people walking leisurely along the grey pavements, perhaps fowlbeasts gathering by the ponds—that is the Tara I remember. It's no special thing, but neither has it truly existed before. Doctor, I believe everyone should have a home to welcome them back.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk 3
char_1020_reed2.text: I can't make myself out to be a comrade of yours—there are some by your side that surely hate me. But—once Dublinn no longer needs these raging, burning flames, then I'll come back here... I want to come back here.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1020_reed2.text: In my spare time? I still like prose, and poetry, both reading and writing... and I like to hear others sing. I know a few folk songs—very pretty ones, but no record has been made of them. Doctor, Have you ever heard, how the stems of reeds can be used as whistles? Yes, the reeds that would burn away at the brush of a flame.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1020_reed2.text: Once you've caught Oripathy, living can become very painful... Do I resent it? No, I just used to not understand... life is so fragile, so much is ready to steal it away, yet we were meant to withstand that—to resist each and every trouble? But now... I can see you fight not just to resist—you fight to give people back their lives.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1020_reed2.text: Do not fear, but do not disregard. Be light, be gentle... that is how you touch another. I remember learning this from you, Doctor, and it ensures my flames won't turn others to ash. Don't worry, I can bear the pain that accompanies. My fire won't die out.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1020_reed2.text: Many prophecies say similar things—'it is the Draco's nature to fight.' I won't stand for that. But—if my sister stays blind to what will become of the land, once blanketed by the fires of death... then I will stop her. I know what kind of Leader the people put their hopes in—and that's not what she is.

char_1020_reed2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1020_reed2.text: My mind's not at peace, Doctor. Is my every choice truly right? Their lives stoke our flames in the night. Yet in the end, if they fail to burn through the darkness... No, why should their lives even be mine to dictate...? But still, I will walk on. Now I bear a duty, and I will walk on.

char_1020_reed2.title: Idle
char_1020_reed2.text: Not a word needed... It's always so tranquil, by your side.

char_1020_reed2.title: Onboard
char_1020_reed2.text: I know—you'll have many new questions for me, about my identity, about my goals... but—I am still the same Reed.

char_1020_reed2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1020_reed2.text: No matter how many times, you'll still choose to fight like this...

char_1020_reed2.title: Promotion 1
char_1020_reed2.text: What is it you seek, from those who earn this medal? Tell me more about your dreams.

char_1020_reed2.title: Promotion 2
char_1020_reed2.text: Upon the damp soil, there struggles life after life. While my flame does not yet die, I will reach them—I will.

char_1020_reed2.title: Added to Squad
char_1020_reed2.text: I understand the objective you've set.

char_1020_reed2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1020_reed2.text: You fight not by my will, but yours. You choose to be warriors. So I will stand with you, shoulder to shoulder.

char_1020_reed2.title: Depart
char_1020_reed2.text: What blocks the way, I will burn through.

char_1020_reed2.title: Begin Operation
char_1020_reed2.text: It is your tyrannies that fuel this flame.

char_1020_reed2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1020_reed2.text: Where do you wish to go?

char_1020_reed2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1020_reed2.text: I'm prepared to fight.

char_1020_reed2.title: Deployment 1
char_1020_reed2.text: Please, trust in me.

char_1020_reed2.title: Deployment 2
char_1020_reed2.text: Your lives are mine to protect.

char_1020_reed2.title: In Battle 1
char_1020_reed2.text: Your lives, now ignited.

char_1020_reed2.title: In Battle 2
char_1020_reed2.text: This endless burn, you needn't bear.

char_1020_reed2.title: In Battle 3
char_1020_reed2.text: Fear not the firelight.

char_1020_reed2.title: In Battle 4
char_1020_reed2.text: I am Dublinn.

char_1020_reed2.title: 4-star Result
char_1020_reed2.text: In honesty, it's hard to even tell whether your battles are victories, given your dreams still lie so far, far away. But at times like these, it strikes me—perhaps we may all see the day, when peace comes.

char_1020_reed2.title: 3-star Result
char_1020_reed2.text: To drive them away with fire is easily done. But—if we're to ensure they'll never come back to hurt us, then a fire is not enough.

char_1020_reed2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1020_reed2.text: Did they flee? I have no hate for those who do—but here on the battlefield, I will pursue them.

char_1020_reed2.title: Operation Failure
char_1020_reed2.text: The pain of burning, I can bear much more of. Just—don't let anyone else—disappear to the flames again...

char_1020_reed2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1020_reed2.text: I remember how I hid away in the ship's cabins. I miss those days.

char_1020_reed2.title: Tap
char_1020_reed2.text: ...I still burn hot, don't I?

char_1020_reed2.title: Trust Tap
char_1020_reed2.text: The poems I've transcribed? I can read them to you, if you're interested. It's okay if you don't understand Taran—perhaps you'll still feel the emotions' touch.

char_1020_reed2.title: Title
char_1020_reed2.text: Arknights.

char_1020_reed2.title: Greeting
char_1020_reed2.text: Ah, Doctor. Yes, some things never change.

char_4080_lin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4080_lin.text: I can offer you protection, and even handle a little business for you. But you'd better prove it's worth my time.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk 1
char_4080_lin.text: Rhodes Island's work in Lungmen will remain confidential, but I know that your actions saved lives. I've spent a long time trying to gauge just how trustworthy Rhodes Island really is. As for my conclusion, I trust you had no trouble setting up your office in Lungmen?

char_4080_lin.title: Talk 2
char_4080_lin.text: I'm sure you've been working with Mr. Lee. You can trust the information you get from him, but there are limits to what a private investigator can do. If you need something outside his purview, you come to me. Don't worry, my methods won't send any trouble Rhodes Island's way.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk 3
char_4080_lin.text: I just saw Swire here. It surprised me how she was working so hands-on. If we'd followed the dreams we had as kids, she would've become the head of Lungmen's Chamber of Commerce, and I might be a university lecturer right now. You never know... Hm? No, I don't need to say hello. Given her status, it would be inappropriate for us to be seen in public.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4080_lin.text: The coat my father always wears is a birthday present I gave him. I'm so used to the dignified airs he puts on, sometimes I even forget that... underneath the coat is an old man growing frailer by the day. Sooner or later, someone will have to stand up and take the weight off his shoulders.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4080_lin.text: To certain people, the slums are a problem that needs to be solved. To others, this is their home. The shift from 'Slums' to 'Downtown' could take generations to settle. I don't know how far I can carry it myself, but I'll do what I can.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4080_lin.text: I've never seen Ch'en onboard Rhodes Island. She has things to do, doesn't she? Hmph, hardly see any merit in recruiting operators like her. It's true that we don't get along very well. But I must admit, she is the one who showed me a different path.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4080_lin.text: I had nothing to do, so I trimmed the potted plant on your desk a little. No matter how busy life is, we can't forget our aesthetics. Why are you so surprised? The four arts, flower arrangement, tea ceremony... They were all part of my education. You would never have guessed? Whatever.

char_4080_lin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4080_lin.text: The nightscape here is very different from my childhood memories. Lungmen may be advancing by the day, but it still has its unlit corners... How about we go for a drink together? You can't truly know a city until you've visited its streets during the wee hours.

char_4080_lin.title: Idle
char_4080_lin.text: You can't let them see you exhausted, can you…?

char_4080_lin.title: Onboard
char_4080_lin.text: You and I have probably crossed paths before, Doctor, but we finally found time for a formal introduction. There'll be much more done on the problems the Infected face in the Lungmen slums, now that we're working in direct communication.

char_4080_lin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4080_lin.text: There are many ways to deal with trouble, and direct confrontation is usually my last choice.

char_4080_lin.title: Promotion 1
char_4080_lin.text: I sometimes attend ceremonies like these just to make things go smoother. I don't remember how many titles I have. But in the end, I always have to return to the shadows.

char_4080_lin.title: Promotion 2
char_4080_lin.text: I know what I'm doing, and that's all that matters. At the end of the day, not all honors need to be made public, and not all roads need to be trod together.

char_4080_lin.title: Added to Squad
char_4080_lin.text: You tell me your ends, just don't ask me my means.

char_4080_lin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4080_lin.text: If any of you have any doubts about the target, this is your last chance to pull out.

char_4080_lin.title: Depart
char_4080_lin.text: I hope I won't have to explain to you what we mean by 'necessary methods.'

char_4080_lin.title: Begin Operation
char_4080_lin.text: It's time to make an example. They'll see what happens when they break the rules.

char_4080_lin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4080_lin.text: Got it.

char_4080_lin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4080_lin.text: Say no more.

char_4080_lin.title: Deployment 1
char_4080_lin.text: Watch the shadow behind you.

char_4080_lin.title: Deployment 2
char_4080_lin.text: Let's put them six feet under.

char_4080_lin.title: In Battle 1
char_4080_lin.text: You didn't think. So this is what happens when you cross the line.

char_4080_lin.title: In Battle 2
char_4080_lin.text: You want to talk? Too late for that.

char_4080_lin.title: In Battle 3
char_4080_lin.text: Give me a reason to let you go. Don't have one? What a pity.

char_4080_lin.title: In Battle 4
char_4080_lin.text: Shatter into pieces.

char_4080_lin.title: 4-star Result
char_4080_lin.text: It better remain a secret forever.

char_4080_lin.title: 3-star Result
char_4080_lin.text: Clean, decent. No one will ever find their remains.

char_4080_lin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4080_lin.text: The situation is still salvageable. Leave the rest to me.

char_4080_lin.title: Operation Failure
char_4080_lin.text: There is always a way to correct a mistake. Don't let anger get the best of you.

char_4080_lin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4080_lin.text: I don't need too much room here, but this place could use some decoration.

char_4080_lin.title: Tap
char_4080_lin.text: You'll need an explanation for what you just did.

char_4080_lin.title: Trust Tap
char_4080_lin.text: Boh loh yau, fresh out of the oven, want one?

char_4080_lin.title: Title
char_4080_lin.text: Arknights.

char_4080_lin.title: Greeting
char_4080_lin.text: I hope you didn't run into any trouble, Doctor.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4082_qiubai.text: I may not be at your side all the time. But don't worry, when you need me, I will be there.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: Logistics permits, equipment approvals, mission evaluations... Rhodes Island has too much red tape. While recklessness does tend to get you in trouble, being overcautious also gets on people's nerves. Let's keep it simple. If anything comes up, you tell me directly. I'll decide what to do from there.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: I heard the Grandmaster also came to Rhodes Island? Don't worry, I won't pick a fight; but he must be curious if my skills have improved since I left Yumen... Come to think of it, after walking such a long road, he really should be taking it easy. And yet, he still pushes himself into a life of conflict. The same goes for you, Doctor.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk 3
char_4082_qiubai.text: My dad hated the snow. Snow keeps the doors shut, ruining 'business' for his river fort. That's why he gave me this name. 'Qiu' for hatred, 'Bai' for the white of snow. People always find something to blame for their misfortunes: snow, storms, calamities natural or manmade. As for me, I happened to be born on a snowy day, that's all there is to it.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: I've seen some die in vain, some turn to crime, and others drive their friends and loved ones to despair… Justice is rare upon this cruel land, and eking out a living is always difficult. But there is no excuse for evil. Never has been, never will be.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: The conflicts I can resolve with my sword are actually the simple ones. Unfortunately, most are as a great river surging forth, sweeping up all the sand and silt in its path until it turns into an unstoppable murky mess. I may encounter more places like that small mountain village. And I can't say for certain that I will do better next time. But good is good, and evil is evil. One may not confuse them, and I will find my own way to distinguish the two.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: You'd like me to demonstrate my swordsmanship to the operators? Doctor, it's not something you can learn by watching. I know a scribe who served as the Grandmaster's record keeper. He followed the Grandmaster for over a decade. After years of observation, he could nitpick nearly any kung fu style under Heaven. And yet, he is weak to this day. A stiff breeze could blow him over... Anyway, I do happen to have some spare time. So I'll show you all a few moves.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: The sharper the blade, the easier it is to break. The same goes for hatred in one's heart... It's easy to understand. But the hard part is, you must first face that which lies in your heart before you can really let it go. I have both hatred and gratitude toward the Grandmaster. The hatred, I paid back how I saw fit; the gratitude, I will hold as close. That is all.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
