char_4082_qiubai.text: The tumult in Yumen is done, and there's no more reason for me to be there. And the home that I came from is nothing but a river now. In short, I've become the 'one without roots.' But, being rootless is not all bad, as it's led me here to you and Rhodes Island. There will always be a place where my sword comes in handy.  The land under Heaven is vast, and my fate will mark the grave for me.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Idle
char_4082_qiubai.text: A rare bit of fine weather, a rare bit of leisure.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Onboard
char_4082_qiubai.text: Dr. {@nickname}, I am Qiubai. I can't say for certain how long I will stay at Rhodes Island, but every meeting is a stroke of fortune. I trust we'll get along just fine.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4082_qiubai.text: When I was in Yumen, the Grandmaster would also review recordings of my every battle. For us practitioners of kung fu, having someone to provide feedback is always a good thing.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Promotion 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: Why wield a sword? To combat injustice.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Promotion 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: I've seen a certain type of fowlbeast in the Gobi to the north of Yan. Their habitat is on the verge of disappearing. So they fly in groups, wet their bodies with water from afar, then bring it back home... If even beasts can go to such an extent, there must be more we can do as people.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Added to Squad
char_4082_qiubai.text: I just sharpened my sword.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4082_qiubai.text: Very well. Let's walk this path together.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Depart
char_4082_qiubai.text: Don't waste too much energy on the road.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Begin Operation
char_4082_qiubai.text: Don't bother telling me your names.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: Within sheath, the sword awaits.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: Beyond substance, the spirit unchained.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Deployment 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: A true battlefield. This is the right place to settle things.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Deployment 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: Dew falls heavy, grass bends low. Something's not right.

char_4082_qiubai.title: In Battle 1
char_4082_qiubai.text: Your hostile intent is all too clear.

char_4082_qiubai.title: In Battle 2
char_4082_qiubai.text: No blade has mercy. Brace yourself!

char_4082_qiubai.title: In Battle 3
char_4082_qiubai.text: And this is your excuse for evil?

char_4082_qiubai.title: In Battle 4
char_4082_qiubai.text: Don't repent to my sword.

char_4082_qiubai.title: 4-star Result
char_4082_qiubai.text: Let's go, Doctor. Time to head back.

char_4082_qiubai.title: 3-star Result
char_4082_qiubai.text: Even to the very end, I do not know why those people drew their blades... Perhaps, even they did not know themselves.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4082_qiubai.text: Let it be. No sword technique is perfect, just as no outcome is flawless. We shouldn't get too fixated on fighting.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Operation Failure
char_4082_qiubai.text: Even a technique you have executed a thousand times can fail. Don't focus too much on winning and losing, Doctor, you did what you could.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4082_qiubai.text: Were you the one who decorated this room? No, nothing. I am a jianghu wanderer, and we are not picky.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Tap
char_4082_qiubai.text: I'll write this off as a little joke. But, next time...

char_4082_qiubai.title: Trust Tap
char_4082_qiubai.text: Doctor, why don't you come practice the blade with me?

char_4082_qiubai.title: Title
char_4082_qiubai.text: Arknights.

char_4082_qiubai.title: Greeting
char_4082_qiubai.text: Doctor, remember to practice your kung fu.

char_493_firwhl.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_493_firwhl.text: With all this paper around, it's hard to resist the urge to start fires… Whoa, whoa, don't look at me like that, I'm just joshin', okay?

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk 1
char_493_firwhl.text: Doctor, our employees are all Billy natives who know the lay of the land. If any Rhodes operators are traveling to Rim Billiton and need an escort, come find us! We will offer you a fair price.

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk 2
char_493_firwhl.text: Why hire Infected when it's bad for business? Well, umm, because... Ah, come on, we all know how Oripathy's transmitted. All you need is proper protection and monitoring. Rhodes Island does the same, right? Ahaha…

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk 3
char_493_firwhl.text: The right type of ammo can turn the tide of a battle', it's a line every artilleryman knows. So their bags are filled with grapeshot, flashbangs and tracers. 'Course, they always have trouble deciding which to use when the time comes. As for me, I just bring incendiaries. Use 'em right, and they replace any type of ammo you could need.

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_493_firwhl.text: I hated it whenever anyone brought up my dad while I was in university. Are we on bad terms? Naw, he's not a bad dad, and I'm grateful to him. But I hate it when people look at me like a mining mogul's spoiled kid. I'm more than just my dad's daughter!

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_493_firwhl.text: Dad wouldn't let me near fire, Mum didn't let me play with the miners' kids, my old boss told me not to poke my nose into business that isn't my own, and everyone told me not to be too nice to the Infected. I never listened to any of that. You decide what's right and wrong for yourself, and never get swept up if you need time to make a choice.

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_493_firwhl.text: That little firefighter always tenses up when she sees me, then points her hose right at me. Well, It's cute, sure, but that can't go on forever. The three of us should go for a drink sometime and clear up this misunderstanding. For the two of you, I'll make my special flaming cocktail.

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_493_firwhl.text: I know I'm not great at business, but I also know how it feels to be helpless, relying on the kindness of others. It hurts, the company being in debt, but debtor's prison beats having to burn your own comrades to cinders.

char_493_firwhl.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_493_firwhl.text: I loved playing army when I was little, and I always dreamed of becoming a general. But Rim Billiton wasn't the place for that, so I had to settle for a private security firm... Now? Now I just want to keep my people warm and fed. My dream of becoming a general died the first time I saw someone get shot.

char_493_firwhl.title: Idle
char_493_firwhl.text: Yawn... I'm bored. Might as well build a grenade tower over here... Whoa?! You're awake? Er, these are blanks! Nah yeah, just blanks!

char_493_firwhl.title: Onboard
char_493_firwhl.text: Thank you for choosing Firewhistle Security Services! My name is... huh? Codename? Umm, just call me Firewhistle. Yup, that's the key to raising brand awareness!

char_493_firwhl.title: Watching Battle Record
char_493_firwhl.text: Nice strat. Would've been even better with some fire on that spot.

char_493_firwhl.title: Promotion 1
char_493_firwhl.text: A promotion? Thank you! If you've got any more security jobs for me and my people, that'd be even better. Hehe.

char_493_firwhl.title: Promotion 2
char_493_firwhl.text: Working with Rhodes Island's seen my company turn a profit at last. I'm not paying my employees out of my own pocket anymore! Thank you so much, Doctor! You have all my appreciation and all my gratitude!

char_493_firwhl.title: Added to Squad
char_493_firwhl.text: Firewhistle, at your service!

char_493_firwhl.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_493_firwhl.text: Captain? No problem, I'm used to running the show.

char_493_firwhl.title: Depart
char_493_firwhl.text: Let's go,everyone! I'll buy a round for us all when we're done.

char_493_firwhl.title: Begin Operation
char_493_firwhl.text: Stay low. Wait 'till you see my fire.

char_493_firwhl.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_493_firwhl.text: Need some fire to turn up the heat?

char_493_firwhl.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_493_firwhl.text: Your orders please.

char_493_firwhl.title: Deployment 1
char_493_firwhl.text: In position and ready to light'em up.

char_493_firwhl.title: Deployment 2
char_493_firwhl.text: Artilleryman in position!

char_493_firwhl.title: In Battle 1
char_493_firwhl.text: Let's burn'em up!

char_493_firwhl.title: In Battle 2
char_493_firwhl.text: This one's for you!

char_493_firwhl.title: In Battle 3
char_493_firwhl.text: Panicking just spreads the fire faster.

char_493_firwhl.title: In Battle 4
char_493_firwhl.text: Load, fire!

char_493_firwhl.title: 4-star Result
char_493_firwhl.text: Your plan actually worked! Sure wish I had a tactical genius like you on my payroll.

char_493_firwhl.title: 3-star Result
char_493_firwhl.text: We should put out the fires before we call it a day. Wanna join me?

char_493_firwhl.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_493_firwhl.text: Leaving a smoldering ember is a good way to end up with a wildfire. Let's watch out for those.

char_493_firwhl.title: Operation Failure
char_493_firwhl.text: I'll cover our retreat. Don't worry, I've done this a bunch of times.

char_493_firwhl.title: Assigned to Facility
char_493_firwhl.text: Rhodes Island's base is outfitted so much better than my little office.

char_493_firwhl.title: Tap
char_493_firwhl.text: Hey, Wanna see some fireworks?

char_493_firwhl.title: Trust Tap
char_493_firwhl.text: Here, I made this ornament out of a shell casing. Hehe, I'm really good at it, right?

char_493_firwhl.title: Title
char_493_firwhl.text: Arknights.

char_493_firwhl.title: Greeting
char_493_firwhl.text: G'day, Doctor! Need a warm fire?

char_4083_chimes.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4083_chimes.text: Are these the documents you need to mail? Alright, let me check them off.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk 1
char_4083_chimes.text: There's a letter for you from the Lungmen slums, Doctor. A former patient? Your expression tells me pretty much exactly what's in this letter.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk 2
char_4083_chimes.text: I use this sword to fight beasts that slip into the village, as well as bandits and thieves. For beasts, it's just a matter of driving them away. But people,  it's hard to keep them from going astray.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk 3
char_4083_chimes.text: There are villages that don't even appear on maps, relying on Messengers to communicate. I used to follow the ones who came to my village around, and even learned my first words from the stuff written on envelopes. But I had to grow up before I learned how much those few words meant.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4083_chimes.text: I once went back to the village where I grew up. All I found was a few abandoned huts and fields. The people who lived there probably found new lives in the cities. But sometimes I wonder, if I had worked harder, would they have stayed?

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4083_chimes.text: You know, I haven't been to that many places. I've wandered between the mountains and cities, and seen people suffering from hardship, helplessness, and stress... This is a vast land, but how many people live in its nameless corners from birth to death, with no one ever to know they existed?

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4083_chimes.text: The villagers didn't kick me out when they learned I had Oripathy, but still I couldn't go back to my old life. No, getting infected was my own responsibility. It'd be too full of myself to say I got Infected to help people.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4083_chimes.text: I'm still looking for the young man's family. My words were too harsh... I didn't know his name, even at the very end of it. Superficial as it might have been, he came down for a taste of our harsh lives and recorded it. There's meaning in that.

char_4083_chimes.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4083_chimes.text: I've seen many people wait at the village entrance, hoping for a letter from their families. I've seen all sorts of emotions on their faces when they opened the letters. Messengers carry little slivers of people's lives. That's got nothing to do with me, and everything too.

char_4083_chimes.title: Idle
char_4083_chimes.text: What a beautiful sunset. The weather tomorrow should be fine and clear.

char_4083_chimes.title: Onboard
char_4083_chimes.text: Hi there, Are you the Doctor that's in charge here? I heard I could get treatment for Oripathy in exchange for work here... Oh, right, just call me Wind Chimes. It's a name that represents hope.

char_4083_chimes.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4083_chimes.text: I'd rather not get into fights while making deliveries...

char_4083_chimes.title: Promotion 1
char_4083_chimes.text: All I did was carry out my duties as a Messenger... Anyway, leave it to me if you have a job like that again. I won't let you down.

char_4083_chimes.title: Promotion 2
char_4083_chimes.text: Many more people are waiting for hopeful news. Doctor, let's walk this path together.

char_4083_chimes.title: Added to Squad
char_4083_chimes.text: As long as there's a destination, there's a way.

char_4083_chimes.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4083_chimes.text: I'll make sure everyone arrives safely.

char_4083_chimes.title: Depart
char_4083_chimes.text: The road is long. Walk slowly.

char_4083_chimes.title: Begin Operation
char_4083_chimes.text: Get out of the way.

char_4083_chimes.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4083_chimes.text: I'm ready.

char_4083_chimes.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4083_chimes.text: Ready to go.

char_4083_chimes.title: Deployment 1
char_4083_chimes.text: Bare mountains, dirt n' dust... all familiar sights.

char_4083_chimes.title: Deployment 2
char_4083_chimes.text: A long path through tall mountains… Stay alert.

char_4083_chimes.title: In Battle 1
char_4083_chimes.text: Leave now and I'll act like I never saw you.

char_4083_chimes.title: In Battle 2
char_4083_chimes.text: I never wanted to point this blade at anyone.

char_4083_chimes.title: In Battle 3
char_4083_chimes.text: There are people waiting for me.

char_4083_chimes.title: In Battle 4
char_4083_chimes.text: Don't keep pushing down the wrong path…

char_4083_chimes.title: 4-star Result
char_4083_chimes.text: No matter how far the destination, you will get there one day, as long as you keep moving forward.

char_4083_chimes.title: 3-star Result
char_4083_chimes.text: I'm happy to bring news of victory, but I would rather avoid conflict like this.

char_4083_chimes.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4083_chimes.text: The goods are still here. Let's hope those who ran away will learn and repent.

char_4083_chimes.title: Operation Failure
char_4083_chimes.text: Let's rest and regroup. We can take back what we lost later.

char_4083_chimes.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4083_chimes.text: It's good to have a place to rest.

char_4083_chimes.title: Tap
char_4083_chimes.text: Huh?

char_4083_chimes.title: Trust Tap
char_4083_chimes.text: Careful, I just got back and I'm covered in dust…

char_4083_chimes.title: Title
char_4083_chimes.text: Arknights.

char_4083_chimes.title: Greeting
char_4083_chimes.text: Letter for you, Doctor.

char_2024_chyue.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2024_chyue.text: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much… I misunderstand?  No problem, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk 1
char_2024_chyue.text: Doctor.' Your title reminds me of the Yanese scholars. Experienced and knowledgeable, they see the forest for the trees. You feel like we've met before? It's true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... Sadly, the more friends I make, the lonelier I feel. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk 2
char_2024_chyue.text: As you can see, I note down only my experiences and insights, rather than any specific kung fu moves. What really matters to the martial arts is 'Yi' — your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take Dusk's paintings, for example. If I couldn't grasp the intent behind them, and sought to discuss techniques and styles with her, she would only shut the door on my face.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk 3
char_2024_chyue.text: I agreed to be a 'fight choreographer' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket, or getting too lonely. Dusk is timid, and Ling is too fond of drink. I will look after them as well... We are far from a normal family. Nevertheless, we are siblings, and not the collective 'we' as we are often called.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2024_chyue.text: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. But the real challenge they face, is preserving their humanity and morality after facing such morbidity, rather growing jaded and desensitized. Indeed, conflicts and mortality have been the way of these lands for eons. But only those giant, terrible creatures are cold-hearted enough to think so.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2024_chyue.text: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is train day and night, from the depths of winter to the height of summer. It may sound like a clumsy and brutish method, but the result is giving every last drop you have, leaving no regrets.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2024_chyue.text: That sword is an unwanted possession that must not be cast away. Huai Tianpei keeping it is an outcome that all concerned parties can accept. My duel with him, you ask? He trained for forty years, and landed a single heavy blow on me. But how many comings and goings of spring and autumn have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2024_chyue.text: 'Who am I'... For this question, you need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, foggy woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for the distant, radically different future, whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek new answers, is an entirely different question.

char_2024_chyue.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2024_chyue.text: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander in jianghu seek revenge, status, glory, or a simple resolution. Their obsessions run deep, yet their time runs short. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes chasing a single ideal or undertaking... All those people, how woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable.

char_2024_chyue.title: Idle
char_2024_chyue.text: The spring comes and goes, leaving a lonely autumn.

char_2024_chyue.title: Onboard
char_2024_chyue.text: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I hope you will excuse me for intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please call me 'Chongyue.' It's a name given to me by... an old friend of mine.

char_2024_chyue.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2024_chyue.text: The colors that once embellished the autumn grass, hues long buried by war.

char_2024_chyue.title: Promotion 1
char_2024_chyue.text: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen. They risked their lives in battle until death took them, or their age crept upon themselves... yet never for their own ends.

char_2024_chyue.title: Promotion 2
char_2024_chyue.text: Battles we have fought, death we have braved. Doctor, no need to say more.

char_2024_chyue.title: Added to Squad
char_2024_chyue.text: Lit, quenched, then lit again… The signal fires never ever rest.

char_2024_chyue.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2024_chyue.text: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?

char_2024_chyue.title: Depart
char_2024_chyue.text: The sunset weaves a silken river. Heaven and earth bolster me upon departure.

char_2024_chyue.title: Begin Operation
char_2024_chyue.text: Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.

char_2024_chyue.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2024_chyue.text: One should spar from time to time.

char_2024_chyue.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2024_chyue.text: At your command.

char_2024_chyue.title: Deployment 1
char_2024_chyue.text: Look at this spectacular sight. Alas, it is now a battlefield.

char_2024_chyue.title: Deployment 2
char_2024_chyue.text: Many intellectuals must join a battle before penning a decent verse, including that sister of mine… This too is an opportunity.

char_2024_chyue.title: In Battle 1
char_2024_chyue.text: Unsteady posture, wavering intent. Much to learn yet.

char_2024_chyue.title: In Battle 2
char_2024_chyue.text: A thousand moves in one breath!

char_2024_chyue.title: In Battle 3
char_2024_chyue.text: Strike, and sunder the tides cleft. Retract, and leave no peace bereft.

char_2024_chyue.title: In Battle 4
char_2024_chyue.text: After all this time, you still turn to war for solutions!

char_2024_chyue.title: 4-star Result
char_2024_chyue.text: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a weiqi player like you is a truly rare sight.

char_2024_chyue.title: 3-star Result
char_2024_chyue.text: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, with a handful of sand to clean the blood from one's armor... What a tremendous victory!

char_2024_chyue.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2024_chyue.text: There is never a true victory in brandishing a sword and formulating a strategy, while looking for gains and losses is an even greater folly. So long as you leave no regrets, then all is well.

char_2024_chyue.title: Operation Failure
char_2024_chyue.text: All warriors must face defeat. Don't lose heart.

char_2024_chyue.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2024_chyue.text: This is much more comfortable than a military tent. Can I even manage a good night's sleep without the sound of drilling soldiers…?

char_2024_chyue.title: Tap
char_2024_chyue.text: Doctor, have you figured out how to counter that move from yesterday?

char_2024_chyue.title: Trust Tap
char_2024_chyue.text: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.

char_2024_chyue.title: Title
char_2024_chyue.text: Arknights.

char_2024_chyue.title: Greeting
char_2024_chyue.text: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I'll protect you, as I've promised. But...it'll take some time before I can read all the words on these documents... Don't worry, I'll get there.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: You have to be prepared, out in the wastelands. Always carry flint for starting fires, a weapon for self-defense, and fabric to use as a water filter... no flammable items in the office? But, what if there's a power outage?

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Shifu taught us how to fight, how to avoid Catastrophes, how to farm and store food. Now we don't have to drift around in search of water and pasture anymore... Just like you, Doctor, Shifu seemed to know everything. I can't be like you and my Shifu, but I can protect you, so you can help people.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk 3
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Whenever the tribe is on the move, everyone worries whether we'll find a good place to settle down. But people in nomadic cities don't seem concerned at all... Maybe for them, they're not moving in search of a new home, but drifting with the home they have?

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Oripathy is not a rare sight in my tribe. We only think the stones that grow from the skin, they look like the stones we dig out of the earth… There are already so many things that can kill you; why persecute someone for a disease?

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: The name 'Anasa' means 'one without roots.' My people say that if you have no attachments, there's nothing that can trouble you. But everyone I've met since I left has something that they are attached to. Me? You mean I'm the same, in how I want to repay my debt? Hmm...

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: My name comes from the first Yanese poem my Shifu taught me. It tells of a cloud, 'Yun' in Yanese, that has been drifting for a thousand li, raining across the land, until it finally finds a mountain to rest upon. 'Jie' is the end of that long journey. After all, 'everyone should have a place to call home.'

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: That martial arts master is here too... I thought he was cold and heartless, but now I kind of understand him... a man who has lived for so long and traveled so far can only carry so much. That must be what Shifu thought as well.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Sometimes you see the clear night sky after a Catastrophe has passed in the distance. Wind blows toward the horizon, and the stars seem so close you could touch them. A bonfire keeps the beasts away, while singing keeps you warm. The wastes are dangerous, but they are not terrible.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Idle
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Are you retiring for the night? I'll stand watch.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Onboard
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: My birth name? Doctor, you understand the Anasa language...? But I would rather continue to use the name 'Jieyun.' Shifu gave me this name, and I like it.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: The reasons to fight never change much.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Promotion 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I still have a lot to learn after leaving the wastes. I'm willing to do more, if you trust me to. As the Yanese expression goes: a promise is worth a thousand taels of gold.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Promotion 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I haven't thought much about what I will become, but Rhodes Island could become home to many. Thank you, Doctor.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Added to Squad
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Yes, I will complete the task you gave me.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Stay close. The wastelands are a dangerous place to get lost.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Depart
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: We're bringing everyone home, safe and sound.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Begin Operation
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: The wind and sand don't cover all tracks. Something's not right here.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Yes, I remember your instructions.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I'll go.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Deployment 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Remember those poplars, and you'll always find your way.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Deployment 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I'll pile some stones here to mark the trail.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: In Battle 1
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Would you give up after a loss?

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: In Battle 2
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: You have invaded someone else's home...

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: In Battle 3
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Your families will be sad if they never see you again.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: In Battle 4
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: A few more cairns on the barrens.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: 4-star Result
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Will anyone remember them when all this is buried beneath the sand?

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: 3-star Result
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: If I could learn from you, Doctor, I could protect my people's lands.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Shifu says it isn't important whether or not you achieved what you set out to do, but whether you gave your best without running away. We've done well, Doctor.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Operation Failure
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Don't worry, I remember the way that we came. There's time to retreat.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I'm used to the darkness... oh, there's the light.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Tap
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Be careful, Doctor. You don't want to be mistaken for an attacking beast.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Trust Tap
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: I recognize your footsteps, Doctor.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Title
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Arknights.

char_4078_bdhkgt.title: Greeting
char_4078_bdhkgt.text: Would you like to go out for some fresh air, Doctor?

char_1029_yato2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1029_yato2.text: I'm to assist you? One moment, then. I'll go and change into more appropriate uniform... What? No need?

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk 1
char_1029_yato2.text: I'll be honest, even now I'm not used to life with my mask off—it always feels like there's something missing from my face. Still, it seems I can operate freely in daylight now. Please, give me more daytime missions, Doctor.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk 2
char_1029_yato2.text: The combat style the Felynes have taught me is like nothing I've known before. Unbroken strings of attacks as a defense, swift evasive maneuvers, different styles combining to achieve completely differing effects... Even though I've been training day and night, I still can't say I've mastered it.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk 3
char_1029_yato2.text: These clothes have your attention, Doctor? They confused me just as much when I first put them on—they have a startling defensive capacity, despite their obvious design. How it's achieved is completely beyond me.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1029_yato2.text: There's a strange force in these dual blades. They attack with thunder, but without the use of Arts... Is it the materials that cause it? I was definitely more proficient with my old katana... but when it comes to protecting us all, I'll shy away from no weapon.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1029_yato2.text: The Felynes never cease to mention monsters even more fearsome than Rathalos—the kind that could bring about Catastrophe-scale disasters with the flap of a wing. If Rhodes Island ever faced such a threat... no. After all we've been through, I wouldn't fear an enemy like that anymore.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1029_yato2.text: Though I've changed my loadout and gained new skills, I'm still the same Yato you know. Just give the order, and I'll take on whatever role Rhodes Island needs of me, Doctor.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1029_yato2.text: Noir Corne's always been this way, fussing over minor details, dragging down the mission. Still, I admit he's occasionally helpful... okay, a little more than occasionally. The point is, I don't hate him.

char_1029_yato2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1029_yato2.text: Operators are often worried about the way I do things, wondering if I'm putting myself in harm's way. Honestly, the concern's unnecessary. Thinking too much on my situation would only slow me down, but when it comes to what my friends are going through, trust me, I will care.

char_1029_yato2.title: Idle
char_1029_yato2.text: It seems you need some rest, Doctor. You can try this, if you want. It's a Felyne blend of a remedial plant they call Sleep Herb and some kind of mushroom. I hear it works very well, sleep-wise.

char_1029_yato2.title: Onboard
char_1029_yato2.text: Hey, Doctor. That's right, it's me. Op Team A4 Captain Yato, back and reporting in. As for where I got all this new equipment, you have the whole story from me in the mission debrief.

char_1029_yato2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1029_yato2.text: Hold on, I had notes on the locale. Let me find them...

char_1029_yato2.title: Promotion 1
char_1029_yato2.text: Whatever role I'm in, I'll bring everything I have.

char_1029_yato2.title: Promotion 2
char_1029_yato2.text: Another medal for me? I'd love to wear them, but I don't think this outfit has anywhere for them to go. Still, thank you, Doctor.

char_1029_yato2.title: Added to Squad
char_1029_yato2.text: Leave it to me, Doctor.

char_1029_yato2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1029_yato2.text: Alright, it's in my hands now. The success of our mission is assured.

char_1029_yato2.title: Depart
char_1029_yato2.text: Target confirmed. They won't know what hit them.

char_1029_yato2.title: Begin Operation
char_1029_yato2.text: Op Team A4 Yato in position.

char_1029_yato2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1029_yato2.text: Standing by…

char_1029_yato2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1029_yato2.text: Finally, am I up?

char_1029_yato2.title: Deployment 1
char_1029_yato2.text: Engaging.

char_1029_yato2.title: Deployment 2
char_1029_yato2.text: So that's our target?

char_1029_yato2.title: In Battle 1
char_1029_yato2.text: Hnf! Haah!

char_1029_yato2.title: In Battle 2
char_1029_yato2.text: That all you got?

char_1029_yato2.title: In Battle 3
char_1029_yato2.text: Flurry!

char_1029_yato2.title: In Battle 4
char_1029_yato2.text: Fight or flee, it's no use!

char_1029_yato2.title: 4-star Result
char_1029_yato2.text: We owe this victory to your fine command. I still have a long way to go.

char_1029_yato2.title: 3-star Result
char_1029_yato2.text: Take victory as a whetstone to hone the cutting edge.

char_1029_yato2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1029_yato2.text: Was this your mercy? Understood.

char_1029_yato2.title: Operation Failure
char_1029_yato2.text: This falls on me. You make a retreat, and grant me one more attempt.

char_1029_yato2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1029_yato2.text: I'd like more dangerous or challenging work, but if these are your orders, I'll gladly accept, Doctor.

char_1029_yato2.title: Tap
char_1029_yato2.text: What is it, Doctor? Intrigued by the materials for this outfit?

char_1029_yato2.title: Trust Tap
char_1029_yato2.text: Oh, hey, Doctor. I guess I'm not used to dropping the mask after all.

char_1029_yato2.title: Title
char_1029_yato2.text: Arknights.

char_1029_yato2.title: Greeting
char_1029_yato2.text: Hey, Doctor. You're the same as ever. I wonder if I'm any better than I used to be?

char_4077_palico.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4077_palico.text: Remember, you two, this purr-ticular assistant role calls for maximum vigilance. If any meownsters come knocking, we throw the Doctor on the cart and go!

char_4077_palico.title: Talk 1
char_4077_palico.text: Curious about our latest research? We're gnawing on 'An Investigation into Biological Discrepancies Between Us Felynes with a Y and Terran Felines with an I.' We were halfway done, but then we found out you have Aslans too, so it's back to the scratching post for us... You Terrans are meowder with your subspecies!

char_4077_palico.title: Talk 2
char_4077_palico.text: Your Meowjesty, never forget to eat your fill before you go on a hunt. Dive into a fight with full stamina, and you might end up doing things you didn't even think you could... mrrreow!

char_4077_palico.title: Talk 3
char_4077_palico.text: *dink* *dink* No Machalite Ore left...  Could substitute with Rock Spider stones and gloompincer shells... Don't know without trying. In you go.

char_4077_palico.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4077_palico.text: The mountains never fail to remind me of an old bud, built just as tall and strong. He broke his weapon once and quit the Palico life after, but if memory serves, he then went with the Research Commission to take up cheffing in the New World... You never know what turn your next life'll take.

char_4077_palico.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4077_palico.text: Say, Doctor, I'll let you in on a secret trick, friend to... maybe furless friend. If you ever get hurt in battle and you need to chug a Potion, set off a Barrel Bomb behind you while you do. Why? It'll stop any baddies getting the pounce on you, that's why!

char_4077_palico.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4077_palico.text: Terra has new materials. Lots of ores. Very lovely... Maybe I can make a weapon just like that Great Sword in the ice cave back home! For mew, Doctor!

char_4077_palico.title: Idle
char_4077_palico.text: Meow, meow, lots of... fascinating things in Doctor's room. Want to move them elsewhere, while Doctor's asleep... Smithy! Stay your paw!

char_4077_palico.title: Onboard
char_4077_palico.text: On Your Meowjesty's summons, we the Felyne Special Corps... cream of the crop of the Terra Research Commission's Furst Fleet, have arrived! Meowch! Get your hind paws off my head!

char_4077_palico.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4077_palico.text: What are you doing inside this box, Smithy? Im... Impawssible! It's all moving! How is it done?

char_4077_palico.title: Added to Squad
char_4077_palico.text: Ready for departure!

char_4077_palico.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4077_palico.text: A simple task! I'm a purr-ime leader, after all!

char_4077_palico.title: Depart
char_4077_palico.text: Let's go, 'Hunters!' Put some pep in your step!

char_4077_palico.title: Begin Operation
char_4077_palico.text: Purr-ey spotted. Watch out, Your Meowjesty.

char_4077_palico.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4077_palico.text: By your bidding, Your Meowjesty.

char_4077_palico.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4077_palico.text: Meow! Right here!

char_4077_palico.title: Deployment 1
char_4077_palico.text: You two! Now!

char_4077_palico.title: Deployment 2
char_4077_palico.text: You're purr-essing too hard!

char_4077_palico.title: In Battle 1
char_4077_palico.text: Aim fur that weak spot!

char_4077_palico.title: In Battle 2
char_4077_palico.text: They're wide open!

char_4077_palico.title: In Battle 3
char_4077_palico.text: Taste the flaming soul of a hunter!

char_4077_palico.title: In Battle 4
char_4077_palico.text: The purr-fect slinger technique!

char_4077_palico.title: 4-star Result
char_4077_palico.text: Are... Are we out of danger meow? Can I open my eyes yet?

char_4077_palico.title: 3-star Result
char_4077_palico.text: Absolutely stellar command, Your Meowjesty. That's what I call great gains... mrreow.

char_4077_palico.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4077_palico.text: Equipment everywhere... grabbing, all of it. Grabbing and going.

char_4077_palico.title: Operation Failure
char_4077_palico.text: Good gravy, they're catching up! Run, run like your tail's on fire!

char_4077_palico.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4077_palico.text: Hauling, hauling... Smithy, why do you drag that meowntain of materials with you everywhere you go?

char_4077_palico.title: Tap
char_4077_palico.text: Mrrow~

char_4077_palico.title: Trust Tap
char_4077_palico.text: What are you doing? Mrrow... right there, please... Hey, save a pet or two for me!

char_4077_palico.title: Title
char_4077_palico.text: Arknights.

char_4077_palico.title: Greeting
char_4077_palico.text: Ah, Doctor! Fine day to mew!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1030_noirc2.text: Alright, I'm here to help! Chill, I'm all good with this gear now. Bumping into everything? That's the old me!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: Out in the field, it's pretty important to watch what you and your teammates eat. Just a while ago, I learned how to use this simple BBQ spit to treat raw meat. Here, lemme demo for you right now!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: I've hauled butt all across Terra, and I've never seen gear both as sturdy and as comfortable as this. Feels like when I wear it, my attack power gets boosted, plus I can hit enemy weaknesses way better, and my fire attacks are stronger too! Yeah, uh, I figure that might just be me? Haha.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk 3
char_1030_noirc2.text: The Felynes say the more experienced the hunter, the more thorough the pre-mission prep. Packing all your potions and tools is just as key to the hunt. Still, Yato loves to chew me out, saying I'm always bringing too much stuff on missions. Rock and a hard place, y'know?

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: Feels weird, honestly, not having my ol' reliable shield on hand. Still, the Felynes say if I get good enough with this long sword, I can basically fend off every attack under the sun. Guess my training's got a long way to go.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: You only really master combat technique after taking on enough enemies. I guess no shortcut to getting promoted after all, huh? Especially for dummies like me, haha.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: I get that whetstones aren't thrilling, but they're a tool you can't go without. Even a blade with sharpness this fine is gonna need nonstop polishing its whole life.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: I just wanna do my job as a guy in the background, even now. Us nobodies, we've got our own duties, our own worries, and our own things we wanna protect.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1030_noirc2.text: Ditching the shield, using a long sword like this, it keeps reminding me of the old days. Bad times I hate to remember. But without our past, I guess Yato and me wouldn't be who we are today.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Idle
char_1030_noirc2.text: Get your rest on, Doctor. Leave the place to me.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Onboard
char_1030_noirc2.text: Operator Noir Corne, back under your command with all-new gear! Alright, Doctor, don't care if it's bandits or nightmare bizarro creatures, you leave it all to me!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1030_noirc2.text: Lemme scrub back a sec, I want a closer look. Yeah, mm-hm...

char_1030_noirc2.title: Promotion 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: I've gotta give thanks to my kickass gear for carrying me this far. But obviously, the biggest props go out to you and everyone around me for all your help!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Promotion 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: This is Operator Noir Corne, everyone's shield through hell and high water! And hey, I guess I can handle being everyone's sword too!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Added to Squad
char_1030_noirc2.text: No prob. I'm all readied up.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1030_noirc2.text: You want me to lead, without Yato? You sure? I think it'd be better if you got her on.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Depart
char_1030_noirc2.text: Everybody done eating? Alright, go time!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Begin Operation
char_1030_noirc2.text: Mission start! Target position is a lock!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: Which area am I heading to?

char_1030_noirc2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: Primed and ready!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Deployment 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: Draw!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Deployment 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: Nice, right here!

char_1030_noirc2.title: In Battle 1
char_1030_noirc2.text: Haah! Hey!

char_1030_noirc2.title: In Battle 2
char_1030_noirc2.text: I'm going in!

char_1030_noirc2.title: In Battle 3
char_1030_noirc2.text: I see through you!

char_1030_noirc2.title: In Battle 4
char_1030_noirc2.text: That's my window!

char_1030_noirc2.title: 4-star Result
char_1030_noirc2.text: Now THAT was a good battle. Take pride, everyone, and good work!

char_1030_noirc2.title: 3-star Result
char_1030_noirc2.text: Mission complete, perfect job! We gotta get back to Rhodes Island, because I'm looking forward to celebrating!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1030_noirc2.text: Good work, Doctor. We'll do better next time, don't you worry.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Operation Failure
char_1030_noirc2.text: Doctor! Got your Farcaster from the Felynes? You need to ditch, fast. I'll come right after you, no worries!

char_1030_noirc2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1030_noirc2.text: Whoa, whoa, steady. Lemme put my sword away first.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Tap
char_1030_noirc2.text: What's up, Doctor? Need me to head somewhere?

char_1030_noirc2.title: Trust Tap
char_1030_noirc2.text: Haha, what do you say, Doctor? How about a round of drinks?

char_1030_noirc2.title: Title
char_1030_noirc2.text: Arknights.

char_1030_noirc2.title: Greeting
char_1030_noirc2.text: It's another fine day. Take care of yourself, Doctor!

char_4091_ulika.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4091_ulika.text: Can I go live in here? I'm not really comfortable having a whole crowd standing around watching me stream, so I'd feel way more at ease in your office... Besides, I'm your assistant now anyway, heehee.

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk 1
char_4091_ulika.text: Doctor, I got to thinking that the stream incident might not have been a totally bad thing. After all, I got to know so many nice people ready to lend a helping hand, and you too... Shoot! I forgot to turn off my mic—— Yes, and all of you as well! With your support, I'll break out of this funk!

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk 2
char_4091_ulika.text: I need to decompress after that stream... Games? Doctor, were you even watching my stream? Chat wouldn't stop making fun of how much I suck. I don't wanna play another game this whole week... And that's why I need to practice every day? Uhh... I guess you have a point there?

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk 3
char_4091_ulika.text: Awwgh, it's so frustrating! How come a clip of me tripping over my words gets so many more views than all my VODs combined? I really don't understand viewers these days... Look, Doctor, what's so funny about this compilation of my brain-far—you just laughed, right? You totally laughed just now!

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4091_ulika.text: I won an award the first time I did a solo show. Pretty lucky, huh? What, don't believe me? Look right here, 'Awarded to the employee who stayed put until the end of the show during an earthquake'! Getting hit by an earthquake hit during your debut sounds unlucky? Ah-Ahaha...

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4091_ulika.text: I used to work my butt off every day so I could make more money, then shop more and shop better. But you know, when I use fancy concealer to hide my eye bags, I sometimes wanna cry... Oh, uh, s-speaking of crying, getting fired from the TV station made me want to cry a lot more.

char_4091_ulika.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4091_ulika.text: When I get up there to face my audience, the only advantage I have is the angle of my camera. But you, Doctor... You're the only one who watches my stream in person. You're my most special, and most unique audience. Ahem, it would be even nicer if you tossed a little dono my way~

char_4091_ulika.title: Idle
char_4091_ulika.text: Hello. You looking for the Doctor? What? No, no bother at all. The Doctor's fast asleep, and I'm just eating some dry instant noodles. Want a chunk?

char_4091_ulika.title: Onboard
char_4091_ulika.text: Hello everyone, this is your omnipotent streamer, Eure—Errrr, sorry, scratch that. Rhodes Island operator, U-official! Reporting in, Doctor!

char_4091_ulika.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4091_ulika.text: Doctor, I'm not gonna sugarcoat it. No matter how many vids like this I watch, I won't learn how to fight.

char_4091_ulika.title: Added to Squad
char_4091_ulika.text: Go to war? Me?! This has to be a dream…

char_4091_ulika.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4091_ulika.text: And you're giving me command of the squad to boot? This dream sure is funny, haha...

char_4091_ulika.title: Depart
char_4091_ulika.text: Well, since this is a dream anyway, I will mop up all the enemies for you!

char_4091_ulika.title: Begin Operation
char_4091_ulika.text: Bow down before the true master! Wooooo-wata! Scared now?

char_4091_ulika.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4091_ulika.text: Heehee, mind sending me the instructions... in a superchat?

char_4091_ulika.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4091_ulika.text: Your streamer is in perfect condition and ready to go live!

char_4091_ulika.title: Deployment 1
char_4091_ulika.text: Deep breaths... stay calm…

char_4091_ulika.title: Deployment 2
char_4091_ulika.text: Just treat it like a regular stream? I'll try!

char_4091_ulika.title: In Battle 1
char_4091_ulika.text: Ah, ah, mic check! Can everyone hear me?

char_4091_ulika.title: In Battle 2
char_4091_ulika.text: Let me know what you think in chat!

char_4091_ulika.title: In Battle 3
char_4091_ulika.text: Next up, time to read the comments!

char_4091_ulika.title: In Battle 4
char_4091_ulika.text: Dear viewer, for your aggressive behavior, you've been permabaned from the channel! Oh no!

char_4091_ulika.title: 4-star Result
char_4091_ulika.text: The battle's over, so why haven't I woken up from my dream yet... What? This isn't a dream? Then, how come I'm not hurt at all?!

char_4091_ulika.title: 3-star Result
char_4091_ulika.text: Phew, it's finally over... Time to get a good night's sleep. I hope I don't have any more weird dreams about war.

char_4091_ulika.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4091_ulika.text: Hey you guys running off there, don't forget to tell your friends and family about me. Thank you!

char_4091_ulika.title: Operation Failure
char_4091_ulika.text: Waahhh… this is the worst ending to a stream I could've imagined…

char_4091_ulika.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4091_ulika.text: Can I use this place as the backdrop for my next stream? No? Fine, I'll try someplace else then.

char_4091_ulika.title: Tap
char_4091_ulika.text: Don't jumpscare me like that! A monster just pushed me into the pit, now I have to do a 'no death run'…

char_4091_ulika.title: Trust Tap
char_4091_ulika.text: I'm done streaming, Doctor. Wanna take a walk around the deck?

char_4091_ulika.title: Title
char_4091_ulika.text: Arknights.

char_4091_ulika.title: Greeting
char_4091_ulika.text: Thanks for letting me stream from your office, Doctor.

char_491_humus.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_491_humus.text: Can I have this printer that's written off? And my gosh, how could you dump that whole pile of paper in the shredder? You can still write on the back!

char_491_humus.title: Talk 1
char_491_humus.text: Whoa whoa, Stay back. I just finished work, so I'm all sweaty. You need something? If it's not urgent, just go back to your office. Let me wash up and get a change of clothes, then I'll come talk to you.

char_491_humus.title: Talk 2
char_491_humus.text: Hahaha, Check me out! I made this whole outfit by myself. Yeah, it looks like crap, but it's sturdy! And you see this sickle?  I tore a door off a huge car to make it. I've used it for years, and it's good as new.

char_491_humus.title: Talk 3
char_491_humus.text: See that electric cooker of mine? I made it out of an old heater. And my space heater there, I made it out of an old TV. And As for the TV here, I put that together from the parts of a broken bread maker. Where did I get this bread maker? Aha, I modded an electric cooker I scavenged.

char_491_humus.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_491_humus.text: The Pioneer guys are different from us. They get to wander around. Not us. Once you come to the disposal plant, you're staying forever.  Think you can run? Not happening, my friend. Look at your supplies, how far could you go? There's nothing but wasteland for miles. Your only shot at survival is staying inside.

char_491_humus.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_491_humus.text: You have no idea how heartless those snobs are. They dump just about anyone in the disposal plant. Kids barely old enough to work, old folks in bad health. I can't stand it, but there's not much I can do other than making sure they get fed alongside me.

char_491_humus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_491_humus.text: Doctor, remember that printer I took off your hands? Here, I fixed it. Oh, but keep an eye on the thermometer up top when you use it. If it goes over the threshold, it could explode.

char_491_humus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_491_humus.text: Yeah, Doctor, I've got a temper, and I can't just sit by and watch bad things happen. In the end, I made the wrong enemies, and got thrown in the disposal plant. A whole decade came and went in the blink of an eye, like a nightmare... But now the dream's gone, and I'm awake! I don't regret it one bit. I'll keep my temper and make no compromises.

char_491_humus.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_491_humus.text: Ever since we were kids, if folks like us wanted to eat, we had to count on the scraps the snobs let slip from on high. Sadly, that's not enough to fill your stomach. So some folks end up stealing, naturally. That's not something anyone should do, I know. But if there was another way, why would you need to steal?

char_491_humus.title: Idle
char_491_humus.text: Whatever it is, it can wait until tomorrow! There's unlimited steak at the canteen today, I'd better get over there right away!

char_491_humus.title: Onboard
char_491_humus.text: Doctor, Rhodes Island has done so much for me. What can I say except thank you? If you need anything, just say the word. I'll do whatever it takes to make it happen!

char_491_humus.title: Watching Battle Record
char_491_humus.text: Doctor, I can read a little bit, but the jargon in this video is pretty dense. I can barely make any sense of it.

char_491_humus.title: Promotion 1
char_491_humus.text: What? You're giving me a promotion? Me? For real? Hold up, what was I doing before this?

char_491_humus.title: Promotion 2
char_491_humus.text: Thanks, Doctor... If only my old man had lived long enough to see this day. His kid... always up to no good... has finally made a name for himself.

char_491_humus.title: Added to Squad
char_491_humus.text: Agh... It's been a while since I beat anyone up. Hope I didn't get too rusty.

char_491_humus.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_491_humus.text: Yeah, I can be the captain and chaperone these kids. I'll make sure all of them come back alive.

char_491_humus.title: Depart
char_491_humus.text: Stop right there, you little cubs! Don't just rush in ahead!

char_491_humus.title: Begin Operation
char_491_humus.text: You come at me like that, you can't blame me for what happens next.

char_491_humus.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_491_humus.text: Are you ready?

char_491_humus.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_491_humus.text: I'm all set to go.

char_491_humus.title: Deployment 1
char_491_humus.text: Huh? I thought you wanted me here to fix a lock!

char_491_humus.title: Deployment 2
char_491_humus.text: Whose car is this? I... How should I know?

char_491_humus.title: In Battle 1
char_491_humus.text: A one-on-one? Tough guy, huh.

char_491_humus.title: In Battle 2
char_491_humus.text: What, you think you're gonna grind me down with numbers?

char_491_humus.title: In Battle 3
char_491_humus.text: There's more of you? Ugh, what a day.

char_491_humus.title: In Battle 4
char_491_humus.text: Arghhhh screw it! Bring it on, all of you!

char_491_humus.title: 4-star Result
char_491_humus.text: Ugh, I just hope these punks learned their lesson.

char_491_humus.title: 3-star Result
char_491_humus.text: No enemies in sight. But I'm sure they left behind some pretty good stuff.

char_491_humus.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_491_humus.text: No, no, don't chase them. Just let them be. They got beaten so bad, they won't be causing trouble for a long while.

char_491_humus.title: Operation Failure
char_491_humus.text: Relax, nobody wins every fight. Go home, wash your face. Life goes on.

char_491_humus.title: Assigned to Facility
char_491_humus.text: Man, this bed is too soft. I just can't fall asleep. Could you give me something firmer? That's how I like it.

char_491_humus.title: Tap
char_491_humus.text: Hm? Need some help? I'm your man.

char_491_humus.title: Trust Tap
char_491_humus.text: Here, I grabbed you some tangerines from the canteen.

char_491_humus.title: Title
char_491_humus.text: Arknights.

char_491_humus.title: Greeting
char_491_humus.text: No matter how busy you are, be sure to eat right, Doctor.

char_154_morgan.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_154_morgan.text: You want to chat future op planning? You've come to the right person, Doctor, love. I'm the entire stuffing brains of Glasgow.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk 1
char_154_morgan.text: Eugh, this doesn't taste right. Is this can gone off...? Ay, get Hannah to try this for me, will you? Oh, and if she scoffs the whole thing in one go... well, waste not want not, yeah?

char_154_morgan.title: Talk 2
char_154_morgan.text: Why do I fight with such a naff-off big machete? Because I'm trying to be efficient here! If I scare some enemies off, that's enemies I don't need to do in. I mean obviously, I'm handy with me fists too. 'Cuz you spend as long as us on the streets, you learn how to scrap from every angle.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk 3
char_154_morgan.text: When we left the Glasgow Gang behind, see, I thought we'd all be back in a jiffy. But here we are ages later, and still on the go. Everything's changed. Vina, Hannah, Baird, and especially me... yeah, I might have changed most out of us.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_154_morgan.text: I had my grievances, I did. While Victoria was booming, I was living on scraps. Who said I should pay the price once the bloody place went arse-up? But look at me, I came back anyway. I mean, my life, everyone I care about... all of it's here still.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_154_morgan.text: I guess me old Morgan's Memoirs is gone. Probably lost it in the Glasgow Gang base, if you'd even call it a base... and if the Glasgow Gang still exists. War's not some heroic fantasy. There's moments of deathly honest grief... just, instants you can't describe.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_154_morgan.text: I got a good head on my shoulders, don't I? Not like I'm book-smart or anything here—the most I'm good at is scheming a thing or two in the street. Be honest, sometimes, there's this thought that plagues me, how maybe I'm no help to Vina at all... What, that's rubbish, you think...? Yeah, alright, fair dos, love! I can't be quitting now!

char_154_morgan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_154_morgan.text: It might be easy for us to follow the leader, but you know what? While we go after Vina—who's Vina got to go after? I don't want to be behind her anymore, Doctor. I want to go with her, or take her along. That way, when she gets tired, at least she'll have my shoulder to rest on.

char_154_morgan.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_154_morgan.text: Once we succeed with all this, I... hahah, the ffffirst thing I wanna do! Is go out and get smashed with the girls again... Doctor, promise me, you'll come crawling with us. We'll have a right hoot... forget all our troubles. Sound good, love?

char_154_morgan.title: Idle
char_154_morgan.text: Ay-yi-yi, someone's wide open. I could do some face painting on you, love?

char_154_morgan.title: Onboard
char_154_morgan.text: Alright, Doctor? I'm Morgan. Vina said you'd like some assistance from me? I've got brains to pick and brawn with a machete—whatever you need, love, just ask.

char_154_morgan.title: Watching Battle Record
char_154_morgan.text: Not bad, not bad, learned a thing or two. In exchange, why not have a copy of How to Fight with the Glasgow Gang?

char_154_morgan.title: Promotion 1
char_154_morgan.text: Well, I'm honored! You've got a sharp eye, Doctor, just like Vina.

char_154_morgan.title: Promotion 2
char_154_morgan.text: There'll be plenty more trouble in future for the Glasgow Gang, but you won't catch me running. Whatever we can't handle, you bet I'll keep trying to figure it out. Whatever we can handle, you let my machete and Molotovs do the work!

char_154_morgan.title: Added to Squad
char_154_morgan.text: Coming, love, coming. Not too late, am I?

char_154_morgan.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_154_morgan.text: No prob. Minding you lot's a breeze compared to Glasgow.

char_154_morgan.title: Depart
char_154_morgan.text: Doctor, love, how'd you even come up with these plans?

char_154_morgan.title: Begin Operation
char_154_morgan.text: Maybe let's try ambushing them?

char_154_morgan.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_154_morgan.text: Machete's all sharp.

char_154_morgan.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_154_morgan.text: Alright, who am I hacking up?

char_154_morgan.title: Deployment 1
char_154_morgan.text: Watch. There's method to a brawl.

char_154_morgan.title: Deployment 2
char_154_morgan.text: Can't just be all brawn.

char_154_morgan.title: In Battle 1
char_154_morgan.text: Ay-up! Watch your left.

char_154_morgan.title: In Battle 2
char_154_morgan.text: Nah, mate, I'm on your right.

char_154_morgan.title: In Battle 3
char_154_morgan.text: Lessee, who's the next sap getting duffed up?

char_154_morgan.title: In Battle 4
char_154_morgan.text: You don't win until you beat us all.

char_154_morgan.title: 4-star Result
char_154_morgan.text: All that command was complex stuff... I'm having trouble keeping up now. Doctor, love, once we're back, can you break down today's battle for me? You'd do me a solid!

char_154_morgan.title: 3-star Result
char_154_morgan.text: Doctor, want to celebrate the Glasgow way? First me and Hannah grab a leg each, then we shut our eyes, and then we hip-hip-hurray and send you flying... ay, no need to run, love, I'm just joking!

char_154_morgan.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_154_morgan.text: I know every bend around these parts. Give me one minute, and I'll root those bastards out.

char_154_morgan.title: Operation Failure
char_154_morgan.text: I'm not... I'm not falling here. The story of Vina and every one of us... is NOT over!

char_154_morgan.title: Assigned to Facility
char_154_morgan.text: Dead quiet around here... hahah, makes me wish I could do it like Vina and kip somewhere.

char_154_morgan.title: Tap
char_154_morgan.text: Ooh, surprise Doctor attack!

char_154_morgan.title: Trust Tap
char_154_morgan.text: Got some good news to share, Doctor? Because if you don't, let me tell you a joke.

char_154_morgan.title: Title
char_154_morgan.text: Arknights.

char_154_morgan.title: Greeting
char_154_morgan.text: Alright, Doctor! Fancy seeing you about.

char_464_cement.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_464_cement.text: Don't stay cooped up in your office all the time, Doki. Why don't you come down to the mines with me one of these days?

char_464_cement.title: Talk 1
char_464_cement.text: Something smells moldy. Should be in the bottom left drawer. My nose is never wrong... Well, Doki, You should really deal with those documents before they pile up. If you just leave them like that, they're gonna get damp.

char_464_cement.title: Talk 2
char_464_cement.text: My drills are all souped up. They've got twice the impact, improved stability, and they pretty much can't jam. Anyway, I'm a pro when it comes to boring, tunneling, and laying concrete. If you've got any construction jobs like that, I'm your girl!

char_464_cement.title: Talk 3
char_464_cement.text: First, you check construction blueprints ahead of time. Second, you don't disrupt our work without a good reason. Third: You never, ever fall behind on your payments. That's the three principles Shana's Construction Crew uses to decide on projects. No exceptions, Doki, not even for Rhodes Island.

char_464_cement.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_464_cement.text: Rim Billiton has more prospecting operation platforms than you can count, with tons of workers running around. You gotta know what you're doing to get anybody to listen to ya. I work hard to refine my skills, and I teach what I know to the gang. That's the way I do things... Yeah.

char_464_cement.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_464_cement.text: We don't compromise on safety, even in barren mines with low output. Infected or not, so long as you work the mines, your rights oughta be guaranteed. I hope we never see another Billy mine accident. At the very least, I always make sure my projects stand up to inspection.

char_464_cement.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_464_cement.text: Doctor, want a lolly? It's just a regular mint one. I always keep some in my pocket. Don't underestimate the power of a lolly, though. When there's dusty air all around you, a little sweetness can really calm you down.

char_464_cement.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_464_cement.text: My dad always said that Columbia's Great Expansion marked the start of a new age. Now, the big corps pull in all different countries on big projects. Rim Billiton's ores really shine out there. But you know how things go, the taller the building, the more solid the foundations have to be. That's why the work we do is always meaningful, no matter the task.

char_464_cement.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_464_cement.text: A Billy worker never sees the sun.' That's what my friends in the mines always say. The darkness down there swallows everything, work and life, past and future... I want to give people hope for the future, Doki, give them better lives. Easy enough to say, but there's lots of work to do. You'll lend a hand, won't you, Doki?

char_464_cement.title: Idle
char_464_cement.text: Alright, lads, day's done. Rest up now.

char_464_cement.title: Onboard
char_464_cement.text: Oh, so you're the Doctor everyone's talking about! I'm new in Engineering; foreman of Shana's Construction Crew out of Rim Billiton! Here's my business card.

char_464_cement.title: Watching Battle Record
char_464_cement.text: Nah yeah… If the mines just provided workers with recorders, it would save us so much hassle.

char_464_cement.title: Promotion 1
char_464_cement.text: I thought it was a joke when I got a new contract from HR. Not only did my pay go up, I get even more benefits... Thanks, Doki!

char_464_cement.title: Promotion 2
char_464_cement.text: If I ever get the chance, I want to go check out Columbia, see the Great Expansion with my own eyes and how their workers are different from ours in Rim Billiton... Doki, Rhodes Island works with a lot of big companies, right?

char_464_cement.title: Added to Squad
char_464_cement.text: Work, work! Hop to it now!

char_464_cement.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_464_cement.text: You all got your helmets on? Check again!

char_464_cement.title: Depart
char_464_cement.text: This shaft's got a complicated layout. Follow me.

char_464_cement.title: Begin Operation
char_464_cement.text: Ah! Why is my drill stuck?!

char_464_cement.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_464_cement.text: Hm…? What's that smell?

char_464_cement.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_464_cement.text: Relax, Doki, just show up at completion time.

char_464_cement.title: Deployment 1
char_464_cement.text: The blueprints check out. Let the construction work begin!

char_464_cement.title: Deployment 2
char_464_cement.text: Remember, max deviation for each drill hole is two centimeters!

char_464_cement.title: In Battle 1
char_464_cement.text: Oi! Stay focused when you're running that boring machine!

char_464_cement.title: In Battle 2
char_464_cement.text: A triple bright miner's lamp could make ya go blind!

char_464_cement.title: In Battle 3
char_464_cement.text: Move, or this cement's going right on your heads!

char_464_cement.title: In Battle 4
char_464_cement.text: Dig! Diiig! Diiiiiiig!

char_464_cement.title: 4-star Result
char_464_cement.text: Doki! We… We just wrapped up a huge project!

char_464_cement.title: 3-star Result
char_464_cement.text: When worker safety's on the line, you can't slip up for even a single second.

char_464_cement.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_464_cement.text: If you spot anything after construction's done, that's already too late. We need to find as many problems as we can in the design stage.

char_464_cement.title: Operation Failure
char_464_cement.text: Don't be glum, chum. Follow-up work is part of construction, too. Just leave it to me to take care of the reinforcement. Cheer up, Doki.

char_464_cement.title: Assigned to Facility
char_464_cement.text: Let's say Rhodes Island needs some dorms rebuilt, think you might hire Shana's Construction Crew? Hehe…

char_464_cement.title: Tap
char_464_cement.text: Eeek! Oh, it's you, Doki. Sorry, didn't notice you over the sound of the drill.

char_464_cement.title: Trust Tap
char_464_cement.text: Doki, can you hold this shield for me? Careful now, it's heavy. The inside there? That's concrete, baby.

char_464_cement.title: Title
char_464_cement.text: Arknights.

char_464_cement.title: Greeting
char_464_cement.text: Hey, Doki! Here, a mint for ya.

char_4087_ines.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4087_ines.text: You can keep me in the shadows. My KIA status comes in handy, so no running your mouth about me being here.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk 1
char_4087_ines.text: ...I'd put down that tray, if I were you. It's one of W's 'wake-up calls' she makes for all of us. The woman's brain's like those wilds around Kazdel, taken by her overgrown madness by the year. And anyone who trusts a lunatic like her... Heh, is probably just as insane.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk 2
char_4087_ines.text: There was one who hoped to flee the war, but only ended up sinking deeper and deeper into its quagmire. Heh, Pathetic, isn't it? But that's exactly how we live. We either give up and resign ourselves to death, or... we kill this very way of life.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk 3
char_4087_ines.text: Your eyes aren't deceiving you. Yes, it's a sewing kit. A needle drinks as much blood as a sword, in the hands of a merc. Besides… it's a tall order to look decent on battlefield, and a smart cookie like you should know that well, right?

char_4087_ines.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4087_ines.text: On the northern side of Kazdel... is a birch forest. Those gray and white trees wither in the frigid wind, then struggle to regain their vitality the following year. But when the last trees died, they had no idea that spring would never come back.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4087_ines.text: For all the people to fall into peaceful slumber?' Not half bad for a fancy dream of yours. I only hope people could have a chance to struggle on in the face of war and death, and perhaps after that, some energy leftover to hold a grude. That is why I'm signing this agreement with Babel… with you, Rhodes Island.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4087_ines.text: Those faint lights out the window... They're campfires in the wilderness. W says I like campfires? Hehe, that's because the shadows under the fire don't lie. I see myself in them.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4087_ines.text: A merc who lived her life staring death in the face, but chose to die for a pipe dream in the end… Sounds like a bad joke, doesn't it? But if you had to make sense of it, the merc probably hopes her death could be more than a sneaky battlefield tactic. That's all.

char_4087_ines.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4087_ines.text: My eyes tell me that this ship, that doctor, Her Majesty, and you... have all changed. W thinks you're too good of an actor. She doesn't want to admit it, but she's changed a lot too. It's not like there's anything we could do about it anyway. The shadows beneath our feet keep getting longer and longer.

char_4087_ines.title: Idle
char_4087_ines.text: ...Your dreams are a lot more peaceful than I expected.

char_4087_ines.title: Onboard
char_4087_ines.text: Ascalon showed you my files. Messenger or mercenary, you ask? Doesn't matter. I'm not after your life for now , 'Doctor.'

char_4087_ines.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4087_ines.text: Are you sure I need to watch these? Back in Kazdel, you used to lead my people.

char_4087_ines.title: Promotion 1
char_4087_ines.text: Hmph, great. Even in the middle of a war, you people still insist on these goddamned ceremonies.

char_4087_ines.title: Promotion 2
char_4087_ines.text: For us mercs, life is war, and war is life. The only escape is death. Our struggle will never end, as long as we live.

char_4087_ines.title: Added to Squad
char_4087_ines.text: Getting this crew together wasn't easy. You better make them count.

char_4087_ines.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4087_ines.text: W, on my team? Whatever, I'm just wondering what crap she's up to this time.

char_4087_ines.title: Depart
char_4087_ines.text: Let's see... Which insect is falling into my trap?

char_4087_ines.title: Begin Operation
char_4087_ines.text: The shadows are trembling.

char_4087_ines.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4087_ines.text: I know what to do. Don't order me around.

char_4087_ines.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4087_ines.text: Don't keep me waiting.

char_4087_ines.title: Deployment 1
char_4087_ines.text: Picked out your bait yet?

char_4087_ines.title: Deployment 2
char_4087_ines.text: I'm listening.

char_4087_ines.title: In Battle 1
char_4087_ines.text: You can't hide your fear.

char_4087_ines.title: In Battle 2
char_4087_ines.text: Nothing can mask the scent of despair.

char_4087_ines.title: In Battle 3
char_4087_ines.text: Better watch your step.

char_4087_ines.title: In Battle 4
char_4087_ines.text: I will sink your corpse into shadow. No one will find it.

char_4087_ines.title: 4-star Result
char_4087_ines.text: You always win, just like the old days. But this time, your joy is real.

char_4087_ines.title: 3-star Result
char_4087_ines.text: Take a breather and tally up your losses. Nothing worth celebrating here, we might be dead in a second or two.

char_4087_ines.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4087_ines.text: Wow, you kept everyone alive. Congrats.

char_4087_ines.title: Operation Failure
char_4087_ines.text: ...An arm, an eye, or maybe something else. More than enough to trade for a few enemy heads. Or, would you rather bear the price of failure? Tch, suit yourself.

char_4087_ines.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4087_ines.text: 'Rhodes Island'... This landship sure has gotten a lot brighter.

char_4087_ines.title: Tap
char_4087_ines.text: Not the safest way to say hello.

char_4087_ines.title: Trust Tap
char_4087_ines.text: If you want to make small talk, Hoederer's your guy. Or... I guess you'd rather stand here in silence with me for a while.

char_4087_ines.title: Title
char_4087_ines.text: Arknights.

char_4087_ines.title: Greeting
char_4087_ines.text: Ascalon forced me to take this 'bodyguard' gig. Pick your jaw up off the ground, Doctor. You'll be seeing a lot more of me for a while.

char_1031_slent2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1031_slent2.text: Let's commence work, Doctor. We have a mountain of issues to face.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk 1
char_1031_slent2.text: Doctor, can you pass a message onto Ifrit for me? I'm returning to Trimounts—there's some urgent business that requires me in person. So she'll have to eat dinner with Saria tonight. I... I'll make it up to her next time, I promise.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk 2
char_1031_slent2.text: Do you need coffee? This is a special bean Joyce prepared for me that keeps me up even in the daytime. After all, I can't coop up alone in the lab day and night like I once did. I have lots of meetings that I'd rather not take, and lots of reports to read that I'd also rather not.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk 3
char_1031_slent2.text: My thoughts on returning to Rhine Lab...? I'd rather not reflect on it like that, if I could. All I can say is, I used to perennially expect someone would come to my aid, but now I understand—I can only rely on myself if I am to achieve anything.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1031_slent2.text: Guess what this stack of papers is? They're whistleblower reports. Some labs think they can protect themselves by airing other labs' dirty laundry to me. The more they do this, the more anger I feel welling up inside.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1031_slent2.text: Return those gifts to senders, and have them convey to whoever's behind them, that I'll be making a personal visit, and they'd better be prepared... Sorry, Doctor, am I bothering you at work? I'll excuse myself for now. Yes, alright, I'll be back in Trimounts later today...

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1031_slent2.text: This contract pertains to the ensuing direction of our partnership with Rhodes Island, Doctor. You'd better take a look. I don't want us to blindly accept Rhodes Island's aid. Of course, I do hope that outside of work, we'll remain good friends.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1031_slent2.text: Yes, Doctor? No, I'm no longer restricting Ifrit from seeing Saria. Honestly, on the contrary, I hope they see more of each other now. Ifrit is grown up, after all. And more importantly, her presence will remind Saria that,  not all prices are numbers, and reports do not remove scars.

char_1031_slent2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1031_slent2.text: To be honest, being domineering is an awful sensation. When people come to my desk, the way they look at me makes me uncomfortable. But that's something I'll gradually adapt to. I'm going to rest for a short while, Doctor. I'd like to hear your thoughts after I wake up.

char_1031_slent2.title: Idle
char_1031_slent2.text: I'll deal with some minor affairs for you, Doctor. Rest well.

char_1031_slent2.title: Onboard
char_1031_slent2.text: Doctor, my time aboard Rhodes Island will be inevitably diminished in the future. There is one thing, however, that I can guarantee: my relationship with Rhodes Island will only grow closer, because I trust Rhodes Island, and I trust you.

char_1031_slent2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1031_slent2.text: Some battles are unavoidable, I know.

char_1031_slent2.title: Promotion 1
char_1031_slent2.text: The pharmaceutical I took part in developing is highly effective? That's excellent. Though I have to devote more of my energy elsewhere, I would never want to give up my research.

char_1031_slent2.title: Promotion 2
char_1031_slent2.text: I know what you want to ask. The path I'm about to walk is a thorny one. Am I really prepared for it…? I don't know whether future me will come to regret this, but at least right now, I will firmly walk on.

char_1031_slent2.title: Added to Squad
char_1031_slent2.text: Support role aside, you can delegate some tactical planning work to me too.

char_1031_slent2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1031_slent2.text: I'll see to it our tactics are drawn up.

char_1031_slent2.title: Depart
char_1031_slent2.text: We should probe into the significance of the fight, and not indulge its outbreak.

char_1031_slent2.title: Begin Operation
char_1031_slent2.text: I'm a physician, but also a member of the squad. Let's go.

char_1031_slent2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1031_slent2.text: Any change in tactics?

char_1031_slent2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1031_slent2.text: I'm ready.

char_1031_slent2.title: Deployment 1
char_1031_slent2.text: I concur.

char_1031_slent2.title: Deployment 2
char_1031_slent2.text: Understood.

char_1031_slent2.title: In Battle 1
