char_1031_slent2.text: Don't act rashly.

char_1031_slent2.title: In Battle 2
char_1031_slent2.text: This is an excellent opportunity.

char_1031_slent2.title: In Battle 3
char_1031_slent2.text: I hope nobody is hurt.

char_1031_slent2.title: In Battle 4
char_1031_slent2.text: Just as planned.

char_1031_slent2.title: 4-star Result
char_1031_slent2.text: Doctor, I always find a great deal to learn from you, though I hope I never have occasion to use these tactics.

char_1031_slent2.title: 3-star Result
char_1031_slent2.text: The samples in this area... We've taken these before. Let's move on.

char_1031_slent2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1031_slent2.text: I'll organize aid for wounded personnel. Everyone else, please assist in maintaining the perimeter.

char_1031_slent2.title: Operation Failure
char_1031_slent2.text: Doctor... it looks like we should reformulate our tactics.

char_1031_slent2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1031_slent2.text: This place still feels like home.

char_1031_slent2.title: Tap
char_1031_slent2.text: ...Huh?

char_1031_slent2.title: Trust Tap
char_1031_slent2.text: Doctor, I happen to have some issues I'd like to discuss with you. Are you available right now?

char_1031_slent2.title: Title
char_1031_slent2.text: Arknights.

char_1031_slent2.title: Greeting
char_1031_slent2.text: Coffee, Doctor?

char_4027_heyak.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4027_heyak.text: Here, two Minoan Mists, freshly brewed... I'll have to behave myself, Doctor, since I'm your assistant now. The next time you choke on my strangling tail after getting me mad, I'll make sure you can at least find some solace in my feathers.

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk 1
char_4027_heyak.text: Immoral scientist, disloyal mercenary, double-crossing spy... Yes, that's all me. Rules are what bar you from working to your full efficiency, darling, and you must learn to break them. That being said, I'm sure you have more to share with me for what little time we have alone together, other than the rules of Rhodes Island, I suppose?

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk 2
char_4027_heyak.text: As senior consultant to Rhodes Island, I'd love to have more time to study the archives and collections of this ship. Meet my coworkers? You see the flow of history and soundless order in those objects. Tell me, what's worth seeing in people?

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk 3
char_4027_heyak.text: 'Reflect the truth and glimpse the future'? Most astrologers got started just to steal a peek at their own doom. But when Kristen tore open the skies over Trimounts, she debunked astrology as the silly fabrication it is. And that's more interesting than the practice itself.

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4027_heyak.text: The foolish build walls, the wise topple them... or vice versa. History is a database that holds more than it seems, full of hints about the future. After all, history itself was the future for countless generations... that's what really grips me.

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4027_heyak.text: Our story? Feathers wet by dew from the trees, tails sweeping past decrepit pillars. Thus, knowledge was passed on through generations. We embrace the ever-expanding unknown, and walk toward madness... I don't want to lose my mind, of course. But if that's what it takes to change this ridiculous fate, then I'll do it gladly.

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4027_heyak.text: Doctor, were you… avoiding me? I just wanted to show you a newly-excavated ruin I found. What's that? Why do I keep bothering you? Oh my, shouldn't you do some soul-searching and ask why you are the only one I'm bothering?

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4027_heyak.text: I saw you with Muelsyse at the mall in Trimounts. That elf surely knows how to work her charm, doesn't she? I could use some assistance from you as well, but my 'approaches' are different. Look down now, my tail will gladly learn the way through your heart, unless you accept my offer.

char_4027_heyak.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4027_heyak.text: Tell me, Doctor, how does it feel to lose your memory? I couldn't bear to see a great library reduced to ashes in a fire. But a librarian fool enough to only brush the dust off the shelves pains me even more. Who's sadder, you or me?

char_4027_heyak.title: Idle
char_4027_heyak.text: Your ears are red. Sensitive, aren't they? Puff... oh, they're getting redder! Now don't you move. You're still at work, you know.

char_4027_heyak.title: Onboard
char_4027_heyak.text: I'm not here representing Maylander or Rhine Lab. I'm here because I, Ho'olheyak, want some further contact with Rhodes Island... Now, now, why are you trying to shake off my hand? I haven't finished introducing myself yet.

char_4027_heyak.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4027_heyak.text: Are we done yet?

char_4027_heyak.title: Promotion 1
char_4027_heyak.text: Congratulations. You've earned yourself a promotion from me too. This time, I brewed four Minoan Mists... do they really punch you that hard? Stay sober now, if you know what's good for you.

char_4027_heyak.title: Promotion 2
char_4027_heyak.text: Another promotion? Does that mean more permissions at Rhodes Island? There are secrets in this ship that even you don't know about, I can sense that. Just what fun we'll have!

char_4027_heyak.title: Added to Squad
char_4027_heyak.text: My job is to innovate on these missions. Your job is to be impressed.

char_4027_heyak.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4027_heyak.text: There's no plan. Plans change anyway. As long as it helps the mission, you can break the rules at any time.

char_4027_heyak.title: Depart
char_4027_heyak.text: I'd rather operate solo.

char_4027_heyak.title: Begin Operation
char_4027_heyak.text: Oh? What a surprise.

char_4027_heyak.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4027_heyak.text: I thought I was just here as a consultant.

char_4027_heyak.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4027_heyak.text: My, my...Are you sure you want to treat me as a mercenary?

char_4027_heyak.title: Deployment 1
char_4027_heyak.text: Such ruthlessness! I said I don't like getting my feathers wet.

char_4027_heyak.title: Deployment 2
char_4027_heyak.text: How rude~ Didn't I tell you not to get dust on my tail?

char_4027_heyak.title: In Battle 1
char_4027_heyak.text: Leaving so soon?

char_4027_heyak.title: In Battle 2
char_4027_heyak.text: Could you even leave?

char_4027_heyak.title: In Battle 3
char_4027_heyak.text: Oh, your Arts aren't working. How can that be?

char_4027_heyak.title: In Battle 4
char_4027_heyak.text: Did I say I was going to have mercy? I lied.

char_4027_heyak.title: 4-star Result
char_4027_heyak.text: Doctor, your performance reminds me of a bunch of unfounded legends. But now, I believe in them. Legends no more.

char_4027_heyak.title: 3-star Result
char_4027_heyak.text: Are you… waiting for a compliment?

char_4027_heyak.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4027_heyak.text: Nothing is 100% true. Similarly, nothing is 100% false. Doctor, what we've done is already enough to bring all kinds of change.

char_4027_heyak.title: Operation Failure
char_4027_heyak.text: Leave the rest to me. I'm used to picking up other people's messes. Use the time to think about how you'll thank me.

char_4027_heyak.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4027_heyak.text: Excuse me, are we accommodating a mercenary here, or is this how Rhodes Island welcomes their senior consultant...? Heh, Just kidding.

char_4027_heyak.title: Tap
char_4027_heyak.text: What, here to challenge Siestan Iced Tea? Or, Minoan Mist?

char_4027_heyak.title: Trust Tap
char_4027_heyak.text: Careful! These are rare documents. How did I get them? Relax, not by following procedure, I assure you. What, you wanna interrogate me?

char_4027_heyak.title: Title
char_4027_heyak.text: Arknights.

char_4027_heyak.title: Greeting
char_4027_heyak.text: Well, if it isn't the Doctor… What a coincidence, us bumping into each other.

char_4006_melnte.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4006_melnte.text: You would like me to take care of your secretarial work? I can, but please do keep the amount of work under control. I used to write reports fairly often, but most don't find the contents of my reports very pleasant to read.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk 1
char_4006_melnte.text: You can stop looking at my shoulder. This is not an Oripathy lesion. It's just a tattoo that resembles one. Why? To outwit anyone who thinks they've found a weakness. You won't bother me again after the first time you guess wrong.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk 2
char_4006_melnte.text: That's right. I became an Infected while I was testing this railgun. Why am I still using it? First, it's safe now that it has been fine-tuned. Secondly, while I don't want to admit it, this is the weapon that suits me the most. I don't want to or dare to abandon it.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk 3
char_4006_melnte.text: The medicine in my earrings? It's not medicine. It's a perfume that I mixed myself. A highly concentrated perfume that can induce... emotions that run opposite to hostility. It comes in handy in dangerous situations. As for the lower concentrated one that I have here... Umm, it's for alleviating carsickness. I tend to get carsick pretty badly.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4006_melnte.text: I'd say I was a mercenary, more than a weapons tester. As soon as the higher-ups gave the order, I would have to take to the battlefield with newly-issued equipment. It was nothing like the battles I've fought for Rhodes Island. No one knew or cared why I fought.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4006_melnte.text: I was infected not because of an accident, but because of a transaction. For my infection, the client got their data, and the provided got a significant payment. Plus, they got to keep me on a leash with their insurance... If it wasn't for them treating me like a tuskbeast, why would I have run?

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4006_melnte.text: The first time I struck a dummy, I thought back to my parents, that bandit, and how powerless I was despite having a gun in my hand... Even after I was out of ammo, I was still mechanically pulling the trigger over and over, until the coach took away the launcher in my hand. That's right. A launcher, not a gun.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4006_melnte.text: I once thought about opening a sundries shop like my parents did. Once, I even had an agreement with a landlord. Then, I had nightmares that entire night... Now? Much better. I'm even trying to help Instructor Dur-nar—Oh, please don't tell anyone about this.

char_4006_melnte.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4006_melnte.text: My father used to tell me stories of how the great Blacksteel founder upgraded their firearms. But it wasn't until recently that I realized true greatness is not to popularize some kind of weapon. Instead, it's to make weapons useless forever. Right, it's very ironic. This is what I dream of achieving, and it is something that I can only dream of achieving.

char_4006_melnte.title: Idle
char_4006_melnte.text: Please rest at ease. I will ensure the office's safety during this period of time.

char_4006_melnte.title: Onboard
char_4006_melnte.text: Nice to meet you, Doctor. As a field operator, I will be in your service from here onwards. I hope that my firepower will not betray your expectations.

char_4006_melnte.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4006_melnte.text: That is excellent CQC, but perhaps a little too dangerous...

char_4006_melnte.title: Promotion 1
char_4006_melnte.text: The only way my former employer expresses approval is by raising wages—Don't get the wrong idea. For every wage increase, they make you do ten times the work afterwards. That's not how Rhodes Island works, right?

char_4006_melnte.title: Promotion 2
char_4006_melnte.text: Thank you for your trust, Doctor. I used to think of Rhodes Island as a stopping point so beautiful that it's almost unreal, but it now seems I will have to extend my stay here for a little longer.

char_4006_melnte.title: Added to Squad
char_4006_melnte.text: I'll provide fire support for everyone.

char_4006_melnte.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4006_melnte.text: You are appointing me as the leader? It appears this will be a tough battle.

char_4006_melnte.title: Depart
char_4006_melnte.text: Everyone, so that we don't run into any unexpected issues on the field, check your weapons once again.

char_4006_melnte.title: Begin Operation
char_4006_melnte.text: Maintain a safe distance. Avoid direct confrontation if possible.

char_4006_melnte.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4006_melnte.text: I'm here.

char_4006_melnte.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4006_melnte.text: Your command?

char_4006_melnte.title: Deployment 1
char_4006_melnte.text: Adjusting firing trajectory... Complete.

char_4006_melnte.title: Deployment 2
char_4006_melnte.text: Weapon's good. Ready for data collection.

char_4006_melnte.title: In Battle 1
char_4006_melnte.text: Shh. Do you hear that? That's the sound of the reaper making her advent.

char_4006_melnte.title: In Battle 2
char_4006_melnte.text: Laying suppressive fire.

char_4006_melnte.title: In Battle 3
char_4006_melnte.text: Maximum output reached.

char_4006_melnte.title: In Battle 4
char_4006_melnte.text: Don't huddle there. Hard for me to assess the blast area.

char_4006_melnte.title: 4-star Result
char_4006_melnte.text: I... I'm suddenly a little terrified. If I were on the other side facing you and your command, how much of the firepower I'm so proud of would actually be effective?

char_4006_melnte.title: 3-star Result
char_4006_melnte.text: A perfect performance, to the point that I want to write an evaluation report, voluntarily.

char_4006_melnte.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4006_melnte.text: A few of them got away. It seems we need some further adjustments.

char_4006_melnte.title: Operation Failure
char_4006_melnte.text: Cover the retreat? No problem. It's important to evaluate performance during retreats, too.

char_4006_melnte.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4006_melnte.text: Considering the weapon's size, this place might be a little cramped.

char_4006_melnte.title: Tap
char_4006_melnte.text: Doctor, don't touch. You could get hurt.

char_4006_melnte.title: Trust Tap
char_4006_melnte.text: Would you like to head to Engineering together?

char_4006_melnte.title: Title
char_4006_melnte.text: Arknights.

char_4006_melnte.title: Greeting
char_4006_melnte.text: Good morning. A dream-less night of sleep alleviates exhaustion the most, don't you think?

char_249_mlyss.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_249_mlyss.text: So you're saying I have the right to decide your schedule and itinerary?  Which means, whatever I write in this memo book, Doctor, you've gotta do. Wowie! Too late for regrets now, heehee.

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Ecology's about filling some dirt, putting some plants and animals on it, then making a profound study about the cyclic relationships between individuals, species, and biocommunities. With the help of innovative research, we can improve the ecosphere or even forge a brand-new... Well, someone clearly knows it all, because that's an unadorable look you're giving me. Alrighty, let's change topics.

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk 2
char_249_mlyss.text: I want you to come with me next time I go clothes shopping. The thing is, I don't really understand fashion stuff so much, and I wanna hear your ideas. What, you don't either? Sure! If you've got opinions, and I've got opinions, then we can do swapsies. Plus, I get to see you wearing something else for once.

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk 3
char_249_mlyss.text: Are your lips kind of dry there...? Yeah, they look a little chapped. You need more water on the regular. Alright, you can have my chapstick, and then we're even again once you buy me a new stick. This is the only brand I use, and it's gotta be peppermint flavor. Don't get the wrong one. Okay?

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Looking back on it, it's like Rhine was just founded yesterday. The stuff we fought over at that time is a total one-eighty compared to now. Heheh, good memories… Doctor, Do you still remember when Rhodes Island was new on its feet? No? That's fine, you'll remember with enough time.

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_249_mlyss.text: Here I am, dewdrop landed on a leaf, but we'll be baked away in the sun soon enough. Oh, don't let it end here. We could melt together, dew filling leaf's veins, and make our grand return to the land... um, that's about dew, okay? Like, it's just dew that wants to—um... Mmm...

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Has Magallan been good recently? Oh, still out exploring? Hasn't said when she gets back yet? Aw, okay... I've still got the crystals she sent me last time, out in cold storage. Any interest in this stuff? Well, well, I see you have a good hobby. Come on, let's crack open your horizons.

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_249_mlyss.text: If Kristen didn't have the talent and leadership, Rhine Lab would've never been founded. But maybe it was her power that got her to bare her true self to everyone in the end. People change. I wonder what I'll become?

char_249_mlyss.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_249_mlyss.text: My people have no future. We've only been able to pray for answers from the past. You're from the past, Doctor. You're the hope of my people, and me. But even if that wasn't the case, you're still the one who pulled me from the bubbles, and you're still gripping my hand. How could I ever let go now, right?

char_249_mlyss.title: Idle
char_249_mlyss.text: Getting distracted on the job? Terrible habit.

char_249_mlyss.title: Onboard
char_249_mlyss.text: Muelsyse, Director of the Ecological Section at Rhine Lab. Not that I think we need any formal how-do-you-dos, Doctor. After all, we've been friends forever now.

char_249_mlyss.title: Watching Battle Record
char_249_mlyss.text: There really isn't a single fresh thing anywhere across the lands.

char_249_mlyss.title: Promotion 1
char_249_mlyss.text: A present from you? I'll keep it nice and safe, that's a guarantee. How about in return, let's go to the movies?

char_249_mlyss.title: Promotion 2
char_249_mlyss.text: Dew gets turned to vapor, and everything in it vanishes without a trace. Will I ever see showers of blessing? Will I ever meet my people again and know them anew?

char_249_mlyss.title: Added to Squad
char_249_mlyss.text: Sunlight's a little spicy. Just let me take five.

char_249_mlyss.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_249_mlyss.text: Okay, maybe I should assign roles first?

char_249_mlyss.title: Depart
char_249_mlyss.text: The way seems kind of rough. Careful, you don't want to trip.

char_249_mlyss.title: Begin Operation
char_249_mlyss.text: Annoying people, annoying business. Let's deal with them ASAP.

char_249_mlyss.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Hiya.

char_249_mlyss.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_249_mlyss.text: Want a candy?

char_249_mlyss.title: Deployment 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Okay, serious face.

char_249_mlyss.title: Deployment 2
char_249_mlyss.text: Easy-peasy.

char_249_mlyss.title: In Battle 1
char_249_mlyss.text: Shape like water.

char_249_mlyss.title: In Battle 2
char_249_mlyss.text: Now's not the time for hellos.

char_249_mlyss.title: In Battle 3
char_249_mlyss.text: Let animosity be gone with the flow.

char_249_mlyss.title: In Battle 4
char_249_mlyss.text: Oh wishes, I beg you coalesce.

char_249_mlyss.title: 4-star Result
char_249_mlyss.text: Good work. Need to get under this umbrella?

char_249_mlyss.title: 3-star Result
char_249_mlyss.text: Job's done, be sure to rest up now.

char_249_mlyss.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_249_mlyss.text: I told you to be careful... any ouchies?

char_249_mlyss.title: Operation Failure
char_249_mlyss.text: I got my mirages to lead them off. We'll go this way.

char_249_mlyss.title: Assigned to Facility
char_249_mlyss.text: Let's really decorate this place. It'll be cozy in no time, promise.

char_249_mlyss.title: Tap
char_249_mlyss.text: Hm?

char_249_mlyss.title: Trust Tap
char_249_mlyss.text: If anything's bothering you, put it to one side for now. Here, try this out, 'Orange Storm'.

char_249_mlyss.title: Title
char_249_mlyss.text: Arknights.

char_249_mlyss.title: Greeting
char_249_mlyss.text: Hiya! How about a little chat before you get to work?

char_4093_frston.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4093_frston.text: If I become your assistant, Closure won't be able to touch me anymore, yes? I'm aware of her extreme interest in me, but her planned modifications on my body are both ridiculous and unacceptable. They're an insult to a scientist, and I won't allow it even in my current form.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk 1
char_4093_frston.text: Why would humanity grow horns and tails? This stage of biological evolution is past my parameters of understanding... I know tens of thousands of years have passed— Kal'tsit has mentioned this countless times. Hmm, I will need a bit more time to formulate my deduction.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk 2
char_4093_frston.text: Closure wanted me to sound like a 'thirty-year-old rock band vocalist with a raspy voice,' but my original body was already twice that age... at least, that's what my final memories tell me.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk 3
char_4093_frston.text: Let's stop here for today, Doctor. I have to go over to Kal'tsit's office. She must be needlessly burning the midnight oil again. A soul, driven by her sheer sense of mission to trudge on for tens of thousands of years, just to stop what exactly? It would be better for her to get more sleep.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4093_frston.text: Doctor, don't look at me the same way you do Castle-3 and the others. They are very... cute. But my robot body is just like your hood, merely a sort of costume... a style. I know who I am, and thus you and I are more alike.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4093_frston.text: I'm not arrogant, but I am angry at your ignorance and lack of self-awareness, angry at your self-righteousness, all of you. Yes, I've lost all my knowledge, so you can take this anger as merely a 'result' of my 'calculations,' and a very clear result at that.

char_4093_frston.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4093_frston.text: My wife, daughter, and the rest of my people are eternally resting in those sarcophagi, and will never wake up again. I've made many decisions, I'm well aware. But all I remember is that final dinner, where everyone bid me farewell, and prayed that the subsequent odyssey would go smoothly...

char_4093_frston.title: Idle
char_4093_frston.text: Doctor, are you free? I hope you might take me out for a walk.

char_4093_frston.title: Onboard
char_4093_frston.text: Hello there, I am Friston. That's right, just 'Friston,' not 'Friston-3' or whatever. I am not a replica, and very much less a reproduction of a replica. I hope you understand.

char_4093_frston.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4093_frston.text: This is valuable research material. I shall require a copy for myself.

char_4093_frston.title: Added to Squad
char_4093_frston.text: Doctor, which sector do you need me to take charge of?

char_4093_frston.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4093_frston.text: Am I to lead everyone and find a new direction...? Very well, I won't let them down this time.

char_4093_frston.title: Depart
char_4093_frston.text: Let's go. This is also a new journey.

char_4093_frston.title: Begin Operation
char_4093_frston.text: Danger detected!

char_4093_frston.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4093_frston.text: I will relay our combat strategies to THRM-EX and Lancet-2.

char_4093_frston.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4093_frston.text: I am naturally capable of more than THRM-EX and the others. I will shield them on the front line.

char_4093_frston.title: Deployment 1
char_4093_frston.text: As long as I'm still standing, no one will come to harm.

char_4093_frston.title: Deployment 2
char_4093_frston.text: I will not fall.

char_4093_frston.title: In Battle 1
char_4093_frston.text: Are you all staring at my expression doodle?

char_4093_frston.title: In Battle 2
char_4093_frston.text: Your behaviors have been recorded and archived.

char_4093_frston.title: In Battle 3
char_4093_frston.text: Where's your leader? I need to talk!

char_4093_frston.title: In Battle 4
char_4093_frston.text: What a disgrace... these ugly creatures.

char_4093_frston.title: 4-star Result
char_4093_frston.text: Doctor, your thinking routines and command style are very much distinct and different from the others... I guess some things never change.

char_4093_frston.title: 3-star Result
char_4093_frston.text: I still remember the duty I bear, but I must admit, I am no longer able to fulfill it, let alone execute it as well as you do. You have my respect, Doctor.

char_4093_frston.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4093_frston.text: An odyssey will always have nigh-avoidable accidents, and a plan might always go wrong. They may be painful to accept... but what else can I do except accept them?

char_4093_frston.title: Operation Failure
char_4093_frston.text: If the worst possible outcome is turning into something like me, then there is nothing to be afraid of. Doctor, you should evacuate first, and leave the rest to me.

char_4093_frston.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4093_frston.text: I would like to stack all of my borrowed ecological research materials over here. I trust there will be no issues with that?

char_4093_frston.title: Tap
char_4093_frston.text: You should have observed my expression doodle. Currently, it's 'anger'.

char_4093_frston.title: Trust Tap
char_4093_frston.text: I've taken a photo of you, Doctor. You want to see it? Sorry, I've already saved it to my archives.

char_4093_frston.title: Title
char_4093_frston.text: Arknights.

char_4093_frston.title: Greeting
char_4093_frston.text: How do you do, Docor?

char_4015_spuria.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4015_spuria.text: No problem. Just leave the documents here, and I'll filter out anything that isn't worth you reading... Can't do it that way? We have to take each one seriously? Fine, fine, whatever you say.

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk 1
char_4015_spuria.text: I guarantee that field op will be cleared without a hitch, so— I can't dump it on another operator? Come on, It was a long trip for me to come here, and I'm better off spending my time in the workshop while I'm on the ship. Work with me here, will you？

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk 2
char_4015_spuria.text: How's my stay? So far so good. Here I can focus on reviewing my designs without headphones on my head. No need to block everything out with music. Feels kinda refreshing. Still, I haven't modded any of the equipment in the dorm myself, so it does feel kinda like we're missing some features here. For example, something that automatically orders cactus tarts takeout at preset times.

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk 3
char_4015_spuria.text: Do me a favor and tell me when Lemuen shows up, Doctor. I help maintain her sister's gun every now and then, so my guess is she wants to have a few words with me. Why don't I just go see her? Uhmm... The way I put it, one can't be so proactive with everybody. Sometimes, you need to keep a certain distance. You know what I mean?

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4015_spuria.text: Laterano has tons of magazines covering the combat attire of other countries. Their designs seem to have drawn inspiration from a variety of sources, all of which I'd like to try out. Oh, just so you know, I'm more of an order-by-phone kind of girl. I don't go shopping unless I'm invited by some very specific people. So, you gonna ask me out?

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4015_spuria.text: I'm more willing to go on field ops than before? That's because I'm after inspiration for firearms upgrades. When I stand in war-torn ruins, where there's none of the ear-rending ruckus of Laterano, I get this weird sense of fear. I have to find a way to use my technology to combat that somehow.

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4015_spuria.text: If the Lateran Curia ever asks for me, make an excuse and turn them down, will you? I don't wanna go back to listen to my boss nag about faith and standing. She thinks she can talk me into recognizing my mistakes, but I don't ever think that much when I do stuff.

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4015_spuria.text: I study firearm assistive technologies, but I don't fundamentally understand what a gun means to a Sankta... Hm? Oh, nothing. Just a friend of mine who told me she's starting to use a gun again. Anyway, I'll be going on a trip soon. Be sure to approve my disembarkation when the time comes, Doctor.

char_4015_spuria.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4015_spuria.text: You look like you're in a bad mood, so I grabbed you a snack from— Hey, what's that surprised look for? Yes, you're no Sankta and I can't feel your emotion, but that doesn't mean I can't care about you. Alright, eat up now. I wanna see if this is from the tainted batch.

char_4015_spuria.title: Idle
char_4015_spuria.text: You asleep...? Hehe... Well, well, seems like a good chance to release a drone in the hallway and stream someone's sleep-talking... No response? Looks like you're actually asleep.

char_4015_spuria.title: Onboard
char_4015_spuria.text: Spuria, liaison from the Sixth Tribunal of the Lateran Curia, here for cultural exchange. Oh, right. To prevent any safety inspections, my luggage has a self-destruct mechanism. Yep, the stuff inside isn't necessarily all safe.

char_4015_spuria.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4015_spuria.text: You want to watch combat records together? You aren't gonna complain that I'm not serious enough when I watch the videos, right?

char_4015_spuria.title: Promotion 1
char_4015_spuria.text: If you're giving me more permissions, I won't have to check with you the next time I want to do something, right?

char_4015_spuria.title: Promotion 2
char_4015_spuria.text: We Sankta know how to shoot just by the instincts we were born with. Then, after seven years of schooling, we've mastered advanced shooting techniques and learned the basics of maintenance and retrofitting. After that, we may spend our entire lifetimes without ever realizing... guns hurt people.

char_4015_spuria.title: Added to Squad
char_4015_spuria.text: Yep, no problem. I've got the objectives all memorized.

char_4015_spuria.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4015_spuria.text: Relax, just leave it to me. What kind of havoc can I wreak?

char_4015_spuria.title: Depart
char_4015_spuria.text: Aww, I prefer combat strategies without so many twists and turns.

char_4015_spuria.title: Begin Operation
char_4015_spuria.text: Perfect opportunity to observe the battlefield.

char_4015_spuria.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4015_spuria.text: Comms online and stable.

char_4015_spuria.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4015_spuria.text: Go ahead. Tell me your plan.

char_4015_spuria.title: Deployment 1
char_4015_spuria.text: Hello, on-site service.

char_4015_spuria.title: Deployment 2
char_4015_spuria.text: It's about time we switched to a frontal assault, no?

char_4015_spuria.title: In Battle 1
char_4015_spuria.text: Come on, don't be such a drag.

char_4015_spuria.title: In Battle 2
char_4015_spuria.text: Just a smaaaall test.

char_4015_spuria.title: In Battle 3
char_4015_spuria.text: Take a guess. Am I holding my gun to pray?

char_4015_spuria.title: In Battle 4
char_4015_spuria.text: Uh-oh, you got it wrong.

char_4015_spuria.title: 4-star Result
char_4015_spuria.text: What a surprise. It's been a while since I had so many casings at my feet. You really know how to put on a show.

char_4015_spuria.title: 3-star Result
char_4015_spuria.text: Just as promised, the mission's a success. What was I doing? Whoa, whoa, whoa, that's hurting. Nobody likes a Doctor who pries too much, yes?

char_4015_spuria.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4015_spuria.text: No worries, it's not a big deal. Just act like you're all remorseful, and nobody will press it too hard. But I still saw every mistake you made with my own eyes, better keep that in mind.

char_4015_spuria.title: Operation Failure
char_4015_spuria.text: Uh, you're not gonna fix the part of the perimeter that got blown up? That wouldn't fly in Laterano.

char_4015_spuria.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4015_spuria.text: Woo, I love this icy, modern feel.

char_4015_spuria.title: Tap
char_4015_spuria.text: Careful. My gun might go off.

char_4015_spuria.title: Trust Tap
char_4015_spuria.text: How much do you know about Sankta guns? There's no way you'd ever be able to fire one, but I don't mind explaining things to you.

char_4015_spuria.title: Title
char_4015_spuria.text: Arknights.

char_4015_spuria.title: Greeting
char_4015_spuria.text: Hey, Doctor, you're finally here. While you were gone, absolutely nothing happened.

char_1032_excu2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1032_excu2.text: Yes, I have received the notification that fragmentation mines are forbidden in the corridors. But rest assured, Doctor, the high voltage fencing installed on your door violates no ordinances.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Indeed, I was the one who introduced recent Lateran Operators to Rhodes Island. If you have no objections, I will continue to introduce functionaries with special circumstances to you. I hope to study how Sankta live outside Lateran, and how it compares to their life within.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk 2
char_1032_excu2.text: This mission may call for a piano performance? Do not worry. I have memorized the complete scores of over a hundred classical pieces, and I can play every note in accurate order. Any properly trained executor should be capable of this. That does not count as playing the piano? I do not understand.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk 3
char_1032_excu2.text: The title 'Saint' can neither enhance my abilities nor reveal any precise mission to me. Though it has added difficulties to my work, I cannot fathom why I was chosen. Its objective and demands are something I must seek myself.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Doctor, this is my medical examination report, please confirm. Currently, no horns have grown on my head, and my halo has seen no changes in shape or form. Indeed, my violation of the law has not had a physical effect on me, but it's nothing worthy of celebration. Abnormalities have been on the rise. This is an omen of disaster.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1032_excu2.text: Doctor, during my recent missions, my limbs have been acting before I complete my thought processes. This phenomenon can impede successful completion of my missions. I am troubled. Could you tell me whether it's a kind of disease? Will my condition worsen? Is there (a) medicine that can heal it?

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Most confuse Arturia's Arts as tampering with cognition and mental faculty, but I know the fact is just the oppoiste. Arturia is interested only in the truest emotions, and cares not for where these emotions lead. The influence she can command is far worse than anyone can possibly imagine.

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1032_excu2.text: What are you doing, Doctor? Bodily contact is no replacement for spoken language. I cannot decipher your thoughts through your limbs. You think that I need comfort? If that is your judgement, then I have no reason to refuse. Infact, I am merely thinking back to my recent mission. What leaves a man no other choice(,) but death?

char_1032_excu2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1032_excu2.text: As you can see, this is a burnt flower. I have, to the best of my abilities, maintained its condition in order to bring it to you. It is not a gift, becuase it does not meet the criteria for one. It's a question in my mind. I am still pondering the things behind this flower.

char_1032_excu2.title: Idle
char_1032_excu2.text: You lack sleep, Doctor. You need more rest.

char_1032_excu2.title: Onboard
char_1032_excu2.text: You seem surprised, Doctor. Please rest assured that the change in my equipment won't affect my ability to complete my missions. If you find yourself ill at ease because of my attire, I can change into my previous garments before I enter Rhodes Island. No need? Understood.

char_1032_excu2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1032_excu2.text: I have attempted a few combat techniques, and they have yielded excellent results.

char_1032_excu2.title: Promotion 1
char_1032_excu2.text: You put together an all new profile. Is this a false identity for my next mission? If the need arises, I know where to prepare identification that can pass checks. No need? This, too, is a normal promotion?

char_1032_excu2.title: Promotion 2
char_1032_excu2.text: I am trying to understand the law. Is Laterano's foundation truly these words alone? Is that applicable to lands other than Laterano? I must admit I have indeed been affected by it, to a certain degree. I will attempt to find the answer posthaste.

char_1032_excu2.title: Added to Squad
char_1032_excu2.text: The law itself has no power. It calls for enforcers.

char_1032_excu2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1032_excu2.text: I require those who can act on their own judgment.

char_1032_excu2.title: Depart
char_1032_excu2.text: Move out.

char_1032_excu2.title: Begin Operation
char_1032_excu2.text: Commencing operation. Please confirm the mission objective.

char_1032_excu2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Understood.

char_1032_excu2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1032_excu2.text: Your request is reasonable.

char_1032_excu2.title: Deployment 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Prayers are unnecessary.

char_1032_excu2.title: Deployment 2
char_1032_excu2.text: I shall ensure the integrity of the law.

char_1032_excu2.title: In Battle 1
char_1032_excu2.text: Target confirmed.

char_1032_excu2.title: In Battle 2
char_1032_excu2.text: Destruction is the most naive behavior.

char_1032_excu2.title: In Battle 3
char_1032_excu2.text: Annihilation is the most common result.

char_1032_excu2.title: In Battle 4
char_1032_excu2.text: Violated taboos hold no power.

char_1032_excu2.title: 4-star Result
char_1032_excu2.text: No casualties, no commotions. All good.

char_1032_excu2.title: 3-star Result
char_1032_excu2.text: Mission complete.

char_1032_excu2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1032_excu2.text: The result is acceptable.

char_1032_excu2.title: Operation Failure
char_1032_excu2.text: We need to reformulate our battle plans.

char_1032_excu2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1032_excu2.text: Maintaining a dedicated room is a show of respect? I see.

char_1032_excu2.title: Tap
char_1032_excu2.text: I have heard there are certain hobbies that are not easily understood by others. Perhaps this is one such hobby?

char_1032_excu2.title: Trust Tap
char_1032_excu2.text: Speak the word if you need anything, Doctor.

char_1032_excu2.title: Title
char_1032_excu2.text: Arknights.

char_1032_excu2.title: Greeting
char_1032_excu2.text: You have changed greatly, Doctor.

char_498_inside.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_498_inside.text: You need my help with your mountain of work? Haha, I'm not sure if I should be intervening in Rhodes Island's internal affairs though...? It's no problem? Uh, really?

char_498_inside.title: Talk 1
char_498_inside.text: Our laws are incapable of perfectly solving every dispute. There are many situations where even the saints can't help. I must admit, I have a deep respect for people like the bishop from that monastery, considering the problems he faced. Too bad I don't have such lofty faith.

char_498_inside.title: Talk 2
char_498_inside.text: Was that Arene earlier? Now when did that punk learn some manners...? You taught him? Wow, now that's impressive! I guess even a devious boy like him is still just a boy. Easy enough to trick him onto the right track... Huh...? You didn't trick him?

char_498_inside.title: Talk 3
char_498_inside.text: Yo, Doctor! Ambriel and the others are doing a dessert potluck, and I'm bringing donuts. Mind helping me taste test? Okay, so what do you think—Whoa whoa, slow down on the water! It's too sweet and greasy? Strange, I thought the sugar level was just right...

char_498_inside.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_498_inside.text: Don't get me wrong, Doctor, yes, I was elected as 'a representative of the Notarial Hall', but that's just because everyone's curious about what magical place could  Federico endorse, and they needed someone out to take a look for them. In other words, they picked me to come take a look-see here. I've got no say on any matters relating to the Notarial Hall, so don't ask me about that sort of thing, okay?

char_498_inside.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_498_inside.text: I'm lucky I was born a Lateran. No, Doctor, our good fortune does not lie in our halos, but in our material abundance and strong state. You have an ideal Rhodes Island of your own? It's not easy, chasing your dreams, but... good luck I guess?

char_498_inside.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_498_inside.text: Take note of your posture, keep your crossbow aimed straight ahead, turn your body slightly... Yes, just like that, and then pull the trigger! Wow, bullseye! Very nice! Oh no, no need to thank me, I just helped correct your posture, that's all. You're very talented, Doctor.

char_498_inside.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_498_inside.text: Come sit over here, Doctor. I have something to discuss with you. There's a bunch of Sarkaz I know, and they're pretty good in a fight, so if Rhodes Island ever needs a few helping hands... Haha, yes, I'm not eager to make trouble for myself, but... Well, I might be going too soft, but why not consider it?

char_498_inside.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_498_inside.text: I thought you might have found this business annoying, so I dealt with it in your place, and here's the mission report. The scene was something of an eyesore, so I didn't attach any photos. I executed every last name in your notes, no exceptions.   What's with the look, Doctor? Do you feel unwell?

char_498_inside.title: Idle
char_498_inside.text: Oh, Doctor, you're awake… What? Please don't tell Dr. Kal'tsit and Amiya you were napping at work? Ahaha, what napping?

char_498_inside.title: Onboard
char_498_inside.text: Liaison from the Lateran Notarial Hall, Insider. Here's the paperwork for our collaboration. May I ask which office I should be heading to next? I'm making my first impression here at Rhodes Island, so I want to do this perfectly.

char_498_inside.title: Watching Battle Record
char_498_inside.text: Let's see... Ezell is still so merciful in battle, huh... Sheesh, Federico is the exact opposite!

char_498_inside.title: Promotion 1
char_498_inside.text: Promotion? Thank you for your affirmation, Doctor. However, does this mean I'm going to have to handle even more difficult work in the future?

char_498_inside.title: Promotion 2
char_498_inside.text: Many thanks. I will report that Rhodes Island intends to deepen the level of cooperation with the Notarial Hall... Wait, this is a personal commendation for me? Haha, what an honor.

char_498_inside.title: Added to Squad
char_498_inside.text: Got it. You've determined that use of force is required in the current situation, and I'll trust you on that.

char_498_inside.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_498_inside.text: I'm in charge? Alright then, I would like everyone to act freely as they wish. And everyone is responsible for their own actions.

char_498_inside.title: Depart
char_498_inside.text: Firearm, check.

char_498_inside.title: Begin Operation
char_498_inside.text: I wish everyone could just calm down, before I raise my gun to settle things.

char_498_inside.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_498_inside.text: Alright, mission accepted.

char_498_inside.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_498_inside.text: Bullets may be fast, but they aren't always so quick to solve disputes.

char_498_inside.title: Deployment 1
char_498_inside.text: Chill, everyone, I'm just here for a few questions.

char_498_inside.title: Deployment 2
char_498_inside.text: If you insist on being so stubborn, then... prepare for execution.

char_498_inside.title: In Battle 1
char_498_inside.text: I'm actually better at wrestling than shooting. Makes the cleanup easier.

char_498_inside.title: In Battle 2
char_498_inside.text: I'll give you some time to cry out in pain while I adjust my weapon.

char_498_inside.title: In Battle 3
char_498_inside.text: I was really hoping it wouldn't turn out like this.

char_498_inside.title: In Battle 4
char_498_inside.text: In our current situation... A complete sweep would be the most efficient solution.

char_498_inside.title: 4-star Result
char_498_inside.text: I knew I was getting into trouble coming here, but thankfully I've got you, Doctor. I wouldn't have figured out how to resolve such a complicated conflict by myself.

char_498_inside.title: 3-star Result
char_498_inside.text: Alright, time to pack up my gun. Mission complete, Doctor. We achieved victory just as planned, so there shouldn't be any post mortem work required, right?

char_498_inside.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_498_inside.text: What, did some of them escape? Ah, I had one eye closed while aiming my shots, so maybe they happened to be out of my sight.

char_498_inside.title: Operation Failure
char_498_inside.text: It's clear we need to overhaul our plans.

char_498_inside.title: Assigned to Facility
char_498_inside.text: You have such good accommodation here? This place is top-notch in all the foreign posting I've had.

char_498_inside.title: Tap
char_498_inside.text: Haha, Doctor. You're not scaring me that easily.

char_498_inside.title: Trust Tap
char_498_inside.text: It's nice to occasionally get some rest in places like this corridor. After all, most of Laterano's benches are found only outdoors.

char_498_inside.title: Title
char_498_inside.text: Arknights.

char_498_inside.title: Greeting
char_498_inside.text: You can take a break first, Doctor.

char_2012_typhon.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2012_typhon.text: Close your eyes, don't rush to open them. They may feel slightly hot, that's normal... Shh, stay calm, I crushed some herbs to help your eyes relax. You must have been staring at some dangerous thing. I do that a lot, trust me.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk 1
char_2012_typhon.text: A guide...? I guess Simone is a better fit for the job. She's also a veteran hunter like me, so I know you'll be in good hands, and won't get into... trouble. There have been some misunderstandings and a few tribes now turn me away. Just remember, if anyone tells you I'm a man eater, they're lying.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk 2
char_2012_typhon.text: Hands off. I've told you before, no one gets to touch my bow. Not you, not the smiths. You don't have the skills to hunt shadows in the depth of Sami, so you shouldn't draw their attention. I know your kind, I know you're curious. I'll just repeat myself over, over, and over again until I get through to you.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk 3
char_2012_typhon.text: Check the logs from the research teams. See? These little hornbeasts are friends, they're harmless. And this kind of snow needs Arts to control, so call me if you run into some. Good, go ahead and add some notes to these pictures, you're pretty clever. Why the look? Is it so strange that I know how to use electronics?

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2012_typhon.text: You all are strange, just like Magallan, insisting on comprehending the land on your own terms. I've seen your hard work, you'll come to know the whole of Sami as you see her in your dreams someday. But now? You aren't there yet. I'm worried about you, but since we're working together, just listen to me and you'll be fine.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2012_typhon.text: Put that navigation instrument down, you're no professional, it's wearing you out just carrying it around. Let me lead the way, just like Arges used to do for me. She always says pitfalls and pains guide you to destiny, but I find I can get where I want by just following the sound of the breeze and the twigs in the trees.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2012_typhon.text: You've never tried sleeping on a cave floor before? What about a bed made of vines? You should give it a try, I can't get a good night's sleep if I don't hear the heartbeat of Sami. How could I even close my eyes if I can't wake the moment I get a vision...? Yes, I have a lot of nightmares, what about it?

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2012_typhon.text: ...You called for me? Did you come across some trouble? If everything's fine, let me sit here alone for a while... I'm looking at the dead. The unsullied dead will walk among the beasts of the forest... I'm still looking for my parents.

char_2012_typhon.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2012_typhon.text: Have I ever gotten lost? Hmm... Maybe. I left my home at first to find revenge, but when I saw all that sullied snow, I could only think to draw my bow and aim, to show the shadows that I was the true hunter. Can you be a hunter, too? Or can you be a companion to carry me out of danger when I'm hurt?

char_2012_typhon.title: Idle
char_2012_typhon.text: Does the Doctor have the same kind of dreams that I do? Hm, probably not, we aren't in Sami, after all... Lucky enough for you, the shadows won't be chasing you through your dreams then.

char_2012_typhon.title: Onboard
char_2012_typhon.text: If you come across any abnormalities while we're working together, I'll take care of them for you... Codename? Typhon is my only name. I found it on the horn ornament my mother left behind. Some people say it sounds scary, though.

char_2012_typhon.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2012_typhon.text: Are you trying to show off your camera skills? No...? But how can you even call this combat experience, if you don't experience it yourself?

char_2012_typhon.title: Promotion 1
char_2012_typhon.text: Um, what's this promotion badge for again? If it's useless in combat, then let's wait until we settle the danger right in front of us, then you tell me the story behind it.

char_2012_typhon.title: Promotion 2
char_2012_typhon.text: Many travelers to Sami find death in avalanches caused by loud boasting, or other arrogant behavior. They never even get a chance to see Sami's shadow. You won't make the same kind of mistake, not with me accompanying you.

char_2012_typhon.title: Added to Squad
char_2012_typhon.text: Take these weapons and tools. We need them more than extra hands.

char_2012_typhon.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2012_typhon.text: Got it, I'll take the lead. Don't be nervous, I can handle this.

char_2012_typhon.title: Depart
char_2012_typhon.text: Stay close, don't run off.

char_2012_typhon.title: Begin Operation
char_2012_typhon.text: Don't let them out of sight, even if your eyes are hurting.

char_2012_typhon.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2012_typhon.text: Stay calm and make your move. No need to worry, I've got your back.

char_2012_typhon.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2012_typhon.text: What do you need of me?

char_2012_typhon.title: Deployment 1
char_2012_typhon.text: Time to choose our prey.

char_2012_typhon.title: Deployment 2
char_2012_typhon.text: Good timing.

char_2012_typhon.title: In Battle 1
char_2012_typhon.text: I'll pin you to your shadow.

char_2012_typhon.title: In Battle 2
char_2012_typhon.text: Cowards break the silence first.

char_2012_typhon.title: In Battle 3
char_2012_typhon.text: Nature should not be disturbed.

char_2012_typhon.title: In Battle 4
char_2012_typhon.text: Get out of my home!

char_2012_typhon.title: 4-star Result
char_2012_typhon.text: Each of my arrows slows the black that taints the Sami snow.

char_2012_typhon.title: 3-star Result
char_2012_typhon.text: I see you managed to complete a mission without causing any unnecessary pain to the quarry. Um, not bad, not bad. Sip a hot drink and get some rest.

char_2012_typhon.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2012_typhon.text: If you've run out of arrows or let your target escape, then you should give up the chase. You've already lost.

char_2012_typhon.title: Operation Failure
char_2012_typhon.text: Grasp these seeds tightly in your hand, and run. Don't look back. I'll take care of things here.

char_2012_typhon.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2012_typhon.text: Can you explain how these machines work? I've got a good memory, Magallan explained the structure of the research station last time, and I still remember it all... Well, at least, I think I do.

char_2012_typhon.title: Tap
char_2012_typhon.text: Nope, you'll have to be faster than that to even think about faking an attack.

char_2012_typhon.title: Trust Tap
char_2012_typhon.text: Do you have someone you trust standing guard? I want to rest for a bit, your camp is so warm…

char_2012_typhon.title: Title
char_2012_typhon.text: Arknights.

char_2012_typhon.title: Greeting
char_2012_typhon.text: What's up, Doctor. Where have you been? You're not lost, are you?

char_341_sntlla.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_341_sntlla.text: I... can take care of some basic tasks, but your assistant should be able to take on a large share of your work. That may be… beyond my abilities.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk 1
char_341_sntlla.text: Prejudice is common between peoples. Before I came to Rhodes Island, I actually thought people outside of Sami left the womb with weapons in their hands... That's not a joke, Doctor. I really did.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk 2
char_341_sntlla.text: You're still bothered by the cold? Hmm... Sometimes, I feel like you're needier than a newborn. Hold your hands out then... Haah... Feel better? You're welcome. Give me a moment, I'll fetch you another blanket.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk 3
char_341_sntlla.text: Yes, I know this is a general education course meant for children. But a shaman's calling is to master all forms of knowledge, whether metal or wood. And my knowledge of the South probably isn't much greater than a local child. So a course like this suits me just fine.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_341_sntlla.text: Fighting is not in Sami nature. But, if you do not become the hunter, then you can only be the hunted. This is true whether facing the elements, the demons... or the people of Ursus. It's the law of nature.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_341_sntlla.text: I respect you, and so I give you my word. As long as I am aboard this iron ship, I will not trouble the people of Ursus. But when in Sami, I hope you'll turn a blind eye to... some of my actions. There is always a price to be paid, even if it falls to Ursus rather than a particular individual.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_341_sntlla.text: My friends here at Rhodes Island made this outfit not long after I arrived. I was still a stubborn rockhorn back then, unwilling to accept even the slightest bit of kindness. Now... I'm probably not so inflexible. Even the coldest ice melts in the spring sun.

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_341_sntlla.text: Tribe cannot go on without a shaman. It was painful to part with the branches of my family tree, and let go of the responsibility of protecting my tribesmen. It used to be my only wish to remain in my ancestral home, accompanying the long-withered tree. But now, that is not possible anymore...

char_341_sntlla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_341_sntlla.text: One crystallized eye is enough to turn a woman into a monster. The Southerners use Originium to command metal to move, yet fear that it will grow upon their bodies. Alas, what deadly weapons indifference and fear have become. Though they leave no wounds on the body, they instead bleed the spirit dry.

char_341_sntlla.title: Idle
char_341_sntlla.text: I wave a twig… for a fresh and healthy year...

char_341_sntlla.title: Onboard
char_341_sntlla.text: She was born under the tribe's santalla tree, so it became her identity, her codename, and a part of her life. Now the outcast returns to the tribe, regaining the right to use her name. She will commit herself to her new leader.

char_341_sntlla.title: Watching Battle Record
char_341_sntlla.text: They do not yet comprehend the enemy's cruelty…

char_341_sntlla.title: Promotion 1
char_341_sntlla.text: May the generosity you've afforded me plant the seedlings of joy within your heart.

char_341_sntlla.title: Promotion 2
char_341_sntlla.text: The curse cannot extinguish the pain in my heart. Since it is conquest that Ursus craves, then let them be conquered by nature.

char_341_sntlla.title: Added to Squad
char_341_sntlla.text: What do you wish for the battlefield to become?

char_341_sntlla.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_341_sntlla.text: Protect our teammates, and victory will be ours.

char_341_sntlla.title: Depart
char_341_sntlla.text: Look into the distance, and be mindful of your feet. Nature has already warned you of the changes.

char_341_sntlla.title: Begin Operation
char_341_sntlla.text: The hunter... and the hunted…

char_341_sntlla.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_341_sntlla.text: Did you have need of me?

char_341_sntlla.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_341_sntlla.text: Your orders?

char_341_sntlla.title: Deployment 1
char_341_sntlla.text: As you wish.

char_341_sntlla.title: Deployment 2
char_341_sntlla.text: We shall begin.

char_341_sntlla.title: In Battle 1
char_341_sntlla.text: The withered tree demands sacrifices.

char_341_sntlla.title: In Battle 2
char_341_sntlla.text: The wild wind plunders your warmth.

char_341_sntlla.title: In Battle 3
char_341_sntlla.text: The deadly cold sends its regards.

char_341_sntlla.title: In Battle 4
char_341_sntlla.text: The eyes of Sami witness your end.

char_341_sntlla.title: 4-star Result
char_341_sntlla.text: Perhaps in your eyes, nature is just another tool.

char_341_sntlla.title: 3-star Result
char_341_sntlla.text: You are the true hunter.

char_341_sntlla.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_341_sntlla.text: War is like nature, full of variables.

char_341_sntlla.title: Operation Failure
char_341_sntlla.text: The blizzard approaches. We should go.

char_341_sntlla.title: Assigned to Facility
char_341_sntlla.text: My room, my domain…

char_341_sntlla.title: Tap
char_341_sntlla.text: Is there anything I can do for you?

char_341_sntlla.title: Trust Tap
char_341_sntlla.text: In Sami, there is no food sweeter than honey. Is this... candy? Hmm... Oh, so sweet!

char_341_sntlla.title: Title
char_341_sntlla.text: Arknights.

char_341_sntlla.title: Greeting
char_341_sntlla.text: I am here, by your side.

char_4102_threye.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4102_threye.text: Pages of truth torn and lost, blood of friends spilt and chilled... Will you stop that ever-writing hand, if such scene is in you eyes...? I see. I shall assist you in your undertaking.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk 1
char_4102_threye.text: Oh... It's dark outside. My apologies, I must have misled you. Rather than having fallen into slumber, I was merely too immersed in reading. You need not wait by my side in such silence. Could you find your own  light? Allow me to illuminate it for you.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk 2
char_4102_threye.text: We and the Sami are alike? No, we merely hide among them. Our foresight and the Sami's divination are two pathways to the future, and neither side has fully accepted the other... Worry not, Doctor. The reproach I have suffered is not important. I humbly urge you to facilitate the cooperation between us all.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk 3
char_4102_threye.text: You seem worried that I'll have a difficult time adapting here. But in my eyes, this metal cave is not at all dissimilar to our dwelling. You perceive the flow of fate via the shadows projected on the cave wall, while we have gazed into labyrinthine darkness since our birth. That is the only difference.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4102_threye.text: Yes, I am gazing at the Sarkaz tracks beneath your feet, but please do not let this bother you. I shall not be prying into your affairs, for the Cyclopes have long turned their attention away from Kazdel. My cooperation with Rhodes Island looks to the threat from the north, and this is my position within your fate.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4102_threye.text: Is your interest really piqued by this note? You may read it, by all means. But it cannot foretell one's fate. The shapes that prophecies take are not set in stone, therefore keeping records is forbidden to us. In spite of this, I have written these words and fragments. Please view these as... lies that I must make, no matter the means.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4102_threye.text: No, no... Please, do not say that... Typhon's life is unrelated to any prophecies. I saved her in the heat of the moment. She is unaware of the cause, nor is she curious about her fate. And it is my wish to never lay eyes on her future.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4102_threye.text: The wind pays no heed to where each snowflake falls, as it is plenty accustomed to the sight of melting snow. On the icefileds, it sees the ravines sculped by fate... I ask you to understand us in that way. However... As I gaze at you here, I cannot help but feel a hint of sadness.

char_4102_threye.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4102_threye.text: This is all my own choices. I would do whatever it takes to fulfill the prophecy that must be fulfilled, no matter the cost. When the day comes, you may loathe me. And so, allow me to offer you my apologies in advance. Would you perhaps think that... Sorry, please, pay me no heed.

char_4102_threye.title: Idle
char_4102_threye.text: It is still snowing.

char_4102_threye.title: Onboard
char_4102_threye.text: You look the same as I saw you before... Sorry, please pay me no mind. I am a Cyclops from the caverns of the Sami mountains. With the impending darkness in my sight, I seek your cooperation. Please, call me Valarqvin.

char_4102_threye.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4102_threye.text: No matter how much you gaze into the past, there are no more possibilities to be seen there.

char_4102_threye.title: Promotion 1
char_4102_threye.text: My mission will never change, no matter the time. Even so, you would go through the effort to prepare a promotion ceremony for me? You have my thanks.

char_4102_threye.title: Promotion 2
char_4102_threye.text: A dark fate looms over the lands in silence, only for the occasional flash of lightning to tear it briefly asunder. It is in those moments when the foresighted see. Likewise, it is in those moments that warriors seek to wager their lives.

char_4102_threye.title: Added to Squad
char_4102_threye.text: As foretold.

char_4102_threye.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4102_threye.text: This ray of light may be dim, but I ask all of you to follow it.

char_4102_threye.title: Depart
char_4102_threye.text: Avoid becoming engulfed in snow, as were the fates of many.

char_4102_threye.title: Begin Operation
char_4102_threye.text: I have no intention of setting my eyes on you.

char_4102_threye.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4102_threye.text: Please accept my advice.

char_4102_threye.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4102_threye.text: I am here.

char_4102_threye.title: Deployment 1
char_4102_threye.text: Please deliver my visions to the masses.

char_4102_threye.title: Deployment 2
char_4102_threye.text: I have received enlightenment.

char_4102_threye.title: In Battle 1
char_4102_threye.text: May the lightning tear chaos apart.

char_4102_threye.title: In Battle 2
char_4102_threye.text: May the blizzard cleanse life and death.

char_4102_threye.title: In Battle 3
char_4102_threye.text: May the mountains prolong our fates.

char_4102_threye.title: In Battle 4
char_4102_threye.text: 'We gaze, from the beginning to the end.'

char_4102_threye.title: 4-star Result
char_4102_threye.text: Fate is always heartless.

char_4102_threye.title: 3-star Result
char_4102_threye.text: With your axe and wit, you have left your mark on the icefield. Now, we can continue our journey forward.

char_4102_threye.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4102_threye.text: Are you still concerned? Fate will bring back to you the enemies who escaped.

char_4102_threye.title: Operation Failure
char_4102_threye.text: Please... do not stand before me... No, just allow me to take a moment of rest by myself.

char_4102_threye.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4102_threye.text: I thank you for arranging for me a place of respite. Alas, I am afraid I cannot make use of it often.

char_4102_threye.title: Tap
char_4102_threye.text: Oh... That's awfully childish of you.

char_4102_threye.title: Trust Tap
char_4102_threye.text: This place… is quiet.

char_4102_threye.title: Title
char_4102_threye.text: Arknights.

char_4102_threye.title: Greeting
char_4102_threye.text: May you advance without hesitation, Doctor.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1016_agoat2.text: Were you looking for these documents, Professor? Here you are. I personally believe that some of these theories aren't explained in enough detail. If you wanted a springboard for your ideas, I suggest referencing these two papers. I've added some of my own commentary, so feel free to look it over.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: The little lamb didn't go away even after the volcano erupted. It's actually been staying with me the whole time, and sometimes gets into trouble. H-Hey, you can't go standing on the Doctor's head! That's terribly rude! Sorry, Professor. Um, Can you see the little lamb? It's right here, hand to the right, and then down a little. Yeah, you're petting it right now.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: This coat was Mom's old protective gear. Professor Keller once told me, this mark came from a sudden burst of magma. It almost left a scar on her, but Mom just laughed, saying she had good luck. If I were to go on an expedition with her, I'd probably need to be the one to lead.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk 3
char_1016_agoat2.text: Shh. Here, Professor, I snuck these over! I saw it all — you were muttering about how badly you wanted some snacks earlier, right? I've actually gotten pretty good at reading lips. Not to brag, but I might be better than Rhodes Island's intelligence agents by now. But, just maybe.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: I'm getting ready to head out, Professor. Another volcano is about to become active. While luck is still on my side, I need to go a bit farther, a bit deeper. I want to wear the brightly-colored ornaments, and get to the truth in the hot magma, just like Mom and Dad did.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: Professor, in a few days, I'll be going to Leithanien to attend a press conference and the premiere of my documentary. Our research is too obscure for the ordinary people who want to learn about volcanoes. But I still hope that one day, I can use this method to show everyone the beauty of volcanoes.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: Frostleaf has been going to Mousse's book club a lot these days. Earthspirit and Provence have been trekking far and wide. I've been exploring more volcanoes... Professor, I still remember those early days, when Mousse was so nervous she couldn't even talk, and Frostleaf was always alone. But look at them now... they're getting better.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: Hehe, Mr. Kahn's letter just arrived. He says he's really mad that Professor Keller and I went rowing on a sulfuric acid lake without protective gear. Mom and Dad did crazy things just like that before they had me, and they didn't bring Professor Keller along. So this time, so I took her with me!

char_1016_agoat2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1016_agoat2.text: One moment, Professor, I'm changing out my hearing aid battery. Hmm? You're... Did you forget, Professor? I can read lips now. Besides, the sign you want should be like this, then this. What you just did was 'I have been suppressed by the volcano.'

char_1016_agoat2.title: Idle
char_1016_agoat2.text: Phew... Even without my hearing aid, I can still pick up the little sounds of Professor's breathing…

char_1016_agoat2.title: Onboard
char_1016_agoat2.text: Professor, I'm back, and I brought some souvenirs for you. I'll send them over to Dr. Kal'tsit and Amiya in a bit. I also managed to get a good amount of new data and specimens from Siesta's volcanic eruption. Would you like to come and take a look with me?

char_1016_agoat2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1016_agoat2.text: A volcano's every change and movement is fleeting. Only by capturing them on camera are we able to preserve every last detail.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Promotion 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: Our documentaries are being taken seriously? That's great! During my inspections in recent years, I've seen a lot of governments that don't trust our judgment and won't allocate resources to evacuate the residents. I hope I'll be able to make a difference.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Promotion 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: I know what you want to say, Professor, but I've never made my expeditions hard for myself. Starting from the smallest example, I bet you've never fried a fowlbeast egg over lava before, but I have!

char_1016_agoat2.title: Added to Squad
char_1016_agoat2.text: How about a slice of lava cake before we head out? It was one of Mom's traditions.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1016_agoat2.text: Volcano field investigations are extremely dangerous. Everyone, please follow my instructions.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Depart
char_1016_agoat2.text: Please double check your protective gear. Also, remember to keep a safe distance from the lava, and give regular status reports.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Begin Operation
char_1016_agoat2.text: Relax, volcano. We're just here to collect a few precious samples. Please don't get mad.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: This time, we can make up for the missing data in the last report.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: Don't worry about me, Professor. I've scaled a lot more volcanoes than you can imagine.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Deployment 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: Volcanic soot contains lots of Originium particles. Let's not stay too long.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Deployment 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: Magma will dredge up Originium veins. Keep your distance.

char_1016_agoat2.title: In Battle 1
char_1016_agoat2.text: Melt away, life-depriving stone...

char_1016_agoat2.title: In Battle 2
char_1016_agoat2.text: Ashes from vocalnoes, they consume and erase, then nourish and propagate.

char_1016_agoat2.title: In Battle 3
char_1016_agoat2.text: Those particles have no place here. I'll send them away.

char_1016_agoat2.title: In Battle 4
char_1016_agoat2.text: Oh, flowing magma, please slow your steps.

char_1016_agoat2.title: 4-star Result
char_1016_agoat2.text: We are one step closer to the truth of this land, Professor.

char_1016_agoat2.title: 3-star Result
char_1016_agoat2.text: Perhaps there will still be people gazing across this volcano a century from now. Their footprints will cover ours, and the seeds buried beneath the ash will bloom into even more beautiful flowers...

char_1016_agoat2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1016_agoat2.text: Why…? I'm not seeing any errors in the formula or the data... Um? I think I see something surfing through the lava...?

char_1016_agoat2.title: Operation Failure
char_1016_agoat2.text: Phew... Thankfully, the volcano didn't want to keep me that badly.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1016_agoat2.text: Professor, I brought the documents you asked me about.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Tap
char_1016_agoat2.text: I heard you coming, Professor. I recognized your footsteps.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Trust Tap
char_1016_agoat2.text: Professor, I know how good you are at learning. I can tell you're doing the wrong sign on purpose just to make me laugh!

char_1016_agoat2.title: Title
char_1016_agoat2.text: Arknights.

char_1016_agoat2.title: Greeting
char_1016_agoat2.text: Professor, the fault lines of mountain ranges and trenches are quietly moving beneath our feet. Little by little, they inch us closer to the volcanoes we hope to visit.

char_1033_swire2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1033_swire2.text: Alright, chop chop. Finish your work during your coffee break so the rest of your day is all coffee break!

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk 1
char_1033_swire2.text: It's a holiday, so of course I gotta dress a little more casual. I may not have taken as many field missions these past few years, but I still passed the L.G.D.'s physical exams, in high heels.

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk 2
char_1033_swire2.text: If Rhodes Island's looking for business partners, you can definitely trust these companies. Hey! Why are you looking at me like that? I'm just genuinely listing off my recommendations. You're making it look like I'm plotting a hostile takeover of Rhodes Island. If I'm actually planning an M&A... I just need to talk you round, right?

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk 3
char_1033_swire2.text: Ahem... I've taken a glance at our recent mission records. Looks like Rhodes Island's tactics have got more professional over the past few years. Not bad, not bad... Excuse me?! What's wrong with your former training consultant checking your operators' records? I absolutely have not been looking at Ch'en's files!

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1033_swire2.text: It's not really a big deal, being L.G.D. chief. I've got a little more on my shoulders, a little more to worry about, and I can put myself in Ch'en's shoes a little more now... Oh, let me reiterate: I'm taking over the L.G.D., not taking over for Ch'en! If that stupid Lung came back right now, she'd have to call me 'Chief.'

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1033_swire2.text: I may have left my family's company, but I still deal in business every now and then. It's a way to build Lungmen, so there's no need to avoid the subject. And now that I've figured out what I need to do, I don't find my grandfather so scary anymore. Hmhm, Once you've made use of your fears, that's when you've truly conquered them, right?

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1033_swire2.text: The new Siesta's an interesting place. Even without its beaches and volcano, it's still worth a visit for its sky pools and natural springs. My investment there has resulted in pretty decent returns too. Doctor, if you find the time, you should go and see for yourself. Heading back to a place you haven't been in a while... might be just like a reunion with an old friend.

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1033_swire2.text: Things are looking up for the trading company I'm running with Bison. Transporting one country's goods to another, sharing the cultures of places afar, these are the charms of commerce. Many are afraid of breaking barriers, but, Doctor, I'm sure we can find common ground.

char_1033_swire2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1033_swire2.text: Is this the last document you have? Alright! You really kept me waiting this time, but finally, time for supper! I know this new place that's not so bad. It's on me tonigh—Oh, You don't want me spending money?  Umm... alright, then it's on you. I know some other places.

char_1033_swire2.title: Idle
char_1033_swire2.text: Rawr... Ahem... You finished your work?

char_1033_swire2.title: Onboard
char_1033_swire2.text: Long time no see, Doctor. Ahem, let me introduce myself again. Beatrix Schwire, soon-to-be Chief Commissioner of the Lungmen Guard Department—I really am the chief! Whoever said the L.G.D. chief can't take holidays?!

char_1033_swire2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1033_swire2.text: It's been a while, but that's quite the improvement—Excuse me!? Why must you emphasize that this happened when I wasn't working here as an instructor?

char_1033_swire2.title: Promotion 1
char_1033_swire2.text: Exceptional talents earn exceptional rewards. That's how things should be.

char_1033_swire2.title: Promotion 2
char_1033_swire2.text: Alright, alright. I get that you can't do without me anymore. No sense beating around the bush like that. If you need my help, just say the word. I'll always be here for you, as your friend.

char_1033_swire2.title: Added to Squad
char_1033_swire2.text: Really? Not making me captain?

char_1033_swire2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1033_swire2.text: Just follow my command and it'll all be fine.

char_1033_swire2.title: Depart
char_1033_swire2.text: Let's try to take up as little of our holiday time as possible.

char_1033_swire2.title: Begin Operation
char_1033_swire2.text: I don't really want my holiday mood ruined, so hurry up and stop resisting arrest.

char_1033_swire2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1033_swire2.text: I haven't taken orders in a long time… feels kinda weird.

char_1033_swire2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1033_swire2.text: Follow your orders…? Fine.

char_1033_swire2.title: Deployment 1
char_1033_swire2.text: Wait for my orders.

char_1033_swire2.title: Deployment 2
char_1033_swire2.text: Start the operation.

char_1033_swire2.title: In Battle 1
char_1033_swire2.text: The moment you break the law, your back's against the wall.

char_1033_swire2.title: In Battle 2
char_1033_swire2.text: Where are you trying to run?

char_1033_swire2.title: In Battle 3
char_1033_swire2.text: Be good, be cuffed, I'll hear your motive after taking you in.

char_1033_swire2.title: In Battle 4
char_1033_swire2.text: Freeze! Hands in the air!

char_1033_swire2.title: 4-star Result
char_1033_swire2.text: That's all the men and wares accounted for. Let's call it a day here.

char_1033_swire2.title: 3-star Result
char_1033_swire2.text: Don't get cocky. This is just barely a pass mark by L.G.D. standards, but if you manage to keep this up, I guess I could still commend you.

char_1033_swire2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1033_swire2.text: If you can take care of something in one go, it's best not to do it twice. Keep your costs under control.

char_1033_swire2.title: Operation Failure
char_1033_swire2.text: Let's wrap it up here. I'll take care of the mission report.

char_1033_swire2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1033_swire2.text: This place hasn't been redecorated even once this whole time? You serious?

char_1033_swire2.title: Tap
char_1033_swire2.text: Doctor, do you know the consequences for attacking a cop in Lungmen? Don't worry. I'm just teaching you about the laws there.

char_1033_swire2.title: Trust Tap
