char_1033_swire2.text: Oh, you like this fashion brand? I can pick out an outfit for you.

char_1033_swire2.title: Title
char_1033_swire2.text: Arknights.

char_1033_swire2.title: Greeting
char_1033_swire2.text: Good morning... Hm? Just saying hello. What were you expecting? Rawr?

char_488_buildr.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_488_buildr.text: The wind blew the documents all over the place… This can't be because of my luck, can it…?

char_488_buildr.title: Talk 1
char_488_buildr.text: When I was a kid, Grandpa told me stories of how they built Siesta, but before he could see it to completion, he moved to Columbia with my parents. I went back to Siesta hoping to see what it had become in his place, only to find that it's all volcanic ash now.

char_488_buildr.title: Talk 2
char_488_buildr.text: This is my grandpa's hammer. It's been with me all the way, from when I was a civil engineering student to my demolition work, and finally to what I always wanted to be——a builder. If Rhodes Island ever needs any demolition work done, just say the word! Uh, by that, I mean construction work! Anyway, for some reason, I find hammers more wieldy...

char_488_buildr.title: Talk 3
char_488_buildr.text: Everybody knows making bets with Rope is a good way to lose your stuff. And I know Glaucus's cocktails are a little different from the ones everyone else gets. And anything Savage's hammer touches is bound to blow up—Oh, um! I know all that, but not because I've got rotten luck!

char_488_buildr.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_488_buildr.text: New Siesta has some unfinished city plates where you can see the volcano. Old workers like to gather there and chat about what the old Siesta looked like. I've heard most of their stories, but I still stay and listen, the same way I listened to Grandpa's stories... I still wonder what it was really like...

char_488_buildr.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_488_buildr.text: Back in school, my classmates always told me that Siesta is a tourist destination. It doesn't have its own architectural style. People just build whatever attracts the tourists. Look at Siesta today, though. We are her style.

char_488_buildr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_488_buildr.text: Want some walnut jam? Freshly made. Uh, I didn't mean to make it. It just, you know, happened. What's that on my hammer, you ask? Oh, um... it's walnut husks... Okay, okay, I admit it. Vulcan said it's a good way to train my strength control, but I didn't get a single one right. So, do you want the walnut jam or not?

char_488_buildr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_488_buildr.text: Look, the last time I came to the landship, the incomplete city plate was still empty, but now there are rows o f houses there, and the lights of the high-tech district reach even the beaches nearby. I'm building our new homeland bit by bit, alongside many others. It's, how do you say, an interesting feeling, right?

char_488_buildr.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_488_buildr.text: After I graduated, I could only find demolition work in Columbia, and I even caught Oripathy. I wanted to go back to Siesta to make a living, only find a pile of volcanic ash waiting for me. It took a lot of work to find the new Siesta, so I was real happy that day. I even yelled out loud: Hey hey hey—That's it for my rotten luck! Everything's going to work out just fine from here on out!

char_488_buildr.title: Idle
char_488_buildr.text: I've got classmates still with the demolition teams, another who's a contractor, and yet another who's a Pioneer... I'm the only one who, after that roundabout path, came back to Siesta to work on what I actually studied... I guess it worked out pretty well for me?

char_488_buildr.title: Onboard
char_488_buildr.text: You're the Doctor that Ceylon talked about, right? I'm Poncirus. Thanks for agreeing to provide medical assistance to us workers. My codename? It's a kind of fruit that's very close to my hair in color. The workers like to squeeze its juices into wine.

char_488_buildr.title: Watching Battle Record
char_488_buildr.text: Finding the structural support core in an instant and destroying it right away...  Alright, with a little practice, I'm sure I can do this, too.

char_488_buildr.title: Promotion 1
char_488_buildr.text: A promotional medal... I'll take it. Thanks for your acknowledgment, Doctor. I'll work hard to make sure I'm worth it.

char_488_buildr.title: Promotion 2
char_488_buildr.text: Senior Engineering Operator? Does that mean my pay goes up, too? That's great! I can send more money back home to my parents now, and I gotta write a letter to Grandpa, too. Yeah, everything's working out just fine!

char_488_buildr.title: Added to Squad
char_488_buildr.text: I'll check out our surroundings.

char_488_buildr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_488_buildr.text: What did those stubborn professors do back in college again... Hold a seminar first? Pff... Everyone would hate me so much...

char_488_buildr.title: Depart
char_488_buildr.text: Bring your site plans, everyone. Watch out for accident-prone areas.

char_488_buildr.title: Begin Operation
char_488_buildr.text: Arrived at the most optimal combat location. Ready to move.

char_488_buildr.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_488_buildr.text: Request acknowledged.

char_488_buildr.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_488_buildr.text: I'll give you the best plan possible.

char_488_buildr.title: Deployment 1
char_488_buildr.text: If you need me to, I'll wreck this place without hesitation.

char_488_buildr.title: Deployment 2
char_488_buildr.text: My hammer's not so weak!

char_488_buildr.title: In Battle 1
char_488_buildr.text: Load capacity calculations complete!

char_488_buildr.title: In Battle 2
char_488_buildr.text: Stress concentration point measured!

char_488_buildr.title: In Battle 3
char_488_buildr.text: Enemy cover demolished.

char_488_buildr.title: In Battle 4
char_488_buildr.text: The structure's stable and sound. Nothing to worry about!

char_488_buildr.title: 4-star Result
char_488_buildr.text: Like a building that'll never be destroyed.

char_488_buildr.title: 3-star Result
char_488_buildr.text: Looks like luck's on my side instead of theirs this time!

char_488_buildr.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_488_buildr.text: It's okay, Doctor. A city covered in volcanic ash is always pale, but beautiful flowers will eventually sprout on it.

char_488_buildr.title: Operation Failure
char_488_buildr.text: The road's been demolished. Enemy pursuit vehicles intercepted.

char_488_buildr.title: Assigned to Facility
char_488_buildr.text: What a sophisticated design... I gotta find time to really look at it.

char_488_buildr.title: Tap
char_488_buildr.text: Got a new mission, Doctor?

char_488_buildr.title: Trust Tap
char_488_buildr.text: Ah! Doctor, remember to stay clear of my hammer the next time you talk to me. It's dangerous!

char_488_buildr.title: Title
char_488_buildr.text: Arknights.

char_488_buildr.title: Greeting
char_488_buildr.text: Why don't we head outside together for some fresh air, Doctor? Staying in one place can really slow your thinking.

char_4106_bryota.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, if you need me for anything, just say the word! You want me to file the documents? Oof, I'm no good with paperwork... How about this, we set work aside and I take you for a spin?  Wink.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk 1
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, I got the ceiling light fixed. Is it bright enough for you? If you don't need me for anything else, I'll go take care of other stuff. You think all this work is hard on me? I get to make some money, meet new friends, and seize the life I want to live with my own two hands. There's nothing better than this.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk 2
char_4106_bryota.text: Ugh, I hit the wrong note again. Come on, don't laugh at me. Not all Siestans are natural-born musicians. Besides, the kalimba is harder than it looks! You wanna try? Here you go. Alright, Hold it a little further down, and gently pluck it with your thumb... You want me to teach you more later? Oh no, I'm no good at teaching either.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk 3
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, I found the perfect spot for sunbathing on the deck. It's got a great view. We can set up a parasol there, grab some ice-cold sodas, lounge on some beach chairs, and watch the clouds. When I was a kid, I used to take naps after I was done helping out at the store. Fell asleep listening to the waves like this.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4106_bryota.text: A police officer taught me these combat techniques. She said that when you run a business, you gotta have a few tricks up your sleeve. Most important is self-defense. Oh, right, she also gave me a membership card. She said it lets me sightsee all around Lungmen. What, You have one, too? What?! And there's no expiration date?!

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, look! I marked all the sightseeing destinations on the map. There's the volcano Miss Naumann talked about, and the underground forest on Chuck's postcard. When Rhodes Island passes by these places, I'll be sure to apply for... Aw, darn it, my nose is bleeding again...

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4106_bryota.text: Oh, I'm writing Harley back, telling her all about the places I've visited. Can't let'em think I traveled less than Chuck, you know. I used to think about the future very little, and I never thought I'd one day leave the 'White Volcano.' That said, when I made up my mind and said goodbye to the past, the future was already there before my eyes.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4106_bryota.text: This round little thing isn't a fowlbeast egg. It's a cobble found on the old Siestan beaches. My sister really treasured it, but she gave it to me right before I left. You know, Doctor, ties between people are like the beach. After the tides recede, you find only treasure. My life here at Rhodes Island has made me believe that even more.

char_4106_bryota.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4106_bryota.text: I promised Lut and Liv that I'd keep track of all my 'journey experiences' with Rhodes Island. Our adventure team may have disbanded for now, but when I become more mature and when they grow up, I'll definitely take them on this journey of mine.

char_4106_bryota.title: Idle
char_4106_bryota.text: One yawn, two yawns... Doctor, why don't I make you a glass of 'Cotton Sunset?' Trust me. You'll find yourself drifting in a fluffy, pillowy dream.

char_4106_bryota.title: Onboard
char_4106_bryota.text: Hello, Doctor. I'm Enis, and I'm formally joining Rhodes Island today. What, a codename? Umm, let me think... How about 'Bryophyta?' I hope I'll get to leave my mark on the mountain rocks and reefs, just like the moss.

char_4106_bryota.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4106_bryota.text: I didn't know you could work together in battle like that! Uh, I'm getting a little hungry. I'll go make some popcorn. You want some?

char_4106_bryota.title: Promotion 1
char_4106_bryota.text: This counts as a promotion, right?  Nice~ I'll write a postcard back to 'White Volcano', and brag all about this to my siblings, heheh. Yeah, I'll have to use a postcard with a picture of Rhodes Island.

char_4106_bryota.title: Promotion 2
char_4106_bryota.text: Elite instructor? You aren't trying to get me to become a kindergarten teacher or a boy scout leader, right? Haha, just kidding. But I've gotten pretty used to life here at Rhodes Island now. Let me keep following you guys to even more distant lands, Doctor.

char_4106_bryota.title: Added to Squad
char_4106_bryota.text: Huh? I-I'm heading to the battlefield, too?

char_4106_bryota.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4106_bryota.text: My gosh, you want me to lead the team? It's not the pay I'm worried about. I'm worried I could mess it up!

char_4106_bryota.title: Depart
char_4106_bryota.text: It's okay... Relax…

char_4106_bryota.title: Begin Operation
char_4106_bryota.text: Gotta give it 200%, better take a coffee mint…

char_4106_bryota.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4106_bryota.text: A capable helping hand? Me?

char_4106_bryota.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4106_bryota.text: Alright! I'll guard this place well.

char_4106_bryota.title: Deployment 1
char_4106_bryota.text: Fasten your seatbelts, everyone. I'm starting the meter now.

char_4106_bryota.title: Deployment 2
char_4106_bryota.text: You want me out of the way? Don't be silly. You can't get inside without tickets.

char_4106_bryota.title: In Battle 1
char_4106_bryota.text: Fierce winds won't push me back.

char_4106_bryota.title: In Battle 2
char_4106_bryota.text: Rough seas won't pull me under.

char_4106_bryota.title: In Battle 3
char_4106_bryota.text: Wildfire won't burn me down.

char_4106_bryota.title: In Battle 4
char_4106_bryota.text: Who says a logistics operator... can't fight?!

char_4106_bryota.title: 4-star Result
char_4106_bryota.text: I really thought I wouldn't make it... But looks like we can overcome even the biggest waves when we're working together.

char_4106_bryota.title: 3-star Result
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, I did well, right? I'm gonna get some ice cream. You want some, too? Alright, I can give you an extra scoop. Okay, okay, I'll give you two extra scoops.

char_4106_bryota.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4106_bryota.text: Uh, I got careless... Hm? I did well enough already...?

char_4106_bryota.title: Operation Failure
char_4106_bryota.text: Go. Don't worry about me... I've got a lifesaver license, you know.

char_4106_bryota.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4106_bryota.text: If only we had a surfboard here, oof…

char_4106_bryota.title: Tap
char_4106_bryota.text: Watch out! Phew, that was close... I almost spilled it.

char_4106_bryota.title: Trust Tap
char_4106_bryota.text: H-Hold on! Don't look! I'm not done with the lyrics yet! You... want to hear it?

char_4106_bryota.title: Title
char_4106_bryota.text: Arknights.

char_4106_bryota.title: Greeting
char_4106_bryota.text: Doctor, want to try some Siestan coffee? You can add some tonic water, too.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1034_jesca2.text: While you were out, I tried to sort the documents on your desk for you... It shames me to admit it, but... I haven't made much progress when it comes to desk work.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: I ran into Franka and Liskarm on my way to the dorms. Even though I hadn't seen them in so long, we talked like we were never apart... Um, Doctor, do you think, maybe, I c-could apply to serve on missions with them?

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: I don't have as much money on hand these days. I argued with my father a lot about pioneering in the barrenlands. And so... I stopped drawing from the family trust fund. But I can still earn some money out there pioneering, at least enough to maintain my equipment.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk 3
char_1034_jesca2.text: When I was little, everyone always had so much on their plates. Only my retired grandfather could stay at home with me. He would tell me stories about his time in the army, so that he can cheer me up this way. Even though his past never stopped tormenting him, he was still willing to fluff it into tidy little stories, just to make me smile.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: There was a soirée a while ago where someone brought up the war in Victoria. I chimed in with my own experiences. Only a few words, but enough to ruin everyone's time. You know, Doctor, that was the moment I finally realized why Blacksteel mercenaries rarely talk about themselves.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: I'm nominally still employed by Blacksteel, but it's been a while since I've done any mercenary work. No, it's not that I regret the decision I made back then; I'm just tired of responding to disaster, always one step behind. This time, I want to be there to protect something from the beginning.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: Doctor... Would you mind coming to the training room with me? I don't need a spotter, it's just... new operators keep coming to me for advice, and facing them alone makes me feel a— a little nervous.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: Oh... You want to know about the flower on my chest? Actually... it wasn't an accessory to begin with. It was a shard of metal that got lodged in my leg. After it was surgically removed, I... decided to turn it into a buttonhole flower instead of throwing it away. Y-Yeah, I guess it is kinda weird. I'm not sure what I was thinking.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1034_jesca2.text: I know now that there's no shame in crying... or having a soft heart. If you're sad about something you can't put into words, why not express your feelings with tears? It's part of being human, so there's nothing to be ashamed of.  Um... Am I right, Doctor?

char_1034_jesca2.title: Idle
char_1034_jesca2.text: You look a little worse for wear every time I see you... Are you doing alright these days, Doctor?

char_1034_jesca2.title: Onboard
char_1034_jesca2.text: It's been a while since we last met, Doctor. I'm glad there's still something I can do for you. That's right, I have changed a lot. If you could find the time, I'd love to sit down with you and catch up...

char_1034_jesca2.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1034_jesca2.text: I just dug up my old combat records, which proved to be pretty useful. Comparing my before-and-after, I at least know what mistakes I shouldn't be making again. Ugh, I really looked like a... bumbling idiot back then.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Promotion 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: I'm just glad to receive your acknowledgement, Doctor. The rewards are secondary.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Promotion 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: Doctor, are you giving me a promotion? Then, can I... make a teensy tiny extra request? It's nothing big, just... Can I... have a hug?

char_1034_jesca2.title: Added to Squad
char_1034_jesca2.text: Come in, Commander, this is Jessica. On the line and ready to roll.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1034_jesca2.text: Rally on me.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Depart
char_1034_jesca2.text: ETA six mikes.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Begin Operation
char_1034_jesca2.text: Hostiles sighted, over.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: In position.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: Roger, wilco.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Deployment 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: I'm headed into the thick of it.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Deployment 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: With all of you behind me, I won't take a single step back.

char_1034_jesca2.title: In Battle 1
char_1034_jesca2.text: Drawing a bead on the target.

char_1034_jesca2.title: In Battle 2
char_1034_jesca2.text: Don't come any closer…

char_1034_jesca2.title: In Battle 3
char_1034_jesca2.text: Requesting permission to fire.

char_1034_jesca2.title: In Battle 4
char_1034_jesca2.text: Be adviced. Target… eliminated.

char_1034_jesca2.title: 4-star Result
char_1034_jesca2.text: No resting on your laurels now... We've got more fighting ahead of us.

char_1034_jesca2.title: 3-star Result
char_1034_jesca2.text: That was close, I almost... A-Anyway, good thing I managed to pull through in the end... Sorry, Doctor. Please, give me a minute. I need to get my emotions under control.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1034_jesca2.text: I think... a minor setback is no big deal. It's already enough that none of our people got hurt.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Operation Failure
char_1034_jesca2.text: Doctor, an apology doesn't even begin to cut it... I'll try to make up for this failure on subsequent operations.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1034_jesca2.text: How I miss the time I spent on this landship... If only I could've stayed longer...

char_1034_jesca2.title: Tap
char_1034_jesca2.text: Go ahead, Doctor.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Trust Tap
char_1034_jesca2.text: You looked a little surprised shaking my hand just now... D-Did my calluses scare you, Doctor?

char_1034_jesca2.title: Title
char_1034_jesca2.text: Arknights.

char_1034_jesca2.title: Greeting
char_1034_jesca2.text: Glad to see you again, Doctor.

char_4105_almond.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4105_almond.text: Eh, how come work at the Engineering Department here is even more exhausting than Blacksteel? Good thing I've got some easy paperwork for a change of pace. Lemme start with this one. Umm... Hehe, sorry I bothered you, Doctor. I've got work to do, so I'm heading back to Engineering.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk 1
char_4105_almond.text: Doctor, you should've told me you dropped something behind this shelf. Look at you, wriggling around on the floor all day. Alright, get up. I've got specialized tools I use to carry bulky, heavy engineering equipment. We'll move it aside and grab your stuff. Do you have earplugs, though? It's probably gonna hurt your ears when I tow around this heavy-ass metal shelf...

char_4105_almond.title: Talk 2
char_4105_almond.text: Be brave, Laura. If you want your work to go smoothly and advance your career, you gotta take the plunge. Think about your future... Think about your dreams... Ah! What are you doing behind me?! I, I'm fine, it's just... I gotta get an injection tomorrow. I'm... I'm trying to get myself ready.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk 3
char_4105_almond.text: If you ask me, the most annoying part of engineering projects and experiments is the funding! Even when you get your hands on it, you still have lots to worry about. Everything I do costs money, and every monthly account statement is red as hell, and my budget's always like toilet paper! Speaking of, how much funding can you give me next month? I gotta start planning early.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4105_almond.text: My whole family lived in a single basement room when we first moved from Bolívar to Columbia. The space under my mother's bed was my first 'engineering lab.' I made lots of weird trinkets there. But I also got smacked just as much, heheh.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4105_almond.text: The power plant is like the heart of a nomadic plate. During my years in the field with my team, I've basically been its primary physician. Either I'm giving it all I got to recover its pulse, or... I'm pronouncing it dead when there's nothing more I can do.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4105_almond.text: Hey, hey, Doctor! Down here! Look at me! I've got good news. Our engineering project just had a major breakthrough. Don't stand there like a bump on a log. Come, let's sit down, I'll show you... Oh my gosh, I'm sorry, I forgot to wash my hands. I got a handprint on your coat....

char_4105_almond.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4105_almond.text: Nah, don't worry. My kneecap's not hurt. I just have a small crystal there, so I hide it with a band-aid. I know there's no need to hide it here, but I'm used to it. You know, Doctor, sometimes I wonder, If I'd met you guys before Blacksteel... Never mind. We don't have time for what-ifs.

char_4105_almond.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4105_almond.text: Doctor, you give everything you've got, even when there's nothing in it for you, just like Jessica. I'm not nearly as selfless as you guys, but I know when to be grateful. I won't let you down or squander the money and trust you two invested in me. I promise.

char_4105_almond.title: Idle
char_4105_almond.text: Falling asleep right on your desk... and your hair blocking your eyes like that. Hmm, guess I'll leave you this bone-shaped hairpin.

char_4105_almond.title: Onboard
char_4105_almond.text: Pleasure to meet ya! I'm the engineer Blacksteel sent here on exchange. Just call me Almond. Are you the Doctor Jessica's always talking about? Let me get a good look at you. Hmm... You seem fine and... Normal, I guess?

char_4105_almond.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4105_almond.text: Now this is interesting. I never thought you could use engineering machinery like that.

char_4105_almond.title: Promotion 1
char_4105_almond.text: Oh, you shouldn't have. It's all a part of our contract. I'm just doing my job so… Hold on! What did you just say...? Invest · ment?

char_4105_almond.title: Promotion 2
char_4105_almond.text: Aw, come on. you can drop the act. I've worked on so many projects with Rhodes Island's Engineering Department. You're not here just to nitpick, are you?

char_4105_almond.title: Added to Squad
char_4105_almond.text: You need my tech on the battlefield too? No problem!

char_4105_almond.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4105_almond.text: I used to lead an engineering team, but now a combat team…? Alright, let's do this. Everyone, listen for the whistle!

char_4105_almond.title: Depart
char_4105_almond.text: Woo! I just got a new idea. Better write it down as soon as the fight's over.

char_4105_almond.title: Begin Operation
char_4105_almond.text: Careful now, 'cause you won't escape once my little friends catch you!

char_4105_almond.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4105_almond.text: Need me for something?

char_4105_almond.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4105_almond.text: You need anything, I'm your girl!

char_4105_almond.title: Deployment 1
char_4105_almond.text: It's all just like the blueprints. Peerrfect!

char_4105_almond.title: Deployment 2
char_4105_almond.text: Even without a blueprint, I'm adaptable enough to work it out.

char_4105_almond.title: In Battle 1
char_4105_almond.text: All parameters set. Fire!

char_4105_almond.title: In Battle 2
char_4105_almond.text: Sheesh, why are you so heavy?

char_4105_almond.title: In Battle 3
char_4105_almond.text: Get over here!

char_4105_almond.title: In Battle 4
char_4105_almond.text: Oh shoot, my grappling hook's stuck! Sorry for tripping you!

char_4105_almond.title: 4-star Result
char_4105_almond.text: Doctor! Once we're back, be sure to check my blueprints! I can't just let you go when you've got such a great mind!

char_4105_almond.title: 3-star Result
char_4105_almond.text: Good work, Doctor! Want a cookie? Too tough to chew...? Hmm… I think it's fine…

char_4105_almond.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4105_almond.text: I would've liked a more perfect finish, but these results aren't so bad.

char_4105_almond.title: Operation Failure
char_4105_almond.text: Laying down smoke! Doctor, we'd better fall back while the enemy can't see us!

char_4105_almond.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4105_almond.text: The wiring in this room's terrible. Who did this? I'm gonna sort everything out here line by line.

char_4105_almond.title: Tap
char_4105_almond.text: Wai-wai-wait! Don't push! You'll mess up all the cables in my backpack!

char_4105_almond.title: Trust Tap
char_4105_almond.text: No · touching · my head!

char_4105_almond.title: Title
char_4105_almond.text: Arknights.

char_4105_almond.title: Greeting
char_4105_almond.text: I'm all set, Doctor. Ready to start working whenever!

char_4104_coldst.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4104_coldst.text: You have to clear all these documents on your desk? Gosh, that's a lot. How about a short break, honey? Tired as you are, a refreshing drink ought to help.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk 1
char_4104_coldst.text: What would you like to order tonight? Some ribs, maybe fried fowlbeast? I recommend the ribs with red wine, or the fowl with a glass of sparkling water Hm? You want both? Only if you can finish it all, darlin'. I wouldn't want any to go to waste.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk 2
char_4104_coldst.text: I met an interesting guy in Tkaronto who claimed to be the president of the Columbian Chiromancy Association. He was all about palm reading, and insisted on teaching me a thing or two. Unfortunately, I'm not a believer —Why not? Heh. Because for all the nonsense that came out of his mouth, his furry paws didn't have a single crease on them!

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk 3
char_4104_coldst.text: Davistown is a mining platform. It gets really cold in winter, but the warmth of its residents kept my diner open for more than a decade. Unfortunately, social ties alone couldn't save the iron mine, and it eventually became a Blacksteel training platform. Well, nothing I can do but wish them well. Hope they don't tip the whole thing into a ditch.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4104_coldst.text: It's in great condition, but I haven't actually used this weapon much in the past few years. A steak knife is enough to settle a dispute. How? Simple, if it's sharp enough to cut a steak, it's sharp enough to cut other things... Wanna see it in action?

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4104_coldst.text: I've seen automated mining platforms. I know it's just a matter of time until those industrial monsters phase out Davistown. But I still can't forgive the profiteers. They never give it a second thought how they're selling more than just the platform, it comes with the lives of everyone on it.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4104_coldst.text: Something bothering you? Need a drink? I learned what I know out in the Columbian wilds, so my drinks aren't exactly stylish, but they pack a punch... Don't look at me like that, hon. We can just chat if you don't want to drink.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4104_coldst.text: Jessica was so gloomy out on the frontier, but she still worked her hardest, day and night. Poor girl wouldn't even admit she was tired when anybody asked... I'm glad to see she looks so much better now that she's here at Rhodes Island with you by her side—Oh, hold still, hon! Your neck and shoulders are stiff as a board. Of course it's gonna hurt when I press down on them like this.

char_4104_coldst.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4104_coldst.text: I made a bet that I could drive us from the frontier to Tkaronto in one night. Wanna come along? You ride shotgun, I'll drive. Either I win, or we'll just park the car somewhere and watch the sunrise, play it like we spent the night chasing the dawn.

char_4104_coldst.title: Idle
char_4104_coldst.text: Doctor, wake up. You'll get a stiff neck if you sleep at your desk. Lay down on the sofa, I already put out a blanket.

char_4104_coldst.title: Onboard
char_4104_coldst.text: Hello, Doctor. Jessica and I are here to get medical help for our infected Pioneers. She talks about you all the time, so I think we'll be good working together.

char_4104_coldst.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4104_coldst.text: Hmm… This looks like more trouble than breaking up a fight in the diner...

char_4104_coldst.title: Promotion 1
char_4104_coldst.text: A company promotion is a wholly new experience for me... thank you, Doctor.

char_4104_coldst.title: Promotion 2
char_4104_coldst.text: I'm not trying to protect anything, I just want to experience as much goodness as I can, leaving no regrets behind. But, if someone were here to do badness, I wouldn't hesitate to empty my magazine.

char_4104_coldst.title: Added to Squad
char_4104_coldst.text: I still prefer the conflicts you can settle with a steak knife.

char_4104_coldst.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4104_coldst.text: I'll assign jobs like I would in the kitchen. Everybody okay with that?

char_4104_coldst.title: Depart
char_4104_coldst.text: If you feel nervous, think about what song you want to sing at the party afterwards.

char_4104_coldst.title: Begin Operation
char_4104_coldst.text: I smell something unpleasant burning.

char_4104_coldst.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4104_coldst.text: What kind of 'drink' can I fix you?

char_4104_coldst.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4104_coldst.text: Who do you want me to target?

char_4104_coldst.title: Deployment 1
char_4104_coldst.text: Got a clear view here. Hope they don't got the same.

char_4104_coldst.title: Deployment 2
char_4104_coldst.text: Relax, I'm almost done reloading.

char_4104_coldst.title: In Battle 1
char_4104_coldst.text: Want a drink? It's on me.

char_4104_coldst.title: In Battle 2
char_4104_coldst.text: Too bad, I've got you now.

char_4104_coldst.title: In Battle 3
char_4104_coldst.text: Ready to surrender? No? Sorry about this, then.

char_4104_coldst.title: In Battle 4
char_4104_coldst.text: Ever stick a hot knife in butter?

char_4104_coldst.title: 4-star Result
char_4104_coldst.text: Well done, Doctor. This drink is to you.

char_4104_coldst.title: 3-star Result
char_4104_coldst.text: Mission complete, easy peasy.

char_4104_coldst.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4104_coldst.text: They're no threat anymore. Just let them wander off into the wilderness.

char_4104_coldst.title: Operation Failure
char_4104_coldst.text: Don't worry about me, I'm just covering your retreat. I've seen worse.

char_4104_coldst.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4104_coldst.text: Sometimes I miss the days I spent riding a burdenbeast out into the wilds.

char_4104_coldst.title: Tap
char_4104_coldst.text: Careful, you almost spilled the drink.

char_4104_coldst.title: Trust Tap
char_4104_coldst.text: Want a slice of this freshly baked meat pie?

char_4104_coldst.title: Title
char_4104_coldst.text: Arknights.

char_4104_coldst.title: Greeting
char_4104_coldst.text: Hello, Doctor. What can I get you today?

char_4088_hodrer.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4088_hodrer.text: Why is this history book only half-written? Because it is waiting to be filled with the wars yet to come. Those Sarkaz who march off to their deaths will be nothing but footnotes. Speak your mind, Doctor. You might just as well leave behind some unique commentary on this segment of history.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: I was the one who killed Scout. We made a 'transaction,' then I jammed my sword through through his heart. Mercenaries like us could put a price on anything. Hmph, the most unfair part of the deal was that I had to keep on living.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: A pathetic soul looking to crawl up out of the quagmire? Ines is right. Still, when the mire wanted to drag me under, I realized there was no escape. For most Sarkaz, they'd find only hatred-borne victories to swallow when they're hungry for revenge. But I refuse to believe it's the way it should be, and I won't stop finding for us a true path to freedom.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk 3
char_4088_hodrer.text: When I was young, my mother taught me to read and write Sarkaz. I still remember that volume of 'Qui'lon's Expedition' she kept on her, its ink smudged with some guy's blood... She died of Oripathy. As for the book, it's gonna carry our hopes and tears, until time wears it out.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: While I was in prison, I liked to kill time by debating a scholar, an old Feline in the next cell over. Our conversations usually ended with him trying to prove that Victoria was more civilized than Kazdel. Eventually, he failed to prove it before the Sarkaz guards executed him. I should say it's not something I feel happy about.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Most of the Sarkaz history books I collected have been lost. Whether burned to ash or cast aside in action like worthless scraps, their whereabouts hardly piqued anyone else's curiosity. But... for better or for worse, we have other ways to remember history.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: No, it's nothing... Fine, 'Introduction to Accounting Practice,' borrowed it from the library. Ines says that all you need to know to open a shop is how to collect money and give change, and now I'm a little surprised to find out she's right. Well, I won't call this a waste of effort. At the very least...there's no harm in having some idle thoughts.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Can you guess who made these salted potatoes? W, Yeah. Hard to believe, huh? She actually cooks a lot more than Ines does. Try one, they're not bad. Mercenaries are good at taking lives, but there's a limit to one's energy. To hone our craft, we have to set aside everything else.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4088_hodrer.text: What were you like back then? My lips are sealed, Doctor. Oftentimes, getting to forget is a gift. Make no mistake, I'm not suggesting you were a good person or some kind of bastard. People always expect things to 'return to the way they were,' whether it's about circumstances or people. However, amnesia won't give anyone a clean restart of life.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Idle
char_4088_hodrer.text: Seems like a lifetime ago...  Only that room with the swaying white curtains is long gone.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Onboard
char_4088_hodrer.text: A nostalgic place, Doctor. As for this commission of yours, I trust we can both set aside its details for the moment. I do have some other ideas on the rewards, though, beyond the bounty itself.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4088_hodrer.text: Is this your upgraded training regimen? Hmm, it's definitely safer for the masses, but I'd do better with something more direct.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Promotion 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: I don't need these, Doctor. But if you insist on some sort of reward... you think I could teach a class to the children here in my free time? No, not to teach military history. I just want to share with them... some Sarkaz folk songs.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Promotion 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Medals and titles give people an illusion of some kind of irreplaceable responsibility. Most times, though, it begets nothing but ruination. That's true for 'elite,' 'leader,' 'king'... and even 'the Lord of Fiends.'

char_4088_hodrer.title: Added to Squad
char_4088_hodrer.text: If conflict is unavoidable, a swift end is a form of mercy.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4088_hodrer.text: I only hope this is temporary. It's not really my thing.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Depart
char_4088_hodrer.text: Embers will hide our footsteps.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Begin Operation
char_4088_hodrer.text: ...War never changes.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: Don't doubt your own judgment.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Seize the moment.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Deployment 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: Order acknowledged.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Deployment 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Same battlefield, different day.

char_4088_hodrer.title: In Battle 1
char_4088_hodrer.text: Eyes blind by hatred.

char_4088_hodrer.title: In Battle 2
char_4088_hodrer.text: Sense deprived by ember.

char_4088_hodrer.title: In Battle 3
char_4088_hodrer.text: The battlefield's all around you. Where do you think you're running?

char_4088_hodrer.title: In Battle 4
char_4088_hodrer.text: Enough. Time to end this.

char_4088_hodrer.title: 4-star Result
char_4088_hodrer.text: One great victory isn't enough to tip the balance, but it can buy you a moment of respite. You may catch a breath now.

char_4088_hodrer.title: 3-star Result
char_4088_hodrer.text: A single military victory means nothing in the face of what we're putting a stop to.  This is just a nuisance we've cleared aside.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4088_hodrer.text: Why the long face, Doctor? Our heads are still sitting on our shoulders. As for them, don't worry, I'll take care of that for you.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Operation Failure
char_4088_hodrer.text: Less guys on your case isn't such a bad thing, is it?

char_4088_hodrer.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4088_hodrer.text: Ines and W? They're here too?

char_4088_hodrer.title: Tap
char_4088_hodrer.text: You… Anything else you want to know?

char_4088_hodrer.title: Trust Tap
char_4088_hodrer.text: I don't have time for small talk. If you want fun and games, go look for W. Huh, so I'm not the only one who just got kicked out.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Title
char_4088_hodrer.text: Arknights.

char_4088_hodrer.title: Greeting
char_4088_hodrer.text: Didn't see you there. I was just... thinking about the future.

char_4110_delphn.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4110_delphn.text: Be at ease. I won't let another assassin do his work right in front of me, ever again.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk 1
char_4110_delphn.text: There's nothing that can derail the historical trajectory of Victoria, not even Theresis, or even the dukes. It's nothing but different people taking turns to wallow in the same puddle of mud. You want my honest opinion? Heh. Stay back, lest you get mud splashed on you.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk 2
char_4110_delphn.text: I lived with Mum for a long time when she was stationed on the border all year round, and the towers of Londinium were never in sight... I never so much as asked her. Just what it was that made her so willing to toil away all those years, out on the border?

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk 3
char_4110_delphn.text: Say. I hear Her Royal Highness Alexandrina is continuing to gather more supporters? Very well... Sooner or later, Vina will have to face the same choice as I did. Though all told, taking off a crown invites far more obstacles than giving up a dukedom. If you get the chance, do tell her I wish her all the best.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4110_delphn.text: The sword brandished and never sheathed is the sword of the weak. Even though my mum taught me swordplay from a young age, more than anything, she made me practice the art of stowing my blade. If I'm to inherit her position, then I can't be daggers drawn for most issues that greet me... And just knowing that chafes.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4110_delphn.text: 'Self-evident?' 'Just?' Great nobles in their ivory towers, engaging in nefarious deeds so that their country endures and prospers, is that self-evident? The starving Infected robbing the innocent in a desperate attempt to live another day, is that just? These are questions I won't give up on finding the answers to.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4110_delphn.text: Rhodes Island has shown its sincerity to me, so even though she's... no longer with us, our deal still stands true. Of course, this is as long as you don't mind my currently utterly powerless status, Doctor.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4110_delphn.text: Did you find these... at the video shop? I actually picked these out just for Baird, but she never gave them the time of day, saying they were just so noisy... They're useless now, so you can have them. These are some of Wrankwood's must-watch comedy classics.

char_4110_delphn.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4110_delphn.text: There's countless scenarios I've thought of to prevent my mum from being assassinated, and always, always, the result is the same... She was so strong, she never had a need to question her own decisions. Tears? Hah, you must be mistaken, Doctor. I learned long ago to never cry.

char_4110_delphn.title: Idle
char_4110_delphn.text: You can rest easy, I'll be here. There aren't many chances to take a nap on the battlefield.

char_4110_delphn.title: Onboard
char_4110_delphn.text: We can save each other the trouble of introducing ourselves, and I'll treat this contract as a token of you approving how we cooperate. Can I get back to work now, Doctor?

char_4110_delphn.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4110_delphn.text: This battle record is a five out of five. It's as good as the Wrankwood action blockbusters I used to watch at the video shop.

char_4110_delphn.title: Promotion 1
char_4110_delphn.text: Interesting. A 'medical organization,' employing a standard military promotion system...? Hmm. I can already see certain people getting their just desserts for underestimating you.

char_4110_delphn.title: Promotion 2
char_4110_delphn.text: A higher position often means taking more responsibilities, but I'm sick of people in those positions using responsibility as a shield for their own selfishness, so I hope things will be different here. In any case, our partnership has at least for now, taken another step forward.

char_4110_delphn.title: Added to Squad
char_4110_delphn.text: I'll cooperate at all times.

char_4110_delphn.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4110_delphn.text: Don't worry. I'll make sure everyone on the squad is safe.

char_4110_delphn.title: Depart
char_4110_delphn.text: Bury the habit of fighting each to your own!

char_4110_delphn.title: Begin Operation
char_4110_delphn.text: Survey the terrain, and clear out those despicables in hiding.

char_4110_delphn.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4110_delphn.text: Hesitancy is forbidden on the battlefield!

char_4110_delphn.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4110_delphn.text: May I draw my sword now?

char_4110_delphn.title: Deployment 1
char_4110_delphn.text: A radical strategy, but I can work with it.

char_4110_delphn.title: Deployment 2
char_4110_delphn.text: Judge by appearance, and suffer the consequences.

char_4110_delphn.title: In Battle 1
char_4110_delphn.text: Do not disregard me!

char_4110_delphn.title: In Battle 2
char_4110_delphn.text: You picked the wrong foe!

char_4110_delphn.title: In Battle 3
char_4110_delphn.text: A fine opportunity.

char_4110_delphn.title: In Battle 4
char_4110_delphn.text: No need to hold back.

char_4110_delphn.title: 4-star Result
char_4110_delphn.text: That was some clean commanding. We have a bit of time before our mission is estimated to end, so you should grab the chance to think about how to reward yourself.

char_4110_delphn.title: 3-star Result
char_4110_delphn.text: A reasonable result. I'd doubt your ability to achieve your ambitions, if coping with this was beyond you.

char_4110_delphn.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4110_delphn.text: It's not for us to leave without regrets, Doctor... Let's accept reality.

char_4110_delphn.title: Operation Failure
char_4110_delphn.text: Am I... still not good enough?

char_4110_delphn.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4110_delphn.text: This style... it fits my impression of you.

char_4110_delphn.title: Tap
char_4110_delphn.text: That's rude.

char_4110_delphn.title: Trust Tap
char_4110_delphn.text: Want some canned food? The sugar will get you fat though.

char_4110_delphn.title: Title
char_4110_delphn.text: Arknights.

char_4110_delphn.title: Greeting
char_4110_delphn.text: It's been a while, Doctor. Ready to move out?

char_494_vendla.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_494_vendla.text: I can choose my own workplace? Thank you, I'll have the documents over shortly! Hmm, was the Convalescent Garden this way... or that way? Sorry, I'll still need you to show me the way after all…

char_494_vendla.title: Talk 1
char_494_vendla.text: My grandfather told me how wild roses used to grow all over behind the town. White ones, red ones, out in the mountains and fields... Children loved them. Dignitaries took pride in them... But I never saw any. Perhaps he just wanted to trick a naughty child into going to sleep...

char_494_vendla.title: Talk 2
char_494_vendla.text: The sunlight through the glass, the town's humid air, the aroma of petals and soil... Those were what made naps special for me, alone in the afternoons. No one would ever bother me—at most they'd quietly leave behind their coin, and take what flowers they fancied back home. At least, that's how it was until the tragedy.

char_494_vendla.title: Talk 3
char_494_vendla.text: I was bringing some seeds back, and Lena was smiling at me the whole time. Why...? Oh, I didn't even notice I had dirt on my face! I feel like when I get busy, I start letting all sorts of things slip my mind. Has it been this way? Well... I used to never have so many worries in the first place.

char_494_vendla.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_494_vendla.text: I don't think me stepping onto the front lines was an act of bravery. My time in the Self-Salvation Corps wasn't that dramatic either. My hometown's gone and I had nowhere to go. All I could do was carry on my friend's last wish, and never look back. Isn't that what war's all about?

char_494_vendla.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_494_vendla.text: Do you think flowers can grow once more, in steel and soil's gaps? Ever since I saw again what that city of iron's become, the question has been bothering me. Maybe Rockrock was right—I'd better take a bag of seeds back home after the war dies down... You don't think we'll be waiting too long?

char_494_vendla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_494_vendla.text: Excuse me, Doctor, I'm not getting in the way of your sunbathing, am I? I like it here too... The portholes might not be that big, but their sunlight's enough for these flowers to grow. What do you think? It worries me when a place feels lonely, so I took the initiative to decorate the room with them.

char_494_vendla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_494_vendla.text: Doctor, watch out for the thorns on the stems! It's not that I don't want to pick them for you, it's just that they haven't reached the peak of their beauty yet. Hm...? You'd like to help me take care of them? Oh, no problem. Do you need me to teach you how?

char_494_vendla.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_494_vendla.text: To be honest, my greatest wish would be to return to my hometown, and rebuild my greenhouse. Doctor, are you laughing? I'm guessing you—think I should have loftier dreams...? No need, you say? Heheh, I suppose. Well, not that this'll be easy either, seeing as my hometown's rubble now.

char_494_vendla.title: Idle
char_494_vendla.text: Take a deep breath, Doctor. The scent of roses will put your mind at ease.

char_494_vendla.title: Onboard
char_494_vendla.text: Greetings, Doctor. Vendela reporting in. Um, what did Rockrock write for me next, I can't remember... Never mind! Please take this flower, I insist! Its meaning is good luck.

char_494_vendla.title: Watching Battle Record
char_494_vendla.text: The method's a perfect fit. You prune leaves and branches the same way.

char_494_vendla.title: Promotion 1
char_494_vendla.text: A promotion? Then may I request a bigger room? No... It's not that I can't get used to it. I just have more and more roses in my room, and they need more sunlight... Okay, maybe the same goes for me.

char_494_vendla.title: Promotion 2
char_494_vendla.text: Don't worry yourself about these entangled thorns. They're just trying to protect me.

char_494_vendla.title: Added to Squad
char_494_vendla.text: I'll try my best to help everyone out.

char_494_vendla.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_494_vendla.text: Everyone, please follow where the petals flutter.

char_494_vendla.title: Depart
char_494_vendla.text: Don't be afraid of the thorns. They are here to help us.

char_494_vendla.title: Begin Operation
char_494_vendla.text: I won't allow them to trample apart this land!

char_494_vendla.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_494_vendla.text: Ugh, there's a bad scent in the air.

char_494_vendla.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_494_vendla.text: Will it really be possible to plant seeds here?

char_494_vendla.title: Deployment 1
char_494_vendla.text: I like these high places. They have plenty of sunshine.

char_494_vendla.title: Deployment 2
char_494_vendla.text: I heard someone tried planting sunflowers on the roof? Not a bad idea.

char_494_vendla.title: In Battle 1
char_494_vendla.text: Watch out for the thorns.

char_494_vendla.title: In Battle 2
char_494_vendla.text: Bloom forth!

char_494_vendla.title: In Battle 3
char_494_vendla.text: Pay attention to where the petals fall.

char_494_vendla.title: In Battle 4
char_494_vendla.text: What blooms, must also wither.

char_494_vendla.title: 4-star Result
char_494_vendla.text: Do you see the dew shimmering on the petals? Such splendid scenery in the morning light… We wouldn't be enjoying this if not for you.

char_494_vendla.title: 3-star Result
char_494_vendla.text: Scything, uprooting... It sounds cruel. But if we want to deal with the weeds competing for nutrients, then I think there's no other way, Doctor.

char_494_vendla.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_494_vendla.text: While on the front lines, I caught a glimpse of an unforgettable field of flowers, blooming with vigor and vitality. I was always curious where their nutrients came from. Now, I think I know…

char_494_vendla.title: Operation Failure
char_494_vendla.text: Their petals... have crumbled away.

char_494_vendla.title: Assigned to Facility
char_494_vendla.text: Cold and isolated... Is this the sort of atmosphere you prefer, Doctor?

char_494_vendla.title: Tap
char_494_vendla.text: Oh! Did you want to buy some flowers?

char_494_vendla.title: Trust Tap
char_494_vendla.text: Eep. You knocked the flower out of my hair.

char_494_vendla.title: Title
char_494_vendla.text: Arknights.

char_494_vendla.title: Greeting
char_494_vendla.text: You spotted it, Doctor? That's a new variety I've been breeding. Do you like it?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4107_vrdant.text: Doctor, I'm putting the flowerpots here. The scent from these clears the mind. It'll help you sift through those documents, guaranteed.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: I used to have to collect plant samples for my employer whenever he barked the order. Give me a scarcely-traveled rainforest and I'll head in happy. Thing is, once our specimens started growing in people's hydroponic pots, and then protected areas, and then test farms... Well, that's where the trouble began.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: I was in the Convalescent Garden, and I saw the plant almanac Perfumer's compiling. Lots of gaps, no way to fill them in as of yet. See, a good plant hunter fills the blanks with their 'prey.' A great plant hunter not only does that, they also get the author to leave them plenty more new blanks.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk 3
char_4107_vrdant.text: I've been to Acahualla plenty. The residents there, Tiacauhs, I believe the name is. They're good people. They'll be frank with you, straight with you. It's just, two things I can't stand: one, they force me to go wrestling when they get drunk, and two, they keep judging my tail... is it really that thin, Doctor? My tail?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: This handsaw was custom-made for me by my mother while I was still in school. Never thought I'd be using it again after I got infected. Thanks to that employer of mine, hiring plant hunters. He let me continue doing what I loved... even if he's the same bloke who fired me out of paranoia in the end.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: Doctor, this is the plant that got me fired. No monetary value, so you can imagine... I told my boss I forsook my assigned target for this bit of shrubbery, and he thinks I'm having him on somehow... But listen. I discovered this 'un. I gave it its name. And nothing could matter more than that.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: To make a 'scarecrow,' you need a whole lot more than just straw. You also need a variety of tough, poisonous, and insect-eating plants, Originium Arts, as well as my dad's techniques to sew everything together... Tch, leaked my trade secrets again. Doctor, remember not to tell anyone.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: You're right, I am in fact used to keeping a cold, stoic persona in front of strangers. After all, your average plant hunter doesn't usually get into interpersonal conflict with a standing army. It's more often absent-minded guards with fixed salaries. Overpowering your opposition by putting on airs can actually ensure your safety, funny enough.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4107_vrdant.text: Doctor, this is my very first time making a 'Scarecrow' for someone else. What d'you think? Uncanny resemblance, right? If danger's ever afoot, this can help—oi, slow down, don't touch those vines, else they'll—Hrm. It'll let go of your arm naturally after a short while. Trust me.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Idle
char_4107_vrdant.text: You were just trying to chat with me and I wasn't responding? Ooh, um, see, I was DEFINITELY, NOT using a 'Scarecrow', tooooo skive off work. Honest.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Onboard
char_4107_vrdant.text: I need a job, and being a pharmaceutical company, surely Rhodes Island won't turn down an experienced plant hunter. And the plant hunter in question is none other than... Y'what? I just need to sign here, that's it? No fibs?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4107_vrdant.text: Hang on! I think I saw a very rare shrub. Might even be a new species! Where was this video taken?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Promotion 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: There's a beautiful medal... but the design's a bit dull. You considered adding some plant motifs to it?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Promotion 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: Never mind contending with people. I prefer exploring the wilderness, delving into the rainforest, living among the plants... Want to come along with me next time, Doctor?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Added to Squad
char_4107_vrdant.text: Can we settle disputes some other way that's not direct conflict?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4107_vrdant.text: All I can assure you is everyone returns safe. I cannot guarantee victory like the others can. Are you SURE you want me as squad leader?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Depart
char_4107_vrdant.text: If this conflict truly is necessary, I suppose there's no way around it.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Begin Operation
char_4107_vrdant.text: Good bit of bravery in you to stand as my enemy.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: Chop-chop with the orders. I'll make 'em regret showing their faces.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: Chop-chop with the orders? I can see them coming...

char_4107_vrdant.title: Deployment 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: Dead branches and rotten leaves! I'll sweep up in no time, just you watch.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Deployment 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: Bunch of ten-a-penny weeds. Nothing I'm interested in.

char_4107_vrdant.title: In Battle 1
char_4107_vrdant.text: The harder on the outside, the softer on the inside.

char_4107_vrdant.title: In Battle 2
char_4107_vrdant.text: Plant looks risky, who can tell. Plant looks safe, you're in for hell.

char_4107_vrdant.title: In Battle 3
char_4107_vrdant.text: Never assume the simple days will last.

char_4107_vrdant.title: In Battle 4
char_4107_vrdant.text: ...Uh-oh. Time I dropped a 'Scarecrow'!

char_4107_vrdant.title: 4-star Result
char_4107_vrdant.text: I never thought I'd be getting the best of that vicious an enemy... At this rate, you think we could be off somewhere more dangerous for sample-collecting?

char_4107_vrdant.title: 3-star Result
char_4107_vrdant.text: There we go, enemies dealt with, now we can show ourselves the door and leave.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4107_vrdant.text: A few of 'em got away... They're not coming back, are they?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Operation Failure
char_4107_vrdant.text: Stay alive, Doctor. You won't have a future to count on otherwise.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4107_vrdant.text: If I want to help improve Rhodes Island's plant diversity, where do I apply?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Tap
char_4107_vrdant.text: If you can't tell the difference between me and a 'Scarecrow,' I think the vines might've poisoned you.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Trust Tap
char_4107_vrdant.text: Hmm... Where should I go to collect samples next time?

char_4107_vrdant.title: Title
char_4107_vrdant.text: Arknights.

char_4107_vrdant.title: Greeting
char_4107_vrdant.text: Good morning, Doctor. I watered the flowers in your office for you.

char_4109_baslin.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4109_baslin.text: That's a huge stack of documents... I can lend you a hand if you're struggling to clear them, Doctor… Oh, sorry. I should be on standby waiting for your request.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk 1
char_4109_baslin.text: Hildegard doesn't care how Leithanians think of her, and I'm not some civil servant mincing words for her. It's just that we've been together for a long time now, so I'm able to stand in for her on unofficial occasions, to speak words she's not at liberty to speak, or meet people unsuitable for her to see.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk 2
char_4109_baslin.text: That must have been Federico earlier... He's also the type to think of normal conversation as stepping on glass. But once you know them long enough, you'll be able to understand what they're perplexed with, or what they're chasing after. My advice? Get used to awkward silence.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk 3
char_4109_baslin.text: I just heard some people discussing my age, but I don't see the issue, really. I met a sickly fellow in Zwillingstürme. He was younger than me by a few months, but he's skating on thin ice every day due to his status as Graf... Well, at least I don't have to worry about my own safety like that.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4109_baslin.text: 'Wolfgang, everything you say and do will affect Wulfsburg's future.' That's what I told myself back then. My life is my answer sheet, which I keep neat. But the problem is... maybe not everything has to be treated as an exam... Um, I still seem tense, even now?

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4109_baslin.text: Thank you for your concern, but I don't mind Hildegard's disappearance at all. She told me the enclosure of war was built so that it could be torn down in the future without any worries. She must have been somewhat aware of it that day, but she still... Anyway, my mission isn't over yet, and I remain her envoy still.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4109_baslin.text: Doctor, why are fowlbeasts unable to touch the stars no matter how far they fly? Uh, no, I'm just used to breaking the silence when it gets too quiet. Please pay me no heed. I don't think the answer's that important...? It's because they can't even fly right when they're... Ahem, seeing stars.

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4109_baslin.text: Didn't I soundproof the room with Arts...? This castanet? It's a gift from Lieselotte, given during my first audience with her. When I was living in the Spire, I would kick it at the books in my room. Knocking them down one by one, then put them back before the sun came up. It's normal for me to be childish at my age, isn't it?

char_4109_baslin.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4109_baslin.text: You two are so similar... Sorry for disturbing you with my sudden words, Doctor... I was just thinking about how you and Hildegard are so alike. Both of you shoulder so many responsibilities in silence, and I can't tell when to step in. Can I help you? Or... can you help me?

char_4109_baslin.title: Idle
char_4109_baslin.text: My tuba? Of course I can play it... Speaking of which, can you play the piano? Can you practice with me when you're free?

char_4109_baslin.title: Onboard
char_4109_baslin.text: Doctor, I am here at the behest of Empress Hildegard of Leithanien, and I hope to maintain friendly relations with you. I can act as a your Messenger, and perform music for you as well.

char_4109_baslin.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4109_baslin.text: I've already seen this... Hold on, I have some old recordings of the annual Kaiserinnensfest. Would you like to watch them together with me?

char_4109_baslin.title: Promotion 1
char_4109_baslin.text: Phew... Seems like I haven't disappointed you. Uh, Doctor. Should I be acting more nonchalant about this?

char_4109_baslin.title: Promotion 2
char_4109_baslin.text: Mm... I'm glad to have met your expectations.

char_4109_baslin.title: Added to Squad
char_4109_baslin.text: I'll follow your baton for the time being.

char_4109_baslin.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4109_baslin.text: I knew you were too lazy to show up, so I went to run some errands... I'm very much used to this.

char_4109_baslin.title: Depart
char_4109_baslin.text: A music score or a battle plan—you have to give me one of those at least.

char_4109_baslin.title: Begin Operation
char_4109_baslin.text: Hm. Dissonances.

char_4109_baslin.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4109_baslin.text: Opening with a tuba? A rare arrangement.

char_4109_baslin.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4109_baslin.text: Am I the only tuba in your band?

char_4109_baslin.title: Deployment 1
char_4109_baslin.text: I'll warm up my fingers first.

char_4109_baslin.title: Deployment 2
char_4109_baslin.text: I'll join in the performance at the right section.

char_4109_baslin.title: In Battle 1
char_4109_baslin.text: Can you hear it, the restorative vigor of that fortissimo?

char_4109_baslin.title: In Battle 2
char_4109_baslin.text: Can you feel it, the melodious emotions of that pianissimo?

char_4109_baslin.title: In Battle 3
char_4109_baslin.text: A shrill howl? That's what happens when you mess up while performing.

char_4109_baslin.title: In Battle 4
char_4109_baslin.text: Out of my way, or I'll shove your head up this tuba.

char_4109_baslin.title: 4-star Result
char_4109_baslin.text: While the tuba is one of the most difficult instruments to play, I'm sure I'll get somewhat proficient at it in time. But you, you seem like a musician who was born proficient with all kinds of instruments... Life is so unfair.

char_4109_baslin.title: 3-star Result
char_4109_baslin.text: Your ingenuity put to shame any conductor I've seen.

char_4109_baslin.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4109_baslin.text: How does one keep their musicality in tip-top shape? Practice. A flawed performance simply means you haven't practiced enough.

char_4109_baslin.title: Operation Failure
char_4109_baslin.text: Did we fail? I don't think so. People like you usually factor failure into your plans, yes?

char_4109_baslin.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4109_baslin.text: The soundproofing here should be decent...?

char_4109_baslin.title: Tap
char_4109_baslin.text: Ahh... you gave me a fright.

char_4109_baslin.title: Trust Tap
char_4109_baslin.text: Doctor, I'm just about to replace the bell on my tuba. Can you lend me a hand?

char_4109_baslin.title: Title
char_4109_baslin.text: Arknights.

char_4109_baslin.title: Greeting
char_4109_baslin.text: Are you resting well, Doctor?

char_4100_caper.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4100_caper.text: Oh, thank you so much, Doc! Why am I thanking you? Heehee, because you just signed… MY PAID LEAVE APPLICATION!

char_4100_caper.title: Talk 1
char_4100_caper.text: I used to be a troublemaker for hire. People PAY for my epic pranks. The coalition government, the Singas, True Bolívar. I don't care who I work for. Sometimes, I even work both sides. I take care of one job on my way to one place, and the other on the way back. Jajaja! All that ruckus, it was glorious!!

char_4100_caper.title: Talk 2
char_4100_caper.text: Here, some corn bugles. Want some? No, no! You can't just throw them in your mouth. Where are your manners? Give me your hand, let me show you. First, you put them on each of your fingertips like that, then—Om! Hehe! Thanks for the food!

char_4100_caper.title: Talk 3
char_4100_caper.text: You call this a weapon? Hahaha, that's so funny. I call it 'Twirly-twirl.' It's a toy my mama made for me. You can throw it out like this, and then it comes back. What? It's too destructive? That's the fun part.

char_4100_caper.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4100_caper.text: I've been pretty playful ever since I was a kid. I had enough tricks up my sleeve to turn the tables on the bullies, even pulled a few ducats out of them sometimes. I mean, come on, you need a thrill like that to really feel alive. But here you are, working your butt off all day long. Aren't you bored?

char_4100_caper.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4100_caper.text: Can't hear the rain in here at all.... You know, Doctor, back when I was a kid, rainy days meant I couldn't go out to play. All I could do was stay in mama's workshop, helping her count screws, and listening to the pitter-patter of rain on the sheetmetal roof... But I don't mind days like that. You surprised?

char_4100_caper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4100_caper.text: A Liberi dude who calls himself a hottie, a Vulpo car mechanic who does things his way, and my fellow Bolívarian with the huge appetite. Just where did you find all these fun people? I knew I made the right choice joining you guys.

char_4100_caper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4100_caper.text: Before I left home, I had a huge fight with mama, all because I caught Oripathy. I have my ways to keep from being a burden to my family, but mama… she hugged me so tight, she said she'd sell everything in the house to get me treated. I've never wanted to admit it, but I guess my life really is miserable.

char_4100_caper.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4100_caper.text: You know what 'can soccer' is? It's my favorite game! Just take a can out of the ditch or whatever scrap heap, then play ball. Oye wey! What's that look on your face? We may have been poor, but there was plenty of fun to be had. Don't believe me? Come try for yourself!

char_4100_caper.title: Idle
char_4100_caper.text: If you're that tired, how about you hand me all your top-secret documents and get some rest?

char_4100_caper.title: Onboard
char_4100_caper.text: Caper, or whatever you wanna call me. Just standing here already proves I'm tough enough, right? You're my boss now, so make sure I don't get bored. And be ready for my surprises.

char_4100_caper.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4100_caper.text: You saw that move of mine? Hahaha! Their reaction was so funny.

char_4100_caper.title: Promotion 1
char_4100_caper.text: All the officers I know are so desperate for promotion, they do all kinds of dirty infighting. So I assumed getting promoted had to be super fun. Hmph, turns out it's no big deal.

char_4100_caper.title: Promotion 2
char_4100_caper.text: I guess only my mama would be happy to hear I got promoted... It's all the same to me. But If I get promoted high enough to order you around… Heehee, then my head is full of ideas.

char_4100_caper.title: Added to Squad
char_4100_caper.text: Finally giving me a real fun job?

char_4100_caper.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4100_caper.text: Alright, everyone, don't overdo it! Of course, that doesn't apply to me!

char_4100_caper.title: Depart
char_4100_caper.text: Come on, come on! Let's go!

char_4100_caper.title: Begin Operation
char_4100_caper.text: Twirly-twirl, it's time to play!

char_4100_caper.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4100_caper.text: My turn now?

char_4100_caper.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4100_caper.text: What you waiting for? It's gotta be me!

char_4100_caper.title: Deployment 1
char_4100_caper.text: Think you can catch me? That's hilarious!

char_4100_caper.title: Deployment 2
char_4100_caper.text: What should I play with you guys?

char_4100_caper.title: In Battle 1
char_4100_caper.text: Go home to your mama!

char_4100_caper.title: In Battle 2
char_4100_caper.text: Watch out—Here comes Twirly-twirl!

char_4100_caper.title: In Battle 3
char_4100_caper.text: Watch me cut your pants to scraps!

char_4100_caper.title: In Battle 4
char_4100_caper.text: Watch me cut all that hair on your head!

char_4100_caper.title: 4-star Result
char_4100_caper.text: That was such a thrill! Can we do it again?

char_4100_caper.title: 3-star Result
char_4100_caper.text: The No.1 rule of playing a master prank—is to be a prank master first, haha!

char_4100_caper.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4100_caper.text: That's it? I haven't had enough fun.

char_4100_caper.title: Operation Failure
char_4100_caper.text: Doctor, you go on ahead! I'm gonna play with them some more!

char_4100_caper.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4100_caper.text: Doctor? Where did my luggage go? You didn't hide it, did you? Pff... Hahaha, just messing with you. I ain't got no luggage.

char_4100_caper.title: Tap
char_4100_caper.text: Whoa~ Need me to keep what you just did a secret?

char_4100_caper.title: Trust Tap
char_4100_caper.text: Try touching my ear. I promise, no surprises... Sike!

char_4100_caper.title: Title
char_4100_caper.text: Arknights.

char_4100_caper.title: Greeting
char_4100_caper.text: Doctor, enough work. Let's play!

char_4011_lessng.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4011_lessng.text: Certainly. I'll stay by your side... At the very least, you don't curse loudly while kicking books all around the room.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk 1
char_4011_lessng.text: We Leithanians do fuss over our horns a lot. Some visit specialized salons to trim any excess cutin, and to keep their horns in shape... Me? I just use this sword. What's that look on your face...? It's up to you to believe me, but there's no way I could demonstrate it for you right now.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk 2
char_4011_lessng.text: I'm just an auditing student at Ludwigs-Universität. The old man needs my help for a lot of things, and I'm the only one who can stand his temperament. It's no matter, he's like a mobile library, so I've learned a lot from him.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk 3
char_4011_lessng.text: The bindings on this sword? There are some on my body as well. They tighten my joints and keep my muscles taut, preventing my mind from slacking off. They are not just for show.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4011_lessng.text: It doesn't matter if a weapon is easy to wield or not, I'd find a way to wield this sword even if it were twice as big. A Leithanian noble can have multiple violin bows made to order, but commoners might only have sticks to use... and we can't depend on others to protect us.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4011_lessng.text: Looks, background, titles, Arts aptitude... everything that we passively inherit is specific only to ourselves. What use they have is for us to determine on our own, not up to abstract concepts like 'fate'.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4011_lessng.text: You don't have to switch it off. Everyone has their own peculiar habits after all. You can work only when there's music in the room, I get it... Don't worry about it, I'll listen to whatever you pick. I don't know much about music, but your taste... shouldn't be that bad, right?

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4011_lessng.text: The more engrossed you get reading up on things, the stranger your mood becomes... If you're feeling moody, a little throwing or smashing might help you vent it out. I'll take care of the clean up afterward... You're saying that, you were restless because I was staring at you as your mind wandered...? I'll go check if dinner's ready.

char_4011_lessng.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4011_lessng.text: Doctor, if you're truly altruistically advocating for the masses—then please believe me, that even if you take away my sword, cover my eyes, and bind my hands, I, Lessing Maeyer, am still willing to fight for you to the very end.

char_4011_lessng.title: Idle
char_4011_lessng.text: Get some sleep. I'll keep watch from a spot where I won't disturb you.

char_4011_lessng.title: Onboard
char_4011_lessng.text: Franz... oh, Ebenholz, as you might know him, he told me about this place. I come from Leithanien, I have a sword, I know some Arts... I can help you.

char_4011_lessng.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4011_lessng.text: If you say this is useful, then it will be. I'll make sure to watch it... eleven times a day.

char_4011_lessng.title: Promotion 1
char_4011_lessng.text: Doctor, there's no need to make such a big fuss, and don't you give me a reward either. I already made it clear then, that I agree with your ideals and am willing to work for your sake.

char_4011_lessng.title: Promotion 2
char_4011_lessng.text: There are many spires in Leithanien, but there are even more people below them. It's natural for one of my background to make such a choice, but what's difficult is to actually shake up the ways of things. We still have a long way to go.

char_4011_lessng.title: Added to Squad
char_4011_lessng.text: You're responsible for the plan, and I'll be responsible for you. Give me the order.

char_4011_lessng.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4011_lessng.text: I accept this job as a valuable training opportunity.

char_4011_lessng.title: Depart
char_4011_lessng.text: Stay close to me, and don't fall behind.

char_4011_lessng.title: Begin Operation
char_4011_lessng.text: Hmm?!

char_4011_lessng.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4011_lessng.text: I've long been ready.

char_4011_lessng.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4011_lessng.text: You can call me earlier next time.

char_4011_lessng.title: Deployment 1
char_4011_lessng.text: I've experienced more chaotic scenes than this.

char_4011_lessng.title: Deployment 2
char_4011_lessng.text: I'll go someplace else that needs more help.

char_4011_lessng.title: In Battle 1
char_4011_lessng.text: You shall not pass, while I'm here.

char_4011_lessng.title: In Battle 2
char_4011_lessng.text: You can run, but I'll keep chasing.

char_4011_lessng.title: In Battle 3
char_4011_lessng.text: The only thing to hold a sword back is the cowardice of its wielder.

char_4011_lessng.title: In Battle 4
char_4011_lessng.text: Answer for your own sins!

char_4011_lessng.title: 4-star Result
char_4011_lessng.text: You've made me believe in something: no opponent is undefeatable, and no goal unachievable.

char_4011_lessng.title: 3-star Result
char_4011_lessng.text: Sometimes I put you and the old man together to compare... and the difference is obvious. He would be excitedly hurling curses everywhere if he were in your shoes now. Yes, that's how he acts when he's happy.

char_4011_lessng.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4011_lessng.text: Mission complete, oder?

char_4011_lessng.title: Operation Failure
char_4011_lessng.text: Every time I fail, I tighten my bindings so that the pain leaves them to weigh on my mind. No, you don't have to, I'll bear yours along with mine.

char_4011_lessng.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4011_lessng.text: It's nice and neat here. I'm going to change my bindings... I was referring to my sword, you don't have to look away.

char_4011_lessng.title: Tap
char_4011_lessng.text: Is this how you supervise others? That's not good.

char_4011_lessng.title: Trust Tap
char_4011_lessng.text: And what will you do if I overreact?

char_4011_lessng.title: Title
char_4011_lessng.text: Arknights.

char_4011_lessng.title: Greeting
char_4011_lessng.text: Hello. I'm not nervous, I've always been like this... what else can I even say instead....? Heya?

char_499_kaitou.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_499_kaitou.text: I won't refuse if you insist, but my poor vision makes it difficult for me to handle clerical work.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk 1
