char_499_kaitou.text: The Engineering Department is very interested in my weapon. I wish I could explain how it works, but all I know is that it requires high-purity gem crystals to run. I have ways to acquire gem scraps, but cutting a precious stone of great value into pieces works the same.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk 2
char_499_kaitou.text: My gosh, briefing documents again? You're not lacking in manpower or technology. My advice would be to avoid spending time and effort on roundabout things... Oh, you didn't bring documents. Then I must express my gratitude. I don't want to be gazing at graphs or designs anymore. It hurts my eyes.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk 3
char_499_kaitou.text: Whistle? Oh, it was me whistling a Leithanian tune. My sincerest apologies, this place just makes me feel relaxed, and it wasn't my... You seem to be fine with it? Strange... to my knowledge, every spire-dweller feels insulted when they hear the sound, and even the mildest scholar would lose his temper when a child whistles at them on the streets.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_499_kaitou.text: I've lived with the Infected since I was little, so it was only natural that I would get Oripathy myself... Well, Rhodes Island doesn't seem to accept that explanation. Then how do you like the story of a single explosion at the quarry that also collapsed many futures? A story too fanciful to believe, don't you think?

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_499_kaitou.text: I may have underestimated you, Doctor. Tell me, would you like to bet on me? Betting on whether I'm worth trusting, betting on what tricks I have up my sleeves, betting on if I'm more than an infected. Of course, should you have a change of mind, I'll get back and continue to work on my worthless stone.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_499_kaitou.text: I'm not interested in talking about the past. As you can see, my lab was destroyed, and all traces cut off. I no longer have to put a price on gems with blood on them... all of which have put my mind at ease, in fact. I no longer have to imagine the gems being cut into pieces, after all.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_499_kaitou.text: I don't know when I'll return to Leithanien, but I would like to invite you for my next operation. There won't be any cooperation, nor do I intend to share my plans... but I'll ask you to keep your eyes on me, to witness all that I do. You're the only one who can see through me, aren't you? Come then.

char_499_kaitou.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_499_kaitou.text: I can take you to the top of any spire in Leithanien. How does that sound? You'd understand me there. The scent of the wind is clean at the top... and that's all. That's all that young boy in the gem mine longed for.

char_499_kaitou.title: Idle
char_499_kaitou.text: If you fall asleep, then nothing here can pique my interest.

char_499_kaitou.title: Onboard
char_499_kaitou.text: Which name card would you like: the one in my left hand, or the one in my right...? Diamante, gemologist. Pleased to make your acquaintance. Don't worry, there's no target here worth my attention, even if you picked the other card.

char_499_kaitou.title: Watching Battle Record
char_499_kaitou.text: A practical video, free from excessive narration and trite background music.

char_499_kaitou.title: Promotion 1
char_499_kaitou.text: Thanks. I don't normally collect medals for the purpose of displaying status, but if you insist, I will place it at the top of my collection to demonstrate my respect for you.

char_499_kaitou.title: Promotion 2
char_499_kaitou.text: Steal a piece of bread, go to jail. Offend a noble, get beaten. Steal a priceless treasure, and you get to stand at the top of the tallest spire. Be my guest, Doctor, and come watch my show, watch the audience cheer. Will it bring you joy, or sorrow?

char_499_kaitou.title: Added to Squad
char_499_kaitou.text: Colluding with me is not something to be done lightly.

char_499_kaitou.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_499_kaitou.text: One wrong step, and we'll pay a heavy price. I expect perfect teamwork from you.

char_499_kaitou.title: Depart
char_499_kaitou.text: As promised.

char_499_kaitou.title: Begin Operation
char_499_kaitou.text: What do you possess that's mine to take?

char_499_kaitou.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_499_kaitou.text: As you wish.

char_499_kaitou.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_499_kaitou.text: This is the only value of gemstones.

char_499_kaitou.title: Deployment 1
char_499_kaitou.text: To all my enemies: I will Crack. You. Down.

char_499_kaitou.title: Deployment 2
char_499_kaitou.text: I shall have the honor to pulverize what you treasure.

char_499_kaitou.title: In Battle 1
char_499_kaitou.text: Will you cheer for me? I can't help but wonder!

char_499_kaitou.title: In Battle 2
char_499_kaitou.text: How will you struggle? How will you hold on to what you have?

char_499_kaitou.title: In Battle 3
char_499_kaitou.text: When will I strike, and take what you cherish the most?

char_499_kaitou.title: In Battle 4
char_499_kaitou.text: Who has not earned their end?

char_499_kaitou.title: 4-star Result
char_499_kaitou.text: I shared my life with you. Repay that debt, and tell me what fruit our efforts have born. Tell me what's the rewards of valor.

char_499_kaitou.title: 3-star Result
char_499_kaitou.text: We can leave now. I'm sure no witnesses escaped.

char_499_kaitou.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_499_kaitou.text: A gem loses its value when flawed with impurities and cracks. You might as well dispose of it.

char_499_kaitou.title: Operation Failure
char_499_kaitou.text: Are you still alive? Good. We all have our share of misfortune, but now you've had your stakes back, which you can risk on the line in the next game. Allow me to congratulate you on that.

char_499_kaitou.title: Assigned to Facility
char_499_kaitou.text: What assessment would you like from me? It's the only place I can call home for now. I don't dare to be critical.

char_499_kaitou.title: Tap
char_499_kaitou.text: Of course, it's your prerogative.

char_499_kaitou.title: Trust Tap
char_499_kaitou.text: If I may interest you with a grind such as gem polishing, then please, take the seat to my opposite.

char_499_kaitou.title: Title
char_499_kaitou.text: Arknights.

char_499_kaitou.title: Greeting
char_499_kaitou.text: Greetings, Doctor. Do you need something appraised?

char_4098_vvana.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4098_vvana.text: Hm, by the way, may I ask who was your previous assistant? No, I'm not snooping or anything. It's just... There's not much I can do for you here, besides offer my quiet thoughts on the occasional poem.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk 1
char_4098_vvana.text: I see what you're hiding behind your back. Be at ease, I know very well that Leithanien needs a citizen to heighten her glory in foreign lands. Kazimierz, on the other hand, needs a scandal-plagued knight of self-professed purity. Both are as plain as day. Besides, that issue of The Red Wine is outdated. Their kinds never run short of personalities to gossip over.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk 2
char_4098_vvana.text: The wind can get very strong up on the decks. Perhaps you should change into something warmer. Me? I'm just dressing this place up as a certain city of greenery and shade in my imagination. The one where the gentle breeze blew from lands unknown, and the blacksmith's rhythmic hammering sounded the passage of time... Those days were brief. So brief, they are worth remembering.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk 3
char_4098_vvana.text: 'Droste' is my mother's maiden name. It is a common name with no place in the spires. How long would you stay in an alley full of marigolds, Doktor? Very few would grace their proses and stanzas with these forbidden blossoms, but they're really beautiful... To be honest, I'm surprised you actually remembered my full name, Doktor.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4098_vvana.text: Poetry is charming as a respite from grammatical convention. It is a search for the most fitting of expressions in the most irrational.  The Candle Knight, who upholds virtue, and Viviana, who loves poetry... I have been a contradiction since the very beginning.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4098_vvana.text: Tales about foreign lands usually end with the traveler returning home. I was always preparing to return to Leithanien, but even after having experienced so much, my truest imp ression of the place remains in the candlelit books on those dark nights. I've seen the people I wanted to see, and I've made my choice.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4098_vvana.text: Look. What is it the candle lights here? Our faces? Lines of poetry that no one reads? Or the dark and mired path ahead of us? I guess you've always been able to see them, even without my candlelight. Right then, rest your eyes upon me. Don't let the light distract your gaze.

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4098_vvana.text: I returned to that small, dark chamber in the spire and spoke to the little girl within. I told her that she will endure a lifetime of slander, suffer regrets that cannot be undone, and be trapped in a cycle of endless pursuit and loss… Yes, farewells feel the same as a dream. Do you find me, as I am in this moment, real enough?

char_4098_vvana.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4098_vvana.text: 'If you and I were notes from one stanza, on which instrument are we strung? And what player has us in his hand?' Oh, I knew you would come. Have you finished reading the poems I gave you? Let me guess. I couldn't possibly share the image of your beloved, and it must lie within the most uplifting cantata.

char_4098_vvana.title: Idle
char_4098_vvana.text: Mein Tag war heiter, glücklich meine Nacht.

char_4098_vvana.title: Onboard
char_4098_vvana.text: Greetings. Margaret told me about you.  It's a shame we didn't have a chance to meet in the Grand Knight Territory… They called me 'The Candle Knight' at the time. You can call me Viviana, Doktor.

char_4098_vvana.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4098_vvana.text: Watching my own fights through a screen... For a moment, I thought I was still in Kazimierz.

char_4098_vvana.title: Promotion 1
char_4098_vvana.text: Are you going to grant me a title as well?  There's no need for that, but it probably won't matter anyway. This place is no arena.

char_4098_vvana.title: Promotion 2
char_4098_vvana.text: Can I interpret this as... your hope that I will stay?

char_4098_vvana.title: Added to Squad
char_4098_vvana.text: I, Viviana Droste, shall wield candle and blade to win victories in your name.

char_4098_vvana.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4098_vvana.text: Um, truth be told, the General Chamber of Commerce's spokesmen kept complaining that I didn't care much about my own matches.

char_4098_vvana.title: Depart
char_4098_vvana.text: Let us move. A timely departure paves the way for an early return.

char_4098_vvana.title: Begin Operation
char_4098_vvana.text: Moonlight barely laid upon the breezy parterre, yet you've witnessed the entirety of autumn?

char_4098_vvana.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4098_vvana.text: I listen, to this passing silence.

char_4098_vvana.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4098_vvana.text: I wait, for that belated serenity.

char_4098_vvana.title: Deployment 1
char_4098_vvana.text: This is no arena. No scars will be remembered or awarded.

char_4098_vvana.title: Deployment 2
char_4098_vvana.text: Leave. This is my last suggestion.

char_4098_vvana.title: In Battle 1
char_4098_vvana.text: Why obsess over rhymes? Poetry is woven with the thread of ideas.

char_4098_vvana.title: In Battle 2
char_4098_vvana.text: 'Pale roses,' pale minds.

char_4098_vvana.title: In Battle 3
char_4098_vvana.text: Alas, but tying your legs together won't make you fly.

char_4098_vvana.title: In Battle 4
char_4098_vvana.text: Let time rest upon this unlit night.

char_4098_vvana.title: 4-star Result
char_4098_vvana.text: Tired already, Doktor? Me too. The last time I had such an unforgettable bout was that match I fought in Kawalerielki.

char_4098_vvana.title: 3-star Result
char_4098_vvana.text: Doktor, you're right. Words that shake one's soul always come from within the storm.

char_4098_vvana.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4098_vvana.text: Even the most uninspiring poetry may contain a few lines that tug at our hearts. Despite the regrettable techniques employed, I can't help but approve of the writer's expression.

char_4098_vvana.title: Operation Failure
char_4098_vvana.text: Doktor, accept this temporary lapse in creativity and remember how this moment feels. I'm still looking forward to the completion of this sonnet.

char_4098_vvana.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4098_vvana.text: No bathtub...? Never mind. Just a little joke.

char_4098_vvana.title: Tap
char_4098_vvana.text: Hmm, who is there? Whatever. I already knew it was you.

char_4098_vvana.title: Trust Tap
char_4098_vvana.text: Doktor, if the candle goes out, I can't say for sure what might happen next.

char_4098_vvana.title: Title
char_4098_vvana.text: Arknights.

char_4098_vvana.title: Greeting
char_4098_vvana.text: Hmm, Doktor, what are you muttering there? I won't force you to recite any poems. But you have read them, have you not?

char_245_cello.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_245_cello.text: What kind of ambience do you prefer when you're working? Of course, my music can't directly alleviate the busy state you're in, but I'd feel terrible if it couldn't make you more comfortable…  or content.

char_245_cello.title: Talk 1
char_245_cello.text: This next concert is for Amiya. I really am curious... what would she see in me if I were allowed to touch her emotions? Oh, that look on your face... are you worried? Then, why not come along... and confine me to your side?

char_245_cello.title: Talk 2
char_245_cello.text: 'Music is the order you dig out of chaos.' That's what my Leithanian teachers taught me, but they've all since died in silence or lunacy. If it were me... I would tell my students, 'Music is a flowing will, a language of self-expression.'

char_245_cello.title: Talk 3
char_245_cello.text: I can tell your fingers are still stiff. It seems you're not yet used to learning this way. Don't be nervous, I'll guide you... Oh? What's the matter, Fede? Are you going to greet me with a mine or an electric fence this time? If you'd like a music lesson, the Doctor and I will oblige.

char_245_cello.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_245_cello.text: I'll never stop performing, even if you, Doctor, are the one who asks me. Trauma is one thing, but freedom is another. My life is the same as the others, it will simply come to an end if I stop in my tracks.

char_245_cello.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_245_cello.text: No matter how powerful one's spirit may be, there is no way to vanquish the inevitability of death. If there is meaning in life, if there is really something out there that can fight against chaos and nothingness... it has to be every emotion that I'm feeling right here and now, and the melodies they'll turn into.

char_245_cello.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_245_cello.text: I'm watching... the clouds. Water accumulates above and in excess before turning to rain. Mother made just as natural a choice when she decided to leave. But father still refuses to accept it, even now. What about you, Doctor? Will you also refuse to listen to the truest self... that lies within you?

char_245_cello.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_245_cello.text: Working with you is actually quite dull to me. Yes, because I don't want to, and can't play your music. So I've curbed my expectations of you, for I fear that when this emotion bursts in resonance along with my strings, you will turn to a grotesque collection of variegated fragments in my arms.

char_245_cello.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_245_cello.text: Let me be your personal musician. Let me... feel my way around your mind. How elaborate are your ideas, and how terrifying is your rising willpower? I will of course be captivated by your music when it blooms into its ultimate form; and at that moment, what I will perform for you... shall be myself.

char_245_cello.title: Idle
char_245_cello.text: Rest well… I don't need to mix any 'illusion' into this lullaby. Your dreams... are already colorful enough.

char_245_cello.title: Onboard
char_245_cello.text: I should have introduced myself by playing some music for you. Unfortunately, I've been forbidden from doing so for the moment. Let's start with a codename, then. You may call me... 'Virtuosa.'

char_245_cello.title: Watching Battle Record
char_245_cello.text: I've no interest in these means of inflicting harm. Do you mind if I wander about for a bit?

char_245_cello.title: Promotion 1
char_245_cello.text: You've come to understand me more and more, even without the sound of an instrument to connect us. And yet... just how am I supposed to share this joy in my heart with you?

char_245_cello.title: Promotion 2
char_245_cello.text: Whenever I touch the strings, the surrounding emotions all flow into me, through my fingertips, surging up into the sky and down into the ground. Did you hear it too? The cry of life in its truest form... How astonishing, how beautiful.

char_245_cello.title: Added to Squad
char_245_cello.text: What audience have you picked for me today?

char_245_cello.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_245_cello.text: I don't often play with accompaniment, but I can try to match the others' voices.

char_245_cello.title: Depart
char_245_cello.text: Notes fall into memory, and a melody resonates in the mind.

char_245_cello.title: Begin Operation
char_245_cello.text: What tones are your souls in?

char_245_cello.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_245_cello.text: The concert may begin at any time.

char_245_cello.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_245_cello.text: What would you like to hear?

char_245_cello.title: Deployment 1
char_245_cello.text: A solo, to you.

char_245_cello.title: Deployment 2
char_245_cello.text: An improv, from us.

char_245_cello.title: In Battle 1
char_245_cello.text: Ecstasy as bright as gold.

char_245_cello.title: In Battle 2
char_245_cello.text: Suffering will come to rest.

char_245_cello.title: In Battle 3
char_245_cello.text: Liberty and sunlight all around us.

char_245_cello.title: In Battle 4
char_245_cello.text: Feel your own self, to your heart's content.

char_245_cello.title: 4-star Result
char_245_cello.text: War itself is unworthy of a performance. But I will listen to every voice on the battlefield, from hero to refugee.

char_245_cello.title: 3-star Result
char_245_cello.text: Over already? Your victory doesn't need to be embellished by my music. I'd much rather... perform for you a piece inspired by that cloud passing overhead.

char_245_cello.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_245_cello.text: Guilt, doubt, fear... this surge of emotion rising from the battlefield will follow them, accompanying them to their graves.

char_245_cello.title: Operation Failure
char_245_cello.text: The performance ends, and the audience scatters. After such a conclusion, how long can the strings continue to vibrate?

char_245_cello.title: Assigned to Facility
char_245_cello.text: What a beautiful sunset. It would be even more romantic if there were music swirling around the deck.

char_245_cello.title: Tap
char_245_cello.text: These strings are vibrating... for you.

char_245_cello.title: Trust Tap
char_245_cello.text: Hmm? Have I been lurking in this corner for a long while? There's a tune lingering in my head, and I refuse to go to sleep before I can express it.

char_245_cello.title: Title
char_245_cello.text: Arknights.

char_245_cello.title: Greeting
char_245_cello.text: Sometimes, I too prefer to avoid the crowd, far away from all the sounds, just to feel my own self... and to feel you as well.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Cook this, cook that, my turn to cook again… Oh, it's snowing.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Hoederer, what's wrong? The book you wanted me to check out? How should I know? What's that pile of ash in the fire? That's... Oh, I 'mistook' the book for tinder a little while ago. Eh, it's fine. We're cooking dinner with knowledge tonight. It's gonna taste way better than usual, don'tcha think?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: How much ammo I got? I just used ten grenades, so I have fifteen left. And three mines spent yesterday, so six remaining... See, the numbers are correct. Hold it, I know what you're about to say. 'If only you applied that memory to study and read.' Seriously, Hoederer, you should've been a teacher.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk 3
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Check this potato, Ines got a head like so-Hmm... now that I think of it, you could probably squeeze a bomb into a potato. Maybe a good trick to play on some miserable dumbass. Hey, Hoederer, you want a potato?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Hey Hoederer, I've been thinking. If the two of us went at that nasty Kal'tsit together, how do you figure our chances taking her out? I mean, you guys are always planning for all contingencies, so we gotta have a plan for that one too, right? Hah, now that's a funny look on your face.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Hey Ines, maybe you should try to learn a thing or two from that {@nickname}. There's not a whole lot of people who could get away with using you as bait. I mean, you only figured it out halfway through. Me? One look at you and Hoederer's faces had my in stitches! Makes me wanna gift the Doctor a potato next time.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: My name... my name... Hey, Hoederer, you're always reading books, so why don't you come up with a name for me? Theresa said I should come up with a new one... Wait a second, what's with all those books? Pick a name myself?! Go to hell!

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: 'Hoederer, if you've got a death wish, just say so.' 'Ines, trust me. My head's reserved for just you, okay?' That's how your lovers' spat went last time, Ines. I'm just giving you my best impression. What? You mad?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: As soon as I'm done cooking, Ines always makes me help put up the tent, then Hoederer always drags me somewhere for recon. After that, there's always some kind of strategy meeting... Huh? Hey, Hoederer. Nothing. I was just talking about how I'll come collect your corpses when the two of you drop dead.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Idle
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Haghhh... I'll get some sleep before my next mission...

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Onboard
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: I know what it means to take up the weapons of the dead, naturally.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Watching Battle Record
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Your acting's too lame. Let me spice things up a little.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Promotion 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: How many pieces of candy am I worth now? I actually kinda like that method of valuing people. You sure we shouldn't go with that?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Promotion 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Theresa called me over and told everyone what an amazing fighter I am, but she didn't look happy at all. How can I make her happy...? What if I invited her over and cooked her a nice dinner?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Added to Squad
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Who's the unlucky one this time?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: As long as I'm not on the same team as Ines.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Depart
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: I'll blow up what I want. You guys do whatever you please.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Begin Operation
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Let me plant some potatoes first.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Yeah, yeah, coming. Don't rush me.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: The plan is to blow them all up, right?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Deployment 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: I'm in a good mood. Sucks to be you.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Deployment 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: I'm in a bad mood. Sucks to be you.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: In Battle 1
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: I wouldn't move that foot, if I were you.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: In Battle 2
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Three, one, kaboom—

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: In Battle 3
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Take a guess. Is this potato a bomb?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: In Battle 4
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Try to take a step?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: 4-star Result
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Theresa always says the {@nickname} volunteers for these missions. Must be dying to die.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: 3-star Result
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Not a single one left. Babel oughta pay me extra for this.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Hmm... If memory serves, I have some potatoes planted over where they're running.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Operation Failure
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: If only I brought a few more mines, things would've been different.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Assigned to Facility
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: How come this door still hasn't been fixed?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Tap
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Theresa?!

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Trust Tap
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Isn't that the bunny who always follows the Doctor around?

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Title
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Arknights.

char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.title: Greeting
char_113_cqbw_epoque#7.text: Watch your step.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: What did you find in time, mysterious master of the black market? The past, Elliot. I have always been seeking the past. Perhaps I will find a home in the patterns of the cacti and quicksand, but neither you nor I know the answer of fate.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I detest everything there. I have no choice but to leave Sargon, even if obeying the coin meant acquiescing to fate. But I am here, Sand Soldier. You can't escape what you are. Our destinies have already been written.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Sargon leaves marks on you. To the employer, you are feeble as a fledging fowlbeast. I forgot how it feels to be put to the lash. Do you hate them? No. I know their end. I know it from your eyes. Fortunately, you do not seem to regret it.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk 3
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Your expression gives no answer. Did you not put it all to the torch? There is a plaza in the black market with a view of the sky. Do you remember what night reminds you of? I called it a cremation, but when the conspirators had their way and the flames raged, it was not the face of my teacher that that came to mind.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Do you remember the first component of Thorne's Gift? The shoddy Arts Unit that was obtained by burying conscience in the sand and deceiving a guard who lost his son? And... Thorne's Gift? What will a teacher give to an evil mastermind, Passenger?

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Tell me. Has Oripathy changed our lives? Do you feel pain? How will the illness transform me? Have the schemers behind the scenes miscalculated? You are trembling, poor Elliot. Never mind the cause. Now, all I do is marvel at its beauty in the mirror.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Business is best in the spring. Festivals adorn the summer. Autumn is the season to seek fortune away from Ibut. Winter belongs to war. These are the seasons of Sargon, seasons that you will come to hate... but the stars shine bright on summer nights in Ibut.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Strange things, fabricated dreams are. What should I say to you, Doctor of the future? If I had met you earlier... no. The Doctor does not exist at any point between you and I. The Doctor belongs to my time, and may act as the Doctor wills. I have high hopes for the Doctor.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: A Vouivre, and the 'Doctor'. Are you begging for their pity? No, I simply want to learn about my future, or tell others about theirs. Eternal nothingness is worse than any illness... listen to me, Elliot. I feel a little tired.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Idle
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Sleep, my Elliot. Sleep and dream together with me. In our dreams, you will become me, and I will still be you.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Onboard
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Have I flipped open the pages of destinies past? No, it is but a dream, a dream that you seek to avoid. My future.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Watching Battle Record
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I see conspiracies... yes, Elliot. The conflicts, the greed. They are everywhere.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Promotion 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Oripathy has robbed me of my future. I hope that Rhodes Island can make use of what I have left. No. Rhodes Island does not exist to indulge your desire for self-harm. It is not that they are too kind; it is that you are too harsh. This is Elliot Glover's conclusion.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Promotion 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Will you see the Sargon of winter when you awaken? Will you sleep away in the eternal summer? Must I become you? Prophecy is fate in disguise. Sleep, Elliot. You built me, and I complete you, until the day the prophecies no longer foretell.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Added to Squad
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Why do you not seek more companions? It is inefficient. You will understand. Many things will make you understand.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Elliot would have asked me: How does an empty soul lead others with sincerity?

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Depart
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I remember the feeling of carrying my injured teacher on my back. It was the feeling of war. But war is profitable.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Begin Operation
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I fought for a single purpose. Let war be the past, then, if the purpose is lost.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: In place of training.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Do you remember the touch of quicksand?

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Deployment 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: My war machine will fulfill your wishes.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Deployment 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: 'Man' is the ultimate weapon.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: In Battle 1
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I remember how this equipment was born.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: In Battle 2
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: What is there to be gained by fighting in the name of my teacher?

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: In Battle 3
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Sentimentality does not bring victory.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: In Battle 4
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Vengeance ends.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: 4-star Result
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: There is no snow in the winter of the black market. Will I still see snow? Yes, but there will be nothing you recognize in that world of silvery white.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: 3-star Result
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Your machinations will catch up to everyone. Is this how you became the master of the black market? Yes, you will too, Elliot. I know that well. You will not let anyone escape.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Did you see how the chastened fled? I saw them. I wonder if that was how those Columbians saw me.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Operation Failure
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: The days to permit mistakes are gone, never to return. We are fighting an enemy too powerful for us. Fate? No, ourselves.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Assigned to Facility
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Do you find Rhodes Island comforting? It's more the caffeine.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Tap
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Do not disturb him.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Trust Tap
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Treasure your memories, treasure a time when you still had emotions. I understand; at least, I still do.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Title
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: Arknights.

char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.title: Greeting
char_472_pasngr_epoque#17.text: I dreamt of a future. Everything became nothing as the seasons changed. No sweet dreams, no nightmares... only the darkness remained. That is the answer of fate, Elliot. The darkness means nothing. It is Nothing itself.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: The Ark does not have the resources to maintain unnecessary, extended communications. But there will be no restrictions on transmissions between the two of us. Keep the channel open.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: With the Originium held back by the curtains Rhodes Island has drawn, mankind was able to build the Ark and drag out its feeble existence. Yet the pressures of survival cannot suppress greed and desire. Every faction's leader yearns to become the administrator who holds all the keys. I understand that you pity them for their predicament, but you must decide based on your own judgment.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Inactive Originium solidified and accumulated, while redundant information piled atop itself in layers, giving us a new home. Only because you were there by our side could we delay the awakening of the arrogant master of all creation. All those who survived rely on your aid. They are all very appreciative, and so am I.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk 3
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: The people of today may still remember what trees looked like. That is why they can point to Originium clusters and call them an Originium Forest. But when we can no longer conceive of trees and woods, the word 'forest' will forever disappear from our languages. If things continue that way, 'these lands' will cease to exist as well.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Originium soared through the skies and seized the twin moons, its clusters dispersing into the universe like spores, contacting and assimilating both the living and the dead— This is what is currently happening outside of Terra. Originium is swallowing everything into its body and incubating an all-encompassing chaos. But Terra can still be saved, and only because you remain by our side.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Under the curtain weaver, symptoms of Oripathy have faded into history, yet mankind continues to voice its dissatisfaction. The old order did collapse, but the minds of man remain narrow. Amiya must still go hither and thither to unite them. While she is now an excellent leader, you are still the only one she can rely on.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: We can no longer draw meaningful lessons from past experiences. The answers to our questions come not from our collective pool of knowledge, but from innovation and imagination. As you are more proficient than I in those aspects, there is no need to seek my advice on every single matter. Your insights are more important than my opinion here.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: You already know how 'death' functions for me. So there's no need to worry about the damage I take. Instead, you should pay more attention to your own condition. The sarcophagus cannot heal the trauma wrought by extreme stress and exhaustion. If there is anything you would like to say, I will listen.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: I can hear the crystal clusters surging. The Originium tides will soon dissolve me... Don't give me that look. Take care of Amiya and the city. We can continue to work on those problems the next time we speak. Well, then... see you again, Doctor.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Idle
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Scanning... The atmospheric oxygen level is still decreasing... No, let the Doctor rest. I will check it out.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Onboard
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: The anti-Originium communication lines have been activated... Signal received. Come in, Babel. This is Kal'tsit, exploring the former Leithanien region as planned. No coagulation point found as of yet. What about you, Doctor? What's the situation there?

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Watching Battle Record
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Experiences from before the crystallization age are for reference only. Do not overly rely on them.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Promotion 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Formalities are no longer necessary between you and I. You need only keep your promise to maintain the Ark's safe course.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Promotion 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Mon3tr, these tattered lands will one day need you more than ever. Now, with your own voice, say hello to the Doctor.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Added to Squad
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: I will correct any flawed decisions that occur during exploration.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Mark the area you need explored. I will arrange for the rest.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Depart
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: All units, double check the status of your anti-Originium equipment.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Begin Operation
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Stick to the plan. Do not throw your life away for nothing.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: What's your plan?

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: I will synchronize the battlefield data.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Deployment 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Executing battle plan.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Deployment 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Mon3tr.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: In Battle 1
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Never let your guard down before the enemy.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: In Battle 2
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Suppressing Originium activity.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: In Battle 3
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Follow my orders, Mon3tr.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: In Battle 4
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: On my mark, prepare to counterattack.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: 4-star Result
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: How much time do we have left?  I see… I trust your judgment.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: 3-star Result
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: All units, proceed according to plan. I will hand the report to the Doctor.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: You should be more careful. We can't afford even a single loss.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Operation Failure
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: All personnel, retreat to safe zone. Comm permits are transferred to you for now. I will sort out the situation before us.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Assigned to Facility
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: The facilities are fairly well-maintained.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Tap
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Seems you are still very fond of your little tricks.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Trust Tap
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Have you ever imagined a future where only you remain?

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Title
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: Arknights.

char_003_kalts_boc#6.title: Greeting
char_003_kalts_boc#6.text: There is still much we can do, Doctor.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Just another rainfall.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: I've never guaranteed your survival for following me, Toland. If it was their lives that your hunters valued, they shouldn't have stepped onto the battlefield or had their recklessness take over them in the first place... Their deaths are not what you need to downplay for your mockery. You will always remember. As will I.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: The rivalries in the halls of power never ceased, they've merely become a part of the opportunistic pursuit of profit. The only constant is the innocent being dragged into the cesspool. As vassals of a treasonous knight, your parents were forced to take you into their involuntary flight ere the fabricated incrimination could arrive... Czcibor, why? Why didn't you... flee even further?

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk 3
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Why are you still here? Our ideals have come to an end, and I witnessed their final moments... No, never mind. You wish to spar? Then pick up your spear. Entrust your future not to a failure, but to sacrifice, and the pain in your flesh. Come.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Father, you once told me that longswords are suitable only for valorous young knights. But the National Council's miscarriage of justice, the General Chamber of Commerce's rise to prominence—everything I've wanted to stop, my blade was useless to prevent. I couldn't remove your lesions, and with it by my side I watched as Schnitz left... I merely became accustomed to its prescence.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Golden plains, a field of wheat, the path of a nomadic city, and the wake of a Catastrophe. The manor's garden, the arena, and those who hand over their last coin along with their last harvest... Father, I've always tried to walk a righteous path.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Forget it, Schnitz. How am I to tutor Maria in your stead? I am no knight, and certainly no father. No one would call me 'gentle.' Besides... I never once imagined I would actually return to this place... Why, Schnitz? Why am I the one to remain?

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Margaret doesn't speak to me, but considering how she was back then... we had no need to. She is just like you were at that age, Yolanta, too much so. She will experience the same things you did, and she will never regret them. That I should tarry at her side more? Hmph, there's no point.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: The Grand Knight Territory's appearance is ever-fluid. Today, the city exhibits no trace of what it was twenty years ago, its sunset-lit silhouette sunken and gone... Yet its nightscapes still spring up to my mind at times wanted and at times not. Often, I find myself thinking that I should at least... try to seek out and reclaim that past.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Idle
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: The sound of a rainstorm in the wilderness...

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Onboard
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness...' Hmph. A bygone time unworthy of remembering. A dream, far too lucid.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Nearly the same struggles and sacrifices...

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Promotion 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Blank paperwork for promotion within the order, excerpts from the recon knights' reports on our movements... Schnitz often sent these things, as his way of saying hello.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Promotion 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: How should I present myself...? As the one slandered by the papers and the groundless gossip in town? Or as the wanderer who once treated that vilification as a badge of honor?

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Added to Squad
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: To think they all still believe that blood is not spilled in vain…

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Follow me.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Depart
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: The sound of the wind in the barrens... Far too familiar.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Begin Operation
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: It would seem they have yet to remember what to fear.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Yes?

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Blade whetted again… for but another battle…

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Deployment 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Do I need to repeat myself on the battle plan?

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Deployment 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: All those... I have yet to abandon.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: In Battle 1
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: It will be over before you feel the pain.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: In Battle 2
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Face the tide? Hmph.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: In Battle 3
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: The sunlight will have to wait.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: In Battle 4
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Even if there is but a sigh at the very end.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: 4-star Result
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: There is no one man who loftily sneers at the pointlessness of it all... Time speeds past us equally.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: 3-star Result
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: ...Wake me up.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: From the windows of Kawalerielki's towers, my eyes have grown tired of those men and their unpunished misdeeds.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Operation Failure
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: 'Failure can be endured.' ... But the price is always dear.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: I have no promises to make.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Tap
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: I can tell who you are. Speak freely.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Trust Tap
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Do not add any frivolous decorations to my sword, Toland... In the Grand Knight Territory, there are merchants eying the Nearl name. They will do as you do, and ridicule me in your place.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Title
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Arknights.

char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.title: Greeting
char_4064_mlynar_epoque#28.text: Do I long for the old days? No. I simply cannot forget. That which I saw in the places untouched by light... and could do nothing about.

char_511_asnipe.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_511_asnipe.text: Alright, squad, keep your status updated.

char_511_asnipe.title: Begin Operation
char_511_asnipe.text: The enemy's moving as expected. Brace yourselves.

char_511_asnipe.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_511_asnipe.text: I know the difference between sparring and a real fight.

char_511_asnipe.title: In Battle 1
char_511_asnipe.text: Don't worry, you won't escape the storm.

char_511_asnipe.title: In Battle 2
char_511_asnipe.text: This surge of energy has only one place to go.

char_511_asnipe.title: In Battle 3
char_511_asnipe.text: I've got a clear shot on target.

char_511_asnipe.title: 3-star Result
char_511_asnipe.text: Aggression is all part of the plan. Returning to base.

char_510_amedic.title: In Battle 2
char_510_amedic.text: War is a plague, and I'm the cure.

char_510_amedic.title: In Battle 4
char_510_amedic.text: No more suffering, no more pain.

char_510_amedic.title: 3-star Result
char_510_amedic.text: Your commands were my thoughts as well, Doctor.

char_508_aguard.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_508_aguard.text: Read the briefing? Good, now here's your assignments.

char_508_aguard.title: Depart
char_508_aguard.text: Know your jobs? Then let's do this.

char_508_aguard.title: Begin Operation
char_508_aguard.text: I prefer to keep my fight quiet.

char_508_aguard.title: Deployment 2
char_508_aguard.text: I can handle this on my own.

char_508_aguard.title: 3-star Result
char_508_aguard.text: It's always reassuring to carry out your orders, Doctor.

char_509_acast.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_509_acast.text: Attention casters: set comms to operation channel.

char_509_acast.title: Begin Operation
char_509_acast.text: Opertaion is a go. Keep your support countersign in mind.

char_513_apionr.title: Added to Squad
char_513_apionr.text: Give your orders. I will work with them the best I can.

char_513_apionr.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_513_apionr.text: I have nothing to say. But remember this one word: survive.

char_513_apionr.title: Depart
char_513_apionr.text: Watch your surroundings. Do not get ambushed.

char_513_apionr.title: Deployment 2
char_513_apionr.text: This will be a disappointing day for our foes.

char_513_apionr.title: In Battle 3
char_513_apionr.text: Pay for your sins with your life.

char_513_apionr.title: 3-star Result
char_513_apionr.text: Finally, I can leave the commanding to others...

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Man, I'm so bored... Might just go shopping... You know what, yeah, we're doing it! Come on, put your shoes on. Yeah, we're both going out, that's why I said 'we'!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: That lame look of yours is grinding my gears... Here, have a toy to lighten up. You're busy with work? Who cares about some boring-ass work? Just one thing: don't lose sight of this little doll, or it'll vanish in the blink of an eye.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Maaan, I'm so hungry... But as they say, gourmet food takes a gourmet cook. My brother's a great chef, you get hungry at one of our family reunions, just call him up and he'll take care of you. Now that's what I call service! Rhodes Island's food tastes like crap compared to his.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lungmen's a pretty chill place, but their cuisine? It's got no kick to it! How can they eat that flavorless baby food? Listen up: spice is a way of life. Once you taste a little pleasant pain and feel that explosion of heat on your tongue, you'll realize what you've been missing all this time.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I used to just focus myself on what I needed for daily life, but I'm the type to really absorb my surroundings. And somehow or other I keep getting into fights. So I guess I could say it feels weird to NOT carry a weapon around. So it goes, I guess.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rituals get passed down from generation to generation not 'cause they have any inherent meaning, but because people find their own meaning in them. A performance has its rewards, and a wish has its fulfillment. And when one of my favorite stories is involved, you bet your ass I'm gonna participate.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If you're out of touch with reality, you'll end up crushed beneath its boot, sooner or later. You'd think that's common freakin' sense, but some of my siblings ignore reality for what it is. Their dull lives are only gonna get harder for 'em as time goes on.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Your dreams turn to haze when you've lived as long as I have. But I've got better stuff to do than dream all day, and that's why l feel so alive. Sure, life is suffering, but seeing people carve something out for themselves is incredible. And as for you: think you got what it takes to be the anvil to my hammer?

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Blacksmithing may just be a regular old occupation, but it was also a part of early civilization. I'll keep metallurgy well and alive, even if everything else dies out. That's the future I chose for myself long ago. And you, you've made important choices before, haven'tcha? Don't ever go back on them. Stay true to the end and see it through. That's what it means to complete something.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You're sleeping AGAIN? Wake up, sunshine! We're going shopping! C'mon, hurry!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Anybody home? Heard from one of your guys that I can make a comfy living here! Something about free lodging and food, with plenty of free time left over... Hm? This area is for staff only? Don't be like that! You make it sound like I don't belong here!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh? What good do you think this stuff's gonna do me? Skills like these are only useful to people who value them.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion? That takes me back... I got something like this once before. Anyway, that's cool, I guess. You have my thanks!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: People are like tools; you can classify 'em. And you, you're an interesting one... Or should I say 'unusual'? I could forge you a good sword, but since you ain't gonna swing it, let alone fight in the first place, it'd just be a waste of metal.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Guess one thing's never gonna change with time: swords will inevitably clash.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Say what? Lead the team? Never led anyone before, but I guess I'll try.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A smith's gotta be ready to pay the debts accrued by the weapons she forges.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My sword's gonna cleave your bodies and values alike.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh? You want me to handle this, personally?

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A knife, a life; weapons are the basis for society.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: 'When 'tis a choice of life and death, why shouldst thou lay down thy arms?'

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's just get this done with.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You dare strike my shield with your spear? That's gonna end with you in pieces!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My body burns at over 1,400 degrees!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Even a virtuous king must, from time to time, look to the sword.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why do I gotta waste my precious time on the likes of you third-rate amateurs?

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Not bad! I see some faint promise in you!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: These small fry ain't even close to quelling my hunger.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Man, you sure messed up. What'd I tell you about air bubbles weakening the iron?

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Terrible... If I really let myself loose, things would get a whole lot nastier... for everyone involved.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Mind if I do some redecorating in here?

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Dude! Stop it!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hold still! I'm making you a little something for your ear. It'll look great, just don't move!

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yo, Doctor, you had lunch yet?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? Did I not explain that you were forbidden to enter without my express permission, after knocking? Oh? This is your office? You're working? Then have I not come out of my room to work as well? What is the meaning of 'your office'? Get out! I'm still sketching it out.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You want to see my painting? You may. For you, I could even give you the painting. But if you like it, I won't give it to you. You don't like it? Huh, then you wouldn't want it anyway. This is who I am. Deal with it.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Haa… I'm trapped on this ship. If anyone asks, you tell them so, and you do not let them into my room. I'm taking up space? I'm refusing to perform my operator duties? Hello, I am Dusk, the great painter trapped in this room.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm not going out. Don't try to make me go out, I don't want to go out. I no longer care for the world outside. Do I dislike it? I like it fine. The mountains and rivers, the flowers and feathers, the pools and forests, the common folk, young and old, I could paint forever, I could watch forever, and yet, I will not go. It does not hold my interest forever.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I loathe the word 'taste.' What gives these people the confidence to demand something good just as they open their mouths to lock the gates to others? It is unbecoming. If you are satisfied, you are satisfied. Should you enter, you must not bar the gate. Do you see the twin moons thinking only of themselves?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: An opportunity to watch me paint in earnest comes but once in a lifetime to one in ten thousand individuals. 'When the time comes, the strength of heaven and earth are one.' Ch'i, bone, shape, color, method, pouring out as a vast river, fine like the shadow of mountain bamboo, such is my brush, and it will not stop.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I took the time to partake of some contemporary works. Films are not bad, they are like paintings. The good ones all have a unique strength of character, with form, and with decent meaning. Right, poetry and painting have a legacy. Do you have time to help me burn Nian's mountain of garbage? She is denigrating the very concept of cinema. Please.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Food? Oh, thank you. Hm, where does this drink come from? It's good. Quite good. But I feel like it's missing something. You want to know what I usually eat? Then close your eyes. Ah~ You feel nothing, yes? That's because if you don't look, the food in my paintings does not exist.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Take a look at Nian's carefree expression. You know the truth, don't you? She cares quite a bit about our lives, and our deaths. As for me? I may not get along with the wretched scribbler, but neither of us care much. When people die, the paintings remain. When I die, my work remains.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Dreams are like unto life, like unto the scroll. One sleeps this sleep, will one sleep for millennia?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh? {@nickname}? Another contract? Very well, please don't bother me again after I sign this one. Here... I should tell you here and now: I, Dusk, do not give out my paintings. Not to anyone. And I don't take commissions!

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? A swing of an axe becomes rivers of blood. Do you mean... you want me to paint this?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why use a sword? There is a reason. 'With an inkstone sheath, one may learn the annals. With a brush sword, one may paint the celestial.' Is it true? Naturally, I speak off the cuff.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ahh, to make it this far with me... I should paint you a scroll. But be careful! Do not get caught up within it. The world I paint is much more fascinating than this one. How many have been lost, since ancient times? How many have escaped?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't keep me too long.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Captain? What does a captain do?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's get this over with.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm in a good mood today. I'll give you this one I've titled 'Bones on the Sand'.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't go too far.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Better leave the fine brush at home.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Would any of you like to be my paint?

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This battlefield would do well with a splash of ink.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Too difficult to explain, let me paint it for you.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: With the setting of the sun, the brush draws up the peaks!

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Copy the infinite with the tangible, bring the intangible to life!

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I am rather attached to you. Most of the time.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Once, painting and war were quite different. But with this power, battle is art.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Not bad.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm... a failed painting must be destroyed. It will bring shame.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Slipped on a stroke? Start over.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Do not bother preparing the room for me. I will handle it myself.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You'll spill my ink!

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, don't get paint everywhere.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT.text: What was your name again? Oh, {@nickname}?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Evocative so. Years and an age ago, the very palace rained and drizzled in the whisperers of consultants.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yea, when Yan scholars speak of Sui, that is us, and It too. Facts hardly worth covering up; Nian's worries are not mine. After all, I am only me, and my death, no more than death is. The only shames would be this wine and world, for at day's end I love them long.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I was of the mind I would finally meet someone past, an old friend. Never did I think this is how you now present yourself. From knowing not one is one, isn't this like a dream? However, {@nickname}. It is fine to be as yourself. Long have I contended with myself; myself I shall prefer to act.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Where the heart is as will, and its utterance is as verse. If wells your chest with depths manifold, wouldn't failing their writing be shame to meet yourself? Hm? My tail? Ah, so too do I make use of a common brush, naturally. But it is at times inconvenient, as an extremity would be. My body is an unfettered one; who says I can't use my tail?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Poetry, speech, lyric, essay. Though they all differ as their own, they are common in places. A pity the people of now are, by and large unable to exercise patience. To listen to a song, to read a poem. I take no objection to it, but how must our present scholars suffer.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Nian is too impetuous, Dusk timid, yet to see the two as they are now, it seems they already know what they like, and want to do. So why probe at veracity or falsity or object or subject? To bicker and squabble every day, knowing emotion's gamut, is that not what a person is?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: {@nickname}, would you want for me to compose you a verse? Hm? Nay, I'm simply in the mood. I need not write it, nor record it. Ah, wait, if it were a song... that would be quite good too! But to dance a song, I fear I would need some preparation. Good! You sit there, and await me a short while.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I am drunk? Hah... I have not yet seen the sky throw wide, moon rise, seas race, ice break, to wait true for all the world's sobriety would be but the withering of a bud, to want true for deep intoxication would be far too early still... {@nickname}, now, why do you say I am drunk?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Last night I dreamt of you. Nay! Perhaps it's you who dreamt of me. Oh, can you not recall? A shame; it delighted me so, yet I cannot share this revelry. Delighted how? Hmm. That eight thousand years of springs, eight thousand of winters, all dreamt, were no more than a brief handful of autumns. That is all.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Clouds ranged as billows, distant-run roads withered. I, departed of the vistas, sailed a ferry in late autumn.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ling, you can call me. Have my two troublemaking sisters vexed you any? Hm? You've seen me before? Ah... perhaps so, in a dream.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Though antithetical at a glance, your nature is quite similar.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm... 'General, I heed thy order,' should I say? Ha, do not take it seriously. I only suppose that if you were truly a field marshal, then I may not mind once again serving as a strategist.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Nian was not wrong. This farcical dream of a thousand autumns is only right to wake from.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The river bends a thousand times, a city lone in desolation, vivid in the mind's eye.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: To scatter the fill of a brimming cup, to share the sip for a soothed sorrow.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Plotted schemes, waged wars, crossed arms, shed blood. An eternity, unaltered and unfailing in its challenge.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: To gaze the fire from afar, knowing not its heat.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Has it come to my turn?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Truly evocative.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: And thus has autumn made reckoned her arrival.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: For the marching, a warsong. For the fallen, a lament.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The split halberd sinks in the sand, great aspirations unrecompensed.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: One word to address all beneath the heaven, one scope to spare none upon the earth.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: When will the hate sunk beneath the battlefield disperse?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Speak as your heart wills, and be as your intoxication wishes.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Another song, sublime and majestic. {@nickname}, perhaps you and I truly are as two entwined friends.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Duly satisfying, as a cup filled to the brim. We should remain level and humble, yet... we ought to sing your praises, yes. You did well.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Mm... things disappoint on occasion; there's no need to blame yourself too hard. Leave the rest to me.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Victory and defeat are commonplace in war. As we have freedom to maneuver, this is not a complete loss.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rhodes Island's interior... I'm lost as to whether I should say it's reminiscent or curious.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? Do you need me?

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: What is it? Would you like a cup? You wouldn't? What a shame.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why, how are you, {@nickname}?

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I will be your bodyguard, Doctor.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've always had my suspicions about Rhodes Island. Still do.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why are you staring at me? Nothing better to do?

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hmph.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I know every nook and cranny in Lungmen. The docks, the neon signs, the winding paths, I can see them all in my mind, clear as day. I'll never forget them.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Things around here have deteriorated lately. I'll be on guard, but I'll still need you to be careful.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Maybe one day that man will take note of my efforts, but until then…

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Amiya trusts you completely. When I see you two together, it makes me wonder... what if I had someone like that by my side?

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've... I've never been able to rely much on anyone, not even...

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor? You fell asleep? Hmph. No nerves to keep you awake, then.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ch'en. Leader of the L.G.D.'s Special Inspection Unit. For my own reasons,I'll be joining you for a while. Seeing as we're already well acquainted from our prior work together, I'll ask you to take me to my workplace now.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's all in the service of more efficient operations.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion? I've been through these things before.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Roger. Just give me all the missions your usual Operators can't handle.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: No problem.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Listen up! We'll be much more efficient if we work together.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Everyone! Prepare for battle!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ready? Stick to the plan.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is Ch'en.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ready to move.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Moving out!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Take them out fast.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Slash!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Flash!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Drop your weapon!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't force my hand!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Your evil must be stopped. I will do so by any means necessary.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Where did you find the courage to challenge me?

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The wounded wait here for a medivac. The rest of you, stay on guard.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Tactical retreat. Don't break formation!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: So this is Rhodes Island's base? Bigger than I expected.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey! What are you doing!

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, you're in a good mood. Is it because that operation went well? Same here.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_010_chen_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh, it's you, Doctor.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You're not the type to sit around the office. It's easier to guard you if I dress more casually.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I won't doubt Rhodes Island anymore. Your cause, Amiya and Dr. Kal'tsit, and all the other operators here are worthy of my respect.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The way operators are supposed to see things and deal with problems is nothing I've known before. It'll take some time to get used to this.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I heard from Amiya what you went through in Siesta. Sounds like you had a tough holiday. What about me? It was terrible. Maybe not terrible. That's all I can say.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My roots are in Lungmen. That will never change. The world I knew there will stay with me wheresoever I go.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: When I left Lungmen, I thought there was an answer to find, but now I get it. There's no such thing as answers, only actions and results.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, it's been a while since I left Lungmen and came on board as a Rhodes Island operator. It's about time you treat me as an operator too. It's hard for me to do anything if you are always on your toes around me.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've got a lot of people relying on me, and I used to take that trust for granted. It may be harder than ten sets of advanced training every day, but I'll be worthy of their trust.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The events in Chernobog and my experiences in Dossoles both proved one thing—Whether fighting or saving, I must first understand my target. I need to broaden my horizons and open my eyes, Doctor.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Asleep again... You've done a lot of work already, so I'll let you have ten minutes.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ch'en, reporting back in from my holiday in Dossoles. I have a lot of reports to write about my trip, so I'm just passing by to say hello, Doctor. Let me know if you've got something. Now that the holiday's over, everything's back to normal.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
