char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There is always someone out there who's better than us.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You're giving me a promotion as a Sniper operator? No problem. I'm sure I can set a fine example.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: To tell you the truth, I never thought my shooting would get to this level. I'm more used to fighting with a sword, but shooting is indeed more convenient in certain scenarios.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Orders received.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: No need to fret. I'll take care of it all.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Buck up and get ready for battle!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Are you all ready? Let's go, then!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Enemy spotted.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ch'en here. Ready at a moment's notice.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Leave this place to me.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Great spot.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hmph!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't let them get away!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Laying suppressive fire!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Time is limited.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Pure evil and a little torment is nothing to be afraid of. But there's never anything pure there, that's what's terrifying.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: That was some beautiful teamwork. Great work, everyone.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Help the wounded, and if you got any strength left, I need a few of you to stand guard with me.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Stay calm and fall back! I'll bring up the rear!

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? Another new room? Engineering's at it for sure.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You never learn, do you, Doctor?

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, do you have a field operation next? I'll come with you.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_1013_chen2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, you seem well.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Relax, Doctor. I'll keep you safe.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lots of new recruits lately, many new faces. Don't let your guard down.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If something happens, don't forget to use the emergency communication channel. Just call me and I'll come running.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I sound cold when I talk? I'm on the clock. I'm a lot less serious when I'm off.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rhodes Island needs more than just combat Operators. You need experts in education, PR, and all kinds of stuff.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I used to only get called in for the nastiest fights, but now every fight is a nasty one.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This shield has a name: Hannya. I brought it from my hometown. Its 'father' and mine were old friends. Back in the L.G.D., my superiors would always tease me about it, but together we've proven that a shield makes a great weapon, and so do I.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hannya's tasted plenty of Lungmen gangster blood. I never thought it'd win me many friends, but the ones who looked down on me started showing me some respect after all that had happened. Or maybe they're just scared of how big I am? What do you think?

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: How about another shot...? Oh, you've had enough? Don't sweat it... I can carry you back to your room if you pass out. What? That worries you even more? C'mon, don't be a buzzkill.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? Heh. Nothing. Just guarding you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hoshiguma, Defender Operator. I'll be your shield, your blade, your fortress. Very glad to meet you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's all thanks to your teaching, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm honored.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: No one tells me where I'm going, and no one can stop me once I make up my mind. And now—I've made up my mind to follow you, Doctor.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I will protect everyone.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Protecting Rhodes Island is my responsibility too.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I want everyone to get home safe.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If you've got a reason to fight, you've got a reason to die!

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yes, Sir.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Got it.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Not one step backwards.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Not one step forwards.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hannya will crush you.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If you want to hurt my friends, you have to go through my shield first.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Seeing is believing.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hannya, unleash the rage your father poured into you!

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The harder the journey, the stronger you'll become.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hurting my friends right in front of me? I'll make you pay!

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Are you hurt? I'm sorry. I failed.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Fall back, now! I'll bring up the rear!

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: With my size... it's kind of hard to get through the door.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Here.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, you should take a load off now that we finally got a break.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, Doctor.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm. The office of the vaunted Doctor, then? Marvelous, truly. Allow me a brief moment to consult my feng shui crash-course guidebook...

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm no mere braggart! Beyond a little kickboxing in a scuffle, I can rustle up meals, practice acupuncture, divine with feng shui, work masonry, tend to rice and angle fish alike—I'm a maestro of all kinds! Doctor, you need only give the order, and I'll see everything through!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: D-Doctor, I was a little idle, see, and went to make myself useful at HR, and by carelessness glimpsed at a few operator files, and... er, well, could FEater be the very star of 'Fiends of the Gods Reincarnated Immortal' herself? Truly? Could I go get an autograph?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Who was my master? Hmm, a question as complex as a showdown of Yan cuisines. Normally I'd refrain from answering that, as slipping up would get me beaten sideways. That said... you need only know, Doctor, I'm the last descendant of the Lien line. Ah, but my family name's not Lien. I'm a Ch'u.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: M-Miss Dusk really did... come to Rhodes Island with us, then? My, um... what was it now? My recollection's quite fuzzy now, yet I have the vague impression that within her painted dreams, I had a peek into my own miserable future. Ah, let's never mind. Dear, oh, dear. You be quite careful too, Doctor.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Now, now, Doctor, don't worry about me. I and the Infected do get along well. Back at my old place, a Catastrophe once struck not too far away. It frightened all of us, seeing the world go pitch black. My master remarked then that Catastrophes were Heaven's false charge against the human realm. Ah, truly a bitter thing.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Benefactor Lava? Yes, I call her my benefactor. She once saved me, and as time went on, it became second nature. Throughout my life I've been saved thrice, and every time, I engrave it upon my soul. The gloompincer incident, you mean? No, not that. She showed to me a path, and that was true grace beyond all.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Say, Doctor, are people able to brush the past away as they live? Certainly not, hm? If the bonds you once left behind still hold fast, what ought you do? You've no idea either? Well, then. It seems we're companions in our misery. Here, what say we crack some sunflower seeds?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Countless, they were, the ancient parasol trees about Kou-wu City. Oh, just reminiscing all of a sudden. I remember the leaves scattered across the ground come fall, when my parents would visit me from the country. Only then would my strict master speak nothing but good, and her other disciples, my brothers and sisters, wouldn't bully me. No, well, just reminiscing.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hmm. I've been pondering a fan for you too, but what ought we write on it?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My codename? 'Mr. Nothing.' The latter man of Tzu-hsu and Wu-yu; Nonexistent and Nothing indeed. And you, fine soul, are the Doctor? That is to say, my new boss? Well, then, would you like me to massage your back? Loosen up your legs?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ho, what a hundredfold bouquet of martial prowess. You've got my eyes wide open now!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion and a raise?! Ohh, ohh, I thank you, Doctor, in all respects possible! Be it for you, I would brave the greatest fires and waters, I would not hesitate to... well, that said, how much might my wages be growing by?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Sooner or later, I plan to return to Kou-wu City and set every debt in my books straight. My only worry is I may invite trouble and sweep others up in its path. You know this, dear Doctor, and yet you still wish to bestow such partiality on me...? Your kindness toward me is a grace, and I will never, in eternity, forget it.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Very well! Doctor, I'll see to it that you have nothing at all to worry about.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Me, the captain? Hold one moment, just let me find my secret tomes for the art of war, now...

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: As they say, all have their own methods, whether arms against a force or earth to a waterspout. There'll be a way!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm witnessing fiends, one and all! Quite frightening!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Might you need me?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Here! Right here!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Very well! Leave this to me.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The Doctor, you are! What a sagacious decision!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Compose yourself. Collect yourself!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A perfect technique makes freedom to act!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The moon waxes and wanes. The fan opens and shuts!

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's have you make a move first, now.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: More hands bring more fuel for the fire. When we concert our efforts together, yes, we truly can burn the sky a red to rival sunsets. Not bad, not bad.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: As they say, those of just ways have much support, and those of lost ways find little. Seen as such, our victory is assured.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Pursue not the cornered. Suppose anything troublesome should happen, we'll just bear it together.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Go on ahead, everyone. No worries. My runaway act is first in class. I'll be just fine.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh-hoh, Rhodes Island truly is a wondrous land. I feel quite dizzy just looking.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hoh? What's this for exactly, Doctor?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, what say I teach you a thing or two about some moves?

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_455_nothin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Well, if it isn't the Doctor! What a happy coincidence!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: So... I have to just stand here and not do anything? Laaaame.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: These gauntlets aren't that heavy. See? Even a dainty little girl like me can carry 'em around real easy.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You remember fighting by my side before? Can't say I remember fighting by yours, sorry... I just fight for what's right, that's all.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hah. That boxer, Beehunter? She's really something! I enjoyed sparring with her so much, I had to throw out some serious moves. And she's got an amazing honey collection too. Wanna visit her with me next time? You gotta learn some kung fu first, though.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Reading a movie magazine...? Well, guess what? The 'hot kung-fu actress' mentioned in this article is ME! What? You don't believe me? Come on, look! This is me, can't you tell? C'mon, that's definitely me!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Do I regret forgoing my previous life? Well, sometimes, of course. But the world ain't kind to us Infected. Lots of places I'm not allowed to go. It blows.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There's a street full of food stalls in the neighboring city. And... a candy shop over there? And a theme park? Aww, Doctor, can I get a day off? I wanna check out these places!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Am I satisfied with life at Rhodes Island, you ask? Hm, to be honest... It's even sweeter than what they show in the movies! I got cool opponents to practice with, top-notch food, and by working here, I'm doing something good for the world! What could be better!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, look! What do you think about this script? Oh, who's gonna act in it, you wonder? You and I are gonna be the main characters! There's this scene where we leap from the roof of a thirty-story building and slide all the way down. Isn't that cool? Hey! Come back! Wait!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You're catching some z's, eh? Guess I'll slack off for a bit too. Man, this couch is so fluffy!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You swear you've seen my face before? Probably saw it in a movie I was in! Call me FEater, and what I do from here is your call!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's over? Come on, let's watch just a while longer. We're almost at the fun part!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oooh! A promotion! Thanks so much, Doctor!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This here's the perfect opportunity to show you some REAL kung fu!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All right, it's show time!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh? I'm the leader? Not sure how it'll go, but...

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is gonna be exciting!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm FEater. Pleased to beat you!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Un-huh.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Here we go!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All right!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Show time!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: HI-YAH!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is straight out of one of my movies!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: From flexibility comes power!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Who says a movie star couldn't be a real kung-fu master!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Wow, it's over?

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's over already? I was just starting to get warmed up.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, it's no biggie. Just a few scratches and bruises.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Aw... I just wanna go home and sleep...

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Now that's stylin'!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Stop that, I'm getting dizzy!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, Doctor, want my autograph? I'll take a pic with you if you want, too!

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_241_panda_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Did you have breakfast yet, Doctor?

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, we can't waste even one single precious minute! One minute could mean a loss of millions on the account with extra casualties on the field! Huh? Coffee? I take it with a sachet of sugar and heavy on the milk foam, thanks!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: They say Rhodes Island is a criminal organization, full of Infected people dirtying up the corridors. But that couldn't be further from the truth. Rhodes Island's Operators are giving their lives to make things better for everyone, just like the police force of Lungmen!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hear me out, do you think we could redesign the instructors' office? At least add a bit of flavor to it, maybe a handmade rug or some atomistic art whatnot. It's just so bland now. Dobermann might say she doesn't care, but it really kills my enthusiasm...

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ahhh, that awful Ch'en isn't here, is she? Back when we were in the L.G.D. together, she shot me this dirty look every time we bumped into each other. It made me wonder if I've done anything bad! I just... kinda want to take over the L.G.D. myself. That couldn't be bad, right?

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Exercise, study, training, researching my competitors and market shifts... Gotta keep them up!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've been allowed to set aside the family business for a while. But it's clear to me that the future of Lungmen needs both a stable public sector and security apparatus, as well as a healthy business and financial system. In both respects, I'm ready to be of service to Lungmen!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lungmen bureaucracy is complicated, even for us. Keeping the peace, protecting the people, directing traffic, negotiating trade... Agh, it's absolutely backbreaking. But as long as what we do is good for Lungmen, I'll be—hehe—very pleased.

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, why is Rhodes Island's training course so short...? Insufficient capital? Unacceptable, I'm requesting an immediate transfer to the business division! It's-it's not as if I like business, but if you need me to do it, I'm... more than capable!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You know, Doctor, Lungmen could use someone as talented as you. So, well... If you're not enjoying this line of work, there's plenty of opportunities in the banking and management sectors! I-I can get you a job! Oh? You'd rather we work with Rhodes Island? ...Fine!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Uughh... I'm exhausted... Two shifts in a row really does... zzz... zzz...

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Swire, Senior Superintendent of the L.G.D.. I'll be joining Rhodes Island as a training consultant. Dr. {@nickname}, I'm looking forward to working together with you for the future of Lungmen!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hmm, as far as tactical theory goes, this is a decent application!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion? Hmm? But it doesn't do anything for me back in Lungmen, does it? Well, if you insist, I suppose I will accept it!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Maybe it's that you want me to improve your relationship with Lungmen. Or, possibly, you truly need my talents. I suppose it could be something else you want, too... I'm not sure exactly what, and I can't promise it'll be on offer. But I'll be a stalwart with you to the end.

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Aha~! You finally need my wisdom!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Everyone, follow my orders to the letter!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Wipe them out in one fell swoop! It's cheaper that way!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's finish this quickly. My time is far too precious!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh?

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've seen through the enemy's strategies!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is far from my only battlefield!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Business competitor or not, you will get a lesson from me!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Time is money!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hurry it up, let's move!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lungmen has its own pride!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Time to liquidate!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Fantastic! In battle as in business: high risk, high return!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Capital is all mergers and acquisitions! Victory is like investigation and arrest!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: ...Bad... just bad... You can do better, can't you? We'll work it out together. Don't give up!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: How could this have happened? How could I... How could I have blundered so badly?!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Not bad... No, I think this room could use some more renovation!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ah! How rude of you!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: How... How about we go for dinner together? M-my treat!

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_308_swire_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, roar!

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much… I misunderstand? No problem, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: 'Doctor.' Your title reminds me of the Yanese scholars. Experienced and knowledgeable, they see the forest for the trees. You feel like we've met before? It's true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... Sadly, the more friends I make, the lonelier I feel. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: As you can see, I note down only my experiences and insights, rather than any specific kung fu moves. What really matters to the martial arts is 'Yi' — your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take Dusk's paintings, for example. If I couldn't grasp the intent behind them, and sought to discuss techniques and styles with her, she would only shut the door on my face.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I agreed to be a 'fight choreographer' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket, or getting too lonely. Dusk is timid, and Ling is too fond of drink. I will look after them as well... We are far from a normal family. Nevertheless, we are siblings, and not the collective 'we' as we are often called.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. But the real challenge they face, is preserving their humanity and morality after facing such morbidity, rather growing jaded and desensitized. Indeed, conflicts and mortality have been the way of these lands for eons. But only those giant, terrible creatures are cold-hearted enough to think so.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is train day and night, from the depths of winter to the height of summer. It may sound like a clumsy and brutish method, but the result is giving every last drop you have, leaving no regrets.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: That sword is an unwanted possession that must not be cast away. Huai Tianpei keeping it is an outcome that all concerned parties can accept. My duel with him, you ask? He trained for forty years, and landed a single heavy blow on me. But how many comings and goings of spring and autumn have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: 'Who am I'... For this question, you need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, foggy woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for the distant, radically different future, whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek new answers, is an entirely different question.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander in jianghu seek revenge, status, glory, or a simple resolution. Their obsessions run deep, yet their time runs short. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes chasing a single ideal or undertaking... All those people, how woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The spring comes and goes, leaving a lonely autumn.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I hope you will excuse me for intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please call me 'Chongyue.' It's a name given to me by... an old friend of mine.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The colors that once embellished the autumn grass, hues long buried by war.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen. They risked their lives in battle until death took them, or their age crept upon themselves... yet never for their own ends.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Battles we have fought, death we have braved. Doctor, no need to say more.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lit, quenched, then lit again… The signal fires never ever rest.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The sunset weaves a silken river. Heaven and earth bolster me upon departure.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: One should spar from time to time.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: At your command.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Look at this spectacular sight. Alas, it is now a battlefield.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Many intellectuals must join a battle before penning a decent verse, including that sister of mine… This too is an opportunity.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Unsteady posture, wavering intent. Much to learn yet.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A thousand moves in one breath!

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Strike, and sunder the tides cleft. Retract, and leave no peace bereft.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: After all this time, you still turn to war for solutions!

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a weiqi player like you is a truly rare sight.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, with a handful of sand to clean the blood from one's armor... What a tremendous victory!

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There is never a true victory in brandishing a sword and formulating a strategy, while looking for gains and losses is an even greater folly. So long as you leave no regrets, then all is well.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All warriors must face defeat. Don't lose heart.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is much more comfortable than a military tent. Can I even manage a good night's sleep without the sound of drilling soldiers…?

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, have you figured out how to counter that move from yesterday?

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I can offer you protection, and even handle a little business for you. But you'd better prove it's worth my time.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rhodes Island's work in Lungmen will remain confidential, but I know that your actions saved lives. I've spent a long time trying to gauge just how trustworthy Rhodes Island really is. As for my conclusion, I trust you had no trouble setting up your office in Lungmen?

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm sure you've been working with Mr. Lee. You can trust the information you get from him, but there are limits to what a private investigator can do. If you need something outside his purview, you come to me. Don't worry, my methods won't send any trouble Rhodes Island's way.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I just saw Swire here. It surprised me how she was working so hands-on. If we'd followed the dreams we had as kids, she would've become the head of Lungmen's Chamber of Commerce, and I might be a university lecturer right now. You never know... Hm? No, I don't need to say hello. Given her status, it would be inappropriate for us to be seen in public.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The coat my father always wears is a birthday present I gave him. I'm so used to the dignified airs he puts on, sometimes I even forget that... underneath the coat is an old man growing frailer by the day. Sooner or later, someone will have to stand up and take the weight off his shoulders.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: To certain people, the slums are a problem that needs to be solved. To others, this is their home. The shift from 'Slums' to 'Downtown' could take generations to settle. I don't know how far I can carry it myself, but I'll do what I can.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I've never seen Ch'en onboard Rhodes Island. She has things to do, doesn't she? Hmph, hardly see any merit in recruiting operators like her. It's true that we don't get along very well. But I must admit, she is the one who showed me a different path.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I had nothing to do, so I trimmed the potted plant on your desk a little. No matter how busy life is, we can't forget our aesthetics. Why are you so surprised? The four arts, flower arrangement, tea ceremony... They were all part of my education. You would never have guessed? Whatever.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The nightscape here is very different from my childhood memories. Lungmen may be advancing by the day, but it still has its unlit corners... How about we go for a drink together? You can't truly know a city until you've visited its streets during the wee hours.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You can't let them see you exhausted, can you…?

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You and I have probably crossed paths before, Doctor, but we finally found time for a formal introduction. There'll be much more done on the problems the Infected face in the Lungmen slums, now that we're working in direct communication.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There are many ways to deal with trouble, and direct confrontation is usually my last choice.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I sometimes attend ceremonies like these just to make things go smoother. I don't remember how many titles I have. But in the end, I always have to return to the shadows.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I know what I'm doing, and that's all that matters. At the end of the day, not all honors need to be made public, and not all roads need to be trod together.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You tell me your ends, just don't ask me my means.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If any of you have any doubts about the target, this is your last chance to pull out.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I hope I won't have to explain to you what we mean by 'necessary methods.'

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's time to make an example. They'll see what happens when they break the rules.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Got it.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Say no more.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Watch the shadow behind you.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's put them six feet under.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You didn't think. So this is what happens when you cross the line.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You want to talk? Too late for that.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Give me a reason to let you go. Don't have one? What a pity.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Shatter into pieces.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It better remain a secret forever.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Clean, decent. No one will ever find their remains.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The situation is still salvageable. Leave the rest to me.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There is always a way to correct a mistake. Don't let anger get the best of you.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I don't need too much room here, but this place could use some decoration.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You'll need an explanation for what you just did.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Boh loh yau, fresh out of the oven, want one?

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_4080_lin_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I hope you didn't run into any trouble, Doctor.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, I'll leave the files I sorted here. Oh, you don't have to thank me. I am used to it, and it's nothing difficult... Um, are you thirsty perhaps? Should I make you some tea?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm not very good at speaking any languages other than Yanese. That's why I was a little scared at first and didn't talk much. But everyone's very friendly, and there are a lot of people from Yan here. Phew... it really puts my mind at ease.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Sorry to disturb you, Doctor, but would you happen to know where Provence and everyone else went? My family sent me some goodies from back home, and I thought I'd share some with them since they've been taking care of me... Oh, there are some for you too, Doctor. Please have a taste!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, could you help me look for my little dumpling? It's the small black-and-white doll. I thought I'd left it here, but I can't find it... *Whimpers*, please, I can't sleep at night without it.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The rescue team has to deal with the Catastrophes a lot, so it's only a matter of time for us before we become infected. None of us reject anyone because of that. The crystallization on my body isn't very conspicuous, and it doesn't hurt even if you press down on it... Sometimes, I even forget that I have this on my body.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: When I first joined the rescue team, I wasn't very used to the climate or the food there. I'd get too homesick to fall asleep at night, and I cried to myself many, many times, but whenever I see the people we rescued, I start to think that maybe I can keep at it...

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, sorry to bother you... I've been studying Oripathy prevention techniques during Catastrophe relief, and Tsukinogi suggested that I come ask for your advice... Um... Sorry, am I being a bother?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Uhh! Doctor, why would you sneak up on me like that? Huh? What am I holding? Oh, this is a letter I got from home. When I made the decision to leave, my parents were so angry that they said they would disown me, but there's a saying where I come from: Blood is thicker than water...

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: When I got infected with Oripathy, I knew I probably wouldn't be able to live the peaceful life my parents wanted for me. I don't regret it, though... Besides, if I hadn't made my decision, I would never have met you or anyone else from Rhodes Island here and now, hehe.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor? Doctor? Sorry to bother you. Please lift your head up a little and sleep with the cushion. If you fall asleep like this, the letters from the report will get all over your face...

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hello, I'm a member of the Yan disaster relief organization 'Chun-qian,' dispatched here as an intern. My name is... Oh, I-I'm sorry. We need to use our codenames here, right? I'm terribly, terribly sorry. Please call me Mulberry.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Uhh..The mountain collapsed, and the ground crumbled...! They're not special effects from an action movie, are they?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh? A promotion? Really? I get a salary from Rhodes Island as well as Chun-qian?! I... I'm so happy...!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This time, I'm not doing this to help someone else, I'm doing it for myself... Doctor, thanks for always being there to cheer me on. Now, I'm sure that everything that I've done is truly meaningful.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'll do my best to support everyone!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh? Me as team captain? Ah... Are you sure?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Okay, we'll head out right away... Everyone, please stay safe. We'll meet again once this is over.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Watch out, everyone! There's movement up ahead!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Safety goggles... Okay, I have mine on. Let's go!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Phew... Haah! Oh, I'm here! I-I'm not nervous!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Preparing rescue...!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rescue team Mulberry in position!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Everyone, please be careful!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I... I can do it too!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Where are you looking? It's dangerous to get distracted!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's my job to ensure everyone's safety!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Report! All rescue operations in the area have been completed. Evacuation and escort proceeding without issue! Phew, thank goodness nobody's hurt...

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Phew, that wraps up the operation. Doctor, was I helpful?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Wait! It's not safe that way... We have to do something. I'll go fetch them right away!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's not safe here! Everyone, please evacuate! Doctor, follow me!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Whoa, this is the staff dormitory... Um, will I need to pay rent?

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh? Ah! I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor! I really appreciate it, but please stop trying to sneak any more amulets onto me... I have way too many already!

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_473_mberry_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hello, Doctor. Do you have work today too?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: D-Doctor! Excuse me, but could you please move a little? You're stepping on a coin...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My dream is to be praised sincerely by the entire world... Ah, um, maybe just Lungmen... Well, maybe I should start with Rhodes Island, or, um, just you! Yes, that is my dream for the time being...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ugh, I forgot to turn off the light when I left the office yesterday... Hm? Rhodes Island has a power generation facility so there's no need to pay for electricity? Really? Does that I mean I get to eat dinner in the future?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is the Originium ammunition that Jessica ordered... Eh? D-Doctor! Isn't this dollar amount wrong? Or is this the currency of some small remote country? It's not? It's LMD? I, I, I, I, I see... Don't worry, I was just a l-l-l-little s-surprised.

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oripathy... Hm, even though it's a bit beyond my field of study, it does seem to be worth looking into... But if I add another research project, I'll go from two meals a day to two days a meal... Ugh...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Frugality is a type of virtue, but for me, it's closer to a habit... D-despite that, if you or my friends were in need, I'd gladly help out! I'm serious!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You'd like to take a look at my clawhook? That's maybe fine... but whatever you do, don't push this button. And watch your thumb when you're holding the grip... W-wait, you're not winding the rope correctly, and... Ack! Sorry, don't mind me, you can keep looking at it...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: After I become a great, world-famous scientist with lots of money, I swear I'll have three meals a day and dessert too, just like Jessica... And then, with the money I'm not able to spend, I'd put it back into making Lungmen a better place. Um... if a day like that ever comes.

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Money is very important. Before I returned to Lungmen, I refused a large retention fee from the research institute, so my self-funded research project went under... But it's more important to be home. I can always save up more money, and now I won't go dizzy from looking at all those large numbers!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: ...Did you fall asleep? Just let me handle the rest, though I am a bit hungry.

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oww... my head! Sorry... Oh, y-you're the Doctor? It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Snowsant. Sorry, I shouldn't be walking with my head down...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Woah... This isn't something you can learn with more effort...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ehh? A p-promotion? I feel a bit more pressure, but I'll be okay. This is the proof that I'm one step farther than when I first came.

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: 'Heaven rewards the hard-working.' Wouldn't you agree, Doctor?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It'll be all right, as long as I work just as hard as I did during training...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You want m-me to be the squad leader? I really don't know anything about battle though...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Clawhook inspection complete! Take a deep breath... I can do this!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I found the enemy!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: M-me?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'll do my best!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My clawhook won't malfunction, right?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This is my first time being so close to a battlefield...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Clawhook at the ready!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Stop moving around, it'll be easier this way!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: O-owww!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My equipment's in good shape!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: As long as we work together, there's no obstacle we can't overcome!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: What a flawless victory - not a bit of waste!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Some enemies got away, sh-should we chase after them?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I, I'll go salvage some damage parts, to at least reduce our losses...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Woah, so this is what it's like inside Rhodes Island... I'm so envious...

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Eek!

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor?

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Good day, Doctor.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Sorting files? Whoa, I've suddenly gotten this headache. I can't take it, I need a break. Well, keep at it, Doctor. Such little paperwork should be a walk in the park for you, right?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A job? Of course, I'm all ears. Or maybe you'd like something a little spicier than detective work? Some wet work? Haha, just pulling your leg. We don't do that sort of thing. We're fine, upstanding citizens running a legitimate business.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Having Waai Fu and Hung around to keep an eye on that Aak boy really saves me a broken back. I'll admit, it's shameful, but I started out babysitting these kids, and now they're all taking care of me. Kids these days do more than we did when I was young, and that's great.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's thanks to your patronage that the agency is still running smoothly, give or take. Lungmen's a place with the human touch—live there long enough, and sooner or later you'll know a crowd, find the right connections. We don't like spilling blood in our line of work—always best to solve things friendly.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: How do you like it, Doctor? Jaye makes mean finballs, doesn't he? Old Tung taught that boy his trade and his way of treating people. It all combines for a flavor unique to Lungmen. Come on, have a try. It'll warm you up.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Under this heading, you had the third row on the left here wrong, so I patched that up, no need for thanks. Oh, do I come off very fluent? Not at all, this is still my first time accounting on a scale so small outside of the agency. Things used to be very—ah, I'm getting distracted, don't you mind.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why are the lights all on at this hour... oh? Ah, Doctor. Are you still processing battle records? Well, I never thought you were such a workaholic. I'm impressed. But! You'd better turn in sooner. It's not worth it to break your body doing it.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Everyone's chasing fame and profit. But after so many winning and losing, how many people get to end up as what they like? Living a decent little life of your own is sometimes a lot to ask for. Ah, what are we all doom and gloom for? I'll go stir-fry something up, so you wait for me, Doctor. A drink together would be even better, don't you think?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My hexagram says to avoid going out, so I'll pass on this mission today... what, I can't? I have to go, no two ways about it? Hah, I see. Then this is a special exception, once only! I'm lending you a hand, so dinner's on you tonight! Look, I'm all decided! This is the joint!

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Why a busy life when you can have a leisurely cup of tea. *gulp* Doctor, you do keep some good tea leaves here.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hello, hello there, you must be the Doctor? You've been looking after my employees for me. They haven't made trouble for you, have they? Oh, that reminds me, here's a card for my agency. Take it, go ahead.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: How about a quick scrap? No, no, I'm just joking. I'm no good in a fight.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion...? There's a first for me. Feels quite fresh, too. I think times like these call for some magic words—thank you very much, boss?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Life goes by in a flash. If you're always jostling for the lead, when do you stop to smell the roses? Don't think too hard about things. Enjoy the moment. No matter how paranoid you are, it'll happen if it's going to happen. And you've dealt with it, all's right with the world.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Do I have to come along too? *Sigh*... fine, fine. Let's get going.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Good. Follow my instructions closely, then. Alright, everyone, dismissed—wait, hold it, don't head off for real! I was joking! Joking!

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's like we're on a school trip here, eh?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Fortune favors the bold, but you still need a few tricks up your sleeves to win the battle.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm sure you can sort them... wait, hold it. Am I up now?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: There, there. Put your worries to rest. I'm right here.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hello, friends, what are we talking about?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Time for a little telling off. But not too harshly.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Come on, man. Friendliness is good for business.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, buddy! Calm it down! You nearly spilled my tea!

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My friends, I implore you to reconsider—Is there REALLY no room for negotiation here?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: *Grumble* I told you. Don't get so worked up.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My thanks. It couldn't have happened without you, Doctor... I owe you for this one. I won't forget.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Well done, Doctor. What, where was I just now? Well, given your capability, it was better for me to be your moral support. Cheered the whole time, you see.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Now, now, hold it! Do not press an enemy at bay. Let them run free.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Risky, risky. There's a terrifying fortune to get. Thank goodness we run fast.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor? Here, take this. Decorate your room with it. Ah, but not at the head of your bed. What does it do? Haha, now that would be telling.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm sure we can talk this out, nice and easy. No need for physical contact, right?

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: No smoking here? But this isn't a cigarette, it's white stick candy. You don't believe me? Go on, try some.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_322_lmlee_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Welcome to Lee's Detective Agency, do you have any work... Well, if it isn't the Doctor!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, Doc. Have you eaten yet? You could have one of my cookies if you're hungry.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doc, if Aak ever steps out of line, could you be lenient with him? He teases people a lot, but he's not a bad person. Also, if he ever gets under your skin, just tell me and I'll get him to tone it down.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Just call on me when you're hungry, Doc, and I'll make you a little something to eat. I may not be a chef, but Mr. Lee taught me how to cook a few recipes.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Say, Doc, do you give any lectures on machines here at Rhodes Island? I've got an interest in that stuff and was hoping I could learn something new.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hahah, just between you and me, Doc, for the longest time I thought all detectives do the same stuff as Mr. Lee. You know, like investigating crime scenes, that sort of thing.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm sure you already know, but with the intellect and talent that Aak's got, he's destined for great things one day. But personally, all that matters to me is that he doesn't ever go back to his old way of doing things.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Me and Mr. Lee, well... How should I put it... I was a bit scared at first. He seemed like a guy who's got dark secrets, which had me on edge... But now after knowing him for so many years, I know that's definitely not the case.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If you need info on something or someone, just tell me and I'll ask Mr. Lee for you. Nothing in Lungmen happens without him knowing about it.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: To be honest with you, I actually don't like getting into fights. I'd much rather we could all get along with each other. But I'm not a militant pacifist; there are things I'll fight to protect. Things like the agency, and now, Rhodes Island as well.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Do— Phew, I just nearly woke the Doc up... Guess I'll take this opportunity to rest too.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You must be the Doctor that Mr. Lee talked about. The name's Hung, it's a pleasure to meet you. My fields of expertise are security and repairing machinery. If you ever need a bodyguard for a public appearance, or if your TV or fridge break down, then be sure to give me a holler!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: So this is what the elite of the elite are like... I've got to work just as hard.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Thanks, Doc! I'll be giving it 110% from here on out!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doc, don't hesitate to give me all the work you need done. I'll admit I'm not an expert at many things, but I've got the build for physically intense tasks!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A mission? I'm ready whenever.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I personally guarantee everyone's safety.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Stay close behind me so we don't get split up.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You can all rest easy, knowing I'm here!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'll handle this!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Where am I needed?

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Get behind me!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I'm here to protect you all!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't think you're getting past us!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Is anyone in need of healing?

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You're not hurting anyone on my watch!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's just a scratch!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: *pant*... *pant*... Sorry, Doc, but could you give me a minute? My body's shaking.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You just stay here and rest, Doc. I'll clean up the battlefield.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Stay beside me, Doc. There are still enemies around.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hurry, Doc, climb onto my back! I'm getting you out of here!

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Leave patrol duty to me.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Are there any broken machines in here?

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Need a hand, Doc?

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_226_hmau_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Morning, Doc.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh yeah, my dude, when you're callin' my name to get my attention, don't forget to stress the K at the end. Or else I might assume you're stammering or somethin'.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Whoa, whoa, hold up! Is that vampire lady none other than 'Mr. Blood'?! Man, we've still not settled that medical score we had a while back, and this is the perfect opportunity! I'll have to set up my experiment equipment later... Heheheheh!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Lemme guess, Hung's still tellin' you to watch out around me, ain't he? Oh, just to 'look after me,' huh? Yeah, that sounds like him all right. But listen, my dude, I know your type. You're like me and just wanna do whatever you want, right? Then you can just ignore that guy and we can do whatever fun stuff we want instead.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yeah, I develop new drugs, do surgery, and nurture bacteria cultures, but those are all just fun hobbies to me. And don't call me a doctor, you got no reason to. I don't go 'round saving people's lives, y'know, I just 'save' people by teaching them the value of their lives. All I can really do is prevent 'em from dying.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The medical department guys are askin' for me? Tell 'em to stop. I don't dig those oh-so-professional physicians. They firmly believe that being a doctor's this noble job and are content with just saving lives... And everything comes crashing down when that faith of theirs is shattered. I've seen that happen time and time again. Honestly, it's kinda sad.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rhodes Island is pretty decent, or more accurately, it's just what I'd hoped. People are dyin' in the world right as we speak. There are doctors cooped up in labs, only workin' to cure diseases rather than prevent 'em. Hardly anyone gets it, but you people actually do. Keep up the good stuff!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Me, a sociopath? You got it all wrong, my dude. Everyone's got their own hardships to deal with, and I know that. Nobody wants to suffer, but what's the point of medicine if the bastards causing suffering are still around? Is medicine gonna save those people who're being murdered? Doctors in suits are not the saviors that Terra needs, my dude.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My pops was an amazing doctor, and he was all about saving people's lives. But his colleagues laughed at him, shunned him, and framed him for malpractice, and that's how he wound up racing down a nasty new path in life. But y'know, stuff like that ain't so unusual, really. I'll admit though, what happened to him really changed my own life.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Have Waai Fu and Hung left? Really? Aight, I'm gonna hang out in your office for a while then. Y'know, if anyone can make the world a better place, it's gotta be people like them. You, meanwhile... Well, who knows, maybe you can be my right hand?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: What's up? Feelin' tired? Then how about testing this new compound I made? Free of charge, of course!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: So you're the Doctor, eh? Nice to meet'cha. My name's Aak. That's right, two A's with a K. Anyway, I'm here 'cause someone at the agency said Rhodes Island needed me. I'm just askin' to make sure here, but does the phrase 'medical mishap' put you off?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Huh... Does this mean I might get involved in combat scenarios like this? Surely not, right?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A promotion? That's almost too good to be true, man. Those agency guys really HAVE been exploiting me all along!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Honestly, I dunno if I'm helpful or not. The way I see it, you've gotta be nice to be helpful, and I'm not blind to how people perceive me. But in any case, if you ever get sick, I've got you covered.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: We goin' on a mission? Let's do it.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All right, team, gimme your thoughts on my new meds after this is done.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Once I start an operation, there's no stoppin' it.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Simmer down, guys. With me on your team, none of you's gonna die even if you want to.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My treatment is not for the squeamish!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The battlefield ain't for me, but I can't pass up on some fun treatment.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Time for a clinical test of my new meds.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You've gotta dose in moderation, 'else it's gonna hurt when you really need it.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All lives are equal... With the exception of yours!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Try my meds and you'll see how crazy they are.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Looks like my meds have the ability to reform bad guys!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Medicine is like Pandora's box: once you open it, there's no goin' back!

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I doubt I can make the world a better place on my own. But with your talent, we can at least stop it from gettin' any worse.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Capturing our enemies and experimenting on 'em doesn't violate any ethics as long as nobody catches us doin' it. Relaaax.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Aren't you a real humanitarian, just letting 'em get away like that?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't worry, my dude. I can fix any injury as long as the patient's still breathing.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's see here, which of these rooms is my new lab?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yeah, what?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Yo, my dude! Found any new experiment samples for me?

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_225_haak_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey, my dude. What's cookin'?

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, where are you going? Shouldn't you be working? Lunch? Well then, I'm coming along. There's a few things I want to buy, and I can protect you too.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Sorry, Doctor, Rhodes Island is just a part-time job for me. I have to study hard to make sure I have a nice, normal future ahead of me. I am committed to keeping in touch with everyday society.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I color coded all the documents to be sent out, the backups have already been delivered, your schedule is right here. I bought your late night snack and put it in the refrigerator. Don't forget to heat it up. And last, oh, do you need me to change the light bulb in your office for you?

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Did I ever tell you about my other job? No? Well, I won't. Don't look at me like that, Doctor. There's just not much to say. If my other office worked a tenth as hard as Rhodes Island does, they'd monopolize Lungmen's entire investigations industry.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You wonder where I learned martial arts? Well, I have my nasty old dad and his weird education to thank for that. Not that I resent kung fu. A hero must uphold justice. Martial arts are a part of me.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
