char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Just like the human heart, martial arts have yin and yang, right and wrong. To right those wrongs, to defeat evil, to counter bad kung fu, these are all second nature to me. The world is dark, and someone must stand for justice.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You think you just saw me? In downtown Lungmen? That may have been me. I just finished class. Hm? You saw me beat down some thugs who were harassing a passerby? And then slipped away before the police arrived? Must have been someone else. Heh heh. Definitely. That's enough about that.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: My rotten dad said he had to go find the true meaning of kung fu. I still don't know where he is. Please! What year does he think it is? Find some common sense and learn some responsibility before you get yourself killed. But at least I haven't forgotten what he taught me: 'Martial arts have martial virtue, humans have human kindness.'

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, did any mail come for me? It did? Great. These are my grades... my very important grades! It's been straight A's for me, so far. If I don't work hard enough, I'll end up regretting all the things I wasn't strong enough to do.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Falling asleep at a time like this... Oh well, I'll just finish your work for you.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Is this Rhodes Island? Nice to meet you. I'm Waai Fu, your new part-timer. Please don't go easy on me. I can handle anything you ask of me.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If I can fight like this here, I can definitely knock them out.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Thank you very much. I won't let you down, Doctor.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I often witness injustices in my life. If I ever find myself unable to stop them, I reflect on the moment, and force myself to get stronger. So, if ever you need me, don't hesitate to say so. I'll be there, with all my strength!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Is there evil to fight?

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I don't have much experience, but I won't turn down the responsibility.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Fight evil with the fist of justice!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Like cutting weeds and pulling roots!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hey.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Go ahead!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: No other choice.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: All right!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You have turned your backs on society!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Pick on someone your own size!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Behold, the power of the Song Do Bart Cham style!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The mind directs, the fist executes!

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Foul intentions lead a foul life. Repent now. There is still time.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: A strong will conquers all.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: That was not enough. I need to train more.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Father... I'm still... not strong enough.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: At least it's better than some old, messy detective agency.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: An ambush...?! Doctor, don't sneak up on me like that. You'll end up in Medical.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You want to go for a walk? I'll go with you. You'll be safe with me.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_243_waaifu_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Care for some tea, Doctor?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Alright, chop chop. Take care of all your work during your coffee break, and you'll get to relax during the rest of your work hours.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's a holiday, so of course I gotta dress a little more casual. It's true I haven't been on as many missions the last couple years, but I could earn passing marks on the L.G.D.'s physical exams wearing heels, I'll have you know.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If Rhodes Island's looking for business partners, you can definitely trust these companies—Why are you looking at me like that? I'm just listing off my recommendations. You're making it look like I'm plotting to take over Rhodes Island. If I were actually planning to do that... I just have to talk you over, right?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk 3
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Ahem... I've taken a glance at our recent operational records. Looks like Rhodes Island's tactics have got more professional over the past few years. Not bad, not bad. Hah? As your former training consultant, what's wrong with me checking your records? I definitely have not been looking at Ch'en's files!

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's not really a big deal, being the L.G.D.'s chief. I've got a little more on my shoulders, a little more to worry about, and I can put myself in Ch'en's shoes a little more now... Oh, let me reiterate: I may have taken over the L.G.D., but I didn't take over for Ch'en! If that stupid dragon were to come back now, she'd have to call me 'Chief.'

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I may have left my family's company, but I still deal in business every now and then. I can build Lungmen this way; there's no need to run away. And now that I've figured out what it is that I need to do, my grandfather doesn't seem nearly that scary anymore. It's only when you put your past fears to good use that you've truly triumphed over fear, right?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: The new Siesta's an interesting place. Even without its beaches and volcano, it's still worth a visit for its sky pools and natural springs. My investment there has resulted in pretty decent returns too~ Doctor, whenever you have the time, we should go and have a look. When you visit a place you haven't been to for some time, it might just feel like meeting an old friend.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Things are looking up for the trading company I'm running with Bison. Transporting one country's goods to another and showing people the sights and cultures of places afar is one of the charms of business. Many are afraid of breaking barriers, but, Doctor, I'm sure we can find common ground.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Is this the last document you have? Alright! You really kept me waiting this time, but finally! Time for supper! I know this new place that's not so bad. It's on me toni—Hm? You don't want me spending money? Hm... Well, you can take me out, too. I know some other places.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Idle
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Rawr... Ahem... Doctor, are you finished with work already?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Onboard
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Long time no see, Doctor. Ahem, let me introduce myself again. Beatrix Schwire, soon-to-be Chief Commissioner of the Lungmen Guard Department—I really am the chief! Whoever said the L.G.D. chief can't take holidays?!

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's been a while, but that's quite the improvement—Hey, why must you emphasize that happened while I wasn't working here as an instructor?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Exceptional talents earn exceptional rewards. That's how things should be.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Promotion 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Alright, alright. I get that you can't do without me anymore. No need to beat around the bush like that. If you need my help, just say the word. I'll always be here for you as your friend.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Added to Squad
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Hm? Not making me the captain?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Just follow my command and it'll all be fine.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Depart
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's try to take up as little of our holiday time as possible.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Begin Operation
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: I don't really want my holiday mood ruined, so hurry up and let yourselves get arrested.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: It's been a while since I've taken orders from anyone... Feels kinda weird.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Take orders from you...? I could.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Wait for my orders.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Deployment 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Commencing operation.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 1
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: You've had nowhere to run since the moment you violated the law.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 2
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Where are you trying to run?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 3
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Be good and let yourself be cuffed. I'll hear all about your motive in the interrogation room.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: In Battle 4
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Put your hands up and don't move!

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 4-star Result
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: That's all the men and wares accounted for. Let's call it a day here~

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: 3-star Result
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Don't get cocky. This is just barely a pass mark by L.G.D. standards, but if you manage to keep this up, I guess I could still commend you.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: If you can take care of something in one go, it's best not to do it twice. Keep your costs under control.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Operation Failure
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Let's wrap it up here. I'll take care of the mission report.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: This place hasn't been redecorated even once this whole time? You serious?

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Tap
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Doctor, do you know what are the consequences of attacking a cop in Lungmen? Don't worry. I'm just teaching you about the laws there.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Trust Tap
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Oh, you like this fashion brand? I can pick out an outfit for you.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Title
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Arknights.

char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.title: Greeting
char_1033_swire2_CN_TOPOLECT.text: Good morning... Hm? Just saying hello. What were you expecting? Rawr?

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Organizing documents? Doctor, we have much more important things to do. Bene, I'll give you a hand, if you insist. But do remember, I expect you to come up with a plan that's worth my while. Do not disappoint me.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: What do you want to know? Secrets of the Siracusan famiglie? There's hardly anything worth mentioning there. The things we do are no different from the wolves fighting in the wilderness thousands of years ago. Only, time has taught us some new tricks. Heh, you see 'order' could be the official name for 'tearing your prey to pieces.'

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: For many years, I couldn't really understand my father. He paid the ultimate price, only to betray almost everything in the end... But I still remember the question my father posed to me many years ago, when we were sitting together in a park: 'Siracusa, sara un posto migliore senza le famiglie?'

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk 3
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Judge Lavinia never realized what she was getting herself into. The game with Signora Sicilia won't be won through courage or resourcefulness alone... She's looking for me? To discuss my unbalanced diet…? Tell her I'm not here.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: The old ways make it impossible to find a new path. If the new Siracusa is built on violence, it will fall back into the same well. The destruction of a few individual famiglie is far, far from enough. We must kick the entire 'habit.'

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: The disputes among the famiglie were petty and stupid. The dons clung on to whatever authority they had, thinking they were the masters of Siracusa. But I invite you, Doctor, to join me in shaping a new era.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: If you want to show respect to the Siracusans, then hire a proper Siracusan chef. The next time I see any 'innovative Siracusan cuisine' out of your minions... Beh, let's just say somebody knows about your little office naps, and it'd be a shame if the beans got spilled on your beauty sleep.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Something on your mind? If it calls for blackmail, bribery, or something worse... none of that would be much trouble for me. Underhanded business is pretty much all I inherited from my famiglia. As for how to use my knowledge, that's your call.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Zaaro, il Signore dei Lupi... the shadow lurking behind me and my father. Don't be fooled by his pretentious words. A wild beast's hunt won't slow the progress of humanity. If he appears before you one day, I will drive him away.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Idle
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Hey. Is our 'cooperation' just me watching you sleep?

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Onboard
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Buongiorno, Doctor. I am Famiglia Bellone's... Lasci perdere. My famiglia doesn't exist anymore, but that was the price we paid to buy change in Siracusa. As for what comes next... Operator Vigil is at your service, Doctor. I hope our partnership will be productive.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Watching Battle Record
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: I am no stranger to violence. As long as I'm on the scene, things should be a little more efficient.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Promotion 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: A promotion? There's no need to test me like that, Doctor. I've played this game too... winning people over with small rewards. But if you're just trying to show your faith in me... Va bene, grazie.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Promotion 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Our partnership has been productive, Doctor. A made man would sell out anybody for his ambitions, but I can promise you one thing: you've bought my loyalty with yours.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Added to Squad
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Va bene. Let's see if your plan is worthy of my work.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: The process is just as important as the end result. Don't go dying on me, ragazzi.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Depart
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Remember, our purpose is not violence itself, but rather the victory it brings.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Begin Operation
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Chi morirà qui oggi?

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Ready to move.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: They'll be sleeping with the fins in no time.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Deployment 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Don't make this harder than it needs to be.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Deployment 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Anything outside the plan, I'll judge for myself.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: In Battle 1
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Let's put an end to this show, pronto.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: In Battle 2
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: And what purpose do you think your sacrifice will serve?

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: In Battle 3
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: This hunt has dragged on for too long.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: In Battle 4
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: A valiant struggle, but you won't get away.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: 4-star Result
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: They have no idea who they're messing with. Bravo, Doctor. I was right to partner with you. I hope you'll find even more challenges for me in the next battle.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: 3-star Result
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Are we done yet? What are you looking all smug for? These stronzi have already wasted too much of our time.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: They're getting away. Do you need me to walk you through this? Ma dai! Whack them already.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Operation Failure
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: I'll take care of the evacuation. You get moving, fast. I hope this won't happen again, Doctor.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Assigned to Facility
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Careful with the moisture-proofing. I hate the smell of rotting wood.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Tap
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Are you having fun? Because I'm not.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Trust Tap
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Ah... Mi mancano le osterie di Siracusa. Doctor, is the kitchen available right now? I can make something myself.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Title
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: Arknights.

char_427_vigil_ITA.title: Greeting
char_427_vigil_ITA.text: None of these documents matter at all, Doctor. The only thing that matters is how you act.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: It's been a long time since I've felt like there was any conviction or meaning in my work. Rather than sit through show trial after show trial, I prefer to wade through these thorny, complicated files.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: You don't have to tiptoe around me. I don't judge good or evil on any ironclad law. And with all the crimes staged in the name of order… Ah, pay no mind to this judge's grumble, a powerless judge waiting to be indicted for misconduct in office.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: The thorns on this codex? Yes, of course the spikes hurt, but I wish for the pain to remind me: No matter how weak the statutes in Siracusa, no matter how highly I think of my calling, perversion of justice and blasphemy against the law are crimes.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk 3
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: They say 'the law is the basis of morality,' but that's not a natural truth. It emerges from a consensus of the people. When the people come to see violence as order, the law is nothing but a fantasy to dream of. And I, as the keeper of that fantasy, am the most ridiculous of all.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: In Siracusa, being a city court judge is a dangerous job. Either you join 'them,' or... you disappear. I thought I could strike a balance between the two, but there's no way to stay clean when you're surrounded by mud. In the end, I was just another accomplice.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Maybe Siracusa really is that hard to change. The gangs, the famiglie... They shared a womb with Siracusa and shaped it into the country it is today. But we can't take them for granted. We must believe that a different path exists.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Oh, mi dispiace, I didn't see you there. If you're all done with work, how about joining me for a drink?… Why that look in your eyes? I'm not an alcoholic. But everyone needs some liquid assistance every now and then, whether for fatigue or for suffering. Ecco. It's on the strong side, so sip slowly.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: If you ever get a chance to visit Siracusa, please avoid the rainy season. However, if you really are that unfortunate... best thing you can do is find a little shop on the street and sit for a while. Maybe only after the rain can one enjoy the momentary illusion that the city is clean.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: In my many years as a judge, I've only handed down a few verdicts I could feel good about. I still remember the look on those two kids' faces when I broke up their little scuffle and told the aggressor to apologize. What, why are you laughing? Even the greatest justice must start from somewhere small.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Idle
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: You're sleeping? There's nothing more valuable than these rare moments of peace. Conserviamo questi momenti.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Onboard
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: I am Lavinia Falcone, formerly a judge of Siracusa. Today, I report to you as Operator Penance. I hope that in working for Rhodes Island, I can absolve myself of my past mistakes.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: So much violence in the name of order... Doctor, I can only pray that your efforts are more than futile.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Promotion 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: I am honored to earn your support. We can certainly work together and offer mutual assistance, but let me be frank — that doesn't mean you can influence my decisions. Sorry, no offense intended, but that's a lesson I learned the hard way.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Promotion 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Be it a famiglia, a society, or a country, people are often bound by mutual interest... I used to assume this was the way of the world, but Doctor, you showed me a different path. I hope we can share this mutual trust long into the future.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Added to Squad
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Sitting around in an office won't bring about justice. That's one thing I know for a fact.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Whether or not you are burdened by a criminal record is unimportant to me. All I ask is that in this coming battle, our goals might be aligned.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Depart
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Contempt for the law is a crime. The words of my codex will prove their own worth.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Begin Operation
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: This time, I will hand down a fair verdict.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: No matter what I might encounter, I will not back down.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: What the law does not specify, I will reveal through practice.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Deployment 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: This gavel of justice is weighty. Spero che siate pronti.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Deployment 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: I am fighting for more than just the law. Also the justice and virtue that extend beyond it.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: In Battle 1
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: The law is a means, not an end.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: In Battle 2
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: There is no such thing as absolute justice, but I still invoke it!

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: In Battle 3
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Can crimes be punished through methods outside of the law?

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: In Battle 4
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Your crimes are irrefutable.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: 4-star Result
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Even a crime-ridden swamp is not beyond salvation. Doctor, thank you for once again reminding me of this fact.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: 3-star Result
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: A trial in all its vaunted glory will not bring about any substantive change. It matters more what we do after the trial. Doctor, I've seen what you've done, and find it praiseworthy.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Doctor, prepare a team to arrest the fugitives. There is no difference between a moment of mercy and a miscarriage of justice. They have not yet been read their verdict.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Operation Failure
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Naturally, they and the darkness behind them will occasionally prevail... But mark my words, even the most frustrating rainy season will pass in time. Until then, all we can do is persevere, and keep trying.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: This place is nothing like stagnant, old Siracusa. The breath of hope flows here.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Tap
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Please show proper respect.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Trust Tap
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Are you here to discuss criminal procedure with me? No? Eccellente. I hope you never need my knowledge in that regard.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Title
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Arknights.

char_4065_judge_ITA.title: Greeting
char_4065_judge_ITA.text: Doctor, I've categorized these documents according to their importance. Let me remind you that some of your operations land in a legal gray zone. I'm not opposed to them, but you need to think things through. I'll offer my advice as well.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times, Doctor. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: How does it feel to be back in Siracusa? Not great. It's for wise guys and famiglie, not me. I'm only staying long enough to cut ties with the past. After I'm done washing my hands of the whole business, I'm heading back to Lungmen to pick up the girls, and then going out for a nice drive.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I didn't want to get Penguin Logistics involved, but it was a relief to see them in Siracusa. My noisy friends, that life of freedom... Looking back now, staying with them in Lungmen was the best decision I ever made. Just, don't tell them I said that.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk 3
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Sometimes I hear Siracusans talking about the downfall of Famiglia Texas. No two versions of the story are the same. Most are pretty dull, and some make for interesting fairytales, but in the end, they're all pretty embellished. The real story is... I just got exhausted, and decided to leave.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Ever noticed how even the rain here stains the walls outside? Dirty rainwater can't wash anything clean. And that's Siracusa. Siracusans might be used to it, but I'm not.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I've got no interest in joining Greyhall. The dons sit in their chairs, acting all high and mighty, hiding their plans. I decided to confront Signora Sicilia because she thinks she can tame everyone, and that's one thing I can't stand.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I saw Lappland in Siracusa. Oh, you haven't seen her in a while? Not like she needs anyone worrying about her. If she's over me now, she'll find something else to cut. As for the score we haven't settled, I say it doesn't matter. We'll meet again soon enough.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I was born in Columbia, but my grandfather wanted me to become a proper mafiosa and sent me to Siracusa to learn the trade. But to this day I don't understand why the people here like macaroni so much? I used to go to this little place for macaroni myself, but it closed down a long time ago. The owner died in a back alley.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: In Siracusa, there were a whole lot of people trying to guess what I'd do. It wasn't that complicated. I was there to do what I had to do, and help those who deserved help. Doctor, all I ask is that we continue to get along just like we used to. This relationship, built on real trust, is hard to find there.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Idle
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: It's quiet here. No hitmen haunting the shadows, no wolves waiting in the alleys.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Onboard
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: We meet again, Doctor. The Siracusan rainy season always gets my tail wet, so I prefer the climate here. Don't worry, Exusiai and the girls will keep taking care of the deliveries, but I'll handle any jobs assigned to me personally.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Watching Battle Record
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Thanks. Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Promotion 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I'm not helping you for the money, Doctor. But still, go ahead and send my salary over to Penguin Logistics as usual. I'll pick it up from Emperor.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Promotion 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Added to Squad
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Order confirmed, crystal clear.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Alright. Try to keep up. Let me know if you can't.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Depart
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: No need to make a scene.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Begin Operation
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Don't leave bloodstains. They're hard to clean.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Moving to designated location.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Need speed to succeed.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Deployment 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Got a problem that needs solving?

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Deployment 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I see them. I'll be right back.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: In Battle 1
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Bad luck, you ran into me.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: In Battle 2
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: You saw nothing.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: In Battle 3
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Pass on your last words? No.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: In Battle 4
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: This will keep you quiet.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: 4-star Result
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: 3-star Result
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: A battle without an explosion or cheering makes me feel a little uneasy. Let's head back. A drink? Maybe next time.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Operation Failure
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: I can take out a few more. You go ahead and retreat.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Assigned to Facility
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: This place reminds me of Lungmen. It's quiet. Doesn't have the constant pitter patter of the rain.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Tap
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Hey. Stop it.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Trust Tap
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Doctor, where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Title
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Arknights.

char_1028_texas2_ITA.title: Greeting
char_1028_texas2_ITA.text: Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_102_texas_ITA.text: My next mission is to protect you, Doctor.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk 1
char_102_texas_ITA.text: I don't say much? That's because I'd rather avoid thinking about most things.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk 2
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Our job is to handle life and death.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk 3
char_102_texas_ITA.text: I usually listen to Sora's songs when I'm driving.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Cigarette? Oh, no, this is chocolate. You've gotta replenish your energy regularly. Which reminds me... do you want some coffee?

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_102_texas_ITA.text: How long have I worked for Penguin Logistics? When did I start...? I don't even know how long it's been.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Watch out for the Red Wolf. She's not evil, but... she's not like us.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_102_texas_ITA.text: No matter how hard I run, my past will catch up to me one day.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_102_texas_ITA.text: My independent lifestyle and rowdy friends have brought me a lot of trouble... but I kind of like it this way.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Idle
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Is it time for a break?

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Onboard
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Code name Texas. I'm responsible for driving, moving cargo, and keeping our people safe. Try to get the mission briefings as concise as possible, please.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_102_texas_ITA.text: I'm not good at barking orders.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_102_texas_ITA.text: A few of them passed through.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Operation Failure
char_102_texas_ITA.text: I may have underestimated this operation.

char_102_texas_ITA.title: Assigned to Facility
char_102_texas_ITA.text: Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Ehi, Doctor. Hope you don't mind if I bring my weapons inside. I'll plop myself right over here.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Somebody out to get you, huh? Then have a long, hard think about who you might've wronged in the past.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: If someone's out for revenge on you, don't hesitate, just take them out. Once you decide to pick up a weapon, you don't need a reason to kill.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk 3
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: It's been a while... I see that Texas made some friends. Hehehe... Affascinante! Can't wait to get to know them!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: You think I'm an assassin, huh? Yeah, alright. Call me whatever you want. I can be anyone, do anything, kill anyone anytime. Just so long as I want to!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: I love power, Doctor. And you offered me a job where I can use my power to my heart's content... Love it. Honestly, the only joy I get out of this insane world is using my power to conquer it.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Texas? Ha, she's afraid of me, but I don't wanna do anything to her, except maybe try to bring back the old Texas. The one we got here's a cucciolo impaurito.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: That red one... oh... Doctor, keep her away from me! She'd definitely kill me in a fight. But I have this feeling... this feeling... ugh, why do I want to fight her so badly?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: You want to know what happened between me and Texas? Hehe, you don't have a single idea of what you are sticking your nose into. You'll find out the truth someday, but not from me.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Idle
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Sleep tight... enjoy your sweet dreams while you still can.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Onboard
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: A great evil stands in the way of justice. My master, in the name of hatred and revenge, lead the weak onward!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Watching Battle Record
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Don't you just love how I keep getting more and more powerful?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Promotion 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Hahaha! Bene! I love how much you trust me. You can't say the same for Texas, right?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Promotion 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Molto bene! That's more like it! Strength, unfettered and unchained! That's what I'm talking about!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Added to Squad
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Make Texas the leader!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Put Texas on my team!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Depart
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Begin Operation
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: We're fighting you guys? Then please do your bestest job, or I'll be really bored.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Show me what you've got.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Tell me, what's your plan?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Deployment 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Solid positioning.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Deployment 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Ahahaha!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: In Battle 1
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: C'mon! C'eri quasi, tesoro!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: In Battle 2
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Can you do it?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: In Battle 3
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Just try me!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: In Battle 4
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: You'll have to try harder than that!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: 4-star Result
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: It's over? Ah, che noia!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: 3-star Result
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Hahaha, sliced 'em up like a millefoglie. How do you like it?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Not my best work. You can lay it on me for letting a few get away.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Operation Failure
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Assigned to Facility
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Hm? Did I see a red shadow flash by?

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Tap
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Haha!

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Trust Tap
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Title
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Arknights.

char_140_whitew_ITA.title: Greeting
char_140_whitew_ITA.text: Heh. Hi, Doctor.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Hm? Ah, this soil... it can murmur. It can dance. It is my friend.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Miss Closure told me I shouldn't walk about Rhodes Island 'fully equipped'... but I'm not used to... revealing... myself. Sorry...

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Thank-you letters? Ah, from the Sarkaz workers yesterday? My equipment and type of Arts are a good match for physical work. Besides, their materials and fuel weren't featherweight. And they relied on the power of flesh and blood to ensure Rhodes Island sails smooth... it's incredible.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk 3
char_311_mudrok#1.text: That elite operator... I thought I'd seen enough bizarre Originium Arts in Leithanien to write any wild fantasy. But the moment he pushed apart the fog with a wave of his hand, I understood, as a Sarkaz, he was young yet incredibly ancient.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I often think of the soldiers and companions that have left us. Sometimes, I have a sort of delusion that even now, I'm still fleeing... Doctor, have you been to Kazdel before? That was where my journey started, and once, where I'd thought it would end.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Dr. Kal'tsit, huh... She startled me, but she's reassuring in spades... One thing, though. Rhodes Island seems to get along well with another mercenary group, too. Could you tell me about them, Doctor? It's best I don't know? I see... then I think I can more or less guess who.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I became a Rhodes Island Operator so they could be treated properly, live on properly, and only then would those warriors... have died with meaning. But... since coming to Rhodes Island, I've seen clearly what I, myself, am truly fighting for. That was a first for me.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Me, alone, talking to a clay doll...? You're... you're telling you saw me? That was just a kind of ceremony... huh? So everyone already knew? Really? Then I'll be more careful next time, do it late when nobody's up... um, I shouldn't?

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_311_mudrok#1.text: From Kazdel to Leithanien, so many marks have been carved onto the suffering. The moment they had no choice but to fight, I realized I had nothing at all. How do you see me, Doctor? You trust me? Will that trust... allow me to live on?

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Idle
char_311_mudrok#1.text: ...The person napping there is the Doctor. Remember that well. Our road together is sure to be long and far.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Onboard
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Sarkaz mercenary, Mudrock... You're the Doctor, then. Rhodes Island has saved me many times, and now, I'd like you to let me return the favor.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Watching Battle Record
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I've had a taste of how Rhodes Island fights before, but, well, this still makes a great reference...

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Promotion 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I used to be known as Reunion, and then under the Mudrock Squad, and now... I've been promoted by my former enemy. Is this what they meant by 'life is a rollercoaster?'

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Promotion 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Hm? This seems fresh? I never take my helmet off in battle, after all... There's a lot of reasons why, but things have changed now. S... staying like this? If I have to...

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Added to Squad
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I'm simply a Rhodes Island Operator, now. I'll obey your command.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_311_mudrok#1.text: The captain... I don't like leading, but... I'm used to it.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Depart
char_311_mudrok#1.text: It's time to fight.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Begin Operation
char_311_mudrok#1.text: The enemy...

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Selecting Operator 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: The soil answers my will.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Selecting Operator 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Speak. The rocks are listening.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Deployment 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Battlefield never changes.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Deployment 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: I'll fight for myself.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: In Battle 1
char_311_mudrok#1.text: The land is as my friend.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: In Battle 2
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Be as the mountains.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: In Battle 3
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Heed my call.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: In Battle 4
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Arise, great boulder.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: 4-star Result
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Running is useless... resist it, even if you are not willing to resist. This is the only way I've come to know to face suffering.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: 3-star Result
char_311_mudrok#1.text: My friends are whispering their celebration. They cheer our victory, Doctor.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Chase them... I'll watch over the battlefield with my friends' eyes.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Operation Failure
char_311_mudrok#1.text: It's not the first I've fled with my back to the enemy. If even more can live on this way... I'll cover your backs.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Assigned to Facility
char_311_mudrok#1.text: The ceiling's... a little lower than I imagined.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Tap
char_311_mudrok#1.text: ...Mm? Did you touch me just now?

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Trust Tap
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Doctor? Could you stay with me for a bit? I'd like... to ask you a little about Kazdel. Ah, and my friends have missed you, too.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Title
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Arknights.

char_311_mudrok#1.title: Greeting
char_311_mudrok#1.text: Hello, Doctor.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Appointed as Assistant
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: This table's really high! I guess it's easier if I just use my old form to jump up.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk 1
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: What are you doing here? There's these Medic Operators who keep chasing my tail all the time saying they wanna study me! I need to lay low! Still, why are you hiding here too? You're not slacking off, right, Doctor?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk 2
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: My power is controlling metal, stuff like the thing on your table. I can make it turn pointy, round, or flat, and even more complicated shapes too.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk 3
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: The people here look a lot like the spirits in our world. So maybe, the spirits in this world look like you do, Doctor?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk after Promotion 1
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: This place is a lot like the Hall for Spirits to me, with all the Infected staying here because they have nowhere to go. But... the Infected have it really different from spirits. They can't even escape just by staying far away from everyone.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk after Promotion 2
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: There's so many Catastrophes here... Is this why your cities have to keep wandering everywhere all the time?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: I get it! Operators are Executors, aren't they? Executors do errands for the Hall for Spirits, and Operators do errands for Rhodes Island! Huh? No?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: I'll be an Executor someday, just like my master. My master's really mighty! Um... you too. Everyone on this battleship listens to you, so you've got to be somebody incredible.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Doctor, are we friends now? Then if you can, you should visit our side to play sometime!

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Idle
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Doctor, are you eating something secret there?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Onboard
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Hello, Doctor, my name's Xiaohei, and I'm a spirit.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Watching Battle Record
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Doctor... if I don't understand these tapes, can I ask you about them?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Promotion 1
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Promotion? What does that mean?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Promotion 2
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: I still don't really get it, but thanks, Doctor.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Added to Squad
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Doctor, I'm here! Huh? Is there something on my face? Ah, I just finished eating, haha.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: I'm gonna be the captain? Can I handle that...?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Depart
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Doctor, grab onto me, I'll use my power to send us there. It's quicker that way.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: 4-star Result
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Is everyone okay? I'm so, so glad!

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: 3-star Result
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: There's just mighty people everywhere.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Sub 3-star Result
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Phew—lucky. You're still fine, right?

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Operation Failure
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: It's all my fault for being so weak, Doctor...

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Assigned to Facility
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: I can't forget about the mission the Doctor gave me. But this mat's so comfortable, and the sun's so warm. I think I'm getting kinda sleepy...

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Title
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Arknights.

char_4067_lolxh#1.title: Greeting
char_4067_lolxh#1.text: Hello, Doctor!
